節目簡介: 上半場以不同地方及不同種類的舞蹈為主。如有羅馬尼拉舞、夏威夷舞、中國民間民族（朝鮮族、維吾爾族及彝族等）、現代舞等。下半場的舞劇是以新編童話故事[賣火柴的女孩]為藍本，透過女孩的際遇，告訴大家遇到困難不要害怕;只要有希望，堅定自己的意志，推開心中的那堵牆，就可感受世界多美好，未來是充滿希望的。
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

節目簡介: 繼《行行重行行音樂旅程》及《絲綢之路 1 之飛蛾舞會》後，亞洲民眾戲劇節協會再一次帶來英港共融社區藝術計劃－《遊蕩於人生風景》！演出溶合了舞蹈和影像，探索當下改變的身體，它的起伏曲線、結構、節奏和建築。表演者與觀眾都踏上一個「人的旅程」，釋放他們的感覺，刺激他們的幻想。來自英國 Shrewsbury 的藍眼晴靈魂舞團透過現代舞和接觸即興的媒介，讓傷健人士走在一起表達創意。
About the Programme: Following The Long Walk and The Moth Ball, the Asian People's Theatre Festival Society brings you yet another collaboration between Hong Kong and the best community artists from the United Kingdom,  the famous inclusive dance group, Blue Eyed Soul in Wander-A human landscape.  Blue Eyed Soul Dance Company works with the disabled and abled people through the medium of contemporary dance and contact improvisation. Wander--A Human Landscape fuses dance and video to explore the ever-changing scenery of the body, its contours, structure, rhythms and architecture, inviting both performer and audience to travel on a human journey which will awake the senses and stimulate the imagination.
地點: 賽馬會創意藝術中心黑盒劇場
Venue: Black Box Theatre, JCCAC
venue.1: 賽馬會創意藝術中心黑盒劇場
venue_en: Jockey Club Creative Arts Centre, Black Box Theatre

節目名稱: 絲綢之路 1 - 飛蛾舞會
節目簡介: 亞洲民眾戲劇節協會與英國 Mind the Gap 聯合製作。英國著名劇團Mind the Gap的Tim Wheeler(導演) 和 Jez Colburne (歌手/演員)於零九年五月來港與陳美心、丸仔、莫昭如、李雅瑜、吳文基及許多傷健舞者一起排練及創作。又一個跨文化的互動、熱切的演出、激情的派對、繞樑三日的歌聲、蠶的故事、繭的故事、飛蛾的故事、人的故事、一個工廠、一個現代絲綢之路的故事…給你一段精神肉體都滿足的神奇之旅！
About the Programme: Tim Wheeler(director) and Jez Colburne(singer/actor) from Mind-the-Gap(UK) collaborate with Hong Kong artists including Mandy Chen, yuenjie, Mok Chiu Yu and people with or without disabilities to create a show, full of music, dance, drama, poem and installation... A magical experience for both your body and mind!
Venue: Jockey Club Creative Arts Centre
venue_en: Jockey Club Creative Arts Centre

節目簡介: 《港菲民眾文化戲劇節》將讓居港菲律賓人和本地華人互動交流，透過遊戲及各種創意藝術活動互相了解，提倡平等、和諧及共融社會。此計劃提供一個平台讓大眾和少數族裔聆聽大家的聲音，讓整個社區可體現多元文化及增權。《港菲民眾文化戲劇節》前亦舉行了一連串的工作坊，讓參與者體驗到精彩的菲律賓民俗藝術訓練包括Pangalay 舞蹈工作坊、Poi火球舞工作坊及皮影戲工作坊
About the Programme: Filipino artist Marie Gold Villar is invited to stay in Hong Kong for one month, bringing Filipino Migrants and Local Chinese People together through Integrated Theatre Arts activities in the pursuit of a collective understanding, promoting equality and harmony between Filipinos, Hong Kongers and citizens of the world. There are three nine-hour workshops which will provide trainings of very exciting Filipino folk arts, integrating Hong Kong with world’s other folk arts and cultures.  The workshops include Pangalay workshop, Poi Dance workshop and Shadow Puppetry  workshop.
地點: 香港灣仔香港藝術中心麥高利小劇場
Venue: Hong Kong Arts Centre McAulay Studio
子分類_ArtGenre SubCategory: 東方舞、菲律賓民俗舞、火球舞、皮影戲、跨媒體藝術
venue.1: 香港藝術中心麥高利小劇場
venue_en: Hong Kong Arts Centre, McAulay Studio

節目名稱: 《愛麗絲夢遊仙境》- 幕後追蹤出奇兔
Programme Name: Alice in Wonderland - Behind the Scenes - Follow the White Rabbit
地點: 香港文化中心大劇院後台
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre Backstage
主辦單位: 香港藝術節協會有限公司
Presenter: Hong Kong Arts Festival Society Limited

venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre Backstage

節目簡介: HOPE & GLORY是一個很大的多媒體展覽。它被稱為一個[概念的馬戲班]，參觀時除了令你回憶看馬戲的經驗，你會得到各種的觀感刺激。共生舞蹈團成員將經驗展覽後，由藝術總監丸仔協助下進行創作回應，並為當天的研討會揭開序幕。
About the Programme: HOPE & GLORY multi-media installation by SIMON BIRCH is a “Conceptual Circus” that gives one multi-sensory experiences. Members of the Symbiotic Dance Troupe of the CCCD, led by artistic director, yuenjie, will be visiting the exhibition during the day, immersing in multi-cellular structure and then improvise in response, and will be performing in the same evening (at 7.15pm) as the opening for the HOPE & GLORY forum.
地點: 香港鰂魚涌港島東太古坊康和大廈1樓
Venue: Taikoo Place, Island East, Hong Kong
子分類_ArtGenre SubCategory: 現代舞／當代舞、多媒體裝置
venue.1: 香港鰂魚涌港島東太古坊康和大廈1樓
venue_en: Taikoo Place, Island East, Hong Kong

節目名稱: 第二屆廣東舞蹈夏令營《舞蹈與社會》研討會閉幕演出《我是﹒我有﹒我夢》
Programme Name: The 2nd Guangdong Summer Dance Camp, Dance Symposium – Dance In Community  Closing Performance, I am, I have, I dream!
節目簡介: 社區文化發展中心及亞洲民眾戲劇節協會蒙香港藝術發展局及亞洲文化協會支持和協助，邀請Alito Alessi 於2006年4月來香港，進行「Danceability社區舞蹈﹕舞出傷健新紀元」計劃，Alito 在香港留駐期間主持了接觸即興和舞動多元工作坊，並與近60位包括肢陴、智障、聽障及四肢健全的不同能力舞者，排演了《舞出傷健新紀元》的演出。
About the Programme: Supported by the Hong Kong Arts Developement Council and Asian Cultural Council in 2008, Centre for Community Development and Asian People’s Theatre Festival Society had jointly organized the DanceAbility Community Dance Project. It involoved over 60 dancers with different abilities.
Venue: Guangdong Modern Dance Company Small Theatre
venue_en: Guangdong Modern Dance Company Small Theatre

節目簡介: Maxime 的創作靈感來自 Ulysses、Leopold Bloom、James Joyce。James Joyce用意識流的技巧寫主角 Leopold Bloom在1904年6月16日那一天，在Dublin的旅程，可算是無盡的意識流…不由理性邏輯支配…像墮進夢裡思維。Maxime的編舞，也用上意識流。他的舞就叫Ulysses Bloom – 充滿詩意，在嬉戲簡約的空間，舞者的身體放射不同的情緒…不止的流動和轉化，輕巧而匯聚能量…。Maxime除獨舞外，還將與香港舞者和音樂師即興演出。Ulysses Bloom曾在法國、西班牙及斯洛凡尼亞演出，香港活動後將前赴臺灣參與當地藝術節。
About the Programme: Maxime's inspiration came from Ulysses, Leopold Bloom, James Joyce. James Joyce used the technique of stream of consciousness to describe the journey undertaken by the protagonist Leopold Bloom on 16th June 1904 in the city of Dublin.  It was a journey not subordinated to rational logic; it was a journey of stream of consciousness with logic in a dream.  Maxime choreographed his dance piece utilizing the stream of consciousness approach and his dance is called Ulysses Bloom – extremely poetic with the body of the dance in a playful simple space, radiating with emotions...endless flows and transformation and full of energy. Apart from his solo dance, he would jam with Y Space's Victor and Mandy accompanied by Nelson Hiu, one of the most like musician who plays improvisation music.  After his gig in Hong Kong, Maxime will perform in a Festival in Taiwan.  Ulysses Bloom has been staged in France, Spain and Slovenia.
Venue: Y-Space Theatre Y
主辦單位: 社區文化發展中心、多空間
Presenter: Organized by Centre for Community Cultural Development & Y-Space
venue_en: Y-Space, Theatre Y

節目簡介: 本故事是以受小朋友歡迎的玩具店為背景提材, 這間玩具店日間只是一間普通的玩具店,所有不同種類的洋娃娃整齊地放在廚窗及貨架上, 但一到晚上玩具店關了門後, 所有在廚窗及貨架上的洋娃娃都變成了有生命的娃娃, 在玩具店裡跳起舞來. 在表演中, 學生扮演著不同種類的洋娃娃, 表現出每種娃娃特色的舞步, 例如有可愛善良的白兔娃娃, 舞姿優雅的芭蕾舞娃娃, 來自東方的中國娃娃, 活潑的旋轉陀螺娃娃, 一群浩浩蕩蕩的斑馬娃娃, 大小朋友都喜歡的美妮老鼠娃娃,漂亮的仙子娃娃, 以及來自西方意大利的搖鼓舞娃娃, 當一到黎明的時候, 這群可愛的娃娃會返回廚窗及貨架, 迎接新一天的來臨.  表演下半部, 有俄羅斯舞,,胡桃鉗子 “La Valse”, “Rendevous of Angels”,等以足尖舞步為主的表演外, 還有爵士舞, 踢躂舞, 以及由本校校長鍾金寶編排的”Celebration” 為這次表演畫上完美的句號.
About the Programme: Le Magasin De Jouets, is a popular mega toys shop in the town, various kinds of the dolls is placed in the display window and the rack in tidy during the day time. But, when the shop is closed and the lights are off, all the dolls are get up and they dance all round the shop.  The students act in various kind of doll, e.g. Adorable rabbits, elegance ballerina dolls,  Chinese dolls, funny spinning tops dolls, zebra dolls, cutie minnie mouse dolls, beautiful fairy princess dolls & Italian tarantella dolls.  They dance all night and they return to the rack & display window before the dawn is come.  The second half of the performance, we have present Russian dance, Party Girls from “The Nutcracker”, Tap, Jazz and mainly on pointe work in “La Valse”, “Rendevous of Angels”, and Joan’s choreography in “Celebration”
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Theatre
主辦單位: 嘉露貝雯芭蕾舞學校 及倫敦芭蕾舞學校
Presenter: Carol Bateman School of Dancing & London School of Ballet
製作/演出單位: 嘉露貝雯芭蕾舞學校 及倫敦芭蕾舞學校
Production / Performing Unit: Carol Bateman School of Dancing & London School of Ballet
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

節目簡介: 一個畫家為了找畫畫的創靈感, 於是, 他決定四處遊歷, 在萬無目的旅程中, 他看到大自然種種不同的景象, 令他找到新的靈感, 畫了一幅漂亮得像真實大自然的作品.  畫中 所有景象栩栩如生, 如尉藍色的睛天, 白雲,漂亮的蝴蝶, 寧靜的河流, 天鵝, 活躍的小馬,色彩鮮艷的鮮花, 及不同的人和事物.  , 學生扮演著不同角色, 將這幅圖畫帶進舞台.
About the Programme: The painter  across the earth to seeking for the inspiration for his painting, he see many difference natural scene, like Sunshine,  Clouds in the sky, Butterflies, Flowers, Swans, River, energetic Ponies in the grass, children dance with balloons, baskets, ribbons & hats.  The scenes inspired him to  paint a beautiful painting finally.  The students act in difference character in the performance.  Sunshine, clouds, butterflies, flowers, swans, river, ponies, children dance with balloons, baskets, hats and ribbons , students dance like bring the real painting on the stage, and they performed very impressive to the audience.

節目名稱: 《舞蹈青年2009》- 平台舞蹈表演計劃
節目簡介: 2009年CCDC舞蹈中心把「舞蹈青年」的概念向國內推展，舉辦「青年舞蹈雙城 – 香港．廣州」，連同姊妹舞團廣東現代舞團，與當地的大專及演藝機構合作，於香港及廣州的社區舉行公開的平台舞蹈演出，以促進珠三角地區的文化交流，同時建立區內之舞蹈網絡。
About the Programme: In 2009, CCDC introduced the concept of “ WuDaoQingNian- Professional Dance Training and Podium Dance Performance” to the Mainland. Launching Guangdong Modern Dance Company, we worked with local universities and organizations to train young dancers in the province. We also organized a new edition of “ Hong Kong WuDaoQingNian”. “Dancing Youths” from both cities shared their experiences with one another. In addition, we worked with communities in Hong Kong and Guangzhou to stage public podium dance performances in order to promote cultural exchange in the Pearl River Delta.
Venue: (19-20/12/2009)Tuen Mun Cultural Square , (9-10/1/2010) Plaza, Xinghai Concert Hall, (16-17/1/2010)Plaza, Shatin Town Hall
venue.1:
屯門文娛廣場
 廣州星海音樂廳廣場
 沙田大會堂廣場
venue_en: Tuen Mun Cultural Square ,  Plaza, Xinghai Concert Hall, Sha Tin Town Hall, Plaza

節目名稱: 現代舞培訓計劃結業演出 - 《舞出艷陽天2009》
Programme Name: Finale of Modern Dance Animateur Scheme – Dancing in the Sun 2009
節目簡介: 「學校現代舞培訓計劃」乃CCDC舞蹈中心與康樂及文化事務署合作的學校藝術培訓計劃，由CCDC舞蹈中心委派專業導師到各參與中、小學舉辦舞蹈工作坊，向同學教授現代舞技巧及提供多元化舞蹈學習和排演活動，最後會參與一年一度的結業演出。2009年結業演出《舞出艷陽天 2009- 動物奇緣》有十三間學校、超過二百位學員參加演出及九百名觀眾入場支持。
About the Programme: Modern Dance Workshop, which targets secondary students, is the largest program of CCDC’s Dance Centre. In co-operation with the Leisure and Cultural Services Department, dance training workshops will be held by appointing professional dance tutors in primary and secondary schools. Tutors also choreograph works for students to perform in the annual finale performance. Over 200 students from 13 schools participated in the finale performance Dancing in the Sun 2009- The Tales of Animals. The performance attracted an audience of over 900.
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium
主辦單位: CCDC舞蹈中心及康樂及文化事務署
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目名稱: 現代舞培訓計劃結業演出 - 《舞出艷陽天 2010》
Programme Name: Finale of Modern Dance Animateur Scheme – Dancing in the Sun 2010
節目簡介: 「學校現代舞培訓計劃」乃CCDC舞蹈中心與康樂及文化事務署合作的學校藝術培訓計劃，由CCDC舞蹈中心委派專業導師到各參與中、小學舉辦舞蹈工作坊，向同學教授現代舞技巧及提供多元化舞蹈學習和排演活動，最後會參與一年一度的結業演出。2010年結業演出《舞出艷陽天2010- 我們的集體回憶》共有十七間學校，超過三百位學員參加演出及一千名觀眾入場支持。
About the Programme: Modern Dance Workshop, which targets secondary students, is the largest program of CCDC’s Dance Centre. In co-operation with the Leisure and Cultural Services Department, dance training workshops will be held by appointing professional dance tutors in primary and secondary schools. Tutors also choreograph works for students to perform in the annual finale performance.  More than 300 students from 17 schools participated in the finale performance Dancing in the Sun 2010. The performance attracted an audience of over 1, 000.
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium
主辦單位: CCDC舞蹈中心 及 康樂及文化事務署
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目名稱: CCDC舞蹈課程學生匯演 – 《Good Show 2010》
舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 現代舞, 爵士舞/街舞
節目簡介: Good Show乃CCDC舞蹈中心為學員提供的舞蹈實踐演出平台，舞蹈種類包括現代舞、爵士舞、芭蕾舞、中國舞、踢躂舞、音樂劇舞等。所有參加的學員將接受純演出的專業舞蹈技巧及表演訓練，與我們一班高水準及經驗豐富的舞蹈導師共同分享舞蹈學習及演出所帶給舞者的愉悅及難忘經驗。
About the Programme: Good Show is a platform provided by CCDC Dance Centre for students to reach a level of real achievement in dance. With professional technique and performance skills training, participants can make an impact on stage thanks to our high quality and experienced teachers.
Venue: Shatin Town Hall Auditorium
子分類_ArtGenre SubCategory: 現代舞／當代舞、爵士舞、芭蕾舞、中國舞、踢躂舞
venue_en: Sha Tin Town Hall, Auditorium

節目名稱: 夥伴計劃真演出系列- 《隨．時．變》
Programme Name: Partnership Programme- REAL Showcase Series- r language
節目簡介: 「夥伴計劃」成立目的是要善用CCDC擁有的場地及在營運上的專業知識，為從事舞蹈創作的獨立藝術家提供創作空間及支援，以推動本地藝術的發展。為實踐舞蹈中心宗旨，藉著「夥伴計劃」舉辦的演出及各類活動，凝聚舞蹈愛好者、觀眾及藝術家，建立活躍的討論、分享及資訊交流的環境。我們對夥伴的支援，將因應舞蹈中心的資源分配、夥伴不同的需要及其活動內容，以排練場地、技術人員、器材、宣傳及或行政資源作支援，以協助其完成演出或其他活動。 由CCDC舞蹈中心主辦的《真演出》系列自2006年推出以來，已為超過十多位舞壇新秀製作演出，讓藝術家與觀眾在小劇場有限的空間裡體驗無限的創意。小劇場為創作者提供實驗平台，是一個將想像轉化為真實的空間，亦是舞蹈愛好者互相啟發思維的場所。
About the Programme: In order to make effective use of its space, production and administration expertise, CCDC Dance Centre launched the Partnership Programme in 2004 to support local independent dance artists. In line with the goals of CCDC Dance Centre, a diverse range of activities are organized to bring dance lovers, artists and audience under one roof. Our support for artists varies according to their needs and activities. New REAL Showcase Series aims to nurture and assist local dance groups and individuals by presenting innovative dance shows in our Jockey Club Dance Theatre at CCDC Dance Centre, we will provide rehearsal venue, technical and administrative support.
地點: CCDC舞蹈中心賽馬會舞蹈小劇場
Venue: CCDC Dance Centre Jockey Club Dance Theatre
venue.1: CCDC舞蹈中心賽馬會舞蹈小劇場
venue_en: CCDC Dance Centre, Jockey Club Dance Theatre

節目名稱: 夥伴計劃真演出系列- 《Beyond The Light》
Programme Name: Partnership Programme- REAL Showcase Series- Beyond The Light
節目簡介: 「夥伴計劃」成立目的是要善用CCDC擁有的場地及在營運上的專業知識，為從事舞蹈創作的獨立藝術家提供創作空間及支援，以推動本地藝術的發展。為實踐舞蹈中心宗旨，藉著「夥伴計劃」舉辦的演出及各類活動，凝聚舞蹈愛好者、觀眾及藝術家，建立活躍的討論、分享及資訊交流的環境。我們對夥伴的支援，將因應舞蹈中心的資源分配、夥伴不同的需要及其活動內容，以排練場地、技術人員、器材、宣傳及或行政資源作支援，以協助其完成演出或其他活動。 由CCDC舞蹈中心主辦的《真演出》系列自2006年推出以來，已為超過十多位舞壇新秀製作演出，讓藝術家與觀眾在小劇場有限的空間裡體驗無限的創意。小劇場為創作者提供實驗平台，是一個將想像轉化為真實的空間，亦是舞蹈愛好者互相啟發思維的場所。
About the Programme: In order to make effective use of its space, production and administration expertise, CCDC Dance Centre launched the Partnership Programme in 2004 to support local independent dance artists. In line with the goals of CCDC Dance Centre, a diverse range of activities are organized to bring dance lovers, artists and audience under one roof. Our support for artists varies according to their needs and activities. New REAL Showcase Series aims to nurture and assist local dance groups and individuals by presenting innovative dance shows in our Jockey Club Dance Theatre at CCDC Dance Centre, we will provide rehearsal venue, technical and administrative support.
地點: CCDC舞蹈中心賽馬會舞蹈小劇場
Venue: CCDC Dance Centre Jockey Club Dance Theatre
venue.1: CCDC舞蹈中心賽馬會舞蹈小劇場
venue_en: CCDC Dance Centre, Jockey Club Dance Theatre

節目簡介: 《 女大不中留 》 是一個受廣大觀眾喜愛的芭蕾舞劇。       故事發生在一個正值收成季節的農村中。農村姑娘莉莎愛上了貧窮的年青工人哥拉斯，但她的母親寡婦茜蒙卻要她嫁給害羞又呆鈍的富家子亞倫。莎莉不甘這個安排，在母親的嚴密監視下想出種種妙計，與情人相聚，又愚弄傻亞倫，弄出笑話連篇。  故事充滿田園氣息，集輕鬆、俏皮、浪漫及惹笑的芭蕾舞喜劇，絕對適合大小朋友共同欣賞。
About the Programme: La Fille Mal Gardée is one of the timeless classic ballet repertory.       In the story, young Lise, is determined to marry Colas, the son of a farmer, for love. But her mother Widow Simone would rather she married the child-like Alain for money and status. And at every turn, Lise manages to stay one step ahead of her watchful mother.    Haystacks and chickens, ribbons and storms, and a charming tale of young love in a picturesque rural scene – everything sparkles with expressive dance, vibrant colour and lyrical music. This is a great introduction to ballet for everyone.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
藝術總監: 廖本懷夫人毛妹太平紳士
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 讓我們帶大家走進灰姑娘的童話世界，一位可憐天天被繼母和醜陋姊妹折磨的溫柔小姑娘，如何通過善良的心，感動了仙女。奇妙的南瓜車，失去的玻璃鞋，牽手結合良緣，永結同心。
About the Programme: Let us take you into the fairy-tale world of Cinderella - the poor little girl ill-treated by step-mother and ugly sisters - who later married a prince. Let us also tell you how a fairy, appreciative of a kind-hearted girl, turned a pumpkin into a princess carriage, and how a lost slipper matched her with the prince of the castle. They married and lived happily ever after.
Venue: Shatin Town Hall Auditorium
藝術總監: 廖本懷夫人毛妹太平紳士
venue_en: Sha Tin Town Hall, Auditorium

節目簡介: 古怪的歌柏尼博士是一個木偶玩具製作家，他脾氣孤僻，與眾多木偶娃娃住在一個村莊裏；博士的至愛是最漂亮的木偶「歌碧麗亞」，他愛安置她在他的窗台旁炫耀。博士希望用魔法把人的心靈賜予歌碧麗亞，令她變成一個有生命的女孩。村裏的一個小伙子被這個每天都默不作聲坐在窗台邊的漂亮女孩深深吸引著，決定偷偷溜進博士的屋裏結識她。卻被博士遞個正著，並想出一個壞主意，要把小伙子灌醉後偷去他的心轉移給歌碧麗亞……
About the Programme: Dr. Coppelius is an eccentric toymaker who lives alone with all his cleverly crafted puppets.  His heart goes out to his most beautiful doll, Coppelia, which he sets near his balcony.  He wants to give real life to Coppelia by stealing, through works of magic, a human heart.   A young villager falls in love with this beautiful creature that sits by the window and sneaks into his house. Coppelius preys on his admiration, tries to intoxicate him, and while he is senseless, takes away his heart to give life to Coppelia…
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Concert Hall
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈發展基金有限公司
藝術總監: 廖本懷夫人毛妹太平紳士
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Concert Hall

節目簡介: 暑假是孩子最期待的日子，大家滿心歡喜預早計劃好怎樣度過悠長的暑假，可是冷不防豬流感疫症突襲，所有夢想落空了，暑假旅行頓成泡影……      飛吧!飛吧!好!就讓我們來一趟夢想旅行吧!小朋友在夢中任意飛翔，他們探訪世界每一個角落，嚐盡各種美食，見識不同的文化，過了一個非一般暑假。小朋友，快來一起展翅高飛吧!
About the Programme: Every child longs for Summer Vacation when they can plan for excitements and adventure. The sudden outbreak of H1N1, however, spoil family summer travel plans. What a big disappointment! Children soon discover, they can go anywhere in their imagination and turn boring days into excitement, fly to foreign countries, enjoy mouth-watering dishes, discover interesting culture. Who knows, with H1N1 rampant, quarantine for period of  7 days, Sinkiang strike, airline delays and cancellations……. the use of imaginations maybe a better way of travelling.
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈發展基金有限公司
藝術總監: 廖本懷夫人毛妹太平紳士
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 現代舞, 爵士舞/街舞
節目簡介: 如果你張開眼晴，你會見到世界上到處都充滿著美。藍天碧海，皚皚白雲，巍峨高山，熱情的花朵，昆蟲的複雜結構，青蔥的草木，海底魚類千奇百怪的形態和鮮艷的顏色，甚至由人工雕琢而成的寶石，都令生命充滿喜悅和意義。 但世上最美的是美麗的心和善良的靈魂，它帶給人們溫暖和快樂。這些都不是即時可以用肉眼察覺得到的。善良的心和美麗的靈魂令到一切有形的美黯然失色。
About the Programme: If we open our eyes to the world around us we can see beauty everywhere. The azure skies, the crystal seas, the glistening snow, the majestic mountains. The exuberance of the flowers, the intricacies of nature’s insects, the verdure beauty we see brings joy to our lives, and feeds our minds. But the most beautiful of all, is the beauty of the heart, and kindness of soul, which may not be instantly recognized but which brings warmth and happiness to all. Outshining all visible pleasures, is the kindness of the mind and the beauty of the soul.
Venue: Shatin Town Hall Cultural Activities Hall
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈發展基金有限公司
藝術總監: 廖本懷夫人毛妹太平紳士
venue_en: Sha Tin Town Hall, Cultural Activities Hall

節目簡介: 每個學年，孩子們極期待暑假的來臨，好讓痛快地享受一個無拘無束的假期，打波、游水、遊學團、跳舞、旅遊、各色其式。可是今年H1N1突然的出現，學校提早放暑假了……同學們也可悠閒在家，有一個不一樣的假期……
About the Programme: All children long for the summer vacation so that they can enjoy excitements and adventures. The recent unexpected outbreak of the new H1N1 influenza has, however, disrupted their travel plans. How sorely disappointing it is! But the kids soon find out that they could roam the world through imagination, by reading post cards, etc. Imagination sweeps away boredom, fly them to far away interesting places, enabling them to enjoy mouth-watering cuisines, discover exotic cultures, and have lots of excitements. Imagination has brought them a very very specially holiday, but without the hassle.
Venue: Tai Po Civic Centre Auditorium
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈發展基金有限公司
藝術總監: 廖本懷夫人毛妹太平紳士
venue_en: Tai Po Civic Centre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 節目分上下半場，相同的故事卻有着不同的結局。 上半場觀眾圍着表演者及演區坐，看着施暴者如何感染旁觀者，一起製造一場暴力，最後以被虐者的死亡作終結。 下半場觀眾安排回到觀眾席上，以抽離的距離看着相同的暴力再上演多一次，但中間因為旁觀者的醒覺，他們不但沒有繼續他們的暴力，反而制止了施暴者，讓被虐者得救。
地點: 賽馬會創意藝術中心黑盒劇場
Venue: Black Box Theatre, Jockey Club Creative Arts Centre
Production / Performing Unit: Choreographer and Dancer : Cyrus Hui       Dancers : Bruce Liu, Victor Fung, Fanny Cheng, Sylvia Lee, Fok Ka Wing       Stage, Costume and Image Designer : Bill Cheung     Lighting Designer : Gary Ng       Sound Designer : Sincere Li       Stage Mana
演出/製作: 舞者：廖展邦、馮樂恆、鄭銘恩、李婷炘、霍嘉頴     舞台、服裝、形象設計：張正和       燈光設計：伍在朗       音樂設計：李善思     舞台監督：曾詠詩       執行舞台監督：鄭慧瑩       監製：何德貞

節目簡介: 台灣著名編舞家張曉雄以舞蹈作軸，融合攝影，在虛幻的光影與實體的流動之間，尋找藏匿在虛擬與現實光年中的欲望黑洞。動藝三大核心成員王廷琳、梁家權、黃茹聯同港台兩地優秀舞者，演繹一段段支離破碎卻又糾結難分的記憶與慾念。
About the Programme: The renowned Taiwan choreographer Zhang Xiao-xiong introduces the ephemeral effects of light and shadow of photography into the fluidity of moving forms in a probing search of the black hole called ‘desire’, hidden between the virtual and actual light years.  Andy Wong, Francis Leung and Yvette Huang, the three core members of DanceArt, together with outstanding dancers from Hong Kong and Taiwan, will be presenting a dance showcase of interlocking snippets made up of memories, lust and love.
Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目名稱: 2009年社區文化大使《筆詩意之夢》
Programme Name: 2009 Community Cultural Ambassador “Dreaming a Dream with Chagall”
節目簡介: 是未及回頭已成長的郁青、是期待甜蜜的緋紅、是溫柔輕軟的嫩黃、是感情燃燒的火赤、是逝者似斯的暗紫、或是，思念深如海的靛藍，當我們經歷愛情，也曾，觸到生命不同的顏色。以畫家夏卡爾的愛情人生，舞出感情的色彩。
About the Programme: The unexpected growth is green, the expecting tender is blush, the softly touching is light yellow, the burning affair is red, passed away is purple, missing is deep blue.  When we experience love, we touch different color of life.  Based on the love story of painter, Chagall, dances with flying colors.
Venue: Black Box Theatre, Kwai Tsing Theatre
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Black Box Theatre

節目名稱: 「當代潮」黑盒劇場系列: 《Salt Salt 哋》
Programme Name: ContemWAVE Black Box Theatre Series: A Little Bit Salty
節目簡介: 黃茹，歐喜美兩位舞蹈界榮升阿媽級阿媽，鬼馬落鹽，瘋狂加醋，劈腿示範，拗腰炮製，知唔係要你知女人唔易做o既簡單人生大道理。歡迎入場偷師、複製、發揚光大，延續Salt Salt哋精神！
About the Programme: Two local talented choreographers, Yvette Huang and May Au, and the fabulous performers Han Mei, Fok Ka Wing and Guthrie Yip dance insanely, demonstrate absurdly and tell you the ultimate TRUTH of being just a woman.
地點: 賽馬會創意藝術中心黑盒劇場
Venue: Black Box Theatre, Jockey Club Creative Art Centre
venue.1: 賽馬會創意藝術中心黑盒劇場
venue_en: Jockey Club Creative Arts Centre, Black Box Theatre

節目名稱: 「當代潮」黑盒劇場系列: 《「二」想天開》
Programme Name: ContemWAVE Black Box Theatre Series: Planet Love
節目簡介: 「瑣碎微細的戀事，不設實際的空想，浮遊在虛構國度，當幻想反回現實，您我或許會找到生活的真實答案。」兩位出色編舞周佩韻、黃靜婷，各自各在自己的舞蹈原點出發，以極盡細膩、間中瘋狂和點點感性，攜手繪畫出超現實的戀愛風景。
About the Programme: The two brilliant choreographers, Pewan Chow and Chloe Wong, start from their own “dancing” point, painting surreal “love scenery” together in an always-precise, sometimes-insane and little-sensational way.
地點: 賽馬會創意藝術中心黑盒劇場
Venue: Black Box Theatre, Jockey Club Creative Art Centre

venue_en: Jockey Club Creative Arts Centre, Black Box Theatre

節目名稱: 「當代潮」黑盒劇場系列: 抱抱
Programme Name: ContemWAVE Black Box Theatre Series: Hug Hug
節目簡介: 想抱抱嗎?那是一個怎樣的擁抱?暖暖的? 緊張? 安全感?分手? 甜蜜? 廿四味?時間停頓? 幻影?劫後餘生? 依依不捨?是愛? 還是性? ...............你最近又在甚麼時侯擁抱了誰?兩位年青編舞黃嘉詠、甘嘉琪女兒以「抱抱」為題，串成女兒家心事。
About the Programme: Wanna a hug? What should it be? Is it Warm? Nervous? Make you Apart? Feel Sweet? Time pulsing  Illusion?  Love…or Sex.  When and whom you hug?  Two young talented choreographers: Carol Wong and Kaco Kam, “hug” and dance to tell the little stories in the bottom of heart.
地點: 賽馬會創意藝術中心黑盒劇場
Venue: Black Box Theatre, Jockey Club Creative Art Centre
venue.1: 賽馬會創意藝術中心黑盒劇場
venue_en: Jockey Club Creative Arts Centre, Black Box Theatre

節目簡介: 你我青澀的舞步，狂竄地衝擊著失心的軀殼──主宰或是失控？虛耗、磨蝕、躁動、不安......沒有方向的方向，蕩失保護，喪失意義，失去生存的動機，抑或惟有「失去」，才是「擁有」最寶貴的一課？！動藝2005年《極樂迷場》激盪迷醉的舞蹈劇場作品後，2009年再次探索年青一輩自我麻痺的混世哲學，以激情憾動的軀體，挑動觀眾繃緊的神經，告訴真正疼惜他們的人：「請靜下心來，仔細感應此時此刻彼此互繫的人生脈搏！」
About the Programme: With toddling steps of an unskilled dancer, we buffet the empty shell of our crazed bodies – wilful? Or just out of control? Wasting away, eroding, restless, uneasy…… directionless directions, protection slipped away, meaning all gone, the motivation to live is lost…… Is ‘loss’ the best lesson to treasure what you once ‘owned’? This 2010 production by DanceArt is another exploration into the disoriented and self-denying world of youths, after the company’s psychedelic, intoxicating Smoke Factory of 2005. The bodies moving to sensations and passions challenge the audience’s high-strung nerves, to tell those who really love and care about them, “Please take a quiet moment and let yourself feel every pulse of life that forms the link between you and me, at this hour, at this very moment!”
Venue: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Cultural Activities Hall
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Cultural Activities Hall

節目簡介: 相隔千里，依舊可以心連心；朝夕相對，卻可以形同陌生。一段關係，不論是伴侶、是朋友、是家人，逐漸充斥著不可說、無法說、乃至說不清的處境。台灣著名編舞家應邀來港與動藝合作，台前集合前城市當代舞蹈團頂尖舞者：王廷琳、梁家權、陳敏兒、麥秀慧、黃茹。
About the Programme: Two individuals can be physically miles apart but still feel the intimacy between each other.  However, seeing each other day in and day out may feel like total strangers. Our relationships, whether it is partners, friends or family, can become inundated with the unspeakable, indescribable and inexplicable situations. The famous Taiwan Choregrapher Ku Meng-sheng is invited to collaborate with DanceArt and the dancers include the ex-CCDC top performers: Andy Wong, Francis Leung, Abby Chan, Antoinette and Yvette Huang.
Venue: Black Box Theatre, Kwai Tsing Theatre
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Black Box Theatre

Programme Name: 2010 Community Cultural Ambassador “When Contemporary Meets Chinese in Dance”
節目簡介: 當代舞與中國舞，一西一東，一現代一傳統，兩者的距離有多遠？讓當代舞帶中國風，讓中國舞現代化，會是怎個樣兒？節目嘗試將中國風的元素，包括中國舞和中國水墨畫，帶進當代舞的領域，呈現空、靈、玄、淡的哲學況味。
About the Programme: Contemporary dance and Chinese dance; western vs eastern; modern vs traditional, how different of these two type of dance? The programme tried to use the Chinese elements like the props of Chinse Dance and the concept of Chinese painting to create a “zen” dance piece.
Venue: Black Box Theatre, Kwai Tsing Theatre
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Black Box Theatre

節目簡介: 資深編舞梁家權最新力作，以白先勇小說情節為引子，舞台時空溜進前身「甘棠第」的孫中山紀念館，重塑追憶中的舊時代。加入音樂人許少榮中西樂演奏，讓靡靡之音紅塵中迴旋。華麗舞步之後，窺探舊禮教下，純愛與慾念之間的鬥爭與包容。
About the Programme: Seasoned choreographer Francis Leung presents his latest and innovative best.   Drawing its inspiration from the world created under the pen of Pai Hsien-yung, the stage is set in the Dr. Sun Yat-sen Museum, which is transported back in time to its former self – the Kom Tong Hall of colonial Hong Kong.  A bygone era is resurrected from washed out memories.  A shadowy, transitory existence is called up by the music of Ivan Hui, in a nostalgic mix of Chinese and Western tunes that reverberate in the captured space.  Behind the flamboyant dance lurks the judgmental Old World.  Love and lust meet head on, fighting each other and alternative embracing each other.
Venue: Dr. Sun Yat-sen Museum
venue_en: Dr. Sun Yat-sen Museum

節目名稱: 2010台北關渡藝術節《最遙遠的距離》
Programme Name: Taiper Kundun Arts Festival  - Unreachable Distance
節目簡介: 相隔千里，依舊可以心連心；朝夕相對，卻可以形同陌生。一段關係，不論是伴侶、是朋友、是家人，逐漸充斥著不可說、無法說、乃至說不清的處境。台灣著名編舞家應邀來港與動藝合作，台前集合前城市當代舞蹈團頂尖舞者：王廷琳、梁家權、陳敏兒、麥秀慧、黃茹。
About the Programme: Two individuals can be physically miles apart but still feel the intimacy between each other.  However, seeing each other day in and day out may feel like total strangers. Our relationships, whether it is partners, friends or family, can become inundated with the unspeakable, indescribable and inexplicable situations. The famous Taiwan Choregrapher Ku Meng-sheng is invited to collaborate with DanceArt and the dancers include the ex-CCDC top performers: Andy Wong, Francis Leung, Abby Chan, Antoinette and Yvette Huang.

venue.1: 國立臺北藝術大學舞蹈廳
venue_en: Dance Hall, Taipei National University of the Arts

節目簡介: 抱著讓學生一展所學的心情，本校每年都花盡心思讓每位學員都有機會「踏上舞台」，讓她們發揮所長、表現自我。本校十分慶幸得到家長和學員的支持，每年都能在暑假順利舉辦一次芭蕾匯演。 在一次又一次快樂的演出經驗中，不單學員們有所得著，家長和老師都有機會分享她們的學習成果。她們所學的不僅僅是一支舞，當舞蹈躍上舞台，便成為能帶給觀眾快樂和驚喜的魔法。從平凡 到精采，一切都被舞台改變。
About the Programme: With the aspiration to let our students showcase what they have learnt, every year, our school put in great efforts in offering the chance for every student to “Step on Stage”, allowing them to show their talents and express themselves.  Our school is gratified to have the support from parents and students, so that every summer, a ballet show can be held successfully.  Through each of the joyful performance, not only do the students have gains, parents and teachers also have the chance to share their fruitful achievements.  What they have learnt is not simply a dance.  When the dance is performed on stage, it will become magic, bringing joy and surprise to the audience.  From ordinary to extraordinary, everything is transformed by the stage
地點: 香港理工大學賽馬會綜藝館
Venue: Jockey Club Auditorium- The Hong Kong Polytechnic University
venue.1: 香港理工大學賽馬會綜藝館
venue_en: Jockey Club Auditorium- The The Hong Kong Polytechnic University

節目簡介: 每逢夏天的來臨，本校都會舉辦芭蕾舞匯演，讓學生藉着投入演出，暫時放下一年來的煩憂。我們盼望表演能增強學生對學校的歸屬感，亦能令她們從舞蹈中尋找到快樂。  今年，我們很慶幸有本校學生參與籌備是次演出，為我們分擔了不少。還記得十多年前我們牽著她們的小手，帶領她們從舞蹈中尋覓快樂。今天，她們不但能驕傲地在台上跳舞，更能把所學所得回饋學校，實在令人欣慰。當然，我們還得感謝一班勞苦功高的工作人員攜手協助，把籌備當中遇到的困難解決。  我們每年都竭盡所能把表演籌辦得盡善盡美，背負了很大壓力。然而，我們所付出的時間和精力是絕對值得的，因為在整個過程中，我們可以看到學生真心地享受在台上或台下跳舞的每一分秒，這正正是我們的宗旨和期望。
About the Programme: Holding the annual showcase takes more time and energy than you can ever imagine.  Nevertheless, as the difficulty striving for the better increases, our enjoyment of the process and finally, the showcase itself, uplifts.  Throughout the year, we understand that students have been facing challenges like school exams.  Therefore, we want to make good use of the summer warmth to bring about happiness to our students through a performing chance.  The showcase is not only about increasing the sense of belonging but also the happiness found in dancing. We are glad that some students, apart from performing, actually participated in preparing the showcase.  They have been with us since their youth and we have guided them from the very first step to dancing.  Now, with their help, a great burden in preparation was shared.  Certainly, adversities were overcome also with the help of our dear and wonderful crew.
地點: 香港理工大學賽馬會綜藝館
Venue: Jockey Club Auditorium- The Hong Kong Polyechnic University
venue.1: 香港理工大學賽馬會綜藝館
venue_en: The Hong Kong Polytechnic University, Jockey Club Auditorium

節目簡介: 女神先創天地萭物，派來十二天使守護天際。創造了日月，可惜他們為爭日月之長短而起紛爭。女神決以雷、電及水流來平定日月之爭。女神欲於地上選出十二種物作領袖，負責保護大地及動植物，決定以渡河比賽挑戰優勝者。動物為求取勝，各出其謀，賽事競爭激烈。小老鼠最終憑靈巧敏捷的身手成功渡河，更成為十二生肖之首。 自此大家相親相愛，守護為大地，女神大感欣慰。
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 故事內容根據19世紀Sweeney Todd的傳奇作藍本，並以Stephen Sondheim作曲作詞的著名百老匯音樂劇改編而成。理髮師Sweeney Todd遭法官Turpin陷害被放逐，及後獲水手Anthony的幫助而得以重返倫敦，並在Lovett太太最差勁的肉批店樓上開了一間理髮店。Sweeney在Lovett太太協助下進行復仇大計，同時亦希望與失散多年的太太Lucy及女兒Johanna一家團聚，可惜女兒已成為法官的養女…… 音樂劇由香港青年藝術協會藝術總監麥蓮茜改編及執導，加上音樂總監史葛傑臣及編舞導師Jun Mabaquiao，我們以一個全新角度演繹故事。嶄新而充滿現代感的風格，適合大小朋友觀賞。65位出色的年輕演員、歌手和舞蹈員，透過澎湃的歌曲把故事一幕幕活現眼前！
About the Programme: Based on the 19th century legend of Sweeney Todd and the hit Broadway musical with music and lyrics by Stephen Sondheim, the barber Sweeney Todd a.k.a Benjamin Barker returns to London after being sent away by Judge Turpin with the help of a sailor, Anthony Hope. He opens a barber shop above Mrs. Lovett's Meat Pie Shop where she sells "the worst pies in London." With the help of Mrs. Lovett, Todd tries to rid of all the people who have ever done him wrong and hopes to be reunited with his wife Lucy and his daughter Joanna, who is now Judge Turpin's ward… Adapted & directed by Lindsey McAlister (Artistic Director of Hong Kong Youth Arts Foundation), with musical director Scott Gibson and choreographer Jun Mabaquiao, we bring you this story in a contemporary and stylish way which is definitely suitable for all ages. 65 talented young actors, singers and dancers bring the story to life with the smash hit numbers.
地點: 香港藝術中心壽臣劇院
Venue: Shouson Theatre, Hong Kong Arts Centre

venue_en: Hong Kong Arts Centre, Hong Kong Arts Centre, Shouson Theatre

節目簡介: 贏得普立茲大獎的百老匯音樂劇《吉屋出租》，根據普契尼的歌劇《波希米亞人》改編而成。是次由香港青年藝術協會藝術總監麥蓮茜改編及執導，史葛傑臣擔任音樂總監，Jun Mabaquiao負責編舞。 故事講述7個年青人，於紐約東岸過了一年絕望的放浪生活。本音樂劇探討了紐約市裡愛滋病、露宿者、同性戀及為藝術抗爭等課題，勸喻年青人要積極保護自己以及身邊的人。50位出色的年輕演員、歌者和舞蹈員，透過動人的歌曲如RENT、ONE SONG GLORY、SEASONS OF LOVE、TANGO MAUREEN及LA VIE BOHEME等等，觸動觀眾的心靈。
About the Programme: Adapted and directed by Lindsey McAlister, with musical director Scott Gibson and choreographer Jun Mabaquiao, Jonathan Larson's Pulitzer-prize winning Broadway musical is based loosely on Puccini's opera La Boheme. It follows a year in the lives of seven friends living the disappearing Bohemian lifestyle in New York's East Village. The musical explores the issues of AIDS, homelessness, homosexuality, and the struggle for art in New York City, persuading young people to be proactive in protecting themselves and the people around them. 50 talented young actors, singers and dancers brought this heart-wrenching story to life with songs like “RENT”, “ONE SONG GLORY”, “SEASONS OF LOVE”, “TANGO MAUREEN”, “LA VIE BOHEME” and more.

節目簡介: 地震無情 人間有愛 1. 災難前夕 2. 八級地震 3. 活埋 4. 餘下的惡夢：一剎那，失去了所有．．． 5. 我的腳下都是你的血：恐懼、悲傷、無力、憤怒、絕望、內疚、幻象 6. 救援戰士：我們永不放棄！ 7. 天主保祐你! :媽媽別擔憂　天堂的路有些擠　有很多同學和朋友　哪一個人的媽媽　都是我們的媽媽　沒有我的日子　你把愛給活著的孩子 8. 愛與關懷：自然災害面前的軟弱和無助，見到了愛和信念，驅使著人們的堅韌和執著以及人類無私的付出 。                重生、重建：天變不足畏，天若有情天祐中華！
About the Programme: Ruthless Earthquakes Loving World 1. Eve of Disaster 2. 8.0 3. Buried Alive 4. LOST— Instant NIGHTMARE 5. The deceased scattered — fear, sadness, weakness, anger, despair, guilt, phantom. 6. Rescue warriors never give up! 7. God Bless You! :　Don’t worry, mother.  The pathway to Heaven might be a bit crowded, but I’ve got my classmates and friends with me. Their mothers are just like mine, so give your love to those who has survived. 8. Love & Care:  when confronting natural disasters, only our unconditional love and faith can actuate our tenacity and great perseverance through selflessness of mankind. 9. Rebirth & Reconstruction: fear no change, God is love, God bless China!
Venue: HK City Hall
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall

節目簡介: 由韵情舞集主辦一年一度的舞蹈晚會《韵情舞集09》於2009年12月28日晚假西灣河文娛中心劇院舉行，當晚由韵情舞集及韵情舞坊全體學員及團員傾情演出，為了使當晚的節目更加精彩及多元化，老師們更精心編排及炮製了多隻全新舞蹈。另外，更專誠邀請多間學校參加演出，一同將歡樂帶給廣大觀眾。
About the Programme: The annual performance (kidance 09)organized by Kidance Troupe was held on 28/12/2009 at the Theatre of Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre. It includes a lot of newly choreoqraphed dances and a special performance by students from Chinese Grade Dance Examination. Moreover, many quest performers are invited too.

節目簡介: 久被傳誦的民間傳奇─梁山伯與祝英台 ‧落在小說家陳慧綿密的心思與筆觸之下在舞壇雙妹楊惠美與陳敏兒的身體之中‧金像電影美指文念中的空間設置之內經戲劇顧問陳志樺精闢獨到的解剖再重組‧幻化成一場不死傳奇繼瘋狂感性的《十宰身體慶團緣》，以及黑色性感幽默佳作《女人濕地》後，雙妹楊惠美及陳敏兒再度挺起女兒身，勇闖民間傳奇， 約定樓台相會共譜新舞曲。
About the Programme: Inspired by the renowned Chinese tale Butterfly Lovers, the new collaboration of renowned Hong Kong novelist Chan Wai and the two female dancers/ choreographers Yeung Wai-mei and Abby Chan. Boot-leg Butter-fly explores the intimate relationship between females as well as their living situation, constraints and competition modern women are facing with, through well structured text, body movement and music. The three female artists are no feminist but are all fascinated by the surprises and creativity of women in todays modern cities, not to mention the struggle between in-born traditions and heritage. The inspiring piece will incorporate new forms of stage performance through the dancers/ choreographers edge on presentation and interpretation of the traditional oriental tale. The involvement of renowned artistic director Man Lim-chung in the movie industry, and dramaturge Mann Chan will surely bring in artistic and creative surprises to the Chinese as well as international audiences.
地點: 香港藝術中心壽臣劇院
Venue: Hong Kong Arts Centre Shouson Theatre
Name of Artistic Director: Abby Chan and Yeung Wai - Mei_

節目名稱: 關渡藝術節 《與山伯同床 》
節目簡介: 《與山伯同床》演出改編自香港小說家陳慧的文本『我的名字叫英台』；舞台及服裝設計為電影美術指導文念中擔任；香港資深編劇陳志樺任戲劇顧問, 是一齣跨越文本、舞蹈、電影的舞蹈劇場。香港小說家陳慧以綿密的心思與筆觸，為久被傳誦的民間傳奇《梁山伯與祝英台》賦與新生命，撰寫成全新短篇小說《我的名字叫英台》（收錄在香港《女人戲》，天地圖書出版）。借用中國民間傳奇《梁祝》的故事，《與山伯同床》的主線落在兩名現代女子─大白與小黛的身上。二人於年青時已出道，廿年來不斷主演《梁祝》，體會成長、追求、情慾與關係的種種，透過另一位女子（圖書館員）娓娓道來，當中夾雜著她的幻想、回憶、委婉，以及與祝英台的奇異關係，交織而成的如夢詩篇，揭示現代女性尋找安身/ 心靈歸宿的掙扎與歷練。
地點: 國立台北藝術大學 展演藝術中心 舞蹈廳
Venue: TNUA The Performing Arts Center Dance Theater

Presenter: Taipei National University of Arts Kuandu Arts Festival

節目簡介: 《人在旅途灑淚匙》靈感源自著名諾貝爾文學獎得主馬奎斯的短篇小說集《異鄉客》(Strange Pilgrims) , 由楊惠美主編，陳敏兒協力，聯同四位不同年代的舞壇精英（王榮祿、王丹琦、韓嘉政、黃靜婷）及萬能音樂人李端嫻@人山人海，一同開放劇場空間，讓文字、人聲、現場音樂及影像，跟舞蹈展開一場糅合魔幻、傷感、奇異與瘋狂的舞蹈劇場。
About the Programme: Inspired by Nobel Prize Winner Gabriel Garcia Marquez's short stories collection Strange Pilgrim, the dance theatre is choreographed by Yeung Wai-Mei, assisted by Abby Chan, together with the four outstanding dancers of different generations (Ong Yong Lock, Wong Tan Ki, Flora Hon, Chloe Wong ) and multi-talent musician Vee Gay @ People Mountain People Sea; it leads you to a magical journey in the dynamic theatre space. Magical, nostalgia, strange and sometimes crazy!!
地點: 葵青劇院黑盒劇場、香港文化中心AC2、香港文化中心GR2&3
Venue: Black Box Theatre, Kwai Tsing Theatre, Hong Kong Cultual Centre AC2, Hong Kong Cultual Centre GR2 & 3

節目簡介: 平靜的畫廊，一場影像與身體的糾結纏綿，正以時間為基礎展開競爭…… 《共生》是一個多媒體舞蹈劇場，探索畫廊內不同元素的互動關係。香港舞蹈年獎得主楊惠美與陳敏兒，與多媒體藝術家劉柏基，及創作歌手黃靖，以六千呎的畫廊為實驗場，探索共存的身體與空間、聲音與光影的互動力量。觀眾可在場內自由活動，選擇自已觀賞的視點，發掘共生狀態下不同個體的能量。觀眾在場內的一舉一動，都在轉化共生的面貌。
About the Programme: The clock is ticking, an interactive and competing relationship between movement and images begins in the tranquil gallery…  Symbiosis is a multi-media dance performance exploring the connection and relationship among co-existing elements within the confined gallery space. Choreographer Yeung Wai-mei and Abby Chan, together with multi-media artist Christopher Lau and Singer-song writer Jing Wong explore the intimate dynamics and interactive energy among co-existing bodies, space, sound and light in the gallery. Audience are invited to move freely in the space, where they have free will to choose the perspective they would like to “see” the performance, be involved, interact or to be part of the performance. Audience every movement will transform the symbiosis in the gallery.
Venue: Osage Kwun Tong
主辦單位: 奧沙畫廊 及 why-me-dance production
Name of Artistic Director: Abby Chan and Yeung Wai – Mei
venue_en: Osage Kwun Tong

Programme Name: New Force in Motion Series：Tap Building
節目簡介: 一個破陋的旅館，客人來自四方八面，帶着不同的歷驗和背景，看似陌生的過客，卻相同地憧憬着可以生根的『家』。雖然言語不通，但人的本能，使他們創作出交心的聲音。一切就像回到過去，彼此對望着似曾相識的傷悲，重新解構自己的人生，徒步走進破陋的門窗。醒悟雙手創造的光輝。這裡已不再是破陋的旅館……
About the Programme: The story takes place in a dilapidated guest house. People have come from all over the world, with their different stories and experiences in life. They may look like accidental travelers, but they have come with the same hope -- that of finding a ‘home’ where they can settle down. Even though they have a language problem, these people are able to communicate and become friends by making sounds that come from sheer instinct. It is as if they are revisiting their past. Looking at each other, they seem to recognize the same sorrows. They walk into that building with dilapidated windows and door, wanting to reconstruct their life. Then they realize, they can build a glorious future with their own hands. The place is no longer the dilapidated guest house as before…
Venue: Black Box Theatre, Kwai Tsing Theatre
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Black Box Theatre

節目簡介: 在春光明媚的鄉郊上，綠草和香花遍植，繁茂生長；昆蟲交替共舞，採花姑娘置身於晨光下的鄉郊，舒暢自在，組成了一幅優美的構圖。 在夏特鎮大街，上工匠、織女、農人、賣藝者辛勤工作，敬業樂業，五相關愛，洛芙的「愛心麵包」似乎有神奇法力，使得全鎮居民都能將其愛心傳揚，人人生活安定，盡顯繁華温馨。亦因為洛芙的愛心，讓她認識了比思科。 好景不常，夏特鎮出現了干斯貝、普賴得、伊霍及一眾小魔鬼，他們的出現，擾亂了夏特鎮的秩序，破壞了其安寧。居民們互相鬥爭，互相鄙視，昔日的士氣被擊退。洛芙眼見情況不妙而自己卻束手無策，感到懊惱，而且三大魔鬼對她步步進逼，使她極為沮喪，幸好身旁有比思科扶持。 有一晚，洛芙如有神助，夢見小蛋糕和小天使，有所領會，深信這是上天的指引，堅決要重振夏特鎮。洛芙亦得到鎮長的幫忙，要求全鎮居民進行投票，在洛芙與魔鬼之間決定去留。最終因為比思科的關鍵一票，洛芙勝出，全鎮居民熱烈歡呼。與此同時，比思科亦共開其皇儲身份，並向洛芙表示愛意，得到居民的祝福。
About the Programme: Under sunshine, butterflies are flying cheerfully and flower girls are picking in luxuriant grassland; they are enjoying the freedom of the town. It looks like a beautiful picture.   Craftsmen, woman weavers, farmers and street performers are very hard working in the Heart Town. All of them are kind persons. One of the girls who is called Luv, she is a baker and seems she knows how to make the magic “Love Bread”, because all the residents likes helping people after eaten her “Love Bread”. The Heart Town is very warm and prosperous. Because of Luv’s kindness, she meets peaceful. Unfortunately, there are three devils invade the Heart Town. They are called Conspire, Pride and Evil. They made the town turned to be disordered. The residents here become rude and look down upon each other. Luv has no ideas and feels annoyed. Luckily, Peaceful always supports her. One night, Luv dreamed a little cake and angel, so she believes they can lead her and let things overcome. Except Peaceful, the mayor also supports Luv. The mayor suggests voting to resolve the problem between Luv and three devils. Finally, Luv is the winner as Peaceful places for the important vote. They are all cheerful. In the meantime, Peaceful discloses his status and show his love to Luv.
Venue: TSUEN WAN TOWN HALL
主辦單位: 羅逸雅芭蕾舞爵士舞學校
製作/演出單位: 羅逸雅芭蕾舞爵士舞學校

節目簡介: “風雨來臨時，沒有任何前兆… 劫難後的我們，還能留下甚麼…” 當代舞蹈表演黑風將以舞 者的肢體語言來展現，一段沒有言語的故事，一次通往內心的旅程，一場探索身體表達限 度的實驗。

Programme Name: 《Love Sick 》Cultural Exchange between Hong Kong and the Pearl River Delta
節目簡介: 牧神有梦 在玻璃球内追花逐月 男人对女人誓神劈愿 女人对玫瑰咬牙切齿 情花开 开灿烂 有七色 也会甩色 三个女人，穿上高跟鞋走进爱情森林里冒险，寻宝遇着牧神幻化的幸福玻璃球 大家开心笑着跳着，忽然，玻璃球变出一个真男人，而女人的面色开始改变……
About the Programme: The faun has a dream – chasing after flowers and the moon in a crystal ball.  In a relationship, man always gives promises; woman is vehement about roses. When love blooms, it’s boom time; it’s got its kicks, but it can also make you love sick Three women put on their high heels, go on a treasure hunt in the Love Jungle.  To their happy surprise, they find a crystal ball - which is actually the faun in disguise. They scream and jump with joy, suddenly a man - a real man – emerges from the crystal ball, and the women’s faces begin to change…
Venue: Guangdong Moderm Dance Company Small Theatre
venue_en: Guangdong Moderm Dance Company Small Theatre

節目名稱: 《功和豆腐》珠三角文化交流計劃
Programme Name: 《Kung Fu & Tou Fu 》Cultural Exchange between Hong Kong and the Pearl River Delta
節目簡介: 舞力全作動, 身體；青瘀腫痛二十年。 體力流失於時光，昨日的身體，無法被替代及重複。 回來，是臨近亢奮的心跳，我的極限近在咫尺，目標卻在更遠的他方。 熱血、汗水、氣流和意念，讓你感受我流動的所有和所愛。 同場+蹈身體重遊—曹誠淵、黎海寧、伍宇烈和潘少輝等舞蹈藝術家的經典作品。
About the Programme: The production reviews Ong's two decades in dancing and choreography, which he says have given him more bruises than fame. It will also bring this year's "Solo Show Series" to an end.      "Dance Moves, Kung Fu and Tofu" is a multi-media production jointly directed by Ong and Chan Chi-wah, with set and costume by Yuen Hon-wai, lighting by Lee Chi-wai, sound by Edmund Leung and visuals by Chris Chan. Ong will also perform some works inspired by classics from choreographers Willy Tsao, Helen Lai, Yuri Ng and Pun Shiu-fai.      Tofu represents Ong's philosophy of life - simple and down-to-earth and with hints of kung fu, the work reflects his enthusiasm and passion for dance. "As time passes, my body cannot be replaced nor can it be cloned. Through sweat and ideas, however, I hope the audience can feel every flowing part of me," Ong said.
Venue: Guangdong Moderm Dance Company Small Theatre
venue_en: Guangdong Moderm Dance Company Small Theatre

節目名稱: 《絲綢之路藝術節2009 ─ 九色鹿》
Programme Name: Silk Road Arts Festival 2009 - A Deer of Nine Colours
節目簡介: 一隻珍奇罕見的鹿，毛色有九種顏色，角白如雪，常與一隻烏鴉為伴，在恆河邊飲水吃草。  一日，有人失足掉進河裡，驚恐大叫。九色鹿不顧自身的安危，趕忙跳下河裡，將落水人救起。落水人欲報答救命之恩，表示願做其奴僕，但九色鹿只要求他將其行蹤保密，免遭人殺害。  夜間，皇后夢見一隻身長九色彩毛的鹿，皮薄堅韌，鹿角亮白勝雪，異常珍貴。皇后一覺醒來念念不忘夢裡的鹿，朝思暮想要把鹿皮造成坐褥，用鹿角造成亮白勝雪的拂柄。最後以死央求國王派人捕捉九色鹿，國王為討皇后歡心，公告重金獎賞提供九色鹿行蹤之人。  落水人貪慾起、惡念生，想著鹿不過是頭畜牲，死活何干？繼而違背諾言，向國王告密，怎料臉上立刻生滿癩瘡，痛苦難當，但利慾薰心的落水人並無覺悟，仍然帶著國王的大軍來到河邊捕鹿。  九色鹿見狀，莊嚴而神聖地告訴國王：「你不該殺我，我對你的國家有恩！」「陛下，這個人前幾天掉進深水裡，在波濤中掙扎浮沉，我在那時不惜自己的生命，跳入水中把這個人背上岸，然而這人竟然不識知恩圖報。」  九色鹿的話慷慨激昂，大義凜然，說得國王慚愧至極。更斥責那落水人道：「你受人救命之恩，怎能反過來還要殺害他呢？」  國王爾後在全國頒布命令，不准有人驅殺九色鹿，而這個國家隨之而來也是風調雨順、五榖豐登，老百姓安居樂業，無病無災，天下太平。  心地善良，正直無私必得善果；見利忘義，必遭惡報。
Venue: Tsun Wan Town Hall Exhibition Gallery
製作/演出單位: 不加鎖舞踊館 ﹠明日藝術教育機構
Production / Performing Unit: Unlock Dancing Plaza & Ming Ri Institute for Arts Education
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Exhibition Gallery

節目簡介: 三個頂尖本地現代舞團︰動藝、不加鎖舞踊館及多空間破天荒首次同台演出，反轉香港至潮文化地標──賽馬會創意藝術中心，玩盡劇場內外每一吋空間──除了極具自家特色及令人拍案叫絕的原創舞台作品外，更會將前身為工廠大廈的創意藝術中心化成令人意想不到的舞者另類舞台，加上多位來自不同界別藝術家瞓身落場齊齊”jam”，務求與觀眾零距離，帶領觀眾進入比3D夢遊仙境更震撼的全方位感官體驗。機會可一不可再，你又豈能錯過?
About the Programme: Fre3Dance is the first ever collaboration of DanceArt, Unlock Dancing Plaza and Y-Space, the three top modern dance companies in Hong Kong. The programme comprises a mixed bill inside the Black Box Theatre which brings together excerpts of the Companies’ best repertoires as well as site-specific improvisation performances with artists from other disciplines throughout the public spaces of the building of JCCAC. The 360ﾟexperience at this unique creative arts hub which used to be a factory estate ignites the senses of the audiences and offers the audience a brand new way to explore modern dance.
地點: 賽馬會創意藝術中心黑盒劇場
Venue: Jockey Club Creative Arts Centre, Black Box Theatre
製作/演出單位: 不加鎖舞踊館、動藝、多空間
venue.1: 賽馬會創意藝術中心黑盒劇場
venue_en: Jockey Club Creative Arts Centre, Black Box Theatre

節目簡介: 舞力全作動, 身體；青瘀腫痛二十年。 體力流失於時光，昨日的身體，無法被替代及重複。 回來，是臨近亢奮的心跳，我的極限近在咫尺，目標卻在更遠的他方。   熱血、汗水、氣流和意念，讓你感受我流動的所有和所愛。 同場+蹈身體重遊—曹誠淵、黎海寧、伍宇烈和潘少輝等舞蹈藝術家的經典作品。
About the Programme: The production reviews Ong's two decades in dancing and choreography, which he says have given him more bruises than fame. It will also bring this year's "Solo Show Series" to an end.      "Dance Moves, Kung Fu and Tofu" is a multi-media production jointly directed by Ong and Chan Chi-wah, with set and costume by Yuen Hon-wai, lighting by Lee Chi-wai, sound by Edmund Leung and visuals by Chris Chan. Ong will also perform some works inspired by classics from choreographers Willy Tsao, Helen Lai, Yuri Ng and Pun Shiu-fai.      Tofu represents Ong's philosophy of life - simple and down-to-earth and with hints of kung fu, the work reflects his enthusiasm and passion for dance. "As time passes, my body cannot be replaced nor can it be cloned. Through sweat and ideas, however, I hope the audience can feel every flowing part of me," Ong said.
Venue: Black Box Theatre, Kwai Tsing Theatre
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Black Box Theatre

節目簡介: 以蕭邦古典音樂融合當代舞蹈的作品。  鋼琴家以指尖骨頭彈奏出蕭邦樂曲，舞團則以樂曲快速進行和在瞬間終了的亢奮，展現男舞者極速爆發的力量和絕密的技藝。同樣以改變骨頭之間的空間，引發大氣間的躍動，隨著蕭邦琴詩的浪漫，舞蹈將化肢體為五線譜上的音符，探入城市的某個角落，感知他們的喜樂悲歡；舞者將名師音樂化為一股潛藏力量，觸動心靈的每一個角落張弛、躍動…   不加鎖舞踊館一眾Cai子以爆炸性能量充滿身上每一個細胞硬爆蕭邦柔情音樂。香港鋼琴王子Phoebus Chan陳雋騫發揮渾身解數為一眾Cai子引路，尋找蕭邦迷失在異國的思鄉情懷，玩盡Hip-hop、雜技、現代舞、當代舞、舞蹈劇場…
About the Programme: This is a piece blending the classical music of Chopin and contemporary dance together.  Pianist plays the Masterpieces with his phalanges. The Male dancers are releasing the explosive energy and tactful skills through the masterpieces. With the same theory of changing spaces between bones, they trigger vibrations in the air. The choreographer tries to turn the dancers into notes on score, expressing the romance of the music in the stream of time somewhere in the city. The masterpieces are now a potential energy touching every corner of the inner space of dancers and making every move.  A gang of hard-core nuts filled with explosive energy in every inch of their muscle, meet the tender Chopin Masterpieces. Acclaimed pianist in Hong Kong, Phoebus Chan, plays the Masterpieces for those nuts, leading them into the way Chopin lost in Poland. With the elements of Hip-hop, Acrobatics, Modern Dance, Contemporary Dance, they hang around in the theatre.
地點: 香港兆基創意書院 多媒體劇場
Venue: Multi-media Theatre, HKICC Lee Shau Kee School of Creativity
子分類_ArtGenre SubCategory: 現代舞／當代舞、嘻哈、舞蹈劇場
venue.1: 香港兆基創意書院多媒體劇場
venue_en: HKICC Lee Shau Kee School of Creativity, Multi-media Theatre

節目簡介: 節目包括由小朋友, 配合專業木偶大師黄暉同台演出的「木偶奇遇記」;節奏強勁的 「勁歌爵士舞」;節錄自著名的芭蕾舞選段-包括睡美人'胡桃夾子'天鵝湖'歌碧利亞'女大不中留及舞姬等; 由本校舞蹈團及精英培訓班演出之現代芭蕾「沉香」及由北京中央芭蕾舞團的管文婷及邢亮表演他們於第十一屆俄羅斯國際芭蕾舞比賽中榮獲金獎的天鵝湖雙人舞.
About the Programme: The programme consisted of a ballet “Pinocchio” for the little ones to dance with the puppet  master Mr Wong Fai, a jazz sequence “Pop On the Rock”, several ballet excerpts chosen from Sleeping Beauty, Nutcracker, Swan Lake, Coppelia, La Fille Mal Gardee and La Bayadere, a  Modern Ballet “Chen Xiang” performed by members from our dance team and Elite Dancer Programme.  Last but not least, our guest performers Ms Guan Wenting and Mr Xing Liang  from the National Ballet of China  performed their Grand Pas de Deux from Swan Lake.
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
子分類_ArtGenre SubCategory: 芭蕾舞、現代舞／當代舞、爵士舞
venue_en: Grand Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目名稱: 飛舞天下《飛同凡響》舞蹈匯演
節目簡介: 匯演包含多種類型舞蹈，包括中國舞、民族民間舞、現代舞、拉丁舞及當代中國舞共19個節目。其中7個為首演的創編舞蹈。當中『兒童勞動舞』為大型舞蹈詩「客從何來」的選段，內容是反映昔日農村兒童樂於勞動的天性，節目更獲甄選為「香港特區成立12周年慶祝酒會」之表演節目；而現代舞『拼搏』曾於公開舞蹈比賽中獲得亞軍及優異獎，『藍孔雀』及『思潮』則嘗試在傳統中國舞中加入新的元素，各個節目均獲得在場觀眾的好評。
Venue: THEATRE, SAI WAN HO CIVIC CENTRE
venue_en: Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre, Theatre

節目名稱: 飛舞天下《京港齊飛》舞蹈匯演
節目簡介: 匯演邀請到北京浪遏飛舟文化傳播有限公司之「快樂小魚藝術團」來港進行交流，合共演出11個中國舞、民間舞及現代舞節目，包括國內獲獎無數的『剪紙姑娘』及『快樂小魚』，此外，隨團的北京舞蹈學院導師，更為觀眾展示多個民族民間舞蹈小品，令大家大開眼界。在短短的個多小時，為在場觀眾帶來一個難忘的早上。
Venue: THEATRE, SAI WAN HO CIVIC CENTRE
venue_en: Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre, Theatre

節目名稱: 學校文化日計劃：《尋找快樂金鎖匙》
Programme Name: The key to Happiness (School Culture Day Scheme 2009)
節目簡介: 節目為融合舞蹈、文字、錄像及劇場多種不同媒體之表演，內容講述主持人(阿輝)希望透過《尋找快樂金鎖匙》的演出將歡笑帶給觀眾，誰知過程中不斷被外來事情打擾，當中包括外星人亞文(阿MAN)乘坐快樂飛船從K1386星球降臨香港，以探索及了解地球人生活，並期望將在地球尋找到的「快樂金鎖匙」帶回所屬星球；演出中途又遭年青蒙面人在演出期間搶劫。最後主持人在經歷眾多事情及問題之後，和大家一同總結並分享快樂心得，道出快樂人生視乎各人對生活的態度及如何看待生命的真諦。我們該學習如何珍惜、欣賞及感受身邊的人、事、物…。 演出加插錄像片段，以加強同學對演出的投入。部份同學更會獲邀與表演者體驗創作的樂趣，演出完畢後亦會進行討論，加深同學們對演出及創作過程之了解。
About the Programme: The makeshift stage is a familiar Hong Kong tradition: during festivals, Cantonese opera is performed alongside rituals and celebrations. These bamboo scaffoldings became a site for the meeting of tradition and modern art: through a series of site-specific theatre and dance performances, workshops,parade and games for the whole family, Y-Space brought together traditional and modern culture to share with the public. The multimedia performance on the main stage, The Key to Happiness, was narrated by Ah Fai. He wanted to bring joy to the audience through the show. But interruptions kept coming: a alien (Ah Man) arrived from Planet Joy to bring the key to happiness back to his people; a masked robber burst into the scene … After so much had happened, Ah Fai shared his realization that one’s attitude to life, the people one met and all that transpired, was the key to happiness.
地點: 屯門大會堂演奏廳 & 荃灣大會堂演奏廳
Venue: Tuen Mun Town Hall Auditorium&Tsuen Wan Town Hall Auditorium
venue.1: 屯門大會堂演奏廳 & 荃灣大會堂演奏廳
venue_en: Tuen Mun Town Hall, Auditorium&Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium

節目名稱: 社區文化大使計劃： 戲棚計劃II — 舞蹈拼貼嘉年華《香港船與島的故事》
Programme Name: Makeshift theatre Project II: Dance Collage Carnival 2009
節目簡介: 香港在尚未發展成為今日的繁華城市之前，是一個與海有密切關係的小漁港。而被海洋分隔著又與我們息息相關的就是一個個不同大小的島嶼。這些不同特色的島嶼代表著香港不同時期的發展和歷史，孕育出香港獨有的文化。而連接著這些島嶼及至遠大海洋的是一艘艘不同大小的船隻，它們記載及經歷著香港人為理想與目標而努力奮鬥、為生活與大自然掙扎求生的一段段感人故事。      《香港船與島的故事》演出以現代舞為主，並結合東西方表演程式，加上強勁之中國敲擊樂及說書﹕當中以天后（媽祖）角色串連整個演出，帶出香港發展的歷史並述說香港人奮鬥的故事。
About the Programme: Hong Kong began as a fishing harbour whose people lived in close proximity to the sea. The many islands were connected by boats, which carried the people of Hong Kong as they strove for a better life. And so they were witnesses to the people’s sweat and tears as Hong Kong developed into a bustling metropolis and evolved a distinct culture. They were vessels contatining moving stories of struggles against the forces of nature, and of striving for their ideals.  The Story of Island and Boat – Hong Kong combined East and West, old and new on one stage. Modern dance met powerful Chinese percussions and “syut syu” storytelling, the southern Chinese folk performance tradition. The character of Goddess Tin Hau weaved the many theatrical elements together, to bring out the stories of Hong Kong.
地點: 香港．屯門三聖村恆貴街 (平安福音中學側) &香港．西貢普通道（天后廟前）
Venue: Hang Kwai Street, Tuen Mun Sam Shing Estate (next to NLSI Peace Evangelical Secondary School), Hong Kong  &  Sai Kung Po Tung Road (in front of Tin Hau Temple), Hong Kong
venue.1: 香港．屯門三聖村恆貴街  &香港．西貢普通道（天后廟前）
venue_en: Hang Kwai Street, Tuen Mun Sam Shing Estate , Hong Kong  &  Sai Kung Po Tung Road , Hong Kong

節目名稱: 自主舞蹈創作平台2009 －《非常搞嘢》
Programme Name: New Dance Platform 2009- Super Gao Ya
節目簡介: 「自主舞蹈創作平台」是一個獨立、自由、自主的舞蹈創作平台，期望透過這個平台長遠能鼓勵並發掘更多有潛質的舞壇創作人，為他們提供一個進行創作及發表作品的空間。「自主舞蹈創作平台」可以協助本地舞壇新進將其意念及理想轉化為演出，讓他們能有一個與公眾分享作品及發表創作之機會。 《非常搞嘢》是由入圍的六個組合自行創作之作品。六個不同的故事，六把不同的心聲，11位非常創作人在台上展示他們追求夢想的歷程。
About the Programme: New Dance Platform is a free , independent and autonomous platform for dance creations.It aims to explore and encourage innovative and upcoming choreographers in a long run, and enabling them to present their works. From vision to presentation ,New Dance Platform allows potential choreographers to share their works with the public.
地點: 香港．賽馬會創意藝術中心黑盒劇場
Venue: Black Box Theatre,JCCAC,H.K.
venue.1: 賽馬會創意藝術中心黑盒劇場
venue_en: Jockey Club Creative Arts Centre, Black Box Theatre

節目簡介: 書寫已枯萎了嗎  文字卻是不死的 他們不只是紙上兵卒書裡紅妝 他們也會風生水起，像海盛開 2009年8月29日，走進第20個系列的《緣舞場》，以文字為主題，演出糅合了舞蹈、音樂、視覺、裝置、戲劇、形體等藝術形式。一眾藝術家聯同台灣原住民藝人英桃阿姨同台即興創作。
About the Programme: The twentieth improvisation brought together dance, music, visual and installation art, drama and movement under the overarching theme of text: not mere traces of ink colouring the page, but text that whip up the wind and span distances like the ocean.
Venue: Theatre Y, Y-Space
venue_en: Y-Space, Theatre Y

Programme Name: By the Artistic Director of Synalèphe from Paris : Maxime Iannarelli’ s Ulysses Bloom
節目簡介: Maxime的編舞亦用意識流手法，定名為Ulysses Bloom－詩意盎然，嬉戲在簡約空間，舞者憑藉身體放射不同情緒……無止無盡的起承轉合，輕巧愜意，亦能量充沛 Maxime除獨舞外，當晚還與「多空間」的舞者馬才和及嚴明然，還有樂師邱立信合作即興表演。
About the Programme: Maxime choreographed his dance piece utilizing the stream of consciousness approach and his dance is called Ulysses Bloom – extremely poetic with the body of the dance in a playful simple space, radiating with emotions...endless flows and transformation and full of energy. Apart from his solo dance, he would jam with Y Space's Victor and Mandy accompanied by Nelson Hiu, one of the most like musician who plays improvisation music. After his gig in Hong Kong, Maxime will perform in a Festival in Taiwan. Ulysses Bloom has been staged in France, Spain and Slovenia.
Venue: Theatre Y, Y-Space
主辦單位: 多空間& 社區文化發展中心
製作/演出單位: 多空間& 社區文化發展中心

venue_en: Y-Space, Theatre Y

節目名稱: “舞”可能IV－馬才和的舞蹈展覽(一)
Programme Name: Dance “In” Possible IV – Victor Ma’s Dance Exhibition I
節目簡介: 一個人 一個人在舞蹈室 一個人在舞蹈室生活 一個人24小時在舞蹈室生活 一個人連續30天每天24小時在舞蹈室生活 一個人連續30天每天24小時在舞蹈室中尋找生活的舞蹈 一個人連續30天每天24小時在舞蹈室中尋找生活的舞蹈及搜索舞蹈中的生活 一個人連續30天每天24小時在舞蹈室中尋找生活的舞蹈、搜索舞蹈中的生活及生活中的表演
About the Programme: Having danced for many years, the dancer wanted to search for the condition in which dance is performed: that moment without past or future, the moment that the dancer most relished. For this search, Victor Ma enclosed himself for one month, at Y-Space’s studio in the Kwai Chung industrial area. If life and art are so inextricably linked, every moment is a performance, watched by a god, other people, or oneself. The performance was streamed live on the internet for viewing.  The work was a month-long exhibition, including Victor Ma’s Chaozhou physicality, a 45-year-old man’s worries, joys, pains, memories, photographs, and his postmodern self. On the other hand, this was a preparation for a solo later that year, and the enclosure allowed the self to quieten, to enter into the condition for creating. Once every seven days, Victor Ma also set aside one hour to meet and interact with a live audience.
地點: 多空間舞蹈創作室 / 互聯網 (24小時直播)
Venue: 多空間舞蹈創作室 / 互聯網 (24小時直播)
venue.1: 多空間舞蹈創作室 / 互聯網
venue_en: 多空間舞蹈創作室 / 互聯網

Programme Name: Dance “In” Possible IV – Victor Ma’s Dance Exhibition II
節目簡介: 這是“舞” 可能系列的第四部曲“馬才和的舞蹈展覽2009＂的第二部，是馬才和於2009年7月25日至8月24日，為期一個月，每天24小時的網上表演及生活展覽的延續。 馬才和在他這次 “舞蹈展覽二” 中與觀眾一同回顧他的崎嶇、古怪、不凡又多變化的舞蹈人生，“馬才和的舞蹈展覽2009＂是他個人的生命、生活及舞蹈探索及經歷的呈現與分享……。 這不僅僅是一場舞蹈自傳，既有吉光片羽式的回憶：童年時光、習舞歷程、創作感悟、從舞者到舞團總監的人生積累，亦有即興的淋漓抒寫，對「美」、對「自在」的追索，對身體與空間的開發，對生與死的終極關懷。這更是展現馬才和即興式舞蹈不可複製的臨場智慧，是身與心的融會貫通，也是他詭怪、崎嶇、幻化萬端舞蹈風格的成熟演繹。
About the Programme: This work followed on from Victor Ma’s enclosure in the Y-Space dance studio in 2009 in Victor Ma’s Dance Exhibition I, during which his daily living was streamed live on the internet as a month-long performance. Victor Ma’s Dance Exhibition II looked back at his life: difficult, strange, unpredictable, an extraordinary journey. The work shared his experiences and explorations in life, living and dance.  The work was not just an autobiography in dance. It showed fragments of childhood memories, dance training, creative breakthroughs, and life experiences; but the dance also revealed unrehearsed moments of relish in the search for beauty and unrestraint, the opening up of body and space, the mediation on life and death bounded up in the moment. The work thus invited a witnessing of how Victor Ma had matured in his distinctive style: difficult, strange, unpredictable, a dance that came from his engagement with the fleeting, the improvised, the live connection between mind and body – both in dancing and in living.
Venue: Black Box Theatre, Kwai Tsing Theatre, Hong Kong
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Black Box Theatre, Hong Kong

節目名稱: 學校文化日－《香港－船與島的故事2009》
Programme Name: The Story of Island and Boat – Hong Kong 2009(School Culture Day Scheme)
節目簡介: 香港在尚未發展成為今日的繁華城市之前，是一個與海有密切關係的小漁港。而被海洋分隔著又與我們息息相關的就是一個個不同大小的島嶼。這些不同特色的島嶼代表著香港不同時期的發展和歷史，孕育出香港獨有的文化。而連接著這些島嶼及至遠大海洋的是一艘艘不同大小的船隻，它們記載及經歷著香港人為理想與目標而努力奮鬥、為生活與大自然掙扎求生的一段段感人故事。      《香港船與島的故事》演出以現代舞為主，並結合東西方表演程式，加上強勁之中國敲擊樂及說書﹕當中以天后（媽祖）角色串連整個演出，帶出香港發展的歷史並述說香港人奮鬥的故事。
About the Programme: Hong Kong began as a fishing harbour whose people lived in close proximity to the sea. The many islands were connected by boats, which carried the people of Hong Kong as they strove for a better life. And so they were witnesses to the people’s sweat and tears as Hong Kong developed into a bustling metropolis and evolved a distinct culture. They were vessels contatining moving stories of struggles against the forces of nature, and of striving for their ideals.  The Story of Island and Boat – Hong Kong combined East and West, old and new on one stage. Modern dance met powerful Chinese percussions and “syut syu” storytelling, the southern Chinese folk performance tradition. The character of Goddess Tin Hau weaved the many theatrical elements together, to bring out the stories of Hong Kong.
地點: 荃灣大會堂 & 屯門大會堂
Venue: Auditorium, Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Hong Kong  & Auditorium, Tuen Mun Town Hall, Hong Kong
venue.1: 荃灣大會堂 & 屯門大會堂
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium, Hong Kong  & Tuen Mun Town Hall, Auditorium, Hong Kong

節目名稱: 《枯榮》-「多空間」深圳香港交流計劃
節目簡介: 人生寄世，忽如逆旅 草木盛衰，命運俯仰 生活自最初，便開始一場向外擴張的旅程 追逐「美」、「愛」、「自由」，馬不停蹄，周折往復 在不同地方不同時刻留下印跡，既是開疆拓土，也是流離失所
About the Programme: Life is of diverse journeys,  Nature is of continuous cycles journey begins at the time when you were born. It is also a never-ending process of searching for beauty, love and freedom.  Footprints left... There are always adventures ahead, or indeed a wild wonder in a maze.
Venue: OCAT Theatre
主辦單位: 何香凝美術館OCT當代藝術中心（深圳）
Presenter: OCT Contemporary Art Terminal od he Xiangning Art Museum
venue_en: OCAT Theatre

節目名稱: 《身體，空間與身份 III》-「多空間」深圳香港交流計劃
Programme Name: Body, ID, Space III -  Crossing OCAT Contemporary Dance Festival
節目簡介: 《身體，空間與身份III》一場表演者與環境、觀眾互動的交響，讓身體與身份在有限空間中碰撞出意義。「多空間」創作成員透過現場音樂、舞蹈、錄像制作及觀眾參與來進行創意演出。作品以肢體創作為主體，加以表演者的主觀理念、性格特質和文化差異，利用客觀的環境空間進行多媒體演出。觀眾不僅僅是一名旁觀者，其反饋足以影響表演進程。
About the Programme: Bodies, spaces and identities in similarity and diversity … Different tongues, cuisines, climates, laws, histories, within the same country … Do our differences make us unique, or create barriers? Does our coming together imply that all is well? In 2009 in Shenzhen, Y-Space revisited this collision of differences when invited to perform at Crossing OCAT Contemporary Dance Festival.
Venue: OCAT Plaza
主辦單位: 何香凝美術館OCT當代藝術中心（深圳）
Presenter: OCT Contemporary Art Terminal od he Xiangning Art Museum
venue_en: OCAT Plaza

節目名稱: 「四圍跳」系列－ 環境舞蹈 《竹林舞士》
Programme Name: Dancing “In” Dancing “Out” – Dance in the Bamboo Garden
節目簡介: 《竹林舞士》是「多空間」特別為元朗劇院及其竹林景觀度身編排的環境舞蹈，根據環境特色、現場反應，以至觀眾情緒，幻化入舞，引領肢體律動的形態，帶觀眾感受肢體、音效、影像投射與景觀水乳交融的立體經歷。過程中，觀眾由專人帶領分批於元朗劇院不同場景觀賞演出，角度轉變，移步換景，全憑觀衆主宰！
About the Programme: The Dancing All Around series is one of Y-Space’s programmes coming out of the Yuen Long Theatre Venue Partnership Scheme. The audience at this site-specific work was divided into groups, each led through different viewing areas, changing their perspectives of the performance in the bamboo garden. The dancing interacted with music, projections, sites, and live reactions, becoming a multi-faceted performance that offered unique experiences for audience members.
地點: 元朗劇院及竹林景觀區
Venue: Yuen Long Theatre and Bamboo Garden
子分類_ArtGenre SubCategory: 現代舞／當代舞、環境舞蹈

節目簡介: 「多空間」方今2010年被邀前往深圳OCAT參與其五週年慶典，創作及演出了《遇》。 因為時間 因為這裡 因為緣份 因為有你 有我 此時此刻 我們相遇…
About the Programme: Y-Space was invited to perform on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of the OCT Contemporary Art Terminal in Shenzhen.

Programme Name: Not a Double Room 2010 (Revolve Stage Version)
節目簡介: 《不是雙人房》是以探索家庭及人際溝通為主題的舞蹈劇場。兩個人同住一間房，卻並不代表一起生活，那怎樣才叫「生活」？房間內的男女主角，雖然共處一室、打扮類似，但想法行逕迥異，心靈隔著遙遠的距離；兩人都以自我為中心，彼此並無關愛，缺乏溝通與尊重。危機正是在看似瑣碎的生活細節中不斷積累，最終關係一繃即斷，最後他們各自收拾行李，想要逃離現實，但最終又因為害怕、恐懼， 無法接受外界或根本無法脫離現實而再次回到〝雙人房中〞！明天是重新開始？還是繼續重複昨天的生活？舞劇以開放式的結局作結，引領觀眾一起省思「如何誠實地面對自己與他人」的課題。 《不是雙人房》的佈景結合生活與虛構、寫實與抽象；當中真正的桌椅配以虛構平面併貼而成的馬桶、梳化等家具，再結合文字、對白、視覺、音響設計、劇場及舞蹈元素，在舞台上形成一個似真亦假的房間。
About the Programme: Family and communication was the main theme of this dance theatre production. Living in the same room does not necessarily mean sharing a life; so what does it mean to “live together”? What is that something beyond material pleasures? The scenic environment of Not a Double Room blended the life-like with the imagined, the realistic with the abstract; real table and chairs stood amongst collages of toilet, sofa and other furniture. Text, spoken words, visuals, sound design, drama and dance elements created a room somewhere between reality and illusion. As the mundane details of the couple’s daily living accumulated, the slightest tension snapped the cord. But as they each packed their bags to escape, their fear of the outside - perhaps of reality itself - brought them back to the double room! Would tomorrow bring something new, or a repeat performance? The work was open-ended, guiding the viewer towards reflections on how to face oneself and each other with honesty.
Venue: Auditorium, Yuen Long Theatre, HK
venue_en: Yuen Long Theatre, Auditorium, HK

節目名稱: 香港波蘭交流及聯合創作計劃《反反覆覆》
節目簡介: 反覆傳統 顛覆科技 尋找平衡從地球形成開，從有生命、有人類開始，經過數十億年發展到今天，科技不斷在提升發展，我們的慾望擴張了，生活是變得更舒適、悠閒，還是更忙碌？物質生活快速提升，我們的壽命延長了，換來是把身體交托給機械和藥物還是我們對生命的掌控和自主加強了？ 我們該如何在科技與發展的同時保留我們的文化傳統？兩者是否可以並存？面對文明/發展/與科技及歷史或/文化/傳統，現代人類該如何在這兩極中尋找平衡？要活在當下，我們該如何自處？《反反覆覆》，正是與觀眾一同探討傳統與科技這個人類切身的問題！  《反反覆覆》共分兩條主線，一是由遠古到今，另一主線是由未來到今天，中間穿梭不冋的大小片段。
About the Programme: As multi-media dance theatre, RE/evolution made use of different theatrical languages to address a pressing issue in today’s world – the clashes and the fusion of tradition and technology.  Technology evolves, needs are met, fuelling more desires. Have our lives become more comfortable, or more hectic? We live longer - due to our dependence on drugs and machines, or from increased control over our own lives? How can cultural traditions be preserved as technology develops - can they co-exist? How to find the balance?
Venue: Auditorium, Kwai Tsing Theatre, Hong Kong
製作/演出單位: 多空間 及 波蘭 Silesian 舞蹈劇場
Name of Artistic Director: Victor Ma Choi Wo &  Jacek Luminski_
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

Programme Name: RE/evolution (Poland)  Poland XVII Annual International Contemporary Conference and Performance Festival 2010

Technology evolves, needs are met, fuelling more desires. Have our lives become more comfortable, or more hectic? 節目名稱: 自主舞蹈創作平台2010《搞乜义嘢!?》
節目簡介: 「自主舞蹈創作平台」是一個獨立、自由、自主的舞蹈創作平台，期望透過這個平台長遠能鼓勵並發掘更多有潛質的舞壇創作人，為他們提供一個進行創作及發表作品的空間。「自主舞蹈創作平台」可以協助本地舞壇新進將其意念及理想轉化為演出，讓他們能有一個與公眾分享作品及發表創作之機會。2010年，「多空間」繼續當「媒人」，為舞壇新進成其好事，入圍的五個組合來自不同背景，更能夠看到新舊舞蹈 創作人的交接及傷健共融!《搞乜义嘢！？》SHOW What!，再一次讓觀眾見證年輕創作人“搞嘢”的成果。
About the Programme: New Dance Platform is a free , independent and autonomous platform for dance creations.It aims to explore and encourage innovative and upcoming choreographers in a long run, and enabling them to present their works. From vision to presentation ,New Dance Platform allows potential choreographers to share their works with the public.
Venue: Theatre,Sheung Wan Civic Centre
venue_en: Theatre,Sheung Wan Civic Centre

Programme Name: Improvisation Land XXV – Inside Out Outside In
節目簡介: 竹園內庭 + 玻璃幕墙 + 劇院環境 + 光影聲效 + 觀衆互動 = 《裡裡外外》 「多空間」首次於元朗劇院竹林進行的環境即興，過程中，觀眾更可選擇於竹園內庭或隔着玻璃幕牆於劇院室內不同場景觀賞演出，角度轉變，移步換景，由觀眾主宰。  你在外時我在內， 我在內時你在外， 你在我內，我在你內， 你我共融，你我相隔， 你我不分，你我分離， 你你我我，裡裡外外…！ 倚重空間，依靠裝置，依賴環境， 風景不獨在身外，尚且在心內…
About the Programme: Bamboo garden + glass wall + theatre complex + light & sound + audience interaction = Inside Out, Outside In … Audience members could choose to view from within the bamboo garden or through the glass wall. The scene changed as the perspective changed – left to the viewer’s decision.
Venue: Bamboo Garden of Yuen Long Theatre
venue_en: Yuen Long Theatre, Bamboo Courtyard

節目簡介: 一個集合、錄影與互動媒體的即興表演 匯合了香港、美國、日本頂尖藝術家，一齊進入別開生面的「生鬼」聚會。
About the Programme: Ghost Party is an improvisation performance that gathers dance, music and multimedia top artists from Japan, US and Hong Kong.
Venue: Y-Space  TheatreY
子分類_ArtGenre SubCategory: 現代舞／當代舞、影像、多媒體裝置
venue_en: Y-Space, Theatre Y

節目名稱: 四圍跳系列—環境舞蹈《跳上跳落跳出跳入跳進元朗劇院》
Programme Name: Dancing “In” Dancing “Out” - Dance Around YL Theatre
節目簡介: 《跳上跳落跳出跳入跳進元朗劇院》為「多空間」之「四圍跳」- 環境舞蹈系列之創作。 從室外跳到室內  從大堂跳到竹庭  從地面跳到樓上  從前台跳到後台  從後台跳到元朗劇院演藝廳觀眾席…… 演出帶領觀眾透過一次探奇歷程來近距離接觸及探索元朗劇院之建築特色，參加者被引領到元朗劇院不同角落，全方位的欣賞演出，並經驗一次立體的表演！
About the Programme: Different sites within the Yuen Long Theatre complex became performance spaces, each with its own architectural characteristics. From outdoors to indoors, from foyer to the bamboo garden, from ground level to upstairs, from stage to backstage and to the auditorium … a dance viewed from all angles!
Venue: Yuen Long Theatre
venue_en: Yuen Long Theatre

節目名稱: 緣舞場二十七-觸動 ( 香港舞蹈節開幕式匯演)
節目簡介: 作品於2010年香港舞蹈節之開幕禮中演出，由一個簡單概念 “接觸”開始，並延伸至環境及觀眾…!  馬才和及嚴明然他們在身體帶上無線攝錄機，並將二人現場舞動期間之互動影像投放於銀幕，再加上現場音樂人所擦出之火花，觸動身體感觀產生動作和感覺，演出是一個結合音樂、互動媒體與舞蹈的即興演出。
About the Programme: Performed at the opening ceremony of the 2010 Hong Kong Dance Festival. Victor and Mandy moved with wireless camcorders attached, and the spaces and images between the interacting bodies were projected live on the screen. Between body contacting body, and between live music and movement, sensations and movements were sparked and ignited.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre
子分類_ArtGenre SubCategory: 現代舞／當代舞、影像、多媒體裝置

節目名稱: 《舞可能三-這是一個舞蹈表演II之起舞吧》香港舞蹈節2010節目之《三各演異》
Programme Name: Dance “In” Possible III - This is a Dance Performance!? II – Shall We Dance! HK Dance Festival 2010 programme - Fre3 Dance
節目簡介: 《三各演異》齊集頂尖本地現代舞團︰動藝、不加鎖舞踊館及多空間，破天荒首次同台演出，反轉香港至潮文化地標──賽馬會創意藝術中心，玩盡劇場內外每一吋空間──除了極具自家特色及令人拍案叫絕的原創舞台作品外，更會將前身為工廠大廈的創意藝術中心化成令人意想不到的舞者另類舞台，加上多位來自不同界別藝術家瞓身落場齊齊”jam”，務求與觀眾零距離，帶領觀眾進入比3D夢遊仙境更震撼的全方位感官體驗。 《舞可能三-----這是一個舞蹈表演II之起舞吧》是根據舞可能三2000年的演出版本作調整及修改而成的。
About the Programme: Fre3Dance was the first ever collaboration between DanceArt, Unlock Dancing Plaza and Y-Space, the three top modern dance companies in Hong Kong. The programme was a mixed bill inside the Black Box Theatre, bringing together excerpts of the companies’ best in their repertoires, as well as site-specific improvisation performances with artists from other disciplines throughout the public spaces of the JCCAC building. The 360ﾟexperience at this unique creative arts hub (which used to be a factory estate) ignited the senses of the audiences and offered a brand new way to explore modern dance. This was a refined version of Dance “In” Possible III –This is a Dance Performance!? that premiered in 2000.
地點: 賽馬會創意藝術中心黑盒劇場
Venue: Black Box Theatre, Jockey Club Creative Arts Centre, HK
主辦單位: 多空間 & 不加鎖舞踊館 & 動藝
venue.1: 賽馬會創意藝術中心黑盒劇場
venue_en: Jockey Club Creative Arts Centre, Black Box Theatre, HK

節目簡介: 對於心飛舞團來說，舞蹈就是其生命的真諦，一直以舞蹈這媒體為生命舞蹈，將快樂、熱情帶出社區。為其踏入十周年作小結，並讓社會大眾認識其藝術領域的得著及成就，因此於2010年3月舉辦「我心高飛之城市傳奇」節目。當中由香港著名舞蹈家暨本會舞蹈藝術顧問王廷琳先生編排14首舞蹈作品，配合心飛舞者純真的心、燦爛的笑容，並聯同一群有志服務社區之舞蹈愛好者「舞蹈大使」，在繁忙的城市裏，綻放一道道的彩虹。
About the Programme: Dance is the true essence for Dancing Heart Troupe, it expresses the happiness, enthusiasm in their lives. 2010 was going to be the 10th anniversary of the troupe, we held a show “Dancing Heart’s City Legend” in March 2010 to share their achievements with the community. Our Dance Development Consultant, Mr. Andy Wong, also known as Hong Kong Dance Artist, choreographed 14 dance pieces for the show. With the brightness smile and genuine of our Dancing Heart Troupe, together with ‘DancingAngels’, the amateurs of dance who are ambitious community service, the art revitalizing one’s life in our city.
Venue: SHEUNG WAN CIVIC CENTRE
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre

節目名稱: 我心高飛之城市傳奇~快樂篇
節目簡介: 承2010年3月份『我心高飛之城市傳奇』的演出，灣仔區議會社區建設委員會屬下社區共融工作小組誠邀本會合辦『我心高飛之城市傳奇 ~ 快樂篇』，讓更多社會大眾，可以欣賞智障人士的舞蹈藝術成就，一同感受其真摰的快樂。在聖誕夜裏，心飛舞者以跳躍的身軀，在17首舞蹈作品中去傳播「愛與快樂」。並集結十大傑出青年汪明欣小姐悅耳出色的歌聲及一群有志服務社區之舞蹈愛好者「舞蹈大使」，展現復康人士的驕傲，實行以生命影響生命，共建快樂的城市傳奇。
About the Programme: With the positive feedbacks of “Dancing Heart’s City Legend” in March 2010, Wanchai District Council Community Building Committee invited us to share  the ‘Love and Happiness’ to our city again, “Dancing Heart’s City Legend~Our Happiness” had been held in Christmas of 2010. Dancing  Heart Troupe performed 17 dance pieces, together with Artist, Ten Outstanding Young Person 2008 Awardees-Miss Wong Ming Yan, Chirstina and  “DancingAngels” to demonstrate the talents of the disabilities. Through the show, we passed our spirit to other lives and let the harmony pass on.
Venue: Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre
venue_en: Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre

Venue: CITY  HALL CONCERT HALL
venue_en: CITY  HALL CONCERT HALL

節目簡介: 舞團在東南亞各地的演出歷來備受好評, 逐漸累積了義演籌款的基礎, 1999年在馬來西亞義演為馬六甲公教小學籌得101萬馬幣, 兩年後已建成了新校舍, 2002年在東馬詩巫的一場義演, 為詩巫省華文獨立中學籌得120萬馬幣, 更堅定了舞團的方向。2010年由馬來西亞基督教舞蹈協會牽頭, 在吉隆坡, 檳城, 太平, 怡保四地巡迴義演4場, 題名<情繫亞洲>, 為當地慈善和教育機構共籌得約200萬港幣。  開場節目"馬來西亞全接觸"突顯該國多元文化交流的景象, 接著是印尼, 菲律賓, 泰國, 中國等不同地區的舞蹈, 壓軸是該國吉蘭丹地區舞蹈 "愛的天地", 描繪團結互助的歡樂氣氛。
About the Programme: The troupe has gradually accumulated a charity fund-raising foundation after   series of dances performance in Southeast Asia with critical acclaim. In 1999, Charity performance in Malacca of Malaysia raised 1.01 million ringgit to support school. Two years later, a new school has built. In 2002, the troupe has raised 1.2 million ringgit to support local Chinese independent secondary school in Sibu of East Malaysia. It determined the direction of our troupe.  In 2010,  Led by Christian Dance Federation Malaysia Bhd, a series of  Charity Dance Performances were taken placed in Kuala Lumpur, Penang, Taiping and Ipoh in Malaysia, titled “ Savour The Asian Heritage”  to raise 2 million HK dollars to support the Local Chinese Independent Secondary schools and church. Opening program “Malaysia Truly Asia” highlighted Malaysia is a multi-racial state. Followed by different dances of Indonesia, Philippines, Thailand and Chinese, etc dances in different regions. Finale was Malaysia Kelantan dance “Tari Dikir Puteri” depicts a picture of harmony among the local people.
地點: 吉隆坡, 檳城, 太平華聯中學, 怡保培南獨立中學
Venue: Kuala Lumpur Performing Arts Centre, Dewan Sri Penang, Taiping Hua Lian High School & Ipoh Poi Lam High School
Production / Performing Unit: Hong Kong South East Asia Dance Troupe

舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞及鋼琴演奏及花藝創作
節目簡介: 《指上芭蕾》是一個跨界別的社區藝術演出。視障展能藝術天使李軒，以感性的演繹方式，彈奏經典鋼琴曲目，包括李斯特《愛之夢》及莫札特《土耳其進行曲》。香港芭蕾舞團前高級獨舞員賴振榮，從樂曲中取得靈感，編出優美的現代芭蕾舞蹈，由四位年青舞者傾情演出。肢體殘障的花藝師鄧燕妹，發揮無限的創意，即席創作多姿多彩的插花藝術。部分場次附設口述影像及手語傳譯，讓視障及聽障的觀眾一起欣賞藝術。

節目簡介: 由演藝舞蹈團擔綱演出 十一月，舞蹈月！這既是舉辦香港舞蹈節的月份，也是香港演藝學院舞蹈學院的學生擔綱演出學年的首個節目的月份。《十一．舞翩翩》的節目包含了不同風格和主題的芭蕾舞、中國舞及現代舞作品。其中引人注目的是新上任的現代舞駐院藝術家黃煒丹的新編舞作。黃煒丹曾是英國阿爾斯頓舞蹈團的舞者，也是著名邦妮貝特編舞基金獎的得主。 就讓我們一起來欣賞這場令人著迷和喜悅的演出，感受香港青年舞蹈家的才華和對藝術的熱切追求吧！
About the Programme: Performed by Academy Dance Ensemble In Hong Kong, November is all about dance! It's the month for the Hong Kong Dance Festival, the month when the city dances, and the month when the HKAPA's School of Dance presents its first bright and shining season for the academic year. While still to be confirmed, the programme will be another eclectic mix of work from all three of the School's streams - ballet, Chinese dance, and contemporary dance. A highlight will be a work created by newly-appointed Contemporary Dance Artist-in-Residence, Dam Van Huynh, former dancer with the Richard Alston Dance Company (UK) and recipient of the prestigious Bonnie Bird Choreographic Fund Award.
Venue: Academy Lyric Theatre
Presenter: The Hong Kong Academy Performing Arts

節目簡介: 香港演藝學院25周年校慶，怎可缺少演藝舞蹈學院的技驚四座的精采演出？ 這個5月，舞蹈學院的作品靈感來自1915年俄國偉大的芭蕾舞大師狄亞基洛夫為當時年輕舞蹈家谷克多的挑戰，以此作慶祝學院的25周年校慶。 無與倫比的編舞家威廉科西是舞蹈界創世奇才，舞蹈學院這次能演出其作品《Enemy in the Figure》選段，並請得前法蘭克福科西芭蕾舞的安娜．嘉達蓮娜．羅曼任學院客席藝術家，帶領學生演出科西的作品，同時排練她的二人舞創作《神秘的巴布》。校慶演出亦包括澳洲頂尖編舞家格雷厄姆．墨菲的作品《自由基》的選段和內地著名舞者及舞蹈家（雜技劇《天鵝湖》編舞）趙明的全新創作，身為演藝畢業生的趙明，這次將為母校創作為36人的跨舞系大型作品。另一演藝畢業生Anh Ngoc Nguyen亦將回饋母校，替芭蕾舞學生編作新舞。Anh於2003年加入倫敦Wayne McGregor's Random Dance，憑其精準舞姿及速度，獲「2008年英國全國舞蹈獎」最佳男舞蹈員（現代舞）。最後，學院的中國舞系主任盛培琪將聯同著名編舞家兼演藝畢業生梅卓燕，重排曾於2005年首演的作品《埋．伏》。 因此，過去和現在，本地與海內外的世界級編舞家，畢業生和將畢業的舞者，也會走在一起，共同創造難忘的周年盛事！ 本節目為香港演藝學院25周年校慶節目
About the Programme: ASTONISH ME! And why not? on this special 25th Anniversary season from the School of Dance? This May season takes it inspiration from the challenge the great Russian impresario Sergei Diaghilev supposedly threw out to the young Jean Cocteau way back in 1915. And that's exactly what the School has done: taken up the challenge to celebrate the Academy's 25th Anniversary with a programme that stretches the imagination and reaches for the stars! The incomparable William Forsythe - one of the world's real creative geniuses - has given permission for us to perform a section of his seminal Enemy in the Figure: a special gift indeed! As well as bringing Enemy to production, guest artist Ana Catalina Roman - herself a long-term dancer with Forsythe's Ballett Frankfurt - has restaged her The Secret Bob, a rather wry - but nonetheless gentle - look at what it means to be a creative artist. We have an excerpt from Australia's top choreographer Graeme Murphy's dynamic Free Radicals. And! one of Mainland China's leading choreographic lights (and a graduate of the School) Zhao Ming - of Acrobatic Swan Lake fame - returns to the School to a major challenge: to create a celebratory work for 36 students from across all three departments! Another world-class graduate returning 'home' is Anh Ngoc Nguyen, who will be creating a new work for the Ballet students. Like our other choreographers, Ahn comes with a distinguished pedigree, having been a member of Wayne McGregor's internationally renown Random Dance, and winner of the prestigious Spotlight Award for the Best Male Artist (Modern) at the UK 2008 National Dance Awards. The programme is rounded off by the beautiful Ambuscade, first performed in 2005, and reworked by our Head of Chinese Dance Sheng Peiqi in collaboration with Hong Kong choreographer Mui Cheuk-yin (who is also a graduate). So quite a sensational line-up, where past and present, Hong Kong, China and the world, masters and our young apprentices, graduates and those graduating - all come together in what will be a really impressive anniversary performance! This event is part of the Academy's 25th anniversary celebration

Programme Name: Academy Dance: of night and other things ...
節目簡介: 由演藝舞蹈團擔綱演出 《和合氤氳》 張曉梅《涅槃》 胡錦明《夜急沉》 余載恩《惡童》 林文中《帕基塔》 選段 約瑟 ‧ 馬其里埃 本月份演藝舞蹈團將再次為觀眾呈獻多個精彩的作品，並透過不同的舞目，挑戰一眾年輕舞者的才藝，展示他們的精鍊技巧。五齣作品風格各異，但均具有絲絲陰陽平衡的微妙含意：當代與傳統的平衡、東方和西方的平衡、以及過去和現在的平衡。 來自北京舞蹈學院的客席藝術家張曉梅重編了富有現代感的傳統韓國舞蹈《和合氤氳》，展示群舞與獨舞；線條與圓形的平衡，還處處滲透「氣」的起伏。 另一齣類似的作品《涅槃》由演藝畢業生胡錦明創作，作品描述了生死循環的永恆週期，亦透過 火鳳凰的傳說寓意人類追求永生的精神。這齣全新創作將展示中國古典舞蹈中男性剛柔並重的優美動態。 學院講師余載恩本學期將為芭蕾舞學生排演他的作品《夜急沉》。該作品於2005年由密爾沃基芭蕾舞團首演，並將成為演藝舞蹈團明年4月於摩納哥舞蹈論壇演出的三個作品之一 。 屢獲獎項的台灣編舞家林文中將為香港觀眾帶來他的作品《惡童》，舞蹈的配樂採用了柴可夫斯基小提琴協奏曲作品35第一樂章，屬《惡童三部曲》作品的第一部分。（新任駐院現代舞藝術家王如萍將帶領一眾現代舞學生演出）。 在上演各個當代舞目的同時，演藝芭蕾舞系主任高家霖將與學生重排約瑟‧馬其里埃的華麗舞劇《帕基塔》選段。該作品於1846年首演，1881年曾由彼蒂帕改編，是次演出將為作品注入新的動力。
About the Programme: Performed by the Academy Dance Ensemble In Harmony Zhang Xiaomei Nirvana Wu Kam-ming Night Falls Fast John Utans Evil Boy Lin Wen-chung Excerpts from Paquita Joseph Mazilier This November season will see another exciting mix of work from the School of Dance, a mix which demonstrates the importance we place on repertory that challenges and extends the performance capabilities of our young dance artists. And while the programme is eclectic, the five works are linked by a common - if perhaps rather subtle - thread, crystallized in the yin/yang harmonic opposites: the balance between the contemporary and the traditional; the east and west; the past and present. From the Beijing Dance Academy, guest artist Zhang Xiaomei has recreated In Harmony, a work which gives contemporary voice to traditional Korean Dance. It also gives voice to other kinds of 'harmonic opposites' in its play between the group and the individual, the line and the circle, the ebb and flow of the omnipresent qi. In somewhat similar vein, Academy graduate Wu Kam-ming's point of departure for Nirvana is the age-old story of the firebird phoenix: the eternal cycle of life and death and the striving of the human spirit. A new creation, the work is a beautiful combination of the strength and grace that characterises male Chinese Classical Dance. Faculty member John Utans will set his dynamic Night Falls Fast on the students from the Ballet stream. Created on the Milwaukee Ballet in 2005, the work will be one of three that the School will take to the Monaco Dance Forum in April next year. Performed to the first movement of Tchaikovsky's virtuosic Violin Concerto Opus 35, Evil Boy is the first part of a trilogy of the same name by award-winning Taiwanese choreographer Lin Wen-chung (and set on the Contemporary Dance students by newly appointed Contemporary Dance Artist-in-Residence Wang Ruping). And while the focus of the programme is on contemporary choreography, there is also a glimpse of the past with the performance of excerpts from the gorgeously showy Paquita, choreographed by Joseph Mazilier in 1846, reworked by Marius Petipa in 1881 - and given fresh life for this season by Head of Ballet, Graeme Collins.
