節目簡介: 《有樣學樣板》伍宇烈《瀚海夢欄杆》張建民《白膠帶》鄭宗龍《脈動》李華倫 今個5月，演藝舞蹈團為大家呈獻比過去數季更高水準，由世界級編舞家創作的四個精采作品。 4個舞蹈作品不約而同以《舞‧線》為主題，透過舞步緊扣一起。台灣編舞家鄭宗龍的作品《白膠帶》，以縱橫交錯的十字交叉，形成一個複雜的舞蹈空間，寓意規範以及被剝奪的自由。相反，本地編舞鬼才伍宇烈的芭蕾新作《有樣學樣板》，一切由孩童玩意經常出現的紅線，與中國文革時期的《紅色娘子軍》串聯一起。 澳洲編舞家李華倫的作品《脈動》，12位舞蹈員將在著名近代作曲家米歇爾．尼曼的弦樂四重奏襯托下活潑起舞。張建民的《瀚海夢欄杆》為大家編織一個夢想世界，從現代生活中連接希望與幻想，將我們帶返唐代詩人岑參的七言律詩《白雪歌送武判官歸京》的意境中。張建民過去的編舞作品，包括有廣為人知的張藝謀電影《十面埋伏》。
About the Programme: Everything I Need to Know I Learnt from the Propaganda Ballets by Yuri Ng Of Dreams in Time and Space by Zhang Jianmin White Tape by Cheng Tsung-lung Impulse by Leigh Warren The past few seasons have seen the Academy Dance Ensemble move into a new, high-powered trajectory: high production values, challenging and innovative works from world-class choreographers, and some brilliant performances. This May's dance/lines promises to be no exception. The four works on the programme are loosely held together by the theme of lines - both real and metaphorical - that connect and link, hold and bind, lead and guide. In his White Tape. Taiwanese choreographer Cheng Tsung-lung uses exactly that: white tape not only criss-crosses the stage to form a complex spatial matrix for the dance, but also stands as a metaphor for the restriction and denial of freedom. In contrast, red threads signify everything from childhood games to the seminal Moa-ist period ballet Red Detachment of Women in Yuri Ng's quirky Everything I Need to Know I Learnt from the Propaganda Ballets. A little less obvious perhaps, the lines in Impulse belong to the strings of the School of Music quartet, who not only provide the music for the twelve cross-stream dancers, but become part of the dance itself. Choreographed by Australian Leigh Warren, the lively, high-spirited work is performed to Michael Nyman's String Quartet No.2. Last but by no means least, in Of Dreams in Time and Space world renown Chinese choreographer/director Zhang Jianmin (most widely known perhaps for his choreography for Zhang Yimou's film House of Flying Daggers) has created a dream-world that both connects life in a modern sky-scraper city to unspoken hopes and dreams, and leads us back in time to the elegiac seven-character verse by Tang Dynasty poet Cen Can.

節目名稱: 「屯門中學現代舞普及計劃」- 專業舞蹈導賞演出暨結業作品演出
節目簡介: 「2009-10年普及藝術計劃- 屯門中學現代舞普及計劃」是一個全方位的舞蹈藝術計劃，從課堂工作坊到專業舞台結業演出，讓同學在學習基本舞蹈技巧之餘，亦能體驗肢體動作如何表達思想感情，親身感受舞蹈帶給他們的滿足感，加強同學的自我意識及建立自信。此計劃亦著提昇重參與學校整體學生的舞蹈經驗及欣賞能力，設有舞蹈同樂日及專業舞蹈導賞演出，增加他們對現代舞的興趣。計劃於6間屯門區中學進行。
About the Programme: In 2009, CCDC Centre collaborated with Tuen Mun District Council to run an educational scheme inTuen Mun. Six Secondary schools were involved. Dance training workshops have been held by appointing professional dance tutors. Tutors also choreographed works for students to perform in the finale performance. In order to arouse their interests on modern dance, they were invited to join Dance Day and guided professional dance performance.
Venue: Auditorium, Tuen Mun Town Hall
venue_en: Tuen Mun Town Hall, Auditorium

Programme Name: Opening Doors With A New Set Of Keys
節目簡介: 《驀然回首星如雨》以嶄新的形式融入中西文化，跨越舞蹈及音樂的經典門派，揉合芭蕾、拉丁、費明高、中國傳統舞等等，細心發展出技巧與藝術智慧。編舞林偉源選用阿根廷作曲家 Piazzolla (1921-1992)的 Ｎuevo tango 音樂，再從辛棄疾 (1140-1107)的宋詞《青玉案》中《元夕》取得靈感，令《驀然回首星如雨》成為更戲劇性、更人性化、更多演繹空間的作品。 編舞: 林偉源 舞者: 張健祥、藤岡綾子、林偉源、林恩滇、梁家權、落合恵利子、王泳 樂者: 史提芬．西菲亞、楊慧儀 設計者: 馮國基 (燈光) 龍永邦 (錄像) 曾文通 (佈景)
About the Programme: “It is story about the passion of the classical form when it struggles with the free spirit of creation… the result will always something daring and new.”  ~ Allen Lam “Opening Doors With A Set Of Keys” causes the real intake of breath when Allen Lam blends contemporary dance together with ballet, Latin dance, Flamenco, Chinese dance with respects to each tradition.   The work sets to Nuevo tango music by Piazzolla (1921-1992), and gets inspiration from lyric “Rendevous at Lantern Festival night” by  Xin Qi-ji (1140-1107), a poet of the Song Dynasty.  There are many surprises and splendors in the performances that open up your instincts associated with dramatic expressions in dance.  Choreographer Allen Lam  Dancers Rico Cheung Ayako Fujioka Allen Lam Icey Lam Francis Leung Eriko Ochiai Mike Wang  Musicians Stephen Xavier Verna Yeung  Designers Fung Kwok Kei, Gabriel (Light) Franky Lung (Video) Tsang Man Tung (Set)
Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 《剛柔流》是由兩位香港各負盛名的資深編舞家黎海寧及余仁華發展出來的兩齣風格各走極端的舞蹈作品。黎海寧的《某些動作與陰影》以中國著名詩人北島的作品出發，把詩中激昂而沉鬱的感覺、音節字彙的起落變化融入舞蹈之中。舞者的身體與動作產生的陰影化成無窮意象，緊緊攫取觀眾的心靈。余仁華的《暴光》， 在舞台上設置了一個可分解重構的巨型燈架，利用高科技的舞台裝置令它「起舞」──傾斜或垂直、躺臥或搖晃，產生千變萬化的視覺效果。舞者在燈架的空位穿梭、攀爬，以高能量的身體動律抗衡強勁的電子音樂，肢體的張力足令舞者在台上發熱發亮。
About the Programme: Two of Hong Kong’s most accomplished choreographers, Helen Lai and Jacky Yu, set their creations in a double bill to two apparent opposites: invincibility and vulnerability. Helen Lai‘s Movements and Shadows is inspired by the poems of contemporary Chinese poet Beidao. In the same programme, Jacky Yu plunges the dancers into a pure kinesthetic approach to precision and technicality in Lights Up until the body takes over the mind to think and feel.
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Theatre

Programme Name: Moments in the palm of your hand
節目簡介: 林偉源 Allen Lam + 黃龍斌 Tony Wong 雙人首次合作，將編、導、演、跳集於一身，打破語言限制，更融渾舞蹈、戲劇、錄像、音樂的元素，衝破以往舞蹈表演和戲劇演出的局限，以友誼為故事的藍本，將無分國藉、無分種族、無分性別、無分文化的友情呈現出來，千絲萬縷的情誼由倆個人相遇而開始。每個人也有經歷過與朋友一起相處的時刻，彼此無所不談，互相信任和了解，Allen & Tony 運用他們的舞蹈和身體語言，表達出在生命裡這份不可缺失的感情，由舞蹈翦影揭開序幕，在這短短六十分鐘的光與影旅程中，定能引起大家的共鳴，感受到與別不同的藝術意境。
About the Programme: The story of friendship developed through the eyes of a dancer and an actor.  Two very different people stepping into each other’s art form!  A “Journey of friendship” involving 2 different performing disciplines, one body trying to break the boundary of traditional style and one willing to connect the natural physical instinct. This performance explores the insightful moments of fate, coincidence or personal choice using the unique stage language of Allen and Tony.   Moments in the Palm of your Hand is developed through their independent creative experience over the course of 14 years from the moment when these life-long friends were destine to meet.  Both decided to come together knowing that this is the time to tell their unique story
地點: 麥高利小劇場，香港藝術中心
Venue: McAulay Studio, The Hong Kong Arts Centre
venue.1: 麥高利小劇場，香港藝術中心
venue_en: McAulay Studio, The Hong Kong Arts Centre

舞蹈類別: 拉丁舞, 芭蕾舞, 中國舞, 現代舞, 費明高
Category: Latin Dance, Flamenco Dance, Ballet, Chinese, Modern
節目簡介: 「快樂學跳舞」是妙思舞動教育計劃的主題。舞台上的表演技巧有很多人談論，相對地，舞台表演的美，由多種元素給合的美就被忽略。繼首三天為黎明海博士、蘇明村博士、黃麗晶女士、陳素媚女士的學生在香港教育學院會堂上演《雲流．點轉》，並舉行示範演出和主題工作坊，就繪畫、鋼琴及手鈴音樂、錄象等創作媒體，提升大專學生對現代舞蹈的聯想能力，來一次綜合藝術的學習體驗。尾場為小學設計，備有工作紙，安排同學台上參與，發掘學生對舞蹈、音樂、視藝、文字的表達才華。計劃為未來藝術課程引導多元的發展方向，加強學校與藝術家的溝通，視舞台為想像力的綜合藝術表現空間。
About the Programme: Muse Motion plans “Rhapsody in Dance Education” with a keen eye on arts education, especially for performing arts aesthetics.  Designed with demonstration and thematic workshops, “Rhapsody in Dance” took place in The Hong Kong Institute of Education during the Integrative Arts Week.  Students with major in visual arts and music experienced surprises at the performance of “Rhapsody in Dance”, the result would enrich knowledge of integrative arts aesthetics, including dance movement, music, visual arts and contextual concepts for potential arts teachers.  The last day of event was open for primary school students with provided worksheets.  The project was supported by Dr.Lai Ming Hoi, Dr. So Ming Chuen, Ms Wong Lai Ching, and Ms Chan So Mei.
Venue: Auditorium, The Hong Kong Institute of Education
venue_en: Auditorium, The Hong Kong Institute of Education

節目名稱: 「四圍跳」系列－ 環境舞蹈 《竹林舞士》
Programme Name: Dancing “In” Dancing “Out” – Dance in the Bamboo Garden
節目簡介: 《竹林舞士》是「多空間」特別為元朗劇院及其竹林景觀度身編排的環境舞蹈，根據環境特色、現場反應，以至觀眾情緒，幻化入舞，引領肢體律動的形態，帶觀眾感受肢體、音效、影像投射與景觀水乳交融的立體經歷。過程中，觀眾由專人帶領分批於元朗劇院不同場景觀賞演出，角度轉變，移步換景，全憑觀衆主宰！
About the Programme: The Dancing All Around series is one of Y-Space’s programmes coming out of the Yuen Long Theatre Venue Partnership Scheme. The audience at this site-specific work was divided into groups, each led through different viewing areas, changing their perspectives of the performance in the bamboo garden. The dancing interacted with music, projections, sites, and live reactions, becoming a multi-faceted performance that offered unique experiences for audience members.
地點: 元朗劇院及竹林景觀區
Venue: Yuen Long Theatre and Bamboo Garden
子分類_ArtGenre SubCategory: 現代舞／當代舞、環境舞蹈
venue_en: Yuen Long Theatre and Bamboo Courtyard

節目名稱: 2009年《來‧舞吧！》北京舞蹈學院-中國舞等級考試課程結業演出
Programme Name: (1) 2009《Come on》Beijing Dance Academy Chinese Dance Graded Examination course graduation Performance
節目簡介: 《來‧舞吧！》結業演出，學員透過（北京舞蹈學院中國舞等級考試課程）的正規而嚴謹的訓練，使學員對中國舞蹈藝術有更深刻的認識，除了接受有系統的訓練課程外，更讓學員有機會參與舞台演出，提升學員的表演能力、發掘潛能及増強自信心。
About the Programme: 《Come on》the graduation show of our Beijing Dance Academy Chinese Dance Graded Examination course, deepens the students\' understanding of Chinese dance art after they have attended a formal and vigorous training programme. Apart from systemic training, the live performance experience will enhance their expression through dance, unravel their potentials, and strengthen their self-confidence.
Venue: Tsuen Mun Town Hall Auditorium
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈團-外展及教育部
Presenter: Hong Kong Dance Company-Outreach & Education Department
製作/演出單位: 香港舞蹈團-外展及教育部
Production / Performing Unit: Hong Kong Dance Company-Outreach & Education Department
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium

節目名稱: 2010年《童心飛揚》北京舞蹈學院-中國舞等級考試課程結業演出
Programme Name: (2) 2010《Curtains up》Beijing Dance Academy Chinese Dance Graded Examination course graduation Performance
節目簡介: 《童心飛揚》是學員每年一度之結業演出，學員透過每年的專業學習的正規而嚴緊的訓練，排演不同劇目的節目，讓學員參與舞台演出。
About the Programme: 《Curtains up》was one of our annual graduation shows. After a professional and formal dance course, our students will have a chance to rehearse different titles and perform on stage every year.
Venue: Tsuen Mun Town Hall Auditorium
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈團-外展及教育部
Presenter: Hong Kong Dance Company-Outreach & Education Department
製作/演出單位: 香港舞蹈團-外展及教育部
Production / Performing Unit: Hong Kong Dance Company-Outreach & Education Department
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium

節目簡介: 精選香港舞蹈團2009年兩齣大型舞蹈詩的片段，以新編的舞蹈，追尋中華文化之神韻和意蘊真美。《梁祝》選自舞蹈詩《天上．人間》，舞蹈以中國民間故事《梁祝》為藍本，重現梁山伯與祝英台的經典愛情故事。舞蹈既表現了山伯和英台於學堂相遇相知至相戀的溫馨，也有對社會的控訴和戀人殉愛的感人場景。配合耳熟能詳的梁祝小提琴協奏曲，為觀眾帶來視聽享受。《印象．嶺南》為充滿南粵風情之舞蹈詩，將舞蹈團多年考究的南粵舞蹈經典創作昇華薈萃，與新編的舞蹈貫穿融滙、互相輝映。
About the Programme: The performance includes excerpts of two dance poems produced by HKDC in 2009. The essence of Oriental culture is revealed by the newly choreographed Chinese dances. Butterfly Lovers is the main theme of the dance poem Everlasting Love. It portrays the classic love story of classmates. Lingnan Impressions presents characteristic features of South Guangdong culture. Together with classics of Southern Guangdong dance culture explored by the Company for years, and new choreographic works, the ethnic atmosphere of Guangdong is vividly captured.
Venue: Tsuen Mun Town Hall Auditorium
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium

節目簡介: 香港舞蹈團邀請來自番禺、澳門、青島的兒童舞蹈精英與本地舞蹈新秀同台演出，綻放童真姿彩。參與團體包括香港舞蹈團兒童團及少年團、廣州市番禺區星海青少年宮、澳門演藝學院、澳門蔚青舞蹈團及青島電視台小白帆少年藝術團。精彩節目超過20個，以中國舞、芭蕾舞、民族舞、現代舞等不同風格的舞蹈，透過春、夏、秋、冬四個不同的場景，引領觀眾進入進入多彩多姿的童話樂園。節目也加插了第五屆「小荷風采」全國少兒舞蹈大賽的得奬作品展演。
About the Programme: Young dancers from Guangzhou, Macau and Qingdao join forces with the Hong Kong Dance Company (HKDC) Children’s and Youth Troupes to perform on stage to create a joyful and energetic children dance show. Participating groups include young members of the HKDC Children’s Troupe and Youth Troupe, Guangzhou Panyu Children’s Palace, Macao Conservatory, Macau Regina Dance Group and Qingdao Xiaobaifan Children’s Art Group. These children together have formed a cast of about 200 to bring to the audience an unforgettable performance! More than 20 works of Chinese dance, ballet, folk dance and modern dance are showcased, including award-winning dance pieces of the Beijing Fifth Little Lotus National Dance Competition.
Venue: Tsuen Mun Town Hall Auditorium
子分類_ArtGenre SubCategory: 中國舞、芭蕾舞、現代舞／當代舞
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium

節目簡介: 150多位參與本團外展及教育部舉辦的「北京舞蹈學院中國舞等級考試課程」的學員經過一年的訓練，曾於考場展現專業水平。於結業演出中，他們衝出考場踏上舞台，化身成山地娃娃，或苗族、彝族、蒙古、西藏、新疆等民族姑娘，披戴彩妝華衣，手執銀鈴、葵扇、八角巾等道具，熱鬧歡快地展演課程精華及民族姿彩。
About the Programme: About 150 graduates, aged from 5 to 18, from the ‘Beijing Dance Academy Chinese Dance Graded Examination’ training course organized by the Outreach and Education Department of the Hong Kong Dance Company, show their talents on stage. They demonstrate course curriculum and perform Chinese ethnic dances such as Miao, Yi, Mongolian and Xinjiang dances.
Venue: Tsuen Mun Town Hall Auditorium
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium

節目簡介: 節目以生動的講解引領觀眾認識舞蹈、探討何謂舞劇及舞蹈詩，以及不同舞種的特色等。演出包括基本功示範、民族舞展現及舞劇選段演出，觀眾更可親身上台學習運用舞蹈道具，在遊戲中參與舞蹈活動，加深他們對舞蹈藝術的認識及欣賞能力。
About the Programme: The educational dance demonstration is suitable for students and everyone interested in dance art. Dance techniques and the characteristics of various types of dance are introduced. Basic Chinese Dance techniques, Chinese ethnic dance and excerpts from dance dramas are performed. Participants can learn to use dance props such as long sleeves, swords or drums in the interactive sections.
Venue: Tsuen Wan Town Hall Auditorium
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium

節目名稱: 《穿越舞台 – 中國舞蹈探源及賞析》展覽及演出
Programme Name: Across the stage – Exploring and Appreciating Chinese Dance Exhibition and Performance
節目簡介: 節目專為對舞蹈有興趣的人士而設的舞蹈賞析之旅，結合展覽導賞、舞蹈賞析及舞台演出，讓觀眾全面認識香港舞蹈團並為大家呈現中國的舞蹈藝術。展覽將展出香港舞蹈團多個大型舞台演出服裝、道具及佈景，觀眾更可欣賞到舞蹈團的創作及舞劇選段包括：<織女鄉情> (舞劇《木蘭》選段)、<刀光亮劍> (舞劇《雪山飛狐》選段)、獨舞《菊花台》及朝鮮民族鼓舞等。觀眾更有機會試穿舞蹈詩《清明上河圖》中極具特色的「寸子鞋」，一嘗穿著無踭鞋起舞的感覺。
About the Programme: The programme includes exhibition, dance appreciation and performances, which are specially designed for dance lovers. Stage costumes, props and sets are exhibited. Chinese dance techniques and selected excerpts from the Company’s productions are performed: Dream of Hometown (from Mulan), The Shining Swords (from Snow Fox), a solo dance Juhuatai and Korean drum dance. Participants can try wearing the unique designed ‘petit shoes’ (from the dance poem Qingming Riverside) which made without heel.
Venue: Tsuen Wan Town Hall Exhibition Gallery
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Exhibition Gallery

節目名稱: 《淺灣．流水．舞荃說》舞蹈推廣計劃
Programme Name: Precious Moments in Tsuen Wan – Environmental Dance Project
節目簡介: 荃灣古名「淺灣」，因海灣水淺而得名。早年為客家人聚居，為抵禦盜匪而建圍村。位於荃灣的三棟屋為本港歷史最悠久的圍村之一，1786年由陳氏家族興建。三棟屋於1981年列為法定古蹟，並修建為博物館。香港舞蹈團於三棟屋博物館舞動，將昔日荃灣客家人生活風貌活現，訴說荃灣今昔點滴。活動包括學校舞蹈工作坊、社區民族舞工作坊、相片展覽、攝影比賽、環境舞蹈、博物館導賞及舞劇演出。
About the Programme: Tsuen Wan was named ‘Tsin Wan’ in the past due to its shallow bay. The walled village, Sam Tung Uk was built by the Chan Clan of Hakka in 1786. It was declared a monument in 1981 and was later converted into a museum. Performers from HKDC dance around corners of the village museum, reliving the good old days of Tsuen Wan. Programmes include school dance workshops, community folk dance workshop, photography exhibition, photography competition, environmental dance, museum guided tour and dance drama performance.
Venue: Sam Tung Uk Museum
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈團及荃灣區議會
Presenter: Hong Kong Dance Company and Tsuen Wan District Office
venue_en: Sam Tung Uk Museum

舞蹈類別: 民族舞,中國舞,現代舞,爵士舞/街舞
節目簡介: 香港舞蹈團一班年輕活潑的舞者，從排練室跳出戶外廣場！從古典到當代、東方到西方，無論是中國舞、芭蕾舞、現代舞、爵士舞、街頭舞……多元繽紛，盡顯青春！節目由舞蹈員自主編排及演出，更是舞蹈的公開平台，歡迎學校或社區舞蹈團體參與演出，一同起舞！
About the Programme: A group of young dancers from HKDC spread joy of dance to Tsuen Wan Town Hall Plaza. They give audience refresh ideas about dance by performing a great variety of dances: Chinese, Ballet, Modern, Jazz, Street dances……The programmes are organized and performed by themselves. Dance Fun Day is also an open dance platform, schools or community dance groups are welcomed to join the performances.
Venue: Tsuen Wan Town Hall Plaza
子分類_ArtGenre SubCategory: 中國舞、現代舞／當代舞、爵士舞、街舞
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Plaza

節目簡介: “單情路 One-Way To Love”是一齣以一半舞蹈一半喜劇的演出, 作品講及兩位活於真實與虛幻之間的好朋友，一位以文字描繪動作、一位以肢體演釋對白。大量的粗口配以浪漫、溫柔的舞蹈, 搞笑得來有點感動、詼諧得來有點傷感的浪漫。
地點: 香港藝術中心麥高利小劇場
Venue: Hong Kong Arts Centre McAulay Studio
venue.1: 香港藝術中心麥高利小劇場
venue_en: Hong Kong Arts Centre, McAulay Studio

節目簡介: 被譽為「香港最具實力的編舞家」的黎海寧參以香港文化中心露天廣場為舞台，維港對岸作流動佈景，精心挑選多齣匠心獨運的代表作選段，與觀眾歡渡舞團三十周年。
About the Programme: CCDC presented an outdoor dance gala at Hong Kong Cultural Centre Piazza, showcasing excerpts of the most memorable works of Helen Lai who acclaimed as Hong Kong’s most prominent choreographer, which have set the standard of modern dance in Hong Kong to celebrate the 30th Anniversary of the Company.
地點: 香港文化中心露天廣場（映月樓對開）
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Piazza(Area C)
venue.1: 香港文化中心露天廣場（映月樓對開）
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Piazza

節目簡介: 兩位新浪編舞舞者黃狄文及龐智筠為舞團三十周年而編創的兩齣短篇作品，分別為《下一秒》及《案發現場》。此節目於2009年獲《南華早報》評為「全年最佳舞蹈」。
About the Programme: What’s Next? Crime Scene!, a double bill by CCDC’s talented New Wave dancers / choreographers Dominic Wong and Noel Pong, which was exhilarating celebration programme of the Company’s 30th Anniversary. This production was selected by South China Morning Post as one of the “Best Dances” in 2009.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Studio Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目名稱: 南韓釜山國際舞蹈節——《365種係定唔係東方主義》選段
Programme Name: Excerpts of 365 Ways of Doing and Undoing Orientalism in Busan  International Dance Festival, South Korea
節目簡介: 由中國現代舞先鋒曹誠淵夥拍「跨世紀之星」邢亮及桑吉加編創的《365種係定唔係東方主義》，玩盡西方人眼中「東方主義」的陳腔濫調，由古典芭蕾舞、中國民間舞至戲曲身韻，展示對「東方主義」的質疑與反思。《365》自2002年於香港首演後大受歡迎，曾獲邀於澳洲布里斯本、美國侯斯頓、洛杉磯及紐約等地演出，大獲好評，為城市當代舞蹈團的經典舞碼之一。是次獲「南韓釜山國際舞蹈節」邀請，於釜山Haeundae海灘上演這現代經典。
About the Programme: 365 Ways of Doing and Undoing Orientalism is a trademark production of CCDC choreographed by celebrated choreographer Willy Tsao and modern dance stars Xing Liang and Sang Jijia. As a highly popular repertoire, it has been widely toured to different places, including Brisbane, Houston, Los Angeles and New York since its premiere in 2002. Through an exotic display of “oriental” elements from Peking Opera to the representation of Zen, 365 casts doubts on the West’s fascination with the Orient. This signature repertoire of CCDC was invited to perform at the Busan International Dance Festival, South Korea.
Venue: Haeundae Beach, Busan, South Korea
Presenter: Busan International Dance Festival, South Korea
venue_en: Haeundae Beach, Busan, South Korea

節目簡介: 編舞家黎海寧作品《舞！舞？舞……》。名字以「舞」為基本，並用上三個不同的標點符號，引起對舞蹈的本質及意義的反思。此外，作品亦力邀曾經歷舞者生涯的「舞人」設計團隊及演出嘉賓粉墨登場，包括擔任舞台及服裝設計的鬼才編舞伍宇烈、曾是CCDC舞者的燈光設計吳文安及闊別多年的舞壇怪傑彭錦耀。
About the Programme: Very Dance! choreographed by Helen Lai, brought together a designer team comprised of ex-dancers and special guests, including Yuri Ng as Set and Costume Designer, Goh Boon Ann as Lighting Designer, as well as Sunny Pang, one of the first generation of modern dance choreographers in Hong Kong.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Studio Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目名稱: 第六屆廣東現代舞周——《案發現場》
Programme Name: Crime Scene! in The 6th Guangdong Modern Dance Festival
節目簡介: 城市當代舞蹈團(CCDC)主辦中國最具規模的現代舞盛事——第六屆廣東現代舞周，重點呈獻多個CCDC編舞及本地獨立編舞家的高質素作品及精選舞蹈錄像，充分向國內及世界展示香港現代舞的發展，並促進兩地藝術家之間的對話與合作。第六屆廣東現代舞周節目《香港自由行》呈獻當代香港三位最具人氣年青編舞家王榮祿、楊春江及龐智筠的最新創作。《案發現場》是由CCDC舞者龐智筠編舞剛於2004月在香港上演
Venue: Guangzhou Drama Group No.13 Theatre
主辦單位: 城市當代舞蹈團、廣東星海演藝集團
Presenter: City Contemporary Dance Company and Guangdong Xinghai Performing Group
venue_en: Guangzhou Drama Group No.13 Theatre

節目名稱: 第六屆廣東現代舞周——《四季‧三維》
Programme Name: 4S‧3D in The 6th Guangdong Modern Dance Festival
節目簡介: 《四季‧三維》由CCDC舞者黃狄文所編的《忽然四季》及駐團藝術家邢亮編的《沒有主義》﹙選段﹚組成並於廣州黃花崗劇院上演，是第六屆廣東現代舞周「專業觀摩演出」節目之一。
About the Programme: 4S‧3D is composed of Xtremely Four Seasons choreographed by new wave choreographer Dominic Wong and Point and Line to Plane, excerpt of Out of The Box,by CCDC Resident Artist Xing Liang, which was performed at Guangzhou Huanghuagang Theatre .
Venue: Guangzhou Huanghuagang Theatre
主辦單位: 城市當代舞蹈團、廣東星海演藝集團
Presenter: City Contemporary Dance Company and Guangdong Xinghai Performing Group
venue_en: Guangzhou Huanghuagang Theatre

節目簡介: 城市當代舞蹈團邀得前舞團舞者桑吉加為舞團全新創作《那一年‧這一天》，此作品是桑氏從德國威廉‧科西舞團學成歸來後在香港上演的首個作品，他以世界尖端的舞蹈語彙，與觀眾一起尋找被時間摧毀的記憶。本節目勇奪「香港舞蹈年獎2010」製作與編舞兩項大獎。
About the Programme: City Contemporary Dance Company presented the world premiere of As If To Nothing, choreographed by former CCDC Dancer Sang Jijia. This was the first full-length work of Sang in Hong Kong after his return from the apprenticeship with William Forsythe at Forsythe Company in Germany. This exquisite production has received the awards for Outstanding Dance Production and for Outstanding Achievement in Choreography from the Hong Kong Dance Awards 2010 .
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 香港編舞界的王者曹誠淵，首次夥拍本地兩代最具才華的編舞黎海寧、邢亮聯同黃狄文、龐智筠、黎德威、楊怡孜、羅凡五位CCDC新浪編舞，攜手將中國古代經典《易經》、《黃帝內經》的及《道德經》中的概念重新解構，整合成為舞劇《非常道》。
About the Programme: Dao‧Extraordinaire choreographed by Artistic Director Willy Tsao and the two most sought-after dance-makers in town, Helen Lai and Xing Liang, together with five new wave choreographers from CCDC. Loosely adapted from the Chinese creation myth and the concept of Dao, Dao‧Extraordinaire is an imaginary tour of Chinese wisdom that explores the tripartite theme of Heaven, Earth and Mankind.
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium
藝術總監: 曹誠淵、黎海寧、邢亮、黃狄文、龐智筠、黎德威、楊怡孜、羅凡
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目名稱: 香港‧北京舞蹈平台2010——《那一年‧這一天》
Programme Name: As If To Nothing in “Hong Kong‧Beijing Dance Platform 2010”
節目簡介: 《香港‧北京舞蹈平台2010》是香港城市當代舞蹈團 “中國舞蹈發展計劃”中的一項重要內容，旨在為京、港兩地現代舞的演出創造更多的機會。《那一年‧這一天》是藏族舞蹈家桑吉加專為香港城市當代舞蹈團建團三十周年而創作的作品，這也是他闊別香港城市當代舞蹈團七年、從德國威廉‧科西舞團學成歸來後為該團創作的首部舞作。
About the Programme: The “Hong Kong‧Beijing Dance Platform” is part of CCDC’s commitment to support, nurture and develop modern dance in China, which aim to strengthen exchanges between Hong Kong and Mainland Chinese dance artists. As If To Nothing, choreographed by Sang Jijia, a former CCDC dancer.  This work was created in honour of CCDC’s 30th anniversary, and is the first full-length work he has choreographed for CCDC since his return from the apprenticeship with William Forsythe at Forsythe Company in Germany.
Venue: People\'s Liberation of Army Theater, Beijing
venue_en: People\'s Liberation of Army Theater, Beijing

節目簡介: 駐團編舞黎海寧以世上迄今唯一的女性文字「女書」為切入點，並以香港女作家的小說為靈感，用舞蹈書寫古今女性的情感，是黎氏繼《女體之感動》及《女人心事》後探討女性題材的「女性三部曲」壓卷之作，《女書》更憑著黎海寧出色的編舞及舞者楊怡孜的奪目演出奪得兩項「香港舞蹈年獎2008」。
About the Programme: Inspired by the alluringly embroidered nüshu missives, as well as the shimmering prose of two contemporary Hong Kong females writers, Xi Xi and Wong Bik-wan, Resident Choreographer Helen Lai told HerStory through the perceptive artistry of CCDC dancers. HerStory has swept two Hong Kong Dance Awards in 2008 and is proved to be Lai’s magnum opus on the subject of women.
Venue: Multi-functional Theatre, National Centre for Performing Arts, Beijing
Presenter: Multi-functional Theatre, National Centre for Performing Arts, Beijing
venue_en: Multi-functional Theatre, National Centre for Performing Arts, Beijing

節目簡介: 由黃狄文及龐智筠編舞的兩個全新作品《未團圓‧大結局》，分別以《崩城故事》及《童話故事未團圓結局》炮製羅密歐與茱麗葉式悲情故事和愛麗斯式變調童話。
About the Programme: Happily N’ever After, a double bill by CCDC’s talented New Wave dancers / choreographers Dominic Wong and Noel Pong. Punk Side Story is a retelling of musical West Side Story, while Fairy Tales – To Be Continued melds the stories of several classic children’s stories.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Studio Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目名稱: 第三屆北京現代舞展演周——《舞!舞？舞……》
Programme Name: Very Dance! in The 3rd Annual Beijing Modern Dance Festival
節目簡介: 著名香港編舞黎海寧之作品《舞！舞？舞……》以舞者的身體訴說他們自己的故事，舞作由一眾前舞者擔任設計師，及來自五湖四海的CCDC舞者粉墨登場。獲邀於北京國家大劇院演出。
About the Programme: Bringing together CCDC dancers and a designer team comprised of ex-dancers, Very Dance! reveals the laughter & tears of dancers behind the scenes with an exquisite blend of energy and emotion, both physically and verbally.
地點: 北京國家大劇院小劇場
Venue: Multi-functional Theatre, National Centre for Performing Arts, Beijing
主辦單位: 北京雷動天下現代舞團
venue.1: 北京國家大劇院小劇場
venue_en: Multi-functional Theatre, National Centre for Performing Arts, Beijing

Programme Name: Tales of Two Cities - Hong Kong‧Shanghai‧Eileen Chang
節目簡介: 由城市當代舞蹈團駐團編舞黎海寧創作的《雙城記—香港‧上海‧張愛玲》，以張愛玲的傳奇一生及其作品為題的舞蹈劇場作品，首演於香港葵青劇院，其後應香港特區政府邀請赴上海巡演，成為香港特區參與上海世博會重點節目之一。
About the Programme: Rediscovering Eileen Chang and her tales of love and longing, Tales of Two Cities - Hong Kong‧Shanghai‧Eileen Chang, a dance theatre by CCDC resident choreographer Helen Lai
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 由舞團藝術總監曹誠淵帶領兩位香港得獎新銳編舞家楊春江和王榮祿合編的環境舞蹈《衣食住行》，以圍繞都市人生活不可或缺的四大元素為題材，並獲香港特區政府邀請於2010年上海世博會期間在上海大上海時代廣場及南京東路353廣場上演兩天共四場演出。讓滬上市民和世博旅客近距離接觸多元的香港文化，讓舞蹈走出殿堂、走進尋常百姓生活。
About the Programme: A site-specific dance gala DELT performed in two centrally located Shanghai shopping malls during EXPO 2010 Shanghai, choreographed by Founder and Artistic Director Willy Tsao, together with two young award-winning choreographers Daniel Yeung and Ong Yong-lock. “DELT” -- the acronym for “Dress, Eat, Live, Travel”, which is a Chinese phrase for describing “the four essential elements in everyday life”.
地點: 大上海時代廣場 / 南京東路353廣場
Venue: Shanghai Times Square / PLAZA 353
venue.1: 大上海時代廣場 / 南京東路353廣場
venue_en: Shanghai Times Square / PLAZA 353

節目名稱: 香港特區參與上海世博會重點節目-《雙城記─香港‧上海‧張愛玲》
Programme Name: Hong Kong SAR Cultural Programmes for Expo 2010 Shanghai -Tales of Two Cities - Hong Kong‧Shanghai‧Eileen Chang
節目簡介: 由城市當代舞蹈團駐團編舞黎海寧創作，以張愛玲的傳奇一生及其作品為題的舞蹈劇場作品《雙城記—香港‧上海‧張愛玲》應香港特區政府邀請赴上海巡演，成為香港特區參與上海世博會重點節目之一。
About the Programme: Inviting by the Government of HKSAR, CCDC resident choreographer Helen Lai created a dance theatre Tales of Two Cities – Hong Kong‧Shanghai‧Eileen Chang, rediscovers the legend of Eileen Chang and her tales of love and longing.
Venue: Shanghai Grand Theatre Drama Theatre
venue_en: Shanghai Grand Theatre Drama Theatre

節目名稱: 第七屆廣東現代舞周——《那一年‧這一天》
Programme Name: As If To Nothing in The 7th Guangdong Modern Dance Festival
節目簡介: 《那一年‧這一天》為第七屆廣東現代舞周開幕演出。由藏族舞蹈家桑吉加專為香港城市當代舞蹈團建團三十周年而創作的作品，這也是他闊別香港城市當代舞蹈團七年、從德國威廉‧科西舞團學成歸來後為該團創作的首部舞作。
About the Programme: As If To Nothing as an opening performance in The 7th Guangdong Modern Dance Festival choreographed by Sang Jijia, a former CCDC dancer.  This is the first full-length work he has choreographed for CCDC since his return from the apprenticeship with William Forsythe at Forsythe Company in Germany.
Venue: Guangzhou Opera House
主辦單位: 城市當代舞蹈團、廣東星海演藝集團
Presenter: City Contemporary Dance Company and Guangdong Xinghai Performing Group
venue_en: Guangzhou Opera House

節目名稱: 第七屆廣東現代舞周——《娘子軍》
Programme Name: Detachment of Women in The 7th Guangdong Modern Dance Festival
節目簡介: 《娘子軍》取自城市當代舞蹈團1997年在香港首演的史詩式現代舞劇《三千寵愛》(Sexing Three Millennia) ，選段中CCDC舞者以中國經典樣板戲《紅色娘子軍》扮相，層出不窮舞蹈語匯、精心布局的畫面與舞者的靈巧肢體，好評如潮而收入為CCDC的經典舞作，並多次獲邀於海外重演，成為舞團最受歡迎節目之一。
About the Programme: Detachment of Women, excerpt from Sexing Three Millennia choreographed by Willy Tsao and performed by CCDC dancer Luo Fan.
Venue: Xinghai Concert Hall
主辦單位: 城市當代舞蹈團、廣東星海演藝集團
Presenter: City Contemporary Dance Company and Guangdong Xinghai Performing Group
venue_en: Xinghai Concert Hall

節目簡介: 對唐滌生經典粵劇情有獨鍾的CCDC客席編舞梅卓燕根據粵劇經典《紫釵記》發展而成的全新長篇舞劇《紫‧釵‧緣》。編舞重新解構《紫釵記》中李益與霍小玉的「三生情緣」，以豐富的舞台意像栽出自古到今既微妙、神秘又美麗的偶遇、直覺與等待，以舞蹈編寫出緣份中的愛恨糾纏。
About the Programme: CCDC guest choreographer Mui Cheuk-yin deconstructs legendary librettist Tong Tik-sang’s Cantonese opera classic The Purple Hairpin, creating a modern lover’s discourse exploring the themes of premonition, intuition, and fate.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Studio Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 駐團藝術家邢亮憑著他對舞蹈的慧根及二十七年的舞蹈修為，不斷對舞蹈的本質進行探索，創作作品《六度》。讓觀眾進入無色無相的空間， 達至無我無涯之境界。
About the Programme: Riding on his 27 years of cultivation in dance and movements, CCDC Resident Artist Xing Liang — one of the most gifted dancer-choreographers in China — creates Six Degrees.
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目名稱: 第二屆全港運動會 -開幕典禮
Programme Name: The Opening Ceremony of the 2nd Hong Kong Games
節目簡介: 開幕典禮中為「東亞運鼓舞」的表演活動。舞蹈包含東亞運動會的元素，透過大型舞蹈及鼓樂表演突顯香港2009東亞運動會參賽國家或地區的文化特色及舉辦的23個體育項目。
About the Programme: East Asian Games (EAG) elements will be incorporated in the grand dance and drum performances during which the cultural characteristics of the nine EAG participating countries / regions and the 23 sports of the EAG are highlighted.
Venue: Tseung Kwan O Sports Ground
venue_en: Tseung Kwan O Sports Ground

節目簡介: 由香港和廣州的藝術家聯合創作的大型舞蹈詩，演譯香港百年嶺南文化、由漁村至21世紀的劃時代片段。融合了音樂、民族、美術、書法等歷史因素和文化背景，透視了嶺南文化扎根香港至中西文化糅合的文化延續，感受和追憶歲月中的文化印記。
About the Programme: A large scale dance poem was jointly produced by the artists of Hong Kong and Guangzhou.  It was one of the cultural exchange programmes of the Pearl River Delta interpreted the Lingnan culture in this hundred years in Hong Kong from village to a 21st century landmark pieces.  The combination of music, folklore, art and calligraphy together with the historical factors and cultural background will be shown the continuity from Lingnan culture taking root in Hong Kong to Chinese and West blending.  The audience will feel and recall the cultural marks over the years.
Venue: Auditorium,  Sha Tin Town Hall
Presenter: Hong Kong Dance Federation Ltd.Hong Kong Dance Federation Ltd.
venue_en: Auditorium,  Sha Tin Town Hall

節目名稱: 香港2009東亞運動會開幕典禮
Programme Name: Opening Ceremony of HK 2009 East Asia Games
節目簡介: 100名舞蹈員穿著參加東亞運動會的5個國家、9個地區的服裝在開幕式的表演船上演出各國民族舞蹈，由香港電視廣播有限公司TVB即場轉播。
About the Programme: One Hundred Dancers performed the National Dances on the Floating performing platform at the 2009 East Asia Games Opening Ceremony.
地點: 香港文化中心 維多利亞港水上舞台
Venue: HK Cultural Centre ,Victoria Harbour Floating Performing Platform
製作/演出單位: 香港電視廣播有限公司
venue.1: 香港文化中心 維多利亞港水上舞台
venue_en: HK Cultural Centre ,Victoria Harbour Floating Performing Platform

節目簡介: 4日3夜的宿營為香港舞蹈愛好者提供一個高質素的學習和交流機會。來自“捷克”、“澳洲”和“香港”的舞蹈家攜手主持多個類別的《舞蹈課程/工作坊》、《舞蹈交流晚會》、《專題講座》、《表演及比賽》、《結業成效展示》等項目，內容充實豐富。營友與外國及本港的舞蹈家近距離互動學習，並與外地專程來港的營友交流，讓本港學校學生、舞蹈愛好者通過參與舞蹈營的經驗，認識不同地域的舞蹈文化，並將學習成效帶回學校與同學分享。
About the Programme: In this 4 days and 3 nights Camp, provided a golden opportunity for Hong Kong dance lovers to learn and share their experience together with overseas participants. Experienced Hong Kong and overseas Professional Artists from Czech Republic and Australia were invited to host a range of dance workshop, symposium and achievement appreciation.   Through a range of interactive dance activities, it aims to enrich the participants dance journey!
Venue: Youth Square
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈總會及民政事務總署-青少年暑期活動委員會
Presenter: Hong Kong Dance Federation Ltd. & HAD-Summer Youth Programme Committee
venue_en: Youth Square

Programme Name: Tsuen Wan Arts Festival – Hong Kong、Hong Kong
節目簡介: 應邀演出每兩年一次的荃灣藝術節，以多元的舞蹈種類，演譯多個類別的中型作品，為創作者提供另一個發揮的空間。
About the Programme: 8 medium size dances in various dance forms were performed in this programme at the Tsuen Wan Arts Festival 2010.
Venue: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium
主辦單位: 荃灣藝術節統籌委員會,  仁濟醫院, 荃灣民政事務處
Presenter: Tsuen Wan Arts Festival Coordinate Committee, Yan Chai Hospital & Tsuen Wan District Office

節目名稱: 荃灣區全民運動日舞蹈活動
Programme Name: ‘Dance for All’ at the “Sport For All Day”(Tsuen Wan District)
節目簡介: 響應國家「全民健身日」及進一步推廣普及體育，康樂及文化事務署(荃灣區)假荃灣楊屋道體育館舉行「全民運動日」。包括舞蹈演出和同樂，為市民帶來一個健康、有趣的活動。
About the Programme: To support the “National Fitness Day” and to promote Sport for All in the community, a Dance for All Fun Day programme had been held at Tsuen Wan District.
Venue: Yeung Uk Road Sports Centre
venue_en: Yeung Uk Road Sports Centre

節目名稱: 香港舞蹈節2010  –紫荊盃舞蹈大賽優勝者演出暨頒獎禮2010
Programme Name: Hong Kong Dance Festival 2010 -  Bauhinia Cup Dance Championships 2010 Winners’ Performance & Award Ceremony Program
節目簡介: 《紫荊盃舞蹈大賽》及《紫荊盃國際舞蹈邀請賽》獲獎節目交流演出及頒獎禮。 展示及推介香港與國際舞者的創新作品、交流及分享舞蹈創作經驗。面對現今時代，探討如何傳承創新、發揚民族傳統舞蹈文化，藉以増進國際舞者間的相互合作和交流。
About the Programme: To stage performances by winning groups while sharing and exchanging experience, this function helps to explore ways to innovate and empower dancers to perpetuate traditional dances, which leads to greater interaction and collaboration.
Venue: Auditorium, Sha Tin Town Hall
venue_en: Auditorium, Sha Tin Town Hall

節目簡介: 民政事務局與青年廣場主辦的藝坊Arts@Y2，提供免費表演予藝術節目交流的平台。共演出4 台不同舞種的節目。
Venue: Youth Square
venue_en: Youth Square

節目名稱: 《Bulu Bulu 救地球》創意芭蕾培訓計劃 結業演出
Programme Name: “Bulu Bulu Saves the World” Creative Ballet Animateur Scheme - Finale Performance
舞蹈類別: 多媒體舞蹈 (芭蕾舞為主)
節目簡介: 曾經建造方舟、拯救動物避開大洪水的挪亞，經過千萬年後，他的後人挪季竟然要重複祖先的拯救行動！地球氣溫上升令兩極冰塊幾乎完全溶掉，導致水位上升、陸地消失，故挪季建造了一艘名為「Bulu Bulu號」的飛船，把地球的動物帶離陸地。在「Bulu Bulu號」上，挪季一家知道他們已沒有能力改變地球的狀況，唯有嘗試利用當時的高科技，把「Bulu Bulu號」改裝成時光穿梭機，飛到現今的21世紀，呼籲「過去的」地球人不要再破壞地球。可是「過去的」小朋友並不察覺地球有何不妥，繼續做出各樣破壞環境的事情。於是，挪季帶同「過去的」小朋友一起乘坐「Bulu Bulu號」，回到地球還未被嚴重污染的時代。自此以後，小朋友們身體力行保護地球，眼前的「Bulu Bulu號」突然消失了，原來群策群力的環保工作漸見成效，改變了地球的未來，令挪季在未來不再需要建造「Bulu Bulu號」來拯救地球了。
About the Programme: Noah was a holy man who built a wooden ark and saved all the animals from the great flood. After tens of millions of years, his descendant, Noach, is to repeat the salvation once again! The rise in the Earth’s temperature has caused the polar ice caps to melt, which in turn causes the sea level to rise and the land to disappear gradually. In view of this situation, Noach builds an aircraft named “Bulu Bulu”, which successfully takes all the animals on the Earth to leave the land. When they are riding on “Bulu Bulu”, the family of Noach knows for sure they cannot change the conditions of the Earth. The only thing they can do is to make use of the prevailing advanced technology and turn “Bulu Bulu” into a time machine, which will bring them to the 21st century so that they can urge people “in the past” not to destroy the Earth any more. However, children “in the past” do not realize that the Earth is very sick and continue to destroy the environment. So Noach takes the children “in the past” to ride on “Bulu Bulu” and get back to the days when the Earth is not seriously polluted. Since then, these children do whatever they can to protect the Earth, and suddenly “Bulu Bulu” vanishes before their eyes! It is because their combined efforts in environmental protection have finally paid off and successfully changed the future of the Earth, therefore Noach needs not build a “Bulu Bulu” to save the Earth anymore.
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
主辦單位: 康樂及文化事務署 及 香港芭蕾舞團
Presenter: The Leisure and Cultural Services Department & The Hong Kong Ballet Limited
製作/演出單位: 香港芭蕾舞團教育及外展部
Production / Performing Unit: The Education and Outreach Department of The Hong Kong Ballet Limited
venue_en: Grand Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目名稱: 學校藝術培訓計劃2008/09《舞裝小飛俠》創意芭蕾培訓計劃 結業演出
Programme Name: School Arts Animateur Scheme 2008/09 “The Dance Journey of Peter Pan” Creative Ballet Animateur Scheme - Finale Performance
舞蹈類別: 多媒體舞蹈 (芭蕾舞為主)
節目簡介: 童話《小飛俠》的故事發生在二十世紀初。溫蒂、米高和約翰三姊弟在褓姆娜娜看護下，正準備睡覺。一名陌生男孩穿過敞開著的窗子，落在小孩子睡房的地板上，原來他就是小朋友心目中的英雄 — 小飛俠。小飛俠帶領著小孩一同飛往幻想國，遇到滑稽可愛的小仙子銀鈴兒、被遺棄的孩子、大壞蛋鐵的船長和他帶領著的海盜，驚險的旅程從此便開始了......
About the Programme: The story of "Peter Pan\" takes place at the beginning of the 20th Century. Under the watch of their nanny Nana, Wendy and her two brothers Michael and John are getting ready for bed. Suddenly, a stranger flies through an open window and lands on the bedroom floor - it\'s a boy called Peter Pan, a hero figure adored by children all over the world. Peter Pan takes Wendy and her brothers to Neverland. On the way, they meet the tiny fairy, Tinkerbell, Peter\'s gang of Lost Children, the villain Captain Hook and his pirates - and an adventous journey begins...
Venue: Auditorium, Tuen Mun Town Hall
主辦單位: 康樂及文化事務署 及 香港芭蕾舞團
Presenter: The Leisure and Cultural Services Department & The Hong Kong Ballet Limited
製作/演出單位: 香港芭蕾舞團教育及外展部

節目簡介: 香港舞蹈年獎是香港舞蹈界一年一度之盛事,旨在表揚過去一年中對香港舞蹈發展有傑出貢獻的人士及團體。 主辦機構香港舞蹈聯盟是一個非牟利註冊慈善團體，以推動和支援香港舞蹈於本地發展及面向世界為使命。
About the Programme: The Hong Kong Dance Awards is an annual event that recognizes significant contributions to Hong Kong dance for work accomplished during the previous year. Its presenter, the Hong Kong Dance Alliance, is a non-profit-making charitable institution with a mission to serve as a primary voice and support group for dance in Hong Kong.
Venue: Auditorium, Kwai Tsing Theatre
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 承接著2007-2008「編舞．新系列」的成果，香港舞蹈聯盟將在2009年推出「編舞新人王2009」—《舞道X傳人》，並獲得香港藝術發展局委約製作，和邀請了香港演藝學院作為合作伴。《舞道X傳人》的一個重點新概念是「合作」，透過藝術家或團體間的合力創作，達到創意相乘的效益。這個以打造本地新一代編舞家為目標的計劃，由著名編舞家楊春江擔任藝術總監，並邀得著名編舞家梅卓燕和伍宇烈作為顧問。他們在四月從公開招募所收集到的計劃書中，選出四個創作組合為九月的演出創作全新作品。 四個參與計劃的組合分別為： •羅思朗 X 羅健邦（作曲／現場演奏） •黃碧琪 X 黃宇恆（舞台視覺設計） •賈東霖 X 葉彩鳳 X 江景先（數碼互動影像） •標局 (李健偉X陳文進X黄振邦
About the Programme: After the success of Emerging Choreographers Series in 2007-2008, the Hong Kong Dance Alliance, commissioned by Hong Kong Arts Development Council and partnered with the Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts, presents Emerging Choreographers 2009 – Dance X Men. The project emphasizes collaboration, aiming to achieve an effect that multiplies creativity through successful choreographic collaborations. Established choreographer Daniel Yeung serves as the Artistic Director of the project. With an aim to cultivate a new generation of choreographers, Yeung, together with the project’s Mentors – established choreographers Mui Cheuk-yin and Yuri Ng – have selected 4 groups from the proposals received through an open call in this April to create new works for the performances in September. The four participating groups of the project are: •Sarah Lo Sze-long X Law Kin-pong (Sound/Live music) •Rebecca Wong X Albert Wong Yue-hang (Scenography) •Jia Donglin X Koala Yip X James Kong (Digital interactive projection) •Biuguk (Max Lee X Chris Chan X Bruce Wong)
Venue: Theatre, Sheung Wan Civic Centre
venue_en: Theatre, Sheung Wan Civic Centre

節目名稱: 《港菲民眾文化戲劇節》工作坊
Programme Name: Hong Kong - Pinoy Theater Festival Workshop
節目簡介: 《港菲民眾文化戲劇節》將讓居港菲律賓人和本地華人互動交流，透過遊戲及各種創意藝術活動互相了解，提倡平等、和諧及共融社會。此計劃提供一個平台讓大眾和少數族裔聆聽大家的聲音，讓整個社區可體現多元文化及增權。《港菲民眾文化戲劇節》前亦舉行了一連串的工作坊，讓參與者體驗到精彩的菲律賓民俗藝術訓練包括Pangalay 舞蹈工作坊、Poi火球舞工作坊及皮影戲工作坊
About the Programme: Filipino artist Marie Gold Villar is invited to stay in Hong Kong for one month, bringing Filipino Migrants and Local Chinese People together through Integrated Theatre Arts activities in the pursuit of a collective understanding, promoting equality and harmony between Filipinos, Hong Kongers and citizens of the world. There are three nine-hour workshops which will provide trainings of very exciting Filipino folk arts, integrating Hong Kong with world’s other folk arts and cultures.  The workshops include Pangalay workshop, Poi Dance workshop and Shadow Puppetry workshop.

Programme Name: Rhythm of the Mind and Body Performance
節目簡介: 《港孟民眾文化戲劇節》邀得孟加拉首屈一指的劇團「來自森林的人劇團」的Shamima Shawket女士作導師，她將分享多年來累積的豐富演出及導師經驗，與港人分享孟加拉傳統及現代的舞蹈、歌唱及劇場形式，並聯合本港少數族裔朋友透過互動工作坊交流，創作出另一共融劇場演出！
About the Programme: The Hong Kong-Bangla Theatre Festival has invited Ms Shamima Shawket, a prominent theatre artist from Bangladesh, who is a member of Aranyak Natyadal, one of the top theatre groups in Bangladesh founded in 1972, to organize the workshop of classic & contemporary Bangladesh dance, weaving with music, drama and costume-making.

節目名稱: 香港舞蹈節2010──國際舞蹈研討會舞蹈演出 《滙》
Programme Name: Dance Performance “Convergence” -- International Dance Symposium for Hong Kong Dance Festival 2010
節目簡介: 由香港舞蹈聯盟和香港演藝學院合辦,香港藝術發展局邀約,獲世界舞蹈聯盟亞太區支持的國際舞蹈研討會於2010年11月25至28日假香港演藝學院舉行。是次研討會的主題是「與當代舞蹈家對話 : 今日華人社會舞作」,希望藉是次研討會,引起世界對散居各地的華人舞蹈家，包括在中國內地、香港、澳門、台灣以至散居其他亞洲國家及歐美者、及其作品特色的關注。主辦及合辦單位希望透過這次會議, 引起各界對從事舞蹈編排、演出、教育及推廣等華人舞蹈工作者的注視，從而探討他們的創作意念、表達手法、風格及創作過程，以及所面對的挑戰、機遇及成就。舞蹈演出《滙》為研討會的內容之一， 由６個來自歐／美／亞洲的編舞，借舞台連繫匯聚，向觀眾展示百花爭靘的藝術探索，與觀眾一同尋找文化融合之美的驚喜。
About the Programme: Co-presented by Hong Kong Dance Alliance and Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts (HKAPA), commissioned by Hong Kong Arts Development Council (HKADC) and the support of World Dance Alliance, the International Dance Symposium is  held at HKAPA from 25 to 28 November, 2010.This year’s theme is Connecting Conversations: Choreography Now! in Chinese Communities, which aims to draw the world focus on Chinese artists working in the Mainland China, Hong Kong, Macau, and Taiwan, and in other Asian countries as well as artists of the Chinese diasporas working around the world.The Symposium aims to draw attention to the work of a wide range of choreographers and to examine their diverse dance ideas, expressions, styles, and working processes, as well as the challenges, and opportunities they face and the successes they have achieved. Performance “Convergence” is part of the Symposium which presents by six Choreographers from six cultures, spanning from Asia to US to Europe, Connect and Converge.
Venue: Drama Theatre, Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈聯盟及香港演藝學院
Presenter: Hong Kong Dance Alliance  and Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts
venue_en: Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts, Drama Theatre

節目簡介: Royce 和 Rose 在小鎮裡經營了一間很出名的餅店，由於他們非常勤力精心鑽研造飽餅，每天都吸引一大群村民，等候購買新鮮出爐的麵包及蛋糕。 今日亦都不例外，正當二人正密鑼緊鼓地準備他們精美蛋糕及餅乾之際，門外已經有一大批市民正在等候，他們分別有賣花的女孩，上班的白領一族，貴族婦人和孕婦光顧。當他們逐一離開時，所有蛋糕亦相繼地起舞，令全條小大街熱鬧起來。 由於口碑轟傳，越來越多村民慕名而來，連電台也邀請Royce和Rose 訪問，每日都有大批記者在門外守候。 Royce自覺越來越出名，他開始被名利充昏了，終日呆在家中看自己的報導，留下Rose在餅店裡獨撐大局，所造的麵包和蛋糕亦每況愈下，客人開始對二人失去信心了，甚至將蛋糕掟向Royce洩憤！Royce自覺傷心失望，並萌起自殺念頭，魔鬼更不斷向他游說，正當Royce想在天台跳下去之際會！Rose上前阻止，　但糾纏其間，卻令Rose失足跌下，重傷昏迷。 Royce傷心欲絕，天使向Royce提出方法：「只要用愛心及努力去製造你的美味蛋糕，一定會令Rose甦醒！」 於是Royce重拾信心，用盡心機去製造出愛心蛋糕給Rose吃，吃罷果然有奇蹟出現，Rose終於甦醒過來！他連同四周的蝴蝶，鳥兒，店舖內的汽水及罐頭食物，薯片、紛紛開心地起舞，小鎮大街又回復當日一片熱鬧情景！

節目簡介: 據說可可豆含苯乙胺, 吃了可使人快樂? 夏娃到處尋找可可豆樹, 可可豆會否真正使人快樂? 夏娃會否因為挑戰上帝的權威而吃可可豆? 快樂、喜悅又是什麼?  我們不得而知, 可知的是她在尋找的過程中,得著一些快樂、一些無奈、一些迷惘、一些滿足…
Venue: Hong Kong Fringe Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Fringe Theatre

節目簡介: 生活中  總有時候，我們需要、亦盼望地問 誰能與我同歡笑?  誰能與我同哀哭?
地點: 香港兆基創意書院多媒體劇場
Venue: HKICC Lee Shau Kee School of Creativity Multi-media Theatre
venue.1: 香港兆基創意書院多媒體劇場
venue_en: HKICC Lee Shau Kee School of Creativity Multi-media Theatre

節目簡介: 甚麼是隔閡？ 隔閡能被看得見嗎？ 能否感覺到僵持的困局？ 冰凍得剌痛，僵硬得發麻！ 心似同極的磁鐵 頑強地抗衡，凝固了！  但光叫「冰」溶化，使它消失
Venue: Jockey Club Creative Arts Centre
venue_en: Jockey Club Creative Arts Centre

節目簡介: 駐團編舞黎海寧在作品中引用及演繹音樂的造詣獨步華人舞壇，今次從備受爭議的蕭斯達高維契的回憶錄《證言》出發，糅合舞蹈、音樂、劇場及電影，用豐富多變的舞台意象將蕭氏樂章的詩意及現實的殘酷巧妙結合。三屆香港舞台劇獎最佳男主角李鎮洲首次參與現代舞劇演出，一時化身音樂大師，一時變成差利卓別靈式默片中的莎劇人物，穿插於電影、舞台與現實之中。
About the Programme: Resident Choreographer Helen Lai is renowned for her ingenious use of music in her exquisite choreography. Inspired by Testimony, the controversial memoirs of Shostakovich, CCDC’s Testimony is a breathtaking crossover starring three times Best Actor of the Hong Kong Drama Awards Lee Chun Chow who makes his debut in dance theatre in this collaboration with CCDC. Lee plays the roles as the Russian composer as well as the Shakespearean characters in slapstick silent movies.
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 獲獎無數的邢亮，以二十世紀傳奇男舞者尼金斯基的手記為藍本，以全男班舞者體現他與尼金斯基的跨世紀相遇與對話。在《尼金斯基》中，舞者幻化成不同的理性與感性狀態，把尼金斯基在舞台與三十年瘋人院的生活詭異地融為一體，展現他那令人驚歎的舞姿和藝術成就背後的一段充滿曲折的悲劇人生。
About the Programme: Xing Liang, “Star of the Century” in the Chinese modern dance field, shows his exquisite talent in this breathtaking piece about Nijinsky, the “God of Dance.” In this rarely seen all-male full-length feature, Xing is intrigued by Nijinsky’s madness and notorious life and enters into a soul-searching dialogue with the legendary dance genius across space and time.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Studio Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

Programme Name: Dancers’ Homework II – Talk to Her
節目簡介: 四位來自中、港、台、日的全女班舞者分別以個人女性觸覺，編創四個作品，訴盡廿一世紀女人的暴烈與溫柔。本地土生土長的龐智筠在《雲想曲》中以輕鬆玩味的創作手法，以藍天白雲作佈景，譜寫出一段豁然開朗的愛情組曲。來自東京的岡部牧繪透過《流離時光》抒發她在異鄉旅程中的所遇所感。出生在中國陝西的喬楊及來自台灣的前雲門舞者張慈妤在她們個人編創的獨舞作品《我跳我心情》及《當J遇上T????》中，分享自己的故事和生活感受。
About the Programme: Manifesting their excellent choreography with an elegant touch of femininity, four veteran female dancers of CCDC from four different places in Asia lead the audiences through a journey of memories, love, devotion, hatred and solitude. Home grown dancer and choreographer Noel Pong’s A Walk on The Cloud is a portrayal of love and affection. Tokyo girl Makie Okabe tells her fancies and fantasies of her journey and experiences in the three cities through The Passage of Time. Qiao Yang from mainland China and Janet Chang from Taipei share their most personal moments in their solos I Dance What I Feel and When J Meets T????
地點: CCDC舞蹈中心七號室小劇場
Venue: CCDC Dance Centre Theatre Studio SE VEN
venue.1: CCDC舞蹈中心七號室小劇場
venue_en: CCDC Dance Centre Theatre Studio SE VEN

節目名稱: 《K的喜劇》 （原名：《畸人說夢》）台北之旅
Programme Name: The Comedy of K  Taipei Tour
節目簡介: 由黎海寧編創的《畸人說夢》2004年於香港首演後於2006年獲邀於台北上演。《畸人說夢》的靈感來自卡夫卡小說《變形記》，舞者頭戴黑色呢帽身穿黑西裝，角色亦男亦女，亦蟲亦獸。由床上跳到床下，充滿能量且又荒誕抵死。
About the Programme: Sporting a woolen black hat and a dark suit, K is a typical urban dweller. However, his life is by no means typical. “…the moment of waking up was the riskiest moment of the day.” It all begins in K’s tiny gloomy apartment. Everyday he wakes up from his bed to various bizarre situations and incomprehensible experiences, including the transformation of his body. The Comedy of K is inspired by the short stories and the classic novels of the legendary Czech literary figure, Franz Kafka.
Venue: Novel Hall for Performing Arts, Taipei
venue_en: Novel Hall for Performing Arts, Taipei

節目簡介: 梅卓燕與楊春江兩位編舞家汲取巽風坎水流動之氣，推動四肢百骸，把無形無相的水流風向化作舞動軀體的源動力。集天文、地理、環境、心理、醫學、文化之大乘，地水風火，四大不空，玩盡同步錄像投影，現場採聲混音及旋轉機動舞台裝置，以天馬行空的多媒體舞蹈劇場給觀眾帶來一連串有關風與水的奇想與狂想。
About the Programme: Two acclaimed local choreographers Daniel Yeung and Mui Cheuk-yin have based their work of fantasy Feng．Shui on something more than ba-gua mirrors, the luo-pan compass or Chinese astrology. Yeung transforms the shapeless and colourless wind into a theatrical feast by fusing video images, experimental music and lighting with dance. Mui meanwhile creates an entrancing piece which explores the many forms that water takes (ice, water, mist, rain, etc) as an analogy for the cycle of human memories and emotions in our own lives.
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium
