節目簡介: 香港舞蹈團將國寶級畫作〈清明上河圖〉以舞蹈詩的形式活現觀眾眼前，由藝術總監、著名編舞家梁國城先生作總導演、編舞，集台前幕後近百人的傾力製作，引領觀眾踏上充滿詩意的旅程。 舞蹈詩《清明上河圖》於2007年7月在香港文化中心首演，作為慶祝香港回歸十周年的獻禮節目。2008奧運年，獲國家文化部邀請，成為唯一代表香港參與「相約北京–2008奧運文化活動」港澳藝術節的舞蹈團，同年獲頒「香港舞蹈年獎2008」。2009年1月在香港載譽重演。 舞蹈詩以寫意的創作手法，以形取神，通過刻劃汴河兩岸北宋人生百態，讓觀眾重臨千載繁華古都，並以當代藝術創意手法，向悠久深厚的中國文化致敬。
About the Programme: Qingming Riverside premiered at the Hong Kong Cultural Centre in July 2007 to commemorate the Tenth Anniversary of the establishment of the Hong Kong SAR. In July 2008, Qingming Riverside toured to the National Centre for the Performing Arts, Beijing at the invitation of the Ministry of Culture, being the only dance performance to represent Hong Kong at the “Meet in Beijing 2008” Arts Festival. In response to popular demand, the epic dance spectacle Qingming Riverside made its triumphant return in Hong Kong. Lauded as “a stage wonder that arises from a painting masterpiece”, this crown jewel of the Hong Kong dance community is something to be very proud of. Directed and choreographed by Hong Kong Dance Company’s Artistic Director Leung Kwok-shing and featuring a hundred dancers and creative personnel, the opulent spectacle Qingming Riverside explores traditional Chinese culture through tapping into the rich dance culture of China as the basis of performance. It depicts the lives of Bianjing citizens during the Northern Song Dynasty (AD 960-1126) in broad painterly impressions, inviting the audience to travel through time to the dynamic city on the River Bian. This living painting salutes the long and profound history of Chinese culture through contemporary expressions.
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 鄧樹榮和邢亮以自身的觀點，加上對現代劇場、中國舞蹈及現代舞的體會，對《帝女花》原著粵劇劇本裏面的八場戲作出嶄新的演繹；以中國舞為骨幹，輔以現代舞的自由精神，再加上現代劇場的視覺表現元素，打造一齣既保留傳統又有新意的劇場演繹。長平公主和駙馬周世顯穿梭全劇，作為故事軸心，重複出現於三個時空﹕古代、古現代交界和現代，經歷這三段不平凡的時空，將《帝女花》的八幕經典，娓娓道來……
About the Programme: Award-winning Director Tang Shu-wing and Choreographer Xing Liang joined hands with Hong Kong Dance Company to deconstruct, reshape and re-invent the Cantonese Opera Classics Princess Changping into an innovative contemporary dance theatre.  The Director and the Choreographer offered a brand new interpretation of the eight scenes in the classic Cantonese opera Princess Changping with their own viewpoints and understanding of modern theatre, Chinese dance and modern dance. They used Chinese dance as the frame-work, supplemented it with the free spirit of modern dance and the expressive visual impact of modern theatre to create a theatre interpretation which preserved the tradition, and yet blended with new ideas. Princess Changping and his husband Zhou Shixian crossed the timeline from the ancient, the ancient/modern and the modern era to unfold the eight classic scenes of the Princess Changping.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 《來‧舞吧！》為北京舞蹈學院中國舞等級考試課程學員的結業演出。學員透過正規而嚴謹的訓練，對中國舞蹈藝術有更深刻的認識；除了接受有系統的訓練課程外，香港舞蹈團更讓學員有機會參與舞台演出，提升學員的表演能力、發掘潛能及増強自信心。
About the Programme: Come on was the graduation show by the students of Hong Kong Dance Company’s “Beijing Dance Academy Chinese Dance Graded Examination course”. Apart from systemic trainings, the students were also given a chance to perform on stage, through which they could earn live performance experience and strengthen their self-confidence.
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

節目簡介: 一位年青人偶然發現自己置身於民間傳說中的愛情故事，正目睹和體驗着與故事人物同樣的情緒和感受﹕有牛郎與織女般的無奈守望；有如孟姜女般的執着不屈、有許仙白娘子之間的迷亂痴纏、有梁山伯與祝英台的至死不渝。年青人驚覺這些古代傳說中的愛情自發生以來，就未曾休止過……楊雲濤根據自身對四個中國民間經典愛情故事的感悟，以中國舞蹈語彙轉化成四段細膩、充滿情感的舞蹈詩篇；以肢體語言訴說因愛情而起的甜蜜、奉獻、期待、悲傷，並向恆久不變的愛情致敬。
About the Programme: In Everlasting Love, Yang Yuntao created a dance poem in four episodes with inspirations from four Chinese classical love stories. The sweetness, sacrifices, longing and sorrow of love were expressed through body language as a salute to everlasting love. The accompanying music was derived from popular tunes, like the violin concerto “Butterfly Lovers”, to bring out the spirit of classic legends.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 香港舞蹈團資深舞蹈員胡錦明將其過往創作及演出精選，如《菊花台》、《願做失業漢》等重新改編成個人創作結集演出。 從中國傳統切入，配合現代電影曲目和審美情趣，表現生活化的舞蹈情懷，日日跳舞、日日編舞、日日記舞蹈……
About the Programme: Wu Kam-ming, veteran dancer of the Hong Kong Dance Company, selected highlights of his past performances to form his own collection of dance explorations.
地點: 上環文娛中心「八樓平台」
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre HKDC 8/F Platform
venue.1: 上環文娛中心香港舞蹈團八樓平台
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, HKDC 8/F Platform

節目簡介: 香港舞蹈團、香港舞蹈團兒童團及少年團首度聯合演出—舞蹈詩《印象‧嶺南》，掇取代表嶺南文化特色的高牆窄巷、楠木雕花、荷池古榕等實體場景，彰顯嶺南獨有之鄉風民情，以廣東舞蹈特有之寫意和細膩的表現手法，虛實相交、情景兼融，結合成一台充滿本土鄉風民情、雅俗共賞的舞蹈作品。
About the Programme: The Hong Kong Dance Company and its Children’s Troupe and Youth Troupe joined hands to present a grand dance poem Lingnan Impressions, a dance programme which combined new choreographies with the essence of classical Southern Regional dances. Lingnan Impressions showcased a number of features which could represent the Lingnan culture, including high walls, narrow alleys, wood carvings, lotus ponds and old banyan trees, in order to highlight the region's unique ethnic atmosphere. The dance poem also portrayed the distinctive characteristics of Guangdong dance.
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

節目簡介: 梁國城創意編導，將面世50周年的金庸同名經典武俠小說改編成抽象、唯美的舞台演繹。《神鵰俠侶》以舞劇的形式凸顯小說中人性的情感刻劃，以當代的美、舞蹈形式的美、結構安排的美、舞台視覺的美，透視出人物的內涵、感情和生命。「問世間情是何物，直教人生死相許」，在《神鵰俠侶》世界中，各式各樣的男女之情，代表着人世間種種情愛的瓜葛，節目以多角度的舞蹈語彙表述他們在愛情關係中所受的甘苦，展現《神鵰俠侶》的情感衝突與愛恨糾纏。
About the Programme: The grand dance drama Eagle Companion was based on Jin Yong's same-titled classic martial arts novel, which was first published half a century ago. Leung Kwok-shing ingeniously translated the literary text into an abstract and beautiful stage performance, depicting the conflicting nature of love and emotional struggles of love and hatred with dance vocabularies. The work employed a contemporary artistic style and at the same time embodied the essence of Chinese traditional culture.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目名稱: 《香港傳奇》- 2009東亞運動會(香港)開幕禮
Programme Name: Hong Kong Legend - 2009 East Asian Games Opening Ceremony
節目簡介: 香港舞蹈團特別為2009東亞運動會開幕禮編創及演出三節舞蹈：「香江漁火」《紅帆舞》、「活力都會」及「祝福香港」。
About the Programme: The Hong Kong Dance Company was invited to perform in the 2009 East Asian Games Opening Ceremony with three dance pieces.
地點: 尖沙咀香港文化中心露天廣場及維多利亞港
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, floating stage at Victoria Harbour
venue.1: 尖沙咀香港文化中心露天廣場及維多利亞港
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, floating stage at Victoria Harbour

節目簡介: 香港舞蹈團兒童團、少年團、青年團聯合演出，以年輕舞者的角度出發，描述她們在舞蹈方面的學習成長、舞蹈創作思維和舞台表演經歷，整理成三個篇章﹕〈課堂篇〉、〈創意篇〉及〈劇目篇〉。這群年輕的舞者懷着一份最真摯的渴望，流露於稚嫩的眼神中，揮灑在青澀的身體語言間。那份令人感懷的執著 ，如同晴空中的一抹夏雲，純淨、素白、蘊含蛻變的力量……
About the Programme: A collection of dance works that showcased creative thoughts of children and youths performed by the Hong Kong Dance Company Children’s Troupe, Youth Troupe and Young Persons’ Troupe.
地點: 上環文娛中心「八樓平台」
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre HKDC 8/F Platform
venue.1: 上環文娛中心香港舞蹈團八樓平台
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, HKDC 8/F Platform

節目簡介: 梁國城以創新的概念，將經典武俠小說《雪山飛狐》構思成浪漫寫意的舞劇，以舞蹈深入刻劃原著小說中角色的恩怨情仇及人性的矛盾，將懸念的結構化成唯美的情感，突出舞蹈的空間感和想像力，展現出舞劇獨特的藝術風格。再加上充滿現代美感的視覺效果，營造大雪冰川的磅礴氣勢之舞台美術，賞心悅目的服裝，為演出更添姿彩。《雪山飛狐》於2008年首演，此為載譽重演，特邀著名舞蹈家梁菲演出。
About the Programme: Hong Kong Dance Company premiered Snow Fox in 2008 as the second production of the Jin Yong Dance Drama Trilogy. Snow Fox transformed a classic martial arts novel into a romantic dance drama. The love and hate between characters and their moral conflicts in the original novel were vividly depicted in the choreography. The grand glacier stage design showcased modern visual aesthetics. The elegantly designed costumes and contemporary Chinese music added to the splendor of this outstanding performance. In response to fervent demands from the audiences, Snow Fox was re-run featuring guest artist Faye Leung, formerly principal dancer of the Hong Kong Ballet.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 國家一級編導劉凌莉與香港舞蹈團攜手，從中國古典舞蹈出發，廣納戲曲的精髓，融入當代美學元素，製作大型舞劇《畫皮》。青樓女子小雪與書生王生相愛，助其高考得中，王生卻背棄前盟，另娶新歡，並將小雪殺害。小雪冤魂不散，化作厲鬼。百年後，她瘋狂地報復害人；她遇見江南巡撫王存益，長相與王生相似。小雪假扮逃奴，進入王府，誘惑王存益，加害其善良的夫人湘綺。一場人鬼之間、人倫之間愛恨交纏的生死之戰徐徐展開。愛恨情仇，生死抉擇，驚心動魄。
About the Programme: Created by Liu Lingli, a National First Rank choreographer and director, Painted Face was a poignant, bittersweet dance drama that drew from the rich traditions of Chinese opera. Distilling and developing elements from different regional opera styles, the traditional roots were infused with a contemporary aesthetic vision to give the production a neo-classical touch. The dance drama took a humanistic approach, through rounded and distinct characterisations, to create a new dance vocabulary that speaks for our time.  Xiao Xue, a courtesan, is murdered by her faithless lover. So enraged by his infidelity and cruelty, her spirit finds no rest but in revenge. For a hundred years, the ghost of Xiao Xue haunts men, disguising in a mask of human skin painted with a female face, seducing men and consuming their hearts wherever it goes...  Painted Face played out on stage the forces of love and hate, human and spirits, fidelity and deceit, self-sacrifice and revenge, inspired by this most famous ghost story in Chinese literature.
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 香港舞蹈團大型舞蹈詩《清明上河圖》第三度載譽公演，一齣已巡演三十場的香港舞蹈團戲寶，值得香港市民引以為傲。 舞蹈詩《清明上河圖》在展現中國傳統文化的基礎上，以活現畫卷為主題，刻劃汴河兩岸北宋民生百態；並以寫意的創作手法以形取神，廣納豐富的中原舞蹈文化作為表演的素材。千姿百態的中原舞蹈，是千載留存於於民間的非物質文化傳統，復添上現代藝術處理，使傳統民間舞蹈更顯活力，讓人發思古之幽情，隨着舞者的步伐走進令人目眩神迷的宋代繁華盛世。
About the Programme: Performed for more than 30 times in Hong Kong and on tour, the Hong Kong Dance Company’s epic dance spectacle Qingming Riverside made its triumphant presentation for the third time at the Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre. Lauded as “a stage wonder that arises from a painting masterpiece”, this crown jewel of the Hong Kong dance community is something to be very proud of. Featuring a hundred dancers and creative personnel, the opulent spectacle Qingming Riverside explores traditional Chinese culture through tapping into the rich dance culture of China as the basis of performance. It depicts the lives of Bianjing citizens during the Northern Song Dynasty (AD 960-1126) in broad painterly impressions, inviting the audience to travel through time to the dynamic city on the River Bian. This living painting salutes the long and profound history of Chinese culture through contemporary expressions.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目名稱: 第九屆中國藝術節 —《 清明上河圖》
Programme Name: The Ninth China Arts Festival - Qingming Riverside
節目簡介: 香港舞蹈團獲邀於第九屆中國藝術節演出，在廣州白雲會議展覽中心演出大型舞蹈詩《清明上河圖》。 舞團將國寶級名畫〈清明上河圖〉以舞蹈詩的形式活現在內地觀眾眼前，台前幕後百人的傾力製作，引領觀眾經歷充滿詩意的旅程，回到千載繁華古都，向悠久深厚的中國文化致敬。適逢世博中國館亦以〈清明上河圖〉動畫展示八百多年前的汴京城市生活，而大型舞蹈詩《清明上河圖》於上海大劇院上演，可說是適逢其會，相得益彰。遊世博，賞名劇，難得因緣巧合。
About the Programme: The Hong Kong Dance Company was invited to participate in the Ninth China Arts Festival with a performance of Qingming Riverside at the Guangzhou Baiyun Convention Centre. Featuring a hundred dancers and creative personnel, the opulent spectacle Qingming Riverside explores traditional Chinese culture through tapping into the rich dance culture of China as the basis of performance. It depicts the lives of Bianjing citizens during the Northern Song Dynasty (AD 960-1126) in broad painterly impressions, inviting the audience to travel through time to the dynamic city on the River Bian. This living painting salutes the long and profound history of Chinese culture through contemporary expressions.
地點: 廣州白雲會議展覽中心世紀大會堂
Venue: Guangzhou Baiyun Convention Centre
venue.1: 廣州白雲會議展覽中心世紀大會堂
venue_en: Guangzhou Baiyun Convention Centre

節目簡介: 三位舞者如何在平凡的生活中，追尋自己不平凡的舞蹈人生？  香港舞蹈團三位年青舞者劉迎宏、陳榮和米濤，在香港這個既陌生又熟悉的環境裏生活着、努力着，同時也分享着彼此的所思所感，對現實的思考和對理想的追求。
About the Programme: Hong Kong is a familiar yet alien city where the three dancers Liu, Chen and Mi have come to live and work. It is the city where they share their thoughts and feelings, their reflections of reality and their pursuit of the ideal.  Dancing Emotions was the three men's shared journey in search of an extraordinary existence as dancers in a contemporary metropolis like Hong Kong.
地點: 上環文娛中心「八樓平台」
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre HKDC 8/F Platform
Name of Artistic Director: 「劉迎宏《每一天》尋常的場景，演繹卻絕不平淡，香港舞蹈團舞者的專業水準之高，在這一幕可見一斑。」李海燕，《舞蹈手札》
venue.1: 上環文娛中心香港舞蹈團八樓平台
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, HKDC 8/F Platform

節目名稱: 上海世界博覽會「相約世博－舞蹈春之季」 —《 清明上河圖》
Programme Name: 2010 Shanghai Expo cultural presentation - Qingming Riverside
節目簡介: 香港舞蹈團榮獲香港特別行政區政府邀請，代表香港參與2010年上海世博會的文藝演出，在上海大劇院演出大型舞蹈詩《清明上河圖》。 舞團將國寶級名畫〈清明上河圖〉以舞蹈詩的形式活現在內地觀眾眼前，台前幕後百人的傾力製作，引領觀眾經歷充滿詩意的旅程，回到千載繁華古都，向悠久深厚的中國文化致敬。適逢世博中國館亦以〈清明上河圖〉動畫展示八百多年前的汴京城市生活，而大型舞蹈詩《清明上河圖》於上海大劇院上演，可說是適逢其會，相得益彰。遊世博，賞名劇，難得因緣巧合。
About the Programme: The Hong Kong Dance Company’s Qingming Riverside took part in the cultural presentations at the 2010 Shanghai Expo at the invitation of the Hong Kong SAR Government, with two performances at the Shanghai Grand Theatre. The performance of this epic dance spectacle complemented the “Along the River during the Qingming Festival” multi-media display in the China Pavilion at the Shanghai Expo. Featuring a hundred dancers and creative personnel, the opulent spectacle Qingming Riverside explores traditional Chinese culture through tapping into the rich dance culture of China as the basis of performance. It depicts the lives of Bianjing citizens during the Northern Song Dynasty (AD 960-1126) in broad painterly impressions, inviting the audience to travel through time to the dynamic city on the River Bian. This living painting salutes the long and profound history of Chinese culture through contemporary expressions.
Venue: Shanghai Grand Theatre Lyric Theatre
venue_en: Shanghai Grand Theatre Lyric Theatre

節目簡介: 童話天地無邊無際，到處閃耀着愛與夢的追求，對真善美的嚮往。香港舞蹈團兒童團及少年團選演童話之王安徒生的五個家傳戶曉的故事，包括《醜小鴨》、《老單身漢的睡帽》、《拇指姑娘》、《紅舞鞋》和《海的女兒》，編成繽紛悅目的兒童舞劇，。一眾小團員以天真瀰漫的舞步，演繹感人至深的經典故事，讓觀眾重拾赤子之心，投入想像飛馳的奇妙世界!
About the Programme: More than a hundred dancers from the Children’s and Youth Troupes of the Hong Kong Dance Company transformed themselves into fanciful characters, recreating the world of fairy tales on stage. The colourful children's dance drama Childhood Wonderland featured five of the best loved stories by Andersen – The Ugly Duckling, The Old Bachelor’s Nightcap, Thumbelina, The Red Shoes and The Little Mermaid. Each chapter of Childhood Wonderland shimmered with dreams, love and yearning for truth, beauty and virtue.
地點: 香港大會堂劇院、荃灣大會堂演奏廳
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Theatre, Tsuen Wan Town Hall Auditorium
venue.1:
香港大會堂劇院
荃灣大會堂演奏廳
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Theatre, Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium

節目名稱: 第四屆中國（深圳） 國際少年兒童藝術文化節 —《童話天地》
Programme Name: The Fourth China (Shenzhen) Youth Arts Exchange Camp - Childhood Wonderland
節目簡介: 香港舞蹈團兒童團及少年團獲邀參與第四屆中國（深圳）國際少年兒童藝術文化節的交流活動，於深圳少年宮演出《童話天地》。 童話天地無邊無際，到處閃耀着愛與夢的追求，對真善美的嚮往。香港舞蹈團兒童團及少年團選演童話之王安徒生的五個家傳戶曉的故事，包括《醜小鴨》、《老單身漢的睡帽》、《拇指姑娘》、《紅舞鞋》和《海的女兒》，編成繽紛悅目的兒童舞劇，。一眾小團員以天真瀰漫的舞步，演繹感人至深的經典故事，讓觀眾重拾赤子之心，投入想像飛馳的奇妙世界!
About the Programme: The Children’s and Youth Troupes of the Hong Kong Dance Company were invited to take part in the Fourth China (Shenzhen) Youth Arts Exchange Camp and performed Childhood Wonderland at the Shenzhen Children’s Palace. More than a hundred dancers from the Children’s and Youth Troupes transformed themselves into fanciful characters, recreating the world of fairy tales on stage. The colourful children's dance drama Childhood Wonderland featured five of the best loved stories by Andersen – The Ugly Duckling, The Old Bachelor’s Nightcap, Thumbelina, The Red Shoes and The Little Mermaid. Each chapter of Childhood Wonderland shimmered with dreams, love and yearning for truth, beauty and virtue.
Venue: Shenzhen Children\'s Palace
venue_en: Shenzhen Children\'s Palace

節目簡介: 三國時代在中國歷史的長河中僅存在了四十五年(公元220-265)的時間，就在這歷史長河的彈指一瞬間，多少英雄指點江山，各領風騷；多少豪傑盡顯本色，叱吒風雲。時光如逝水，一切都成為歷史。 舞劇《三國風流》以中國經典四大名著之一《三國演義》為創作藍本，以中國古典舞韻，結合傳統美學及當代視覺藝術，寫意地再現風雲色變的三國時代，數風流人物。
About the Programme: Yang Yuntao drew inspiration from Romance of the Three Kingdoms, one of the Four Great Classical Novels of Chinese literature to create an epic dance theatre of the same title. Combining dance with Chinese opera and theatre elements, Yang painted the thrilling tales of chivalry on stage.  Romance of the Three Kingdoms is China's most outstanding historical novel. It drew on real figures and events from the Three Kingdoms period and embellished them with imagination, immortalising history for posterity through fiction. The Three Kingdoms (220-265 AD) accounted for merely 45 years in Chinese history. This short period, no more than a split second out of the long timeline of civilisation, created more heroes, legends and awe-inspiring personalities than any other period.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

Programme Name: 8/F Platform - Dark Root of the Scream
節目簡介: 那些歌曲、那些音樂、那些舞蹈，蒼涼、悲傷、穿透心靈深處。 佛蘭明高的歌曲反映了吉卜賽人的不幸和艱苦的生活；漂泊流浪的吉卜賽人以他們獨特的嗓音創造出悲傷而深沉的民謠，這些民謠有種能穿透人們心靈深處的魔力，配合奔放豪邁的舞者釋出所有的精力與熱情，叫人目不轉睛，深怕一眨眼就會錯過精彩的畫面。 紙扇，長絮披肩，飛揚的裙擺；古典優雅的蘭花手，激情澎湃的拍掌和踏步。當白色遇上黑色、當中國遇上西班牙！
About the Programme: Flamenco songs capture the Gypsy’s wanderings. Melancholic yearnings from deep in the heart, they are the soundtrack to their harsh and rootless existence. These folk melodies captivate the heart and soul of their audience, and unleash exceptional passion and energy from the dancers. Tassel shawls and fans. Flamboyant dresses and long flowing sleeves. Graceful, restrained gestures of Chinese dance came face-to-face with the fiery, impassioned flamenco hand-clapping and foot-stomping in this mesmerizing performance.
地點: 上環文娛中心「八樓平台」
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre HKDC 8/F Platform
子分類_ArtGenre SubCategory: 現代舞／當代舞、佛蘭明高舞
venue.1: 上環文娛中心香港舞蹈團八樓平台
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, HKDC 8/F Platform

節目簡介: 《瀟灑東坡》以中國舞蹈演繹大文學家、書畫家、美學家蘇東坡的傳奇一生。梁國城以中國舞蹈結合太極的意念，以天、地、人為舞動神韻的素材，配合多媒體的聲、色、形、舞多種手法，透過肢體語言寫意地演繹蘇東坡的經典不朽詩詞，並將其風雲多變、淒風苦雨的人生片段，與他的詩詞意境重疊建構，刻劃這一位文豪詩人灑脫不屈的人格、坎坷跌宕的遭遇、顚沛流離的政治生涯；以橫空出世的詩人情懷，浪漫而富情趣地舞出「蘇軾之詩」。
About the Programme: Su Dongpo attained dazzling heights in all genres of literary arts – from poetry to prose, painting to calligraphy. Su Shi (1037 – 1101), alias Dongpo is one of the best-loved scholars in Chinese history, and stands tall at the pinnacle of Chinese culture.  Inspired by the legendary life and enlightened works of this Song dynasty literary giant, Leung Kwok-shing created Poet Dongpo, a grand dance drama to celebrate the legacy of this dashing man of letters. Based on the principles of taichi, the choreography of Poet Dongpo centred on concepts of heaven, earth and man. Fusing sound, visuals, forms and movements, the multimedia production brought back the cheerful spirit of this great man of letters, and traced his rollercoaster career in politics and key events of his dramatic life.  With creative talents from Mainland China, Taiwan and Hong Kong joining forces to conjure the spirit of poetry with music and movement, Poet Dongpo lyrically invoked Su’s verses with dance, and led the audience into the literati's world of poetic freedom and intense emotions.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 如果一生中只可看一齣芭蕾，«天鵝湖»絕對是不二之選。第三幕黑天鵝的三十二個單腿陀螺轉(fouettes)是芭蕾史上難度最高的演繹之一，亦成為芭蕾舞伶向他人展示個人技藝的代表動作。除了個人獨舞精彩外，劇中很多群舞也十分出色，包括舞會中華麗優雅的«華爾茲舞»、活潑可愛的«四小天鵝，還有眾天鵝的大型群舞，拼湊出一幅幅美妙絕倫的圖畫。此製作於北京演出，以佩蒂巴和艾化李夫的傳統編舞為藍本，再注入藝術總監米瀚文及兩位編舞白家樂、周錦欣的全新元素，獲得高度評價。
About the Programme: Whether it’s the true love between the White Swan and the Prince, or the thrilling technical bravura of the Black Swan, Swan Lake has cast a magic spell over dancers and balletomanes.  Swan Lake has long been considered one of the most time-honoured classical ballets. While The Hong Kong Ballet’s production was based on the traditional Petipa version, new choreography by Artistic Director John Meehan and choreographic apprentices Carlo Pacis and Selina Chau gave the audience many pleasant surprises. This production garnered critical acclaim after it was performed in Beijing.
地點: 北京國家大劇院歌劇院
Venue: Beijing National Centre for the Performing Arts Opera House
venue.1: 北京國家大劇院歌劇院
venue_en: Beijing National Centre for the Performing Arts Opera House

節目簡介: 巴赫的音樂觸發無數現代編舞家的靈感。《巴赫‧芭蕾》以他的音樂為主題，一次過演繹多段不同風格的精采舞作。包括大師級編舞家威廉‧科西(William Forsythe)的《舞極》(Steptext)、芭蕾巨匠喬治‧巴蘭欽(George Balanchine)的《巴羅克協奏曲》(Concerto Barocco)、由斯坦頓‧韋爾奇(Stanton Welch)在911事件後創作的《空‧色》(Clear)以及德國多特蒙德市立劇院芭蕾舞團藝術總監王新鵬的《我的巴赫》。香港小交響團在指揮安德烈‧莫加利亞的帶領下現場演繹上半場的巴赫音樂，為整個劇目錦上添花，於舞台上活現巴赫這位音樂大師的傑作。
About the Programme: J.S. Bach's music has provided unending inspiration for modern choreographers. The Hong Kong Ballet staged All Bach featuring four innovative contemporary ballets: from the technically thrilling and highly dramatic Steptext by William Forsythe, to George Balanchine's classic Concerto Barocco, to Stanton Welch's contemporary masterpiece Clear, to Wang Xin Peng's exciting dance theatre, Mein Bach. Live accompaniment by the Hong Kong Sinfonietta, under the baton of Andrew Mogrelia in the first half of the programme, added colour to the stunning performance of the dancers on stage.
Venue: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre
主辦單位: 香港藝術節協會有限公司
Presenter: Hong Kong Arts Festival Society Limited
Related Programme: All Bach Dance Preview2009/02/03 ,All Bach Pre-Performance Talk 2009/02/13
venue_en: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre

節目簡介: 此劇自1895年於聖彼得堡演出後，一直迄立不倒，百年來迷倒不少芭蕾舞迷及演出者。港芭於北京的演出更為觀眾帶來了精彩舞台體驗，除了原著佩蒂巴、艾化李夫編排了細膩淒美的故事及優美的舞蹈，彼得‧科曼瑰麗的佈景、服裝、柴可夫斯基膾炙人口的音樂外，此製作由前港芭藝術總監米瀚文、舞團編舞新星白家樂和周錦欣攜手創作的《天鵝湖》，當中注入新鮮元素，為芭蕾舞迷帶來不少驚喜。
About the Programme: Premierèd in St. Petersburg more than a century ago, Swan Lake has cast a magic spell over dancers and balletomanes. The dramatic story line, the sumptuous sets and costumes by Peter Farmer, music by Tchaikovsky, beautiful dance patterns created by the original choreographers Petipa and Ivanov, with additional touches by Artistic Director John Meehan, and two of the Ballet's young talents Carlo Pacis and Selina Chau, helped to create a great theatrical experience for the audience.
Venue: Sha Tin Town Hall Auditorium
venue_en: Sha Tin Town Hall, Auditorium

節目名稱: 《咫尺之間 — 年青編舞家全新創作》
Programme Name: Up Close and Personal - Young Choreographers Showcase
節目簡介: 七位香港芭蕾舞團的年青舞蹈員：高瀚林、藤野暢央、白家樂、李怡燃、鄺藹怡、陳基琼、平良彥太捨棄華麗的舞台包裝，回到創作之根據地，各施各法，編創出自己的作品。他們誠邀觀眾與舞蹈員作零距離交流，於港芭的專用排舞室內上演他們的全新創作。咫尺之距，觀眾可目睹舞蹈員最真實的一面，一舉手、一投足，盡收眼簾，與舞者一起投入一個天馬行空，滿載喜、怒、哀、樂的無限創意空間。
About the Programme: Shedding their classic roles of 19th century princes and princesses, 7 budding choreographers from the Company - Jonathan Mangosing, Nobuo Fujino, Carlo Pacis, Li Yi-ran, Aurora Kwong, Eve Chan and Hikota Taira - revealed their true selves as living, breathing individuals of the 21st century in 7 new works. Audiences enjoyed a great variety of dancing styles that reflected each choreographer’s own unique cultural elements and experience. The seven new works were presented in a studio environment – the dancers' "home" in the Hong Kong Cultural Centre.
地點: 香港文化中心大劇院後台8 樓GR2 排舞室
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre Backstage 8/F Rehearsal Room GR2
venue.1: 香港文化中心大劇院後台八樓排演室GR2
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre Backstage 8/F Rehearsal Room GR2

節目簡介: 2009年，香港芭蕾舞團為慶祝30周年，呈獻了一個星光熠熠的國際芭蕾滙演GALAXY。舞團邀得多位世界舞壇巨星與港芭舞者同台演出，包括英國皇家芭蕾舞團阿莉娜‧約卡魯、約翰‧高博格、史提芬‧麥克瑞、諾貝蒂‧馬奎絲、美國三藩市芭蕾舞團的譚元元（港芭客席首席舞蹈員）、達米安‧史密斯、德國柏林芭蕾舞團的中村祥子，及德國多特蒙德市立劇院芭蕾舞團的莫尼卡‧霍特斯尤他和馬克‧拉賈波夫親臨香港，為觀眾帶來多姿多采的芭蕾盛宴。
About the Programme: The Hong Kong Ballet presented GALAXY, an international ballet gala in May 2009, as one of the highlights of the Company's 30th anniversary celebrations. On one stage, balletomanes were able to witness the consummate skill and charming grace of our Company dancers and some of the world's brightest stars: Alina Cojocaru, Johan Kobborg, Steven McRae and Roberta Marquez from The Royal Ballet, Tan Yuan Yuan, the Guest Principal Dancer of The Hong Kong Ballet and Principal Dancer of San Francisco Ballet, and her dance partner Damian Smith, Shoko Nakamura from Berlin State Ballet and Monica Fotescu-Uta and Mark Radjapov from Ballett Dortmund.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 心地善良的灰姑娘被惡毒繼母與醜八怪姐姐困在家，幸得仙子相助乘著南瓜車遠赴華麗舞會邂逅英俊王子……繽紛夢幻的灰姑娘故事一向是世界各地不同編舞家的靈感泉源，作品由古典至現代等風格多不勝數。此次香港芭蕾舞團於澳門的演出為傳統版本，由美籍編舞家大衛▪艾倫(David Allan)加以改編創作，獨舞演員的精湛舞藝、浪漫的劇情、華麗氣派的宮廷舞廳、魔幻神秘的樹林……營造出不可思議的舞台效果。舞劇同時不乏浪漫和幽默元素，其中最出色的「攪笑」能手莫過於令觀眾捧腹大笑、由男芭蕾舞演員反串演出的醜姊姊。港芭整晚演出贏得觀眾熱烈掌聲
About the Programme: The Hong Kong Ballet brought the everlasting ballet fairytale to life: Cinderella. This enchanting story was transformed into a ballet feast with Prokofiev's melodious music and the magical input of award-winning North-American choreographer David Allan. Cinderella is a narrative known worldwide and many versions have been written. David Allan focused on Charles Perrault’s tale, adding some Russian elements, leading the dancers to depict the blossoming of Cinderella and Prince Charming’s poetic love, bringing a touch of romance and heart-warming emotions to the narrative. Designer Peter Cazalet’s magnificent sets and costumes also transformed the stage into a magical and fantasy world. Although everybody knows how the story ends, children and grown-ups were caught up in the romantic tale of the little princess, her prince, the fairy-godmother, the ugly sisters and the merciless stepmother. The humorous and poetic atmosphere with the splendid ballroom décor, magical forest scenes, the pumpkin carriage, the striking clock and the glass slipper, brought back childhood memories.
地點: 澳門文化中心綜合劇院
Venue: Macao Cultural Centre Grand Auditorium
venue.1: 澳門文化中心綜合劇院
venue_en: Macao Cultural Centre Grand Auditorium

節目簡介: 《仙履奇緣》這個耳熟能詳的童話故事流傳了好幾個世紀，亦出現了無數的版本。它的吸引之處不僅在於浪漫的故事，更重要是背後所傳遞的重要信息：擁有一顆美善的心比漂亮的外表更難能可貴。港芭為觀眾演繹美藉編舞家大衛▪艾倫的版本，配以浦羅歌菲夫既富戲劇性又悅耳動聽的管弦樂及彼得‧卡索列的華麗服裝及佈景設計，把經典童話故事活現舞台。
About the Programme: Cinderella is a classic folk tale with thousands of variants known throughout the world. Its popularity is not only attributed to the romantic love story; more importantly, it conveys a meaningful message that beauty is a treasure, but graciousness is priceless. The Hong Kong Ballet's Cinderella was choreographed by David Allan to the dramatic and melodious music of Sergei Prokofiev, with magnificent sets and costumes designed by Peter Cazalet.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 《吉賽爾》是一部扣人心弦的芭蕾經典，刻畫了人物細膩的情感，百多年來洗滌觀眾的心靈，歷久常新。《吉賽爾》是其中一部最重要、並最能顯示舞團實力的古典芭蕾舞劇。它不單要求演出者舞藝精湛，更需要卓越的演技。《吉賽爾》無論對整個舞團還是主要演員均是一項真正的挑戰。香港芭蕾舞團應中華人民共和國文化部之邀請於北京保利劇院演出此經典浪漫芭蕾舞劇，作為參與中華人民共和國建國六十周年的慶祝活動之一。
About the Programme: Giselle belongs to a ballet heritage that continues to inspire and illuminate audiences today. A heart-rending tale of love, betrayal and the supernatural and a supreme example of ballet, Giselle served as the ideal vehicle to represent classical tradition while highlighting the Company's global perspective and aspirations. The Hong Kong Ballet performed Giselle, the most romantic of all ballets, at the Poly Theatre in Beijing in 2009. Through an invitation from the Ministry of Culture, The Hong Kong Ballet was honoured to present the Company's dancers to Beijing audiences in the landmark 60th celebration of the founding of the People's Republic of China.
Venue: Beijing Poly Theatre
venue_en: Beijing Poly Theatre

節目簡介: 香港芭蕾舞團把盧狄‧凡登士重新詮釋的莎士比亞愛情巨著《羅密歐與茱麗葉》搬上舞台。盧狄‧凡登士被譽為歐洲當代最傑出編舞家之一，自1967年面世以來，此劇已成為其中一個最常演出的版本。浦羅哥菲夫所創作的芭蕾音樂現已成為管弦樂中的經典，與峰迴路轉的劇情、震人心弦的結局配合得天衣無縫。是次演出由香港小交響樂團伴奏，康尼利斯指揮。
About the Programme: With its sumptuous set and costumes, thrilling fight scenes and the tragic finale, Romeo and Juliet choreographed by Rudi van Dantzig embodies everything a ballet should be. Set to Prokofiev's sublime orchestra score, the music conjures the oppressive mood and violence of the feuding families, to the poetic nightscape of the balcony love scene. The Hong Kong Sinfonietta, under the baton of Gerry Cornelius, provided live accompaniment to the production.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 揉合經典與現代特色的《冬之舞樂祭》把印度神話、柴可夫斯基的音樂著作和二次世界大戰的影像呈現，表現一連串矛盾和對比。《冬之舞樂祭》的節目中包括三部作品：佩蒂巴 (Marius Petipa) 的《舞姫》第二幕、史提芬．貝恩斯 (Stephen Baynes) 特別為港芭而編的《孤獨守望》，以及克里斯特 (Nils Christe) 的《三樂章交響曲》(香港首演)。
About the Programme: An eclectic mix of classical and contemporary styles, Symphony of Movements is a triptych of passion, fear and loathing─ conjuring visions of mythical India, the horrors of the Second World War and the uncertainties in life's journeys. Symphony of Movements focused on emotions such as dealing with loss, loneliness and shock, exploring ideas of myth, grandeur, war and doubt. The triple bill featured Act II of La Bayadère by Marius Petipa, Stephen Baynes' The Way Alone, which was a special commission for The Hong Kong Ballet, and Nils Christe's Symphony in Three Movements, which was a première in Hong Kong.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 小嘉麗在衣香鬢影的聖誕舞會收到胡桃夾子木偶為聖誕禮物，夢中與胡桃夾子王子遇上連串驚喜怪事，展開聖誕繽紛夢幻之旅。當中的大型舞會、各式民族舞、浪漫醉人的雙人舞、劇情趣怪的戰爭舞等往往令觀眾印象難忘，配合堂皇瑰麗的佈景、華麗奪目的舞衣，指揮家威爾京士率領香港小交響樂團現場演奏柴可夫斯基的悠揚樂曲，《胡桃夾子》是一家大小度過聖誕佳節的最好節目。
About the Programme: Set to Tchaikovsky’s whimsical music and based on a traditional tale adapted by the French writer, Alexandre Dumas, The Nutcracker ballet was first performed at St Petersburg’s Mariinsky Theatre in December 1892. It has since become a magical part of Christmas tradition for adults and children all over the world. The enchanting music of Tchaikovsky was performed by the Hong Kong Sinfonietta, under the baton of Ormsby Wilkins. With the sumptuous set and costumes making a delightful spectacle, this show is always a magnificent ballet, a must-see holiday show for the whole family.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 《糊塗爆竹賀新年》由本地編舞家伍宇烈及香港芭蕾舞團的舞蹈員江上悠聯手創作，以充滿傳統節日氣息的著名芭蕾舞劇《胡桃夾子》為藍本，帶領觀眾穿越時空，由1959年起一直向前走，觀眾好像看到舊影畫戲的預告片一樣。舞劇原用柴可夫斯基在《胡桃夾子》中的音樂，而每一幕的編舞都對應著《胡桃夾子》作360度大翻新。棉襖、桃花、紅包、麻將、舞獅、唐裝衫褲加小帽……芳芳、狄娜、于素秋、香港節的花車美人、工展會小姐、訪港的公爵夫人……一份濃濃的香港情懷令人會心微笑。《糊塗爆竹賀新年》是中西合璧、新舊共融的創作，是對過去的懷緬，亦是對現在及未來的反思，一個穿越時空的旅程，引起觀眾深刻的共嗚。
About the Programme: A journey into the past as well as a ride into the future, Firecracker by Hong Kong-based choreographer Yuri Ng and The Hong Kong Ballet’s Yuh Egami transported the traditional festive fantasy The Nutcracker into a Hong Kong experience. Beginning in 1967 and speeding forward through events and fragments of memories, Firecracker recalls the experience of watching film trailers of old Cantonese films, stars of yesteryear, parade floats and Royal visits drift by in a seamless vignette of recollections. The inspiration for Firecracker - its mix of East and West, past and present, as well as a nostalgic yearning for the past - is reflective of Hong Kong and its inhabitants. This ballet resonates with a unique Hong Kong sensibility that holds its resonance.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Studio Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 兩位在芭蕾史上影響深遠的傳奇人物，法王路易十四與亨利二世的皇后凱瑟琳▪德美第奇，一同現身《芭蕾進化論》，帶領觀眾見證芭蕾舞歷代的演變，由17世紀宮廷尊享的高級娛樂，發展至浪漫時期的風格，再到19世紀芭蕾熱直捲俄羅斯造就古典芭蕾的發展，及後進入20世紀現代芭蕾的革命年代。觀眾一次過欣賞舞團演出十多段代表著不同時期的精彩芭蕾選段，當中包括經典舞劇《吉賽爾》、《拿波里》、《天鵝湖》和《睡美人》，以及多位二十世紀殿堂級編舞家的作品，例如伊莎多拉▪鄧肯、瑪莎▪葛蘭姆、喬治▪巴蘭欽及威廉▪科西等。《芭蕾進化論》曾獲香港舞蹈年獎2009，它以輕鬆的手法讓觀眾認識芭蕾簡史、風格和技巧、芭蕾舞鞋和舞衣的演變，加上專業演員的生動旁述，必能讓您樂在其中。
About the Programme: From its court origins in Louis XIV’s palace in the 17th Century, the art of ballet has undergone an evolution of around 300 years. This re-run of the award-winning production was staged at the Shatin Town Hall. Introduced by King Louis XIV and Catherine de' Medici, well-known patron of the arts, the evolution of ballet was unveiled in this show. Featuring exciting excerpts from romantic and classical ballets like Giselle, Napoli, Swan Lake, The Sleeping Beauty, and the work of iconic 20th century figures such as Isadora Duncan, Martha Graham, George Balanchine and William Forsythe, this revealed all you need to know about ballet. It was a condensed history of this enduring dance form.
Venue: Sha Tin Town Hall Auditorium
venue_en: Sha Tin Town Hall, Auditorium

節目簡介: «光▪影▪步»結集多位著名編舞家的作品，包括喬治▪巴蘭欽、威廉▪科西、克里斯托夫▪威爾頓、波蘭編舞家克里兹托夫▪帕斯特，及蘭納▪格斯克改編佩蒂巴之作品等。來自法國土魯斯市政廳芭蕾舞團的首席舞蹈員姬莉▪利奧及卡兹别克▪艾米耶諾夫應邀獻演«海盜»其中一幕雙人舞，而港芭的客席首席舞蹈員譚元元以及她在三藩市芭蕾舞團的拍擋達米安‧史密斯亦演出克里斯托夫▪威爾頓的新作«鬼魂»之雙人舞。
About the Programme: Bringing together distinctive ballet works in the neoclassical and modern genre, Brilliant Steps featured the works of masters such as George Balanchine, William Forsythe, and the renowned Polish choreographer Krzysztof Pastor. Also featured on the bill were The Hong Kong Ballet's acclaimed guest principal dancer, San Francisco Ballet's Tan Yuan Yuan and her dance partner Damian Smith, and Gaëlle Riou and Kazbek Akhmedyarov from Ballet du Capitole, Toulouse. The Pas de Deux from Christopher Wheeldon's Ghosts was performed by Tan and Smith, while Riou and Akhmedyarov danced the Pas de Deux from Marius Petipa's classic Le Corsaire.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目名稱: 上海演出《 仲夏芭蕾精品》
節目簡介: 爲慶祝中國2010年上海世博會的舉行，香港芭蕾舞團獲香港特別行政區政府邀請，於2010年6月4日假上海東方藝術中心東方歌劇廳演出《仲夏芭蕾精品》。是次演出是港芭繼2008年10月的《吉賽爾》及《空．色》後，再度於上海東方歌劇廳演出。 《仲夏芭蕾精品》節目包括由香港編舞家伍宇烈及香港芭蕾舞團江上悠所合編的《糊塗爆竹賀新年》之選段、當代芭蕾大師威廉▪科西的《舞極》和波蘭編舞家克里兹托夫▪帕斯特的《光與影之間》，三部風格迥異的當代芭蕾作品。
About the Programme: Summer Delights brings together 3 contemporary ballet pieces which come from diverse origins, but are equally unexpected and provocative. They include William Forsythe’s Steptext, Krzysztof Pastor’s In Light and Shadow, and an excerpt from Firecracker created by Yuri Ng and The Hong Kong Ballet’s Yuh Egami that highlights the history of Hong Kong.
地點: 上海東方藝術中心東方歌劇廳
Venue: Shanghai Oriental Art Centre Oriental Opera Hall
venue.1: 上海東方藝術中心東方歌劇廳
venue_en: Shanghai Oriental Art Centre Oriental Opera Hall

節目簡介: 《夢偶情緣》1870年於巴黎歌劇院首演，為芭蕾史上其中一齣最受歡迎的喜劇芭蕾。故事發生於中歐的一個村落，一位神秘怪誕的發明家歌柏尼博士，創造了一台漂亮彷如真人的機械木偶。羅奈‧海德的編舞，不但讓舞者展示幽默傳神的演繹技巧，同時亦挑戰舞者的技巧與潛能。音樂由芭蕾音樂巨匠德利伯編寫，蘊含古典與民族音樂的特色，配合諾貝蒂‧帕哥諾瑰麗堂皇的佈景及服裝設計，《夢偶情緣》是一家大小的開懷之選。
About the Programme: Since its creation in 1870 for the Paris Opera, the wonderfully witty Coppélia has deservedly earned its reputation as one of the most popular comic ballets. The Hong Kong Ballet staged Ronald Hynd's version with delightful choreography that gave the dancers an opportunity to showcase their comic and character acting skills, at the same time displaying their technical skills in a range of complex dance styles. Léo Delibes' original blend of classical and folk music styles and Guidi di Bagno's gorgeous sets and costumes further enhanced this endearing tale. The ballet's bright and jovial mood made it the perfect family entertainment for all ages.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 香港芭蕾舞團五位年青舞蹈員，包括李怡燃、江上悠、胡頌威、古思宇及高瀚林，既是表演者亦是編舞家，他們以月亮為靈感，以嶄新的意念，透過創作一連串不同風格的「雙人舞」，探討現代人與社會、自身、現實、虛擬世界之間等各式各樣的微妙關係。舞團亦特別委約來自加拿大的新一代編舞家彼得▪奎安斯為是次演出創作全新作品«明亮»，節目同時亦包括著名古典編舞家奧古斯特‧布農維爾的作品«花節雙人舞»。
About the Programme: Undertaking the challenges of creating new works of their own, dancers Li Yi-ran, Yuh Egami, Ricky Hu, Kostyantyn Keshyshev and Jonathan Mangosing moved into the roles of choreographers as they created new dance works which expressed the emotions and physicality of relationships. New Moon took the audience on a journey to the past, travelling to dance duets of our time. The program opened with the timeless 19th century pas de deux in Flower Festival in Genzano by Danish master August Bournonville, a charming duet which displays the simple joy and teasing playfulness of young love. Canadian choreographer Peter Quanz, who has been making his name on the international dance scene, created Luminous, a world première for the dancers of The Hong Kong Ballet. New Moon combined original dance duet works created by The Hong Kong Ballet’s dancers, the acclaimed Peter Quanz in a world première piece, as well as a glance back into one of the classic examples in the pas de deux genre.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Studio Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 《睡美人》是芭蕾舞劇中不朽的經典作品，它結合了浪漫、詩意、善良、邪惡、命運等不同元素，當然還有真摯的愛情，加上古典芭蕾之父佩蒂巴豐富多樣的編舞，令它自1890年於聖彼得堡首演以來，迄今仍是最歡迎的古典舞碼之一。是次香港芭蕾舞團全新製作的《睡美人》，由前英國皇家芭蕾舞團首席舞蹈員辛西婭‧哈維加以改編，配合英國名設計師馬克‧貝利全新設計的華麗舞台和閃爍舞衣，加上香港小交響樂團現場演奏柴可夫斯基的動人樂章，讓觀眾沈醉於繽紛夢幻的童話國度。
About the Programme: Premiered at the Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre in 2010, this new version of The Sleeping Beauty for The Hong Kong Ballet was staged by Cynthia Harvey, former principal dancer of the American Ballet Theatre and The Royal Ballet, with magnificent sets and lush costumes by Mark Bailey. The Hong Kong Sinfonietta conducted by Judith Yan provided live accompaniment from Tchaikovsky’s seductive score.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 《胡桃夾子》是香港芭蕾舞團每年一度的聖誕長青芭蕾舞劇，故事背景由法國作家大仲馬改編傳統故事而成，配合柴可夫斯基異想天開的音樂，成為了芭蕾舞劇中的不朽經典作品。 從1892年12月在聖彼德堡的馬林斯基劇院首演到現在，《胡桃夾子》的傳奇成為了世界各地、大人及小朋友心目中聖誕傳統的一部分，由著名指揮家葉詠詩／廖國敏率領香港小交響樂團現場演奏柴可夫斯基的悠揚樂曲，加上瑰麗悅目的佈景及服飾，是適合一家大小的聖誕節精選節目。
About the Programme: A long-running, annual Christmas production of The Hong Kong Ballet, this classic favourite is set to Tchaikovsky's whimsical music and based on a traditional tale adapted by the French writer, Alexandre Dumas. The Nutcracker ballet was first performed at St Petersburg's Mariinsky Theatre in December 1892. It has since become a magical part of Christmas tradition for adults and children all over the world. The music was performed live by Hong Kong Sinfonietta and conducted by Yip Wing Sie and Lio Kuok Man in alternate performances. With the sumptuous set and costumes, making a delightful spectacle, the show was a magnificent ballet as always, a must-see holiday show for families.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目名稱: 威廉．科西的編舞靈感大師班
Programme Name: The Choreographic Process of Forsythe Master Class
地點: 香港文化中心大劇院後台GR2 排練室
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre Backstage Rehearsal Room GR2
venue.1: 香港文化中心大劇院後台八樓排演室GR2
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre Backstage Rehearsal Room GR2

節目簡介: 跟編舞家王新鵬及威廉．科西的指定排練導師Agnes Noltenius和Thierry Guiderdoni，解構創作過程，細述巴赫與芭蕾的微妙關係，觀眾更可率先欣賞舞團演出精彩選段。
About the Programme: Choreographer Wang Xinpeng and Forsythe’s répétiteur, Agnes Noltenius and Thierry Guiderdoni, shared with the audience their creative process and how Bach has been an inspiration for different ballet masters. The audience also had an exclusive opportunity to see a preview of the programme performed by The Hong Kong Ballet Dancers.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Studio Theatre
主辦單位: 香港藝術節協會有限公司
Presenter: Hong Kong Arts Festival Society Limited
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目名稱: 漫談《天鵝湖》：精選舞段優先睇
Programme Name: The Secrets behind the Enduring Romantic Classic: Insights into Swan Lake, with dance preview
節目簡介: 家傳戶曉的《天鵝湖》憑什麼成為不朽經典？這次免費講座透過影像及舞蹈員現身說法，深入淺出剖析《天鵝湖》的精髓，讓觀眾從劇中人物的肢體語言、民族舞段、編舞特色等多角度認識《天鵝湖》，並率先欣賞舞團現場演出該劇之選段。
About the Programme: Why is Swan Lake the most famous classical ballet of all time? This was the topic of discussion at this lecture, which was supplemented with images and interviews with dancers. The audience also had an exclusive opportunity to see a preview of the programme performed by The Hong Kong Ballet Dancers.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Studio Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

Programme Name: A Preview of Galaxy- International Ballet Gala 2009
節目簡介: 藝術總監區美蓮為觀眾介紹此次芭蕾匯演，觀眾更率先欣賞舞團演出精彩選段。
About the Programme: Artistic Director Madeleine Onne gave an introduction to the gala. The audience had an exclusive opportunity to see a preview by the dancers of the Company.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Studio Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

Programme Name: Preview of Cinderella - the truly popular and everlasting fairy-tale
節目簡介: 芭蕾舞劇《仙履奇緣》如何運用音樂和編舞，把一個繽紛夢幻的童話故事活靈活現的呈現出來？講者細說此劇的精髓，介紹當中的默劇及展示戲服。觀眾不但欣賞到舞團演出精彩選段，更與舞者對話。
About the Programme: How does the use of music and choreography in the full length ballet Cinderella help tell this magical story? The speaker illustrated its essence and interesting facts, including an introduction to mime and a presentation of the costumes. The talk was accompanied by a dance preview by the dancers of the Company, who also met the audience in a sharing session.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Studio Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目名稱: 《羅密歐與茱麗葉》幕後優先睇
Programme Name: The Making of Romeo and Juliet
節目簡介: 觀眾被邀到舞團的專用排舞室欣賞《羅密歐與茱麗葉》的排練過程，瞭解幕後製作花絮，更與助理編舞安德烈▪路易斯(加拿大溫尼伯皇家芭蕾舞團藝術總監)對話。
About the Programme: The audience went behind the scenes of Romeo and Juliet with a visit to the backstage rehearsal room. They gained an exclusive look into the rehearsal process with the dancers, and there was also an insightful chat session with André Lewis, Artistic Director of the Royal Winnipeg Ballet, who is the assistant to the ballet’s choreographer.
地點: 香港文化中心大劇院後台8 樓GR3 排舞室
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre Backstage Rehearsal Room GR3
venue.1: 香港文化中心大劇院後台八樓排演室GR3
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre Backstage Rehearsal Room GR3

節目簡介: 香港演藝學院舞蹈學院芭蕾舞系講師劉燕玲(前香港芭蕾舞團首席舞蹈員)重踏大劇院舞台，在優美佈景襯托下，與觀眾分享曾經演繹茱麗葉一角的心得，細說此劇的精髓及其編舞特色。觀眾不但欣賞到舞團演出精彩選段，更與舞者對話。
About the Programme: The audience joined Stella Lau, Lecturer of School of Dance (Ballet) of the Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts, and former Principal Dancer of The Hong Kong Ballet in this special talk that explored the essence of this production. The talk took place on the splendid set, and Stella spoke from her experience of performing the role of Juliet.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

Programme Name: A Preview of Symphony of Movements - an eclectic mix of classical and contemporary styles
節目簡介: 三段不同的舞蹈，三種迥異的風格，卻帶著微妙的共通點，交織成《冬之舞樂祭》。講者與觀眾細說是次演出背後的構思、剖析每段舞蹈的精髓、介紹三位編舞家不同的風格等。其中《三樂章交響曲》的編舞家克里斯特及製作人安妮珍史林親身與觀眾分享他們的創作靈感及幕後點滴。觀眾更欣賞到舞團演出精彩選段。
About the Programme: The Hong Kong Ballet’s Artistic Director Madeleine Onne shared her ideas behind Symphony of Movements in this special session. Ms Onne highlighted the essence of each work and introduced the styles of the three distinctive choreographers. The audience also had an exclusive opportunity to enjoy a dance preview by the company.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Studio Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目名稱: 《糊塗爆竹賀新年》幕後綵排優先睇
節目簡介: 觀眾率先目睹舞團的綵排實況。編舞伍宇烈及聯合編舞江上悠亦與觀眾分享幕後點滴。
About the Programme: The audience saw the rehearsal process of Firecracker in this studio visit. Yuri Ng, Choreographer and Yuh Egami, Associate Choreographer,shared their process and thoughts with the audience.
地點: 香港文化中心大劇院後台8 樓GR2 排舞室
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre Backstage Rehearsal Room GR2
venue.1: 香港文化中心大劇院後台八樓排演室GR2
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre Backstage Rehearsal Room GR2

節目名稱: 《芭蕾進化論》 — 芭蕾歷史從頭講
Programme Name: The Evolution of Ballet: A Close Look
節目簡介: 舞團的藝術總監區美蓮與教育及外展部總監龍世儀以學術性角度為觀眾介紹芭蕾發展史和當中的重要人物，剖析由古至今最具代表性的芭蕾風格和技巧的不同之處。配合錄像及舞蹈員現場示範演出，觀眾能在短時間內瞭解芭蕾舞的發展。
About the Programme: Madeleine Onne, Artistic Director of The Hong Kong Ballet and Shirley Loong, Director of Education and Outreach gave an overview of ballet’s evolution over time, and the important figures central to its development.   The talk was complemented by video clips and dancers’ demonstrations which helped compare different styles and techniques of ballet across the centuries, giving a closer look to this artform.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Studio Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目名稱: 《芭蕾進化論》幕後綵排優先睇: 芭蕾舞導師專場
Programme Name: The Evolution of Ballet Rehearsal Visit: An Exclusive Invitation to Ballet School teachers
節目簡介: 為進一步推動芭蕾舞藝術的發展，香港芭蕾舞團特別為一眾芭蕾舞導師舉行一場《芭蕾進化論》「幕後綵排優先睇」。
About the Programme: The Hong Kong Ballet hosted a special rehearsal visit for The Evolution of Ballet exclusively for ballet school teachers.
地點: 葵青劇院1 樓排演室
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre 1/F Rehearsal Room
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Rehearsal Room

節目簡介: 觀眾深入舞團於香港文化中心大劇院後台的排舞室，率先目睹舞團的綵排實況，近距離欣賞舞蹈員的風采。藝術總監區美蓮及《光與影之間》的排練導師史蒂芬▪艾蒂安更與觀眾分享幕後點滴。
About the Programme: In this Studio visit backstage at Hong Kong Cultural Centre, the audience saw the rehearsal process of Brilliant Steps. Artistic Director Madeleine Onne and Steven Etienne, répétiteur of In light and Shadow also shared their process and thoughts with the audience.
地點: 香港文化中心大劇院後台8 樓GR3 排舞室
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre Backstage Rehearsal Room GR3
venue.1: 香港文化中心大劇院後台八樓排演室GR3
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre Backstage Rehearsal Room GR3

節目名稱: 與您暢談《 夢偶情緣》
Programme Name: Coppélia: More Than a Comic Ballet
節目簡介: 舞團的藝術總監區美蓮與教育及外展部總監龍世儀與觀眾暢談《夢偶情緣》的有趣內容及分享台前幕後的製作點滴。一起重溫第一齣《夢偶情緣》成為喜劇芭蕾經典作的成功要素。觀眾除可預先觀賞到部分精采的民族舞選段，更即場與舞蹈員直接對話。
About the Programme: Madeleine Onne, Artistic Director of The Hong Kong Ballet and Shirley Loong, Director of Education and Outreach shared the story highlights and the production process of Coppélia with the audience who also had an exclusive opportunity to enjoy a dance preview by the company.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Studio Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

Programme Name: Studio Visit: The Making of New Moon
節目簡介: 觀眾將深入舞團於香港文化中心大劇院後台的排舞室，率先目睹舞團的綵排實況，近距離欣賞舞蹈員的風采。藝術總監區美蓮，以及幾位參與《月舞》的香港芭蕾舞團舞蹈員暨編舞家，連同來自加拿大的編舞彼得‧奎安斯與觀眾談天說地及分享幕後點滴。
About the Programme: The audience visited the backstage studio at the Hong Kong Cultural Centre to watch the rehearsal process of New Moon. Artistic Director Madeleine Onne, five dancers/choreographers from the company and the guest choreographer Peter Quanz from Canada also shared their working process with the audience, followed by a chat session.
地點: 香港文化中心大劇院後台8 樓GR3 排舞室
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre Backstage Rehearsal Room GR3
venue.1: 香港文化中心大劇院後台八樓排演室GR3
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre Backstage Rehearsal Room GR3

節目簡介: 舞團的藝術總監區美蓮為觀眾剖析《睡美人》如何成為經典的芭蕾舞劇，介紹它在編舞及音樂上的特色等。編舞辛西婭▪哈維(前英國皇家芭蕾舞團首席舞蹈員)和服裝及佈景設計師馬克▪貝利更與觀眾會面，暢談創作心得及分享幕後點滴。觀眾不但率先欣賞舞團演出精彩選段，更可與舞者對話。
About the Programme: The Hong Kong Ballet’s Artistic Director Madeleine Onne highlighted the essence, music and characteristics of the Sleeping Beauty together with Choreographer Cynthia Harvey and Set and Costume Designer Mark Bailey. The talk was accompanied with a preview by the company dancers, who also met the audience in a sharing session.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Studio Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目名稱: 絲路藝術節《絲路尋蹤 — 藝術展‧演》
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Exhibition Hall
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall Exhibition Hall

節目簡介: 《尼金斯基》2006年於香港首演時四場火速爆滿，並於翌年3月在北京載譽重演。CCDC舞者幻化成尼金斯基不同的理性與感性狀態，把這位二十世紀傳奇男舞者在舞台與三十年瘋人院的生活詭異地融為一體，展現他那令人驚歎的舞姿和藝術成就背後的一段充滿曲折的悲劇人生。成功吸引無數北京觀眾的目光。
About the Programme: Xing Liang, “Star of the Century” in the Chinese modern dance field, shows his exquisite talent in this breathtaking piece about Nijinsky, the “God of Dance.” In this rarely seen all-male full-length feature, Xing is intrigued by Nijinsky’s madness and notorious life and enters into a soul-searching dialogue with the legendary dance genius across space and time.
Venue: Beijing Haidian Theatre
主辦單位: 北京雷動天下現代舞蹈團
venue_en: Beijing Haidian Theatre

節目簡介: 城市當代舞蹈團三位七十年代出生、八十年代成長的編舞龐智筠、黃狄文和楊雲濤，在廿一世紀的今日倒轉時代巨輪，分別透過三齣不同風格的全新舞作，細數電視流行文化、男歡女愛以至戲夢人生，找尋漸受遺忘的集體回憶。
About the Programme: Recounting their reminiscences of Hong Kong, CCDC’s choreographers Noel Pong, Dominic Wong and Yang Yuntao showed their journeys to adulthood: from kids addicted to TV, to young people experiencing bittersweet romance and later sophisticated adults partying their nights away. C’est la vie, C’est l’amour took audiences down memory lane in search of faded collective memories.
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

節目名稱: 第四屆廣東現代舞周《蕭斯塔科維奇密碼》(原名：《證言》)
Programme Name: The 4th Guangdong Modern Dance Festival Testimony
節目簡介: 駐團編舞黎海寧從備受爭議的蕭斯達高維契回憶錄《證言》出發，並選用蕭氏的經典樂章，解構這位俄國一代音樂巨匠背後的荒誕與狂想，成為第四屆廣東現代舞周重點節目之一。
About the Programme: Inspired by the life and music of Soviet composer Dmitri Shostakovich, choreographer Helen Lai interpreted the music of Shostakovich and revealed the absurdity of his time in Testimony. It was the highlight of the 4th Guangdong Modern Dance Festival.
Venue: Guangzhou Friendship Theatre
主辦單位: 廣東星海現代舞蹈藝術有限公司
Presenter: Guangdong Xinghai Modern Dance Arts Lim
venue_en: Guangzhou Friendship Theatre

節目簡介: 中國三大現代舞團──城市當代舞蹈團、廣東現代舞團及北京雷動天下現代舞團繼2005年美國華盛頓甘廼廸中心「中國文化節」聯袂演出後再度匯聚香江，呈獻三齣風格迥異的作品，為香港特別行政區成立十周年慶祝活動之一，並獲得觀眾熱烈回響。
About the Programme: Building on the success of their critically acclaimed debut in the Kennedy Centre’s Festival of China in 2005, Awakening showcased the exquisite artistry of the three leading modern dance companies, CCDC, Guangdong Modern Dance Company and BeijingDance / LDTX, in China. It was one of the celebration activities for the 10th Anniversary of the establishment of the HKSAR and captivated a large audience.
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 為慶祝香港回歸祖國十周年，舞團獲邀為首都觀眾呈獻《銀雨》，把多段揚威海外的經典作品共冶一爐，展現香港多姿多采的藝術文化。觀眾反應熱烈，並吸引當地媒體作焦點報道。
About the Programme: CCDC gave two performances of Silver Rain in Beijing to celebrate the 10th anniversary of the establishment of the HKSAR. Apart from acclaims from the enthusiastic audience, media in Beijing also showed great interest in CCDC and contemporary dance in Hong Kong.
Venue: Beijing Dong Fang Xian Feng Theatre
主辦單位: 北京雷動天下現代舞蹈團
venue_en: Beijing Dong Fang Xian Feng Theatre

節目簡介: 中國三大現代舞團總指揮曹誠淵，與以糅合中西音樂特色見稱的作曲家陳慶恩，以南北朝名將蘭陵王為藍本，透過希臘劇場的表現形式呈現這位悲情王子的傳奇。CCDC舞者邢亮、黃狄文、楊雲濤及陳宜今分別於四段舞蹈——「秀美之章」、「假面之師」、「勝利之鑰」及「死亡之杯」中飾演蘭陵王，聯同九位獨當一面的音樂家組合在城牆上現場演奏，成為2007年舞蹈界與音樂界的一大盛事。
About the Programme: Created by the artistic leader of the three leading Chinese modern dance companies Willy Tsao teams up with award-winning composer Chan Hing-yan to reveal the complexity of Warrior Lanling. CCDC dancers Xing Liang, Dominic Wong, Yang Yuntao and Chan Yi Jing star as four stages of Warrior Lanling and take the audience through the immortal legend behind the mask, together with the live ensemble that fuses instruments from East and West.
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 舞團應香港駐美國經濟貿易辦事處邀請，在美國華盛頓及三藩市演出經典薈萃《銀雨》，向美國觀眾展現香港高水準的舞蹈作品。其中在華盛頓的演出更安排於世界銀行會議期間舉行，演出由財政司司長曾俊華先生擔任主禮嘉賓，觀眾包括美國衆議院議員和國際銀行家。
About the Programme: Invited by The Hong Kong Economic and Trade Offices in the United States, CCDC performed Silver Rain in Washington D.C. and San Francisco, presenting the multifaceted contemporary dance culture of Hong Kong to an American audience. The performance in Washington D.C. was held during the period of Annual Meeting of The World Bank Group. Mr John Tsang Chun-wah, Financial Secretary of the HKSAR, was the officiating guest for the performance, while the audience included the members of the House of Representatives of the United States and international bankers.
地點: 華盛頓華納劇場 (21.10.2007) 及　三藩市Yerba Buena Center for the Arts　（25.10.2007）
Venue: Warner Theatre, Washington D.C. (21.10.2007) &  Yerba Buena Center for the Arts, San Francisco (25.10.2007)
主辦單位: 香港駐美國經濟貿易辦事處
Presenter: The Hong Kong Economic and Trade Office in the United States
venue.1: 華盛頓華納劇場  及　三藩市Yerba Buena Center for the Arts　（25.10.2007）
venue_en: Warner Theatre, Washington D.C.  &  Yerba Buena Center for the Arts, San Francisco

節目簡介: 駐團編舞黎海寧以世上迄今唯一的女性文字「女書」為切入點，並以香港女作家的小說為靈感，用舞蹈書寫古今女性的情感，是黎氏繼《女體之感動》及《女人心事》後探討女性題材的「女性三部曲」壓卷之作，《女書》更憑著黎海寧出色的編舞及舞者楊怡孜的奪目演出奪得兩項「香港舞蹈年獎2008」。
About the Programme: Inspired by the alluringly embroidered nüshu missives, as well as the shimmering prose of two contemporary Hong Kong females writers, Xi Xi and Wong Bik-wan, Resident Choreographer Helen Lai told HerStory through the perceptive artistry of CCDC dancers. HerStory has swept two Hong Kong Dance Awards in 2008 and is proved to be Lai’s magnum opus on the subject of women.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Studio Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 香港現代舞壇三代攜手呼風喚雨，創造一場史無前例的季節性效應﹗曹誠淵及劉兆銘的《生之白》從電影大師黑澤明夢中意境出發，捕捉白布嫲嫲人生最刻骨銘心的一刻；梅卓燕卸下女性與歷史的包袱，進入春夏秋冬以外無以名狀的《第N季節》，引發惹人遐思的變異；黃狄文的《忽然四季》顛覆韋華第的經典音樂，化成CCDC舞者施展渾身解數的十二種變奏。
About the Programme: Three generations of dance-makers in Hong Kong create seasonal mood swings that make an impact on us comparable to that of La Niña on the weather. Maestros Willy Tsao and Lau Siu-ming re-create memorable scenes from the dreams of 20th century film giant Akira Kurosawa in their work The Unbearable Whiteness of Life; Mui Cheuk-yin wanders into the Season N in a mesmerising exploration of the unknown, free of gender and historical issues; in Xtremely Four Seasons, Dominic Wong challenges Gidon Kremer as he, together with the dancers of CCDC, attempts to create 12 variations on Vivaldi ’s Four Seasons.
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Theatre

節目簡介: 以世上迄今唯一的女性文字「女書」為切入點，並以香港女作家的小說為靈感的《女書》憑著黎海寧出色的編舞及舞者楊怡孜的奪目演出奪得兩項「香港舞蹈年獎2008」。舞作更於首演翌年於首屆北京國際現代舞周中亮相。
About the Programme: Inspired by the alluringly embroidered nüshu missives, as well as the shimmering prose of two contemporary Hong Kong females writers, Xi Xi and Wong Bik-wan, choreographer Helen Lai told HerStory through the perceptive artistry of CCDC dancers. HerStory has swept two Hong Kong Dance Awards in 2008 and is proved to be Lai’s magnum opus on the subject of women. It was invited to perform at the Beijing International Dance Festival the year after its premiere in Hong Kong.
Venue: Beijing Tian Qiao Theatre
主辦單位: 北京雷動天下現代舞團及中國國家芭蕾舞團
Presenter: Beijing LDTX Modern Dance Company & The National Ballet of China
venue_en: Beijing Tian Qiao Theatre

節目簡介: 城市當代舞蹈團應意大利羅馬音樂基金的邀請，前往羅馬代表香港為「走近中國」文化節演出，以經典薈萃之作《銀雨》展現香港多姿多采的文化面貌。
About the Programme: CCDC was invited by The Fondazione Musica per Roma to perform its signature repertoire Silver Rain in the Festival of Chinese Culture held in Rome. CCDC showcases the multi-faceted culture of Hong Kong to the audience from all over the world.
Venue: Auditorium Parco della Musica, Rome
主辦單位: 中華人民共和國文化部及意大利羅馬音樂基金
Presenter: The Fondazione Musica per Roma with the support of the Ministry of Culture of the People\'s Republic of China
venue_en: Auditorium Parco della Musica, Rome

節目簡介: 「跨世紀之星」邢亮摒除各家門派，不受主義的束縛，脫離理所當然的軌跡，在理性與感性之間尋找框框以外的可能，讓舞者來一次「行動藝術」，將觀眾帶入一個非常邢亮的舞蹈世界——天馬行空，來去自在，可以自立規矩，達至完全精神自由境界。邢亮以似有還無的章法，在聚光燈下驚鴻一筆，與抽象派大師康定斯基神交，於三維空間呈現立體點線面，挑戰觀眾對舞蹈的既有觀念。
About the Programme: Xing Liang—one of the mainland’s most creative dancer-choreographers—approaches his performance-art project with a strong conviction of the purity of dance and its dignity as art. The result is Out Of The Box, personal, detached, uncaring of any isms, yet compelling and engaging with the strongest cogency.            Inspired by Kandinsky’s abstract paintings, Out of the Box presents an all-round picture of Xing’s talents as a dancer-choreographer and takes the audience into a world that is uniquely Xing’s, the quest for the unorthodox, the depth of his understanding of the nonverbal world of body language, and ultimately, Xing’s challenge to audience expectations of dance.
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目名稱: 第五屆廣東現代舞周──《女書》
Programme Name: The 5th Guangdong Modern Dance Festival HerStory
節目簡介: 以世上迄今唯一的女性文字「女書」為切入點，並以香港女作家的小說為靈感的《女書》憑著黎海寧出色的編舞及舞者楊怡孜的奪目演出奪得兩項「香港舞蹈年獎2008」。舞作繼香港首演及首屆北京國際現代舞周中亮相後，再於第五屆廣東現代舞周重演。
About the Programme: Inspired by the alluringly embroidered nüshu missives, as well as the shimmering prose of two contemporary Hong Kong females writers, Xi Xi and Wong Bik-wan, choreographer Helen Lai told HerStory through the perceptive artistry of CCDC dancers. HerStory has swept two Hong Kong Dance Awards in 2008 and is proved to be Lai’s magnum opus on the subject of women. It was invited to perform at the 5th Guangdong Modern Dance Festival this year after its premiere in Hong Kong in 2007 and  showcase in Beijing International Dance Festival.
Venue: Guangzhou Huanghuagang Theatre
主辦單位: 廣東星海演藝集團及城市當代舞蹈團
Presenter: Xinghai Performing Arts Development Group & City Contemporary Dance Company
venue_en: Guangzhou Huanghuagang Theatre

節目名稱: 《365種係定唔係東方主義》意大利羅韋雷托之旅
Programme Name: 365 Ways of Doing and Undoing Orientalism, Rome, Rovereto Tour
節目簡介: 由中國現代舞先鋒曹誠淵夥拍「跨世紀之星」邢亮及桑吉加編創的《365種係定唔係東方主義》，玩盡西方人眼中「東方主義」的陳腔濫調，由古典芭蕾舞、中國民間舞至戲曲身韻，展示對「東方主義」的質疑與反思。《365》自2002年於香港首演後大受歡迎，曾獲邀於澳洲布里斯本、美國侯斯頓、洛杉磯及紐約等地演出，大獲好評，為城市當代舞蹈團的經典舞碼之一。是次獲「東方國際文化節」邀請，於意大利羅韋雷托上演這現代經典。
About the Programme: 365 Ways of Doing and Undoing Orientalism is a trademark production of CCDC choreographed by celebrated choreographer Willy Tsao and modern dance stars Xing Liang and Sang Jijia. As a highly popular repertoire, it has been widely toured to different places, including Brisbane, Houston, Los Angeles and New York since its premiere in 2002. Through an exotic display of “oriental” elements from Peking Opera to the representation of Zen, 365 casts doubts on the West’s fascination with the Orient. This signature repertoire of CCDC was invited to perform at the Oriente Occidente Festival at Rovereto, Italy
Venue: Teatro Sociale, Trento
venue_en: Teatro Sociale, Trento

節目簡介: 香港編舞界紅人伍宇烈將德國作曲家寇特‧威爾及當代戲劇泰斗布萊希特經典《七宗罪》煎皮拆骨，將當中的懶惰、傲慢、憤怒、暴食、色慾、貪婪、妒忌獨立包裝，分拆上市；CCDC舞者與商業電台叱吒得獎獨立樂隊朱凌凌主音朱柏謙將化身成一千零一個賣肉求榮的小人物：一個肢解身體的連環殺手「特技男」、一個愛的收藏家、一群將靈魂肉體和自己的一生拿來拍賣的瑪莉蓮夢露，以低溫低價低密度低市盈率，將高清高檔高回報高實用率的七情六慾賣俾你﹗
About the Programme: Yuri Ng’s murder mystery production employing scenes from Bertolt Brecht’s The Seven Deadly Sins as well as songs by Kurt Weill. Local canto-pop rising star Chu Pak-him teams up with CCDC dancers to tell the stories of one thousand and one “no-bodies” who sell their bodies for honour: a stunt serial-killer; a love collector; a Marilyn Monroe… The medieval taboos:  Lust, Gluttony, Greed, Sloth, Wrath, Envy and Pride, are re-packaged into something that is cheap and yet sensational.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Studio Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 駐團編舞黎海寧在城市當代舞蹈團三十周年舞季的頭炮作品《永無休止》中向已故波蘭電影大師奇斯洛夫斯基致敬，她以奇氏的御用作曲家捷碧尼爾‧柏拉斯拿紀念奇氏的《安魂曲》為主調，以舞蹈與奇氏神交，帶觀眾遊走於肉體與靈魂的流離國度，譜成打動影癡舞迷的舞蹈詩篇。
About the Programme: Inspired by the masterpieces of Polish film director Krzysztof Kieslowski, Resident Choreographer Helen Lai shares her passion for the late Kieslowski\'s vision in her work No End by exploring the themes and motifs in his films, namely the uncertainties of life, the mystery of death, the accidental encounters, the never-ending waiting and searching. Set to the Requiem written by his long-time collaborating composer Zbigniew Preisner to commemorate the legendary director, No End is a poetic dialogue between a choreographer and a filmmaker.
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 大型舞劇《塵埃落定》以充滿雪域高原風情的舞蹈、神秘獨特、豪情激昂的西藏音樂、如雲霞般華美的藏族服飾，豐富舞劇的思想性、藝術性、觀賞性。 舞劇首演榮獲「香港舞蹈年獎2007」演員獎及服裝設計獎：主演的首席舞蹈員劉迎宏藉著其精湛的演繹，驕健的舞姿獲得讚譽；服裝設計崔炳華創作出一套套美輪美奐、色彩斑斕，並兼顧傳統藏族特色的舞台服裝，為演出增添姿彩。
About the Programme: Epic dance drama Red Poppies takes this unique story to the stage, enriching it with invigorating dance, mysterious music, and sumptuous costume in the Tibetan style.  The premiere of this dance drama won the Dancer Award and Costume Designer Award of the “Hong Kong Dance Awards 2007”. The Principal Dancer, Liu Yinghong was praised for his excellent interpretation and strength in dance. The Costume Designer, Cui Pinghua was awarded for his creative design of costumes that captured traditional Tibetan ethnic characteristics as well as adding colour and style to the stage performance.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
演出/製作: 黃磊
Cast and Production: Huang Lui
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 八幕觸動您每分神經的實驗舞蹈
About the Programme: 8 experimental dance pieces that touch your every single nerve.
Venue: HKDC 8/F Platform
venue_en: HKDC 8/F Platform

Programme Name: Little Panda in a Big Big World
節目簡介: 充滿生機的地球上，住著兩隻漂亮可愛的小熊貓──嘻嘻和哈哈。環境污染和無情的獵殺，打破了小熊貓們安寧的家。嘻嘻不幸離開了，哈哈痛失伴侶。人類將哈哈帶到馬戲團悉心照料，希望用關心來撫平哈哈的心靈創傷。他們讓哈哈住在精緻的籠子裏，又跟哈哈談心和教他做各種動作。哈哈成了馬戲團的明星，為觀眾帶來歡愉，但哈哈自己並不快樂。最後團員終於明白，他們愛哈哈，就得讓小熊貓哈哈回到充滿自然生機的家。
About the Programme: Two cute little pandas, Hehe and Haha, live in a natural habitat. Hehe left Haha unfortunately, and the human beings bring the mourning Haha back to a circus, where they try to comfort him with love. They prepare a beautiful cage for him and teach him all kinds of tricks. Haha soon becomes the star of the circus, making his audience happy while he himself remains sad. Finally the circus members understand that loving Haha means respecting his choice of home. Instead of the circus, our little panda finds his home in a wood filled with the earth\'s vitality.
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Theatre

節目簡介: 你我踩在時間的鋼索上感受活著的喜樂憂愁
About the Programme: Tiptoeing on a steel wire of time, you and I feel a spectrum of emotions of being alive
Venue: HKDC 8/F Platform
venue_en: HKDC 8/F Platform

節目簡介: 《如夢令》展示了表現性的舞蹈，如何以身體舞動的形式，結合中國戲曲裏常用的寶貝，如水袖、絲扇、劍與傘等，延展着身體，並強化了表達的訊息。《如夢令》的「基本幻象」或姿勢，是生命力的展現與情感的符號。看的人也在舞著夢著，融入於生命的追逐、璀璨、平靜與釋放，抖擻於連串動人的片段裏。
About the Programme: Presented as an expressive dance piece, Dream Dances demonstrates how body movement collaborates with Chinese operatic treasure, namely water sleeves, fan, sword and umbrella; dancing body hence stretched, message passed hence strengthened. Dream Dances hallucinates the poise of dynamic vitality and emotion on stage. Dreaming and dancing, viewers are indulged in a life of pursuance, glamour, tranquility and liberation, move along a series of tender scenes.
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 笑看成敗兩手牽， 傲雪孤松立深淵， 江山代出英豪傑， 湖海恩仇付輕煙。 正圓柱方皮囊相,, 邪魔聖神影偕雙， 無邊紛擾人間世， 界別難分拚死傷。
About the Programme: Holding your hands, at all successes and failures I am smiling. Facing the cliff, a lonely pine tree is proudly standing. Generations of heroes, Gratitude and resentment every one forgoes. Physical bodies all look different. A saint always has a devil as accompaniment. Our world full of quarrels, The battle between good and evil helps nothing but to confuse our morals.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
演出/製作: 黃磊
Cast and Production: Huang Lui
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 在遼闊無際的大山大水間，一條破舊的小渡船、一個天真無邪的女孩、一對手足情深的兄弟，交織成一個情懷含蓄而浪漫的鄉情故事。 翠翠自小與爺爺相依為命，以撐渡船為生。十多歲的翠翠分別於兩年的端陽，認識了碼頭總管的二名兒子，兄弟倆同時愛上翠翠，決議輪流唱山歌競取翠翠芳心。 大老自知技不如二老，毅然引退，下河去了。不料，卻掉進漩渦中淹死。二老把事件歸咎於爺爺拿不定主意，一氣之下，出走到桃園。爺爺不久去世，只剩下翠翠孑然一身，日夜昐望心中的二老回來。
About the Programme: Against a background of towering mountains, Cuicui has always lived with her grandfather and the two make their living by plying a small ferry boat. At two Mid-Autumn Festivals, teenaged Cuicui met the two brothers who are in charge of the pier respectively. They both fall in love with her. The two young men decide to compete for Cuicui’s love by holding a singing contest. On the eve of the competition, Older Brother, who knows that his singing ability is not as strong as his brother’s, decides to withdraw and goes down-river. An unexpectedly turbulent maelstrom causes his death by drowning. Younger Brother blames the Grandfather’s indecisiveness for his brother’s death and leaves in anger. Soon after this, Grandfather dies of an acute illness. Cuicui is left alone and lonely. She gazes in the distance, awaiting the return of Younger Brother.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
製作/演出單位: 香港舞蹈團及演戲家族
Production / Performing Unit: Hong Kong Dance Company and the Actors’ Family
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

Programme Name: The Smiling, Proud Wanderer - Shanghai Performance
Venue: Shanghai Grand Theatre
主辦單位: 恒生銀行有限公司上海分行
演出/製作: 黃磊
Cast and Production: Huang Lui
venue_en: Shanghai Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 《清明上河圖》舞蹈詩在展現中國傳統文化的基礎上，以活現長卷為主題，廣納豐富的中原舞蹈文化，作為表演的素材，〈百戲〉中更融入了不同的傳統舞蹈，包括「社火巡遊」、戲曲中的「走鞭趟馬」等，呈現京城中歌伎賣藝，百戲雜耍紛陳的熱鬧場面。還有「划旱船」及「漁燈」等，千姿百態的中原舞蹈，復添上現代藝術質感，使傳統民間舞蹈更顯活力，讓人發思古之幽情，隨著舞者的步伐走進令人目眩神迷的繁華盛世。
About the Programme: The theme of the epic dance Qingming Riverside is to make the tableau on the handscroll come to life on stage, using the richness and wealth of Chinese dance culture as basic materials for the performance, with the aim of promoting traditional Chinese culture. And in the major episode of “Vaudeville”, there is a variety of traditional dances like ‘Fire Parade’, and dance steps from Chinese operas, such as, ‘Cracking the Horsewhip’ and ‘Round Table’. These steps describe the bustling scene of the travelling troupes and acrobats in the city. Other dance pieces included are ‘Rowing on Dry Land’ and ‘Fishing Lights’. These various traditional folk dances are all infused with a sense of modernity, which charges them with a lot of energy and dynamic. That will lead the beholders of this magnificent epic dance into an enchanting realm of antiquity. Following the steps and rhythm of the dancers, the audience will enter into a magical and dazzling world of wealth and prosperity.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
演出/製作: 黃磊
Cast and Production: Huang Lui
得獎名單 (比賽): 2008「第十屆廣東藝術節」中獲得「藝術特別大獎」及「編導一等獎」
Awardee List: Qingming Riverside received the Hong Kong Dance Award 2008, and the Special Grand Award and the First Class Award for Choreography and Directorship at the Tenth Guangdong Arts Festiva
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 傳說，遠方的瀑布之上，仙子在翩翩起舞，那一刻是世間最美的景象……小時候的胡樂，聽著攝影師爸爸說這故事。一天，為了捕捉那最美的剎那，爸爸離開了家庭，剩下他和舞蹈員媽媽胡麗仙。兒子默默繼承媽媽的理想，冀望成為出色的舞蹈員。  十年後，胡麗仙昔日的舞蹈拍擋林翔，正組織一隊舞蹈團，希望得到胡麗仙母子的加入。胡樂不理母親的反對決意成為團員，與同樣追求舞蹈藝術的舒玲和凌浩，在舞台上跳一場感動自己，也感動別人的「傳說」
About the Programme: Legend had it that angels dance on a water fall in a distant land and the scene captured the most beautiful moment in the world……this story was told by Hu Le’s father, who was a photographer, in his childhood. One day, his father left home in order to capture the most beautiful moment. His mother, dancer Hu Lixian was left behind with him. The son discreetly continued his mother’s aspiration to be a brilliant dancer.   Ten years later, Lin Xiang, a former dance partner of Hu Lixian, was forming a dance company. Her wanted Hu Lixian and Hu Le to join. Despite the objection of his mother, Hu Le was determined to join. With the same pursuit of the art of dance, young dancers like Shu Ling and Ling Hao with different backgrounds, were ready to plunge into creating a legend that moved themselves on stage as well as others concerned.
Venue: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre
venue_en: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre

節目名稱: 第五屆北京國際舞蹈演出季, 北京演出 -《清明上河圖》
Programme Name: The 5th Beijing International Dance Performance Season, Beijing Performance – Qingming Riverside

venue_en: Beijing China Theatre

節目簡介: 一對正墮入愛河的「後後現代男女」，一日在床上覆雨翻雲之際，竟突然雙雙「叫停」，急忙找上唐滌生遺作《再世紅梅記》中的裴禹和李慧娘，試圖引證自己的「前世真身」；在今夕一遍以「假似道」為情愛花招的世界裡，虛擬著古今女色男歡的愛戀百味……
About the Programme: A boy and a girl from the “post-post-modern world” fall in love.  One day, while they are having wild sex in bed, both of them call halt all of a sudden.  In a blind fury, they go looking for the hero and heroine of “The Reincarnation of Lady Plum Blossom” (the last opera of Tang Tik-sang, the librettist), that is, the scholar Pu Yu and Lady Lee Wai-leung.  In this present world of phoney love and hypocrisy, where exist all types of virtual love and passion, these young lovers seek for these characters in order to find out things about themselves, like who they were in their previous lives.
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目名稱: 第十屆廣東省藝術節東莞演出 -《清明上河圖》
Programme Name: “2008 Guangdong Art Festival”- Dongguan Performance Qingming Riverside
Venue: Dongguan Yulan Theatre
venue_en: Dongguan Yulan Theatre

節目簡介: 山東民族舞「鼓子秧歌大場」，當中祈福，求雨的原始目的性，以道具為表現手段，強調道具與身體媒介間的聯繫。是次創作賦予民族、民間舞更廣闊的現代思考，體現不同地域及文化背景下的異地傳承，探索民間風格制約下舞蹈意識形態的多角度、多樣性開發，尋求原始精神風貌的現代再現。是次創作，演藝學院中國舞系學生們的參與，為演出注入了豐富的生命力。
About the Programme: Shandong Folk Dance Grand Show of Drumming and Rice-Sprout Song expresses such primitive desires like praying for happiness or rain through using props, and highlights the link between props and the body. This piece attributes to folk dance and ethnic dance a wider and modern dimension. It manifests the inheritance of tradition in different geographical location and a different cultural context. Explores the multi-faceted and diverse nature of dance ideology under the folk dance constraints, and seeks a modern representation of primitive essence. The students from the HKAPA (Chinese Dance) contributed to make the show an inspirit work.
Venue: HKDC 8/F Platform
venue_en: HKDC 8/F Platform

節目簡介: 木蘭得悉體弱的老父被召入伍而擔心不已，由於沒有兄長可代，她決定代父從軍。經過多年的征戰，木蘭和同行的將士們結下深厚友情。在戰事結束，回朝受封之際，她郤毅然放棄官位，回家事親。  舞劇通過木蘭非凡的經歷和動人的故事，展現中華民族傳統美德：當中有捨己為人的的孝道和犠牲精神，有為隱藏身份多年而付出的堅持和忍耐。既體現出巾幗不讓鬚眉的氣慨，又盡顯女子温婉、聰慧的本色，並透出中華兒女和平反戰的意義。
About the Programme: Mulan was very worried because the name of his feeble old father was included in the conscription. Lack of an elder brother to take her father’s place, Mulan decided to join the army. After years of battles, Mulan won comradeship among fellow soldiers. At the end of the war, she gave up the award of a high official position at court, in return for a safe return to her home town to take care of her father.   The dance drama demonstrated traditional Chinese virtues through the unusual adventures and moving story of Mulan. There was filial piety and the spirit of sacrifice for the benefit of others. There was perseverance and persistence in hiding one’s identity for years. Mulan was a heroine with moral courage and yet effeminate and intelligent. The dance drama demonstrated the love of peace by the Chinese with an anti-war significance.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
演出/製作: 黃磊
Cast and Production: Huang Lui
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目名稱: 奧運重大文化活動演出之「港澳藝術節 – 相約在北京」--《清明上河圖》
Venue: National Centre
主辦單位: 中華人民共和國文化部, 國家廣播電影電視總局, 北京市人民政府, 北京奧組委

venue_en: National Centre

節目簡介: 爺爺願將大蘋果的種子送給遠方的小孩子，那處是爺爺年輕時曾送信到過的偏遠山區，他希望種子在那裏發芽、成長，讓小朋友分享到新鮮香甜的大蘋果。 孫女為實現爺爺的願望，夢中進入了時光隧道，經過千辛萬苦，終於讓爺爺的願望成真。
About the Programme: Grandpa wishes to give the seeds of a big apple to kids of distant lands where he once visited as a young postman. He hopes that the seeds will germinate, grow and allow children of the remote countryside to taste the fresh sweet big apples.  To pursue grandpa’s wish, the grand daughter enters the time tunnel in a dream. Through lots of hardship, she finally makes her grandpa’s wish come true.
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Theatre

節目名稱: 奧運開幕式前之暖場演出-「馬運之都耀香江」
Programme Name: Opening Ceremony of the Beijing Olympic Games - The Equine Capital Hong Kong
Venue: Bird\'s Nest
Presenter: The Beijing Organizing Committee for the Games
venue_en: Bird\'s Nest

節目簡介: 《香江春》是以環境劇場的空間架構、獨特的舞蹈詞彙，並結合多媒體影像，讓觀眾們與舞者的身體共生的一次舞蹈歷程！
About the Programme: “Hong Kong Spring” is a unique dance vocabulary created with theatre space, dancers’ body language, memories and tales. The audience will join dancers on a multi-media journey of re-birth!
Venue: HKDC 8/F Platform
venue_en: HKDC 8/F Platform

節目簡介: 故事改編自金庸名著《雪山飛狐》及《飛狐外傳》，以群雄奪寶開始，再以兩位主角苗人鳯和胡斐的生死決鬥結束，當中牽著幾段愛恨交纏的感情﹕胡一刀與苗人鳯的相知之情；胡一刀與郎劍秋的真情；胡斐與袁紫衣、程靈素和苗若蘭的三角愛情；寶樹和尚與田歸農的貪婪無情等，掀起世代碧血情仇，結下不解的怨恨，只有天上的飛狐能超然放下，讓仇恨埋在玉筆山莊，像白暟皚的山峰頂天立地，享受無悔無懼的自由。
About the Programme: The story was adapted from “Snow Fox” and “Snow Fox Addendum”, famous novels by Mr. Jin Yong. It started with the scramble for hidden treasures by various parties and ended with the life-and-death duel between Miao Renfeng and Hu Fei. A number of love-and-hate relationships were depicted, including the friendship between Hu Yidao and Miao Renfeng, the love between Hu Yidao and Lang Jianqiu, the affection between Hu Fei and Yuan Ziyi, Cheng Lingsu and Miao Ruolan, and the reckless greed of Monk Baoshu and Tian Guinong. Generations of love and hatred were involved. Only the Snow Fox could bury the hatred in the Jade Brush Mountain Villa and enjoy absolute freedom like the towering snow peaks.
Venue: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre
演出/製作: 黃磊
Cast and Production: Huang Lui
venue_en: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre

Programme Name: “2008 Guangdong Art Festival”-Zhong Shan performance- Qingming Riverside
