venue_en: Zhong Shan Culture & Art Center

節目名稱: 【玫瑰花魂】多媒體舞蹈教育計劃2005/06 結業演出
Programme Name: A Multi-media Dance Education Project 2005/06 “Spirit of the Rose” - Finale Performance
舞蹈類別: 多媒體舞蹈 (芭蕾舞為主)
節目簡介: 節目主題【玫瑰花魂】：玫瑰 - 有漂亮的外表，清新的香味及美艷的色彩，它代表著愛意和愛心；花魂 - 是一個主觀賦予的抽象生命，虛幻而包含著一股不可言喻的力量。【玫瑰花魂】也是一齣富浪漫色彩的芭蕾雙人舞 <<Le Spectre De La Rose>>。節目由來自13間中、小學老師、同學及家長合作演出，除舞蹈演出外，還注入了戲劇、視覺藝術、創意文字、音樂及戲曲的元素，展示參加者在過去十個月的學習成果。
About the Programme: Rose is beautiful. It is fresh and colorful. It represents love. The spirit of the flower is a subjective and abstract living thing which takes on a spirit of its own. “Spirit of the Rose” is also a romantic and colorful ballet pas de deux, “Le Spectre De La Rose”. Students, teachers and parents from 13 primary and secondary schools together with experienced multi-media instructors participated in the performances and showcased their talents on dance and creativities in multi-media (drama, visual arts, creative writing, music and Chinese opera).
Venue: Auditorium, Sha Tin Town Hall
主辦單位: 康樂及文化事務署 及 香港芭蕾舞團
Presenter: The Leisure and Cultural Services Department & The Hong Kong Ballet Limited
製作/演出單位: 香港芭蕾舞團教育及外展部
Production / Performing Unit: The Education and Outreach Department of The Hong Kong Ballet Limited
venue_en: Auditorium, Sha Tin Town Hall

節目名稱: 學校藝術培訓計劃2007/08《迷失的歌碧麗亞》創意芭蕾培訓計劃 結業演出
Programme Name: School Arts Animateur Scheme 2007/08 “In Search of Coppélia” Creative Ballet Animateur Scheme - Finale Performance
舞蹈類別: 多媒體舞蹈 (芭蕾舞為主)
節目簡介: 《迷失的歌碧麗亞》改編自香港芭蕾舞團著名舞劇《夢偶情緣》(Coppélia)。故事發生於十八世紀歐洲的一條小村莊，講述歌柏尼博士花盡心思希望將他最喜愛的木偶歌碧麗亞變成有生命的人類，可惜被史雲達及法蘭茲這對小情侶從中嬉弄至傷心得很。在荒誕而魔幻的喜劇背後，充滿著發人深省的道理。而《迷失的歌碧麗亞》保留著故事中最重要的劇情及主要人物，並加入了老師和同學們的創意而豐富了故事的內容。  節目雲集了多名經驗豐富的媒體導師，由來自11間中、小學老師、同學及家長合作演出，除芭蕾舞蹈演出外，還注入了戲劇及視覺藝術的元素，展示參加者在過去十個月的學習成果。
About the Programme: “In Search of Coppélia” was inspired from The Hong Kong Ballets performance of Coppélia, one of the greatest comic ballets of all time. The story takes place in a European village in the 18th century. It is centered around the old doll-maker Dr Coppélius, who dreams of turning his Coppélia doll into a living, breathing young woman, but was tricked by the energetic young couple Swanilda and Franz until heartbroken. Between the magical and the absurd in the comedy, there are also laughter and tears, compassion and love. “In Search of Coppélia” keeps the main storyline with the addition of creative insight and variation from both students and teachers.    Students, teachers and parents from 11 primary and secondary schools together with experienced multi-media instructors participated in the performances and showcased their talents on dance and creativities in multi-media (drama and visual arts).
Venue: Auditorium, Kwai Tsing Theatre
主辦單位: 康樂及文化事務署 及 香港芭蕾舞團
Presenter: The Leisure and Cultural Services Department & The Hong Kong Ballet Limited
製作/演出單位: 香港芭蕾舞團教育及外展部
Production / Performing Unit: The Education and Outreach Department of The Hong Kong Ballet Limited
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目名稱: 《美女與野獸》多媒體舞蹈教育計劃2006/07 結業演出
Programme Name: A Multi-media Dance Education Project 2006/07 “Beauty and the Beast” - Finale Performance
舞蹈類別: 多媒體舞蹈 (芭蕾舞為主)
節目簡介: 《美女與野獸》是一個耳熟能詳的童話故事，有發人深省的情節內容，道出美與醜，善與惡的相關道理。內容除了主角善良的少女和被變成野獸的王子，還有許多可愛的小人物和具象徵意義的玫瑰花，小朋友和青少年都會容易投入這個富幻想的童話世界，并通過藝術活動，把他們的感受發揮在不同藝術媒體上；無論是肢體語言還是視覺藝術等，都是他們創意的工具，表達的空間。  節目雲集了多名經驗豐富的媒體導師，由來自 14間中、小學老師、同學及家長合作演出，除舞蹈演出外，還注入了戲劇、視覺藝術、創意文字、音樂及戲曲的元素，展示參加者在過去十個月的學習成果。
About the Programme: The well-known fairy tale Beauty and the Beast expresses the truth behind good and evil as well as the meaning of real beauty and love. The main characters, a girl and the wicked beast, are supported magnificently by the lively energy of other characters and beautiful scenery. Children can easily enjoy this fantasy world and expressive creative thought as a result.                Students, teachers and parents from 14 primary and secondary schools together with experienced multi-media instructors participated in the performances and showcased their talents on dance and creativities in multi-media (drama, visual arts, creative writing, music and Chinese opera).
Venue: Auditorium, Tuen Mun Town Hall
主辦單位: 康樂及文化事務署 及 香港芭蕾舞團
Presenter: The Leisure and Cultural Services Department & The Hong Kong Ballet Limited
製作/演出單位: 香港芭蕾舞團教育及外展部
Production / Performing Unit: The Education and Outreach Department of The Hong Kong Ballet Limited
venue_en: Tuen Mun Town Hall, Auditorium

節目名稱: 2008上海、杭州、寧波巡演《吉賽爾》及《空‧色》
Programme Name: 2008 China Tour (Shanghai, Hangzhou, Ningbo), performing Giselle and Clear
節目簡介: 香港芭蕾舞團於2008年10月23日至11月1日圓滿完成中國內地三大城市為期十天共五場的巡迴演出。港芭為上海、杭州及寧波三地觀眾演出浪漫芭蕾舞經典《吉賽爾》和當代舞作《空．色》，首三場演出由客席首席舞員譚元元領銜主演《吉賽爾》。港芭更是首次踏足上海東方藝術中心及杭州大劇院舞台。  這次中國巡演深受上海及浙江等地歡眾歡迎，上座率平均超過百分之八十，演出被讚揚為「一台夢幻般精緻的芭蕾舞盛宴」。10月25至26日的兩場演出全院滿座，更是2008上海國際藝術節的重頭劇碼之一，吸引多位嘉賓及芭蕾舞蹈界名人出席。
About the Programme: The Hong Kong Ballet made a successful 10-day tour to 3 major cities in China from 23 October to 1 November 2008 . The Company gave 5 performances of the Romantic ballet, Giselle, and 4 performances of Clear, a contemporary ballet by Stanton Welch, with an average of over 80% attendance in Shanghai, Hangzhou and Ningbo.  The Company’s performances, starring Guest Principal Dancer Tan Yuan Yuan as Giselle in the first three shows, were received with great enthusiasm and praise. The sold-out performances on 25 & 26 October at the Shanghai Oriental Art Center were part of the distinguished Shanghai International Arts Festival, attracting many important guests and ballet professionals. It was the first time The Hong Kong Ballet performed on the stage of Shanghai Oriental Art Centre and the Hangzhou Grand Theatre. The superb performances attracted widespread media coverage and received great critical acclaim.
Venue: Hangzhou Grand Theatre (10/28-29)/ Ningbo Grand Theatre (11/1)
演出/製作: 張堯
Cast and Production: ZHANG Yao
venue.1: 上海東方藝術中心  / 杭州大劇院  / 寧波大劇院
venue_en: Hangzhou Grand Theatre / Ningbo Grand Theatre

節目名稱: 《框內框外 : 古典 ~ 新編》
節目簡介: 節目以編舞工作坊的形式，發掘及展現香港芭蕾舞團舞者的編舞才能。除六齣港芭舞者的創意短篇外，節目亦選演《天鵝湖》、《睡美人》及《唐吉訶德》精彩選段，帶領觀眾於風格各異的旋律中遨遊，體驗舞者身體與情感的互動。六齣短篇包括：周錦欣的《門內、門外》、陳基琼的《沉》、江上悠的《影》、馬長靖的Swing It! 、李怡燃的《無所謂》及白家樂的There’s a Fly in this Soup。
About the Programme: A choreographic workshop showcased the choreographic talent of The Hong Kong Ballet dancers. The programme featured light-hearted sparkling duet from Swan Lake’s romantic White Adagio, The Sleeping Beauty’s glorious Grand Pas de deux and Don Quixote, as well as six creative short works choreographed by the Company dancers, allowing audience to experience different choreographic style in one performance.    Six short works include : Selina Chau’s Beautiful That Way; Eve Chan’s Falling; Yuh Egami’s KAGÈ; Beh Chang-ching’s Swing It!; Li Yi-ran’s Take it Easy; and Carlo Pacis’ There’s a Fly in this Soup.
地點: 牛池灣文娛中心劇院 (一月) / 西灣河文娛中心 (四月)
Venue: Ngau Chi Wan Civic Theatre Centre (Jan) / Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre Theatre (Apr)
venue.1: 牛池灣文娛中心劇院  / 西灣河文娛中心
venue_en: Ngau Chi Wan Civic Theatre Centre  / Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre, Theatre

節目簡介: 由謝傑斐編導的舞劇取材小說及電影《蘇絲黃的世界》，以上世紀六十年代的香港題材，重新演繹，原創編舞和音樂令舞劇加倍精彩。舞台上霓虹燈閃耀，芭蕾舞者身穿旗袍，腳踏高跟鞋，舞動牛仔舞 與Cha-cha-cha，新鮮耀目。  音樂大師鮑比達身兼作曲、指揮及編曲，率領現場樂隊，演奏新曲舊調。全新編創之樂章以五六十年代叱吒樂壇流行曲點綴，風格多姿、熱鬧精彩。鮑比達更將親自以鋼琴演奏主題曲，由嘉賓張偉文及陳美鳳演繹。
About the Programme: Inspired by the culture-clash romance The World of Suzie Wong, Stephen Jefferies’ chic, captivating ballet, with its vivid and lively Hong Kong setting, cheongsam fashions, premièred in March 2006 at Sha Tin Town Hall and became the most talked-about dance production in town. Following the successful première, the production was re-staged in November 2008.   The ballet’s acute sense of nostalgia is reflected in the original score tempting ballerinas to dance jive and cha-cha-cha in high heels.  Chris Babida, taking the triple role of composition, conducting and music orchestration, leads his big band playing the original score incorporated with pop favourites from the 50s\' and 60s\'. Chris Babida will perform a piano solo for the romantic theme song, sung by special guest vocalists Donald Cheung and May Chan.
地點: 沙田大會堂演奏廳  (三月) /  香港演藝學院歌劇院 (十一月)
Venue: Sha Tin Town Hall Auditorium (March) / The Hong Kong Academy for the Performing Arts Lyric Theatre (November)
venue.1: 沙田大會堂演奏廳   /  香港演藝學院歌劇院
venue_en: Sha Tin Town Hall, Auditorium  / Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts, Lyric Theatre Lyric Theatre

節目簡介: 《睡美人》自原創功臣佩蒂巴於1890年在聖彼得堡首演後，多年來成為編舞家的至愛。謝傑斐以簡潔鮮明的手法，展現《睡美人》出塵之美。  水晶泉、金嗓鳥以至金葡萄仙子舞奪目耀眼；正邪仙子鬥法，各顯光芒；王子與公主由幻象到現實雙雙起舞；還有獨步芭蕾舞壇的玫瑰慢板和悅目的花環舞於宮廷展風姿；藍鳥、貓咪、小紅帽和狼穿梭於森林和瀑布；展現如詩似畫的仙境在柴可夫斯基的動人樂章襯托下，醉人醉心。
About the Programme: The grandest and finest classical ballet, Petipa-Tchaikovsky’s The Sleeping Beauty creates a magic with Charles Perrault’s everlasting romantic story. Being the youngest ever interpreter of the role of Prince Florimund in 1970, Artistic Director Stephen Jefferies reintroduced this timeless masterpiece after Petipa’s original choreography in 1890.  It is a ballet that has everything: romance, poetic symbolism, lyricism, friendship, goodness, darkness, fate and of course love. Princess Aurora, the luckiest sleeping beauty in the world, awakens from her deep sleep with a kiss by Prince Florimund.
Venue: Tuen Mun Town Hall Auditorium
藝術總監: 編舞：佩蒂巴   附加編舞 ：謝傑斐
Name of Artistic Director: Choreography : Marius Petipa; Additional Choreography : Stephen Jefferies
venue_en: Tuen Mun Town Hall, Auditorium

節目簡介: 大衛艾倫以俄羅斯那富夢幻舞台色彩，細說《仙履奇緣》這個浪漫童話經典。艾倫要求舞蹈員用會說話的身軀，把灰姑娘憑著美善的心終獲幸福的動人故事向觀眾細訴。  除了大衛艾倫流暢亮麗的編舞外，舞台的佈景及服裝設計則由向來懂得創造童話世界的設計大師彼德卡索列擔綱，配合張國永的燈光設計，舞台滿佈浪漫和詩意。
About the Programme: Cinderella, the ultimate “rags-to-royal” story, comes to brilliant life in award-winning North-American choreographer David Allan’s production danced to Prokofiev’s wonderful ballet score. David Allan tells the magical story of a maiden redeemed by her own goodness. The birth and blossoming of the love between Cinderella and the Prince, and how it overcomes all obstacles, is the ultimate tale of a dream fulfilled. The stage was transformed into a magical world of romance and fantasy by Set and Costume Designer Peter Cazalet and Lighting Designer Leo Cheung.
地點: 沙田大會堂演奏廳 (2006 年 8月) / 屯門大會堂演奏廳 (2007年9月)
Venue: Sha Tin Town Hall Auditorium (Aug 2006) /Tuen Mun Town Hall Auditorium (Sept 2007)
演出/製作: 張堯
Cast and Production: ZHANG Yao
venue.1: 沙田大會堂演奏廳  / 屯門大會堂演奏廳
venue_en: Sha Tin Town Hall, Auditorium  /Tuen Mun Town Hall, Auditorium

節目簡介: 節目包括四齣不同風格的短篇作品：喬治巴蘭欽的《主題與變奏》及 《柴可夫斯基雙人舞》，突破古典芭蕾舞的規範及敍事程式，舞蹈員的身體化成音符，以精煉、舒展的線條，回應音樂的動律，印證芭蕾舞最純淨的美；史提芬•米爾斯的《此時無聲… …》在簡約音樂大師菲力普格拉斯的旋律中，展現戀人亦步亦趨，若即若離的關係；伍宇烈為港芭原創的《夜夜西門慶》，首度從芭蕾世界摸探中國古典情色小說，音樂由人山人海于逸堯全新打造。港芭更特邀巴蘭欽的高足Merrill Ashley來港為舞蹈員排練巴蘭欽作品，葉詠詩指揮香港小交響樂團為巴蘭欽及伍宇烈的作品現場伴奏。由新古典芭蕾到全新原創短篇，展現舞團的實力、活力與多元。
About the Programme: A mixed bill programme designed to showcase the dazzling technique, sophistication and versatility of the Company. There were four ballets in a single programme:  Theme and Variations – George Balanchine reveled in the musical variations Tchaikovsky had created in the finale to his orchestral Suite No 3. In revisiting the opulence of the Imperial Ballet, he evoked a lost world；Tchaikovsky Pas de Deux - Balanchine created this work in 1960. In responding to ballet’s classical purity and bravura possibilities, he creates a perfect marriage of music and movement, distilled for just two dancers; Hush -  Set to Philip Glass’ hypnotic rhythms and lush melodies, Stephen Mills’ Hush made its Asian début. A dance for four young couples, it is a highly sensuous and romantic work; yeah yeah XI MEN QING  – a fresh new work by the imaginative homegrown choreographer Yuri Ng, who took on the challenge to adapt the Chinese classic Jin Ping Mei together with Hong Kong composer Yu Yat-yiu and designer Ewing Chan.  Exploring aspects of male attitudes towards female sexuality, this pure dance work leads audiences to the fantasy world of the lustful social climber Xi Men Qing and his women.  Providing a direct link with Balanchine himself, The Hong Kong Ballet invited virtuoso ballerina Merrill Ashley as guest teacher and repetiteur for the Balanchine ballets and live accompaniment of Yuri Ng and Balanchine’s works was played by Hong Kong Sinfonietta under the baton of Yip Wing-Sie.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 故事取材自荷夫曼 (E.T.A. Hoffmann) 的《胡桃夾子與老鼠王》，首齣芭蕾舞劇由佩蒂巴編舞，音樂巨匠柴可夫斯基作曲，1892年於聖彼德堡首演。1997年，謝傑斐重新編排這齣經典舞劇，將自己兒時對這節日的感受，點滴滲進其中，把孩子天馬行空的幻想，與他們看到新奇事物那興奮莫名的反應捕捉下來。自1997年，此劇一直成為港芭的聖誕劇目。謝氏每年也為舞劇注入新元素，除挑戰舞者的技巧外，也為舞劇帶來新鮮感。由彼得‧科曼設計瑰麗悅目的佈景及服飾，張國永設計層出不窮的燈光，由香港管弦樂團 /香港小交響樂團，現場演奏。
About the Programme: The Hong Kong Ballet’s longest-running, annual Christmas production by Stephen Jefferies, which has entertained nearly 220,000 audience members in the past 12 years at venues all across Hong Kong and beyond since 1997. Based on a story adapted by the French writer, Alexandre Dumas, and set to Tchaikovsky’s whimsical music, The Nutcracker ballet was first performed at St Petersburg’s Mariinsky Theatre in December 1892, and has since become a magical part of Christmas tradition for adults and children all over the world.  The sumptuous set and costumes by Peter Farmer, magical lighting by Leo Cheung, together with live accompaniment by Hong Kong Philharmonic / Hong Kong Sinfonietta make this production a perfect treat for audience in all ages in Christmas season.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
演出/製作: 張堯
Cast and Production: ZHANG Yao
Number of dancers / participants: 117 including guest artists and  student dancers
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 七位香港芭蕾舞團舞者，包辦編舞、舞台設計、服裝概念於一身，以紅、藍、黃三抹原色，貫穿七個全新創作，有頑皮抵死、幽人一默；亦有對回憶夢魘、生死悵惘之勾劃：齋藤浩人的05:46 – 創作意念源自1995年1月17日凌晨5:46分，神戶大地震，一位母親因拯救兒子而犧牲的故事；白家樂的Hesperidium  -  創作和舞蹈是一次徹底自我探索的旅程；李怡燃的Just do it ! - 舞者以身體遊走在迷幻音樂經典Dark Side of the Moon - Time，即興回應急激的鼓聲；高秀桃的「我看見的你是我自己」- 舞中伊人對鏡自照，渴望尋回昔日的天真爛漫，不其然跟鏡中人共舞，融為一體；江上悠的《櫻》– 一次記憶的展影；周錦欣的《血滴紙》 - 揭示愛情中被背叛的污點；陳基琼的 《喧嘩的餐桌》- 以舞蹈展示餐廳中的眾生相。
About the Programme: An evening with dances created by the Company’s young choreographers. Seven creative new works in different styles – contemporary, rock and neoclassical - with a connecting thread of colour (hence the primary) connected the moves. Conceived and developed within the Company, the project exemplifies artistic director John Meehan’s belief that “…dancers showcasing their own creativity is essential to nurture the artistic talents of next generation.”   05:46 by Hiroto Saito - inspired by a true story of an earthquake that shook choreographer Hiroto Saito’s home town of Kobe in 1995; Hesperidium by Carlo Pacis - a piece about self-discovery, explores our desire for what other people possess without realizing that we have the same thing; Just do it ! by Li Yi-ran – takes Pink Floyd’s Time from Dark Side of the Moon and uses its fast rhythm and sheer impulsiveness to pump up the dancers; Mirror by Crystal Costa -  by looking at her reflection in a mirror, a  woman sees herself as a child. Remembering the little girl in her, she yearns to live with her carefree, naïveté again. The dance becomes a beautiful chase between two, hoping to create a single soul again; Sakula by Yuh Egami - Japanese nuances of cherry blossom inspires choreographer Yuh Egami for a contemplation of life, love, death and tunnel between the living and the dead; Tainted Sheet by Selina Chau -  Rodion Shchedrin’s percussive take on Bizet’s Carmen inspires Selina Chau to get back to basics. Intrigued by two composers a century apart, telling one story of betrayal-tainted love; There is a table… by Eve Chan - Humour, set in a restaurant, is Eve Chan’s starting point of creation.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Studio Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 被譽為歐洲當代最傑出編舞家之一的盧狄．凡登士重新詮釋莎士比亞經典愛情劇作，以細膩編舞及精妙的角色設計，跳出一段年少輕狂的愛情之旅：羅密歐與茱麗葉在樓台的愛情表白，直率無畏；兩家激烈劍鬥，場面浩大，卻又埋下命運不能逆轉的悲劇。唐亞．凡沙奇瑰麗堂皇的佈景及服裝設計，儼如重建十六世紀意大利維羅納的繁華盛世。舞團更邀得英國皇家芭蕾舞團客席指揮李察‧伯納斯來港，指揮香港管弦樂團，為舞劇現場伴奏，加拿大溫尼伯皇家芭蕾舞團藝術總監安德烈‧路易斯亦來港，為舞團排練。
About the Programme: A balletic masterpiece of the 20th century, Romeo and Juliet is Rudi van Dantzig’s powerful interpretation of the immortal tragedy by William Shakespeare.  With its sumptuous sets and costumes, thrilling fight scenes and tragic denouement, this production of Romeo and Juliet embodied everything ballet should be.  Hong Kong Philharmonic Orchestra joined forces with The Hong Kong Ballet to accompany the production under the baton of Richard Bernas, the Guest Conductor of The Royal Ballet at Convent Garden. André Lewis, Artistic Director of Royal Winnipeg Ballet, also came to Hong Kong to help stage the ballet. Set and Costume Designer Toer van Schayk was also in town for the creation of the production.
Venue: Sha Tin Town Hall Auditorium
演出/製作: 張堯
Cast and Production: ZHANG Yao
演出/參加人數: 65名包括表演嘉賓和舞蹈學生
Number of dancers / participants: 65 including guest artists and student dancers
venue_en: Sha Tin Town Hall, Auditorium

節目簡介: 改編自雷哈爾傳世名作輕歌劇，舞劇《風流寡婦》於澳洲全球首演後，轟動一時，迅即成為二十世紀芭蕾經典。旖旎的雙人舞、流麗的華爾茲、熱情奔放的肯肯舞 － 羅奈海德時以幽默俏皮，時以深情詩意的編舞，巧妙呈現全劇快樂而不意風流，輕快而不輕佻的調子。配以雷哈爾動人的圓舞曲，及亮麗的舞台設計，《風流寡婦》將巴黎上流社會的浮華盛世活現舞台。  故事講述龐特維德拉公國年輕美麗的寡婦漢娜擁有億萬家財，單身漢大獻殷勤，求婚者眾。公國駐巴黎大使為使漢娜家產留在祖國，派遣美男子伯爵丹尼羅追求漢娜。經過種種周折與巧合，最後有情人終成眷屬，大團圓結局。
About the Programme: A tale of romance, money and intrigue amidst the glamour of the belle époque, The Merry Widow is a delicious interpretation of Franz Lehár’s beloved operetta. Set in Paris 1905, a rich and beautiful widow from Pontevedria, Hanna Glawari, wows Parisians and countrymen alike, while the men at the embassy try to persuade Prince Danilo to woo her so her wealth is not lost to their motherland.  At the embassy ball in Paris, however, the plan is thwarted as Danilo and Hanna realise they were once young lovers, followed by a series of intrigues and flirtations.  Choreographed by Ronald Hynd with music arranged by John Lanchbery, The Merry Widow has established itself as a classic of the 20th century full-length ballet repertoire since its world première. Highly acclaimed as witty and entertaining, Hynd’s choreography showcased the entire Company with its swirling waltzes, intimate pas de deux, and of course, the French can-can. Together with original, lavish décor of Desmond Heeley and the enchanting music of Franz Lehár, the ballet offered audience a feast of the Parisian charm and romance of days gone by.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
演出/製作: 張堯
Cast and Production: ZHANG Yao
演出/參加人數: 50名包括表演嘉賓和舞蹈學生
Number of dancers / participants: 50 including guest artists and student dancers
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 佩蒂巴與艾化李夫的《天鵝湖》，一八九五年於聖彼得堡首演贏盡美譽，自此，《天鵝湖》成為芭蕾史上最受歡迎的古典芭蕾舞劇。藝術總監米瀚文製作的《天鵝湖》，以佩蒂巴及艾化李夫的傳統版本為藍本，加進全新編舞，包括第一幕的四人舞、華爾茲和波羅奈舞，以及第三幕的四段民族舞，為這經典舞劇注入清新氣息。
About the Programme: Since the première in 1895 in St. Petersburg, Swan Lake has become the most popular ballet in the world. Marius Petipa and Lev Ivanov’s timeless choreography together with Tchaikovsky’s captivating music continue to inspire today. Firmly based on the original choreography of Petipa and Ivanov, the Hong Kong Ballet’s production of Swan Lake, staged by Artistic Director John Meehan showcased fresh new choreography including the pas de quatre, Waltz and Polonaise in Act I and the character dances in Act III.
Venue: Sha Tin Town Hall Auditorium
演出/製作: 張堯
Cast and Production: ZHANG Yao
演出/參加人數: 59名包括表演嘉賓和舞蹈學生
Number of dancers / participants: 59 including guest artists and student dancers
藝術總監: 原編舞：佩蒂巴、艾化李夫  附加編舞：米瀚文、白家樂、周錦欣
Name of Artistic Director: Original Choreography: Marius Petipa / Lev Ivanov, Additional Choreography: John Meehan, Carlo Pacis, Selina Chau
venue_en: Sha Tin Town Hall, Auditorium

節目簡介: 節目包括三齣各具特色的短篇作品：古典芭蕾之父佩蒂巴的經典名作《帕吉蒂》，佩蒂巴以其法式編創風格，夥拍音樂家明克斯，把原來充滿西班牙色彩的兩幕默劇芭蕾發揚光大，展示芭蕾女伶和十九世紀的華麗極致；美國侯斯頓芭蕾舞團藝術總監韋爾奇爆炸力作品《空色》，創作靈感源自九一一事件，七男一女舞者隨巴哈小提琴協奏曲抽絲剝繭，急激能量藉舞步流瀉，徹底迸發男舞者的陽剛能量。還有本地芭蕾編舞新貴陳基琼全新力作《遷影》，以其別樹一格的女性想像，舞織一幅睡美人都市圖騰。 舞團更邀得紐約市芭蕾舞團首席舞蹈員索菲娜‧西爾薇與拍檔湯馬士索利摩斯演出《海盜》第一幕雙人舞，令節目更顯璀璨奪目。
About the Programme: A new mixed bill programme featured three signature one-act ballets that demonstrated the astonishing versatility of ballet – from well loved timeless masterpieces to refreshing, stimulating and bold new work – undeniably something for everyone. The three one act ballets include Paquita by Marius Petipa - premièred at the Paris Opera in 1846, Paquita was originally a 2-act ballet-pantomime with a Spanish theme. The ballet was exported to St. Petersburg and in 1881, Marius Petipa staged a new version of the ballet in his characteristic style to musical additions contributed by Ludwig Minkus. These additions, including Grand Pas Classique, Children\'s Polonaise and Mazurka; Clear by Stanton Welch - one of the most sought-after choreographers of his generation, Stanton Welch is currently the Artistic Director of Houston Ballet, created Clear in 2001, shortly after September 11. Stripping down the process to its bare essentials, Welch created his ballet for seven men and one woman set to Bach’s heavenly score; Night Light by Eve Chan -  an original new work commissioned by The Hong Kong Ballet. Set to music from Arvo Pärt and combined with re-arranged music from The Sleeping Beauty, Chan created a melancholy and surreal piece exploring the fine line between dreams and the real world.   International ballet stars, Principal Dancer with New York City Ballet Sofiane Sylve and her partner Tamas Solymosi made their debut performance in Hong Kong and danced pas de deux from Le Corsaire Act I, making the programme an unforgettable celebration of dance.
Venue: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre
venue_en: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre

節目簡介: 一個饒富趣味的芭蕾教育專場，讓新一代年青觀眾了解芭蕾舞藝術的演變歷程，從而擴闊他們的藝術視野。節目以輕鬆活潑的手法，配以生動的旁述、精彩的芭蕾選段及瑰麗的舞台設計，帶領觀眾探索芭蕾舞如何由十七世紀法國路易十四的皇室娛樂，發展至浪漫古典時代的風格，到二十世紀現代芭蕾的革新年代。觀眾更可一睹芭蕾舞技巧、芭蕾舞鞋及戲服演變進程。舞團更與香港演藝學院合作，五位來自舞台及製作藝術學院設計系的學生，在舞團及學院指導下，為製作設計佈景及服裝，將課堂理論應用於專業舞台製作中。節目部分舞段，由舞團舞蹈員兼見習編舞白家樂、陳基琼編排。
About the Programme: A free education programme aimed at educating primary and secondary school students how the ballet history has evolved whilst widening their artistic horizon. The Company collaborated with The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts (HKAPA) to offer HKAPA students an opportunity to participate in a professional ballet production. Five students from School of Theatre and Entertainment Arts were engaged to design the set and costume for production. Few dance pieces in the production was choreographed by the Company’s choreographic apprentices Eve Chan and Carlo Pacis. This programme offered a fascinating portrait of how the art form has developed from court entertainment to romantic and classical ballet, and finally to the modern style of 20th Century ballet. The production also introduced the intriguing facts of the development of costumes, pointe shoes and ballet techniques from 17th Century to present day.
地點: 元朗劇院演藝廳  / 荃灣大會堂演奏廳
Venue: Yuen Long Theatre Auditorium / Sha Tin Town Hall Auditorium
venue.1: 元朗劇院演藝廳  / 荃灣大會堂演奏廳
venue_en: Yuen Long Theatre, Auditorium / Sha Tin Town Hall, Auditorium

節目簡介: 節目揉合古典、新古典及原創芭蕾，包括佩蒂巴《睡美人》第三幕雙人舞 – 樂章是柴可夫斯基依佩蒂巴的要求譜寫，舞段講述費洛蒙王子解除魔咒，喚醒沉睡了百年的愛麗娜公主，二人歡欣起舞；米瀚文《天鵝湖》第一幕四人舞 - 取代傳統的三人舞段，讓男舞者有更多機會展示舞技；巴蘭欽兩齣名作《主題與變奏》、《柴可夫斯基雙人舞》及澳洲芭蕾舞團駐團編舞史提芬貝恩斯的全新創作《孤獨守望》- 以舞蹈及簡約舞台設計，表達人在個人及群體層面上，懷著錯雜的心情回顧過去，展望將來。
About the Programme: The production showcases five spectacular works set to Tchaikovsky music – Grand Pas de Deux from The Sleeping Beauty by Marius Petipa; Theme and Variations and Tchaikovsky Pas de Deux by George Balanchine; Pas de Quatre from Swan Lake  Act I by John Meehan who revisited Tchaikovsky’s memorable score and infused it with fresh ideas; The Way Alone, a newly commissioned work by Resident Choreographer of The Australian Ballet Stephen Baynes who chose an eclectic mix from Tchaikovsky’s oeuvre as his theme - the forging of a new future with reference to the past - which allowed him to relate classical ballet to contemporary dance, while treating each dancer as an individual character.
Venue: Sha Tin Town Hall Auditorium
venue_en: Sha Tin Town Hall, Auditorium

節目簡介: 港芭八位年輕編舞家各以獨特的經歷與文化體會，跟舞蹈對話，以多元音樂與舞蹈語彙，舞出芭蕾新國度：李嘉博的《埋伏》- 在中國著名樂曲《十面埋伏》那氣勢磅礴的節奏中，以舞蹈展現傳統東方藝術神韻；布雷特的《心魔》- 探索埋藏心底的狂野；江上悠的《一一》-  以生命源頭一一開始，思考如何拼湊自己的心經；白家樂的《順其自然》- 以澎湃的西班牙結他音樂為背景，走進個人感情深處；周錦欣的《不怕記不住，只怕忘不了》- 受電影《太陽照常升起》啓發，帶領觀眾走進感性之旅，經歷愛、痴、慾、詐的情感；鄺藹怡的《男女男》- 以時而溫柔，時而暴烈的舞步，直視男女關係微妙的張力；李怡燃的《零感覺》- 在悲歡人生中，留住亮麗精彩的回憶；高瀚林的《黃》- 意念源自美國古老俚語Yellow，述說一對情侶愛中的怯懦。
About the Programme: An evening of eight new contemporary and neo classical works created by the Company’s talented choreographers. Set to Classical as well as Pop and Rock music, each piece reflecting the choreographers’ own unique cultural elements and style: Ambush by Li Jia-bo - a neo-classical ballet conveys the wide range of emotions conjured from the rhythmic Chinese classic Ambush from Ten Sides taking the audience on a thrilling cultural journey; Bête Noire by Brett Simon - an imaginative blend of contemporary and neo-classical movements reflects a man’s inability to accept fundamental characteristics of his personality; Collage of One by Yuh Egami – describes the complexities we all face in life; Déjalo Donde Estaba by Carlo Pacis -  set to expressive Spanish guitar music, this ballet explores an unwanted but necessary emotional journey; Footprints by Selina Chau – inspired by Chinese movie The Sun Also Rises, this beautiful contemporary piece takes the audience on an emotional adventure of love, madness, desire and deceit; Man Woman Man by Aurora Kwong - the many layers of love are explored in this contemporary study of the relationship between men and women and the emotional tensions aroused between them; Nothing by Li Yi-ran - an inventive ballet portrays the various aspects of life’s intricacy; Yellow by Jonathan Mangosing - a take on the old American slang word - Yellow that illustrates two couples where their relationships are marred by cowardice, lack of commitment, and the inability to relish in the love he/she has.
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

節目簡介: 為「法國五月」的其中一個節目，以法國國旗紅、白、藍三色出發，編選三位二十世紀芭蕾大師的經典名作。紅－ 芭蕾巨匠喬治巴蘭欽傳世傑作《珠寶》其中一幕《紅寶石》，巧妙糅合芭蕾與百老匯歌舞風格，瀟灑張揚，猶如紅寶石綻放閃爍光芒；白－《白色組曲》由前巴黎歌劇院芭蕾舞團藝術總監賽吉Ÿ里法於1943年創作。作品舞步亮麗多變，展現全團技巧，另外，亦選演《白天鵝雙人舞》，舞者以精湛舞藝，跳出愛情與芭蕾最純粹之源；藍－英國編舞大師安東尼都鐸，成名作《丁香園》於1936年首演後，被當時舞壇形容為現代經典。作品氣氛靈巧深幽；藍月映照，四角戀情錯愛斑駁。國際華裔芭蕾舞星譚元元更首度與港芭合作，為香港觀眾獻藝。
About the Programme: Tricolor – red, white and blue - is one of the Le French May programme featuring three 20th century masterpieces all new to the repertoire of the Company.    Red is for Rubies.  Inspired by Claude Arpel’s luminous jewellery, George Balanchine’s high energy, neo-classical ballet Rubies is filled with sparkling and jazzy choreography with a truly spontaneous quality.   White is for Suite en Blanc and White Swan Pas de Deux from Swan Lake. While Serge Lifar’s brilliant ballet is a showcase for the whole company with its purity of style and dazzling technique, White Swan Pas de Deux from Swan Lake displays the supreme artistic qualities of two leading dancers.   Blue is for the flowers in Antony Tudor’s intense Jardin aux Lilas. Young lovers steal their last, furtive goodbyes in a garden redolent with the scent of lilacs and unfulfilled longings.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 一齣三幕經典喜劇芭蕾，由著名英國編舞家羅奈‧海德編舞，絕妙樂章由利奧德利伯編寫。取材自荷夫曼的作品《睡魔》，故事發生於中歐的一個村落，一位神秘怪誕的發明家歌柏尼博士，創造了一台漂亮彷如真人的機械木偶歌碧麗亞，令村民為之著迷。輕挑不羈的弗朗茲為一睹歌碧麗亞的風采，偷偷潛入歌柏尼博士大宅，惹起未婚妻絲維妮爾達生氣，二人於大宅遇到連串怪事……經過一番糾纏和嬉弄，弗朗茲及絲維妮爾達最終和好如初，並與村民一起歡慶成婚之喜。  羅奈‧海德的編舞極具挑戰性，對於擔任絲維妮爾達女主角的舞蹈員，不單要技巧精確，掌握動作間的連貫性亦同樣重要。舞劇由香港小交響樂團現場伴奏，葉詠詩擔任指揮。
About the Programme: A full-length production of the beloved classic comedy ballet with choreography by Ronald Hynd and gorgeous sets and costumes by the award-winning Roberta Guidi di Bagno. Originally subtitled “the girl with enameled eyes”, Coppélia is set in a small village in Europe and is based on E.T.A. Hoffmann’s light-hearted story Der Sandmann. It tells the tale of Dr Coppélius - an eccentric old inventor who fools the villagers with his creation of a beautiful mechanical doll – Coppélia. So life-like in appearance, she attracts the amorous attention of the flirtatious Franz who breaks into her creator’s house to get a closer look. In an attempt to save her lover and dupe the conniving doctor, Swanilda slips into the house pretending to be the doll in life form. The result is a frivolous scene of mistaken identity which happily ends in a joyful marriage.   Ronald Hynd’s choreography provides a challenge for all the dancers in the Company, but particularly for the female principal dancer in the role of Swanilda. The role has been described as not only technically exacting, requiring full use of classical technique, but is also a showcase for the ballerina’s comic and character acting skills.  The success of Coppélia is also inextricably linked to the wonderful music of Léo Delibes. This production was live accompanied by the Hong Kong Sinfonietta under the baton of Yip Wing-sie.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
演出/製作: 藤野暢央, 張堯
Cast and Production: Nobuo Fujino, ZHANG Yao
演出/參加人數: 44名包括表演嘉賓和舞蹈學生
Number of dancers / participants: 44 including guest artists and student dancers
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 兩幕長篇舞劇«吉賽爾»被評為芭蕾史上最完美的劇目之一，1841年於巴黎歌劇院首演大獲成功，被譽為19世紀浪漫時期的芭蕾之冠。港芭的演出亦以佩蒂巴所編的為藍本，由藝術總監米瀚文及高級舞團導師林美芳重新製作。舞劇第一幕由故事劇情所推進，而第二幕(又稱「白之幕」) 則是前一幕故事的解讀，充滿令人回味的舞蹈場景，呈現一幅幅美麗浪漫的圖畫，如第二幕中群舞員橫越舞台的亞拉伯式(arabesque)跳躍更是芭蕾史上的經典時刻。  故事講述一位純潔而心靈脆弱的農村少女吉賽爾，錯愛已有未婚妻的阿爾伯特伯爵，傷心死去。化為幽靈的吉賽爾最後亦以愛和寬恕，從眾幽靈之后手中救回愛郎。
About the Programme: A full-length work in two contrasting acts, Giselle is in many ways the most perfect work in the whole repertoire of ballet history. The first act is driven by the plot and the second act, or the white act, is the resolution of the drama of the previous act. It is filled with evocative choreography containing wonderful romantic images, with [the corps de ballet’s hops in arabesque across the stage an iconic moment in ballet choreography. The title roles are cornerstones of any principal dancer’s repertoire. They require skill not only as a dancer, but also as an actor.  Giselle is the story of an innocent, kindhearted peasant girl who has a weak heart. She falls in love with a handsome young villager but soon discovers that he has deceived her – he is in fact Count Albrecht who has a fiancée. The news unhinges her and leads to her tragic death. In Act 2, at Giselle’s grave, the Wilis (spirits of abandoned engaged girls who rise from the dead to prey on the men who had wronged them) condemn Albrecht to dance until he dies. Giselle tries to sustain him until daybreak. The spell is broken and Giselle and the Wilis fade away, leaving Albrecht alone and sorrowful.
Venue: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre
演出/製作: 張堯
Cast and Production: ZHANG Yao
藝術總監: 原編舞：柯拉里 / 栢羅 / 佩蒂巴  製作：米瀚文 / 林美芳
Name of Artistic Director: Choreography after Coralli / Perrot / Petipa, staged by John Meehan, Lin Mei-fang
venue_en: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre

舞蹈類別: 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 是次演出，是本聯會自92年成立以來第四部大型舞蹈詩，由香港舞蹈聯會72個會員團體中，邀請20多個團體，聯同本港及國內十多位編舞家，600位舞者及100人合唱團聯合演出。 <<獅子山下>> 是你，我，他熟識的身邊人物故事， 以兩代人的遭遇, 反映香港五、六十年代至今的變遷和奮鬥經歷。以「獅子山下」為名，因獅子山是香港具代表性的地標，同時，它體現了香港社會的基本精神，使人聯想到香港人的奮鬥、掙扎、進取以及隨之出現的種種喜怒哀樂。 內容橫跨半個世紀，展示出當時香港的人生風貌，如60年代涼茶鋪裏喜歡跳阿哥哥的飛仔飛女，街上的擦鞋童；灣仔酒吧裏的美國水兵和吧女；木屋區大火後劫後餘生的坊眾；90年代大富豪夜總會的艷舞女郎、暴發戶，金融風暴，沙士抗疫的勇士等。
About the Programme: It is the 4th production of the Association which involved 20 of its 70 member groups to join force with choreographers from Hong Kong and China, 600 dancers and 100-strong choir. The show revealed the change and development of Hong Kong during the 50s and 60s with the story of a local family. The Chinese name of the production means “The Lion Rock”, an iconic landmark of Hong Kong, which symbolizes the tears and laughter of Hong Kong people. Set in different scenes, the story starts with a family living in the poor squatter hut area. Hoi Nam, the mother, touts for business as Suzie Wong in a bar to earn a living; A sang, Hoi Lam’s son, was a poor boy but now earns a fortune. Being a victim of the economic crisis, he goes bankrupt, being down in the dumps and seeing no way out; Ah Chun, Hoi Nam’s daughter, is a kind-hearted girl and pursues a nursing career. She is in the frontline of the hospital in the battle against SARS.              The story spanned across over 50 years, revealing the development of Hong Kong and the way of life of Hong Kong people. Scenes included The A-Go-Go Generation, Dance of Shoe-Shine Boys, Dance of the American Marines and Suzie Wong, Fire in the Wind, Night Club Dance, The Economic Thunderstorm and The Invisible War (SARS) etc.       With the choreograph team made up of 20 choreographers from Hong Kong and China, the dance poem combined the essence of Chinese dance, Jazz, modern dance and Western dance, revealing an “East meets West” personality. Among the playwrights, choreographers, composer and light designers, they all grew up during the 50s and 60s and knew the in-depth side of Hong Kong. The dance poem has also joined force with 600 dancers and a 100-strong choir performed in the final scene.
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium
Production / Performing Unit: Association of Hong Kong Dance Organization
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

Programme Name: Fund-raising performance by Dance Organizations in Hong Kong
舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 生命的脆弱，實在無法預計。2008年5月12日下午2時28分，四川汶川縣的7.8級大地震是中國三十年來最嚴重的地震，至今已奪去5萬多人的寶貴生命，受傷人數多達28萬人，500多萬人無家可歸。 災難當前，救援工作馬上展開。十萬軍民奮不顧身拯救生還者，深受感動，令人鼓舞。因此08年5月28日香港舞蹈聯會組織香港舞蹈界賑災籌款義演出了。整個過程中充滿人間有愛，籌回38萬善款，為災區獻出一點愛心。
About the Programme: Sichuan, China has greatly suffered from the 7.8-magnitude earthquake, the heaviest earthquake during the past 30 years in China, with over 50,000 people died, over 280,000 casualties and over 5 million people being homeless. However, the people in Sichuan do not give up and strike to survive, as they know they have to meet their family members again.
Venue: Tsuen Wan Town Hall Auditorium
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈聯會/荃灣民政事務處
Presenter: the Association of Hong Kong Dance Organizations and Tsuen Wan District Office
Production / Performing Unit: Association of Hong Kong Dance Organizations
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium

Programme Name: Hong Kong Dance Festival 2006 The Spirit of Dance Rally
節目簡介: 由香港舞蹈聯會合辦的《齊齊舞不停》，是一個全民參與的non-stop party，四小時內齊齊跳，超越年齡、不分性別，全人類一起舞、舞、舞吧！
About the Programme: Capture the spirit of dance at a four-hour extravaganza with all ages and every sector rallying the myriad forces and faces of dance.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Piazza
Production / Performing Unit: Association of Hong Kong Dance Organizations
venue.1: 香港文化中心露天廣場
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Piazza

節目名稱: 《舞蹈詩 ‧ 獅子山下》第二十二屆荃灣藝術節“舞苑奇葩聚荃城2006”
Programme Name: Our Home, Our Story The 22nd Tsuen Wan Arts Festival
舞蹈類別: 中國舞, 當代/現代舞

About the Programme: It is the 4th production of the Association which involved 20 of its 70 member groups to join force with choreographers from Hong Kong and China, 600 dancers and 100-strong choir. 舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 一個獎項頒發穿插於精彩舞蹈的演出。舞蹈年獎2006的獎項得主包括陳敏兒與林偉源、賀基富、夏國斌、香港舞蹈團、「八樓平台」《民間傳奇》、聖雅各福群會、刑亮、楊雲濤、楊惠美與陳敏兒、余仁華，以及獲傑出成就獎的謝傑斐。演出節目方面，則安排了本港的三個「旗艦」專業舞團（香港芭蕾舞團、香港舞蹈團、城市當代舞蹈團）分別演出芭蕾舞、中國舞和現代舞，以及不加鎖舞踊館、香港演藝學院舞蹈學院和聖雅各福群會的舞蹈演出。
About the Programme: A evening of awards presentation intertwining with excellent dance performances. Hong Kong Dance awards 2006 were given to Abby Chan and Allen Lam, Keith Hawley, Bill Haycock, Hong Kong Dance Company, “8/F, Platform” Min Jian Chuan Qi, St. James’ Settlement, Xing Liang, Yang Yuntao, Yeung Wai Mei & Abby Chan, Jacky Yu, and Distinguished Achievement Award winner Stephen Jefferies. Dance performance featuring the three local flagship companies, the Hong Kong Ballet, Hong Kong Dance Company and City Contemporary Dance Company, and Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts School of Dance, Unlock Dancing Plaza and St. James’ Settlement.
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

Programme Name: Hong Kong Dance Festival 2006 – Dance Trinity
舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 由香港三個旗艦舞蹈團演出的三段舞蹈精品：城市當代舞蹈團表演由龐智筠編舞的《星期一（雨）》（由） 、香港芭蕾舞團表演由娜泰莉．維亞編舞的《杜蘭朵》（選段），以及香港舞蹈團表演 由劉凌莉編舞 的《塵埃落定》（選段）。
About the Programme: A triple bill performance showcased the works of the three flagship dance companies in Hong Kong. The programme included City Contemporary Dance Company’s Rainy Days and Mondays…  choreographed by Neol Pong, Hong Kong Ballet’s Turandot (excerpt) choreographed by Natalie Weir  and Hong Kong Dance Company’s Red Poppies (excerpt) choreographed by Liu Lingli.
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目名稱: 香港舞蹈節2006—《賈作光舞蹈藝術觀禮》
Programme Name: Hong Kong Dance Festival 2006 – Jia Zuoguang and the Mastery of Chinese Dance
節目簡介: 由中國舞蹈界的權威、當代的舞蹈藝術大師賈作光先生主講，以中國當代舞蹈藝術為主題的專題講座，並由一群中國傑出藝術家作示範演出，包括解放軍藝術學院舞蹈系主任劉敏、2004雅典奧運閉幕典禮中的獨舞員黃豆豆、新疆舞蹈團國家一級演員廸麗娜爾、首屆中國舞荷花獎金獎康紹輝、中央民族大學舞蹈學院教授敖登格日勒、北京舞蹈學院中國民族民間舞系教授於曉雪、北京舞蹈學院青年舞團劉震及王亞彬，北京舞蹈學院中國民族民間舞系成員等。
About the Programme: A lecture on Chinese traditional dance by Mr. Jia Zuoguang, an unrivalled authority on Chinese traditional dance in the modern era. A group of this generation’s brightest stars provided demonstration performances, including: Liu Min, Dean of Dance Department of the PLA Academy of Art; Wang Doudou, Artistic Director of the Shanghai Song and Dance Troupe and dance soloist in the closing ceremony of the 2004 Olympics in Athens; Dili Na-er, Vice-President of the Chinese Dancer’s Association; Kang Shaofui, Golden Prize winner of the First Chinese Dance Lotus Awards; Aodeng Ge-ri-li, Professor of Dance School of the Chinese Central University of Nationalities; Yu Xiaoxue, Lecturer of the National Folk Dance Department at the Beijing Dance Academy; Liu Zhen & Wang Yabin, both members of the Beijing Youth Dance Troupe of the Beijing Dance Academy; and dancers from the Chinese National Folk Dance Department of the Beijing Dance Academy.
Venue: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Drama Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts, Drama Theatre

Programme Name: Hong Kong Dance Festival 2006 – New Millennium DANCE
舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 《舞出千禧》是一個與香港舞蹈總會合辦，表揚香港舞蹈的多元而優秀一面的節目。 以「繼傳統舞精情茂，新千禧再續風華」為主題，呈獻了十五個舞蹈節目。演出的舞蹈學校、組織、團體及舞團包括保良局金卿幼稚園、星榆舞蹈團、王仁曼芭蕾舞學校、盛舞坊、小水點舞蹈團、香港東南亞舞蹈團、藝摯歐洲民族舞蹈組、心飛舞團、吳翠雲舞蹈學校、蓓蕾舞蹈社、創舞坊、錢秀蓮舞蹈團蔡偉雄舞蹈中心、索意歐洲民族舞蹈團、T&Y創作坊。
About the Programme: In association with the Hong Kong Dance Federation, New Millennium DANCE is an event cerebrating the wide-ranging excellence of the different styles of Hong Kong dance.  With a theme of “Projecting Tradition into the New Millennium: Imagining the Future of Dance” the programme presented 15 dance works performed by various dance schools, organizations, groups and companies. They are PLK Kam Hing Kindergarden, Star-wave Production, Jean M. Wong School of Ballet, Sheng Dance Group, Hibiscus Group, Hong Kong South East Asia Dance Troupe, Knack Cordial Folk Group, Dancing Heart Troupe, Ng Tsui Wan School of Dancing, Budlet Folk Dance Club, Inspired Dance Co., Miranda Chin Dance Co., Rico Tsoi Dance Centre, Legacy European Folk Dance Troupe,  T&Y Creative Arts.
Venue: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre
venue_en: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre

節目名稱: 香港舞蹈節2006—《舞蹈．各自各》
舞蹈類別: 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 來自香港的梅卓燕和邢亮、楊惠美、李思颺和王丹琦，聯同來自中國（吳鑒、龍雲娜、趙梁、董雪、李蓉、劉嘉、劉倬、吳淑丹、關亮、鄭彊和張溪璐）、台灣（何曉玫）、日本（新上裕也）、菲律賓（Jose Jay B. Cruz）、南韓（Cho Yang-sook）、美國（Jonathan Fredickson和Rob Kitsos）及巴西（Evelin Moreira）的10個編舞者或組合，在3場不同的節目中演出共13個作品。
About the Programme: 13 works in 3 different performances, choreographed by Hong Kong artists Mui Cheuk-yin and Xing Liang, Yeung Wai-mei, Justyne Li and Wong Tan-ki, with 10 other artists or groups from China (Wu Jian, Long Yunna, Zhao Liang, Dong Xue, Li Rong, Liu Jia, Liu Zhuo, Wu Shudan, Yan Liang, Zheng Jiang), Taiwan (Ho Hsiao-mei), Japan (Youya Shinjo), the Phillipines (Jose Jay B. Cruz), South Korean (Cho Yang-sook), USA (Jonathan Fredickson and Rob Kitsos) and Brazil (Evelin Moreira).
Venue: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Drama Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts, Drama Theatre

節目名稱: 香港舞蹈節2006—《第二十週年國際舞蹈學院節》
Programme Name: Hong Kong Dance Festival 2006 – 20th Anniversary of International Festival of Dance Academies
舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 由北京舞蹈學院(中國)、香港演藝學院、拉邦中心(倫敦) 、昆士蘭科技大學(澳洲) 、SUNY Purchase Conservatory (紐約) 、國立台灣藝術大學(臺灣) 、南非體育學院 (南非) 及西澳表演藝術學院 (澳洲) ，這八所來自五大洲的專業舞蹈學院演出三場不同的節目、共 26 個精彩的舞蹈作品。
About the Programme: Coming from the 5 continents of the world, 8 professional dance academies, including Beijing Dance Academy (China),  Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts, Laban Centre (London), Queensland University of Technology (Australia), SUNY Purchase Conservatory (New York),  Taipei National University of Arts (Taiwan),  Tshwane University of Technology (South Africa) and Western Australian Academy for Performing Arts (Australia), performed a total of 26 dance works in 3 different performances.
Venue: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre
venue_en: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre

節目名稱: 香港舞蹈節2006—《國際舞蹈教育會議》
Programme Name: Hong Kong Dance Festival 2006 – International Dance Education Conference
舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 一個以「想像未來：21世紀的舞蹈教育 」為主題的國際舞蹈教育會議。來自香港、中國、台灣、新加坡、印尼、印度、菲律賓、美國、英國、南非等地的28個舞蹈學者和教育家分別在 8 節講座中發表論文。所有論文刊登於《論文集》中。
About the Programme: With a theme of “Imagining the Future: Dance Education in the 21C “, 28 dance scholars and educators from Hong Kong, China, Taiwan, Singapore, Indonesia, India, the Philippines, USA, UK and South Africa presented there papers in 8 different conference sessions. All papers were published in the Conference Proceedings.
Venue: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Common Room
venue_en: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Common Room

節目名稱: 香港舞蹈節2006—《舞蹈大師班》
Programme Name: Hong Kong Dance Festival 2006 – Master Classes
舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 由來自世界各地的舞蹈教師和藝術家教授的舞蹈課，包括中國民間舞及古典舞、身韻、太極、中國戲曲動作、身體條件鍛練、主流及前衛芭蕾舞、現代舞、劇場舞蹈。適合初學或喜愛舞蹈的成人至專業舞者。
About the Programme: Dance classes taught by dance teachers and artists from various countries. Content included Chinese folk and classical, Shen Yun, Chinese opera, Tai Chi, body conditioning, cutting edge and mainstream ballet, modern, theatrical dance for adult beginner/enthusiast to professional level.
地點: 香港演藝學 院1-9 號舞蹈室
Venue: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Dance Studio 1-9
venue.1: 香港演藝學 院1-9 號舞蹈室
venue_en: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Dance Studio 1-9

舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞, 其他: 音樂劇場舞
Category: Ballet, Ethnic, Chinese, Contemporary/Modern, Other: Musical Theatre Dance, Break
節目簡介: 除了頒發獎項予舞蹈年獎2007得主亞洲民眾戲劇節協會及社區文化發展中心、城市當代舞蹈團、陳宜今、張國永、崔炳華、香港芭蕾舞團、黃磊、金瑶、劉建華、劉迎宏、余碧艷，和傑出成就獎成龍及吳杏冰外，大會亦安排了精彩的節目，演出嘉賓包括香港芭蕾舞團、香港演藝學院舞蹈學院、鄭詠梅及洪海、黃磊及華琪鈺、四擊頭、羅凡、保良局李城璧中學、聖公會莫壽增會督中學、舞館、敏迪貝蒂及連展豪、高世章、原子鏸及姚詠芝。
About the Programme: Besides presenting awards to Hong Kong Dance Awards 2006 recipients Asian People’s Theatre Festival Society & Centre for Community Cultural Development, City Contemporary Dance Theatre, Chan Yi-jing, Leo Cheung, Cui Pinghua, The Hong Kong Ballet, Huang Lei, Jin Yao, Jaspar Lau, Liu Yinghong, Yu Pik-yim, and Distinguished Achievement Award recipients Jackie Chan and Helen Ng, dance, Chinese opera movement and song singing were also performed by The Hong Kong Ballet, Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts School of Dance, Cheng Wing-mui & Hung Hoi, Huang Lei & Tina Hua, Four Gig Heads, Luo Fan, PLK Lee Shing Pik College, SKH Bishop Mok Sau Tseng Secondary School, Studiodanz, Mandy Petty & Michael Lin, Leon Ko, and Marsha Yuan & Gigi Yiu.
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目名稱: 《香港文化系列——舞蹈專場》 （北京）
節目簡介: 這個紀念香港回歸十週年的活動共有三個香港獨立的小型舞團到北京各自演出了一場。它們分別是新約舞流演出由周佩韻編舞的《馨香》、不加鎖舞踊館演出由王榮祿 編舞的《愛息》，以及惠美_跳舞演出 楊惠美編舞的《跳你好舞》。
About the Programme: An event to celebrate the 10th anniversary of Hong Kong re-unification with China. 3 small independent dance companies from Hong Kong each performed one performance in Beijing. They are Passover Dance Company performed Pewan Chow’s Xin Xiang, Unlock Dancing Plaza performed Ong Yong-lock’s Whisper of Love, and why_me_dance performed Young Wai-mei’s You Had Better Dance.
Venue: Beijing Oriental Pioneer Theatre
主辦單位: 雷動天下現代舞團（北京），香港舞蹈聯盟協辧
Presenter: LDTX Modern Dance Company (Beijing), in association with Hong Kong Dance Alliance
製作/演出單位: 雷動天下現代舞團（北京）
venue_en: Beijing Oriental Pioneer Theatre

舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 「編舞．新系列」為具有一定經驗的編舞新進提供創作的機會和支援。四位編舞者在《鋒芒四露》中發表新作：李思颺《Narcissus and Echo》、陳丹《扇．巾》、郭嘉源《城市．身體》和蔡嘉樂《錯愛的呼喚》。
About the Programme: Emerging Choreographers Series provide opportunity and support for emerging choreographers to create and produce their works. In Danzzzzzling, 5 works were presented:  Wu Yi-san’s Fluctuation, Chloe Wong’s Timedrifting, Lai Tak-wai’s Substitute, Jo Leung’s Bet Da Man, and Anthony Suen’s My Tap Blog.
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

舞蹈類別: 當代/現代舞, 其他: 音樂劇場舞
節目簡介: 「編舞．新系列」為具有一定經驗的編舞新進提供創作的機會和支援。五位編舞者在《目迷五色》中發表新作：吳易珊《浮鏡》、黃靜婷《時移》、黎德威《分身．身分》、梁秀妍《打幾大》和孫銘傑《踢踏博客》。
About the Programme: Emerging Choreographers Series provide opportunity and support for emerging choreographers to create and produce their works. In Danzzzzzling, 5 works were presented:  Wu Yi-san’s Fluctuation, Chloe Wong’s Timedrifting, Lai Tak-wai’s Substitute, Jo Leung’s Bet Da Man, and Anthony Suen’s My Tap Blog.
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Th
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Th

舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞, 其他
Category: Ballet, Ethnic, Chinese, Contemporary/Modern, Other: Tap, Latin, Break
節目簡介: 除了頒發獎項予傑出成就獎得主鍾金寶、陳寶珠、毛妹和郭世毅，以及舞蹈年獎得主陳慶恩、陳榮、香港藝術節、香港芭蕾舞團、香港舞蹈團、黎海寧、梁菲、玄牝舞集、伍宇烈及香港小交響樂團和楊怡孜外，大會安排了香港芭蕾舞團、香港舞蹈團、城市當代舞蹈團、香港演藝學院舞蹈學院、節拍攻擊、郭偉傑、王丹琦、梁美嘉、王泳、黃梅、張健祥、林恩滇、韓嘉政、陳榮、吳昜珊、黎德威、黃靜婷、梁秀妍和李思颺作演出嘉賓。
About the Programme: Besides presenting awards to Distinguished Achievement Award winners Joan Campbell, Pearl Chan, Christine Liao, and Stephen Kwok, and Hong Kong Dance Awards 2008 recipients Chan Hing-yin, Chen Rong, Hong Kong Arts Festival, Hong Kong Ballet, Hong Kong Dance Company, Helen Lai, Faye Leung, Manna Dance, Yuri Ng & Hong Kong Sinfonietta  and Yang Yizi, the event also presented performances by The Hong Kong Ballet, Hong Kong Dance Company and City Contemporary Dance Company, and The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts School of Dance, Rhythm Attack, Ken Kwok, Wong Tan-ki, Eve Leung, Mike Wang, Tasha Wong, Rico Cheung, Icey Lam, Flora Hon, Chen Rong, Wu Yi-san, Lai Tak-wai, Chloe Wong, Jo Leung and Justyne Li.
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

舞蹈類別: 中國舞, 當代/現代舞, 其他: 音樂劇場舞
Category: Chinese, Contemporary/Modern, Other: Musical Theatre Dance
節目簡介: 「舞蹈平台」是一個向具入門經驗的編舞者提供創作及發表作品機會的計劃。《舞蹈平台2008》由周佩韻擔任藝術總監，共有六個編舞新鮮人發表新作：劉詠芝的《In the River Name “TIME”》、譚渼樺《Simply Muddle》、蔡穎《控制》、梁芷茵《異．見》、馮樂恒《男兒事》和梁美英《工廠妹萬歲》。
About the Programme: Dance Platform is a project that provides opportunity for entry level choreographers to choreograph and present their new works. Artistic Directed by Pewan Chow, Dance Platform 2008 presented six works in 3 performances: Iris Lau’s In the River Named “TIME”, Malvina Tam’s Simply Muddle, Cai Ying’s Control, Cherry Leung’s Witnessing Changes, Victor Fung’s Boy Don’t Cry, and May May Leong’s Two Thumbs up to the Factory Girls.
Venue: Fringe Theatre
venue_en: Fringe Theatre

Programme Name: Hong Kong Dance Festival 2006 – New Millennium DANCE
舞蹈類別: 兒童舞、中國舞、芭蕾舞、流行爵士舞、現代舞及東西方民族舞
Category: Children’s Dance, Chinese, Ballet, Pop Jazz, Modern, Eastern & Western Folk Dance
節目簡介: 匯聚香港舞蹈團體及舞校的優秀節目，展示香港的多元舞蹈文化，共有15團體參加，是《香港舞蹈節2006》其中一台大型多元舞蹈專場。
About the Programme: Imagining the future tradition of Dance and savoring the excellence and diversity of dance companies, schools, organizations, and groups, the event was one of the large-scale performances in Hong Kong Dance Festival 2006 participated by 15 groups and co-presented with the Hong Kong Dance Federation.
Venue: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre
venue_en: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre

節目名稱: 《紫荊盃舞蹈大賞》2006年 及 2008年
Programme Name: Bauhinia Cup Hong Kong Dance Championships Winners’ Performance 2006 & 2008
舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 西方民族舞, 中國舞, 現代舞, 爵士舞
Category: Ballet, Western Folk Dance, Chinese, Modern, Jazz
節目簡介: 《紫荊盃舞蹈大賽》後，優勝舞團與嘉賓舞團合作演出的高水平舞蹈專場。
About the Programme: A high-level dance concert performed by the winners of Bauhinia Cup Hong Kong Dance Championships and guest dance troupes.
地點: (2006)高山劇場; (2008)沙田大會堂演奏廳
Venue: (2006)Ko Shan Theatre; (2008)Sha Tin Town Hall Auditorium
Presenter: The Leisure and Cultural Services Department
venue.1: 高山劇場; 沙田大會堂演奏廳
venue_en: Ko Shan Theatre; Sha Tin Town Hall, Auditorium

節目名稱: 《全港中國舞等級考試課程精英聯合展示》
Programme Name: Joint Demonstration of Syllabus for Chinese Dance Graded Examination
節目簡介: 為慶祝北京舞蹈學院「中國舞等級考試課程」開發20周年，全港首次大型「課程精英聯合展示」，由參與此課程考試成績優異的學員，展示該課程各級別訓練過程。並對長期努力教學的老師及她們累積的教學成果作出表揚和致意。讓學員的優秀表現得到社會人士的共賞並加深對弘揚中國傳統文化的「中國舞等級考試課程」的認識。
About the Programme: In celebration of the 20 years’ launching of the Chinese Dance Graded Examination of Beijing Dance Academy, the first grand Joint Demonstration of Syllabus for Chinese Dance Graded Examination was held.  The training processes of all the grades of the syllabus were demonstrated by students with brilliant results.  The function also commended teachers who have made long-term efforts and yielded positive results.  It was hoped that through the excellent performance of the students, the appreciation for Chinese dance would be cultivated and the knowledge of Chinese Dance Graded Examination which promotes traditional Chinese culture would be enhanced.
地點: 伊利沙伯體育館表演場
Venue: Queen Elizabeth Stadium Arena
venue.1: 伊利沙伯體育館表演場
venue_en: Queen Elizabeth Stadium Arena

節目名稱: 《國際中國舞等級考試課程精英聯合展示》
Programme Name: Joint Demonstration of Syllabus for Chinese Dance Graded Examination
節目簡介: 為慶祝北京舞蹈學院「中國舞等級考試課程」開發20周年，再辦大型「課程精英聯合展示」，由參與此課程考試成績優異的學員，展示該課程各級別訓練過程。並對長期努力教學的老師及她們累積的教學成果作出表揚和致意。讓學員的優秀表現得到社會人士的共賞；對弘揚中國傳統文化的「中國舞等級考試課程」加深認識。
About the Programme: In celebration of the 20 years’ launching of the Chinese Dance Graded Examination of Beijing Dance Academy, the Joint Demonstration of Syllabus for Chinese Dance Graded Examination was held again.  The training processes of all the grades of the syllabus were demonstrated by students with brilliant results.  The function also commended teachers who have made long-term efforts and yielded positive results.  It was hoped that through the excellent performance of the students, the appreciation for Chinese dance would be cultivated and the knowledge of Chinese Dance Graded Examination which promotes traditional Chinese culture would be enhanced.
地點: 伊利沙伯體育館表演場
Venue: Queen Elizabeth Stadium Arena
venue.1: 伊利沙伯體育館表演場
venue_en: Queen Elizabeth Stadium Arena

舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 西方民族舞, 中國舞, 現代舞, 爵士舞
Category: Ballet, Western Folk Dance, Chinese, Modern, Jazz
節目簡介: 總會自1996年起創辦《香港舞蹈博覽》匯演活動，為舞蹈藝術的普及和發展，獲得廣泛的肯定和好評。舞蹈博覽為多元化的舞蹈團體建立了演出平台，提供藝術策劃和行政管理，不斷促進和提升節目創新精神和表演水平。每年有超過50個本地及外地嘉賓團體報名參加。
About the Programme: Since its launching in 1996, Hong Kong Dance Expo has greatly enhanced the popularity and development of dance art and has been much welcome and recognized by Hong Kong people.  It has inspired different forms of dance performances, integrated many local dance groups and motivated their enthusiasts.  More than 50 dance groups participate in the event every year.  With the professionalism in artistic planning and management, they have created vitality and improved their performance standards.
Venue: Sha Tin Town Hall  Auditorium
venue_en: Sha Tin Town Hall  Auditorium

節目名稱: 《暑期國際青少年舞蹈交流營 》2006 , 2007 , 2008
舞蹈類別: 西方民族舞, 中國舞, 現代舞,爵士舞, 社交舞
Category: Western Folk Dance, Chinese, Modern, Jazz & HipHop, Social Dance
節目簡介: 《紫荊盃舞蹈大賽》後，優勝隊伍與嘉賓隊伍合作的表演專場，是一項展示香港舞蹈高水平節目。
About the Programme: Bauhinia Cup Hong Kong Dance Championships and guest cooperate performance.

節目名稱: 《『百卉競艷』香港舞蹈總會 30週年紀念舞蹈專場》
Programme Name: “Florilegium” 30th Anniversary Ceremony & Performance of the HK Dance Federation
舞蹈類別: 西方民族舞, 中國舞, 芭蕾舞, 爵士舞, 社交舞
Category: Western Folk, Chinese, Ballet, Jazz, Hip Hop & Social Dance
節目簡介: 是慶祝香港舞蹈總會成立30周年的多元舞蹈、多元主題舞蹈晚會。由18個總會團體會員、匯同北京舞蹈學院考級中心高級教師舞蹈團及香港體育舞蹈聯盟聯合演出，將本港主要民間舞團及盛行的舞蹈向觀眾介紹
About the Programme: A diversified dance soirée celebrating the 30 years’ inception of the Hong Kong Dance Federation.  Jointly performed by 18 group members of the HKDF, the Senior Teachers Dance Group of the Examination Centre of Beijing Dance Academy and Hong Kong DanceSport Association Ltd., the function introduced the major dance groups and popular dances of Hong Kong to the audience.
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Concert Hall
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Concert Hall

節目簡介: 香港芭蕾舞學會在過去的四十二年歷史中，曾四度演出《吉賽爾》此古典芭蕾舞劇。 這次演出讓來自不同芭蕾舞學習的同學們有交流的機會，包括《第四屆芭蕾舞超新星大賞》的得獎者及有優異表現的參加者，提供了一次非常珍貴、增進他們舞台演出經驗的平台及有機會跟蜚聲國際的舞蹈員合作。
About the Programme: It has been over a couple of decades since Hong Kong Ballet Group last presented this classic romantic ballet – Giselle. In our 42 years’ history, this is the fourth time we have put this piece together. Winners and participants from the 4th Hong Kong Young Ballet Stars Award competition performed in the production. This performance not only provides a valuable platform for our student members to gain stage experience and to work with international renowned dancers, it also provides an opportunity for them to meet with students from other schools. Through the long hours of rehearsal and intensive coaching, participants build up their confidence, technique and most importantly life-long friendship and bonding among themselves.
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Concert Hall
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Concert Hall

About the Programme: The programme was a mixed bill which showcased students from all four streams of the School of Dance – Ballet, Chinese Dance, Contemporary Dance and Musical Theatre Dance. Choreographers ranged from the emerging Ong Yong-lock (Beyond越) to the experienced Willy Tsao (an excerpt from his 365 Ways of Doing Undoing Orientalism選段自《365種係定唔係東方主義, with local choreographer Yuri Ng’s Butterfly Lovers (梁山伯與祝英台) a strong focal point.
Venue: Lyric Theatre, The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts
主辦單位: 香港演藝學院 — 舞蹈學院
Presenter: School of Dance, The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts
venue_en: Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts, Lyric Theatre

About the Programme: Taking its title from local choreographer Mui Cheuk-yin’s work Impulse,  this programme also included five works created by School of Dance faculty: Dean Maggi Sietsma and Head of Ballet, Graeme Collins (K301 to Mozart), Chinese Dance staff Yu Pik-yim (Once in a Secret Night 雨夜), Pei Chang-Ching (Wind Spring Sky 風．泉．天), Senior Lecturer in Contemporary Dance John Utans (Faint Parallel Lines 模糊的平行線), and Musical Theatre Dance Artist-in-Residence Keith Hawley (Hit the Boards跳躍舞台. The programme thus showed the range of major performance studies of the School – Ballet, Chinese Dance, Contemporary Dance and Musical Theatre Dance.
Venue: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre
主辦單位: 香港演藝學院 — 舞蹈學院
Presenter: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts School of Dance
venue_en: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre

About the Programme: Included as an event in the Le French May Choreographers season, Topology  showcased the depth and breadth of the School of Dance’s exceptional talent, with Sextet (六重奏) by internationally renown French choreographer Thierry Malandain a major highlight. Created on Malandain’s Ballet Biarritz, the contemporary ballet demonstrated the strength, fragility and sensuality of the dancing body, as  expressed through the movement of 12 dancers from the Ballet stream. The programme also included Copacabana from Australian musical theatre choreographer William A Forsythe, Xing Liang’s elegaic Life, Death and the Twilight(人．鬼．戲 - Chinese Dance), and Taiwanese choreographer Cheng Tsun-lung’s powerful Memory (記憶 - Contemporary Dance).
Venue: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre
主辦單位: 香港演藝學院 — 舞蹈學院
Presenter: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts School of Dance
venue_en: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre

About the Programme: Highlighting the fleeting nature of dance, Transience featured works by the School of Dance Faculty, and introduced the work of Contemporary Dance Artist-in-Residence Raewyn Hill to Hong Kong audiences. Hill’s work - the poignant ‘Til Death Do Us Part (至死不渝) was complemented by John Utans’ in a manner of speaking (言外之意 - a work which included dancers from across the three major streams - Ballet, Chinese Dance and Contemporary Dance - and which was toured to the United Kingdom), Cho Yi’s Neither: nor (不即不離), and Graeme Collins’ Crystal (水晶).  The latter featured talented HKAPA School of Music student Crystal Lam performing an excerpt from Spanish composer Enrique Granados’ opera Goyescas. The final work of the production was also an excerpt – this time from Danish choreographer August Bournonville’s lively Napoli (《拿坡里》選段1842).
Venue: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre
主辦單位: 香港演藝學院 — 舞蹈學院
Presenter: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts School of Dance
venue_en: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre

About the Programme: Each of the five works that comprised the narrative traces season embodied the central theme: that no matter how abstract a work, it inevitably resonates with traces of any number of interconnecting narratives. International choreographer/ performer/director Rob Tannion found the inspiration for Sinking Water in a true life narrative – the tragic drowning of 21 Chinese cockle-pickers on the treacherous sands of Morecombe Bay in the UK.  From Shanghai, young dancer/ choreographer Dong Jie created the cross-stream work Floating Void/Empty Travel(空流), while Beijing-based artist Wang Yuan-yuan presented a challenge  to the Ballet students with her tai-chi inspired Crossing (跨界). British choreographer Christopher Hampson’s Paganini Variations (巴格尼尼變奏曲) spoke not only of the Polish composer’s well-known work, but also of bodies in time and space.  The award winning And the Thunder Sings (＜雨喻＞ – 節選自《風水行》choreographed by Chen Lei and Xie Yin, dancers from the Hong Kong Dance Company, echoed traces of traditional Chinese folk rituals and brought them into a contemporary present.
Venue: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre
主辦單位: 香港演藝學院 — 舞蹈學院
Presenter: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts School of Dance
venue_en: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre

About the Programme: The five works which comprised the Fleeting Moments season embodied theme  of impermanence and fragility – not only of the dance work itself, but also of time and space, love and life.  Graeme Collins’ Fragmented Dialogues (零散的對話) played counterpoint to Maurice Ravel’s Piano Concerto for Left Hand in G Major, while Boundless Grasslands (遼闊草原) gave contemporary voice to fast-disappearing Mongolian folk traditions and dance forms. Featuring the totemic Wolf Dance, the work was choreographed by Professor Zhang Lin-ping. Jaime Redfern’s Loss Illuminates (消失的光采) posed questions about memory, existence and being human, while John Utans’ if these walls could talk…. (如果圍牆會說話……) explored notions of reality and the imagined, of what is true and what is false.  Raewyn Hill focused on love and loss in Vespers (晚禱). Based loosely on the Seven Sorrows of the Virgin Mary, the work was set to a specially commissioned score by New Zealand composer David Long.
Venue: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre
主辦單位: 香港演藝學院 — 舞蹈學院
Presenter: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts School of Dance
venue_en: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre

舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 《夢想的天空》是碧華舞蹈團成立後第一次舉辦的舞蹈匯演。乘著06年4月應邀到日本進行交流演出，於同年8月回邀日本舞蹈團體到港參加是次演出，一方面向大眾展示團員們努力學習的成果，另一面架起了中日之間文化交流的橋粱，深厚了舞者之間的和睦之情。達到了世界共融，互相學習，共同欣賞，共同提高的目的。      是次演出內容包括有不同種類的舞蹈，如現代舞、芭蕾舞、中國民間民族舞等。舞蹈都各具特色。舞蹈員年齡平均13-18歲，他們自信、投入、對舞蹈充滿熱誠，從舞蹈表演中散發出青春的火花。
About the Programme: Dance, Our Dream is the first performance produced by Alan & Becky Dance Group to show the versatility and talents of the Group members. It is also a cultural exchange programme which a Japanese dance group is invited to demonstrate their flairs.
Venue: Tsuen Wan Town Hall Auditorium
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium

節目名稱: 《濃情廿載顯關懷》- 中國舞蹈匯演 (李秀娟專場)
Programme Name: “ Caring for you – 20 years on “Lee Sau Kuen Dance Performance
節目簡介: 廿載舞蹈，服務社群。\"濃情廿載顯關懷\" 透過回顧本中心資深藝術義工李秀娟小姐的廿載舞蹈生涯，與公眾分享其多年在學校、社區舞蹈推廣及教學上的寶貴經驗和體會，並藉此機會聚集多所學校、志願團體及各方舞蹈愛好者參與演出，一同以中國舞蹈關懷社會，服務社群。
Venue: Yuen Long Theatre, Auditorium
主辦單位: 業餘中國舞蹈推廣中心
製作/演出單位: 業餘中國舞蹈推廣中心
venue_en: Yuen Long Theatre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 舞者翩翩起舞，如風似水，仿似蝴蝶飛鳥，製造出優美的影像，觸發失聰畫家高楠的創作靈感，即場在一幅大型畫布冮繪畫。畫布上逐漸顯現出來的點、線、面，與舞步互相呼應，把創作的珍貴過程，一一展現在觀眾眼前。
About the Programme: Dancers move like wind and stream, butterflies and birds. The dancing inspires deaf painter Ko Name. Each stroke, line and dot on the art piece seems to echo the movements of the ladies. Audience can admire the creative process of the painting which is as valuable as the end product.

舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞, 其他: 爵士
Category: Ballet, Ethnic, Chinese, Contemporary/Modern, Other: JAZZ
節目簡介: 人魚王國上下正準備開派對時，魔鬼魚王Twins Devil誘帶小魚仙Ario到危險的魔鬼魚水域，期間經過夏威夷、中國、埃及等地；當小魚仙Ario到了魔鬼魚水域時，Twins Devil便施展魔法讓Ario動彈不得，同時準備吸走她美麗的聲線，幸好其他公主借助父皇的法力幻化水母，成功把Ario救出。最後大家一起到人魚王國參加舞會，欣賞跳舞魚和國王精彩的演出，盡興一番。
About the Programme: The Twins Devil lead Ario away from The Mermaid Kingdom into the terrible water of the Devil Ray Kingdom. On their way they pass through Hawaii, China, Egypt… When they arrive at The Devil Rays Kingdom, The Twins Devil cast a spell on Ario and she is paralyzed. They are going to steal her lovely voice!! At this moment, other princesses arrive to her aid. By the magic of the King, they had transformed into Jellyfishes and they drive The Devil Rays away. The gueats are enjoying the banquet and everybody has a wonderful time.
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞, 其他: 爵士
Category: Ballet, Ethnic, Chinese, Contemporary/Modern, Other: Jazz
節目簡介: 冰雪妖樹帶領著冰雪精靈對充滿朝氣的花之土地虎視眈眈，令花之土地花兒零落，於是太陽神與兩位年青的花之蝶假扮冰雪精靈深入調查。原來花之后被冰雪樹妖捉住，於是兩位花之蝶便開始尋找森林朋友幫忙。 最初，小花兒、小昆蟲、花之彩馬、花之雪兔、花之孔雀、花之虎等都不願幫忙，但因這兩位花之蝶堅毅和勇敢精神表現出營救花之后的信心，於是太陽神帶領花仙子和所有朋友一起對付冰雪妖樹。最後花之后和大家一起幫助冰雪妖樹抵抗邪惡回復大地之神的身份，讓花之土地回復朝氣勃勃，萬物蓬生。
About the Programme: The Flower Goddess has been imprisoned by Icy-Tree Monster and the Land of Flowers become barren, nothing seems to grow. The Sun God and two little butterflies discovered that unable to save her. They return to the Land to get help. The Sun God leads all the animals to Icy forest to save the Goddess. All use their strength and wisdom and eventually they defeat the Monster. Under the treatment of the Goddess, the Icy-Tree Monster manifests into Earth God. Once more, all life returns in abundance to the lovely Land of Flowers.
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞, 其他: 爵士
Category: Ballet, Ethnic, Chinese, Contemporary/Modern, Other: Jazz
節目簡介: 由於地球不斷受污染，用以平衡地球生態的彩虹之光快要消失，光明女神須要集合七種生命元素，但森林仙子已被污染得失去法力，現只剩大地彩鳥、星月仙子、藍風仙子、紅日鳳凰、青水仙子和紫霞仙子等六種元素。 黑夜女王為了控制地球，便派出黑夜烏鴉對付光明女神及破壞拯救計劃，但奸計被白雲仙子發現，於是烏鴉們起對付白雲仙子令她受重傷，當光明女神利用光明斗篷為白雲療傷之際，黑夜烏鴉作致命一擊，此時白雲犧牲自己以保護彩虹之光。也因為白雲表現出世上最偉大的愛，為彩虹之光的重生注入最重要的元素，地球也因而再次表現出無比的活力了。
About the Programme: Earth is heavily over-polluted – the Light of Rainbow which maintains Earth’s ecological balance is vanishing. The Light Goddess invited all the Fairies of the Elements and bring more power to the Light of Rainbow. Evil Dark Light Queen sent out the Dark Night Crows to destroy the plan of save the Light of Rainbow. The plot was discovered by The White Cloud Fairy, then the crows causing her to further lose her power. The Light Goddess gives her the Light cape for recover and fight with the Dark Light Queen. Facing their many opponents, the White Cloud Fairy sacrifices herself to protect the Light of Rainbow. She provides necessary power for the regeneration. Then Earth’s ecological equilibrium is maintained, all will be live together peacefully and enjoy this beautiful paradise.
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

節目簡介: 故事由一群小朋友在河邊玩耍，水仙子及小鴨子在河中起舞開始，鴨媽媽小心翼翼地照顧快將孵出了一窩鴨寶寶，六隻鴨寶寶孵出了, 可是最後孵出來的那隻小鴨子，卻長得又大又醜，村民稱牠做醜小鴨。 醜小鴨心裡十分難過，忍不住逃離了這個讓牠傷心的地方。逃出來的醜小鴨，經歷過許多波折，後來溫暖的春天到了，醜小鴨鼓起勇氣和一群美麗的天鵝成為好朋友，而且牠的好朋友更告訴醜小鴨， 牠是一隻非常漂亮的天鵝。 這時，牠看到自己映在水中的影子，那不是醜小鴨，而是一隻潔白高貴的天鵝！小天鵝把過去的痛苦和煩惱都忘記了，牠做夢也沒想到自己可以是這麼美麗，牠回到了故鄉，幸福的生活著。
About the Programme: The story begins with children playing by the river which becomes active and lets the water spirits dance. Little ducks swimming find a mother duck looking after six eggs which hatch out to show five little ducks and one different bird.  After a few months the villagers are still feeding the ducks but do not feed the one they call “Ugly Duckling”.  One villager takes pity on the “Ugly Duckling” and takes her home.  The Ugly Duckling gets bore and so decides to wander off on her own, she gets sleepy and so finds a place to sleep.  She dreams that it snows, then the stars come out, in the morning flowers, birds, frogs and swans appear.  On awaking she sees many swans swimming on the water and they become her friends and tell her she is a beautiful swan.  So, she look in the shadow from the water, and she can’t see the “Ugly Duckling” again, because she become a beautiful white swan now.  Little swan forget all the sad memory, get back home and have a beautiful life.

節目簡介: 可憐的鞋匠走向最後一塊皮革和決定將這塊皮革裁剪它做一雙鞋。當他和妻子睡覺時，有一群精靈用那皮革造了一對舞會著的鞋子，鞋匠醒來看到這對鞋子時，就馬上將它賣掉。鞋匠現在有錢買更多皮革，並預備做兩對鞋子，結果精靈再來幫鞋匠完成工作，鞋匠和妻子決定要看看是誰幫助他們。 12點到了，他們發現是一群精靈幫助他們。 妻子非常感激這群精靈的幫助，決定做一件外套和一對芭蕾舞鞋送給他們。她將做好的外套放在桌上，然後他們在帷幕後掩藏著觀看精靈。 精靈像之前一樣， 到了鞋匠的鞋店照常努力工作。但當他們看見放在桌上的衣裳，他們很高興地大笑。他們一面笑，扮鬼臉和高興地跳舞，他們一直跳到門外， 精靈從此消失了。 鞋匠看見他們消失後， 一直幸福愉快地和他的妻子生活。
About the Programme: A poor shoemaker came to his last piece of leather and decided to cut it to make a pair of shoes.  Whilst the shoemaker and his wife were sleeping, some Elves came into the shop and made a pair of “Party Shoes”. In the morning the shoemaker found the shoes and quickly sold them. A little later he left to buy more leather.  On his return to the shop he cut out two pairs of shoes and put leather for other shoes away.  Again the Elves made up the shoes.  After cutting the second piece of leather the shoemaker and his wife decided to stay awake to see who was making the shoes.  At twelve O’clock they saw the Elves appear to make the shoes.  When they left the shoemaker and his were so happy they danced together.  The wife said she would make the Elves a jacket and the dragged the shoemaker off to bed clutching a pair of ballet shoes.  She made the clothes, and laid them on the table. Then they went and hid behind the curtain to watch what the little Elves would do.  At midnight the Elves came in and were going to sit sown at their work as usual.  But when they saw the clothes lying there for them, they laughed and were in high glee.  They dressed themselves in the twinkling of an eye, and danced and capered and sprang about as merry as could be, till at last they danced out of the door, and over the green.  The shoemaker saw them disappear, and everything went well with him as long as he lived.

節目簡介: 在2009年4月，我們舉辦了一個成功的「示範」表演，所有學生都有機會參加這表現。藉著這表演，學員可顯示整個年所學會的舞步， 表演示範是按學生的級別和水平的順序，并且表演是以現場音樂伴奏。我們的教師為這示範表演，特別編排了一套針對皇家芭蕾舞課程的舞蹈練習為中心的舞蹈組合。學生示範了芭蕾舞、現代舞、 踢躂舞, 他們的示範演出非常成功，他們的技術和專業，令觀眾留下深刻的印象。
About the Programme: In April of 2009, we have a very successful Demonstration.  All the students have the opportunity to participate in this performance.  This performance begins with a ballet demonstration of material learned throughout the year in order of class levels and the performance is in concert accompaniment.  Our esteemed staff choreography the exercise and dance studies for this demonstration exclusively.  The students performed Ballet, Modern and Tap in the performance, and they performed very impressive and expressed their technique and professional.

節目名稱: 《舞蹈青年 2006》 – 平台舞蹈表演計劃
節目簡介: 「舞蹈青年」承接「群眾中來，群眾中去」的藝術理念，在社區挑選一群舞蹈菁英，授以多元化嚴謹的訓練及密集式排練，然後以平台舞蹈的形式展示成果，把藝術帶回社區。平台舞蹈強調公眾空間的開放性及包容性，著重觀、演之間的交流分享。平台舞蹈並沒有一個特定的主舞台作為媒介。觀眾可自由往返及穿梭各演區，甚至參與其中；舞者亦可投身觀眾之中，體驗藝術的全然開放。
About the Programme: As the artistic direction of WuDaoQingNian is “from the people to the people”, the programme started with strenuous recruitment of young talents from the community through open auditions. The selected dancers underwent intensive training and rehearsals, and demonstrated their achievement in a series of Podium Dance Performances throughout Hong Kong. Podium Dance Performance is a form of community art.  It emphasizes the open nature and diversity of dance performance, and there will be no boundaries between audience and performers, between the artists and the community, nor between the art and the non-art.

節目名稱: CCDC舞蹈課程學生匯演 - 《Good Show 2006》
舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞, 其他: 爵士舞, HIP HOP, Musical Theatre, Tap
Category: Ballet,Ethnic, Chinese, Contemporary/Modern, Other: Jazz, HIP HOP, Musical Theatre, Tap
節目簡介: 《Good Show》乃CCDC舞蹈中心為學員提供的舞蹈實踐演出平台，所有參加的學員接受純演出的專業舞蹈技巧及表演訓練，與我們一班高水準及經驗豐富的舞蹈導師共同分享學習舞蹈及演出的愉悅及難忘經驗。多年以來，《Good Show》的舞台一直是希望尋求發揮及突破的舞蹈學員之共同目標。 以參與《Good Show》演出為目標的排演課，為不同程度的舞蹈愛好者提供各種舞蹈類別包括：現代舞、爵士舞、芭蕾舞、中國舞、踢躂舞、音樂劇舞等表演訓練；學員最後在《Good Show》的舞台上，一展努力成果。
About the Programme: 《Good Show》is a platform provided by CCDC Dance Centre for students’ dance effectuation. With the professional technique and performing skills training, participants can jolly bear fruits on stage with our high quality and experienced teachers.《Good Show》has been the common goal of dance lovers for the past nine years. Our Repertoire Courses are especially designed for students who would like to join 《Good Show》. A variety of dance classes is offered to participants with different interests and levels, including Modern, Jazz, Ballet, Chinese, Tap, Musical Theatre…etc.
Venue: Sha Tin Town Hall Auditorium
venue_en: Sha Tin Town Hall, Auditorium

節目簡介: 《歌碧莉亞》，又名「淺藍眼睛的少女」，是一齣浪漫主義的芭蕾舞喜劇，原劇內容跟據霍夫曼 的童話故事（沙人）改編。由德里布作曲，聖列翁舞蹈編排。1870年5月25日首演於巴黎歌劇院。 139年來，隨著時代的演進，音樂與故事都有新編及復原的不同版本。本團曾於1995年於西灣河文娛中心及牛池灣文娛中心演出全劇，並邀請上海小天鵝芭蕾舞團來港合作演出。 其中第一幕的《女朋友之舞》，更成為我團的主打舞蹈，分別多次演出於香港文化中心、上海、天津、匈牙利的國際少年兒童文化藝術節。
About the Programme: It is the second time that Chapio Youth & Children Ballet Company performs Coppélia, a classical ballet comedy.
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium
主辦單位: 集羽青少年兒童芭蕾舞團
製作/演出單位: 集羽青少年兒童芭蕾舞團
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 《胡 桃 夾 子》是一齣聖誕節的芭蕾舞劇，原劇內容跟據德國小說家Ernst T-heodor Amadeus Hoffmann 的故事改編。她是音樂大師柴可夫斯基(Piotr Ilich Tchaikovsky)為芭蕾舞作曲的第三齣舞劇，由俄國編舞家配提拔(Marins Petipa)及伊凡諾夫(Lev Ivanov)舞蹈編排。1892年12月首演於俄羅斯聖彼德堡。 117年來，隨著時代的演進，音樂與故事都有新編的不同版本。本團曾於1992年本劇百週年紀念時演出全劇，1995年演出第二幕，亦曾多次將其中的舞蹈作個別表演。2002年我們演出以二十世紀六十年代的香港作為故事背景的版本。這次我們再演出古典的版本。
About the Programme: A full-length classical version of The Nutcracker choreographed by Marius Petipa and Lev Ivanov is performed.
Venue: Ngau Chi Wan Civic Centre Theatre
主辦單位: 集羽青少年兒童芭蕾舞團
製作/演出單位: 集羽青少年兒童芭蕾舞團
venue_en: Ngau Chi Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

節目簡介: 在一個和平的國家裏，國王皇后為剛誕下可愛的女嬰－愛麗娜公主，舉辦盛大的受洗禮。國王皇后邀請了眾多的賓客及六位仙女前來為小公主送上祝福，偏偏大意地遺留了一位仙女，卡拉波斯；卡拉波斯對於未獲邀出席非常憤怒，向公主下了一個惡毒的詛咒，就是公主會在十六歲時被紡紗車的針剌死！善良的丁香仙子為公主祝願以減輕卡拉波斯的詛咒，她預言公主不會死去，只是昏睡過去，直至一位王子為公主送上一個真誠的吻。   究竟丁香仙子的魔法能否戰勝邪惡的詛咒？王子能否排除萬難，喚醒沉睡的愛麗娜公主及她的王國？在這個暑假，毛妹芭蕾舞學校重新編排這個經典芭蕾舞劇目，引領大家進入一個繽紛燦爛，充滿愛與歡樂的童話世界。
About the Programme: Everyone in the kingdom is eagerly awaiting the birth of the King’s child. At last the infant arrives.  The King calls for a grand christening celebration to which all the fairies are invited to bestow their blessings on his daughter, Princess Aurora.  The joyous scene ends with the arrival of Carabosse, who is infuriated for not being invited. Carabosse announces her curse that Aurora will live only to the age of sixteen. Luckily the Lilac Fairy has yet to give her present.  She declares that Aurora will not die and instead fall into a  deep sleep from which she will be awoken by the kiss of a prince.       Would the fairies’ words come true? Aurora from the spell? Enter into the world of love and enchantment with Christine Liao School of Ballet’s Sleeping Beauty especially re-choreographed for children’s viewing.
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Concert Hall
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈發展基金有限公司
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Concert Hall

舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 小飛俠是個永遠長不大的孩子，他與小仙子小叮噹長居於夢幻島上。一天，他飛入一戶人家尋找遺失的身影，並巧遇三姐弟：愛幻想的溫蒂、聰明的約翰及好奇的米高，並賦予他們飛天的能力，於是眾人飛越夜空，前往神奇的夢幻島，展開他們的奇妙之旅。  他們在夢幻島上遇到迷失的孩子們、印第安人、美人魚等，正當他們玩得樂極忘形之際，無惡不作的鐵鈎船長竟然率領海盜們捉走了溫蒂。勇敢的小飛俠為了營救溫蒂，便與鐵鈎船長展開一場大戰。小飛俠究竟能否護送好朋友安全回家呢？
About the Programme: Peter Pan lives with his tiny friend, the Fairy Tinker Bell, in Never Land. One night, they fly into Wendy’s house, looking for Peter Pan’s shadow. There, they meet Wendy and her brothers John and Michael and give them power to fly.  They all fly to Never Land there they meet the Lost Boys, Indians and Mermaids.  While they are enjoying themselves in Never Land, Wendy is kidnapped by the wicked Captain Hook and his pirates.  Peter Pan fought to save his good friends and helped them to leave Never Land.  He fights fiercely with Captain Hook. Can Peter Pan save Wendy? Let’s come and find out in the show! Welcome to Never Land!
Venue: Sha Tin Town Hall Auditorium
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈發展基金有限公司
venue_en: Sha Tin Town Hall, Auditorium

舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 從前，有一個小女孩常常戴著紅帽子，大家都叫她小紅帽。   有一天，外婆生病了，媽媽請小紅帽帶一些點心去探望她。媽媽又特別吩咐小紅帽在路上要小心，不要貪玩，因為外婆住在森林裡，而且路途遙遠。這是小紅帽第一次獨自往外婆家去，她興奮極了！東看看，西聽聽，走啊走啊，走啊走啊，這次糟糕了！小紅帽誤闖誤撞地走到什麼地方去呢？她怎麼辦？
About the Programme: Once upon a time, there was a pretty little girl.  Her grandmother made her a little red hood, which suited her so well that she would never wear anything else.  So she was always called Little Red Hood.   One day, her grandmother fell ill, so mother asked Little Red Hood to bring some snacks to grandmother, who lived out in the woods, far away from the village.  Mother repeatedly told Little Red Hood to be careful while in the woods, and not to play on the way.  This was Little Red Hood’s first expedition on her own.  She was very excited. As she went into the woods, she saw many interesting things, and heard beautiful songs sung by birds.  However, as she went deeper into the woods, she bumped into something awful. What happened to her?
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Theatre
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈發展基金有限公司
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 期待已久的暑假終於來臨了，一群頑皮的反斗星參加了野外露營。愛玩的HAPPY、自大狂妄的SUPER、富有正義感的HERO及膽小如鼠的LITTLE相約於露營時舉行半夜試膽大賽，夜闖森林，冒險旅程亦由此展開。         森林中，除了遇見溫馴的動物外，他們還碰到兇猛的野獸及可怕的食人花等，最後還遇上食人族，他們最終能否死裡逃生還是未能脫離命運的主宰呢？
About the Programme: The long awaited summer holiday has finally arrived.  A group of mischievous kids gathered in the jungle for a night camp.  The group consists of the playful HAPPY, the self-assertive and reckless SUPER, the righteous HERO and the timid LITTLE.  They have decided to venture into the jungle in the middle of the night, as a test of their courage.  In the jungle, apart from a swarm of little animals welcome the kidsthey also come across the ferocious big animals, and even man-eating flowers.  Yet the most dreadful thing is an encounter with a man-eating tribe.  Can they survive the ordeal?  Can they escape the unfortunate fate?
Venue: Sha Tin Town Hall Cultural Activities Hall
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈發展基金有限公司
venue_en: Sha Tin Town Hall, Cultural Activities Hall

舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 夏日的森林，綠意盎然。各種各樣的動物正乘著這個陽光充沛的季節努力工作，為稍後到來的嚴冬作好準備。然而，一場突如其來的狂風雷暴使森林的時鐘遭受到極大的破壞而停止運作，令原本忙著按時工作的動物們失了方寸，生活作息頓時混亂起來……   舞劇將以古典優雅的芭蕾舞及傳統熱鬧的中國舞等不同舞種，演繹森林裡不同的角色。加上悅耳動聽的音樂和色彩繽紛的服裝，定會帶給觀眾一個愉快難忘的晚上。
About the Programme: In summer day, the forest is full of sunshine and greenery.  Various animals are working diligently to collect food for the coming frigid winter.  However, the clock of the forest has been broken by a sudden and severe thunderstorm.  Consequently, the living order of the animals becomes in chaos… Clock of the Forest – not only has the gracefully classical ballet, but also the lively traditional Chinese dance, and many more.  Accompany with the melodious music and colourful costume, a cheerful and unforgettable evening will sure be brought to audience.
Venue: Tai Po Civic Centre Auditorium
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈發展基金有限公司
venue_en: Tai Po Civic Centre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 每個學期我們都會舉行一次mini show，舞蹈員在每次均會表演四至五隻由不同排舞師編排的舞蹈。兩次表演雖較小型，但它提供一個很好的機會予舞蹈員一顯身手，也是一個難得的機會給其他同學免費欣賞一場精彩演出。
About the Programme: Mini Shows (Mini A and Mini B) are mini performances held in each semester in school. There are normally four to five routines performed by our members with several dance crews to perform. It provides a great opportunity for dancers to show their ability, also a great opportunity for teachers, school mates and staff members to appreciate dancing for free.
地點: 香港城市大學有蓋平台
Venue: City University of Hong Kong Cover Terrence
主辦單位: 香港城市大學舞蹈學會
Presenter: City University of Hong Kong Dancing Society
製作/演出單位: 香港城市大學舞蹈學會
Production / Performing Unit: City University of Hong Kong Dancing Society
venue.1: 香港城市大學康樂樓四樓有蓋平台
venue_en: City University of Hong Kong, Amenities Building, 4/F, Covered Terrace Cover Terrence

節目簡介: 大專聯校巡迴舞蹈滙演是一個與八間大專院校聯校舉辦的大型巡迴表演，城市大學舞蹈學會每年也會排練3隻舞蹈，與其他到訪城大的大學舞蹈員切磋及交流舞藝。當天各大學代表均使出渾身解數，跳出用不同風格的舞蹈，為觀眾帶來一場精采的演出。
About the Programme: Mass Dance is a Joint-University dance performance. Other Dancing Societies of universities come to CityU to perform while City U Dancing Society forms three different routines. It is a great opportunity for dancers to communicate through dancing. Such a large-scale event can provide a very good-quality performance for audience to appreciate. Also with different styles of dancing, audience can know much better about dancing through Mass Dance.
地點: 香港城市大學城大廣場
Venue: City University of Hong Kong University Circle
主辦單位: 香港城市大學舞蹈學會, 香港大學舞蹈學會, 香港中文大學舞蹈學會, 香港科技大學舞蹈學會, 香港嶺南大學舞蹈學會, 香港理工大學舞蹈學會, 香港教育學院舞蹈學會, 香港浸會大學舞蹈學會

venue_en: City University of Hong Kong, Amenities Building, 4/F, Covered Terrace University Circle

節目簡介: 週年表演 Annuel Performance ( AP ) 是城大舞蹈學會一年一度的盛大表演，整個舞蹈學會將會傾巢而出，盡心盡力為觀眾帶來一個難忘的晚上。每年的表演均會圍繞著一個主題，而上年度我們的主題為\"宇宙與星球\"並以金、木、水、火、土作為幾首主要舞蹈的主題。除了城大同學的演出，我們還會邀請其他嘉賓為我們表演，例如排舞師及其他院校的同學，為求讓觀眾看到一場精彩而多元化的演出。
About the Programme: Annual Performance ( AP ) is one of the biggest event for us as every member takes part in it. By showing all their talents, audience could enjoy a great show according to a specific theme each year. For example, we used \"space and universe\" as our theme and Venus, Jupiter, Mercury, Mars and Saturn were used as a theme for five different routines last year. Apart from our dancers, we would also invite other performers such as choreographers from studio and dancers from other universities to come with us; in order to make our performance as interesting and diversified as possible.
地點: (06-07)葵青劇院演藝廳; (08) 元朗劇院演藝廳
Venue: (06-07)Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium; (08) Yuen Long Theatre Auditorium

節目名稱: 北京舞蹈等級試暨頒發證書典禮
節目簡介: 表揚過去一年各學員在等級試考取優良成績外，節目主要目的能夠給每位學員都有踏上舞台的機會，亦使部份學員能接觸台前幕後工作，令家長學員更加投入於中國舞當中。
About the Programme: It is an evening presenting awards to students receiving honor in the graded examination and a student show-case.
地點: (2006)元朗劇院演藝廳 (2007) 沙田大會堂演奏廳 (2008)沙田大會堂演奏廳
