節目名稱: 元朗劇院駐場藝術家計劃「都市心觸覺」總結演出《心跳》
Programme Name: Yuen Long Theatre Artist Resident Scheme “Heart Catching” Finale -  Heart Beating
節目簡介: 「都市心觸覺」計劃著重引導參與者經歷自我思維認知和心靈創作，鼓勵青少年藉著不同類型的藝術活動，包括舞蹈、音樂、裝置藝術及接觸即興等，重新由自我心靈出發，培養多層次溝通及表達技巧、建立自信、肯定自我。總結演出為學員經半年訓練後與專業舞者同台演出。
About the Programme: The project “Heart Catching” focus on the self-cognition of participants, encourage them to re-construct their soul, develop communication skills, build up self-esteem through various art medias, including dance, music, installation and improvisation. After half-year training, the participants give finale performance together with the professional dancers.
Venue: Yuen Long Theatre Auditorium
venue_en: Yuen Long Theatre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 初戀的印象依然不時在腦海浮現，那電光火石間的觸碰、心如鹿撞般的忐忑不安、四目相投的乍驚乍喜……那些不能自主、意亂心慌的反應，卻仍一一瀝瀝在目，相信在生命的不同階段，我們都曾渴望著緣份帶著他或她翩翩而至，於是從此日子變得饒有趣味和驚喜。  愛情雖不至於是人生的全部；但沒有「愛人」的人生，又怕遺失了太多色彩……只有用那顆渴望的心不斷勇敢地去愛，才可能找到真正的幸福，不是嗎？
About the Programme: The scenes of the first love are still always in mind - the flickering sparks of love, the heart beating, the eye contact…all those “love” reflective actions, are so unforgettable. In different phases of life, we still believe the destiny would lead the right one to come right front of us and making the days full of colors and surprises.  Love is not the whole of life, but the life without “lover”, might it lose so much colors.  Following your heart and seeking for love, the fortune will be right there, isn’t it?
Venue: Crown Theatre
venue_en: Crown Theatre

節目簡介: 舞蹈劇場《只約陌生人》構設一個個不同的現實愛情處境，以荒誕、誇張、諷刺的手法，探討審視後現代愛情是一場度「心」訂造的現買現賣遊戲，還是，始終是信奉古老愛情宣言所謂的命運安排。
About the Programme: A comedy of the absurd filled with hyperboles and satire to expose love in its various contexts, each happening in our midst, Blind Dates explores whether love in post-modern society is a trade-off of speculative hears, or ‘in our destiny’, as so many die-hard romantics declare.
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

節目名稱: 2006/07年社區文化大使「人Rap人舞～遊街誌」總結演出《舞．人．情．講》
Programme Name: 2006/07 Community Cultural Ambassador “R & D Street Journal” Finale Tall to Dance
節目簡介: 節目簡介(約200字) 街名、店鋪、路人……構成一幅幅流動風景。運用現代舞的表達方法，爵士舞 / Hip Hop的演繹方法、Rap的獨特表述形式，以新角度去觀看每天都經過的一事一景，嘗試將生活、軼事融入藝術創作，編寫一闋「遊街誌」。聯合動藝的專業舞者，參加者跳出融合現代舞及流行舞元素的舞蹈「街」作。
About the Programme: Street names, shops, pedestrians…become moving pictures of streets.  Through the media of contemporary dance, jazz, hip hop and rap, from a new angle of view to express the “scenery” of daily life and write a “Street Journal”.
地點: 高山劇場劇院(31/03); 荃灣大會堂演藝廳(01/04)
Venue: Ko Shan Theatre Theatre (31/03); Tsuen Wan Theatre Auditorium  (01/04)
venue.1: 高山劇場劇院; 荃灣大會堂演藝廳
venue_en: Ko Shan Theatre Theatre ; Tsuen Wan Theatre Auditorium

節目簡介: 當南美洲熱帶雨林中一隻蝴蝶，偶然搧了搧翅膀，微弱的氣流晃動，可能造成一周後北美洲紐約的龍捲風。初始的微細差異，隨著時間而擴大，造成南轅北轍的結果。一句微不足道的說話、一個挑釁的動作、一個輕蔑的眼神，便可能成為蝴蝶的翅膀，小小躁動，扣起一環又一環的不平事，引發情緒大風暴。當你置身憤怒颶風當中，選擇怎樣自處?又可以怎樣自處?
About the Programme: One flap of a butterfly’s wings in South America may be enough to generate a tornado in New York of North America a week later.  A tiny difference in the initial conditions of system can become amplified over time.  A word of trifling importance; an act that can stir up troubles; a look that conveys contempt, which can turn into the wings of butterfly. A stir can rouse a chain reaction of feeling of injustice and an emotional storm. When you are I this violent gale, what would you do and what can you do.
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Theatre

節目簡介: 夢想愛情中的結局總是出人意表的，共處一室的你、我、他、她，是如何面對彼此？理想中的愛人與現實中的伴侶有沒有距離差異……如果我沒法成為完整的我，而你，真的會完美無暇嗎？
About the Programme: The ending of a dreamy love is always out of expectation. You, I, he, she, together in a room, how do we facing each other? Ideal lovers and partners in reality, how far of the distance in between? If I’m not a complete one, and you , would be really perfect?
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Black Box Theatre
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Black Box Theatre

節目名稱: 第七屆香港文學節「藝萃」《路中拾遺》
Programme Name: The 7th Hong Kong Literature Festival - Lost Memories
節目簡介: 以王貽興的散文《路中拾遺》為骨幹，以舞蹈加上戲劇、朗讀及互動的表演形式，描繪七八十年代出生的香港人的「集體兒時回憶」，沒有電腦和NDS的年代，依然活得快樂稱心。從中我們探視物質愈豐盛，創意愈缺乏的迷思。
About the Programme: Based on the Ong Yi Hing’s prose, childhood of those who were born in 70s and 80’s is going to restage in form of dance and accomplished by interactive drama and dialogue.  Without internet and NDS, life was still full of fun!  Is it true that we own more, our creativity loses more?
地點: 香港中央圖書館展覽廳
Venue: Hong Kong Central Library Exhibition Hall

節目名稱: 2008年社區文化大使總結演出《戀舞達人咖啡室》
Programme Name: 2008 Community Cultural Ambassador “Café de Danse” Finale
節目簡介: 結合動態的舞蹈表演藝術及靜態的陶藝視覺藝術，透過生活化的題材，讓觀眾更「貼心」感受藝術。計劃將以「露天咖啡室」為概念，以輕鬆活潑的舞蹈劇場方法，演繹一連串的港情港事，細味戀人絮語，重拾人與人之間零距離的關係。
About the Programme: A combination of dance performance and ceramic art expressing topics from daily life, and let audiences appreciate more lively art. The project is based on the concept of “Café”, developing a dance theatre and the finale is about the lovers’ speech and seeking for the intimacy.
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Black Box Theatre
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Black Box Theatre

Programme Name: Andy Wong and His Dancing Angels
節目簡介: 落入凡間的天使，就在你我眼前……王廷琳以舞蹈和音樂，將生命、愛和感受與觀眾分享；舞蹈年獎得獎作品「美麗人生」系列五年精彩片段，一晚之間呈現眼前。
About the Programme: Angels falling on the earth who are already in front of you and me.  Through dance and songs, Andy shares his feeling of life and love with audience. The fabulous pieces from the awarding piece “Beautiful Life” of Dance Award, present to you in one night.
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Black Box Theatre
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Black Box Theatre

節目名稱: 夥伴計劃真演出系列 - 《時光隧道》
Programme Name: <>Partnership Programme - REAL Showcase Series – Time Machine
節目簡介: 夥伴計劃成立目的是要善用CCDC擁有的場地及在營運和製作上的專業知識，為從事舞蹈創作的獨立藝術家及舞團提供創作空間及支援，以推動本地藝術的發展。夥伴計劃真演出系列由舞蹈中心邀請藝術家提交申請成為合作夥伴，創作新作品並於舞蹈中心的劇場作至少兩場公開表演，由舞蹈中心負責技術、宣傳、行政及票務，並資助夥伴演出的服裝及道具費用。
About the Programme: In order to effectively utilise the space, the production and administration expertise, CCDC Dance Centre launched Partnership Programme in 2004 to support the local dance artists for their creation. REAL Showcase Series aims to nurture and assist local dance groups and individuals by presenting original dance shows in our Theater. CCDC Dance Center, as a presenter, will provide rehearsal venue, technical and administrative support.
地點: CCDC 舞蹈中心七號室小劇場
Venue: CCDC Dance Centre Theatre Studio SEVEN
製作/演出單位: 何其沃、黃曉妍、朱偉仲、徐焯然、林詠茵、韓嘉政、張學良、林建洪、梁秀妍、施德恩
Production / Performing Unit: Eagle He, Qi Wo, Isis Wong, Nick Yenson, BenJoe Chui, Peggy Lam, Flora Hon, Rick Cheung,  Kelvin Lam, Jo Leung & Dan Sze
venue.1: CCDC舞蹈中心七號室小劇場
venue_en: CCDC Dance Centre Theatre Studio SEVEN

節目名稱: 《舞動教室2008畢業聚餐暨頒獎典禮》
Programme Name: DanceFit Graduation Party and Presentation Ceremony 2008
節目簡介: 各級學生表演連場舞蹈及進行簡單而隆重的畢業頒獎典禮，頒發各級成績優異獎；典禮完畢後並於香港賽馬會跑馬地馬場舉行聯歡聚餐，讓200師生與家長們聚首一堂。
About the Programme: At DanceFit Graduation Party and Presentation Ceremony 2008, students performed several recitals. The Ceremony was a combination of Award Presentation Ceremony and a gathering of around 200 students, guests and family members. Finally, this memorable afternoon ended with a buffet at Hong Kong Jockey Club.
地點: 香港賽馬會跑馬地馬場
Venue: Hong Kong Jockey Club Happy Valley Racecourse
venue.1: 香港賽馬會跑馬地馬場
venue_en: Hong Kong Jockey Club Happy Valley Racecourse

節目名稱: 《舞動教室課堂示範暨畢業典禮2007》
Programme Name: DanceFit  Class Demonstration and Graduation Ceremony 2007
節目簡介: 是次畢業演出之目的主要讓家長分享子女們的學習成果；同時亦為學生們提供可貴的舞台經驗。藝術總監特意選編部分課程內容作示範演出，讓家長及同學們更了解學習古典芭蕾舞的進程及分級試的概況。同時亦特別編排了多個舞蹈小品，讓學生們領略舞蹈世界內豐富的創作內容，從而獲得舞台演出的經驗和樂趣。
About the Programme: DanceFit Class Demonstration and Graduation Ceremony 2007 features the syllabi of Royal Academy of Dance and 8 recitals which are choreographed by Miss Cecilia Chan. The highlight of the event is the Graduation and Award Ceremony. Over a hundred students are awarded for their excellent performance.
Venue: Ngau Chi Wan Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Ngau Chi Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

節目簡介: 《舞動教室學生匯演2006》共演出13個舞蹈小品及《仙履奇緣精裝版》，全部由藝術總監陳凱詩小姐特別編排。讓表演者施展渾身解數，盡展所長將一年學習成果與觀眾分享。
About the Programme: Dance Gala@DanceFit 2006 features 13 recitals and excerpts from Cinderella, all choreographed by Artistic Director Miss Cecilia Chan.
Venue: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Drama Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts, Drama Theatre

Programme Name: Dance Gala for Celebration of HKSAR 10th Anniversary
舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 《繽紛舞匯慶回歸》乃慶祝舞林飛越25載及香港回歸十週年之演藝活動，全晚由數百名舞林兒童舞出多元舞蹈，兒童舞有《生日快樂》、《小苗苗》，中國舞有朝鮮舞之《嬉戲在花田》，漢族舞之《喜迎春》、《喜慶的日子》、《水鄉織女》等。芭蕾舞有《睡美人之鑽石仙子》、《藍鳥》獨舞及《雪花仙子》，此外亦有西班牙舞及爵士舞等。部分舞林高材生更參予錢秀蓮舞蹈團《武極》系列現代舞之春、夏、秋、冬及天人合一為主題之中國現代舞表演，最後以歡樂氣氛之《鼓舞歡慶》結幕。
About the Programme: The Dance Gala for Celebration of HKSAR 10th Anniversary also marked the 25th Anniversary of the founding of Danceland.  The programme for the evening was performed by a few hundred young dancers from Danceland, and included children dances, Happy Birthday and Young Miao; Chinese dances Playing in the Flower Fields (Korean), Welcome, Spring!, Happy Days and The Weaver Girls of the Waterlogged Land (Han); ballet The Diamond Fairy from Sleeping Beauty, Blue Bird solo and The Snowflake Fairies; Spanish dance, and Jazz dance.  Some of the outstanding students from Danceland also participated in the Chinese Modern Dance segment of the Chinese Martial Arts Dance Series by the Miranda Chin Dance Company, dancing in Spring, Summer, Autumn and Winter, as well as in Heaven and Man as One.  The evening came to a close with the rousing, joyous Celebratory Drums.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

舞蹈類別: 民族舞, 中國舞, 推廣舞蹈
節目簡介: 演出強調“全部作品均是原創舞蹈”，並以推廣普及舞蹈為目的。是次演出以青年演員為主，並吸納一批熱愛舞蹈的中、老年人士參加演出，又培訓了一批小朋友加入演出隊伍，年齡層面廣泛從5歲到80歲均參與其中。同時，亦培養了數位本地舞蹈創作人才，共同製作這台演出。作品種類廣泛，有：民間舞、民族舞、兒童舞、古典舞、古代舞和推廣舞蹈，舞團根據不同人士的能力而創作同樣悅目的舞蹈；通過演出，讓不同年齡的人跳不同的舞蹈，以達至不斷拓展舞蹈藝術這目標。
About the Programme: The performance emphasizes “all original dance works” and aims to expedite dance to the public.  This performance mainly involves young dancers, also attracts one group of dance lovers for middle and old ages to join the performance and trains up one group of children as the performance troupe.  Dancers are aging from 5 to 80 years old.  Meanwhile, this promotes several local dance choreographers, to create the dance work.  The creations are very comprehensive, including traditional dance, folk dance, children dance, classical dance, ancient dance and populated dance.  Base on the ability of various members, sophisticated dance works are created.  Through this performance, it enables different age of people to enjoy various kinds of dancing which can achieve the purpose of continuous development of dance art.
Venue: Tsuen Wan Town Hall Auditorium
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium

節目簡介: 我們藉著《夢．舞人生》這個舞蹈晚會，向大家展出我們對人生的種種夢想，對到訪夢中天堂的期待，對團圓之夢之追求， 對豐盛人生的歡愉和快樂的追求。     1. 夢‧境 － 追逐之夢 夢想推動著生命的航船，我們不斷追尋夢想  2. 夢‧天 － 天堂之夢 我們夢寐以求天堂的美好，藝術的翅膀引領我們翶翔, 我們期待，期待到訪夢中的天堂  3.夢‧緣 － 團圓之夢 我們因緣相聚，有共同的夢想 我們亦夢團圓，一起分享理想和生命 團聚帶來喜悅滿溢，彼此感情不斷增長，人間遂成了天堂  4.夢‧花 － 華采之夢 我們追求豐盛人生的歡愉，追求和快樂，就是人生的華采，我們為理想和真情起舞  願我們一起跨越藝術和人生的舞台，開拓更美好的未來
About the Programme: We want to share our dreams with everyone—dreams of vision, dreams of heaven, dreams of family and dreams of friendship. 1. Dreams of Vision   We have common dreams. We pursue our dreams together 2. Dreams of Heaven    We are dreaming of a beautiful paradise. We look forward to visiting the dream of paradise  3. Dreams of Family    The reunion of family is a very important value in Chinese traditions  Because of fate, we seem to be a family and we have common dreams  We also dream of getting together to share our ideals and our life. It’s full of happiness. Overflow feelings seems never ending. At this moment, our world becomes a paradise suddenly.    4. Dreams of Friendship  We all have different dreams in our lives. Our friends are like different colours and we create a rainbow when we get together. With friends coming from China to join our stage, we celebrate and share our friendships on this amazing night. We are paying efforts to make our dreams come true.
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Concert Hall
主辦單位: 雅健社舞蹈團,  踏歌社
Presenter: Elegance Society Dance Troupe, Ta Ge See
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Concert Hall

節目簡介: 男剛烈肢體，女感性形態；7位來自中港台及東南亞的舞蹈精英，各以其獨特風格、精湛創新的動作技巧，作一次越界體驗。
About the Programme: Masculine and Powerful. Feminine and Sensual.  With their unique styles, tremendous energy and incredible technique, 7 of the most prominent dance artists from Mainland China, Taiwan, HK and Southeast Asia will together create a magnificent fusion of dance.
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

節目簡介: 東邊邀請本地最強前衛當代舞團演出，分別是OO合、不加鎖舞踊館及黃大徽，他們以多媒體的手法，帶你進入迷離舞界，狂言狂舞；妙想天開表達方式，炮製三個狂想作品。    1.《白影》  舞團：OO合 編舞：方俊權、龐智筠  2.《1+1≠2》  編舞/舞團：黃大徽 3.《Whatever》 舞團：不加鎖舞踊館 編舞：王榮祿
About the Programme: The E-side Dance Company has invited three of Hong Kong\'s top avant garde dance units - Zero Zero Ensemble, Unlock Dancing Plaza and Dick Wong - to take audiences into the realm of a nebulous existence with crazy dialogue and frenetic dances. Imaginations run wild in the making of the three remarkable dance works.         1. White Shadows Dance Company: Zero Zero Ensemble Choreographer：Force Fong,  Noel Pong  2.《1+1≠2》  Choreographer：Dick Wong 3.《Whatever》 Dance Company: Unlock Dancing Plaza Choreographer：Ong Yong Lock
Venue: Ngau Chi Wan Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Ngau Chi Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

節目簡介: 今個夏天，香港雲集一班亞洲出色舞蹈家，自成一派、於舞台上大顯身手，施展渾身解數，編織一系列色、香、美，新潮流、新觀感舞蹈作品，與你作舞蹈對話、對跳、對唱、對對照；帶給觀眾高能量、高技巧、高密度、情感型、動態型的視覺、動作享受。
About the Programme: This summer, a group of outstanding Asian dancers will converge in Hong Kong to showcase their talents. Weaving together a tapestry of dance performances, they will display new trends and bring new perspectives to the dance medium. They will engage the audience in dialogue, in duets and in songs, delighting all with their high energy, skillful techniques, intensity, emotions and vibrant movements. A Showcase of Asian Dancers brings to you enjoyable performances that are truly visual and dynamic.
Venue: Ngau Chi Wan Civic Centre Theatre
編舞: 王丹琦 (香港)、程錦、譚洪濤 (內地)、周書毅、吳易珊 (台灣)、金甫瓔 (南韓)及劉傑仁 (馬來西亞)
Choreographers: Wong Tan-ki (Hong Kong), Cheng Jin, Tan Hongtao (Mainland), Chou Shu-yi,  Wu Yi-san (Taiwan), Kim Bo-young (South Korea), Jay Jen Loo (Malaysia)
venue_en: Ngau Chi Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

節目簡介: 《舞進芭蕾》分為兩部份，上半部份由高級班的學員負責演繹一些經典芭蕾舞劇，而下半部份就以多個有趣的角色串連成童話故事，由低年班的學員為大家演出。為了大家有一個難忘的晚上，我們百多位學員用了多個月的努力去排練，演出成功。在整個長達大半年的籌備過程中，非常艱辛，但當看見各學員都認真、投入排練時，都真的滿足了。
About the Programme: The program is divided into two parts. The first half would mainly be classical ballet performed by senior students. The latter half would be a fairy tale performed by junior students, with many lovely characters. They are all sweet and cute, performing in a vivid way. To ensure an unforgettable night, over hundred of our students have spent months for preparation, to make the show a good one.
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Theatre

節目簡介: 一班新浪潮、新世代出色舞者運用超凡想像力，表現現代人新觀點、新思維；衝破傳統舞蹈框框，敢於挑戰舞蹈極限，炮製全方位全瘋感的獨特作品。
About the Programme: The new storm turning dance into inspired and unique works of passion and beauty; the go-for-broke physicality of the choreography - brought by your new generation of the most outstanding dance artists.
Venue: Ngau Chi Wan Civic Centre Theatre
演出/製作: Jing Li, David Leung , Iris Sze, Luo Fan, Bruce Wong, Makie Okabe
Cast and Production: Jing Li, David Leung , Iris Sze, Luo Fan, Bruce Wong, Makie Okabe
編舞: 李咏靜、梁嘉能、施寶穎、羅凡、黃振邦、岡部牧繪
Choreographers: Jing Li, David Leung , Iris Sze, Luo Fan, Bruce Wong, Makie Okabe
venue_en: Ngau Chi Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

節目簡介: 香港舞壇近年出現不少鬼才舞者，各自組團，各出奇謀！      他們不單止愛旅遊，愛逛街，愛唱 K，更愛走入劇場攪攪震、攪到自己無得瞓，更令一眾電車男、干物女、少男少女、型男索女、老幼大小，尖叫大笑，鼎力支持。今次他們精心炮製，再次天馬行空，各出鬼主意泡製一場開心、快樂、激情、浪漫、感人、感動、動感的晚上，共同發表舞蹈宣言，觀眾勢必大飽眼福。
About the Programme: The most talented dance artists in Hong Kong are coming!       They are hip.  They are chic.  They are trendy.  They make you laugh.  They make you scream.  They make up your dream.  Come join us and let’s share the romantic, happy, exciting and passionate night of dancing.
Venue: Ngau Chi Wan Civic Centre Theatre
演出/製作: 三大歌舞團; 標局; Neo Dance HK
Cast and Production: Big 3 Ensemble; Biuguk; Neo Dance HK ;
編舞: (三大歌舞團)甯明敏, 盧慧怡, 歐嘉美; (標局)李健偉; (Neo Dance HK )王丹琦
Choreographers: (Big 3 Ensemble)Mon Ning, Tiffany Lo, May Au; (Biuguk)Max Lee; (Neo Dance HK) Wong Tan Ki
venue_en: Ngau Chi Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

Programme Name: The Glamour of the Flowering Street
節目簡介: 《花街十八號》是以歐陸式的花街場景為幻想舞台，前後共十四幕演出，描述花街從早到晚，不同人物和角落的生活片段，務求帶各位觀眾走進這個充滿童真幻想的花街世界觀，享受全新的芭蕾感覺。這兒有幸福的小貓、雄糾糾的士兵、特色的小商店，保證令人樂而忘返。 為了令這次表演成功，無論是年僅四歲的小表演者，還是十多歲的少年學員，人人都傾力演出。在整個籌備過程裏，所有台前幕後的工作人員都盡心盡力，以成功演出為目標，忘記了當中的辛勞與困難，面帶笑容向完美的舞台出發。
About the Programme: The fantastic stage of The Glamour of the Flowery Street has adopted the background of European flowery street. Altogether there are 14 acts, portraying the snatch of every one’s life in every corner, from sunrise to sunset. It strives to bring the audience into the world of the flower street filled with childhood fantasy, letting them bath in the brand-new spa of ballet. Here you can find blissful kittens, dashing soldiers and special stores. You are guaranteed to discover enormous pleasure!  To make the show a successful one, every member, no matter the little performers who have just reached the age of 4, or the teenage students in their 10’s, devoted themselves to perform the best. Throughout the preparation process, team members onstage and backstage pulled their weight to produce an excellent show. They forgot all hardships and difficulties, heading to the perfect stage with a big smile on their faces.
地點: 香港理工大學賽馬會綜藝館
Venue: The Hong Kong Polytechnic University Jockey Club Auditorium
venue.1: 香港理工大學賽馬會綜藝館
venue_en: The The Hong Kong Polytechnic University Jockey Club Auditorium

節目簡介: 本校有一群喜愛跳舞的孩子，學習芭蕾舞經年。他們每一個人都因著跳舞而遇上親愛的友伴，獲得一段段美好的回憶。孩子們一天天長大，跳出的舞步越發好看，唯一不變的就是他們臉上的光彩和笑容。因為愛‧跳舞，於是他們笑了。  適逢本校一年一度舉行的芭蕾舞匯演，我們特意以《愛‧跳舞》作主題，希望學員們透過舞蹈，表達出他們在學習芭蕾的多年來，所感受和經歷的種種愛和分享。顧名思義，這次節目的主題不單代表學員們熱愛跳舞的心情，當中更包含了學員們在學習過程中所得到的愛：來自師長、家人、友伴們。
About the Programme: Our School has a group of kids who love dancing. They have been learning ballet for many years. Every one of them encounters their dear friends because of dancing. Cast in their minds is every single piece of sweet memory. The kids grow up day by day and their dancing skills excel as time goes by. The only thing remains unchanged is the splendor and smile on their faces. Because of love‧dance, they smile.  We specially selected Love‧Dance as the main theme of our School’s annual ballet show. Through dancing, we hope that our students will showcase the love and sharing they experienced in these years of practicing ballet. As implied in the name, the main theme of the program represents students’ enthusiasm in dance, and it also expresses the love experienced by student in their learning process: from parents, teachers, family and friends.
地點: 香港理工大學賽馬會綜藝館
Venue: The Hong Kong Polytechnic University Jockey Club Auditorium
venue.1: 香港理工大學賽馬會綜藝館
venue_en: The The Hong Kong Polytechnic University Jockey Club Auditorium

節目簡介: 《韵情舞集06》是韵情舞集主辦一年一度的舞蹈晚會，於2006年12月25日假上環文娛中心劇院舉行，當晚由韵情舞坊、韵情舞集全體學員及團員演出多個全新編排的節目；另外更加有全新原創舞劇《可可的幸福》，以不同的舞種（中國舞、芭蕾舞、爵士舞）展現於觀眾眼前，另外更邀請多間中、小學參與演出，一同將節目的歡樂給廣大觀眾。
About the Programme: The annual performance Kidance 06 organized by Kidance Troupe has been held on 25/12/2006 at the Theatre of Sheung Wan Civic Centre. A lot of newly choreographed dances and a dance drama in different dance types have been performed. Many guest performers were invited too.
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

節目簡介: 韵情舞集主辦一年一度的演出晚會《韵情舞集07》，於2007年9月30日西灣河文娛中心劇院舉行，今年更邀請儂情舞集協辦，務使當晚的節目更加精彩及多元化。當晚由韵情舞坊、韵情舞集及儂情舞集全體學員及團員演出多隻全新編排的節目；今年更加原創全新舞劇《 反轉珊瑚海》將環保意識，以不同的舞蹈種類（中國舞、芭蕾舞及爵士舞等）展現於觀眾眼前。另外，更邀請了多個嘉賓團體演出，一同將歡樂帶給廣大觀眾。
About the Programme: The annual performance Kidance 07 organized by Kidance Troupe and co-organized with Forever Dance Troupe has been held on 30/9/2007 at the Theatre of Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre. It included a lot of newly choreographed dances and a dance drama on environmental concern with different dance types. Many guest performers were invited too.
Venue: Sai  Wan Ho Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sai  Wan Ho Civic Centre Theatre

節目簡介: 由韵情舞集主辦一年一度的演出晚會《韵情舞集08》，於2008年8月10日假西灣河文娛中心劇院舉行，今年的演出安排了一連串的中國舞分級考試組合展示，作為各級考試班同學的匯報，此外為了使當晚的節目更加精彩及多元化，老師們更精心編排及炮製了多隻全新舞蹈，作為暑假班的總結。另外，更邀請了多個演出嘉賓團體，一同將歡樂帶給廣大觀眾。
About the Programme: The annual performance Kidance 08 organized by Kidance Troupe has been held on 10/8/2008 at the Theatre of Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre. It included a lot of newly choreographed dances and combinations of dances from the Chinese Dance Graded Examination Syllabus.  Many guest performers were invited too.
Venue: Sai  Wan Ho Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sai  Wan Ho Civic Centre Theatre

節目名稱: 《夏日舞繽紛 – 不可不知的芭蕾》
Programme Name: Summer Dazzle – All you ought to know about Ballet
舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 爵士
節目簡介: 學習芭蕾舞的人多不勝數，但了解芭蕾舞發展及起源的則少之有少，為推廣芭蕾的認知，及透過舞蹈不同時代及階段來演譯，以期可以讓更多人了解芭蕾舞背後的歷史，能更好地發揚這古老典雅的藝術.
About the Programme: Millions of people learn ballet, but not many general public know the history and development of this classical art form. Through the performance of different dances in different stage, the audience were introduced to the background development and training of ballet step by step.
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

Programme Name: Summer Dazzle – When you were young
舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 爵士
節目簡介: 21 世紀的小朋友著迷於電子遊戲機，缺乏大肌肉運動，精神面貎缺乏朝氣蓬勃的小朋友特性，相比以往有益身心的課外活動，身和心都得到適當的鍛練，正能量亦相應提高。《小時候》鼓勵同學們多作身體運動，回復天真活潑的面貎。
About the Programme: The programme is about all the fun exercises we did in the old days that both our mind and body got fully exercised and trained. In comparing with nowadays children who are obsessed by electronic game, funs in the past seem to be more healthy and recommendable.
Venue: Ngau Chi Wan Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Ngau Chi Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 爵士
節目簡介: 《白雪公主》是夏日舞繽紛2008的主題，舞蹈編導為秦懿欣，何寶儀及黎秀婷老師。七個小矮人的故事家傳戶曉，掀起節目的高潮。白雪公主及王子等主要演員均為本校高年級學生，首次擔綱演出。全劇60多位演員傾力演出，是一場視覺及戲劇效果都能充分體現的演出。
About the Programme: Snow White is a dance drama choreographed by Ms. Ulian Chun, Ms. Ho Po Yee and Ms. Christina Lai. The story line is well known by all children, and it was well receipted by all participants. The performance of the 7 little drawfs was the high light of the show, both principle dancers are students of higher grade and it was their debut to dance their sole version on stage.
Venue: Sai  Wan Ho Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sai  Wan Ho Civic Centre Theatre

節目簡介: 今年在北京舉行的舉世矚目運動盛事，將大家的心連繫在一起，凝聚了一股不可或缺的力量，促進世界的文化交流，而舞蹈亦本著同樣的信念，因此不同國家、民族也擁有獨當一面的舞蹈。舞者會以皇者的風範，以同樣的舞蹈基礎跳出不一樣的特色，用活力、熱情及浪漫的舞蹈帶領大家到芬蘭、俄羅斯、墨西哥、中國、意大利、德國、希臘、韓國、美國、加拿大及法國，穿梭不同的主辦國，響應今年的運動盛事。
About the Programme: Living the Olympic dream in August 2008 Beijing, we are all devoted and committed to the great success of the games. In dancing, we had similar aspirations; therefore different countries have distinguished cultural dances. Our performers will bring you to a world of glory, honour and excitement. We have dances in our programme from past organizing countries such as Finland, Russia, Mexico, China, Italy, Germany, Greek, Korea, USA, Canada and France.
Venue: Sai  Wan Ho Civic Centre Theatre
Presenter: Rotary Club of City Northwest Hong Kong
venue_en: Sai  Wan Ho Civic Centre Theatre

節目名稱: 《第三屆藝術義工培訓班畢業典禮暨中國舞蹈匯演 及「教院義工舞蹈暖香江」中國舞蹈匯演》
Programme Name: The 3rd Arts Volunteer Training Course Gradation Ceremony & Chinese Dance Performance
節目簡介: 是次匯演乃「社會共融齊起舞2006」藝術義工服務計劃中的一個重點項目。除了匯演外，於整個計劃中，我們分別舉行了「中國舞蹈的社會功能」研討會、義工舞蹈比賽、少年藝術義工培訓計劃、外展舞蹈工作坊及藝術義工培訓班。  匯演中，共有十多個團體共同參與，把藝術義工服務訊息傳播致社會每一個角落。其中，我們更創作了《教院義工舞蹈暖香江》之《我為孺子創未來》及 創新傷健共融舞劇《二泉映月》兩個大型的舞蹈。期望能夠把藝術義工服務訊息傳播到教育界及傷健人士，藉此發揚「社會共融」的精神。
About the Programme: The programme is one of the major part in a plan “Dance for harmonic society 2006”. Apart from the programme, we also orgainzed the Chinese dance conference, dance competition, dance training programmes and dance workshops.   There are nearly 20 organizations participated in the programme. In order to convey the message about Art volunteer services, we create the Dance poem – Bright future for kids and the inclusive dance drama Reflections of the Moon on the Water of Erquan. We hope that more and more people can experience the truth of Arts and to love can care about the community.
Venue: Tai Po Civic Centre Auditorium
主辦單位: 香港教育學院學生會中國舞蹈藝術義工團
Presenter: HKIEDSU Chinese Dance Arts Volunteer Society
製作/演出單位: 香港教育學院學生會中國舞蹈藝術義工團
Production / Performing Unit: HKIEDSU Chinese Dance Arts Volunteer Society
venue_en: Tai Po Civic Centre, Auditorium

節目名稱: 《第四屆教院藝術義工培訓班畢業典禮暨「傳心傳義」義工舞蹈匯演 及   2007 義工舞蹈比賽頒獎典禮暨「教院義工舞蹈暖香江」中國舞蹈匯演 》
Programme Name: The 4th HKIED Arts Volunteer Training Course Gradation Ceremony & Chinese Dance Performance
節目簡介: 是次匯演乃「社會共融齊起舞2007」藝術義工服務計劃中的一個重點項目。除了匯演外，於整個計劃中，我們分別舉行了義工舞蹈比賽、外展舞蹈工作坊及藝術義工培訓班。  是次中國舞蹈匯演共有十多個團體共同參與，表演了多個不同民族的舞蹈，讓參與者都能感受到中國舞蹈的樂趣。而當中，我們設計了以「樂、善、勇、敢」為主題的「傳心傳義」教院義工舞蹈組合，透過四段不同風格的中國舞蹈，描述了「樂、善、勇、敢」的義工特質，希望透過悠揚的樂韻和輕快的舞步，把義工精神傳播到得更廣更遠。
About the Programme: The programme is one of the major part in a plan “Dance for harmonic society 2007”. Apart from the programme, we also orgainzed the dance competition, dance training programmes and dance workshops.   There are nearly 20 organizations participated in the programme. In order to let more teenagers experience the joyful of Chinese Dance Art, we created four sections of the dance with the theme about the joyful of learning, the care to community, development of creativity, and senses of commitment. In this way, more and more people can experience the spirit or volunteer services.
Venue: Tsuen Wan Town Hall Auditorium
主辦單位: 香港教育學院學生會中國舞蹈藝術義工團
Presenter: HKIEDSU Chinese Dance Arts Volunteer Society
製作/演出單位: 香港教育學院學生會中國舞蹈藝術義工團
Production / Performing Unit: HKIEDSU Chinese Dance Arts Volunteer Society
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium

節目名稱: 《第五屆教院藝術義工培訓班畢業典禮暨「義工嘉許」中國舞蹈匯演 及 「教院義工舞蹈暖香江」中國舞蹈匯演》
Programme Name: The 5th HKIED Arts Volunteer Training Course Gradation Ceremony & Chinese Dance Performance
節目簡介: 是次匯演乃「社會共融齊起舞2008」藝術義工服務計劃中的一個重點項目。除了匯演外，於整個計劃中，我們分別舉行了義工舞蹈比賽、外展舞蹈工作坊及藝術義工培訓班。  是次中國舞蹈匯演中，我們邀得多間學校及社區團體共同參與，互相交流及分享，一同感受中國舞蹈的樂趣。而當中，我們更結合中國不同民族的生活文化和特色，創作了《民族舞蹈薈萃》的舞蹈組合。藉各具特色的民族舞蹈作為藝術工具，讓更多社會人士都能藉此認識中國民族的特點，體會藝術背後的意義 ─「真、善、美」。
About the Programme: The programme is one of the major part in a plan “Dance for harmonic society 2008”. Apart from the programme, we also orgainzed the dance competition, dance training programmes and dance workshops.   Many schools and non-governmental organizations participated in the programme. Through the sharing and performance, audiences understood more about the background of Chinese Dance and we created several sections of the dance related to different nations in China. In this way, people experienced the features of different nations and understood the spirit or Chinese culture.
Venue: Tai Po Civic Centre  Auditorium
主辦單位: 香港教育學院學生會中國舞蹈藝術義工團
Presenter: HKIEDSU Chinese Dance Arts Volunteer Society
製作/演出單位: 香港教育學院學生會中國舞蹈藝術義工團
Production / Performing Unit: HKIEDSU Chinese Dance Arts Volunteer Society
venue_en: Tai Po Civic Centre  Auditorium

節目簡介: 《歲月》包括11個獨立的舞蹈創作，涵蓋古今，中國和香港的不同歷史時期、作者感觸至深的事件、生活點滴中最動情的章節，編輯成作品集，獻給觀眾。
About the Programme: As Time Goes By… included 11 independent dance works which described different periods and histories of China and Hong Kong from past to now.  The dance works were created with its own style and represented the most touching, life feeling and inspiration by the choreographers.
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium

節目簡介: 《晨光三月》為香港舞蹈團兒童團自創團以來首個大型製作。舞段中《雀雀樂》，跳出小朋友童真的幻想；《祈福舞》、《圈出你我心》舞動出太陽般熱情的活力；《獅子耍球》跳出中國民間舞的韻味；帶您進入七彩繽紛的夢幻境地。
About the Programme: Sunrise in March, the first major performance of the Children\'s Troupe, features segments like Joy of Birdie which brings out children\'s imagination. Praying for Fortune and Encircle Our Hearts radiate passionate energy like the sun, while Lion Ball Dance manifests the essence of Chinese folk dance even brings the audience into a fabulous dreamlike world.

Programme Name: Dance Extravaganza for End Child Sexual Abuse Foundation
節目簡介: 2008年9月20及21日於香港大會堂音樂廳上演两場風格鮮明、形神俱備的民族舞蹈慈善匯演《聚舞傾情為護苗》，由香港東南亞舞蹈團及索意歐洲民族舞蹈團聯合主辦，分別由廖春慧女士和楊君儒先生領導，並邀斯洛伐克國家民族舞蹈團及印尼東南亞舞蹈團坐鎮，印尼、菲、馬、泰、羅馬尼亞、斯洛伐克、匈牙利和波蘭等各具特色，互相輝映。是次演出為護苗基金籌集善款港幣叄拾萬元正。
About the Programme: The Hong Kong South East Asia Dance Troupe (HKSEADT) and Legacy European Folk Dance Troupe (LEFDT) both aim at promoting ethnical dances from Asia and Europe.  In order to break the demarcations of Eastern and Western cultures, it takes much pleasure to announce that we  jointly present two dance performances in September, featuring 14 dances from 8 countries over the world.  The Slovakian State Dance Ensemble and Indonesian South East Asia Dance Troupe are invited to highlight the programme.
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Concert Hall
主辦單位: 香港東南亞舞蹈團 及 索意歐洲民族舞蹈團
Presenter: Hong Kong South East Asia Dance Troupe (HKSEADT) and Legacy European Folk Dance Troupe (LEFDT)
製作/演出單位: 香港東南亞舞蹈團 及 索意歐洲民族舞蹈團
Production / Performing Unit: Hong Kong South East Asia Dance Troupe (HKSEADT) and Legacy European Folk Dance Troupe (LEFDT)
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Concert Hall

節目簡介: 在小孩子的世界中,要表達是、非、討厭總是簡單不過的事。然而在成年人的世界中,要我們直截了當地說「Yes」、「No」,抑或瀟瀟灑灑地下決定(尤其是將人與人關係帶來張力的決定),卻是困難非常。 害怕的不單是一個決定,還有背後要承擔的責任吧!更難受的是作決定前的那份忐忑與及猶豫! 精力旺盛的編舞何靜茹打定主意與一眾舞者以高能量撇撇脫脫地掀開人與人問係的底蘊,並聯同電台節目主持/寫書人Wasabi以聲音及文字帶領觀眾遊坎於一個個愛與不愛的抉擇。 透過過這庚的演出,願我們一起經驗能從心底最深處徹徹底底放聲高叫「我肯定!YES!」的爽快感受!
About the Programme: It’s always an extremely simple matter for a child to come up with a judgment on whether something is right, wrong, likable or disgusting. But it’s almost impossible for an adult to have a simple answer of “Yes”, “No” or make a decision (particularly those related to personal relationships).  Making a decision is tough enough, even more frightening is the responsibilities behind every decision! The swinging back and forth before deciding is even harder to bear.  Choreographer, Frankie Ho, is determined to use high-energy dance movements to unlock personal relationships in collaboration with author, Wasabi, who would use sound and words to invite the audience through a journey of love (or not to) decision.   Through this piece, we hope you can enjoy the feeling of screaming out from the bottom of our hearts “I am sure, YES!”
地點: 香港藝術中心麥高利小劇場
Venue: Hong Kong Arts Centre McAulay Studio
venue.1: 香港藝術中心麥高利小劇場
venue_en: Hong Kong Arts Centre, McAulay Studio

節目簡介: 《愛您拾分七柒》是有關現代都市人愛得恰到好處的小品，題材與現實並非遙不可及，就像跟好友在咖啡店裡分享自己的生活點滴。本劇以音樂舞劇的表演形式，醞釀出八個「愛情」片段。  舞台及演員雖然沒有宮庭華麗的包裝，但以舞蹈與戲劇最原始、由人出發的基本來處理，相信舞者的能量與演員的表演最能吸引觀眾，透過身體動力與戲劇上的精緻安排，一切回歸原本，開創舞蹈與原創性的音樂劇場。  《愛您拾分七柒》將生活加詩意，營造充滿濃厚戲劇感的原創劇場，透過虛實之間的變化來呈現，打破音樂劇在一般人的眼中是必定是大製作的舊有概念，讓本地原創音樂劇在劇場中生根發芽。
About the Programme: “Luv 70%” is a tale of modern urbanites’ love affairs in their best forms. The realistic materials make it feel like sharing life’s moments at a café. This musical has eight “love” segments.   Without fancy props and costumes, this piece starts from the intrinsic core of being human moving through dancers’ energetic movements and delicate theatrical arrangements, we hope our audience will join our dance-theatre journey returning to the very human core.  “Luv 70%” inculcates poetic elements into lives by adding rich theatrical and original elements and crossing between reality boundaries. It seeks to debunk the status quo that musicals are of large productions and helps foster local original musical artistic expressions.
Venue: 藝穗會小劇場
venue_en: 藝穗會小劇場

節目簡介: 由2005年起，Infinity Dance Studio 每年舉辦之 Dance to Infinity是為學校之週年舞蹈匯演。本節目內容豐富，包括街頭舞、爵士舞、現代舞及拉丁舞等等，表演者為本校之學生及導師，還有遠道而來的著名外國表演嘉賓。舉辦本節目，除了給予學生一個表演平台以外，  亦都藉此機會推廣舞蹈文化至香港普羅大眾。
About the Programme: Four years in a row since 2005, Infinity Dance Studio (IDS) has organized annual performances in the year end, marking a momentum for the company.  Most dance pieces, categorized in Hip Hop (Freestyle, Breaking, Popping) and Jazz (Jazz Funk, Pop Jazz, Lyrical Jazz), were performed by students from IDS, backed up with dedicated and creative choreography by dance tutors.      The showcase also featured guest performers in a variety of dance styles from all over the world – award-winning Latin dancers, street dancers from Boogiezone of the U.S., to name a few, were some of the most sought-after staging in previous annual performances.  Reaching for refinement, the shows were enriched with more prolific choreography, well-trained performing students and sophisticated stage effects.  The performances, however, went beyond sole entertainment. The persistent yearly showcase has not only encouraged dance as a local cultural motif, but also cultivated performers’ self-worth and respect for other forms of performing arts.
地點: 香港理工大學賽馬會綜藝館
Venue: Hong Kong Polytechnic University Jockey Club Auditorium
venue.1: 香港理工大學賽馬會綜藝館

舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 爵士&舞蹈運動
節目簡介: 回顱創舞坊20年的作品及展望未來希望能夠把創團的理念，「藝術娛樂化，娛樂藝術化，不論男女老幼，高矮肥瘦，皆可以跳舞」這個理論，衝出香港飛向中國大陸各地。
About the Programme: A review of the Company repertoire in the past two decades and look forward to the way ahead with a view to bring its objectives of making arts entertaining and making entertainment artistic, and fostering the culture of dance in all age and physical groups, to not only Hong Kong but all areas in China.
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Theatre

舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 爵士& 拉丁舞
節目簡介: 我們喜歡巴赫，亦十分喜歡披頭四的音樂。希望透過巴赫與披頭四的經典名曲，將芭蕾舞的優雅線條，賞心悅目的跳躍及旋轉表現出來，當然其中加添了新意，把拉丁舞、劇場舞蹈及新古典及現代芭蕾舞元素融會其中，令觀眾耳目一新。
About the Programme: I like Bach’s music as well as the Beatles. I would like to highlight the classical lines,  spectacular high leaps and pirouettes through the Bach’s  and Beatles music. Of course, I put some new elements like latin, theatrical dance and neo classical ballet to thrill the audiences.
Venue: Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre Theatr
venue_en: Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre Theatr

節目簡介: 重新篇排原全屬於小朋友的天鵝湖創造出經典中的經典。柴可夫斯基1876年創作的四幕芭蕾舞劇《天鵝湖》取材于民間傳說。公主被惡魔變成白天鵝，只有在夜晚才能恢復美麗的外貌。王子一見鐘情，挑選新娘之夜，惡魔讓自己的女兒黑天鵝假裝成爲公主在舞會上誘騙王子。王子差一點受騙，最終還是認破惡魔殺死了她。白天鵝恢復了女兒外貌，與王子從此過著幸福快樂的日子。
About the Programme: Swan Lake all belongs to the children. The little ballerinas’ dancing of LOVE & HATE,KIND & EVIL made another ballet classic. Tchaikovsky producted Classical Ballet in 1876, embodying the love of Prince Siegfried for the enchanted Swan Queen, has greatly contributed to making this the best loved of all classical ballets. This production, with designs by the late Leslie Hurry, Prince Siegfried celebrates his twenty-first birthday; his mother tells him it is time to marry, but he prefers to go hunting. Alone, by a lakeside, he sees a swan-maiden. In despair, Siegfriend and the swan-maiden leap to death together and their sacrifice destroys the evil power.
地點: 香港藝術中心壽臣劇院
Venue: Hong Kong Arts Centre Shouson Theatre
venue.1: 香港藝術中心香港藝術中心壽臣劇院
venue_en: Hong Kong Arts Centre Hong Kong Arts Centre, Shouson Theatre

節目簡介: 我們希望透過《四季》這舞蹈，傳播節省能源，減小廢物和物料循環再做的信息。我們希望能推廣環保意識，鼓勵他們在日常工作中有效地和謹慎運用資源。
About the Programme: Four Seasons aims to promote conservancy, and increase the awareness among the society. We hope that Four Seasons can spread the message of cutting down energy, reduce waste and recycling. We hope to promote the idea of conservancy and the idea of environmental friendly, and encourage them to utilize resources effectively.
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Theatre

節目簡介: 著名芭蕾舞劇《睡美人》的劇情是根據法國作家佩羅的同名經典童話故事改編，由法國編舞大師佩蒂巴編舞，俄羅斯作曲家柴可夫斯基撰樂。《睡美人》故事簡介皇后結婚很久了，可是都沒生孩子，後來生了一位公主。國王邀請了全國十三個仙女中的十二個來參加慶祝宴會。 沒被邀請的壞仙女詛咒公主滿十五歲時，會被紡織針紮中而死。公主不死，但要昏睡一百年。公主十五歲，生日當天，手被紡線針紮中了。公主就昏沈沈的倒在地上睡著了 。很久以後的某一天，有一位王子來到城堡喚醒了沈睡的公主。整個城堡都醒了。 從此，王子與睡美人過著幸福快樂的日子。
About the Programme: Once upon a time, a beautiful princess was born. Princess Aurora, fated by a terrible curse to prick her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel and die at the age of 16, falls into an enchanted slumber to become Sleeping Beauty. Princess Aurora\'s magical friends, the Good fairies Flora, Fauna and Merryweather do their best to protect the Princess by raising her in a forest cottage disguised as Briar Rose. Despite their loving attempts, the evil fairy Maleficent finds Aurora and the spell is cast. The good fairies put everyone in the castle into a deep sleep until the curse can be broken. It is only with the aid of the gallant Prince Phillip, who vows to save his adored princess that the wicked Maleficent, transformed into a menacing, fire-breathing dragon, is destroyed, and the Sleeping Beauty is awakened by his kiss.
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Theatre

節目簡介: 《地震無情 人間有愛》這舞蹈能表現四川大地震災難帶來的傷痛經歷。但因人間有愛，由緊急救援轉移至協助災民重建新生活，讓他們的生命得以重燃希望。於地震後進行救援工作，四川、甘肅及陝西的災民也有派發糧食、棉被及帳篷物料等救援物資，並幫助兒童擺脫傷痛經歷。當日之門票收益全數捐世界宣明會以支持救援工作。
About the Programme: Brutal quakes heal by Love demonstrates the earthquake which hits Sichuan Province China. Death of 12,000, with another 18,000 still missing. Over 15 million people live in the affected area, including almost 4 million in the city of Chengdu. Nearly 2,000 of the dead were students and teachers caught in schools that collapsed. Since the Tangshan earthquake in 1976, which killed over 240,000 people, China has required that new structures withstand major quakes. But the collapse of schools, hospitals and factories in several different areas around Sichuan may raise questions about how rigorously such codes have been enforced during China’s recent, epic building boom. All tickets sales were donated to The World Vision for the Sichuan rebuild program.
Venue: Stanley Community Hall
venue_en: Stanley Community Hall

節目名稱: 明日之星 2006  -《天鵝湖第三幕及經典舞劇精選 》
Programme Name: Stars of Tomorrow 2006 - Swan Lake Act III & Other Ballet Classics
節目簡介: 本校年度大滙演《明日之星2006之天鵝湖第三幕及經典舞劇精選》於八月十八日及十九日假座沙田大會堂公演，本校很榮幸邀請到前律政司司長梁愛詩太平紳士擔任主禮嘉賓。當晚有超過一千位同學和海外學生傾力演出，國家一級演員傅姝小姐和廣州芭蕾舞團首席舞蹈員王志偉先生分別擔當《天鵝湖第三幕》之黑天鵝及王子的角色，令整個表演更臻完美。是次大滙演演出成功，更吸引了超過二千八百位觀眾入場欣賞。
About the Programme: The annual Stars of Tomorrow 2006 extravaganza featuring Swan Lake Act III & Other Ballet Classics at the Sha Tin Town Hall, on August 18th & 19th.  Ms Elsie Leung Oi-sie, GBM, JP, was the Guest of Honour. The evening also featured more than 1,000 students in newly restaged dances from Don Quixote, The Nutcracker, The Sleeping Beauty, and La Fille Mal Gardée. Principal dancers from the Guangzhou Ballet Company – Ms. Fu Shu and Mr. Wang Zhi Wei – performed the roles of Odile and Prince Siegfried from Swan Lake Act III.  It was a successful event and also attracted more than 2,800 audiences.
Venue: Sha Tin Town Hall Auditorium
venue_en: Sha Tin Town Hall, Auditorium

節目簡介: 本校年度大滙演《明日之星2007之仙履奇緣》於八月十八日及十九日假座香港文化中心順利舉行，本校很榮幸邀請到何鴻燊博士擔任主禮嘉賓。本校亦邀請了保加利亞第二十屆瓦爾納國際芭蕾舞比賽特設大獎得主呂萌及遼寧芭蕾舞團獨舞員王韻擔當演出《唐吉訶德》雙人舞。過千位本地及海外學生參與是次精彩的演出，表演亦吸引了超過三千四百位觀眾入場欣賞。
About the Programme: Stars of Tomorrow 2007 extravaganza featuring the world\'s best loved fairy tale - Cinderella at the Grand Theatre of Hong Kong Cultural Centre on August 18th & 19th 2007. Dr. Stanley Ho was the Guest of Honour. Special Prize winner of the 20th Varna International Ballet Competition in Bulgaria – Mr. Lu Meng and principal dancer of the Liaoning Ballet Ms. Wang Yun – performed the Grand Pas de Deux from Don Quixote. Over 1,000 local and overseas students took part in this wonderful event.  It also attracted over 3,400 audiences.
Number of Performance: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre

Programme Name: Stars of Tomorrow 2008 - The Frog Prince & Other Ballet Classics
節目簡介: 本校年度大滙演《明日之星2008 —青蛙王子及經典芭蕾舞精選》於八月十六及十七日假座沙田大會堂演奏廳圓滿舉行。過千位本地及海外學員傾力演出，當晚更有超過二千八百位觀眾入場支持是次大滙演。本校很榮幸邀請到法國駐港澳總領事戴博先生擔任主禮嘉賓。今年更特別邀請了國家一級舞蹈員呂萌及焦洋，以及遼寧芭蕾舞團主要演員王韻，演出經典芭蕾舞劇《唐吉訶德》及《海盜》選段，以及現代芭蕾舞《風吟》，他們精湛投入之舞藝令觀眾歎為觀止。
About the Programme: The annual performance - Stars of Tomorrow 2008 - The Frog Prince & Other Ballet Classics was held at the Auditorium of Sha Tin Town Hall on 16th & 17th August 2008. The extravaganza featured a cast of over 1,000 local and overseas students. The evening also attracted over 2,800 audiences including parents and friends. Mr. Jean-Pierre Thébault, the Consul-General of France in Hong Kong and Macau, was invited to be the Guest of Honour of the Gala. World-class ballet dancers of the Liaoning Ballet Company, Mr. Lu Meng, Mr. Jiao Yang and Ms. Wang Yun also guest appeared to perform excerpts from Don Quixote and Le Corsaire and a modern ballet Songs of the Wind. The audience enjoyed every minute of the performance.
Venue: Sha Tin Town Hall Auditorium
venue_en: Sha Tin Town Hall, Auditorium

節目簡介: 《爵士舞同樂日2007》於二零零七年六月三日假座香港西灣河文娛中心劇院舉行。是次表演由一百三十位爵士舞及Hip Hop舞蹈班同學包括成人爵士舞之同學攜手演出。當晚共有二十項節拍强勁的舞蹈表演。全場觀眾反應熱烈，大家都擁有一個興奮及難忘的晚上。
About the Programme: Jazz Fun Day 2007 was successfully held at Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre Theatre on 3 June 2007. A total of 140 students from Children Jazz, Hip Hop and Adult Jazz classes participated in the performance. Twenty energetic and funky Jazz and Hip Hop dances were showcased and enthusiastic response were received from the audience throughout the performance.
Venue: Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre, Theatre

節目簡介: 《爵士舞同樂日2008》於四月十三日假座香港西灣河文娛中心劇院舉行。當晚節目由150位我校的兒童爵士舞班、Hip Hop 舞蹈班以及成人爵士舞班之同學攜手演出，一眾表演者之家長及朋友亦應邀出席支持及欣賞表演。全場觀眾反應熱烈，大家在二十項勁歌熱舞之演出下渡過了一個愉快而難忘的一晚。
About the Programme: The annual Jazz Fun Day 2008 was successfully completed on 13 April 2008 at Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre Theatre. The performance showcased 150 students from our School\'s Children Jazz, Hip Hop and Adult Jazz classes. All their parents and friends were invited to come and enjoy the performance. The audience was electrified by the 20 energetic Jazz and Hip Hop dances.
Venue: Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre, Theatre

Programme Name: Reach for the Stars 2007 - Ballet Performance by Scholar Student
節目簡介: 超過75位王振芳紀念獎學金得主於二零零七年六月十日假香港上環文娛中心作結業演出 —《摘星》。首年的《摘星》結業演出大獲讚賞。這些條件優秀的學生獲頒王振芳紀念獎學金並接受為期八個月的密集式訓練。精英班由專業導師唐敏（前美國Pittsburg Ballet Theatre芭蕾舞團及加拿大Les Grands Ballet Canadiens芭蕾舞團首席舞蹈員）及賴振榮（香港芭蕾舞團獨舞員及前王振芳紀念獎學金得獎者）任教
About the Programme: More than 75 Scholar class students presented their year-end showcase Reach for the Stars on 10 June 2007 at Sheung Wan Civic Centre. The first year-end showcase has drawn enthusiastic applause. The talented students received 8 months intensive training under The Tsinforn C. Wong Memorial Scholarship. Classes were taught by professional teacher, Ms Tang Min (Former Principal Dancer of Pittsburg Ballet Theatre in USA and Les Grands Ballet Canadiens in Canada) and Mr Frankie-M Lai (Soloist of the Hong Kong Ballet and the past recipient of The Tsinforn C. Wong Memorial Scholarship).
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

Programme Name: ach for the Stars 2008 - Ballet Performance by Scholar Students
節目簡介: 由王仁曼芭蕾舞學校及王振芳紀念獎學金合辦之 二零零八年度結業演出 —《摘星》於七月五日假座香港西灣河文娛中心劇院舉行。是次演出者為七十多位零七至零八年度獎學金得獎精英，他們於過去八個月接受了一連串專業及嚴格訓練。演出當晚，各學員之家長及朋友均有出席分享他們努力之成果。
About the Programme: Presented by The Jean M. Wong School of Ballet and The Tsinforn C. Wong Memorial Scholarship, the 2008 year-end showcase Reach for the Stars was held on 5 July 2008 at Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre. It showcased 70 outstanding scholarship recipients who had received intensive and professional training for 8 months. Parents and friends attended the performance to share their hardwork that they have achieved.
Venue: Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre, Theatre

節目名稱: 《舞樂逍遙 - 藝摯十週年匯演》
Programme Name: European Dance Euphoria – the 10th Anniversary Performance of Knack Cordial
節目簡介: 超過百位舞蹈員參與這次《舞樂逍遙 - 藝摯十週年匯演》的演出，表演節目長達三小時，包括匈牙利、保加利亞、羅馬尼亞及吉卜賽等歐洲民族舞蹈共22首。受邀來港與本團同台合作演出的海外表演嘉賓包括：巴拉頓匈牙利民族舞團(英國)，MFC匈牙利舞蹈俱樂部(台灣)及波亞斯歐洲民俗舞團(台灣)。
About the Programme: More than 100 performers participated in the performance in memory of the 10th Anniversary of Knack Cordial Folk Group. The three hours program contained 22 dance suites which included Hungarian, Transylvanian, Bulgarian and Romanian Gypsy folk dances. Overseas guest performing teams had been invited to perform together with the Group including Balaton Hungarian Dance Group (United Kingdom), Magyar Folklore Club (Taiwan) and Pojas European Folkdance Ensemble (Taiwan).
Venue: Sha Tin Town Hall Auditorium
venue_en: Sha Tin Town Hall, Auditorium

節目簡介: 「預演」雖然是冇錢為舞蹈本身以外做些攪作，但卻能夠清晰看到演出者的演技，呈現探索和表現過程中種種的原始美，可能比起經過多翻刪減和修飾的製作更自然和豐富。
Venue: CCDC Dance Centre Studio 1
主辦單位: CCDC舞蹈中心 與 Kongtact Square
venue_en: CCDC Dance Centre Studio 1

節目簡介: 一班人，隨緣而相聚，與一位患有血癌的作者一同用身體探索半杯水的意義，爆發一小時的身體力量。
地點: CCDC 舞蹈中心賽馬會舞蹈小劇場
Venue: CCDC Dance Centre Jockey Club Dance Studio
主辦單位: CCDC舞蹈中心 與  Kongtact Square
venue.1: CCDC舞蹈中心賽馬會舞蹈小劇場
venue_en: CCDC Dance Centre Jockey Club Dance Studio

節目簡介: 接觸即興斟: 為接觸即興舞者的交流與互相切磋接觸即興的平台，每月上旬舉行；接觸即興斟+: 每月下旬舉行，為除接觸即興斟外，將由負責成員安排分享一些有關身體的練習: 如推手, yoga, 易筋經養生功, 身體即興練習等作為暖身。
日期: 每月第一個周六或周日(Jam)及最後一個周六或周日(Jam+)
Date: first Saturday or Sunday of each month (Jam), the last Saturday or Sunday of each month (Jam+)
Venue: CCDC Dance Centre
主辦單位: CCDC舞蹈中心 與  Kongtact Square
venue_en: CCDC Dance Centre

節目簡介: 《橋上舞》是舞團的咁朵於2006年遊歷歐洲多地後，產生靈感而創作出的作品。 那個夏天，的咁朵在歐洲的足跡遍及荷蘭阿姆斯特丹、法國阿維儂、西班牙巴塞隆娜、奧地利維也納、斯洛伐克、英國倫敦以及蘇格蘭愛丁堡。 在這些地方去觀看舞蹈節的表演、倫敦百老匯歌舞劇，還參與不同的舞蹈工作坊等，都為的咁朵留下深刻的印象和寶貴的體驗。《橋上舞》中所指的橋則是指位於阿維儂的一條富歷史色彩的古橋。
About the Programme: On the Bridge of Avignon is a recollection of many interesting thoughts and unforgettable     . experiences of the dance group after spending the summer months in Europe in 2006.  Some places the group visited include Amsterdam, Avignon, Barcelona, Vienna, Slovakia, London, and Edinburgh.  A number of dance festivals, London Broadway shows, and dance classes were  . attended enroute.   In particular, the dance group was deeply impressed by the artistic atmosphere and enthusiasm displayed by both the performers and spectators in the Avignon Dance Festival.
Venue: Fringe Theatre
Presenter: Le Groupe Dance dik gam deu
Production / Performing Unit: Le Groupe Dance dik gam deu
venue_en: Fringe Theatre

節目名稱: 《太子珠寶鐘錶呈獻－聚舞傾情為護苗》慈善舞蹈匯演
Programme Name: Dance Extravaganza for End Child Sexual Abuse Foundation
節目簡介: 為擴闊視野及打破東西方文化的界限，香港東南亞舞蹈團特別以靈巧多變的‘手’配合索意歐洲民族舞蹈團鏗鏘有度的‘足’，為世界民俗舞蹈愛好者製作兩場舞蹈匯演，除上演約十個國家十四齣舞蹈外，更邀請斯洛伐克國家民族舞蹈團及印尼東南亞舞蹈團坐鎮。為回饋社會，是次演出得到太子珠寶鐘錶贊助，為護苗基金籌募30萬元經費。當晚衣香鬢影，嘉賓濟濟一堂 , 包括林鄭月娥女士、林煥光先生、李少光夫人、李麗娟太平紳士、賴福明醫生太平紳士、李麗娟女士、匈牙利及印尼註港總領事 等等。
About the Programme: In order to break the demarcations of Eastern and Western cultures, the Hong Kong South East Asia Dance Troupe (HKSEADT) and Legacy European Folk Dance Troupe (LEFDT) jointly present two dance performances, featuring 14 dances from 10 countries over the world.  The Indonesian South East Asia Dance Troupe and SLUK (Slovakian State Dance Ensemble) are invited to highlight the programme too.    To make the event meaningful and fruitful, the performances targeted to raise $300,00 for the End Child Sexual Abuse Foundation (ECSAF), thanks to our generous sponsor Prince Jewellery. Celebrities attended are numerous, such as Mr. Lam Woon Kwong GBS, JP, Mrs. Lam Cheng Yuet Ngor, J.P., Mr. Ferry Adamhar, Consul General of the Republic of Indonesia Hong Kong, Mr. János Chalupa, Consulate of the Republic of Hungary, Ms Shelley L. K. Lee, J.P., Mr. Ng Sau Kei, Wilfred, MH, JP. and Dr. Lai Fok Ming, J.P.
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Concert Hall
主辦單位: 索意歐洲民族舞蹈團 , 香港東南亞舞蹈團
Presenter: Legacy European Folk Dance Troupe and the Hong Kong South East Asia Dance Troupe
製作/演出單位: 索意歐洲民族舞蹈團 , 香港東南亞舞蹈團
Production / Performing Unit: Legacy European Folk Dance Troupe and the Hong Kong South East Asia Dance Troupe
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Concert Hall

節目名稱: 紫蝶十六週年匯演《互動體育舞蹈賀十六週年舞蹈大匯演》
Programme Name: Mabel Fong School of Ballet and Music 16th Anniversary Annual Performance
舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 爵士& 拉丁舞
節目簡介: 《互動體育舞蹈賀十六週年舞蹈大匯演》互動體育舞蹈形式演出，將以芭蕾舞、爵士舞、拉丁舞形式演出，帶領觀眾渡過一個開心難忘的晚上。節目包括有熱情的拉丁舞、優雅的標準舞及強勁的爵士舞，還有以花園作為舞台背景，用舞步演繹白雲仙子、花仙子飛舞、小蜜蜂採花蜜、蝴蝶姐姐與蟲蟲在遊戲、小燕子於藍天飛翔…等。
About the Programme: Student showcase of Mabel Fong School of Ballet and Music, performing Latin, Ballroom, Ballet and Jazz.
地點: 仁愛堂賽馬會社區及體育中心
Venue: Yan Oi Tong Jockey Club Community & Sports Centre
主辦單位: 紫蝶芭蕾舞及音樂學院
Presenter: Mabel Fong School of Ballet and Music
製作/演出單位: 紫蝶芭蕾舞及音樂學院
Production / Performing Unit: Mabel Fong School of Ballet and Music
venue.1: 仁愛堂賽馬會社區及體育中心
venue_en: Yan Oi Tong Jockey Club Community & Sports Centre

節目簡介: 一瞬一生，即使我們體會到人生的短暫和脆弱，知道要珍惜當下，卻往往把光陰消耗在糾纏不清的衝突和爭吵上。《窺心人》這舞劇的窺心者是一個像幽靈般的第三者，經常縈繞於人世中。透過一對因結婚多年而感情轉淡的夫婦，以獨白、悲歎、歌唱來窺視劇中人的內心世界，指出愛並非必然。當激情不再，互信不在，那維繫著兩人的又是甚麼？
About the Programme: Life is but a fleeting moment - even though we realize life is so short and vulnerably that we must cherish every moment, we always let time to be wasted in meaningless fights and quarrels.  In the dance drama Private Landscape, a spiritual observer who can read hearts hovers among us, secretly peeping, watching a couple who have been married for many years. In the story, he would illustrate the protagonists’ internal feeling through monologues, lamentations and songs to tell that love cannot be taken for granted.  When there is neither passion nor trust, what is there to keep the couple together?
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Theatre

節目簡介: 香港回歸十年，雙妹嘜舞蹈劇場也成立十年，兩個「少女」漸變「中女」，正好藉此時機，「十宰身體」作回顧，看看香港的社會風氣、潮流文化及公共空間如何改變及影響個體(尤其是中年女性)的身分和身體。片段式的舞蹈劇場混入流行歌曲、玩意、生活小事、及說唱的劇場形式等，是探討文化身分的一次真情剖白。「雙妹嘜」又幽默又調侃地獻上一場充滿本土情懷的身體饗宴，秉承舞團一直以來從小女人的觀點來表現大世界。
About the Programme: This is the 10th anniversary of Mcmuimui Dansemble and the 10th anniversary of the HKSAR. Mcmuimui would like to take this opportunity to review and celebrate their bodies which are on their way to aging. Flesh Dance is a multi-media dance theatre examining the way popular culture, society and public space influence and shape our cultural identities and womanhood, with songs and gadgets, wit and zanies.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Studio Theatre
主辦單位: 康樂文化事務處「香港故事」系列
Presenter: Leisure and Cultural Services Department under the Hong Kong Stories Series
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 《女人濕地》由雙味嘜舞蹈劇場和詩人黑盒劇場合辦，以淒美迷離的筆觸和舞步，描述一個女人濕的秘密；一個趕赴約會的女人，在晴朗乾燥的一天混身濕透，是因為汗水？眼淚？還是… 女人勞碌了一整天準備赴約，但並不知道，原來她將不會回來。  作品結合舞蹈與文字的舞蹈劇場探索，主要探討女性的生命之旅與慾望；陳敏兒與黃詠詩兩位創作者透過這個作品，展現了二者獨有的幽默感以及對城市女性的細緻觸覺，陳敏兒在整體導演上亦給作品賦與了城市的現代感與遼闊的聯想空間，是本地難得的當代舞蹈劇場作品。
About the Programme: Wetlands of a Woman directed, choreographed and performed by the local innovative performing artist Abby Man-Yee Chan, collaborated with acclaimed playwright Wong Wing Sze. Both of them are famous for their ironic, bold and adventurous character in their artistic field. A fresh and inspiring collaboration explores the private, discreet, individual, solitary and secret world of nowadays women through voice, text, movement and dance. Not merely a presentation or exchange of the two medium, but also a representation of the performance of text and language through the primitive body, as well as a boundless journey of dance through the text. It is definitely an inspiring piece both in the art form and the context in the local performance scene.
地點: 香港藝術中心壽臣劇院
Venue: Hong Kong Arts Centre Shouson Theatre
製作/演出單位: 雙妹嘜舞蹈劇場、 詩人黑盒劇場
演出/製作: 陳敏兒
Cast and Production: CHAN Man-yee, Abby
venue.1: 香港藝術中心香港藝術中心壽臣劇院
venue_en: Hong Kong Arts Centre Hong Kong Arts Centre, Shouson Theatre

節目名稱: 《米雪爾舞藝坊週年舞蹈匯演2008》
舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 中國舞, 爵士舞& 拉丁舞
節目簡介: 中國舞、爵士舞和拉丁舞分別以單齣形式演出，芭蕾舞則以舞劇《海底世界》演出。
About the Programme: Mixed-bill programmes include Ballet, Chinese, Jazz and Latin dance.
Venue: Ngau Chi Wan Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Ngau Chi Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

節目簡介: 《尋找顏如玉》誰是顏 如玉？在哪裡可以見到顏如玉？她真的住在書本裡嗎？她真的存在嗎？她漂亮嗎？她重多少磅？她有沒有變靚一點？她今天做了facial嗎？ 由本地現代舞者陳敏兒和楊惠美組成的雙妹嘜舞蹈劇場，將帶你遊kubrick，尋找書中的顏如玉。2008年4月份，雙妹嘜舞蹈劇場獲康樂及文化事務署委約創作｢香港故事｣系列之《十宰身體慶團緣》，手腳並用笑談女性身體的美麗與哀愁，今回由劇場移師書店，承接上次演出的獨特視覺，邀請你繼續｢閱讀｣身體。
About the Programme: Programme Brief Introduction Around 250 words Who is Yan Ruyu (pretty woman)? Where is she? Among books? Well, does she really exist? Is she beautiful? Does she wish to be beautiful? Local modern dance troupe McMuimui Dansemble, consists of Abby Chan and Yeung Wai-mei, is in search of the legendary Yan Ruyu at kubrick--the dancers have been told that Yan Ruyu exists in books as a symbol of success and fortune. With their acclaimed new work Flesh Dance premiered in April at the Cultural Centre as an attempt to examine the female body, McMuimui Dansemble will transform kubrick into another site of exploration to discover the never-ending myths and mysteries of the human flesh.
Venue: Yaumatei Kubrick Book Shop
製作/演出單位: Kubrick Friday Live 、 雙妹嘜舞蹈劇場
演出/製作: 陳敏兒
Cast and Production: CHAN Man-yee, Abby
venue_en: Yaumatei Kubrick Book Shop

Programme Name: Chinese Martial Arts Dance Series: Episode V
舞蹈類別: 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 《武極五》是總監錢秀蓮在北京體育大學高級訪問學者發表論文“武術太極舞蹈創作”期間，構思以易經八卦為創作主線，易經是代表中國哲學思想文化的書，全舞以陰陽、五行、八卦演繹人與自然、自然與萬物之無窮變化，再配以陳氏太極之螺旋纏繞折疊，而表達太極中最美的 “ S ” 流線動律，太極和諧圓轉與八卦的變數，充分表現了矛盾而又統一之「道」。 此舞是中、港、台藝術家攜手合作，湯偉俠博士作易學顧問、中國的太極金牌得主徐一杰作武術指導、台南國立藝術大學之現場古箏及敲擊使表演者引起互動及變數。
About the Programme: The 5th episode of Wuji (Chinese Martial Arts) is a local production that brings together artists from the Mainland, Hong Kong, and Taiwan. It combines dance, martial arts, music and visual arts, emphasizing both traditional interpretation and contemporary creation.  The whole episode revolves around the main creative plot line of the Yijing Bagua (Eight Trigrams of the Book of Change), using Yin-yang, Wusing (Five Elements) and Bagua to interpret the endless changes in Man and Nature, and in Nature and Everything.  Chen’s Taiji’s gnarled, entwining spiral shows Taiji’s ultimate beauty in the form of the “S” in its aero-dynamic movement and rhythm, as well as the harmonious circling of the Taiji and Bagua, amply representing the Dao (Way) which is both conflict and unity.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

Programme Name: Chinese Martial Arts Dance Series: Episode VI
舞蹈類別: 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 《武極六》是一集舞蹈、武術、音樂及視覺藝術於一身的傳統演繹與現代創新並重的本土製作，青城山掌門人劉綏濱作客席嘉賓配以舞者動律發掘互動演出，再配以部分上海音樂師現場演奏。全舞以武術中豐富動律之形意拳之十二形拳(雞、鼉、猴、鷂、龍、鴼、燕、馬、蛇、虎、鷹、熊)為創作主線，通臂拳之拍、摔、撣與繪畫筆觸變奏對話，太極之開合中正，螺旋纏繞，配以音樂之金木水火土或八音現場演奏，展示無形之氣使大自然生生不息，息息相關。在矛盾、順逆境中君子自強不息之聲、色、形、態、象之變易，多媒體創作之武舞。
About the Programme: The Chinese Martial Arts Dance Series is a showcase of dance, martial arts, music and visual arts all in one, in a highly innovative presentation of the traditional and the modern. Liu Suibin from the Qingcheng School was invited as the martial arts master, and Musicians from Shanghai as guest artists. The current production uses the ‘twelve creature forms’ of martial arts as the main line of choreography, and is supplemented by variations of Chinese painting brushstrokes and fundamental moves in taichi. (The twelve creatures are the cock, the Chinese alligator, the monkey, the sparrow hawk, the dragon, the tai bird, the swallow, the horse, the snake, the tiger, the eagle and the bear.) The live music accompaniment brings out the Five Elements - Metal, Wood, Water, Fire and Earth. The invisible qi (or ‘air flow’) suggests the invigorating forces of Nature and the close link between all living things, including Man.
Venue: Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre, Theatre

Programme Name: Chinese Martial Arts Dance Series: Episode VII
舞蹈類別: 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 全舞以太極導引與中醫之脈絡運行為創作主線，以馬王堆的導引圖，再配以武術中之五禽戲、八段錦、易筋經現代化地再探索人體之心、肝、脾、肺、腎之功能運作與動律之關係，以舞蹈與造型、色彩、光影、空間、聲音的變幻，展示中華文化之中醫養生之哲理與大自然陰陽五行協調而成一和諧之宇宙觀。
About the Programme: The whole dance makes use of taichi daoyin and the working of the meridian espoused by traditional Chinese medicine as the main line of creative force, using the Daoyin Tu (Gymnastic Chart) found at Mawangdui, and coupling it with the Five Animal Plays, Eight Length of Brocade and Tendon Transformation Canon in martial arts to explore the functional and rhythmical relationships between the heart, liver, spleen, lung and kidney. According to the change of dance and modeling, the colour, the shadow, the space and the sound to demonstrate the Chinese cultural and cosmic view that is derived from the life nourishing philosophy of traditional Chinese medicine and the notion of Nature as a representation of the coordination between the Five Elements to form a harmonic Whole.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

舞蹈類別: 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 中國舞的發展及演變深受武術、戲曲、壁畫、詩詞及各地之風土文化影響。《神州舞韻》取材中國舞之傳統與創新，「傳統」則由50年代中國舞之飛天，春江花月夜之經典配合近代之漢唐風格之踏歌，介紹傳統舞蹈之傳承作品。「創新」則以舞團自2001年為慶賀中國獲奧運主辦權而創作之「武術太極」系列，從七集中選取，把中國太極武術與中國哲學、醫學為主題，運用劍、水袖和扇揉合並配以多媒體之光、影、聲互動表達中國舞之精氣神。
About the Programme: The development of Chinese dance had been influenced by various elements of Chinese culture, from martial arts to Chinese opera, poetry, murals, and the regional and folk cultures of the land. The Rhythmic Fantasy of Chinese QuintEssence, a dance showcase with inspiration drawn from traditions and incorporated with original, innovative ideas to form new interpretations of Chinese dance. The first part features some of the most representative dances in the traditional repertoire. The second part celebrate China’s successful bid to host the summer Olympics. Under the themes of Chinese taichi, martial arts, philosophy and medicine, and with the use of swords, flowing sleeves and fans, the dances are performed against a background of multimedia display o flight, shadow and sound. The abstract and metaphysical concepts of jing, qi, shen (essence, air flow and spirit) in the art of Chinese dance are fully revealed.
地點: 沙田大會堂演奏廳、屯門大會堂演奏廳
Venue: Sha Tin Town Hall Auditorium, Tuen Mun Town Hall Auditorium
venue.1:
沙田大會堂演奏廳
屯門大會堂演奏廳
venue_en: Sha Tin Town Hall Tuen Mun Town Hall, Auditorium, Auditorium

Programme Name: Dance Gala for Celebration Of HKSAR 10th Anniversary
舞蹈類別: 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 《繽紛舞匯慶回歸》乃慶祝舞林飛越25載及香港回歸十週年之演藝活動，全晚由數百名舞林兒童舞出多元舞蹈，兒童舞有《生日快樂》、《小苗苗》，中國舞有朝鮮舞之《嬉戲在花田》，漢族舞之《喜迎春》、《喜慶的日子》、《水鄉織女》等。芭蕾舞有《睡美人之鑽石仙子》、《藍鳥》獨舞及《雪花仙子》，此外亦有西班牙舞及爵士舞等。部分舞林高材生更參予錢秀蓮舞蹈團《武極》系列現代舞之春、夏、秋、冬及天人合一為主題之中國現代舞表演，最後以歡樂氣氛之《鼓舞歡慶》結幕。
About the Programme: The Dance Gala for Celebration of HKSAR 10th Anniversary also marked the 25th Anniversary of the founding of Danceland.  The programme for the evening was performed by a few hundred young dancers from Danceland, and included children dances, Happy Birthday and Young Miao; Chinese dances Playing in the Flower Fields (Korean), Welcome, Spring!, Happy Days and The Weaver Girls of the Waterlogged Land (Han); ballet The Diamond Fairy from Sleeping Beauty, Blue Bird solo and The Snowflake Fairies; Spanish dance, and Jazz dance.  Some of the outstanding students from Danceland also participated in the Chinese Modern Dance segment of the Chinese Martial Arts Dance Series by the Miranda Chin Dance Company, dancing in Spring, Summer, Autumn and Winter, as well as in Heaven and Man as One.  The evening came to a close with the rousing, joyous Celebratory Drums.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
主辦單位: 錢秀蓮舞蹈團 / 舞林
製作/演出單位: 錢秀蓮舞蹈團 / 舞林
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目名稱: 《2006/07 年社區文化大使 – 武舞耀香江》
Programme Name: Community Cultural Ambassador 2006/07 – Martialarts Spark In Hong Kong
舞蹈類別: 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 融合太極武術與現代舞精髓，通過一系列的講座及工作坊、社區舞蹈表演及學校巡迴演出，旨在介紹太極武術舞蹈予社群，使其了解中國文化的源流及發展，讓不同年齡及階層人士親身體會武術舞蹈。
About the Programme: Through a series of dance workshops,  dance performances at shopping malls and school tours, in order to  introduce the chinese martial arts dance to the differ social group.
地點: 大學、中學、全港各大商場
Venue: Universities, Secondary Schools, Shopping Malls
venue.1:
大學
中學
全港各大商場
venue_en: Universities, Secondary Schools, Shopping Malls

舞蹈類別: 民族舞, 中國舞, 東南亞舞蹈
節目簡介: 舞蹈家顏木蘭老師生長於椰林風蕉雨的千島之國。自幼熱愛舞蹈藝術的她，高中畢業後，滿腔熱誠回到祖國，接受嚴格的中國舞蹈藝術訓練。其後，顏老師帶著女兒孤身上路，來到人生路不熟的香港。為了生計她忍痛放下舞蹈專業，從工廠抱回一包包沉重的外發貨品，在狹小的板房內加工。一次偶然機會，她重新踏上舞台，並創辦了木蘭歌舞團，以她的執著、認真和精湛的舞藝，培育了朵朵綻放的藝術之花。經過了三十年的辛勤耕耘，顏老師桃李滿天下，昔日的木蘭舞蹈組已茁壯成長為木蘭歌舞團，大放異彩。
About the Programme: Born in Indonesia, Ms Ngan Muk-lan has had great attainments in dancing since childhood. After graduation from high school, she went back to China with sincerity and began her strict training in Chinese national dance. Then Ms Ngan Came to Hong Kong with her daughter. In order to make a living, Ms Ngan reluctantly dropped her dance profession and took semi-finished products to process. On an accidental occasion, Ms Ngan set foot on stage again. Her dance life restarted. She founded Muk Lan Song and Dance Group. Her determination, earnest and perfect dance techniques made her win very high acclaim. After thirty years’ hard cultivation, the artistic flowers nurtured by Ms Ngan are in full bloom.
地點: 香港大會堂 – 音樂廳
Venue: Concert Hall, Hong Kong City Hall
Presenter: Muk Lan Song and Dance Group
Production / Performing Unit: Muk Lan Song and Dance Group
venue.1: 香港大會堂 – 音樂廳
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Concert Hall

節目簡介: 一個異域流離的意境。起初無須著力，只裝自在。突然，死局出現缺口，地動水移，光引人渡，風迴路轉之間，人隨水和光等自然力量聚散有道。林偉源、馮國基、龍永邦首度合作，為《內應》 和《外應─創細記》的創作鋪路。
About the Programme: The surrealism arises here from the kind of extreme emotional states that can loosen reality from its moorings.  Allen LAM’s choreography in dialogue with Gabriel FUNG’s sensory light sculptures, and Franky LUNG’s video images.  This production is a prologue of their extended collaborations into Angels Within and Space Within Shapes.
Venue: Tuen Mun Town Hall Auditorium
venue_en: Tuen Mun Town Hall, Auditorium

節目簡介: 遊動在香港與紐約間，有迷亦有得。  繼2006籌劃Dance Wide HKNY香港、紐約交流演出，進一層次與現居紐約的羅莎朗合作，讓舞蹈呈露天真自然的反應。  林偉源、馮國基、龍永邦加強觸角馬力，通身是眼，觸感微弱光景，沉重的身體在水氣中化作輕靈。舞台光源只來自錄像畫面；燈光與影像溶合再張開，舞者身在其中，讓美境化開。
About the Programme: The creation of an original work and the start of rehearsals in New York with Rosalind NEWMAN, were preceded by a long intellectual quest in the harmony of movement and its natural resonance.  Allen LAM, Gabriel FUNG, and Franky LUNG galvanize sensible impulse to intersect facile connection between fantastic facts and hopes, turning inspiration into continuing transformation of blithe experiences.  Shades and lights from the projected imagery are brimming with the entire performing area.  The projection, a foremost groundbreaking design, plays as an only source of lights and interactive objects to the solo dancer.
地點: 香港藝術中心麥高利小劇場
Venue: Hong Kong Arts Centre McAulay Studio
venue.1: 香港藝術中心麥高利小劇場
venue_en: Hong Kong Arts Centre, McAulay Studio

舞蹈類別: 當代芭蕾舞, 現代舞, 中國舞, 拉丁舞, 佛朗明高
Category: Contemporary Dance of Ballet, Modern, Chinese, Latin and Flamenco
節目簡介: 這是以六六無窮形式，呈露自身與朋友愛慾情誼的舞蹈作品！六位舞者將五種技藝渾成極至，包括現代舞、芭蕾、中國舞、探弗舞及費明高舞。再添上朱殷的服裝作為第六類美學原素，剖白愛與被愛、慾望與寂寞、己與彼之間的無形聯繫。設計親密的觀眾席更可稱絕！
About the Programme: Rhapsody in Dance is a piece for four men and two women, an allegory of loneliness and redemption, but it is also very stylish, emotional and engaging.  The currents run deep on the path of life that bespeaks dancers’ artistic roots and cultures.  From the emotional points of views of Contemporary Dance, Ballet, Chinese Dance, Tango and Flamenco, the congregation throws the relationship between all six into question and motion.  Costume and installation by Virginia CHU, was a pure inspiration.  Intimate seating allows the imminence of passion out-runs ourselves.
Venue: Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre, Theatre

節目簡介: 正當人人都談論近年香港文化地貌的轉變，舞蹈創作亦湧現更多攝及身體、空間、時間的作品，眼前所見到的一切可能只是轉烈點、新一頁的序幕，因為藝術家內弖正蘊釀一場巨大得超出想像的文化關懷。  《外應 創細記》編舞林偉源屬於尋、迷創意的活躍份子，嘗試在新作品中，從舞蹈、影像與印像之間，創造出嶄新的表達形式。縱使我們面對越來越少空的間，越來越少光與影，《外應。創細記》依然積極締造一次神妙的實驗。我們這一代人隱伏的本性和文化底蘊透過藝術呈露出來。
About the Programme: Inspired by our own background in the bygone era, the literary and cultural references, and the current architectural landscape in cities we live in.  This project comes to life via conceptual materials gleaned from artificial space such as sky-high super-modern buildings to debris from the Hong Kong’s heyday.  This space-specific production at the KTT Black Box is to explore a forgotten reflective feeling, once a bustling city with cultural connotations of lights, rhythm, and paradox.   This is another level of choreographic achievement in theatrical art with movement slides with lights, space and images.  Choreographer’s first initiative to collaborate with creative freaks Gabriel FUNG, and Franky LUNG, began in productions Twirling Haze (2006) and Angels Within(2007).
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Black Box Theatre
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Black Box Theatre

舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 當代/現代舞, 現代芭蕾舞
節目簡介: 學童的想像力，決定了他們欣賞舞蹈的投入感。舞者在燈光中穿梭，隨音樂節奏流轉，舞步的含義因應意境產生多重情感。就是多重弔詭的感情，育出學童的獨立思考和聯想力。妙思舞動與同亞洲青少年芭蕾舞團應康文署委約創作《藍靈湖》，讓學童加深了解現代舞和現代芭蕾的獨特藝術意念。學童事前獲發導賞特輯，瞻望舞蹈角色、故事和互動交流的關係。深化編舞家與老師及學童的藝術交流。
About the Programme: A vision inspires change in looking at the art of dance.  To enrich child development, the Muse Motion partnered with Youth Ballet of Asia to engage LCSD and create tangible paths toward dance educational progress.  Muse Motion applied insights from the schools environs to provoke dialogue, identify opportunities for students understanding dance by means of music and visual images, and increase the degree of imaginations among students.  At theatre, we use expressive medium best fits the staging – characters, narratives, interactivity —to convey to students the intent, potential, and emotional experiences of contemporary balletic choreography.
地點: 荃灣大會堂演奏廳、元朗劇院演藝廳
Venue: Tsuen Wan Town Hall Auditorium and Yuen Long Theatre Auditorium
主辦單位: 康樂及文化事務署觀眾拓展組
製作/演出單位: 妙思舞動、亞洲青少年芭蕾舞團
Production / Performing Unit: Muse Motion, Youth Ballet of Asia
venue.1:
荃灣大會堂演奏廳
元朗劇院演藝廳
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium and Yuen Long Theatre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 豐富多元的街舞及流行舞演出
About the Programme: The line-up of over 15 acts ranged from hip-hop to boogaioo, stopping by funk, locking, breaking, house, and a whole host of styles involving the word jazz (jazz funk, street jazz, jazz hands, etc.) While it was undeniably ‘street’ in nature, the production felt more like an extravagant 1950s musical, with giant, elaborate stage sets, and over-the-top costumes.
地點: 香港浸會大會大專會堂
Venue: Hong Kong Baptist University Academic Hall
venue.1: 香港浸會大會大專會堂
venue_en: Hong Kong Baptist University Academic Hall

節目簡介: 豐富多元的街舞及流行舞演出
About the Programme: The line-up of over 15 acts ranged from hip-hop to boogaioo, stopping by funk, locking, breaking, house, and a whole host of styles involving the word jazz (jazz funk, street jazz, jazz hands, etc.) While it was undeniably ‘street’ in nature, the production felt more like an extravagant 1950s musical, with giant, elaborate stage sets, and over-the-top costumes.
地點: 香港浸會大會大專會堂
Venue: Hong Kong Baptist University Academic Hall

節目簡介: 閃耀東方之舞，燦爛民族之情，一個追求以活潑亮麗的舞蹈分享生活晚會中的美意。由幼兒功夫扇舞打開序幕，一連串致送紀念品後，接著中國舞等級考試展示約分為由50至70人演出，歡樂的小秧歌舞，共分全場兩段演出，及中國功夫舞、旗舞及5人劍舞，再者八月桂花扇舞描述一群可愛活潑小女孩手持扇舞動。以民族特色風格再演示新彊民族舞蹈—《 掀起您的蓋頭來》；再為苗山妹獨舞，居之苗族，風格美純，更有沙式太極展現，最後歡慶以最歡快民間樂曲妙舞作閉幕。
About the Programme: The programme was an exhibit of Chinese dance showing the social lives and happiness of different China provinces.  The performance aims to share joy and happiness with all participants and audience through the Chinese dance performances. Beginning with the Children Kung Fu Fan Dance and the presentation of soveniours, the dance performances also demonstrate Chinese Graded Examination by 50 – 70 dancers.  Followed by The Happy Kids Dance, The Yang Ge Dance were The Chinese Kung Fu Dance and The 5-persons Sword Dance.  The August Sweet Osmanthus Fan Dance describe a group of joyful little girls waved and danced with their fans. A group of young ladies presented The Xinjiang Folk Dance – The Mantilla which shows the unique folk dance of the Xianjiang province.  The Miao Zu Solo Dance describe the beautiful and pure life of Miao Zu.  The audiences were then presented with Tai Chi Chuan and lastly The Celebration for the closing the whole programme.
Venue: Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre, Theatre

節目簡介: 新約舞流藝術總監周佩韻(Pewan Chow)聯同美國著名編舞家廖朗莎(Rosalind Newman)編排之舞蹈演出分為三部份,「一線光」(Searching Light)編舞周佩韻、「挫落」(Break/Down)編舞廖朗莎、「旅程」(Journey) 編舞周佩韻。
About the Programme: Xin Xiang is a performance with works choreographed by the Artistic Director of Passover Dance Pewan Chow and acclaimed US choreographer Rosalind Newman. The performance included 3 works; Searchlight and Journey choreographed by Pewan Chow, and Break/ Down by Rosalind Newman .
Venue: Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre, Theatre

節目簡介: 新約舞流於香港回歸十周年之香港文化系列─舞蹈專場中, 帶給中國北京的觀眾一齣全新作品「同途」(Shared Journey)及另一齣舊作「馨香」(原名「旅程」)。
About the Programme: Passover Dance presented a new works Shared Journey together with Xin Xiang, which was original named Journey, to Beijing audience in Hong Kong Culture Series–Dance Gala, a programme that celebrated the 10th Anniversary of Re-unification of Hong Kong and China.
Venue: Beijing Oriental Pioneer Theatre
主辦單位: 雷動天下; 協辦: 香港舞蹈聯盟
Presenter: LDTX; Co-Organizer: Hong Kong Dance Alliance
venue_en: Beijing Oriental Pioneer Theatre

節目名稱: 原創踢躂舞SHOW -《的的得得--屋簷下》
Programme Name: Original Tap Show - Under the hood
節目簡介: 中環某處，有個家庭，同一屋簷下，他們說話大大聲，各有性格但又各自精彩，旁人聽不明也看不懂，三個傻佬和三個癲婆的故事就由此而起，為了証明自己不是神經，來一個名為『火燒舞台』的計劃！一於束起紅頭巾，舞台當爐灶，鐵片躂火花，今舖要煮大鑊飯！宴..客..親..朋..！
About the Programme: Tap into it/ Boys in the hood Living in the neighborhood, they are loud, unique and brimming with energy! They communicate with their own words, none knows what they say. They might look like nutcases, but just look at how they try to prove they are not! With their one-of-a-kind language, they are going to throw a “Fire Party” on stage! “Let’s come to make fire and burn the floor together!”
Venue: Fringe Studio
venue_en: Fringe Studio

舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞, 古典舞& 拉丁舞
節目簡介: 「菁耆樂動」全港舞蹈匯聚期望能以舞蹈促進不同人士的互動，讓不同年齡、不同階層的人士匯聚，一同享受舞蹈的樂趣。活動更以「動」作主題，展現各類人士的不同「動感」與「動力」。活動一開始便以晞蕾舞蹈團的「婆婆與孫女」作序幕，帶出長幼舞動的訊息，其他的演出團體包括了幼兒園的小朋友、以舞蹈藝術服務社會的義工團體、職業及業餘舞蹈團、以及活力充沛的長者，我們希望舞蹈動感，能感染大朋友與小朋友，使心靈及身體跳動，享受舞動的振奮舒暢的感覺。
About the Programme: The Dance Expo used the stage as a platform, gather different age group person together. To perform and to enjoy dance.
Venue: Tsuen Wan Town Hall Auditorium
主辦單位: 耆康會荃葵青區長者綜合服務
Presenter: SAGE Tsuen Kwai Tsing Integrated Elderly Service
製作/演出單位: 耆康會荃葵青區長者綜合服務
Production / Performing Unit: SAGE Tsuen Kwai Tsing Integrated Elderly Service
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium

節目名稱: 《虛擬舞蹈劇場 - 曾經一剎那》
Programme Name: Virtual Theatre Dance -“There has been a moment.....”
節目簡介: 隨著視覺科技的發達，舞蹈已不再純粹是肢體動作與音樂的配合。躍舞翩多年來致力發展「虛擬舞劇」，發揮人體與科技融合的優勢，令整體演出視覺效果更豐富、更有震撼力，帶領觀眾進入舞劇概念，一同直觀藝術。而在虛擬舞蹈劇場II《曾經一剎那》的六幕現代舞及爵士舞中，舞者將憑藉關節動作，即時啟動一套由本團團員、城市大學創意媒體學院助理教授黃錦華先生研發的REAL TIME MOTION CAPTURE軟件，控制電腦投射和音響效果，與觀眾同遊公元前希臘、60年代、本世紀初及2272年，經歷時空，反思時間。
About the Programme: With the advancement of visual technology, dancing is no longer limited to the combination of music and limb movements. Spring Poetry crafts performance with emphasis on the synergy between human bodies and technology that brings richer and more impactful visual experience. In There has been a moment…., the synergy is maximized when dancers, with their joint movements, trigger a real-time motion capture software developed by Kam Wong, Associate Professor of the School of Creative Media, City University of Hong Kong. By commanding their own movements, computer animation and sound effects, dancers will bring the audience through the space of Greece in the B.C. era, early 60’s, beginning of this century, and 2272A.D. in the 1-hour performance. Let’s travel through time to understand time.
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

Programme Name: The Amusing Journey to Cartoon World in Christmas2007
舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 當代/現代舞, 爵士舞
節目簡介: 這是一個環保愛心的多媒體兒童舞蹈劇場。內容既為小朋友提供一個精彩的聖誕節目，也宣揚環保，提倡愛護大自然。劇內以目不暇給的多媒體製作，如電腦動畫、錄像投影、神奇魔幻的螢光設計，原創卡通人物大跳特跳。如生鬼好動的Tap Tap雞之外，亦加入了活潑精靈的Tap Tap企鵝。漂亮可人的小天鵝會為大家表演螢光天鵝湖，新穎有趣的環保士的舞也定必使各位觀眾目不暇給總之歡樂無限、想像以外！絕對是一家大細開懷暢快的好機會！更是假期裏有意思、有趣味的「綠色聖誕」好節目！
About the Programme: A multi-media dance drama for children, The Amusing Journey to Cartoon World in Christmas 2007 aims to promote environmental protection and the love of nature. With the use of multi-media, cartoon characters that are originally designed will definitely bring fun and laughter to the audience. A meaningful, exciting, and “green” event for Christmas!
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Theatre

節目簡介: 躍舞翩於本年情人節呈獻一個以情為主線的舞劇，雨下帶出多段浪漫凄美的愛情故事。為營造現實和虛幻之中的情景，本團以一個全新創作、概念-光影舞蹈劇場，把電腦、多角度現場錄像及裝置的不同媒體去探索獨特的創作層面和表現手法。積極開創光影舞蹈劇場的藝術模式，更邀請著名舞蹈家陳敏兒小姐作為客席舞者。
About the Programme: Beneath the Rain is a Valentine’s Day production comprising several love stories. In this production, Spring Poetry has introduced the incorporation of lighting techniques with dance performance, featuring famous dancer Chan Man-yee.
地點: 上環文娛中心劇院、香港大會堂劇院
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Theatre,  Hong Kong City Hall Theatre
venue.1:
上環文娛中心劇院
香港大會堂劇院
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, Theatre,  Hong Kong City Hall, Theatre

節目簡介: 我「心」高「飛」為「心飛舞團」擔崗的首個弱能人士的個人舞蹈演出，以全新跨媒體舞蹈製作，並集本土優秀舞蹈工作者的創作意念，聯同一群專業舞者及本會「舞蹈大使」，以13只舞蹈來表達熱愛生命的信息，並全心真意為生命而舞蹈，透過不同的舞蹈作品分享智障人士生活的體驗；利用舞蹈的力量表達傷健共融的美好；用舞蹈去豐富圍繞著他們的每一個生命。
About the Programme: “Dancing Heart Show” is the first open dancing performance of its kind in Hong Kong by Dancing Heart Troupe to demonstrate their dancing talent on the stage. The 13 artists of Dancing Heart Troupe perform 13 dance pieces, created by local artist, to express love without boundary in this two-day open performance. It is encouraging that not only their talent in dance art is well recognised in the rehabilitation field, but also their ability and performance are ranked with public. In fact, this can bring a lot of positive impacts on the dancing movement for people with disabilities. This event is the milestone for Dancing Heart Troupe to enter into another stage of personal development.
Venue: Drama Theatre, HKAPA
主辦單位: 聖雅各福群會 復康服務
製作/演出單位: 聖雅各福群會 復康服務
venue_en: Drama Theatre, HKAPA

舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞, 爵士舞
節目簡介: 為培育更多舞蹈表演人才，舞團開設了“舞蹈新星實習班”課程，並安排此演出有一個實習機會；並即場讓觀眾投票選出“最受歡迎節目獎” 及“舞蹈新星獎” 。此外，更由星榆舞蹈團、星榆舞蹈學校演員表演各類型舞蹈。
Venue: Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre, Theatre

venue_en: Ko Shan Theatre

節目名稱: 《孩子的天空 2007　---  我今年十歲了》
舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞, 爵士舞
節目簡介: 《我今年十歲了》星榆兒童舞蹈團和香港特別行政區一樣渡過了十個寒暑。在這十年間，孩子們在這個舞蹈大家庭中一天一天的長大成長，就在這一天的生日會上展現她們的努力和成果。生日會上更專為香港特別行政區回歸十週年和星榆兒童舞蹈團成立十週年而獻上新編舞蹈節目。
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

節目名稱: 《孩子的天空 2008　---  乘運動之熱浪  展舞蹈之風采》
舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞, 爵士舞
節目簡介: [舞蹈、運動、互通、互融] 乘着北京2008奧運之風，把體育之精髓，融進舞蹈活動中，使多姿多采的舞蹈更加添活力與勁度。
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

節目簡介: 由羅耀威先生所創立及帶領的踏歌社，於2008年為慶祝成立20周年，聯同雅健社舞蹈團，以《夢‧舞人生》這一台演出，把各團員多年在舞台上所追尋的夢想與人生，以不同民族的中國舞蹈呈現出來。同時，亦希望透過《夢‧舞人生》的演出，進一步推動香港民族舞蹈的發展，讓更多普羅大眾認識中國文化藝術之美。《夢‧舞人生》整場演出共分為四個部份，分別為（一）夢．境 － 追逐之夢；（二）夢．天 － 天堂之夢；（三）夢．緣 － 團圓之夢；（四）夢．花 － 華采之夢。每部分均以不同的中國民族舞蹈表現主題。是次演出更特別邀得兩位國家一級演員 － 迪麗娜爾及祖麗菲亞同台獻技，為舞蹈晚會帶來高潮。
About the Programme: Established and led by Mr. Law Yiu-Wai, Ta Ge See celebrated its 20th Anniversary by staging the dance show Dreams in Rhythm co-hosted with the Elegance Society Dance Troupe in 2008. It is a show for its members to present to audiences, through different types of Chinese folk dance, their many years of pursuing dreams and life on stage. In addition, it is a show to promote the development of Chinese folk dance in Hong Kong, in order to encourage audiences to appreciate the aesthetics of Chinese art culture. Dreams in Rhythm was divided into 4 sections – “Dreams of Vision”, “ Dreams of Heaven”, “Dreams of Family” and “Dreams of Friendship”. Each section was presented with a specific type of folk dance. The show was climaxed by the performance of two China’s First Class choreographers and performers specially came from XinJiang, China – Ms Dilar and Ms Zulfiya.
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Concert Hall
主辦單位: 雅健社舞蹈團 、 踏歌社
Presenter: Elegance Society Dance Troupe,  Ta Ge See
製作/演出單位: 雅健社舞蹈團 、 踏歌社
Production / Performing Unit: Elegance Society Dance Troupe,  Ta Ge See
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Concert Hall

節目名稱: 中國舞藝術義工培訓計劃
節目簡介: 藝術義工培訓：透過一連串課程，吸納及培訓更多不同階層人士，掌握以舞蹈服務社群的技巧。
About the Programme: Dance Volunteer Training Courses: To help people acquire the skills for organizing voluntary works through a series of training courses.

節目簡介: 《外展舞蹈工作坊》: 探訪社會各階層人士，包括學校、志願機構、醫院、老人中心等，設計及舉辦多樣形式的普及中國舞蹈活動及表演，讓參與者體會中國舞的正面意義和樂趣。
About the Programme: The Workshop is to visit people of different social classes, including schools, voluntary organizations, hospitals, and elderly centres. To design and organize different varieties of Chinese Dance functions and performances, in order to let participants understand the true meaning of Chinese Dance while having fun.
地點: 香港九龍觀塘開源道47號凱源工業大廈4字樓B1室

節目簡介: 團透過舉辦不同組別的舞蹈比賽鼓勵社會人士參與舞蹈藝術活動，給予參與者肯定和支持。讓不同社會人士，包括：學生、長者、婦女、智障及殘障人士等發揮潛能，盡展所長。比賽分為幼兒組、少年組、展藝組、公開組和先進組五個組別，共有35隊伍參加。
About the Programme: To encourage people to participate in dancing, provide them with recognition and appreciation. Students, the elderly, women, and people who are mentally and physically challenged could therefore unleash their potential. There are totally 35 teams joining the competition; all the teams are classified into 5 groups according to their age: children, youth, mentally and physically challenged, public and the elderly group.
Venue: Po Chiu Catholic Secondary School
venue_en: Po Chiu Catholic Secondary School

節目簡介: 《「舞出關懷」舞蹈匯演》是藝術義工團一年一度的大型演出活動。透過這次演出，讓團員對舞蹈藝術有更進一步的追求，並與觀眾分享中國舞蹈的樂趣。演出的部份門票亦會贈送給社會志願機構，讓弱勢社群亦有機會欣賞舞蹈演出。  演出內容包括不同風格的民族舞蹈及創作小型舞劇，當中有團員自己排練和編導的作品，亦有得到專業人士指導的作品，藉此希望更讓團員開闊眼界、發揮所長，並在藝術領域上更進一步。
About the Programme: Annual Chinese Dance Performance is to provide people who are enthusiastic about Chinese Dance with the opportunity to perform on stage and share the happiness in Chinese Dance with the audience.  Some of the tickets are even given to the voluntary organizations. Not only can this help to achieve a harmonious society, but also offer our society with more opportunities to appreciate Chinese Dance. Performance includes a variety of Chinese Dance and self-designed dance drama. As the performance is designed by our members as well as professionals, all of our members widen their horizons and develop their talents, hence moving a big step forward in their life of arts.
Venue: Tsuen Wan Town Hall Auditorium
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium

Programme Name: “Crazy for Dance 30s’” – “Bright future for Kids” Chinese Dance Performance
節目簡介: 《舞醉情傻三十年》-《我為孺子創未來》中國舞蹈匯演的多個節目中，把國情教育及文學教育融合中國舞蹈，在視覺藝術及歌唱藝術等各方面的配合下，以舞台作為平台，廣泛推廣藝術教育，造福新一代。
About the Programme: In the “Crazy for Dance 30s’” – “Bright future for Kids” Chinese Dance Performance, there was a fusion of Chinese dance, Chinese traditional culture and Chinese traditional literary works. With the cooperation of visual arts and songs, we widely promoted the “Art Education”to the general public.
Venue: Yuen Long Theatre Auditorium
