節目名稱: 屯門區第二十二屆舞蹈比賽2008年
舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 藉着舞蹈比賽推動舞蹈發展，提高地區舞蹈水平，增進各方友誼。是次比賽參加隊伍多達208隊，需把隊伍分為五組，安排於三天內進行。而參賽隊伍分別有幼童組、少年組及公開組；舞蹈類別為東方舞、西方舞及現代舞。
About the Programme: The aim of the dance competition is to promoting dance development, enhancing regional dance level and building-up friendship between different dance parties.  There are as many as 208 teams to take part in the competition this year. The teams are classified according to their categories. The categorized participants will be divided into five groups & will be assigned into three days schedule respectively. The teams including young children group, youth group and open group; meanwhile, the categories classifying oriental dance, western dance and modern dance accordingly.
Venue: Tuen Mun Town Hall Auditorium
製作/演出單位: 屯門文藝協進會（屯門舞蹈團）
Production / Performing Unit: Tuen Mun Arts Promotion Association (Tuen Mun Dance Troupe)

節目簡介: Dance Family - 每年除夕倒數均於銅鑼灣世貿中心作一個誇年舞蹈街頭表演，除舉辦跳舞班予本會會員作舞蹈表演外，亦邀請廿多隊本地之舞蹈單位….台灣….韓國等跳舞達人來港一齊表演，互相交流跳舞心得。
About the Programme: Dance Family XIII– UDC holds countdown show at World Trade Centre every year. We always invite different dance unions and our members to perform during the show, also we invite foreign crews to our show in order that we can exchange different dance cultures.

venue_en: World Trade Center

Category: Street Jazz, Jazz, HipHop, Breaking, Poping
節目簡介: IVDC-UDC於2000年開始舉辦這個大專舞蹈界一年一度的盛事，吸引總共超過12,000名觀眾欣賞，絕對是對大專舞蹈界的努力一個肯定﹗除了各大專院校派隊參賽外，我們亦曾邀請不同舞蹈單位作舞蹈表演交流，藉此機會讓大專學生接觸不同地方的舞蹈藝術。 UDC除了作為熱愛舞蹈人士的窩，更肩負著社會新一代的責任，多屆比賽都把部份收益撥捐給有關的慈善用途，帶領大專生及向廣大市民宣揚「關心社會上有需要一群」的正面訊息。
About the Programme: IVDC – Since 2000, UDC holds an annual event for 9 Universities in Hong Kong which is called Intra Varsity Dance Competition. Among these 9 Universities, it is a great competition for them. They can learn, they can experience, they can exchange what they’ve learnt. Except from sharing their interest in dance together, UDC donates part of the income from IVDC to charities, in order to send a positive message to others helping people who needs help.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre

Category: Street Jazz, Jazz, HipHop, Breaking, Poping

About the Programme: Dance Family XIII is a countdown show at World Trade Centre held by UDC every year. Not only different local dance unions and our members are performing on stage, we also invite foreign crews in order that we can exchange different dance cultures.

About the Programme: Since 2000, UDC holds an annual event for 9 universities in Hong Kong namely Intra Varsity Dance Competition. It has been a well-received competition for dance members of universities in which they learn, experience and exchange their views and skills in dancing. Apart from sharing their interest in dance together, UDC donates part of the competition proceeds to charities in order to send a positive message of helping people in need to the public.

節目簡介: 1. 兒童舞劇 《Do-Re-Mi 》: 小朋友們將參與一個音樂舞蹈夏令營，且看這裡一幕幕的小插曲，他們在這裡的生活究竟是怎樣的呢？ 2. 《爵士拼圖》：由澳洲舞蹈教師會派出七十名學員專程到香港參與演出，與本校學生作出文化交流。 3. 芭蕾舞劇《歌碧莉亞》：三幕芭蕾舞劇。
About the Programme: 1. Do-Re-Mi : Children are joining a musical summer camp. Let’s see what their camping activities are like. 2. Jigsaw of Jazz: 70 students from the Queensland Branch of Australian Teachers of Dancing (ATOD) joined our students in a collaborative performance. The dance brought to the audience a sense of the colour and vibrancy of the music of the 70’s, the high energy music of the 80’s pop era and the current popular music. 3. Coppélia: Full length ballet performance.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 1. 兒童舞劇 《愛麗詩夢遊仙境》: 愛麗詩與她的妹妹經歷了一段家傳户曉的旅程。 2. 爵士舞《Stepping Out》：由澳洲舞蹈教師會學員，與本校學生作出文化交流。 3. 芭蕾舞劇 《仙履奇緣》 ：三幕芭蕾舞劇。
About the Programme: 1. Alice in Wonderland : Alice and her sister met all the lovely characters in their adventure. 2. Stepping Out : The dance included many popular Broadway musical pieces such as Fame, Chorus Line, Grease and Chicago. 3. Cinderella: Full length ballet performance.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 1. 兒童舞劇 《糖果屋》: 小姊弟在花園裏玩耍，竟然無意中跟着小白兔，發現了傳說中的糖果屋，原來爺爺的故事是真的。 2. 爵士舞《青春歌舞》 3. 芭蕾舞劇《胡桃夾子》：第二幕選段。
About the Programme: 1. Into the Woods  : The children and their friends found this Candy House, deep into the woods. 2. Dance Off : Based on the music from the High School Musical, students worked together to bring the best to everything. 3. Nutcracker Act Two: Fairies guided Clara and Han-Peter to meet the Sugar Plum Fairy.  They joined in the fabulous entertainment the Fairy had organised in their honour.
Venue: The Hong Kong City Hall Concert Hall
venue_en: The Hong Kong City Hall, Concert Hall

Programme Name: Wan Zi Qian Hong - an evening of Dance and Music
節目簡介: 《情真美善歌舞樂》晚會分為『情、真、美、善』四個環節，在展示過去一批膾炙人口、經久不衰的優秀音樂、歌舞作品的同時，亦表達了浪漫而又深具現實意義的主題。那就是對生命的熱愛，對人生情真美善的追求。晚會中的舞蹈節目有：古典舞《彩雲追月》，藏族舞《洗衣歌》，新疆舞《喀士噶爾女郎》，彝族舞《情深誼長》，小舞劇《白蛇傳之斷橋會》……_________________________________________________________________________ 萬紫千紅是我們的人生，萬紫千紅是我們的歲月。誠然，生命中也有黑暗和悲哀，歲月中也有蕭煞和嚴寒。因為理想，因為信念;我們追尋著人生的情與真,我們追尋著歲月的美與善。因而，我們獲得心靈的富足。在人生的旅途中，在我們感到孤獨和徬徨的時候，有多少歌舞樂曾經伴陪著我們,激勵著我們，至今仍在我們心中流淌……
About the Programme: It is an evening of music and dance with the theme of Passion, Truth, Beauty and Kindness.
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Concert Hal
Presenter: Wan Zi Qian Hong Yi Shu Tuan
Production / Performing Unit: Wan Zi Qian Hong Yi Shu Tuan
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall Concert Hal

節目名稱: 《飛舞天下「眉飛色舞」舞蹈匯演》
Programme Name: World of Dancing: Flying Elbow  Dancing Colours
舞蹈類別: 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 匯演包括16個中國民族民間舞、漢族舞及當代中國舞作品，其中11個為創編舞蹈。當中《心愛的烟盒》，就是以兒童生活的喜悅為創作的靈感，讓舞蹈員投入角色來演繹，達致跳舞自娛的果效；利用電視劇《火舞黃沙》插曲來創作的《焰》，獲得在場觀眾的好評；而蒙古舞–《心願》更奪得公開舞蹈比賽的全場「最佳表現大獎」。
About the Programme: A showcase of the organization includes ethnic Chinese dance and contemporary pieces.
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Theatre

節目名稱: 《飛舞天下「飛天遁地」舞蹈匯演》
舞蹈類別: 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 匯演共有18個舞蹈節目，包括民族民間舞、漢族舞及當代中國舞。舞團的藝術總監編排了13個節目，當中9個為創編舞蹈；當晚觀眾的入座率超過九成，對大部分創編作品均高度讚賞。其後，部分創作舞蹈如《策馬奔馳》、《彝風》及《靜夜詩》等，更於公開舞蹈比賽中奪取多個獎項。
About the Programme: A showcase of the organization includes ethnic Chinese dance and contemporary pieces.
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Theatre

節目簡介: 你曾否細心留意，公園內每個人的故事？ 負責清潔公園的伯伯、巡邏警察、晨運耍太極的公公、帶著初生嬰兒的年青太太、魚目混珠的小偷、等候情人的少女、心情惡劣的白領、積極備戰的運動員……不同年齡的男男女女，每天都可能在公園內上演各種不同的故事。 今天，一位迷路的小孩來到公園裡，因恐慌而把內在潛藏的兩種天性------善良與破壞，分裂出來，在公園內與其他人物遇上……
About the Programme: Have you ever noticed that there is a story to every person in the park ? The park attendant, the policeman on patrol, the old man doing tai chi in the morning , the young with her new-born baby, the thief  who is trying to make himself invisible, the young girl waiting for her boy friend, the depressed white-collar worker, the athlete in training …… so many men and women of different ages on the park, and each has a story to tell every day.  On this day, a child who lost her way comes to the park. as she comes into contact with different people in the park, fear leads to a dichotomy of two hidden aspects of human nature -  kindness and destruction …
Venue: Ngau Chi Wan Civic Centre Theatre
製作/演出單位: 香港展能藝術會、協青社
Production / Performing Unit: Arts with the Disabled Association Hong Kong , Youth Outreach – School of Hip Hop
venue_en: Ngau Chi Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

節目名稱: 《香江情懷》   (香港特別行政區成立十周年慶典 – 成為認可慶祝活動)
舞蹈類別: 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 《香江情懷》是雲海藝術團整體精神的結晶。回憶過去歲月，風雨同路，苦樂同行，奮力進取，面對節奏急速變化，價值觀取捨各異的香港社會，本團上下齊心，奠定之良好根基和形象，可謂有目共睹。今天的演出，表達了我們熾熱的舞蹈心，濃郁的香江情懷！ 本團全體演員悉力以赴，糅合了中國古典、民間、少數民族舞和現代舞多種舞蹈語言，表現了我們在舞蹈藝術的理想、探索、追求與才能；透過獨特的身體語言和不同時期的舞蹈，演繹了香港從一個寂寂無名的小漁村，發展為今日的國際大都會的歷程；重演了香港人的自強不息，不屈不撓的精神。同時也展示本團在過去惡劣環境下對舞蹈藝術的不懈追求，以及在回歸十年期間，在舞蹈藝術方面所獲得更大的發揮空間的喜悅。
About the Programme: The programme depicts the evolution of Hong Kong from fishing villages to today cosmopolitan through various dancing form from Chinese classical, ethnic and modern dance.
地點: 荃灣大會堂 演奏廳
Venue: Tsuen Wan Town Hall Auditorium
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium

節目名稱: 《專題分享：舞蹈治療與癌症病患者》(「整全藝術治療 - 探索與應用」座談會及工作坊 )
Programme Name: Dance Therapy and Cancer Patient (Holistic Arts Therapies Symposium)

製作/演出單位: 香港藝術治療師協會  何天虹博士, Dr. Rainbow Ho,  PhD., DTR

節目名稱: 《Tamalpa 舞蹈 /動作/藝術表達治療 工作坊》
Programme Name: A Weekend of Tamalpa – an  Expressive Arts Workshop based in Movement
節目簡介: 工作坊採用的舞蹈/動作/藝術表達治療方法源於著名舞者/治療師Anna Halprin。我們以直覺的動作入舞、再透過揉合視藝術和文字表達。我們的舞蹈、繪畫和詩歌將呈現不同的意象和訊息，讓我們思考和對話，協助我們改變和成長。 工作坊主持: Karina Bergen是一位舞動治療師及/藝術表達工作坊主持，曾在Tamalpa藝術治療學院接受訓練。Karina Bergen現居香港。
About the Programme: We will use intuitive movement and dance to enter the body, and visual art and written word to express it. Our dances, drawings and poetic expressions hold metaphors and messages allowing for reflection, growth and change in the way to transformation.
Venue: Loft Stage Cultural Network
venue_en: Loft Stage Cultural Network

節目名稱: 《奧運馬術歡聚紫荊城 》 (此節目被納入文化部“相約北京-2008”文化活動 (港澳台地區項目)

About the Programme: The production celebrates the Olympic Equestrian event held in Hong Kong.

About the Programme: Yuen Long Dance Troupe Annual Performance is a mixed-bill showcase to demonstrate the multi-talent of troupe members.

舞蹈類別: 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 由盈楓舞蹈團及盈楓藝術啟發中心與專誠邀請來自新加坡聚舞坊的當代藝團、武術隊、藝術院校及向日葵藝術團等，聯合演出全新節目， 作為於同年7 月受邀至新加坡演出《海闊天空》兩場舞蹈匯演之延續篇。 希望能把充滿嶄新編排和青春氣息的舞蹈呈獻給廣大觀眾，推動新港兩地舞蹈文化交流。
About the Programme: Zehygr Dance Troupe (together with Zehygr Art Inspiring Center) had the joint performance for The Dance Authentic 2006 with Dance Ensemble Singapore Ltd. (DES - including professional contemporary dance group, martial art group & junior dance group).  We were delighted to invite DES in order to continue the cultural exchange missions in Hong Kong, which we had made a jointed performance Interweave with DES on 23rd July, 2006 in Singapore.  We hope to bring the brand-new dances full of energy and enthusiasm to all the audiences.
地點: 香港理工大學賽馬會綜藝館
Venue: The Hong Kong Polytechnic University Jockey Club Auditorium
venue.1: 香港理工大學賽馬會綜藝館
venue_en: The The Hong Kong Polytechnic University Jockey Club Auditorium

節目簡介: 描述愛情的方法多不勝數，體驗愛情的方法不計其數，從Joëlle Bouvier活力澎湃而性感的作品，便知她深明此道。她的作品洋溢著男女間的綿綿情話，《愛》對人類情慾的演繹高潮起伏，蕩氣回腸，令觀眾悠然神往。在此諧趣而輕快的舞蹈表演中，男女們尋尋覓覓，有的隻影形單，有的情投意合，有的漫無目標地流離浪蕩。苦等情人的痛苦、找到意中人後所玩的誘惑遊戲，以及失戀所激發的動力，如此種種，拼發出多姿多采的愛情。從蕩婦的深痛絕望和走鋼絲者的孤寂，可見這場獨舞表演強調失戀與瘋狂。雙人舞誌慶相聚和肉體的融合，三人舞則探索誘惑和變幻莫測的愛情。
About the Programme: About Love plunges the viewer into turbulent and theatrical renditions of human passion. Light as a feather, violent as desire and as obsessive as the passionate declarations that run through it, About Love is a poetic journey incorporating fragments of this universal constant characterized by its wonder and manifest in an Argentinean Tango or a Bach oratorio. Skin deep body movements, pulsating and theatrical dance, incandescent eroticism.  There is thousands and one ways to describe love, Joëlle Bouvier understands these truths quite well as evidenced by her vibrant and sesuel work, which provides a panorama on the amourous discourse of male-female relations.
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Concert Hall
主辦單位: 香港法國文化協會 及「法國五月」藝術
Presenter: French May Festival in association with  Alliance Française de Hong Kong
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Concert Hall

節目簡介: 演出項目《Aduna, Land of Adventure》的主題是7個冒險家探索未知的領域。透過召喚真象和神聖的比喻，讓觀眾神遊現實與幻想之境，舞蹈充滿著意象，創造了形容沙和石的文字，鏗鏘有聲。“Aduna”在非洲烏洛夫族語中包含了世間和命運的概念。Aduna是一齣感染力強、色彩斑爛的作品，燈光效果如如畫。Sissoko編曲成為作品的主要部份，對舞蹈員極富體能和表達力的舞姿有提升和襯托的作用。
About the Programme: An urban dance company from France, combining street dance with theatre dance techniques, capoeira and African dance. Aduna, by choreographer Ibrahima Sissoko, deals with the discovery of an unknown land by 7 adventurers. Aduna, a word from Wolof African language, is a concept gathering the notion of world and destiny. Music by Sissoko plays an essential part in the works. It accentuates and supports the extremely physical and expressive movement of the dancers.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Studio Theatre
主辦單位: 香港法國文化協會 及「法國五月」藝術節
Presenter: Alliance Francaise de Hong Kong & French May Festival
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 《極限》以十個人物作中心，講述他們夢想著其他的人，希望在一個瞬息萬變的世界中找到一個理想的地方。他們被困在一個隨時由水平方向突然傾倒成垂方向的世界內，各人竭盡所能地排除一切將他們分隔開的障礙。“Margo”源於拉文中Marge一字，是代表極限、邊緣或邊界的意思。在一個充滿重大危機的宇宙中，體操運動員、Hip Hop舞者空手道冠軍與戲劇性的對白、舞蹈、武術和卓越的本領互相交織，能喚起原始森林擊鼓聲和低音提琴音樂為這奇異的舞蹈添上完美的一筆。自1986年起，他們那些手法前衛的表演征服全世界的觀眾。創意一族奇技表演團現時長註馬賽港。
About the Programme: Gymnasts, Hip hop dancers,  Contemporary dancers, and old artsy karate champions weave together theatrical dialogue, dance, martial arts and prowess into a universe of explosive gravity.  MARGO shows ten characters, the story of theirs fights and intimate challenges. On an astonishing mobile stage, they move in a world that can fall over at any moment, from horizontal to vertical.  The music between jungle and drum’s bass, put this finishing touches to this extraordinary choreography. The avant-gardiste work of Archaos has been rewarded by immense successes in the world word since 1986. Archaos is acrobatic, danse, ballet, theatre, circus, a harmomnius blend of all these genres.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
主辦單位: 香港法國文化協會 及「法國五月」藝術節
Presenter: Alliance Française de Hong Kong  & French May Festival
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 這2003年在Biarritz芭蕾舞團創作的舞蹈之創作靈感來自編舞家Thierry Malandain的一篇題為《星之頌》的文章，文中他描寫人類跨出的第一步是由舞步帶領。“經過很多個晚上、很多個早晨，一天，他成為第一位天生就是舞蹈員的人。他單獨一人，轉圈、雙臂向著無人伸出。然後，他獲贈第一個女人成為他的舞伴。＂而《Les créatures》（受造者）在貝多芬的音樂《Les créatures de Prométhée》伴奏下從此誕生了。Thierry Malandain從Serge Lifar 1929年的名作中獲得靈感，完成今次Biarritz芭蕾舞團於香港演出的舞蹈《Les créatures》（受造者）。
About the Programme: The CREATURES is inspired by the renowned 1929 Serge Lifar work.  After the success of his first symphony with Viennese audience, Beethoven composed the music for a ballet: the creatures of Prometheus.  “There were many nights, many mornings, then one day, the first man was born a dancer. Alone, he will spin, with his arms, extended towards no one else. Then he was given the first women as a partner.” Choreographer, Thierry Malandain gave priority for the dancing body, to its frailness, its strength and its sensuality.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultral Centre Grand Theatre
主辦單位: 香港法國文化協會 及「法國五月」藝術節
Presenter: French May Festival In Association with Alliance Francaise De Hong Kong
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultral Centre Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 透過舞動/舞蹈、藝術和充滿創意的活動，我們每次着眼身體不同部份，讓我們發現真我及內心深處。令我們思想更具創意，更勇於行動及對自己及他人真坦誠及富有同感心。參加工作坊毋須任何特別資歷和經驗。
About the Programme: Participants will discover movement and creative process while carving a path of extreme authenticity.  Using artistic and therapeutic principles, we will uncover and explore a \'body mythology\'  which connects to the compelling events, issues and questions in our lives.
Venue: Loft Stage Cultural Network
venue_en: Loft Stage Cultural Network

節目名稱: 《DanceAbility 舞出傷健新紀元》(「國際戲劇/劇場與教育聯盟」第六屆世界會議 )
Programme Name: DanceAbility Community Dance (The 6 th World Congress of the International Drama/Theatre & Education Association)
節目簡介: 為每三年舉行一次(今屆為亞洲首辦 )的「國際戲劇/劇場與教育聯盟」世界會議近三百多名國際教育家、藝術家，展現多元能力人士平等、合作及自由舞動的色彩，顯示世上沒有「殘缺」的身體，人人皆可舞。
About the Programme: It was performed by ablebodied dancers and dancers with disabilities to 300 participants of the 6 th World Congress of the International Drama/Theatre & Education Association，demonstrating the dance for all.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Concert Hall
主辦單位: 國際戲劇/劇場與教育聯盟, 香港教育劇場論壇
Presenter: International Drama/Theatre and Education Association(IDEA), Hong Kong Drama/Theatre and Education Forum (TEFO)
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Concert Hall

節目簡介: 無論身體有什麼障礙，或擁有什麼的動作詞彙；都可以透過「身體的風景」，歡樂地享受舞蹈、即興地創造動作，對自己的身體感覺驕傲，透過自己的身體傳達創意，把身體的存在和它的律動所蘊含的象徵意義，構成一壇獨有的好風景！  其核心技巧和理念包括了意識流、接觸即興、認識自己的身體和所處空間、抽取和發展個人掏出來的材料、糅合各種動作詞彙不同的幅度和轉化、探索觸覺、感覺、平衡、重心、人與地的接觸、分享分擔 ，堪稱「全人設計」，即人人均可參與。
About the Programme: The Body Landscape Dance Workshop by Maxime Iannarelli & Gemma Galeria Rocosa is universally designed for all. Participants can happily enjoy dance, improvise, feel proud of their body and creation regardless of any barrier in body and mind.
Venue: Loft Stage Cultural Network
venue_en: Loft Stage Cultural Network

節目名稱: 「藝展心窗」促進青少年精神健康計劃Dr. Beatrice Allegranti - 「舞蹈及形體治療 - 化身」《舞蹈及形體治療工作坊》
Programme Name: Dance Movement Therapy Workshop: The Embodied Performance Approach by Dr. Beatrice Allegranti
節目簡介: 將形體動作深層探索、舞蹈表演及研究揉合。Dr. Allegranti 將會帶領參加者進入三天充滿創意和自我反思的旅程。
About the Programme: The workshop  incorporates the exploration of embodiment with a performance research project.  Dr. Allegranti will facilitate a creative and reflexive journey!
Venue: THE Boys’ & Girls’ Clubs Association of Hong Kong headquarter
主辦單位: 香港小童群益會  社區文化發展中心
Presenter: The Boys’ & Girls’ Clubs Association of Hong Kong, Centre for Community Cultural Development
venue_en: THE Boys’ & Girls’ Clubs Association of Hong Kong headquarter

節目名稱: 舞出傷健新紀元2008:《我是，我有，我夢!》(重演)
Programme Name: DanceAbility Community Dance Project 2008: I am, I have, I dream! (Re-run)
節目簡介: 舞蹈由美國編舞家Alito Alessi 編舞，他尊重每一個人的身體，相信舞蹈屬於世上每一個人，本舞舞者包括多種不同能力人士(肢障、智障、聽障及健體等)，舞中每人均發展出及展示了屬於每一個人的舞蹈，呈現了世上沒有「踐缺」的身體。 是次重演特設現場口述影像(Audio Description)及演前演後的手語翻譯，進一步讓舞作更全面地面向不同能力的朋友。 是次重演特設現場口述影像及演出前後之手 語翻譯，進一步讓舞作更全面地面向不同能力的朋友。
About the Programme: This dance has been choreographed by Alito Alessi who has developed an innovative methodology for inclusive dance. He believes everyone can dance with his/her unique movements. The re-staging of the dance was accompanied by audiodescription and sign language.
地點: 賽馬會創意藝術中心中央庭園
Venue: JCCAC Central Courtyard

節目簡介: 為賽馬會創意藝術中心社區藝術節項目之一，讓不同能力人士體驗「人人可舞」的歷程及概念。
About the Programme: One of the program of Jockey Club Creative Arts Centre Community Art Festival, aims to lead persons with different abilities to experience the process and concept of dance for all.

Presenter: The Boys’ & Girls’ Clubs Association of Hong Kong and Centre for Community Cultural Development
venue_en: THE Boys’ & Girls’ Clubs Association of Hong Kong headquarter

節目簡介: 接觸即興 (Contact Improvisation) 是70年代初美國舞者Steve Paxton和他的友人，因受到合氣道、禪學、體操及太極等影響而開發出來的一種舞蹈形式，它透過身體接觸互動產生出千變萬化的動作，著重身體和心靈的溝通，以開放態度來探索身體本身的創造力。Alito是接觸即興的第一代舞蹈家，每年均在美國俄勒岡州舉辨大型接觸即興舞蹈聚會。
About the Programme: The facilitator, Alito, is a first generation contact improviser. Contact improvisation is based on movements that can arise from the interaction of bodily and physical touch.
Venue: Loft Stage
venue_en: Loft Stage

節目簡介: 舞動多元 (DanceAbility) 是Alito從接觸即興發展出來的舞蹈方法，它更能融合不同能力的朋友，包括專業舞者、四肢健全、視障、智障、輪椅、肢障朋友等一起舞動，從中發掘每一個人獨有的身體語言。
About the Programme: Alito developes DanceAbility from contact improvisation integrating persons with different abilities to dance, and to explore the unique body language of each involved.
Venue: Harbour Road Sports Centre
venue_en: Harbour Road Sports Centre

節目名稱: DanceAbility社區舞蹈：舞出傷健新紀元-《我是、我有、我夢!》
Programme Name: DanceAbility Community Dance Project: I am, I have, I dream!
節目簡介: 「舞動多元「DanceAbility」舞蹈方法，透過身體接觸互動，產生出千變萬化的動作，著重身體和心靈的溝通，探索身體本身的創造力，最終就是要發展出屬於每一個人的舞蹈。DanceAbility是適合不同能力朋友一起參與、一起舞動的舞蹈方法。 由亞洲民眾戲劇節協會主辦及社區文化發展中心策劃的《DanceAbility社區舞蹈：舞出傷健新紀元》是由Alito Alessi編舞，吳詩韻及丸仔統籌，並與本地傷健人士及舞者一起排演的戶外舞蹈演出；是項計劃有近傷健舞者共約七十人參加，是一個不可多得的表演。舞作於2007年獲得由香港舞蹈聯盟頒發的「香港舞蹈年獎2007」
About the Programme: Through body contact and improvisational interaction, DanceAbility is a methodology that helps to create thousands of movement. It focuses on the mingling of body and soul and explores the creativity and possibility of the body. It ultimately develops unique individual dance movements by everyone. DanceAbility embraces the participation of persons with different abilities. The DanceAbility Community Dance project jointly organized by CCCD and APTFS had involved over 70 dancers with different abilities. The DanceAbility Community Dance project was awarded “Hong Kong Dance Award 2007”.
地點: 灣仔修頓球場, 葵芳邨羅馬廣場, 石硤尾邨21-23座足球場
Venue: Wanchai Southern Playground, Kwai Fong, Shek Kip Mei
Choreographers: Alito Alessi ; Co-ordinator: Ng Sze Wan, Yuenjie

灣仔修頓球場
葵芳邨羅馬廣場

Programme Name: Kuntao Workshop (a kind of Filipino Martial Art)
節目簡介: 「觀道」Kuntao 是一種來自菲律賓南部回教族人的武藝，這種自衛術的姿勢美妙，包括強力的跳躍、踢腿、屈膝，有如舞蹈。過去，菲律賓戲劇表演者以「觀道」動作入戲，贏得高度的讚譽，如菲律賓教育劇團演出的印度史詩劇Ramayana。亦因此而為世人所認識。 導師Mario Leofer Lim 是棉蘭老著名的編舞家/音樂家和文化工作者，他將負責主持是次「觀道」工作坊，並由Cha de Cruz 女士協助。是次九小時的工作坊將讓參加者認識「觀道」的基 本動作、姿勢和招式，並且能夠將這些動作、姿勢和招式溶入舞蹈/劇場的表演中。
About the Programme: History and origin of Kuntao – a form of martial arts of the Moro Tausug, which is a Muslim tribe in the Sulu archilpelago, Mindanao, Southern Philippines. It can be described as an art of self defense with precise forceful movement that is combined with jump, kick and deep knee bend infused with dance. Filipino artists have made this famous all over the world as they have incorporated such beautiful gestural vocabularies in some of their performances e.g. PETA’s Ramayana.  Mr. Mario Leofer Lim, well known choreographer, musician and cultural worker from Davao will teach the different basic movements, gesture and body posture of Kuntao. At the end of the workshop, each participant should be able to perform the basic movements and to apply them in dance/dance theatre performances.
Venue: Studio of FM Theatre Power
venue_en: Studio of FM Theatre Power

節目名稱: 《Astad Deboo工作坊》  (由古典印度舞至現代舞
Programme Name: Astad Deboo Workshop  (From Classical Indian to Contemporary Modern Dance)
節目簡介: Astad Deboo是印度當代最著名的舞者，他曾獲印度藝人的最高榮譽 Sangeet Natak Academy Award. 他曾與 Pina Bauch，蘇聯大芭蕾舞團及Pink Floyd等合作。亦曾到過美國及歐亞各地獨舞演出。 他年幼時已經學習印度傳統舞蹈，之後被現代舞吸引，然後到世界各地學習及了解不同的舞蹈動作詞彙，然後回到印度，再度投入印度古典舞的學習。最後他揉合了古典、現化、與世界不同的舞蹈傳統，成為一位非凡的舞者。
About the Programme: Astad Deboo is an internationally known Indian modern dancer/choreographer in the world and the pioneer in India for contemporary modern dance.  Astad Deboo\'s journey as a dancer began with lessons as a child in the Indian Classical dance form Kathak in the steel city of Jamshedpur in Eastern India . The young Astad struggled to come to terms with the iron frame of classical tradition, breaking free ønly when a chance encounter with Murray Louis doyen of modern dance set him on a long journey in search of a unique idiom.  For two decades Astad traversed the globe, in the time honored tradition of a seeker of knowledge. His search took him to the dance traditions of South America, Japan Indonesia, Europe, China and USA. After many years abroad Astad returned to India and trained in Kathakali the powerful dance theater from the state of Kerala bringing to his dance a combination of extreme physical control and stunning visual impact.
Venue: Studio of FM Theatre Power
venue_en: Studio of FM Theatre Power

節目名稱: 《糅合傳統與 現代   Fanishwar Bhasker - 印度現代舞》
節目簡介: Fanishwar Bhasker，曾在印度著名的 Bhoomika Creative Dance Centre全職習舞(現代及古典舞蹈、古典音樂吟唱、武藝、按摩、燈光設計等)八年之久。 到過印度各地的Uday Shankar舞蹈節、俄羅斯、法國、巴基斯坦、巴勒斯坦等地演出、並應邀到德國編舞。他對印度現代舞之父Uday Shankar的理念與創作方法和受Uday Shankar影響極大的印度現代舞發展，有深刻的觀察和認識。他現在是全職的舞者/編舞者和導師。 他應亞洲民眾戲劇節協會的邀請專程來港進行交流活動，主持三天的工作坊及作公開演出，讓參加者品嘗印度古今雙融的現代舞風貌。
About the Programme: Fanishwar Bhasker studied dance in the famous Bhoomika Creative Dancer and has performed in many places in India and outside. Well versed in the method of the father of Indian Modern Dance Uday Shankar, he taught a 3 day workshop and performed at the Fringe Club.
地點: (工作坊)香港灣仔富德樓; (演出)28/06/2006
Venue: (Workshop)Wan Chai Foo Tak Building, Hong Kong; (Performance)Fringe Club
venue_en: Wan Chai Foo Tak Building, Hong Kong; Fringe Club

Programme Name: Workshop on Korean Traditional Folk and Mask Dance
節目簡介: 由韓國著名舞蹈家及民眾戲劇工作者 Lee Seok Gyu 來港主持之韓國傳統民間舞蹈工作坊，除了學習韓國舞蹈 ，同時更學習著名的傳統亞里郎歌曲 。
About the Programme: Korean Traditional/Folk and Mask Dance workshop facilitated by Lee Seok Gyu, well known dancer and people\'s theatre worker from Korea. Come and learn the famous Ariyang songs and dance with the tunes.
Venue: Loft Stage
venue_en: Loft Stage

節目名稱: 《羅密歐與茱麗葉》之復刻版 (學校文化日)
Programme Name: Romeo and Juliet  (School Culture Day Scheme)
節目簡介: 《羅密歐與茱麗葉》之復刻版是以青年人為題。藉舞蹈和戲劇的表演形式建立溝通橋樑 讓年青人除了認識青春期愛情所帶來的煩擾外，也循著創作者的巧思去了解愛的真諦。
About the Programme: The theme of the production works around today’s youngsters which explores the meaning of true love through dance and drama presentation.

節目名稱: 《羅密歐與茱麗葉》之MK版 (學校文化日)
Programme Name: Romeo and Juliet (MK version)  (School Culture Day Scheme)
節目簡介: 羅密歐與茱麗葉》之MK版是以青年人為題。藉舞蹈和戲劇的表演形式建立溝通橋樑，讓年青人除了認識青春期愛情所帶來的煩擾外，也循著創作者的巧思去了解愛的真諦。 除此，內容也會因主人翁為愛殉情而涉及敏感話題的討論如青少年濫藥自殺和死亡等，提供讓學生積極思考人生的方向。
About the Programme: The theme of the production works around today’s youngsters which explores the meaning of true love through dance and drama presentation. It also covers the sensitive issues of drug abuse and death in hope to stimulate students to think the direction of life.

節目名稱: 《 火鳥 》( 社區文化大使計劃)
節目簡介: 希望透過現代舞這一特殊的藝術表演形式及極具震撼力的非語言溝通工具，鼓勵現代的青年人積極面對人生，擁有明確的價值觀，以及為達到理想所付出的勇氣及努力，以「再生勇士」為學習的楷模，活得精彩，創出驕人的成就。
About the Programme: In use of the uniqueness of modern dance as communication media, the programme is to encourage today’s youngsters to live life the fullest.

節目名稱: 《用心看世界 - 「火鳥」延續篇》 ( 社區文化大使計劃)
Programme Name: Phoenix II：Read the World with your Heart (Community Cultural Ambassador Scheme)
節目簡介: 延續及深化2006/07年「社區文化大使計劃」《火鳥》傳遞生命的信息。透過藝術媒介舞蹈和音樂，幫助我們重新認識生命、提昇生命質量和感悟生命的真諦。
About the Programme: Last year\'s Community Cultural Ambassador - Phoenix programme delivered a message on how to live life the fullest； the same theme will be continued and highlighted in this year\'s programme. Through dance and music, we will to inspire audience to see life from a new perspective, to make every passing moment a treasure and to understand the true meaning of life.

節目簡介: 時空交錯，兩個擁有相同名字的Ｒ仔──一位被獨留在家的孩子及一個被遺留在宇宙的機械人──共同踏上尋愛的冒險旅程。被獨留家中的R仔，希望自己像賣火柴的女孩一樣，從火光的閃爍中找到慰籍，可惜她卻意外地將自己燒傷……良好智能機械人Ｒ仔與主人失散，遇上宇宙爛鐵回收商人，誤被送往宇宙深淵解體。幸好，得到一班殘缺機械人的幫助，得以逃離厄運。兩個R仔的命運相互牽引交纏著，交織出幕幕愛的詩篇。
About the Programme: Having the same identities, a child R and a robot R live in completely different space and time. The child R, being left behind at home, hopes to be like the Little Match Girl and to find love from the sparks. Unfortunately, R accidentally burns himself… Robot R, on the other hand, was separated from his owner while traveling in space. He then bumps into the Universe’s scrap ironmonger who mistakenly tows him to the Cosmic Abyss where malfunctioning machines are dismantled. With the help of other robots in the batch, R narrowly escapes destruction. The fate of the two Rs intertwine together to disperse the message of love.
地點: 30間中小學，及荃灣荃新天地 , 紅磡都會商場, 香港文化中心大堂, 天水圍天晴社區會堂, 馬鞍山廣場, 香港站中環行人隧道, 香港中央圖書館展覽廳, 屯門黃金海岸商場,中區山頂廣場, 元朗劇院大堂, 葵青劇院大堂, 沙田大會堂大堂, 香港文化中心大堂, 荃灣大會堂大堂

節目簡介: 牧神有夢        ：在玻璃球內追花逐月，男人對女人誓神劈願， 女人對玫瑰咬牙切齒，情花開， 開燦爛 ，有七色， 也會甩色。 三個女人，穿上高跟鞋走進愛情森林裡冒險，尋寶遇著牧神幻化的幸福玻璃球，大家開心笑著跳著，忽然，玻璃球變出一個真男人，而女人的面色開始改變……
About the Programme: The faun has a dream – chasing after flowers and the moon in a crystal ball.  In a relationship, man always gives promises; woman is vehement about roses. When love blooms, it’s boom time; it’s got its kicks, but it can also make you love sick. Three women put on their high heels, go on a treasure hunt in the Love Jungle.  To their happy surprise, they find a crystal ball - which is actually the faun in disguise. They scream and jump with joy, suddenly a man - a real man – emerges from the crystal ball, and the women’s faces begin to change…
地點: 香港兆基創意書院多媒體劇場
Venue: HKICC Lee Shau Kee School of Creativity Auditorium
venue.1: 香港兆基創意書院多媒體劇場
venue_en: HKICC Lee Shau Kee School of Creativity Auditorium

節目簡介: 對於生活和愛的那一種異乎尋常觸覺，不應只局限在藝術家身上。它應該像這星球上的氧氣一樣，為一切依存者而無色無味地存在。只要你願意，你可以大口的呼吸，同時你也可隨意屏氣息。《愛息》 —從這異常的世界中追求那份尋常的觸覺是這次演出的主題。  不加鎖舞踊館藝術總監王榮祿先生，通過多年來遊走於舞蹈領域裏所累積的經驗以及近期完成的作品《越》為藍本。延續探討那種對我們緊緊相扣的，更深入的“愛”的“旅程”。  《越》：為香港演藝學院、昆士蘭科技大學（布利斯本）以及西澳演藝學院（柏斯）作個別創作以及2006香港舞蹈節的第二十周年國際舞蹈學院節三院破天荒地聯合演出。
About the Programme: Whispers of Love is the theme of the project. Artistic Director of Unlock Dancing Plaza, ONG, Yong Lock, using his great sense of life and love, his professional experiences in dance field for years and his recent choreography work Beyond, partly and collaboration of Hong Kong Academy of Performing Arts, Queensland University of Technology and Western Australian Academy of Performing Arts, performed in the Hong Kong Dance Festival 2006 celebrating 20th Anniversary International Festival of Dance Academies, that had inspire him to continue the ‘journey’ to explore the depth of love of which they connected to us.  For an artist, the limitation on the extraordinary sense of touch in living and love should not exist.  It ought to be the existence of oxygen on this planet, to serve all the interdependent livings. Once you are ready, brave yourselves to breath, but at the same time, feel free to hold your breath. Whisper of Love – is to pursue the ordinary sense of touch from the extraordinary world.
地點: 牛池灣文娛中心文娛廳
Venue: Ngau Chi Wan Civic Centre Cultural Activities Hall
venue.1: 牛池灣文娛中心文娛廳
venue_en: Ngau Chi Wan Civic Centre, Cultural Activities Hall

節目簡介: 對於生活和愛的那一種異乎尋常觸覺，不應只局限在藝術家身上。它應該像這星球上的氧氣一樣，為一切依存者而無色無味地存在。只要你願意，你可以大口的呼吸，同時你也可隨意屏氣息。《愛息》 —從這異常的世界中追求那份尋常的觸覺是這次演出的主題。  不加鎖舞踊館藝術總監王榮祿先生，通過多年來遊走於舞蹈領域裏所累積的經驗以及近期完成的作品《越》為藍本。延續探討那種對我們緊緊相扣的，更深入的“愛”的“旅程”。  《越》：為香港演藝學院、昆士蘭科技大學（布利斯本）以及西澳演藝學院（柏斯）作個別創作以及2006香港舞蹈節的第二十周年國際舞蹈學院節三院破天荒地聯合演出。
About the Programme: Whispers of Love is the theme of the project. Artistic Director of Unlock Dancing Plaza, Ong Yong Lock, using his great sense of life and love, his professional experiences in dance field for years and his recent choreography work Beyond, partly and collaboration of Hong Kong Academy of Performing Arts, Queensland University of Technology and Western Australian Academy of Performing Arts, performed in the Hong Kong Dance Festival 2006 celebrating 20th Anniversary International Festival of Dance Academies, that had inspire him to continue the ‘journey’ to explore the depth of love of which they connected to us.  For an artist, the limitation on the extraordinary sense of touch in living and love should not exist.  It ought to be the existence of oxygen on this planet, to serve all the interdependent livings. Once you are ready, brave yourselves to breath, but at the same time, feel free to hold your breath. Whisper of Love – is to pursue the ordinary sense of touch from the extraordinary world.
Venue: Beijing Dong Fang Xian Feng Theatre
主辦單位: 北京雷動天下現代舞團
venue_en: Beijing Dong Fang Xian Feng Theatre

節目簡介: 《愛息》，由馬來西亞吾舞聯盟牽線，乃吾舞系列的六月檔。不加鎖舞踊館聯同馬來西亞手戈壽板舞團聯手打造的一台跨國交流現代舞碼。王榮祿先生以法國詩人馬拉美的一首詩《牧後的午後》為創作的啓發點，在這首詩的誘導下，嘗試以一種持續的方式探討有關愛的題材。
About the Programme: Whispers of Love is an international collaboration initiated by MyDance Alliance as part of the MyDance Series 2007. This dance project features the joint effort of ONG, Yong Lock by having the poem The Aftrenoon A Faun by Stephane Mallarme as the starting point, they are trying to explore the idea of “ Love” through dance.
Venue: Pentas 2,the Kuala Lumpur Performing Arts Centre, Malaysia
venue_en: Pentas 2,the Kuala Lumpur Performing Arts Centre, Malaysia

節目名稱: 《緣舞場(十二) - 正 與 反  》
節目簡介: 人類常常渴望預知未來，連演出及生活都是每次有計劃地重複，期望達到預期目的，對於《緣舞場》來說，沒有人能預知將來，亦沒法預料結果與過程，這種不可預知的結果與危機才是生命中最有趣、最吸引及最富挑戰之處。期望我們珍惜生命中的每個過程，感受我們生活的每一刻﹗就如《緣舞場》一樣，強調︰萬事因緣而生，緣盡而散；生命中的一切有生自有死，有始自有終；只要我們珍惜、感受和經歷，一切努力過後順其自然……隨緣吧﹗(歡迎有興趣 人仕加入《緣舞場》行列﹗) 《緣舞場(十二) 》嘗試透過即興來開拓陰陽及正負的各種可能，請來一同見正我們如何透過各種媒體表達，尋找正負平衡及如何達至隨心、隨意與表演的當下…!
About the Programme: They meet because of dance! They perform because of chance! Improvisation Land XII is a performance full of chance with dance, music, text, movement, and free body expression! What make you think positive and what make you feel negative. In Chinese Yin and Yan, if they don’t get a balance then it will cause trouble. A time for us to try out “+” and “ –“. May be very exciting or may be nothing will happen. No one knows exactly what will happen until the moment is there, not even the performer. So the most important: moment is the moment with your present…! Only one performance and non-repeatable! No re-run! No extended date! No pirated, all original! With post performance discussions! So don’t miss it!
Venue: Y-Space Theatre Y
venue_en: Y-Space, Theatre Y

Programme Name: Improvisation Land XIII - Gecko in Sandals
節目簡介: 自由聲音即興 自由身體表達 達達俳句酒廊 來自美國、日本與香港的音樂人、作曲家、表演者及舞者交織出本年最不能錯過的自由即興作品！
About the Programme: Free Sound Improvisation Free Body Expression Dada Haiku Lounge Musicians, composers, performers and dancers from US, Japan and Hong Kong, a performance you simply cannot miss this year!
Venue: Y-Space Theatre Y
venue_en: Y-Space, Theatre Y

節目名稱: 《緣舞場 十四 (十月緣舞場 – 四步曲)  》
節目簡介: 在十月的四個週末，多空間實行與你在Y劇場來一個結合音樂、裝置、舞蹈、形體、錄像與文字的即興表演，每星期有不同主題。這個十月，你又那愁沒去處……！ “估” “破” “梵” “胴”
About the Programme: “Or are you not conscious that your body is a house for the Holy Spirit which is in you, and which has been given to you by God?  You are not the owners of yourselves;”  1 Corinthians 6:19 BBE “Speculation” “Split”  “Sanctum” “Shekinah”
Venue: Y-Space Theatre Y
venue_en: Y-Space, Theatre Y

節目名稱: 《緣舞場(十五) - 古典與現代  》
Programme Name: Improvisation Land XV – Classical vs Modern
節目簡介: 當古典遇上現代 / 當東方遇上西方，一個結合印度古典舞蹈與西方現代舞的表演，由印度當代舞蹈大師Astad Deboo擔當編舞及演出。同場加演《緣舞場十五》之古典與現代。
About the Programme: A solo dance performance by Astad Deboo (An Indian Contemporary Dance Master). When East meet West! This will be a performance that combines Classical Indian and Modern Dance. Rare & Extraordinary….!The second half of the performance is Improvisation Land XV, with artists from different medium!
Venue: Y-Space Theatre Y
venue_en: Y-Space, Theatre Y

節目名稱: 《緣舞場十六 - 自己跳自己》
節目簡介: 在欣賞香港藝術節35週年的舞壇鉅獻“我的舞生涯 - 進化論”前，多空間將為舞迷們預設演出前頭盤，邀請了“楊惠美、楊春江、梁家榷、陳敏兒、龍植池、王榮祿、嚴明然及馬才和”聯同音樂創作人陳偉發及邱立信等人大力呈獻一台完全即興的舞台作品 - 《緣舞場十六 - 自己跳自己》 “Let’s Dance”。全現場音樂 + 多位舞者的肢體大比拼。
About the Programme: A “preview” of the Hong Kong Arts Festival 2007 dance highlight production My Life as a Dancer – Evolution.
Venue: Y-Space - Theatre Y
venue_en: Y-Space - Theatre Y

節目名稱: 《天使墮落凡間》- 國際綜藝合家歡2007
Programme Name: Angel Emily on Earth - International Arts Carnival 2007
舞蹈類別: 中國舞, 當代/現代舞, 多媒體舞蹈表演
節目簡介: 美麗而又善良的天使“愛美麗”因為好奇心驅駛來到人間，希望能夠認識及了解地球人及現代都市人的生活狀況與居住環境，因而展開了她的「地球旅程」。演出將以現代舞為主，结合歌舞、現場音樂、文字與錄像，帶出環保信息。
About the Programme: Emily, the angel, descends to earth and lands in Hong Kong. She has brought with her a beautiful picture of Planet Earth and expects to find paradise here. To her disappointment, Hong Kong is only a polluted city under a veil of smog. Eventually, she meets \'Tin Hau\', with whom she decides to go on a mission to save the city.
Venue: School tour performance
venue_en: School tour performance

節目簡介: 即興演出並不單流於「隨心」、「隨意」。一次完美的即興能達至可一不可載及令人載三回味，全憑表演者的功駕、訓練、觸覺及交流。這次《緣舞場十七-「171107‧Sarah Kane」》繼續秉承莎拉‧肯恩不拘一格的勇者精神，一群出色、多變的表演者大概也可以融合、匯聚甚或超脫香港、台灣、加拿大的敏感與感性，以燈光、文字、裝置、舞蹈、聲音、形體、音樂等將莎拉‧肯恩的人間地獄裝飾、點綴，讓觀眾感受另一番更深層的震撼美。
About the Programme: Sarah Kane (1971 -1999) was one of the most important contemporary playwrights in UK (In Yer-Face Theatre). Her works include: Phardra’s Love (1996) , Crave (1998) and 4.48 Psychosis (1999)…etc. This time Y-Space will use her text as a base for Improvisation Land XVII – 171107, with two of the most talented musician / composers in Hong Kong Nelson Hui and Wilson Tsang, three multi talented actors based in Hong Kong / Taiwan / Canada Alex Cheung, Leong Huey Yi & Morgan Gadd, Hong Kong / Taiwan famous set designer Kelvin Tsang, lighting designer Gabriel Fung, dancer / choreographer Mandy Yim and Victor Ma. Want to meet Sarah Kane and these artists? This will be a night not to be missed! Only one performance…!
Venue: Y-Space Theatre Y
venue_en: Y-Space, Theatre Y

節目名稱: 《緣舞場十八 – 零捌．壹．肆「音樂自由行」》
節目簡介: 一個由你決定如何欣賞，從什麼角度欣賞，以什麼層次欣賞的…自由即興與音樂晚會！       多空間於2008年的首個節目：《緣舞場十八- 「零捌‧壹‧肆」》(文字與音樂即興) 將會把觀眾置身於一個被音樂、文字與舞蹈包圍的即興演出！參與者皆是來自不同背景的創作人，當中包括了來自三藩市的電腦聲音能手Tsun-yuk Hsu (Bill) 、 出生於美國及活躍於本港的音樂奇才邱立信 (Nelson) 及來自本港的創作人：演員李鎮洲(CC)、Band友梁卓(Edmund) 及音樂創作人曾德曦 (Wilson) ，屆時並將有其他神秘嘉賓現身！《緣舞場十八-「零捌‧壹‧肆」(音樂自由行) 》將會是2008年第一個最觸目的音樂即興晚會，你一定會被這群多才多藝的音樂奇人所創作的音樂打動…！
About the Programme: A night of free music improvisation that you could decide…! Improvisation Land XVIII – 4‧1‧08 “Music Free Walk” will be a night of free music and text improvisation with artists from local and overseas. Artists including: Bill Hsu come from US will use his computer to create extraordinary sound, Hong Kong famous actor Cung-chow Lee will do text improvisation, Nelson Hiu born in US and actively create music in HK will pick up his bass guitar again, famous local band leader Edmund Leung will play drum & electronic guitar, multi-talented composer Wilson Tsang of course will play his most favorite instrument acoustic piano and there will be other guest performers too. This will be a night of multi-media music improvisation with “surround sound” and unforgettable experience. You definitely can’t miss this first most astonishing free music improvisation in 2008.
Venue: Y-Space Theatre Y
venue_en: Y-Space, Theatre Y

節目名稱: 2007 / 08社區文化大使 戲棚計劃 — 「傳統現代對對碰」
Programme Name: Community Cultural Ambassador Scheme 2007 / 08  Makeshift Theatre Project ．Dance Collage Carnival 2008
節目簡介: 多空間將本土富有特色的傳統神功戲棚，變身為一個結合傳統與現代的環境舞蹈展演場，實行透過現代舞及環境舞蹈及各式表演藝術，來與你一同分享藝術與生命的創造力。 活動包括： 一同分享藝術與生命的創造力。 （一）鼓舞同歡大巡遊 （二）主舞台演出 - 尋找快樂金鎖匙 （三）快樂戲棚客賓臨 （四）共創舞蹈新天地 （五）合家歡樂齊齊玩
About the Programme: An evening that a traditional Chinese makeshift theatre blends the modern site specific dance.
地點: 青衣楓樹窩路二樓青衣體育會球場，茶果嶺大街(天后廟旁)，跑馬地黃泥涌道新月花園，西貢普通道天后廟
Venue: Tsing Yi Fung Shue Wo Rd. Football field (next to Municipal Service Building), Cha Kwo Ling Rd. (next to the Tin Hau Temple), Happy Valley Wong Nai Chung Rd.,Wong Nai Chung Crescent Garden, Sai Kung Po Tung Rd. (in front of Tin Hau Temple)
venue.1: 青衣楓樹窩路二樓青衣體育會球場，茶果嶺大街，跑馬地黃泥涌道新月花園，西貢普通道天后廟
venue_en: Tsing Yi Fung Shue Wo Rd. Football field , Cha Kwo Ling Rd. , Happy Valley Wong Nai Chung Rd.,Wong Nai Chung Crescent Garden, Sai Kung Po Tung Rd.

節目簡介: 呼吸可以令人生存；呼吸可以治病；呼吸更可以傳播病菌，把人類殺個措手不及！沒有呼吸，我們也就沒有生命！而生命誕生的一剎那，小娃娃的第一個呼吸、第一聲呼喊，就決定這個小生命有沒有力量去面對這個世界的挑戰……！一切就由呼吸開始……！《呼吸II ― 現象》是多空間早前於挪威、德國及北京演出《呼吸》的發展及延續。這次將由身體出發，嘗試透過簡單的題材，發掘呼吸與我們生活的關係，並透過呼吸探索中國文化的動作藝術特色。
About the Programme: Breathing is the ultimate force of life, yet it can also take lives away by spreading illnesses. The first cry of a baby is his or her first breath, which is a crucial test he or she has to overcome so as to stay alive. Breathing is where everything begins! Air and Breath II – Phenomenon is a continuation and development of Air and Breath which toured Norway, Germany and Beijing. This time, starting with the body, Y-Space rediscovers the relationship between life and breathing and explores the role of breathing in Chinese traditional arts.
Venue: Ngau Chi Wan Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Ngau Chi Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

節目簡介: 《呼吸II ― 現象》是「多空間」早前於挪威、德國及北京演出《呼吸》的發展及延續。這次將由身體出發，嘗試透過簡單的題材，發掘呼吸與我們生活的關係，並透過呼吸探索中國文化的動作藝術特色。在全球一體化的前題下，我們也不能只顧呼吸眼前三呎的空氣 ― 而在全球暖化的影響下，也是時候看看該如何與世界一同呼吸。
About the Programme: Air and Breath II – Phenomenon is a continuation and development of Air and Breath which toured Norway, Germany and Beijing. This time, starting with the body, Y-Space rediscovers the relationship between life and breathing and explores the role of breathing in Chinese traditional arts. Under the increasing threat of global warming, we should start to look beyond ourselves and breathe at one with the earth.
Venue: Sha Tin Town Hall Auditorium
venue_en: Sha Tin Town Hall, Auditorium

節目簡介: 呼吸曾分別於挪威、德國及北京演出，獲得極大迴響，是之演出將首次移師香港街頭，並將帶到波蘭Bytom上演 《呼吸》是﹕ 一件會呼吸看似有生命的物件 一件不知是男是女的物件 一件不會閱讀都市人類符號而活著的物件 一件會動的雕塑 一件……
About the Programme: Air and Breath was first performed in Bergen (Norway) in the Oktoberdans Festival as a site-specific dance. I used limited resources to present Air and Breath, using duvets and elastics to wrap around my bodies, rolling on the street and every movement is initiated by simple breathing. Air and Breath is: A life like thing that breathes An amorphous thing A thing that is neither male nor female A thing that has no distinct skin colour A thing that does not know how to move according to urban human signage A sculpture that moves A….
地點: Bytom Market Square (波蘭); (re-run)Bytom Silesian Dance Theatre (波蘭)
Venue: Bytom Market Square  (Poland); (re-run)Bytom Silesian Dance Theatre (Poland)
主辦單位: 波蘭第十五屆國際當代舞蹈會議及表演節2008
Presenter: Poland XV Annual International Contemporary Dance Conference and Performance Festival 2008
venue.1: Bytom Market Square ; Bytom Silesian Dance Theatre
venue_en: Bytom Market Square  ; Bytom Silesian Dance Theatre

節目名稱: 《緣舞場十九 -  情迷敲擊夜》
節目簡介: 由一群來自不同背景的敲擊名家所匯聚的《緣舞場十九－情迷敲擊夜》，是本地表演界難得一次的跨國界及跨界別的多媒體大雜匯，亦是本年度全城至勁、至激、至in的多媒體敲擊即興表演。演出者包括音樂人﹕李耀誠(香港)、梁卓堃（香港）、Makha Diop（塞內加爾）、邱立信（美國/香港）及Les Fong（美國/香港），他們將會大玩手鼓、爵士鼓、非州鼓、電子鼓及雜項敲擊…等。而舞者將包括：王榮祿（香港/馬來西亞）、嚴明然（香港）及馬才和（香港） ，而錄像、燈光及舞台監督將由李智偉一手包辦。
About the Programme: Improvisation Land is now up to the 19th series. This time Y-Space will bring you the most creative, fun and talent percussionists local and overseas. They are: Edmund Leung (HK), John Lee (HK), Les Fong (US), Makha Diop(Senegal), Nelson Hiu (US/HK). They will play Jazz drum, Djembe drum, Electronic drum, Frame drum, Chinese drum as well as Found Objects…etc. Of course there will be top dancers Ong Young-Lock ( Malaysia/HK), Yim Ming-Yin/Mandy (HK) and Ma Choi-wo/Victor (HK). Improvisation Land XVIIII – Percussion Night will definitely one of the most exciting, fun and unforgettable cross media improvisation performance in 2008.
Venue: Y-Space Theatre Y
venue_en: Y-Space, Theatre Y

節目簡介: 十二位編舞舞者於三個晚上分兩個小組，從舞蹈形式出發搜尋試探，展示瞬息萬變、時刻新鮮的身體圖像。當主流非主流演出一致推崇多媒體、跨界別、台上說個不停的時候，BSP把舞蹈帶回最基本、不搭台不放投影，純用身影，釋放動靜之間最原始最厲害的能量。
About the Programme: With no sophisticated set, high-tech video projection nor comprehensive scripts, 12 dance-choreographers collaborate in groups of 6 to celebrate the organic, physical energy of dance. When everybody embraces multimedia, cross-disciplinary performances, BSP brings dance back to the basics – the body.
Venue: Fringe Studio
venue_en: Fringe Studio

節目簡介: 再見你…又過了365個日子，倒數彼此生命中的人事景物，細嘗笑的紫薇、淚的甘甜；我是我勇往直前、無悔無怨；你是你沉思靜待，一躍沖天！在不同的時區，共同的天空下，譜奏著同一首生命的舞曲，時而輕快，捨不得一份強烈的溫柔，恨不得每天都可共舞纏綿。
About the Programme: Glad to see you again! Since we parted 365 days ago, we`ve lived our lives in different territories, tasting the sweetness of tears and smiles. I`m still a man of no tear, no regret. You`re still the one you used to be, who is always prepared to fly up high! We`ve looked forward to dancing together again…And the moment will come in no time.
Venue: Fringe Studio
製作/演出單位: 王廷林舞蹈創作工作室
venue_en: Fringe Studio

節目簡介: 凝聚本地舞蹈力量，邀請兩組共九位本地舞蹈家，摒除華麗舞台裝置的創作藍本，在舞臺上演繹出最基本，最單純的舞蹈精粹-沒有佈景，沒有道具，沒有高科技錄影投影，只有一個赤裸裸的舞臺，讓舞者以身體，以姿態，歌頌生命，實現舞臺的簡約主義。延續去年乙城節《BSP2006》,以城中名人，音樂人及DJ挑選音樂給舞蹈家編排舞蹈演出。今年，BSP再接再厲，且將舞蹈勢力蔓延至新加坡，注入新加坡音樂人挑選的音樂。
About the Programme: Nine of Hong Kong `s leading dancer-choreographers, working in two groups, celebrate the organic, physical essence of dance on a bare stage. No sets, no props, no high-tech video projections, just the basics; bodies in motion, celebrating life. First launched at the Fringe club at the City Festival 2006, BSP features movement set to music especially chosen by artists and non-dance. Now, for 2007, BSP spreads its wings to Singapore. And to add a Singapore flavor, the production will feature the favorite music of some Singapore celebs.
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, Theatre

節目簡介: 換個角色、身份，除去名字稱呼、名銜、標籤的辨識和框架；舞動著、傾訴著如流水行雲的身體包裹著你和我，渾然忘我地在有形的時空內，建構無限的空間；追逐時光的腳步，散下時間的巨網，撈起你與我。
About the Programme: Bound by no roles and identities, labeled by no names and addresses, they dance for the sake of dance. Bing self-forgetful, they create unlimited possibilities within confined space and time. Andy and Taiju reunion in The Third Dance of Ten-Year Planning ‘Dance Forest-Self –forgetful’, transcending themselves and making each minute count!
Venue: Fringe Studio
製作/演出單位: 王廷林舞蹈創作工作室
venue_en: Fringe Studio

節目簡介: 計畫由多位舞蹈家參與編舞及演出，包括李健偉、郭曉靈、張狄鳴以及何祖宜，返璞歸真，重組空間，重新探討舞蹈意義，用最基本最單純的舞蹈精粹，配合音樂和基本舞臺燈光，表達內心最深處的澎湃情感，為觀眾帶來無限個可能。由城中名人、音樂人及DJ挑選音樂給舞蹈家作為編舞的素材。本節目獲邀於2008年2月到曼谷藝穗節演出。計畫始於乙城節2006，亦曾於乙城節2007及於新加坡舉行的[照亮香港]延續。
About the Programme: Dancer-choreographers Max Lee, Elaine Kwok, Ralph Cheung and Joey Ho celebrate the power of dance as a simple but forceful expression of human emotions through body movement, music and stage lighting. The music is especially chosen by artists and non – dancers who love dance. First launched at the City Festival 2006, BSP continued at the City Festival 2007, and spread its wings to Spotlight Hong Kong in Singapore in 2007. It will tour to the Bangkok Fringe Festival in February 2008.
Venue: Fringe Studio
venue_en: Fringe Studio

節目簡介: 你與我在過去某一個時間裂縫中巧遇，在無數的這一刻倒流成過去之前，我們要抓緊的不是時間，…是每一個重遇、相逢、相知的機會。
About the Programme: In a split second, we meet by chance. Time flows and doesn`t wait. What we must firmly grasp is not moments in time, but every opportunity to connect and get along because it could all vanish without a trace…
Venue: Fringe Theatre
製作/演出單位: 王廷林舞蹈創作工作室
venue_en: Fringe Theatre

節目簡介: 1976年的夏天，室外的高溫如火焰直奔充滿激情的舞池。快將21歲的少年Jack即將進行一宗畢生難忘的魔鬼交易。在倫敦「火熱的士高」工作至通宵達旦，Jack遇上了撒旦的得力助手——魔鬼美人Lady Marmalade。為了實現不日成名的夢想，Jack決定向Lady M出賣自己的靈魂。Jack搖身一變成為樂壇萬人迷！夢寐以求的名氣、運氣一時無兩，可是他卻失去他的摯愛Jane。面對名利與愛情，Jack渴望再次進行魔鬼交易，不惜以現有的一切來換回一生的最愛……
About the Programme: It\'s the summer of 1976. It\'s as hot outside as the fashion, hits and passion are on the dance floor and Jack is about to celebrate a 21st birthday he will never forget… Working late in a London nightclub, \'Disco Inferno\', Jack meets Lady Marmalade - a femme fatale - the Devil\'s right hand lady. Dreaming of becoming successful, Jack makes a fustian pact with Lady M, trading his soul to fulfill his wildest fantasies. Jack becomes a screaming sensation overnight, from a nobody to a heartthrob of every teenager in town! Sadly this success proves hollow and his popularity doesn’t go down well with his longtime girlfriend, Jane. When it comes to the crossroad of fame and love, if only he could turn back time… if only he could make one more trade, trading all he now has for something far more important... the love of his life.
地點: 香港藝術中心壽臣劇院
Venue: Hong Kong Arts Centre Shouson Theatre
venue.1: 香港藝術中心香港藝術中心壽臣劇院
venue_en: Hong Kong Arts Centre Hong Kong Arts Centre, Shouson Theatre

Programme Name: The Hong Kong Jockey Club 100% Red Performing Arts Project
舞蹈類別: 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 我們以當代舞蹈作為媒介，以一個舞蹈表演去詮釋中國傳統文化藝術的不同範疇。舞蹈創作的靈感來自中國傳統文化藝術，參加者根據四大中國傳統特色，包括詩詞、節慶、民間藝術及書法，自行設計舞步。導師亦以有趣及具啓發性的問題，誘發舞蹈員創作一系列的動作去表達情感。本計劃讓青少年有機會一嘗編舞的滋味，同時能感受中國傳統文化藝術的偉大。所有參加者及觀眾都能夠以完全不同的觀點重新了解中國傳統的文化藝術。
About the Programme: We have chosen contemporary dance as a medium to translate the different aspects of Chinese culture and arts into a dance performance. A participants-devised dance performance, this dance project uses traditional Chinese arts and culture as inspiration. 4 distinctive disciplines of Chinese arts and culture are chosen as stimulants for participants. They are: Poetry, Festivities, Folk Art and Calligraphy. A collection of stimulus together with a series of questions inspires the dancers to generate a sequence of movements that correspond to their emotions. The project provides young people with a valuable opportunity to access and create original choreography and expand their knowledge of Chinese arts and culture. General participants and audiences can also see Chinese culture in a whole different light.
地點: 香港藝術中心壽臣劇院
Venue: Hong Kong Arts Centre Shouson Theatre
venue.1: 香港藝術中心香港藝術中心壽臣劇院
venue_en: Hong Kong Arts Centre Hong Kong Arts Centre, Shouson Theatre

節目簡介: 由20個本地青年舞團帶來不同的舞蹈演出，包括爵士舞、Hip Hop、的士高、中國舞、現代舞、芭蕾舞，甚至是揉合了功夫元素的舞蹈，總之全力施展渾身解數一較高下！踏入第8個年頭的《與眾共舞》，香港青年藝術協會把來自本地不同小學、中學、大學及獨立團體的舞蹈創作力量凝聚，為他們提供費用全免的表演平台、專業技術支援、宣傳及市場策略意見，讓他們有機會把努力和心血結晶呈獻大家眼前。有些團體今天更成為了專業舞團。
About the Programme: 20 youth dance groups sharing their jubilant steps and electrifying moves. Performances range from jazz, hip hop, disco free style to kung fu fighting, Chinese dance, modern dance and ballet. “Dance 4 All” comes to its 8th year and is still a raging success. It provides a free platform opens to all local dance groups who are enthusiastic about dancing and crave to perform. With professional technical support, promotion and marketing advice provided by our experts, local primary schools, secondary schools, universities and fledgling dance companies are gathered together to show you their hard work, blood, sweat and tears. It has brought forward many amateur dance groups to the stage and many are playing a big part in the professional field these days.
地點: 香港藝術中心壽臣劇院
Venue: Hong Kong Arts Centre Shouson Theatre
venue.1: 香港藝術中心香港藝術中心壽臣劇院
venue_en: Hong Kong Arts Centre Hong Kong Arts Centre, Shouson Theatre

節目簡介: 在悠悠長夜的懷抱中， 我尋找光明， 拿著筆開始寫點甚麼， 拼命掙扎著， 黑暗在明亮的月光下無畏無懼， 失眠。 《失眠》是由一班年青人及香港青年藝術協會創辦人兼藝術總監麥蓮茜一同創作的活動舞劇。經過六星期的工作坊，舞蹈員透過運用不同的動作、寫作和視覺圖像，發掘出種種與失眠及夢境有關的舞蹈構思。總演出由這些工作坊的創作拼貼而成，並似剪影般把「失眠」這主題呈現於觀眾眼前。
About the Programme: Deep in the bosom of the gentle night, Is where I search for the light, Pick up my pen and start to write, I struggle a fight, Dark forces in the clear moonlight without fear, Insomnia. Insomnia is a piece of dance-movement theatre devised by a group of young dancers and the Founder/Artistic Director of Hong Kong Youth Arts Foundation, Lindsey McAlister. Over a 6 week period the dancers explored ideas around sleeplessness and dreams working in the mediums of movement, creative writing and visual images. The performance is collage of experiences drawn from these workshops and act as snap shots that capture the theme.
Venue: Fringe Studio
venue_en: Fringe Studio

節目簡介: 葬——一個關於迷失、恐懼、焦慮、抗衡、放棄與重生的題材。 故事會否令你堅強或是快樂起來，恐怕會是一個截然不同的課題。 但至少我們都知道：我們可以重新站起來。可能已經破損，可能封滿灰垢、塵埃。但站了起來，還是可以從頭開始。 作品大致根據愛倫坡的故事與詩句創作，並加入一點點Carol Ann Duffy的元素。一個集合視覺效果、舞蹈與戲劇的作品。心是冷了，但熱情尤在。 遠處還有東西等待著，我們就只要站起來，走過去。
About the Programme: Burial is about lost, fear, anxiety, confrontation, giving up and standing up. Whether you will come out feeling stronger or happier, that will be an entirely different story all together.  But at least we know, we can stand up again. Maybe half broken, cover in dust, dirt and grout. But we are up. And up we go again. The play is loosely based on Edgar Allan Poe’s stories and poems, with a bit of Carol Ann Duffy on top. A visual, dance, drama piece that will cool your heart, but hopefully warm your soul.  There is something out there. We just need to pick ourselves up and walk over there.
Venue: Fringe Studio
venue_en: Fringe Studio

節目名稱: 《那些小孩回來了（香港永不會跟從前一樣了）》
Programme Name: The kids are back (and the Hong Kong streets will never be the same)
節目簡介: 交叉點是一個標示。導演Christina Jensen與朋友們成長的地方，也是他們回巢的地方。Christina招募了富有天份的青年朋友，跟她創作一些充滿香港地方色彩、跨越國際，甚至是一些令觀眾大惑不解的東西！以一個地方作為起點非常有趣，獨特的氣氛總帶來新動態。慢條斯理的親密和快速行駛的城市形成強烈對比，還加上升降機內愚蠢的指定動作。這裡所做的一切，由揭示劇院的概念，進而揭示了整個演出主題。藉此跟觀眾分享舞蹈的力量以及其無型無限。
About the Programme: “X Marks the spot. The place we grew up, left, and chose to return to.” Said Christina Jensen, the director of this performance. Christina has recruited the talents of childhood friends to collaborate with in an effort to produce something that is truly Hong Kong, eclectic, international and possibly confusing. It is always interesting to use a place as a starting point, it\'s unique atmosphere has endless potential for making movement. The contrast of slow moments of intimacy with fast explosive movement mimicking the city, and minimal constrained movement taken from all those awkward elevator moments. All the technical adjustments are seen as part of the overall concept to unmask the theatre as a metaphor in unmasking the theme. They share with the audience the potential of dance and how movement need not be limited by style or genre.
Venue: Fringe Studio
venue_en: Fringe Studio

節目名稱: 太古港島東「景點舞蹈創作匯」
Programme Name: Swire Island East Urban Dance Festival
舞蹈類別: 當代/現代舞, 多元化
節目簡介: 景點舞蹈是一種特別為某地點設計的藝術。專業編舞家帶領參與學生深入研究及了解表演地點的文化特質，根據建築物、歷史、社區及環境等等，創作出獨有而不獨享的舞蹈。 是次舞蹈大會舞影處處，15場景點舞蹈，演出者包括國際舞團：來自洛杉磯的Collage Dance Theatre及來自紐約的Third Rail Projects，加上本地的專業舞團及學校舞蹈隊，聯手創造屬於香港城市的舞蹈節。而且滿街是身穿鮮艷戲服的巡遊演員，還有一個接一個的舞蹈工作坊、讓參加者一同參與的互動舞池，以及即席示範的景點人體彩繪。
About the Programme: Site-specific dance’s choreography is created to exist in a certain place. To generate choreography through research and interpretation of the site’s unique cultural matrix of characteristics, whether architectural, historical, social and/or environmental. The Hong Kong Youth Arts Foundation presented 15 site-specific dance pieces alongside international site-specific dance troupes: Collage Dance Theatre from Los Angeles and Third Rail Project from New York City. There were exciting local dance groups as well as school dance teams to create a street dance festival in urban landscapes, uniting architecture and dance; celebrating the vibrant arts and cultural atmosphere. Every one was amazed and thrilled by this dance extravaganza, dotted with fabulously dressed roaming characters, back to back dance workshops, interactive dance corner and site-specific body painting demonstration!
Venue: Tong Chong Street, TaiKoo Place
venue_en: Tong Chong Street, TaiKoo Place

舞蹈類別: 當代/現代舞, 環境藝術
節目簡介: 本計劃一個以藝術品作為靈感的表演及展覽於，超過100位學生、教師及本地藝術家在多個視藝和演藝工作坊上，跟Natascha Radclyffe-Thomas、Colin Kerrigan (倫敦藝術大學)及麥蓮茜(本會)共同創作，並以香港的建築物作為靈感。計劃以城市為概念，刺激年青藝術家、舞蹈員及編舞去設計時裝、裝置及身體動態。是次計劃鼓勵了不同藝術元素的交溶，同時讓藝術品成為其他年青藝術家的催化劑。 由新媒體藝術家設計出一個多媒體場景，開幕典禮當日舞蹈表演與裝置藝術共冶一爐，實在是一次新體驗！
About the Programme: This project is combined of an artwork inspired performance and exhibition. Over 100 students, teachers, and local artists worked with Natascha Radclyffe-Thomas, Colin Kerrigan (UAL), and Lindsey McAlister (YAF) at the Visual and Performing arts workshops, using Hong Kong\'s iconic architecture as inspiration. This project stimulated young artists, dancers, and choreographers to create fashion designs, installations, and movement vocabulary based on their responses to the concept of \'City\'. This unique project encourages cross fertilization between art forms and the chance for young artists\' work to be used as a catalyst for others.  Throughout the opening event we showcased the choreographic works. They were staged in and amongst the installations, and against a multi media backdrop created by local New Media artists.
地點: 長春社文化古蹟資源中心
Venue: The Conservancy Association Centre for Heritage
製作/演出單位: 香港青年藝術協會、倫敦藝術大學
Production / Performing Unit: Hong Kong Youth Arts Foundation, The University of the Arts London
venue.1: 長春社文化古蹟資源中心
venue_en: The Conservancy Association Centre for Heritage

節目簡介: 本會獲邀參與「莎翁24」— 一個國際性的莎士比亞戲劇活動。60個來自世界各地的青年團體同時上演不同的莎翁改編劇作，盡情歡呼青春、文化及創作力，以慶祝莎士比亞的444歲生辰！活動於紐西蘭展開，24小時後於夏威夷結束。本會與9位年輕表演者以莎翁名劇《李爾王》為基礎，重新創作了《李爾王的女兒》，描述女兒之間的關係和她們對父親的感情。故事以抽象及多媒體形式表達，帶出背叛、瘋狂和審判等主題。劇場包含大量肢體動作，配以別具一格的音樂和對白演出。
About the Programme: The Hong Kong Youth Arts Foundation has been invited to take part in “Shakespeare 24”, an exciting worldwide Shakespeare performance event. Beginning in New Zealand and ending 24 hours later in Hawaii, 60 youth groups will stage adaptations of Shakespeare\'s plays at same time on Shakespeare’s 444th birthday, celebrating their youth, culture and creativity - and Shakespeare.  Base on Shakespeare’s “King Lear”, YAF and 9 youth performers created “Lear’s Daughters.” This physical theatre will be focusing on the relationships between the women in the tragedy and their feelings towards Lear. Themes of the play such as Betrayal, Madness, Justice are highlighted and weaved together in an abstract and highly visual multi media performance in English, Mandarin, and Cantonese. The piece is movement-based and is set to a soundtrack of eclectic music and spoken word.
Venue: Fringe Studio
主辦單位: 香港青年藝術協會、Shakespeare International
Presenter: Hong Kong Youth Arts Foundation, Shakespeare International
venue_en: Fringe Studio

Programme Name: Standard Chartered - Arts In Park Mardi Gras2008
節目簡介: 渣打藝趣嘉年華靈感源自世界各地大型的節慶及嘉年華，其中以英國諾丁山、巴西及美國紐奧良舉行的嘉年華最為盛大。是項戶外大型活動，正展現了香港活力及多元的一面。 500位青少年與藝術家以文學巨著《小人國歷險記》為主題，創作誇張服飾、旗幟、頭飾、巡遊舞蹈及大型木偶。此外，一系列精彩絕倫的舞蹈、音樂及馬戲表演亦於台上輪流演出。現場設有二十個免費的藝術攤位及六個互動演藝工作坊，供市民參與各種藝術創作，感受熾熱的嘉年華氣氛。
About the Programme: Inspired by international arts festivals and carnivals such as the Notting Hill Carnival, the Brazilian Carnival and New Orleans Mardi Gras, Standard Chartered Arts In the Park – Mardi Gras 2008 was a festive outdoor event to celebrate the vitality and diversity of the Hong Kong community.  This event was inspired by the story of “Gulliver’s Travels”. 500 dancers and students have participated in a series of intensive art workshops, creating elaborate costumes, giant puppets and dance performances. There were 6 hours of back-to-back dance, music and circus performances, over 20 arts and crafts stalls for the public to create original carnival-inspired artwork, 6 interactive performing arts workshops that anyone can participate in and culminating in an exciting and colourful procession around the park and everyone was welcome to take part!
地點: 銅鑼灣維多利亞公園中央草坪
Venue: Victoria Park Central Lawn
venue.1: 維多利亞公園中央草坪
venue_en: Victoria Park Central Lawn

節目簡介: 《雨》(2001) ，安．德麗莎最為舞者舞迷鍾愛的作品，在數年內獲邀演出了超過一百五十場！舞者在Steve Reich (2006年為作曲家七十壽辰的全球慶祝) 的《給十八個樂師的音樂》麻醉下，如宇宙星宿聚散。
About the Programme: Rain (2001)is refreshing and ‘rivets you to your seat’ (The Independent) ,and is Rosas’ most frequently toured piece danced to Steve Reich’ Music for 18 Musicians. In a pictorial amphitheatre bathed in a pale golden glow, the dancers trace out an inimitable whirl of movements to Reich’s hypnotic percussions.
Venue: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre
venue_en: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre

節目簡介: 《曾經》(2002) ，難得一見大師傾情獨舞，安．德麗莎親踏台板，向Joan Baez不死的社運精神致敬。
About the Programme: Once (2002), De Keersmaeker’s  signature solo with defined dynamic dancing to Joan Baez in concert; Part 2 is compelling to watch. Gazing into the photo of Baez on the 33rpm cover, she dreamed…
Venue: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre
venue_en: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre

節目簡介: 《雨季的愁思/愛之極至》(2005) ，安．德麗莎2005年最新大型作品，備受矚目。前者是印度民謠，敘述愛的盼望；後者是John Coltrane膾炙人口的作品，詠嘆愛之大同。兩者同是觸動靈魂的天籟，迴異的風格卻形成了有趣的比照。
About the Programme: Intimate and spiritual Raga for the Rainy Season/A Love Supreme (2005) is in two parts, but sharing one theme – love. Exploring love in separation, Raga for the Rainy Season unfolds to the music of a soulful Indian raga. In contrast A Love Supreme, to John Coltrane’s ultimate spiritual jazz, delves into the transcendental beauty of love, as each dancer seems to embody a musical instrument and the legendary musicians who made up Coltrane’s celebrated quartet.
Venue: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre
venue_en: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre

節目簡介: 美女、城堡、黑森林，還有外表猙獰，其實內心溫柔的野獸……這齣2003年美國重頭戲座無虛席，2005年本土載譽重演，2006年跳上香港舞台。純真善良的美少女為救父親，無奈跟野獸同處一室，最終憑着愛與誠為野獸解除魔咒，贏得翩翩王子歸！大衛．賓利精心編排的舞步、華麗的服裝、會變魔術的道具與佈景—一幢像從圖畫書裏跳出來的金碧輝煌的堡壘，可愛的機械貓頭鷹，跟「布公仔樂園」系出同門的動物面具，加上歌德式的動人配樂，齊齊陶醉在浪漫的童話裏。
About the Programme: Beauty and the Beast is a romantic tale off human vanity and magic spells. Raging and anguished, the Beast is a noble prince miserably trapped in a monster’s body. Belle, sweet, beautiful and pure of heart, is forced by circumstance to live with the terrifying Beast. But the power of love transforms ugliness and tames the brutal Beast. Bintley’s choreography is lavish, embellished by dazzling costumes, intricate animal masks from Lim Henson’s Creature Shop, and magically animated sets and props – a claret jug pours with no one near, a candelabra ignites by itself, and an ornate armchair glides effortless across the stage! Encrusted with gold, the entrancing pop-up-book sets display various parts of the Beast’s mysterious castle and its magnificent ballroom – a masterpiece of petrified opulence. The beautiful commissioned score, by Canadian composer Glenn Buhr, weaves a gothic and poignant atmosphere. This is a charming drama-ballet and an engrossing theatrical experience.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 靈巧優雅的手臂、手腕的動作，融合力與美的舞步，伊娃不用華麗炫奇的花招，純以傲視同儕的個人技巧和直接靈魂深處的感性演繹取勝，深刻地呈現了佛蘭明高的美麗與哀愁，俘虜了萬千觀眾的心。伊娃．耶珀貝恩娜率領其舞蹈團首次駕臨香港，演出以其名字命名的首本名作《伊娃》。這風靡各地觀眾的舞作，透過不同的佛蘭明高舞式，傾訴伊娃作為一個佛蘭明高舞者，在追求造詣過程中尋求獨立自由的心路歷程，舞姿感性悅目。
About the Programme: With expressive arm and footwork, commanding rhythmic bravura and a touch of gypsy passion, her movements reach to the heart of flamenco. Eva Yerbabuena and her company will enrapture audiences in Hong Kong with her signature show Eva. A waking dream of a flamenco dancer, Eva is a personal and internal view of flamenco, combining theatrical presence with the musical spontaneity of traditional, improvised flamenco dance.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
製作/演出單位: 伊娃．耶珀貝恩娜佛蘭明高舞蹈團
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 《行草》(2001) 音樂：瞿小松 2001年，林懷民由書法美學汲取靈感，創作了《行草》。儘管風格各有千秋，歷代書法家都同樣以專注的精力，飛墨行「舞」，字裏行間，盡是書法家運氣的留痕。雲門舞者在林懷民引導下，面對名家手跡的巨幅幻燈投影，以身體臨慕，發展出內斂含勁，而又充滿抑揚頓挫的動作風格。《行草》在歐美各國贏得熱烈絕讚。
About the Programme: Cursive (2001) Music: Qu Xiao-song  The dancers absorb the energy, or Chi, of the writer and imitate the linear ‘route’ of ink, full of lyrical flows and strong punctuations, with rich variations in energy. This produces unimaginable movements, with subtle slow motions and dynamic martial arts-like attacks, with slides of gigantic brush characters as backdrops. This is a work of stunning beauty that has received rave reviews in Europe and the US.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
Production / Performing Unit: Cloud Gate Dance Theatre of Taiwan
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 《行草  貳》(2003) 音樂：約翰．凱治(John Cage)  有別於《行草》以充沛的力道着重於濃墨，《行草  貳》以二十世紀前衛音樂大師約翰．凱治的音樂入舞，以冥想的基調探討淡墨，引出宋瓷的寧靜之美。榮獲澳洲時代評論獎與觀眾票選最佳節目，以及台灣台新表演藝術獎。
About the Programme: Cursive II (2003) Music: John Cage  Cursive ll is drastically different from its forerunner. While Cursive emphasizes the darker blacks with vigorous attacks, Cursive II explores the lighter shades in a meditative mood, evoking the serene quality of porcelain from the Sung Dynasty. It won the Age Critics’ award and Patrons’ Award for the Best Production at the Melbourne International Festival.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 《狂草》(2005) 音樂：梁春美  沈聖德 三部曲終結篇《狂草》，編舞靈感來自中國書法美學的極致—草書。《狂草》舞台上，大幅宣紙從天而降，傾洩如瀑；墨水，沉靜緩慢地漫漶渲染，隨着演出的進行創造出即興的抽象軌跡。書不限於法，身不拘於形。雲門舞者以氣引體，流麗奔放，舞蹈終結，滿台宣紙已淋漓為一片墨色山水。《狂草》是時間與能量的絕美結晶。
About the Programme: Cursive III (2005) Music: Jim Shum and Liang Chun-mei The last chapter of this journey, which premiered in 2005, concludes with Cursive lll. Cursive lll draws choreographic ideas from Wild Calligraphy – considered the pinnacle in Chinese cursive aesthetics – which frees characters from any set form and expenses the spiritual state of the writer in its expressive abstraction. The Cloud Gate dancers’ exquisitely liquid movements echo the ink as it flows down cascading streams of rice paper onto the stage. Sublime.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
Production / Performing Unit: Cloud Gate Dance Theatre of Taiwan
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 自1980年代起，安．德麗莎．迪．姬爾斯美嘉已把自己的舞藝拍攝下來。這兩套錄像不是她製作的紀錄片，而是她舞藝的電影版。
About the Programme: Since the 1980s, Anne Teresa De Keersmaeker has been recording her choreography on film. The two videos are not documentaries of her productions, but cinematic versions of her art.
地點: 香港演藝學院三樓電視錄影廠
Venue: Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts TV Studio
主辦單位: 香港藝術節, 香港演藝學院電影電視學院
Presenter: Hong Kong Arts Festival co presented with the School of Film and Television Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts
venue.1: 香港演藝學院三樓電視錄影廠
venue_en: Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts TV Studio

節目簡介: 西班牙來的黑舞士，舞台上渾身是勁，跳出帶有西班牙佛蘭明高色彩的踢躂舞，擊出動感十足的節拍，印度手鼓 (tabla)、尼日利亞巫毒鼓 (udu) 及邦哥鼓 (bongo) 、鼓樂飛揚，運用口技唱出生活上的輕鬆節奏，一雙如Michael Jackson 的摩打腳在沙上熱烈跳舞，台上熾熱舞動之餘，台下觀眾亦隨着黑舞士的節奏拍手和應，即使完場後都打着哼哼喞唧的節奏歸家去。
About the Programme: Hardly discernable in the semi-darkness, the black-clad dancers of Camut Band slowly emerge on stage. Moments later everything suddenly explodes in the most brilliant fireworks of breath-taking, ear-splitting, life-affirming dance and percussion. Mixing a heady cocktail of tap, flamenco, African drumming and elements of Brazilian capoeira, the group stomps on different-sized drums and in scratchy sand, but also on the rule book. Backed by powerful instruments such as the Senegalese djembe and the Nigerian udu, building up complex compelling rhythms from tapping feet, clicking fingers and even raucously nonsensical conversations, they effortlessly transcend linguistic and cultural barriers in a whirlwind of dramatic energy, joyous spontaneity and sophisticated fun. Propelled by elegant panache and infctious humour, seven dance vignettes roll tirelessly together to prove that rhythm is indeed a universal language – the heritage of all mankind.
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Concert Hall
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Concert Hall

節目簡介: 編舞大師尤爾．蕭爾茨以創作氣勢磅礡的大型舞蹈作品而享譽舞壇，他以能人所不能的氣度，從容地融合舞蹈、器樂及聲樂於一台，數十舞蹈員在台上馳騁的大場面，雄偉壯觀卻不失優雅飄逸，觀眾無不屏息，其作品亦被歐洲大部份著名舞團列為駐團舞目。蕭爾茨特別為萊比錫芭蕾舞創作的《大彌撒曲》，將聖樂入舞—連巴蘭欽也不敢輕試的大膽作為—被公認為一支登峰造極的新古典芭蕾舞作品。蕭爾茨以莫扎特膾炙人口的遺作《C小調彌撒曲》為主調，配以格雷果聖咏以及湯瑪士．揚、哥爾格．庫塔克及帕特的動人樂音，還有保羅．雪朗的悲 詩篇，與行雲流水的妙曼舞姿相輔相成，成就一闕超凡入聖的舞樂極品。一個可一不可再的盛會！
About the Programme: The Great Mass is an epic ballet, a sublime production of unprecedented extravagance in dance and classical music ever to appear in Hong Kong. Mozart’s masterpiece of sacred music is played by the Chorus and Soloists of the Leipzig Opera. Uwe Scholz was one of the few choreographers who could create monumental works with large ensembles. Scholz’s ballets form part of the repertoire in most of the important European companies. Treading a path that not even George Balanchine dared, Scholz created The Great Mass for the Leipzig Ballet, an ethereal neo-classical masterwork with an intelligent dramaturgy that storms the gates of heaven. A spiritual keystone of a choreographic undertaking in which Uwe Scholz absorbs the structure of the liturgy of the Mass, and then adds to Mozart’s unfinished Mass in C minor other works by the same composer, and also passages of Gregorian chant, the Credo by Arvo Pärt and readings of poems by Paul Celan.  This is an outcry of joy as the strains of Mozart’s hymns of praise wing their way heavenwards. Rivers of elegant movement flow in every direction, punctuated by wide leaps and eloquent arm movements. Scholz’s ballet confidently celebrates the human spirit in a riot of bright-toned jubilation. A truly impressive choreographic revelation.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre
製作/演出單位: 萊比錫芭蕾舞團 暨 萊比錫布業大廳樂團、萊比錫歌劇院合唱團及獨唱家
Production / Performing Unit: Leipzig Ballet, with the Gewandhaus Orchestra and the Chorus and Soloists of the Leipzig Opera
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 蕭菲．紀蓮從不與傳統妥協，不斷地突破框框，永遠自己挑戰自己的完美。識英雄重英雄，艾甘．漢和林懷民為舞壇天后度身編排新經典，三大高手聯手，肯定成為傳誦廿一世紀的舞壇神話！
About the Programme: Sacred Monsters is also first and foremost the encounter and exchange between two shining stars of the present day dance world, Sylvie Guillem and Akram Khan. This is an exciting exploration of the boundaries between classical and contemporary dance, with additional choreography by Lin Hwai-min.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
製作/演出單位: 蕭菲．紀蓮，艾甘．漢，林懷民
Production / Performing Unit: Sylvie Guillem, Akram Khan, Lin Hwai-min
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目名稱: 《我的舞蹈生涯進化論》(香港藝術節 2007)
Programme Name: My Life as a Dancer the evolution (Hong Kong Arts Festival 2007)
舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 從第一代的長砉編舞皇牌，至當時得令的超人氣編舞，我到底是飽歷舞壇不斷蛻變的洗禮，而進化練就成了一身舞學絕活，還是仍敵不過歲月催人，為藝術犧牲過後的傷痕滿身，已暴肥變形退化成了舞蹈的活化石？抑或其實我們還是不斷 在尋找自己？所以，此時正好結聚眾人力量，為香港舞蹈歷史更現代下一章，再創舞壇奇蹟！
About the Programme: Not in the last 20 years have we seen such a labour of love evolving into this rare event. We love, we unite, we dance. My Life as a Dancer is an evolution of love. Sixteen lovers united with one big heart, dance the love matches: lonely hearts and happily ever-afters; narcissi, romantics and revolutionists; polygamous, monogamous and secret loves; and playboys/girls still searching for the next thrill. You think you’ve seen it all? Wait till you see them in the evolution! Come with your heart open. My life as a Dancer is going to be one big love fest this year!
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium
演出/製作: 陳敏兒
Cast and Production: CHAN Man-yee, Abby
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 來自阿根廷，盛名遠播歐洲的出色舞者、樂手、歌手與樂隊：羅伯托．夏里拉與塔瑪拉．比塞格亞及艾斯特班．莫利奴與歌迪亞．哥德加兩對舞蹈拍檔，是國際知名的探戈舞蹈家及導師，為觀眾示範最綺旎纏綿、意亂情迷的探戈舞步。獲獎頻頻的舞巴啦啦舞蹈團則以別具一格的原創舞劇而聞名；佻皮幽默的風格，打破拘泥規範，展現布宜諾斯艾利斯現下最流行的探戈風情。 在旖旎纏綿的舞蹈背後，聲名遠播巴黎和紐約的艾亞朗克樂團，加上手風琴大師魯爾．加雷洛出神入化的技巧和諾爾利亞．蒙卡達的性感歌聲，在華麗音色裏注滿激情和哀怨，喚醒都會男女們潛藏內心深處的渴望。今次演出與眾不同之處，是把布宜諾斯艾利斯熱辣辣的探戈舞會(Milonga) 跨越半個地球，搬上香港舞台！探戈舞會是阿根廷男男女女展現魅力的空間，它可以是酒館餐廳，也可以是河濱公園或露天球場。舞會中男女兩人即使萍水相逢，只要眼神交會就能邀舞，不須言語彼此便能意會—這又是另一段探戈的開始。
About the Programme: In a seductively sensual and invigorating programme, the performers pay their respects to traditional tango while infusing it with the pulse of modern cosmopolitan Buenos Aires. Their performances synthesize traditional, intimate tango salón – the style danced in the milongas – with a dramatic contemporary tango showcase.  The award winning dance company No Bailarás emonstrates the reason for its acclaim with stylish performances, dynamic characters and original choreography. Their innovative interpretations bring together a theatrical atmosphere filled with ironic humour that breaks  many of the clichés of stage performance tango. No Bailarás’s audacious dancing style is complemented by two internationally celebrated star couples: Roberto Herrera with Tamara Bisceglia and Esteban Moreno with Claudia Códega, who are among the best tango couples today. Herrera’s amazing technique and Bisceglia’s theatrical expressiveness give birth to a dance that explores tango’s dramatic qualities and the erotic sensuality of the embrace. Esteban Moreno and Claudia Códega are highly respected in Europe as teachers, choreographers and tango dancers. The couple have developed an elegant dance style, together with a mise en scène that echoes deep rooted ú traditions while emphasizing more contemporary dance styles.  Master musician Raúl Garello will set the tone by serenading the audience for a genuine tango experience. This distinctive composer and musician expresses the new musical sounds of his city with symphonic influences, never forgetting the essential keys of tango. Come early to enjoy a brief tango demonstration in the foyer!
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
主辦單位: 阿根廷南方文化交流局／布宜諾斯艾利斯探戈推廣中心及香港藝術節聯合監製
Presenter: A Co-production of Instituto de Intercambio Cultural Ensamble al Sur/TangoVia Buenos Aires and the Hong Kong Arts Festival
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 翩娜．包殊，作品永遠震懾人心：《月滿》鎮在台上的大石、隨風飄落的雨絲、瀉滿一台的銀光，身穿華麗晚裝的女士，水中忘形的男士，一場場歡愉暢舞，一段段黯然的關係，翩娜．包殊繼續以恢宏的舞台佈景，絕妙的音樂氛圍，展演一個個人間世的故事；兩性間的情愛慾，在翩娜手上，彷彿一杯苦酒，也彷彿一幕費里尼的《La dolce vita》。
About the Programme: Water, water everywhere… In Vollmond, an almost constant diluvian rain falls; a brook runs across the stage, out from mountainous rock. Dancers splash and swirl through torrents of water, in a visually and dramatically dazzling full moon landscape. In Vollmond her dancers play with water, chucking bucketfuls into the air, sloshing, sliding and swimming their way through the downpour in a sequence of short scenes. In one, a man balances on upturned drinking glasses; in another, a man twists and turns to avoid being rained upon by an arsenal of stones; in a third a girl flirtatiously encourages several men to unfasten her underwear.  Replete with Bausch’s inimitable choreographic trademarks – superb dance, theatrical play and moments of absolute artistry, Vollmond is more than a reinvention and re-inspiration of her earlier works. With its breathtaking stage design and eclectic range of music (from the likes of Cat Power, Tom Waits, Leftfield and the avant-garde Alexander Balanscu quartet)  Vollmond promises a night of virtuoso dance – wet, wild and impassioned.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
製作/演出單位: 翩娜．包殊與烏珀塔爾舞蹈劇場
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 自百多年前被編成第一支舞劇，《天鵝湖》可說是最受歡迎的古典芭蕾舞目；哀怨纏綿的愛情，扣人心弦的樂章，細膩動人的舞蹈。格蘭高別出心裁，加強王子角色與改寫了的結局，由舞步與劇力牽動觀眾情緒，史圖加芭蕾舞團1963年首演時即廣受讚譽；燦爛耀目的舞會一場，各舞者鮮明突出，盡顯格蘭高的功力。
About the Programme: Set to Tchaikovsky’s delightful score, Swan Lake is undoubtedly one of the world’s best loved ballets. The tragic tale of the doomed love between Prince Siegfried and his beautiful swan maiden – really Princess Odette bewitched by an evil sorcerer – is both passionate and heart-wrenching. In Cranko’s tender and luminous rendition, Prince Siegfried’s role is greatly expanded and his character imbued with a deeper emotional intent. Cranko also re-works the finale, creating, as Dance International exclaims “one of the most stunning endings anyone has produced for this ballet.”
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

節目簡介: 芭蕾舞劇《奧尼金》是格蘭創作經典中的經典，根據普希金的詩改編，以柴可夫斯基的音樂編曲，被譽為本世紀舞壇的曠世傑作。 當年玩世不恭的奧尼金拒絕純真少女泰坦妮亞的愛，多年後再遇，才知真愛誰屬，奈何心上人已作他人婦。格蘭高選取了普希金原著中一系列令人難忘的場面：花園邂逅、閨中訂情、雙雄決劍與驀然回首，手工精細的服裝與格局宏大的佈景，配以令人屏息的高難度芭蕾技巧，細緻地刻劃人物的內心世界，描繪感情的跌宕，兩場盪氣迴腸的雙人舞更列為舞壇經典。 1965年首演時，擔演泰坦妮亞的瑪茜．海蒂，光芒四射，是最令人着迷的芭蕾角色之一。
About the Programme: Based on the 19th century novel-in-verse, Eugene Onegin, by Alexander Pushkin, Onegin is an enduring tale of a broken heart, a deadly duel and passionate revenge. Rejected in her youth by the arrogant aristocrat Onegin, Tatiana buries her love and grows gracefully into womanhood. Many years later when Onegin realizes his mistake and declares his love, the circumstances have changed, and Tatiana must painfully refuse his advances. The final pas de deux, in which Tatiana sends Onegin away, is a sensational tussle between love and moral duty and one of the most heart-wrenching scenes in all ballet. Onegin is set to Tchaikovshy’s score, arranged and orchestrated by Kurt-Heinz Stolze.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

Programme Name: Hungarian Concerto: Hommage à Béla Bartók
節目簡介: 是次演出之《匈牙利舞曲》，副題為向巴托克致敬—多得巴托克窮一生編集、整理匈牙利民間歌謠，讓豐富的民族藝術得以保留，演出將以巴托克音樂為始終。《匈牙利舞曲》由音樂、舞蹈編排，至服裝頭飾，均一絲不茍，務求將連綿特蘭西瓦尼亞多瑙河，貫串幾世紀的民族歌舞再現觀眾眼前：在現場演奏的吉卜賽及匈牙利民樂相襯下，匈牙利國粹夏得西舞，以至牧人舞、擊掌舞、旋轉舞、吉卜賽舞一一演繹，勢將文化中心變成布達佩斯，讓觀眾嚐一場匈牙利道地樂舞盛宴。
About the Programme: Time-honoured Hungarian folk dance is lively, energetic fare, fuelled by the melodies and rhythms of vigorous gypsy tunes. The programme’s opening and closing dances are set to the music of Béla Bartók, an avid collector of Eastean and Middle Eastern folk tunes and one of the 20th century’s greatest composers. Strumming up the music is a band of virtuoso musicians – an ensemble of strings, wind and traditional folk instruments. Together with the dancers, they create vibrant synergy, in a repertoire drawn from many different eras and regions. To add to the visual feast, a backdrop of video images that convey the rural origins of the dance and a spectacular light display that adds to the dramatic, theatrical qualities of this performance.
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre
製作/演出單位: 匈牙利國立民族舞蹈團
相關節目: 匈牙利國立民族舞蹈團工作坊 2008/03/16
Related Programme: Hungarian State Folk Ensemble Dance Workshop2008/03/16
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre

舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 中國舞, 當代/現代舞
節目簡介: 被譽為最能以舞蹈表現人類生命的原始性，加拿大編舞家瑪麗．舒娜，帶領其舞團傾巢而出，演繹新作《快樂頌L.I.V.E.》，瑪麗．舒娜的《快樂頌L.I.V.E.》，用自由奔放、豐富、瘋狂、震撼的想像，以軀體爆發快樂之源，將最終極的歡愉世界帶給觀眾，萬眾期待！
About the Programme: As the provisional title suggests, Ode to Joy L.I.V.E. moves with wild, unbridled joy. Inspired by Beethoven’s Ode to Joy in Symphony No.9, the choreography is set to an original score by Louis Dufort, Chouinard’s collaborator of many years. Performed by her home troupe, Compagnie Marie Chouinard, the work pulses with verve and vitality, so don’t miss this exciting Asian premiere and witness the body in motion, in joy.
Venue: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre
venue_en: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Lyric Theatre

About the Programme: TangoTang’s Milonguita is held at Fringe Club, Hong Kong. From time to time we have themes and events include film, music appreciation, Tango trial class and talk on various Argentine Tango culture topics to introduce Tango for guests. The night is not completed without the dance party each time.

venue_en: Fringe Club

節目名稱: 《06年4月Kara Wenham and Matias Facio  工作坊》
Programme Name: Apr 2006  - Workshop by Kara Wenham and Matias Facio
節目簡介: 阿根廷探戈工作坊，由阿根廷探戈大師教授，包括各樣不同水平課程給喜愛探戈的人士，探戈大師也會在舞會上表演
About the Programme: Workshops include different classes for various level dancers for a period from 1 week to 2 months. we invite world renowned tango masters as our instructors from Argentina, and  there are Milongas (Tango Party) held at private club ballrooms at the end of each workshop. Tango masters will also join our Tuesday Guided Practica to teach and dance with members.

節目名稱: 《07年3月 攝影展覽@香港文化中心》
Programme Name: Mar 2007  - Photo Exhibition at HK Cultural Centre Foyer
節目簡介: 為促進及推廣阿根廷探戈在香港的發展，探戈堂經常舉行探戈舞會、攝影展覽、講座、電影欣賞及阿根廷探戈舞蹈初班
About the Programme: “Milonga” is Tango dance party in Spanish. In each of our workshop, we will have at least 1 Milonga held, with performance by our guest tango master also. We also hold Milongas for special events. We also have “Tango Preface” workshop for beginners which is held once every few months. To promote Tango, we also hold photo exhibition and theme talks events.
Venue: Guided Practica at Helena May, 35 Garden Road, Central; Fringe Club, 2 Lower Albert Road, Central; Various venues

節目名稱: 新加坡華藝節 2011：《那一年．這一天》
Programme Name: Chinese Festival of Arts 2011, Singapore - As If To Nothing
地點: 濱海藝術中心劇院 (新加坡)
Venue: Theatre, Esplanade (Singapore)
venue_en: Theatre, Esplanade

節目簡介: 你在堂座看電影，看電影的人在樓座看你。編舞界冷面笑匠龐智筠首次獨擔大旗，在舞台上把玩港產剪接遊戲，不靠鏡頭不賣肉不煽情，舞台變身電影院，銀幕下的眾生相足本登場。CCDC舞者化身成戲迷──尋找男主角的爆谷女、陶醉於浪漫情節的情侶，齊齊投入銀幕中的經典場面，但只聞其聲，不見其畫；舞台上堂座樓座全院爆滿，留住昔日你我在早場正場午夜場的歡樂時光。
About the Programme: In her first full-length work, new wave choreographer Noel Pong turns to the movie theatre for inspiration. With the stage space transformed into a cinema setting, Off Screen makes observations of the film audience, playing out off-the-screen dramas that are at times funny and at times melancholy.
Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 在冷靜與熱情之間，編舞黎海寧駕御舞蹈、溜冰、劇場、音樂和文學元素，聯同三屆奧運溜冰選手劉中達的真雪冰上演出及格林美獎提名大提琴家章雨亭現場演繹巴赫無伴奏大提琴組曲，以懾人的意象與隱喻，在脆弱的薄冰上繪出一幅詭譎的心靈地圖。
About the Programme: Between the poles of hot and cold, choreographer Helen Lai makes masterly use of dance, ice skating, theatre, music and literary elements. Together with skating on ice by three-time Olympic skater David Liu as well as live performance of Bach’s Unaccompanied Cello Suites by Grammy Award nominated cellist Bion Tsang, Lai draws a complex map of the soul on thin ice with stunning images and metaphors in Plaza X.
Venue: Auditorium, Kwai Tsing Theatre
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium
