Programme Name: “Hong Kong．Live in London!”- Excerpts of Silver Rain
Venue: South Molton Street, Mayfair, London (UK)
venue_en: South Molton Street, Mayfair, London

節目簡介: 四位來自不同城市，風格迥異的編舞／舞者，以四個短篇作品，包括陳宜今《風吹草動》、羅凡《另一邊》、林波《反射》及楊浩《沒有精神之精神》，訴說心中最痛、最恨、最想。
About the Programme: Four talented CCDC dancers from different corners of the world – all men with a secret to tell – are vying for your attention through their new choreography. Aftermath by Chan Yi Jing, The Other Side by Luo Fan, Reflections by Lam Po and Auotorun by Yang Hao.
Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
Choreographers: Chan Yi-ji, Luo Fan, Lam Po, Yang Hao
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: CCDC藝術總監曹誠淵繼《霸王》、《蘭陵王》及《非常道》後又一獨具匠心之作，昔日為楚懷王投汩羅江殉難的屈原，如今重新聚焦在璀璨奪目的舞台，在二十一世紀的觀眾見證下被封為「神」。CCDC舞者及強勁製作班底抽象的動態語言及全新創作的音樂塑造亡靈在我們心中的意象，並以《離騷》、《天問》及《九歌》等傳世經典，在「舉世皆濁我獨清，衆人皆醉我獨醒」的世代，奏出文人逸士不被權勢操縱而含鬱而終的悲歌。
About the Programme: Qu Yuan, the patriotic poet and minister in the state of Chu during the Warring States Period who drowned himself in the Miluo River to show his loyalty to his king, is reincarnated on the brightly lit stage, and made a “god” with a 21st century audience bearing witness. Featuring CCDC dancers and a strong production team, the work will conjure up historical figures through abstract movements and original music. Drawing on passages from classic poems such as Li Sao (The Lament), Asking Heaven and Nine Songs, the piece is an elegy on intellectuals dying bitter and misunderstood in corrupt times undermonarchic rule.
Venue: Auditorium, Kwai Tsing Theatre
Choreographers: Willy Tsao, Dominic Wong, Bruce Wong
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 中國現代舞的總舵手曹誠淵率領中國三大現代舞團，聯袂為觀眾呈獻三部優秀作品：CCDC客席編舞家梅卓燕取材曲詞委婉、情意綿密的地水南音《客途秋恨》，展示現代香港的粵式魅力。廣東現代舞團駐團編舞家劉琦的《回聲》以北島的詩歌為靈感，以舞蹈營造詩人眼中冷靜而充滿深刻思辨的世界。北京雷動天下現代舞團執行藝術總監李捍忠和編舞家馬波合作編排《初祭》，透過譚盾的音樂和充滿當代人文符碼的意象，探索遠古神韻。
About the Programme: Building on the success of their acclaimed programmes A Trilogy of Modern Dance at the Kennedy Center in 2005 and Awakening in Hong Kong in 2007, the acclaimed modern dance companies led by Willy Tsao – CCDC, Guangdong Modern Dance Company and BeijingDance/LDTX, join forces once again to showcase their latest works. Mui Cheuk-yin, Associate Choreographer of CCDC, refashions the Chinese nanyin classic, Ke Tu Qiu Hen, in her piece The Tale of Miles, while showcasing contemporary Cantonese elegance. Inspired by the poetry of Bei Dao, the Resident Choreographer of Guangdong Modern Dance Company, Liu Qi creates a calm, profound and sophisticated statement through her well-known fluidity and sensitivity of movement in Voice After. And, with music composed by Tan Dun, and choreography by both Li Hanzhong, Deputy Director of LDTX and Ma Bo, choreographer of BeijingDance/LDTX, First Ritual invites audiences to spread their imaginary wings as it explores an ancient sense of beauty revealed through ritual.
Venue: Auditorium, Kwai Tsing Theatre
編舞: 梅卓燕、劉琦、李捍忠、馬波
Choreographers: Mui Cheuk-yin, Liu Qi, Li Hanzhong, Ma Bo
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 靈感來自文學大師卡夫卡經典作品《變形記》，編舞黎海寧結合荒誕、奇情與黑色幽默，勾勒出一幕幕如霧似幻的「真實」場景。故事主角「K」一覺醒來，發現自己經歷翻天覆地的變化──變成了一隻大蟲，使他分不清自己身處夢境還是現實，一眾角色身分錯配，引發連串怪事，令人驚訝不已。
About the Programme: Inspired by Franz Kafka's masterpiece Metamorphosis, five-time Hong Kong Dance Award Winner Helen Lai depicts with absurdity, surrealism, and dark humour scenarios which lie between the real and the imaginary. When the main character named "K" awakens one morning, his astonishing transformation into an enormous bug and his discovery that other characters have mysteriously exchanged their roles with one another leaves him unable to differentiate whether he is existing within a dream or in a fully conscious reality.
Venue: Auditorium, Kwai Tsing Theatre
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

Programme Name: World Cultures Festival 2011 -- Enchanting Arts of Asia：Two Swallows - Ode To Wu Guanzhong
節目簡介: 透過舞蹈詩的創作，走到白牆灰瓦的江南水鄉，感受雙燕翩翩的情懷，雜花生樹、群鶯亂飛的春景，以及農夫與漁民的樸實，展現畫壇大師一生追尋藝術的自由與個人堅持的孤寂。
About the Programme: Traced the master artist's creative journey through the poetry of dance in Two Swallows. Roaming the idyllic countryside along the Yangtze River, the epic dance poem depicts the painter's lifelong pursuit of freedom and explores the solitude of artistic conception.
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre

節目簡介: 《糊塗爆竹賀新年》由本地編舞家伍宇烈及香港芭蕾舞團的舞蹈員江上悠聯手創作，以充滿傳統節日氣息的著名芭蕾舞劇《胡桃夾子》為藍本，帶領觀眾穿越時空，由1967年起一直向前走，觀眾好像看到舊影畫戲的預告片一樣。舞劇原用柴可夫斯基在《胡桃夾子》中的音樂，而每一幕的編舞都對應著《胡桃夾子》作360度大翻新。《糊塗爆竹賀新年》是中西合璧、新舊共融的創作，是對過去的懷緬，亦是對現在及未來的反思，一個穿越時空的旅程，引起觀眾深刻的共嗚。
About the Programme: Firecracker is a commissioned work by Yuri Ng, which took its inspiration from the traditional holiday fantasy The Nutcracker and transformed it into a ballet all about Hong Kong. Set in 1967 Hong Kong, Firecracker’s central character is an elderly props-man in a neglected film studio. As he reminisces about the past, his memories and experiences come alive to form a ballet mosaic, accompanied by the familiar The Nutcracker score by Tchaikovsky. As faded recollections are brought to life by images from old newsreels, the fast-paced ballet speeds through time, hurtling past events and fragments of collective memories.
Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目名稱: 《破格芭蕾：史特拉汶斯基之音樂革命》
節目簡介: 史特拉汶斯基被譽為20世紀最具影響力的音樂革命家，他的音樂風格前衛且多樣化，在節奏運用上推陳出新，對後世影響深遠。 《破格芭蕾：史特拉汶斯基之音樂革命》結集三部風格迥異的當代芭蕾作品，它們分別以史特拉汶斯基之音樂入舞，包括喬治▪巴蘭欽所編，充滿美國20年代風情的作品《紅寶石》、澳洲女編舞家娜泰莉▪維亞的《春之祭》，及克里斯特展現戰爭中之人性面貌的《三樂章交響曲》，讓觀眾以視覺來體驗史特拉汶斯基的三部經典樂曲。是次演出更邀請澳洲芭蕾舞團首席舞蹈員妮娜▪鍾斯作客演出。
About the Programme: Acknowledged as one of the most groundbreaking modern composers of the 20th century, the work of Igor Stravinsky is known for his broad stylistic range. His innovative use of rhythmic structure in music transformed subsequent generations, establishing him as a musical revolutionary force.  Jazz, Rituals & War: Stravinsky’s Revolution  brought together three ballet pieces connected by music scores by Stravinsky - dance master George Balanchine's colourful, American Jazz age inspired Rubies; Natalie Weir's The Rite of Spring, with its distinctive Aboriginal cultural influence; and Symphony in Three Movements, Nils Christe's work on the dark emotions connected with war. This programme featured Guest Artist Lana Jones, Principal Artist from The Australian Ballet.
Venue: Auditorium, Sha Tin Town Hall
編舞: 克里斯特、喬治巴蘭欽、娜泰莉▪維亞
Choreographers: Nils Christe, George Balanchine, Natalie Weir
相關節目: 《破格芭蕾：史特拉汶斯基之音樂革命》－ 幕後綵排優先睇
Related Programme: Jazz, Rituals & War: Stravinsky's Revolution- Behind-the-Scenes Studio Visit
venue_en: Auditorium, Sha Tin Town Hall

Programme Name: Choreographic Showcase 2011: Inspired by the Five Elements
節目簡介: 《芭蕾五行》由7個舞段組合而成，概念源自五行 ─ 金、木、水、火、土，五種構成大自然的元素。舞團5位年青舞蹈員：李怡燃、江上悠、日高賢二、胡頌威及尊尼芬‧斯納，他們各自對五行有著獨特見解，把其所表達的哲理運用芭蕾舞演繹出來，創作出自己的作品。除了舞團的5位舞蹈員外，香港著名編舞家伍宇烈，以及中央芭蕾舞團的年青舞蹈員王思正亦作客參與，編創全新作品。
About the Programme: Composed of seven dance works, The Hong Kong Ballet's Choreographic Showcase 2011 took the elements of Metal, Wood, Water, Fire and Earth as inspiration, highlighting their power to create, destroy, control and dissolve. The programme presented five young dancers from The Hong Kong Ballet – Li Yi-ran, Yuh Egami, Kenji Hidaka, Ricky Hu and Jonathan Spigner – who stepped into the role of choreographers to create dance pieces. Two guest choreographers, Hong Kong’s Yuri Ng and Wang Sizheng, one of the young talents from the National Ballet of China, also presented new works to the audience.
Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
編舞: 胡頌威、日高賢二、伍宇烈、尊尼芬•斯納、李怡燃、江上悠、王思正
Choreographers: Ricky Hu, Kenji Hidak, Yuri Ng, Jonathan Spigner, Li Yi-ran, Yuh Egami, Wang Si Zheng
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 2011年，舞團再次呈獻《Galaxy國際芭蕾匯演》，港芭舞蹈員與一眾國際星級舞者，分別演繹多段古典及現代芭蕾精選作品，當中更有全新委約之作，是難得的芭蕾盛會。
About the Programme: The Hong Kong Ballet presented a diverse programme of ballet performed by stars from all over the world. A host of international talents, along with the dancers of The Hong Kong Ballet, delighted audiences with a dazzling array of dance. Galaxy combined excerpts from graceful classical ballets with brand new works from today’s most sought-after contemporary choreographers.
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
Related Programme: A Preview of Galaxy: International Ballet Gala 2011
venue_en: Grand Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目名稱: 第5屆哥倫比亞國際舞蹈節
Programme Name: 5th International Dance Festival in Cali, Colombia
節目簡介: 香港芭蕾舞團於2010年6月亮相第4屆國際芭蕾節表現大受歡迎，2011年再獲主辦單位邀請，參與在哥倫比亞卡利市舉行的第5屆國際芭蕾節。港芭於開幕當晚演出，吸引17,000位觀眾冒雨前往Plaza de Toros Cañaveralejo鬥牛場欣賞，給予港芭熱烈的支持。聖地牙哥芭蕾舞團及荷蘭舞蹈劇場等多個世界知名舞團亦有參與此芭蕾節盛事。
About the Programme: The Hong Kong Ballet’s appearance at the 4th International Ballet Festival in June 2010 was so well-received that the Company was invited back to Colombia by the Instituto Colombiano de Ballet Clasico to perform at the 5th International Ballet Festival in June 2011 in Cali. The Hong Kong Ballet took to the stage on the opening night at the bull-fighting ring, the Plaza de Toros Cañaveralejo, where an audience of 17,000 people defied the rain and gave the Company a warm and enthusiastic welcome. Renowned ballet companies from all over the world took part in this festival including Ballet Santiago de Chile, Nederlands Dans Theater and many more.
地點: 卡利市鬥牛場及市立劇院 (哥倫比亞)
Venue: Plaza de Toros Cañaveralejo Bullfighting Ring andTeatro Municipal Theater (Columbia)
Presenter: Instituto Colombiano de Ballet Clasico (哥倫比亞 Columbia)
編舞: 費波、克里茲托夫．帕斯特、伍宇烈、彼得．奎安斯
Choreographers: Fei Bo, Krzysztof Pastor, Yuri Ng, Peter Quanz
venue.1: 卡利市鬥牛場及市立劇院
venue_en: Plaza de Toros Cañaveralejo Bullfighting Ring andTeatro Municipal Theater

節目簡介: 《天鵝湖》自1895年於聖彼得堡演出後，一直被公認為古典芭蕾中最家傳戶曉的劇目。它以優美的編舞娓娓道出悲傷而動人的愛情故事，加上富麗堂皇的佈景和華麗奪目的舞衣，配合柴可夫斯基動人心弦的樂章，令此劇成為芭蕾史上的不朽經典。 《天鵝湖》反應熱烈，門票火速售罄。香港芭蕾舞團於創團以來首次加開少量企位，故入座率最後達103%。
About the Programme: Blending a thrilling story, dazzling costumes and technically demanding choreography with Tchaikovsky’s beautiful score, Swan Lake has been one of the world’s most popular ballets since its 1895 première. No other ballet in the classical repertoire can rival Swan Lake for drama, romance and intrigue.  Swan Lake was extremely popular; tickets sold out so fast that for the first time in its history The Hong Kong Ballet released Standing Area tickets. As a result, audience attendance was 103%.
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
編舞: 佩蒂巴、艾化李夫、米瀚文、白家樂、周錦欣
Choreographers: Marius Petipa, Lev Ivanov, John Meehan, Carlo Pacis, Selina Chau
venue_en: Grand Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 由編舞家聖．里昂所編創、1870年於巴黎歌劇院首演的《夢偶情緣》一直廣受歡迎。其引人入勝的故事及極具表現力的風格令此劇成為古典芭蕾舞欣賞入門的不二之選。羅奈．海德幽默活潑的編舞，讓舞者展示出傳神的演技；加上德利伯融合古典與民族音樂特色的編曲及著名意大利設計師諾貝蒂．帕哥諾瑰麗堂皇的佈景及服裝設計，帶給觀眾難忘的體驗。 《夢偶情緣》是一齣充滿錯配但又窩心動人的諧趣喜劇。簡潔明快的故事橋段加上節奏爽朗的舞蹈風格，為一家大細的開懷之選。
About the Programme: Originally created in 1870 for the Paris Opera by Arthur Saint-Léon, Coppélia has long been popular with all the family, and the charming story and expressive style make it the ideal "introduction" to classical ballet. Ronald Hynd’s delightful choreography shows the dancers’ comic and character acting skills, while Léo Delibes’ original blend of classical and folk music styles and famous Italian designer Roberta Guidi di Bagno’s gorgeous set and costumes bring out the charm of this endearing tale.  Coppélia is an endearing comedy of errors, full of warmth, charm and laughter. The ballet’s winning combination of expressive dancing, witty comical acting, colourful costumes and bright cheerful music entertain all the family.
Venue: Auditorium, Sha Tin Town Hall
venue_en: Auditorium, Sha Tin Town Hall

節目簡介: 《此時．彼刻》結集三部前衛刺激、特意為舞團舞蹈員度身訂做的當代芭蕾作品。在國際舞壇嶄露頭角的編舞新貴彼得．奎安斯、陳建生，及費波，以不同的主題，分別與我們的舞蹈員共同創作出新穎獨特的作品。當中有的充滿澎湃張力、引人深思，有的充滿官能刺激、前衛型格，也有浪漫感性、緊貼生活的作品。在展現舞團整體實力的同時，又盡顯每位舞蹈員的個性和特質，為觀眾帶來嶄新的體驗。
About the Programme: The Hong Kong Ballet presented an evening of 3 original ballets created for the Company – Black on Black by Kinsun Chan, A Room of Her Own by Fei Bo and Luminous by Peter Quanz. Collaborating with these choreographers resulted in three ballets that showcase the Company as a whole, as well as celebrating the unique physique, talent and personality of each dancer. With this trio of powerful, stimulating and thought-provoking works, The Hong Kong Ballet proudly supported the choreographers of the future.
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
編舞: 陳建生、彼得．奎安斯、費波
Choreographers: Kinsun Chan, Peter Quanz, Fei Bo
Related Programme: A Preview of Moments in Time
venue_en: Grand Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 自1997年開始，港芭每年12月均會演出這版本的《胡桃夾子》，令此劇成為不可或缺的聖誕傳統。是次演出為舞團慶祝由前藝術總監謝傑斐所編舞的《胡桃夾子》15週年，配合香港小交響樂團現場伴奏，本年度入座率為98%。
About the Programme: Every year The Hong Kong ballet presents The Nutcracker as a celebration of Christmas. The production was all the more special this year, since 2011 marked the 15th anniversary of the Company’s version of The Nutcracker, created by former Artistic Director Stephen Jefferies. With live accompaniment by Hong Kong Sinfonietta this production was extremely popular, with an attendance rate of 98%.
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
Choreographers: Stephen Jefferies, Rashna Homji, Sheng Pei-Qi
venue_en: Grand Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目名稱: 古典芭蕾冇有怕：《天鵝湖》篇
Programme Name: Ballet Classics for Children: Swan Lake
Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 香港芭蕾舞團應澳門文化中心的邀請，於2012年1月20-21日農曆年前演出伍宇烈作品《糊塗爆竹賀新年》。港芭於1 月20日舉行演前講座，由伍宇烈及服裝設計賴妙芝主講，為觀眾介紹此劇目，又於1月21日招待當地舞蹈學校的學生參觀舞蹈員的排練實況。
About the Programme: The Company was invited by Macao Cultural Centre to present Yuri Ng’s Firecracker just before Chinese New Year, on 20-21 January 2012 with 2 performances. The Company organised a pre-performance talk hosted by Yuri Ng and Costume Designer Yoki Lai on 20 January, as well as an “Open Class Visit” on 21 January for students from local dance schools.
地點: 澳門文化中心小劇院 (澳門)
Venue: Small Auditorium, Macao Cultural Centre  (Macao)
venue_en: Small Auditorium, Macao Cultural Centre

節目簡介: 澳洲編舞家娜泰莉．維亞把這齣充滿力量、慾望及仇恨的歌劇改編成為震撼視覺神經的芭蕾舞劇。一幕幕觸動人心的舞蹈，伴以普契尼原著的音樂，讓觀眾完全沉醉於《杜蘭朵》之中。
About the Programme: Australian choreographer Natalie Weir adapted this opera of power, lust and revenge into a visually stunning ballet. Accompanied by Puccini’s original music, the dazzling spectacle of Turandot has the power to intrigue and beguile audiences.
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: Grand Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 《吉賽爾》被公認為19世紀浪漫時期的「芭蕾之冠」。農村少女吉賽爾邂逅一生所愛阿爾伯特，豈料他早有所屬，被騙的她大受打擊，心碎而死。森林裡的一眾女幽靈為了對負心的男人報復，施咒迫他們跳舞至筋疲力竭而死，阿爾伯特亦難逃一劫。吉賽爾卻捨身守護，以寬恕體現真愛。正當阿爾伯特垂死之際，黎明到來，眾幽靈與吉賽爾在晨光下逐漸幻滅，留下孤獨哀傷的阿爾伯特。 演出已逾１６０年，吉賽爾一角至今仍然是芭蕾舞蹈員最嚮往演出的角色之一。
About the Programme: Giselle has deservedly become the jewel in the crown of Romantic Ballet. The sunny realism of the ballet’s beginning is soon shattered, as Giselle loses her mind and succumbs to a tragic death after learning that her beloved Albrecht has deceived her. In the shadowy afterlife, the Wilis, vengeful spirits of brides who died before their wedding day, condemn Albrecht to dance until he dies. But the strength of Giselle’s enduring love triumphs, and protects him until daybreak when the spell is broken. Giselle and the Wilis fade away, leaving Albrecht alone and full of sorrow. Although Giselle has been staged for more than 160 years, the title role is still one of the most sought after in the ballet world - it demands impeccable technical skill, great dramatic flair, and outstanding grace and lyricism.
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
Choreographers: Jean Coralli, Jules Perrot, Marius Petipa
venue_en: Grand Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 香港芭蕾舞團的《仙履奇緣》由著名編舞家大衛．艾倫編舞，配合浦羅哥菲夫劇力十足的動人旋律，和彼德．卡索列極盡華麗的佈景及服裝設計。這個膾炙人口的故事包羅了灰姑娘與王子的浪漫邂逅、玻璃鞋的夢幻想像、黑心姐姐令人捧腹的滑稽行徑、還有衣香鬢影的皇家舞會。仙女魔術棒一揮，南瓜變成閃爍生輝的漂亮馬車，老鼠變成駿馬。灰姑娘的華麗化身固然令人賞心悅目，兩個凶惡醜陋的姐姐也讓一家大小開懷大笑。
About the Programme: Choreographed by David Allan to a dramatic and melodious score by Sergei Prokofiev, with magnificent sets and costumes designed by Peter Cazalet, Cinderella is a fairytale ballet for the whole family. This much-loved story captures the romance of Cinderella and the Prince, the magic of the glass slipper, the hilarious antics of the Ugly Sisters and the glittering elegance of the Royal Ball. With a swish of her magic wand, the Fairy Godmother turns a pumpkin into a sparkling coach, and mice into horses. As well as the magic of Cinderella’s transformation, the ugly stepsisters’ hilarious slapstick antics provide more than enough wit and humour to get the whole family giggling.
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: Grand Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

Programme Name: Emerging Choreographers - 2012 : the beginning or the end?
Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
編舞: 江上悠、胡頌威、李嘉博、李怡燃、劉苗苗、尊尼芬‧斯納、劉迎宏、謝茵
Choreographers: Yuh Egami, Ricky Hu, Li Jia-bo, Li Yi-ran, Liu Miao-miao, Jonathan Spigner, Liu Yinghong, Xie Yin
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 《芭蕾之味》匯集六部不同情感和風格的短篇芭蕾作品，由世界各地不同編舞家編創，包括現代芭蕾之父喬治．巴蘭欽、炙手可熱的西班牙編舞家納曹．杜亞陶、著名德國編舞家施普克、著名美國編舞家卡尼柏諾烈、美籍華裔創作人梁殷實及中央芭蕾舞團主要演員李俊。國際知名芭蕾舞者譚元元和來自美國三藩市芭蕾舞團的意大利藉首席舞蹈員維托．馬澤奧更專程來港參與演出，聯同芭蕾舞星金瑶、吳菲菲、吳焱、張堯及港芭來自全球各地的舞蹈員同台演出，是一次讓人難忘的芭蕾盛宴。
About the Programme: The Hong Kong Ballet presented A Ballet Soirée, a salon of international ballet, featuring six short pieces varying in style, origin and mood. Choreographers from around the world were represented, including the father of modern ballet George Balanchine, one of today’s foremost choreographers Spanish-born Nacho Duato, acclaimed German choreographer Christian Spuck, famous American choreographer Val Caniparoli, Taiwanese-American creator Edwaard Liang and emerging Chinese talent, Li Jun. Prima ballerina Tan Yuan Yuan and her partner Vito Mazzeo from San Francisco Ballet joined stars Jin Yao, Wu Fei-fei, Wu Yan, Zhang Yao and the rest of The Hong Kong Ballet’s cosmopolitan dancers to create a truly international experience.
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
編舞: 納曹．杜亞陶、卡尼柏諾烈、李俊、梁殷實、施普克、喬治．巴蘭欽
Choreographers: Nacho Duato, Val Caniparoli, Li Jun, Edwaard Liang, Christian Spuck, George Balanchine
Related Programme: A Preview of A Ballet Soirée
venue_en: Grand Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 香港芭蕾舞團於2012年為大家帶來全新製作的《胡桃夾子》，由澳籍德裔編舞家泰蘭斯‧科勒重新編舞，盡展港芭每位舞蹈員的專長和特色，配合澳籍作家克萊爾‧索倫充滿創意的劇本，為故事注入新氣息。西班牙藉設計師祖迪‧洛全新設計的華麗舞台和舞衣、大衞‧保弗羅魔法般的燈光設計，加上指揮顏菁率領香港小交響樂團現場演奏柴可夫斯基的經典樂章，新版《胡桃夾子》讓觀眾親歷繽紛夢幻的奇妙聖誕！
About the Programme: The Nutcracker, a festive favourite for time immemorial, has been re-imagined for the 21st century by celebrated Australian choreographer Terence Kohler in collaboration with Australian dramaturge Clair Sauran, Spanish set & costume designer Jordi Roig and Spanish lighting designer David Bofarull. The brand-new production, with an entirely fresh look and feel, was accompanied by Tchaikovsky’s magical score, performed live by the Hong Kong Sinfonietta under the baton of Judith Yan.
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
相關節目: 新版《胡桃夾子》幕後優先睇
Related Programme: Behind The Scenes: The Nutcracker- A BRAND-NEW VERSION!
venue_en: Grand Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目名稱: 《破格芭蕾：史特拉汶斯基之音樂革命》-幕後綵排優先睇
Programme Name: Jazz, Rituals & War: Stravinsky's Revolution- Behind-the-Scenes Studio Visit
節目簡介: 觀眾率先目睹了舞團進行綵排的實況，及近距離欣賞舞蹈員的風采。
About the Programme: The audience watched a rehearsal of this production during this special Studio Visit.
Venue: Rehearsal Room, Kwai Tsing Theatre
相關節目: 《破格芭蕾：史特拉汶斯基之音樂革命》
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Rehearsal Room

Programme Name: A Preview of Galaxy: International Ballet Gala 2011
節目簡介: 藝術總監區美蓮介紹了這次芭蕾盛會。
About the Programme: Artistic Director Madeleine Onne gave an introduction to the gala.
Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 於1870年首演的《夢偶情緣》無疑是世上最受歡迎的喜劇芭蕾經典作之一。透過這次機會，觀眾得知《夢偶情緣》的創作背景，從而了解此劇如何成為受人喜愛的舞劇。藝術總監區美蓮與大家分享《夢偶情緣》台前幕後的製作點滴，觀眾更優先欣賞了精彩選段及與港芭舞蹈員對話。
About the Programme: The audience learned more about how Coppélia was created back in 1870, as well as how the ballet evolved into a perennial crowd pleaser.  Artistic Director Madeleine Onne let the audience in on some backstage information about The Hong Kong Ballet’s creative process for the show, and there was also a dance preview and an opportunity to chat with the dancers.
Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

Programme Name: A Preview of Moments in Time
節目簡介: 藝術總監區美蓮為觀眾介紹了«此時▪彼刻»。編舞陳建生及費波親述其創作經過及分享幕後點滴。觀眾更優先親睹香港芭蕾舞團舞蹈員演出精彩選段。
About the Programme: Artistic Director Madeleine Onne gave an introduction to the whole programme. Two of the choreographers, Kinsun Chan and Fei Bo, talked about their creative process, and shared their thoughts with the audience. There was also an exclusive opportunity to see a preview by dancers of The Hong Kong Ballet.
Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 藝術總監區美蓮為觀眾介紹了這齣特別為香港芭蕾舞團而編創，充滿澎湃情感而具東方色彩的芭蕾舞劇。澳洲編舞家娜泰莉．維亞與觀眾分享了其創作靈感及幕後點滴。觀眾更優先欣賞由港芭舞蹈員演出的精彩選段。
About the Programme: Audiences found out more about the powerful emotions and motivations behind this visually-striking ballet. Artistic Director Madeleine Onne guided them through an introduction to this oriental fairytale, created especially for the Company. Australian choreographer Natalie Weir talked about her creative process, and about what inspired her to create this ballet. There was also a preview performed by the Company’s dancers.
Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 《吉賽爾》代表著歐洲19世紀初浪漫時期的最高峰。 香港芭蕾舞團藝術總監區美蓮為觀眾介紹了此舞劇的精髓、音樂及獨特之處。觀眾不但可率先欣賞了舞團演出精彩選段，更有機會與舞者對話。
About the Programme: Giselle represents the height of the Romantic movement that swept Europe in the early 19th century. The Hong Kong Ballet's Artistic Director Madeleine Onne explored the ballet’s character, music and unique qualities. The Hong Kong Ballet’s dancers performed a preview of the ballet before meeting the audience in the sharing session.
Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 藝術總監區美蓮為大家介紹此舞劇，並分享古典芭蕾默劇的技巧及展示劇中的服飾。觀眾更優先欣賞了由港芭舞蹈員演出的精彩選段。
About the Programme: Artistic Director Madeleine Onne  introduced the ballet, explored the classic ballet technique of mime, and also gave a short presentation of the costumes. The talk was accompanied by a short excerpt of the ballet, performed by the Company’s dancers.
Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目名稱: 新版《胡桃夾子》幕後優先睇
Programme Name: Behind The Scenes: The Nutcracker- A BRAND-NEW VERSION!
節目簡介: 觀眾率先欣賞了由港芭舞蹈員示範全新版本《胡桃夾子》的精彩選段！藝術總監區美蓮及編舞泰蘭斯▪科勒更為大家介紹了此舞劇的精髓，並分享了創作過程及幕後花絮。
About the Programme: Audiences found out more about this brand-new production of The Nutcracker! Artistic Director Madeleine Onne and choreographer Terence Kohler shared with the audience the ideas and inspirations behind this ballet. There was also a preview performed by the Company’s dancers.
地點: 香港文化中心大劇院後台八樓GR3

節目簡介: 《真演出》系列是一個新晉編舞的創作平台，自2006年推出以來，已為協助超過二十多位舞壇新秀製作演出，創作其第一個長篇作品，為他們日後的發展鋪路。部份曾參與本系列的年青編舞已成功獲康樂及文化事務署及香港演藝發展局的資助繼續創作。2010年7月起香港舞蹈聯盟成為合作夥伴，為創作人提供更多藝術方面的支援。
About the Programme: REAL SHOWCASE Series at Jockey Club Dance Theatre is a platform for an emerging generation of dance artists.  Since its inception in 2006, the showcase has supported more than 20 full-length productions, paying the way for the artistic development of many young dancers and choreographers.  Some of the young artists who participated in the series have since been sponsored by the LCSD and HKADC for further projects.  In July 2010, Hong Kong Dance Alliance becomes our partners and provides additional artistic supports to the young choreographers.

Programme Name: International Arts Carnival 2011 – School and Outreach Touring Programme:
節目簡介: 齊格弗理德王子在Facebook上找找有沒有可做王妃的對象。「白天鵝」個人檔案是「純潔天真」，「黑天鵝」則「詭計多端但忠心」。到底誰是王子在尋找的真正奧傑塔公主？同學們可以協助齊格弗理德王子看通表面，了解「白天鵝」與「黑天鵝」的真性情嗎？白是否一定純潔，黑又是否永遠邪惡？  大眾媒體不斷以影像轟炸我們的視覺。我們如何學會思考這些影像表面和本質的差距？我們是否像齊格弗理德王子一樣，被表象規範了我們對黑與白，好與壞，美與醜的分辨？我們如何學會超越「看到」的，以智慧尋找「真實」？
About the Programme: Prince Siegfried is hunting for his potential wife on Facebook. The profile of "White Swan" says "Pure-hearted and naive" and that of "Black Swan" says "Wicked but loyal." Who is the real Princess Odette that the Prince is looking for? Can you help Prince Siegfried to unearth the essence beyond the superficiality? Is white always "pure" and black always "wicked"?  Everyday, we see such a large number of visual images sent through mass media. Have these images influenced our perception of the quality beyond those images? Just like Prince Siegfried, have images framed our definition of good and bad, virtue and vice, pretty and ugly? How can we learn to "see" through the images before "believing" in them?

節目簡介: 為了推行舞蹈美育，達到習舞4E（表達，教育，鼓勵及享受）的目標，由2006年開始，每年舉辦「袋鼠盃舞蹈比賽」，以提昇學員的表演能力和水平。比賽以澳洲聯邦舞蹈教師協會(CSTD)的芭蕾舞、爵士舞及踢踏舞等課程為藍本，參加者可以單、雙、三人的舞蹈形式參賽；以芭蕾、爵士、踢踏及民族舞為舞蹈分組；以幼童組、兒童組、少年組及公開組為比賽年齡分界。
About the Programme: To promote the theme of 4E (Expression, Education, Encouragement and Enjoyment) in local dance education, the HKDF proudly presents the Kangaroo Cup Dance Competition from 2006.  This annual dance competition has been one of the most all-rounded and comprehensive event enhancing dance standards as well as students’ performing skills in the city.  In the competition, each entrant creates his/her own work based on the Classical Ballet, Modern Jazz and Tap syllabi of the CSTD and competes within the age groups of Toddler, Child, Teenage and Open.
Venue: Y-Theatre, Youth Square
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈總會、 澳洲聯邦舞蹈教師協會
Presenter: Hong Kong Dance Federation Ltd、Commonwealth Society of Teachers of Dancing
venue_en: Youth Square, Y Theatre

節目簡介: 「國際舞蹈日」定於每年4月29日全球舉行，希望藉著大型舞蹈活動，讓年青人有機會體驗和參與各類型的舞蹈、享受其中的樂趣。活動包括「舞動全城」千人共舞、舞蹈工作坊及舞蹈表演、「國際舞蹈日2011」-「舞動全城」等。
Venue: Y-Theatre, Youth Square
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈總會、 青年廣場
venue_en: Youth Square, Y Theatre

節目簡介: 假小西灣運動場舉行開幕儀式，作全港運動會前哨活動。

節目簡介: 由香港舞蹈總會及青年活動統籌委員會聯合主辦，並獲得青年事務委員會協辦、香港賽馬會慈善信託其金撥款資助。舞蹈日營將為香港舞蹈愛好者提供一個高質素的學習和交流機會。來自“澳洲”、“ 中 國”和“香港”的舞蹈家將攜手主持多個類別的《舞蹈課程/工作坊》、《表演及比賽》、《結業成效展示》等項目，內容充實豐富。
Venue: Youth Square
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈總會、民政事務總署 -青少年暑期活動委員會
Presenter: Hong Kong Dance Federation、Home Affairs Bureau - Summer Youth Programme Committee
venue_en: Youth Square

節目簡介: 總會自1996年起創辦『香港舞蹈博覽』匯演活動，為香港舞蹈藝術的普及和發展，獲得廣泛的肯定和好評。舞蹈博覽為多元化的舞蹈團體建立了演出平台，提供藝術策劃和行政管理，不斷促進和提升節目創新精神和表演水平。本屆設有經費，資助15-20分鐘三個中型創作節目。
About the Programme: Since its launching in 1996, Hong Kong Dance Expo has greatly enhanced the popularity and development of dance art and has been much welcome and recognized by Hong Kong people.  It has inspired different forms of dance performances, integrated many local dance groups and motivated their enthusiasts.  More than 50 dance groups participate in the event every year.  With the professionalism in artistic planning and management, they have created vitality and improved their performance standards.  There were three 15-20 mins. outstanding dance programmes rewards their subsidy from the Expo’s organized committee.
Venue: Auditorium, Sha Tin Town Hall
venue_en: Auditorium, Sha Tin Town Hall

節目名稱: 《中國舞等級考試課程比賽﹝七場﹞》
Programme Name: Chinese Dance Competition on Syllabus for Graded Examination (7 Sessions)
節目簡介: 總會自1988年開始，承辦北京舞蹈學院『中國舞等級考試』並同步舉行教師課程及學生考試，現已進入第23年。期間教師梯隊與考生的水平不斷上升，屢獲院方讚賞，這是本港各教師用心教學並努力推行課程的成果。總會將繼06及0為進一步提供更多的機會，使考生有更多的演出平台，8年舉行之《等級試舞蹈課程精英聯合展示》於本年9月主辦第一屆《中國舞等級考試課程比賽》。除提供考生個人舞台表演機會外，更設有環節，鼓勵更多的舞蹈創作，令教師與考生有更多發揮創意的機會，將中國舞課程所學，推到更高的層次，達到國家文化部對考級【考前培訓、
Venue: Y-Theatre, Youth Square
venue_en: Youth Square, Y Theatre

節目名稱: 香港大會堂50金禧舞蹈日 (主舞台-協辦機構)
Programme Name: Hong Kong City Hall 50th Anniversary Commemorative Exhibition – The Golden Stage
節目簡介: 香港大會堂是香港歷史上第一所為市民而建的多元化文娛中心。在過去的歲月裡，大會堂肩負起推廣本地文化藝術、促進中西文化交流和擴大市民社區活動領域的責任，被公認為香港文化藝術殿堂。際此大會堂50周年，讓我們透過光影及實物的展示，重溫大會堂段段星光燦爛的日子。
About the Programme: The Hong Kong City Hall is the first multi-purpose cultural complex built to enrich the quality of life of the Hong Kong community. Over the past years, it has taken on the role of popularizing the arts, promoting eastern and western cultures and expanding the parameters of community activities. The City Hall has been recognized by the general public as one of Hong Kong’s most prominent centres of arts and culture. To celebrate the 50th Anniversary of the City Hall, a commemorative exhibition is organized to take us through its many glorious years with images and memorabilia.
地點: 香港大會堂愛丁堡廣場
Venue: Edinburg Plaza, Hong Kong City Hall
venue.1: 香港大會堂愛丁堡廣場
venue_en: Edinburg Plaza, Hong Kong City Hall

節目簡介: 為了推行舞蹈美育，達到習舞4E（表達，教育，鼓勵及享受）的目標，由2006年開始，每年舉辦「袋鼠盃舞蹈比賽」，以提昇學員的表演能力和水平。比賽以澳洲聯邦舞蹈教師協會(CSTD)的芭蕾舞、爵士舞及踢踏舞等課程為藍本，參加者可以單、雙、三人的舞蹈形式參賽；以芭蕾、爵士、踢踏及民族舞為舞蹈分組；以幼童組、兒童組、少年組及公開組為比賽年齡分界。
About the Programme: To promote the theme of 4E (Expression, Education, Encouragement and Enjoyment) in local dance education, the HKDF proudly presents the Kangaroo Cup Dance Competition from 2006.  This annual dance competition has been one of the most all-rounded and comprehensive event enhancing dance standards as well as students’ performing skills in the city.  In the competition, each entrant creates his/her own work based on the Classical Ballet, Modern Jazz and Tap syllabi of the CSTD and competes within the age groups of Toddler, Child, Teenage and Open.
Venue: Y-Theatre, Youth Square
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈總會、 澳洲聯邦舞蹈教師協會
Presenter: Hong Kong Dance Federation Ltd、Commonwealth Society of Teachers of Dancing
venue_en: Youth Square, Y Theatre

節目簡介: 在香港舉行的第14屆亞太區舞蹈比賽，是秉承澳洲聯邦舞蹈教師協會The Commonwealth Society of Teachers of Dancing，簡稱CSTD，舞蹈教育宗旨的其中一項配套活動；目的是通過舞蹈觀摩比賽、交流學習，提昇亞太地區舞蹈學員的表演能力和水平。
About the Programme: The Asia Pacific Dance Competition was founded by the Commonwealth Society of Teachers of Dancing, Australia with the aim of encouraging the art of dance and providing students of dance from countries throughout the region with the chance of getting together to learn from each other through friendly competition.  In 2012, the grand function was hosted by Hong Kong for the first time.  Over 1000 participants (person-time) from the Philippines, Thailand, Singapore, and China (including Beijing, Shenzhen, Macau and Hong Kong) joined the competition.  It is hoped that the culture of dance will be further developed and exchange between dancers enhanced.
Venue: Y-Theatre, Youth Square
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈總會、澳洲聯邦舞蹈教師協會
Presenter: Hong Kong Dance Federation、Commonwealth Society  of Teachers of Dancing
venue_en: Youth Square, Y Theatre

節目簡介: 廣受青少年歡迎一年一度的國際舞蹈營，多年來由香港舞蹈總會及青少年暑期活動委員會聯合主辦、民政事務總署協辦，並獲得香港賽馬會慈善信託基金及香港藝術發展局撥款資助，將於今年暑假繼續舉行。 本年度即將舉辦的國際舞蹈營，是一個4日3夜的宿營，將會為香港舞蹈愛好者提供一個高質素及多元化的學習及交流機會。多位來自〝羅馬尼亞〞、〝澳洲〞、〝新疆〞和〝香港〞的舞蹈家將攜手主持多個不同類別的《舞蹈課程/工作坊》，另外更於營內舉辦《舞蹈交流晚會》、《專題講座》、《表演及比賽》、《結業成效展示》等項目，內容充實豐富。營友將有機
About the Programme: 〝International Dance Camp 2012〞, co-presented by Hong Kong Dance Federation, Summer Youth Programme Committee and Commission on Youth of Home Affairs Bureau, being co-sponsored by the Hong Kong Jockey Club Charities Trust and Hong Kong Arts Development Council this year, will be held during the hot summer time of 2012. The activity this year involves a 4-days and 3-nights Camp and provides a great opportunity for Hong Kong dance lovers to learn and share their experiences with the Oversea Participants. During the Dance Camp, experienced Dance Teachers and Professional Artists from Hong Kong, Xin Jiang, Romania and Australia are invited to host a wide range of Dance Workshops, Symposia and Achievement Appreciations. Through a range of interactive dance activities, aiming to enrich the Participants’exposure in the World of Dances!
Venue: Youth Square
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈總會、民政事務總署 -青少年暑期活動委員會
Presenter: Hong Kong Dance Federation、Home Affairs Bureau - Summer Youth Programme Committee
venue_en: Youth Square

節目名稱: 《小紫荊盃舞蹈大賽》及《紫荊盃舞蹈大賽》2012
Programme Name: Junior Bauhinia Cup Dance Championships 2012 and Bauhinia Cup Dance Championships 2012
節目簡介: 由香港舞蹈總會舉辦的《紫荊盃舞蹈大賽》是香港一項高水平的舞蹈比賽。大賽為香港的舞者構建了一個創作和表演平台，讓他們充分發揮藝術潛質和才華。過去五屆賽事得到舞蹈界人士熱烈響應和支持，作品成績優異。主要獲獎節目獲邀到廣州作交流演出，而多個金獎節目更在國際舞蹈比賽中獲得最高榮譽。今年舞蹈大賽公開組獲獎作品將代表香港參加《紫荊盃國際舞蹈邀請賽2012》。
About the Programme: Bauhinia Cup Dance Championships, which is organized by the Hong Kong Dance Federation, is a dance competition with a very high standard in Hong Kong. Providing choreographers and dancers with a creation and performance platform where they can give full play to their artistic potentialities and talents, the competition has received active response and support from people in the dance circle over the past five times. Groups with brilliant results have been invited to perform and exchange in Guangzhou and some gold-award choreographies have won high honours in international dance competitions. This year winners of the originality (open)section will be invited to enter Bauhinia Cup International Dance Invitation Championships 2012.
Venue: Ko Shan Theatre
venue_en: Ko Shan Theatre

節目名稱: 《紫荊盃舞蹈大賽優勝者演出暨頒獎禮2012》
Programme Name: Bauhinia Cup Dance Championships 2012 Winners' Performance and Award Ceremony
節目簡介: 《紫荊盃舞蹈大賽》各項比賽的獲獎節目將會聚一堂，隆重會演，展示及推介香港與國際舞者傻秀作品、分享舞蹈創作經驗。面對現金時代，展示如何發揚民族傳統舞蹈文化，不斷發展創新，藉以推進國際舞者間的相互交流和合作。
About the Programme: Winning groups of Bauhinia Cup Dance Championships 2012will display their works of excellence, share their choreography experience as well as demonstrating how to develop traditional dances and innovate continually so as to promote international exchange and collaboration.
Venue: Auditorium, Sha Tin Town Hall
venue_en: Auditorium, Sha Tin Town Hall

節目簡介: 聖誕老人真的存在嗎? 對於一個充滿懷疑的男孩，令人驚訝的事情在他身上發生了。就在平安夜，男孩躺在床上，盼望能聽到馴鹿拉著聖誔老人雪橇的鈴鐺聲。突然他被雷鳴般的怒吼嚇了一跳，一列巨大的蒸汽火車＂極地快車＂在他的面前出現！售票員邀他上車，和其他穿著睡衣的兒童一起到北極開展不平凡的旅程。他將會碰到誰？什麼奇妙的事情在等待著他呢？
About the Programme: Santa Claus does not exist. Or does he? For one doubting boy, an astonishing event occurs. Late on Christmas Eve night, he lies in bed hoping to hear the sound of reindeer bells from Santa’s sleigh. He is startled by a thunderous roar and is confronted by an enormous steam train, THE POLAR EXPRESS! The conductor invites him on board, and together with other pajama-clad children he embarks on an extraordinary journey to the North Pole. Who will he meet? What wonders will be in store for him? Would you want to join him and share in this amazing experience?
Venue: Auditorium, Kwai Tsing Theatre
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目名稱: 《社會共融齊起舞2012》綜合藝術教育舞蹈匯演
Programme Name: Dance in Harmony  2012 Integrated Arts Education Dance Performance
節目簡介: 匯聚曾參與藝術義工培訓班、外展舞蹈工作坊及親善探訪、「服務教育」研討會、「起舞弄清影」藝術教育舞蹈日及「社會共融齊起舞2012」義工舞蹈比賽的學校、社福團體及義工組織一同參與即興健康中國舞蹈工作坊及大型綜合藝術表演，藉中國舞蹈推動「藝術教育」、「傷健共融」和「健康教育」。          為了讓社區團體能夠有機會欣賞多姿多彩的中國舞蹈表演，認識中國舞蹈藝術義工服務;特舉辦贈票顯關懷活動，提供免費門票予弱勢社群，令是次匯演更具社會意義，藉此送暖人間，傳播義工精神。
About the Programme: Community service groups, voluntary groups and schools who took part in our arts voluntary training programme, Chinese Dance for Health Day, Integrated Arts Performance and our dance competition participated in this integrated art performance. We aim at promoting the concepts of “Arts Education”, “Social Inclusion” and the “Health Education”. To provide opportunities for more community groups to appreciate Chinese dance performances, and know about Chinese dance voluntary services, we donated a number of tickets for these groups, which made this activity a more meaningful one
Venue: Auditorium, Yuen Long Theatre
主辦單位: 業餘中國舞蹈推廣中心
製作/演出單位: 業餘中國舞蹈推廣中心
venue_en: Yuen Long Theatre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 一群具豐富潛質的展能藝術家聚首公園，與眾共享一個平等參與藝術表演的機會。在藝術指導王榮祿的帶領下，他們演繹各類舞蹈和音樂，以一幅幅流動的風景，帶領觀眾進入千變萬化的藝術世界，體現「與眾同藝」的精神！
About the Programme: A multi-talented group of performing artists with disabilities are took the parks as their stages to share arts participation with ALL on an equal footing. Led by the Artistic Director Ong Yong Lock, they performed various dances and musical works, bringing the audience through a journey of moveable sceneries into the wonderful world of arts. A true testament to the spirit that “Arts are for Everyone”!
地點: 大埔海濱公園、赤柱廣場
Venue: Tai Po Waterfront Park；Stanley Plaza

Production / Performing Unit: Arts with the Disabled Association Hong Kong

節目名稱: 《多一點藝術節》─ 香港展能藝術會　賽馬會共融藝術計劃2011-12年度周年展覽及演出 「盛傳多一點‧連繫多一點」
Programme Name: A Bit More Than Arts Festival : Arts with the Disabled Association Hong Kong Jockey Club Inclusive Arts Programme 2011-12 Annual Exhibition and Community Showcase ― Flourish a bit more and connect a bit more
節目簡介: 二零一零年八月起，香港展能藝術會籌辦為期三年的「賽馬會共融藝術計劃」，定期於石硤尾賽馬會創意藝術中心L3-04室的賽馬會共融藝術工房舉行不同領域及形式的藝術活動予殘疾及非殘疾人士參與，推廣藝術之餘更透過藝術建立社區，促進社會共融。參與本計劃的殘疾與非殘疾人士「盛傳」多一點藝術文化的背景和歷史，創作出富創意、具個人風格、融入生活元素和展現本土文化特色的表演。「盛傳多一點‧連繫多一點」的演出為總結及分享過去一年的過程和成果。
About the Programme: Jockey Club Inclusive Arts Programme 2011-12 Annual Exhibition and Jockey Club Inclusive Arts Programme, starting from August 2010, promotes arts and inclusion through various activities jointly participated by persons with or without disabilities. Participating artists in JCIAP flourished the cultural nourishment and the ground of arts into their art creation process and made the performances containing with their creativities, personal styles, living elements and local features. To conclude and showcase the process and outcome of the programme, ‘Flourish a bit more and connect a bit more’ is one of the Festival’s activities.
地點: 賽馬會創意藝術中心L1中央庭園
Venue: L1 Central Courtyard, Jockey Club Creative Arts Centre
Presenter: Arts with the Disabled Association Hong Kong
製作/演出單位: 香港展能藝術會賽馬會共融藝術工房
Production / Performing Unit: Arts with the Disabled Association Hong Kong、Jockey Club Inclusive Arts Studio

節目簡介: 節目分成兩部份, 第一部份是來自德國著名童話”糖果屋” , 故事是一對小兄妹, 他們跟做伐木的爸爸和媽媽過着貧窮的生活. 這對小兄妹在樹林裡迷了路, 他們在樹林裡看見一間用各式各樣糖果做成的屋, 於是走進屋裡, 遇到住在這裡的女巫. 幸好到最後, 這對小兄妹都能夠解破女巫的巫術, 逃出樹林, 回到家裡.  學生扮演著不同種類角式,如小鹿, 小兔, 松鼠, 村莊裡的小朋友, 星星, 樹林, 貓, 樹森裡的仙子, 小鳥, 火焰及糖果屋不同種類的糖果. 表演著不同的舞步.  節目的第二部份, 有爵士舞, 踢躂舞
About the Programme: In this performance, we have two difference story, the first half is the well-known fairy tale of German origin – “Hansel & Gretel”  Hansel & Gretel are a young brother and sister and they live with poor wood cutter father and mother.  They threatened by a cannibalistic witch living in the forest in a house constructed of cake and confectionery. Finally, Hansel & Gretel save their life by outwit the witch. The junior students act in difference character in the story.  Deers. Rabbits, Squirrels, villagers, stars, faireies, birds, Jelly Beans, Marshmallows, lollipops, Candy Canes, Liquorices All Sorts, Flames, Forest & Cats.   The second half, we have tap, jazz, mainly on pointe work in Excerpt from Giselle and Romance Les Sylphides choreography by Joan.
Venue: Concert Hall, Hong Kong City Hall
主辦單位: 嘉露貝雯芭蕾舞學 及倫敦芭蕾舞學校

節目簡介: 節目分成兩部份, 第一部份是以香港本地喜氣節日為提才 ~ 農曆新年的傳統習俗~舞龍,煙花滙演, 花卉盛放, 巡遊滙演, 復活節~大地回春, 欣欣向榮的美麗情景; 聖誕節~聖誕精靈,仙子, 雪花及派對狂歡;   節目的第二部份, 有爵士舞, 踢躂舞, Enchanted Dolls 節錄以及由本校校長鍾金寶編排”La Valse” 的節錄 為這次表演謝幕.
About the Programme: In this performance, we have two difference theme, the first half is the Celebration of Festivall in HK, In Lunar New Year, Dragon Dance, Marching Band & Cheer Leaders in parade; cherry Blossom in everywhere and beautiful firework show at night; In Easter, new flame after the cold winter, we have Sun Shade, lovely Chickens, beautiful Flowers and Easter Bonnet; In Christmas, we have Christmas Elves, Fairies, Snow Flake & Party Girls.  The second half, we have tap, jazz, mainly on pointe work in Excerpt  choreography by Joan.
Venue: Y-Theatre, Youth Square

節目簡介: 《中國舞蹈向前看》為中國新一代編舞人才提供平臺展現作品，公開徵集演出隊伍，精挑細選中國舞蹈創作精英新生代在港參與交流及演出。獲挑選隊伍分別來自中港台不同地區，展現當代中國原創舞蹈在意識形態上的不同探索。
About the Programme: China Dance Forward seeking out the emerging creative forces of Chinese contemporary dance and assembling them in Hong Kong.  The program provides a platform for aspiring Chinese choreographers to present their works and exchange their ideas. Through an open call, we have selected from across the country top dance makers of the next generation to meet and perform in Hong Kong. The works exhibit their exploration of “Chinese Dance in a contemporary context”.

節目名稱: 《舞出艷陽天2011》現代舞培訓計劃結業演出
Programme Name: Dancing in the Sun 2011 : Finale of Modern Dance Animateur Scheme
節目簡介: 「學校現代舞培訓計劃」乃CCDC舞蹈中心與康樂及文化事務署合作的學校藝術培訓計劃，由CCDC舞蹈中心委派專業導師到各參與中、小學舉辦舞蹈工作坊，向同學教授現代舞技巧及提供多元化舞蹈學習和排演活動，最後會參與一年一度的結業演出。
About the Programme: Modern Dance Animateur Scheme, which targets secondary school and primary school students, is the largest program of CCDC’s Dance Centre. In co-operation with the Leisure and Cultural Services Department, modern dance animateur scheme will be held by appointing professional dance tutors in primary and secondary schools. Tutors also choreograph works for students to perform in the annual finale performance.
Venue: Auditorium, Kwai Tsing Theatre
Choreographers: Instructors of Modern Dance Animateur Scheme
相關節目: 現代舞培訓計劃 Modern Dance Animateur Scheme
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 「青年舞蹈雙城」為「舞蹈青年」訓練計劃的延續，把「群眾中來，群眾中去」藝術理念擴展至珠三角，在香港及廣州不同社區挑選一群16至27歲的舞蹈菁英，授以多元化以現代舞為主的嚴謹訓練及密集式排練，然後以平台舞蹈的形式展示成果，把藝術帶回社區。2011年的「青年舞蹈雙城」獲邀參與深圳灣國際藝穗節，並在香港的沙田大會堂廣場及油麻地廟街榕樹頭演出共9場。
About the Programme: Youth Dance Two Cities is an extension of WuDaoQingNian training programme and further develop the mission of "from the masses, to the masses" in Pearl River Delta.  Two groups of elite dancers aged 16-27 from Hong Kong and Guangzhou are selected and delegated with a wide range of rigorous training and intensive rehearsals, finally to present the achievement back to the community. In 2011, we are invited to join the Shenzhen International Fringe Festival, and performed in Shatin Town Hall Plaza and Temple Street with 9 outdoor performances.
地點: 深圳海岸城 (中國)、沙田大會堂廣場、油麻地區中心休憩花園
Venue: Shenzhen Coastal City (China)、Sha Tin Town Hall Plaza 、Yau Ma Tei Community Rest Garden
Choreographers: Daniel Yeung, Ronly Kong, Rebecca Wong

About the Programme: My Own Dance is a platform provided by CCDC Dance Centre for students to create their own dance pieces. Nine groups of students from our Seasonal Dance Courses, Dance Training Scholarship Scheme and Wudaoqingnian Podium Dance Project participants in the production.

Programme Name: Environmental Performance: A Time to Dance
節目簡介: 舞蹈演出只能坐在演藝廳欣賞? 香港獨立舞蹈人組織帶給你另類的舞蹈經驗，讓你跟著舞者移動，360度欣賞舞蹈演出! 一眾舞者穿梭沙田大會堂不同位置，以身體回應舞以外的空間，告訴你舞蹈不局限於任何場地，只要你想，那裡都是舞台。
About the Programme: Independent Dance Makers Union will bring you different experience rather than watching the performance in the auditorium. You can appreciate the dance performance by moving with the dancers together. The dancers will move around different places of Sha Tin Town Hall and use their bodies to response the space which instead of the stage. It aims to tell you that dance is not limited to anyplace. Everywhere can be your stage.
Venue: Foyer, Sha Tin Town Hall
主辦單位: 康文署 - 文化節目組
編舞: 李思颺、鄺麗彥、徐奕婕、施卓然、藍嘉穎、李家祺、黃碧琪
Choreographers: Justyne Li, Rita Kwong, Ivy Tsui, Kenneth Sze, Rainbow Lam, Kaki Lee, Wong Pik Kei
venue_en: Sha Tin Town Hall, Foyer

節目簡介: 舞海無涯，無舞不蹈。CCDC舞蹈中心率領一眾舞蹈狂熱份子進佔沙田大會堂，觀眾可飽覽本地舞蹈家不同風格的現代舞及Hip Hop作品，配以主持人的導賞介紹，讓你一探舞蹈作品的多元性。 誠邀大家一起參加這個舞蹈盛會，感受舞蹈的魅力，讓你由這一刻愛上舞蹈。
About the Programme: Dance has no boundaries between different style and different people. It is a kind of expression and togetherness. CCDC Dance Centre leads different groups of choreographers and dancers to perform in Sha Tin Town Hall. The audience can have a deeper understanding of the variety of dance by appreciating this introductory dance performance. Welcome to join us to experience the greatest charm of dance. Let’s fall in love with dance now.
Venue: Auditorium, Sha Tin Town Hall
主辦單位: 康文署 - 文化節目組
編舞: 鄺韻儀、黃美玉、黃振邦、林詠茵、李嘉燕、張紫欣、文慧琦、蘇樂鍵
Choreographers: Ronly Kong, Rebecca Wong, Bruce Wong, Peggy Lam, Carol Lee, Kristy Cheung, Vicky Man, Lokin So
venue_en: Auditorium, Sha Tin Town Hall

節目名稱: CCDC舞蹈課程學生匯演《與舞同在》
節目簡介: Good Show乃CCDC舞蹈中心為學員提供的舞蹈實踐演出平台，舞蹈種類包括現代舞、爵士樂、芭蕾舞、中國舞、踢躂舞、音樂劇舞等。所有參加的學員接受專業舞蹈技巧及表演訓練，與我們一班高水準及經驗豐富的舞蹈導師共同分享舞蹈學習及演出所帶給舞者的愉悅及難忘經驗。
About the Programme: Good Show is a platform provided by CCDC Dance Centre for students to reach a level of real achievement in dance. With professional technique and performance skills training, participants can make an impact on stage thanks to our high quality and experienced teachers.
Venue: Auditorium, Sha Tin Town Hall
venue_en: Auditorium, Sha Tin Town Hall

節目簡介: 小小白雪公主與父王一起在城堡生活。白雪公主母親過世後，父王再娶了一位美麗的女子成為了白雪公主的後母。這位後母擁有一面能顯示世界上誰是最美麗女子的魔鏡，一直以來，魔鏡都顯示後母是最美麗的。在白雪公主十六歲生日舞會中，魔鏡顯示了白雪公主才是世上最美麗的。後母非常嫉妒，遂差遣獵人把白雪公主帶到森林裏殺害她，但善良的獵人最後還是放走了白雪公主。 白雪公主在森林中迷路，但幸運地遇見各式各樣奇怪卻善良的動物，怪人以及小矮人，跟牠們成為了朋友並一起在森林裏愉快地生活，但白雪公主心裏卻時常惦記著跟她兩小無猜的那位男孩子。
About the Programme: Little princess Snow White lived in a castle with her father the king who remarried a beautiful woman after her mother died. The stepmother had a magical mirror which always reflected her as the most beautiful woman in the world. On Snow White’s 16th birthday party, the Magic Mirror reflected Snow White, not her stepmother, as the most beautiful lady.  Out of jealousy and anger the stepmother ordered Snow White to be taken to the woods to be killed. A kind-heart Huntsman allowed Snow White to escape. Snow White made friends with little birds and animals of the meadow and also strange creatures of the caves and dwarf workers. She led a happy life but often thought of a boy she loved. The queen soon learnt Snow White was still alive. She sent someone to poison her.
地點: 香港大會堂音樂廳、元朗劇院演藝廳
Venue: Concert Hall, Hong Kong City Hall；Auditorium, Yuen Long Theatre
藝術總監: 廖本懷夫人毛妹太平紳士
venue.1:
香港大會堂音樂廳
元朗劇院演藝廳
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Concert Hall；Yuen Long Theatre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 歡樂的笑聲充滿整個皇宮。可愛的小公主每天都會在花園和湖邊玩耍，小動物、小昆蟲常常圍著她們團團轉。有一天，小公主不聽褓姆的叮嚀，誤闖陰森的古樹林。結果，可憐的小公主被巫師的魔咒改變了一生。從此，公主白天變成天鵝，到晚上才能回復原貌，而唯一能解除咒詛的方法就是公主找到一位真心愛她的王子。 王子在幽靜的湖邊遇到公主，兩人一見鍾情。此時，巫師怕自己的魔咒被真情破解，便指使自己的女兒迷惑王子。公主得知後，傷心欲絕地回到湖邊。她深知道自己不但失去真摰的愛情，而且復原無望。後來，王子醒悟了，立即奔到湖邊找尋公主，並發誓
About the Programme: The lovely little princess is always surrounded by various kind-hearted animals in her royal court. One day, the princess has disregarded her nanny’s reminder and goes into the dark forest out of curiosity. There, she was caught and cursed by an evil sorcerer that turned her into a swan. The poor princess can only appears as a swan in daytime and regain her human form at night afterwards. The only way to break the spell is the power of a true love. Deep in the forest, the young princes discover the swan princess and see her transform into human form at the lakeside. They fell in love with each other and the prince invites the swan princess to the royal ball at his castle so that he can choose her as his bride and declare his love for her. Having known that, the sorcerer sent his daughter to the ball, disguised as the swan princess. The prince was beguiled into declaring his love to the sorcerer’s daughter. The desperate swan princess cannot regain her human form forever with the prince breaking his promise. The prince rushes to the lakeside and swear to swan princess that she is the only love for him. This power of love has freed the swan prince from the sorcerer’s spell and she unites happily with the prince.
Venue: Concert Hall, Hong Kong City Hall
藝術總監: 廖本懷夫人毛妹太平紳士
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Concert Hall

Venue: Theatre, Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre
venue_en: Theatre, Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre

節目簡介: 《全程40’後300“秒》 以40分鐘的倒數時計起動開始，及後以沙漏中結算最後的300”秒光陰。演出以時間的流動為中軸，探討都市人在快速的生活節奏下如何影響人與人之間最真誠的交流。
About the Programme: “40’300””started with the count down of 40 minutes and experienced the count down with hourglass for the last 300 second. With the extraordinary pace in our life, how are we losing our relation with people around us?
Venue: White Box Theatre, DanceArt
venue_en: DanceArt Hong Kong White Room

節目簡介: 《Blind》創作直率真誠，編舞獨自面對一段失落的感情，掘出潛藏內心深處的敏感神經。在年青人的目光出發，以獨立的目光審視都市人倫關係，形成一個有趣感人的探索之旅。
About the Programme: Choreographer started the piece with his personal experience. “Blind” reaches the sensitive nerve of every lover with a sincere heart.
Venue: White Box Theatre, DanceArt
venue_en: DanceArt Hong Kong White Room

Programme Name: White Box Series: Rustling of Discourse
Venue: White Box Theatre, DanceArt
venue_en: DanceArt Hong Kong White Room

Programme Name: New Vision Arts Festival 2012:  Lament of the Exile
節目簡介: 香港動藝舞團邀來中港台演藝精英，將二千多年前屈原以畢生之沉鬱悲痛寫就的曠世詩篇《離騷》，演繹為當代被放逐與自我放逐者在時代洪流上下求索的旅程。 著名華人編舞家張曉雄，風格洗練獨特， 表現當代漂流的華人知識分子，如何於日漸模糊的邊界中辨識逝去的身份認同，於放逐的史詩中尋覓虛無的文化根源；無界樂人陳國平的中西實驗樂風， 蒙古吟唱歌手娜仁其木格以天籟歌聲，香港和台灣舞者的精湛表演，述說旅人穿越時空的孤獨 。
About the Programme: Dancers move to create dynamic tension. A Mongolian singer chants as if she weeps into the void while a modern score generates music that continuously spurs the imagination. In this enthralling performance, the different fates and emotions of wanderers separated from their homeland – zeal, melancholy, loneliness, exuberance – are laid bare. For this reinterpretation of Qu Yuan’s ancient epic poem, Li Sao, written in grief and sorrow after his own banishment 2,000 years ago, Hong Kong’s DanceArt draws together distinguished performers from the Mainland, Hong Kong and Taiwan who extend Qu’s work into a soul-searching journey for today’s forced and self-imposed exiles.Acclaimed for his originality and characteristic integration of art forms, here Chinese-Australian choreographer Zhang Xiao-xiong blends dance, literature, photography and arts installation to illustrate how contemporary Chinese intellectuals relocate their identity after leaving home, and to explore the cultural ambiguity that arises for those cut adrift in a world of disappearing boundaries. A borderless present is interwoven into the performance through composer-musician John Chen’s experimental fusion of eastern and western sounds while Mongolian singer Narenqimuge’s heavenly voice captures the solitude of those exiled throughout time. Alongside, dancers from Hong Kong and Taiwan fuse their artistry, adding another creative layer to this fascinating work of contemporary dance theatre
Venue: Lecture Hall, Sheung Wan Civic Centre
主辦單位: 康文署 - 藝術節辦事處
venue_en: Lecture Hall, Sheung Wan Civic Centre

Programme Name: New Vision Arts Festival 2012:  Lament of the Exile Student Performance

節目名稱: White Box Series: 《旅人 啟程版1.1》
Programme Name: White Box Series: On the Road Again: A Private Journal Experiment 1.1
節目簡介: 從一處地方遷移至另一個地方，帶著我的枕頭和咖啡。 與之同行的，就是它們嗎？ 善用整個白盒劇場，在一重重如虛似幻的空間之中隱隱滲透著旅人的孤獨與虛空。然而，面向一切未知的興奮之情，總帶著我們的生命越走越遠。
About the Programme: From here to there. I come with my pillow and coffee.  Is that all I have?  White Box Theatre had created layer and space for travelers who are traveling with loneliness and emptiness. However, we still walk further and further away with the excitement from the UNKNOWN
Venue: White Box Theatre, DanceArt
venue_en: DanceArt Hong Kong White Room

節目名稱: 動藝「碌地小八科」總結演出 《心本日和》
Programme Name: DanceArt Hong Kong “Keep Trying, Keep Asking, Keep the Ball Rolling!”
節目簡介: 今天 世界混濁 但 心 晴朗 人們說2012年是世界末日，但如果生活過得不快活，其實每一天也可以是末日。若可保心內的晴天，就算世事多不如意，我們也可撐過去。編舞串連像默片小人物的小故事，處處荒誕，卻見幽默，讓觀眾會心微笑。
About the Programme: Today Darkness in the world  But  Sun shine  Inside of our heart  Is 2012 the end of the world? But it can be a doomsday if life is unhappy. Choreographer creates a series of stories about every ordinary people in the city, Surprise every audience with humor and smile.

About the Programme: Contrasting daily life in which all sorts of pressure is compressed. Summer is a time for our fellow dancers to perform delightfully on stage.

節目簡介: 艾黛萊活在一個孤單、沮喪的世界。她認為自然災害、人類醜惡，都是衝著她而來的詛咒。對於有跡可尋的世間美好， 她早已失去概念。 黑暗中，一群候鳥的遷徙驚動了艾黛萊。 那劃破漆黑的白光，是艾黛萊前所未見的。忽然，雪仙子出現在艾黛萊眼前。雪仙子不是大人的謊言嗎？艾黛萊帶著好奇， 隨雪仙子步進一個新世界。  空氣中的幽香，把愁苦一掃而空。然後，艾黛萊被邀請跟 色彩繽紛的氣球和浮遊在天空之城的絲帶於雲層中漫舞! 飄啊飄，氣球隨風飄揚，去到另一個意想不到的國度—火。 漫天煙火下，火鳥的熱情融化了艾黛萊對火的恐懼。 不一
About the Programme: Adelaide was sad. She assumed the world is cursing her with natural disasters and human darkness. She was suffering from solitude and was a stranger to beauty and love.  Amid the darkness, the migration of white doves startled her. The whiteness that sheared darkness was something new to her vision. Out of the blue, snowflake fairy, who Adelaide thought was nothing but an adults’ tale, appeared before her eyes. Timidly, Adelaide followed her into a brand new world.
地點: 香港理工大學寶馬會綜藝館
Venue: Jockey Club Auditorium, The Hong Kong Polytechnic University
venue.1: 香港理工大學賽馬會綜藝館
venue_en: Jockey Club Auditorium, The The Hong Kong Polytechnic University

節目簡介: 於2011年10月5日適逢《儂情舞集》成立十週年紀念，我們再次重溫十年來曾參賽及獲獎的精彩作品/片段如: 咏梅、西藏情、春萌、西湖傳說、綻放在彩虹下、意●隨風及解語花等，於『十全十美十載情』再次呈現在舞台上。老師們更精心編排了多隻全新舞蹈，慕使當晚的節目更多元化及精彩。另外，我們亦專誠邀請《韵情舞坊》參與演出，一同將歡樂帶給廣大觀眾。
About the Programme: The year of Twenty Eleven is the tenth anniversary of《Forever Dance Troupe》and it provided a great opportunity for us to re-act and perform on-stage various memorable and phenomenal dance pieces that have brought us numerous awards and acclaims in the last ten years such as: “Singing the praises of Plum”, “Tibetan Sentiments”, “Sprouting in Spring”, “The Legend of Xi Hu”, “Blossoming under the Rainbow” “Sensation with the Wind” and “Flower of Beauty and Sadness”. A number of newly choreographed and spectacular dances were performed too. Besides, we have invited《Kidance》as the guest performers as well.
Venue: Y-Theatre, Youth Square
Name of Artistic Director: LEUNG Ki Fun, LAU Man Fung
venue_en: Youth Square, Y Theatre

節目簡介: “雪女王” 是著名童話作家安徒生的名作之一，本團藝術總監秦懿欣校長將之改編為一齣賞心悅目的兒童芭蕾舞劇，適合一家大小觀看。全劇由秦懿欣芭蕾舞學院的師生合力演出，劇情中有優美的芭蕾舞演出，更加插各種不同類形的舞蹈風格，精彩繽紛。劇情描述歌達的好朋友給雪國皇后魔鏡的碎片飄入了眼睛及心房，令他看見所有的事物都變得醜陋。他冰冷無情的離棄了歌達，跟隨冷酷的雪女后出走北極冰宮。為了真摯的友誼，歌達不惜離別親友，到北極冰宮去營救阿佳。憑著她的毅力及愛心，阿佳冰封的心終於被融化了，快快樂樂的隨著歌達回家去。
About the Programme: “Snow Queen”is one of the famous story of the best story teller- Anderson, The best friend of Gerda, Kay got hurt by the broken pieces of Snow Queen’s mirror in his eyes and heart, he then saw the world from a totally distorted angle .He denounced and teased Gerda , and even attracted by the  Snow Queen and went to the North of North with her. Gerda missed her friend and determined to fetch him in spite of difficulties. With the help of the Robber girl and the reindeers, she was able to find Kay in the Ice Palace in the North of North. Her genuine love and warmth melted the icy heart of Kay. He then became himself again and off they went home together happily. The performance is staged by the students of the Ulian Chun Academy of Dance, and it was a dance drama welcomed by young and old.
Venue: Y-Theatre, Youth Square
venue_en: Youth Square, Y Theatre

Programme Name: Summer Dazzle – Peter and the Wolf
節目簡介: 夏日的清晨，彼得待爺爺不察覺, 偷偷的溜到森林玩要。小鳥在活潑地飛翔, 肥鴨則在湖面上快樂的嬉水。靈巧的貓兒施展混身解數，準備偷襲獵物。爺爺不見了彼得，急忙到屋外尋找，告誡彼得森林裡有狼出沒。狼真的來了! 貓兒一下了爬了上樹，鴨子則愴惶逃命，但最終逃不過被生吞的命運。最後，彼得在小鳥和貓的協助下，成功擒拿惡狼。全劇由秦懿欣芭蕾舞學院的師生合力演出，劇情中有優美的芭蕾舞演出，更加插不同類形的舞蹈風格，精彩繽紛。
About the Programme: In a fresh country morning, little Peter went out ot play in the meadow, the noisy little bird is flying up and down amusing herself, the chubby duck was having fun in the lake. The intelligent cat was thinking of all the tricks to catch her prey. Peters Grandfather hurried out to look for Peter and scared him with a wolf. The wicked wolf did come around, the cat made her way up to the tree at once, but the duck was not so lucky as to get away but swallowed by the wolf instead. With the help of the bird and the cat, Peter was brave enough to capture the big bad wolf at last! The performance is staged by the students of the Ulian Chun Academy of Dance.
Venue: Theatre, Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre
venue_en: Theatre, Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre

節目名稱: 《源源遠遠師生情》綜合藝術中國舞蹈匯演
Programme Name: Crazy for Dance 30s - The Gratitude to Teachers for Life Chinese Dance Performance
節目簡介: 以「敬師愛生」為題，讓師生及其他社會人士一同參與舞蹈工作坊及大型綜合藝術表演，並藉舞台推動「藝術教育」和「傷健共融」。同時，教院學生及畢業生作為未來老師及現職老師，以身作則，與社會人士合作，以藝術表達師生情。
About the Programme: As the title indicates, we aim at engaging teachers, students and the community in attending our dance workshops and integrated arts performances to promote ‘Arts Education’ and ‘Social Inclusion’. As student teachers or in-service teachers, students and graduates from HKIEd set good models and work with people from the community to advocate the love between teachers and students through performing arts.

節目名稱: 《社會共融齊起舞2011》綜合藝術中國舞蹈匯演
Programme Name: Dance in Harmony 2011 - Integrated Chinese Dance Arts Performance
節目簡介: 匯聚曾參與藝術義工培訓班、健康中國舞蹈日、「社會共融一家親」綜合藝術中國舞蹈匯演及義工舞蹈比賽的學校、社福團體及義工組織一同參與即興健康中國舞蹈工作坊及大型綜合藝術表演，藉中國舞蹈推動「藝術教育」、「傷健共融」和「健康教育」。為了讓社區團體能夠有機會欣賞多姿多彩的中國舞蹈表演，認識中國舞蹈藝術義工服務;本團特舉辦贈票顯關懷活動，提供一定數量的免費門票，送予弱勢社群，令是次匯演更具社會意義，亦表達了未來老師對社會的承擔和關懷，藉此送暖人間，傳播義工精神。此外，是次匯演亦特設「藝術教育專題研習活動」，讓學生一
About the Programme: Community service groups, voluntary groups and schools who took part in our arts voluntary training programme, Chinese Dance for Health Day, Integrated Arts Performance and our dance competition participated in this integrated art performance. We aim at promoting the concepts of “Arts Education”, “Social Inclusion” and the “Health Education”. To provide opportunities for more community groups to appreciate Chinese dance performances, and know about Chinese dance voluntary services, we donated a number of tickets for these groups, which made this activity a more meaningful one. Besides, we ran a seminar on arts education to allow students take part in dance workshops, appreciate stage arts performances and engage in project-based learning about the Chinese culture and experience the concept of “Social Inclusion” and promote “Social Harmony”.
Venue: Auditorium, Yuen Long Theatre

節目名稱: 荃灣新市鎮金禧演出《淺灣傳奇》暨學校及社區專場
Programme Name: Tsuen Wan New Town 50th Anniversary Celebration Performance Tsuen Wan Legend
節目簡介: 舞劇《淺灣傳奇》取材自荃灣客家圍村，透過村民耕作、求雨、祈福等舞段，展現昔日農村生活風情，集舞蹈、戲劇及歌唱元素，細訴歷史，舞動今昔。節目選演多個舞蹈片段，特別加插導賞環節，解構如何製作及操控栩栩如生的火龍及在台上漂游的小木船等道具；讓學生親嘗拋祈福球許願的樂趣和穿木屐起舞的感受。
About the Programme: The Legend of Tsuen Wan is a dance drama based on the history of Tsuen Wan, looking at life in a Hakka walled village. The performance tells the story of Tsuen Wan through dance and drama, featuring farming, praying for rain and blessing, and the day-to-day life of a folk village. The extra interactive sessions introduce the production and operation of the fire dragon and wooden boat on stage. Students are invited to practise the blessing custom or dance with clogs.
Venue: Auditorium, Tsuen Wan Town Hall
主辦單位: 荃灣各界慶祝荃灣新市鎮金禧活動籌備委員會
製作/演出單位: 香港舞蹈團外展及教育部
Production / Performing Unit: Hong Kong Dance Company - Outreach and Education Department
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium

節目簡介: 新加坡華中校友會每兩年選一地點舉行全球校友嘉年華會。2011年為第五屆, 選址海南博鰲玉帶灣大酒店, 香港東南亞舞蹈團義務策劃及演出兩晚截然不同的節目, 包括印尼, 菲律賓, 馬來西亞, 中國舞,以及變臉魔術劇 。琼海市長秘書蒞臨致辭。

venue_en: The Hainan Boao Yudawan Hotel

節目簡介: 香港東南亞舞蹈團聯同印尼東南亞舞蹈團共同策劃及演出。晚會為練功十八法協會八周年及成立新加坡導引養生功協會開典儀式。舞蹈包括馬來西亞, 印尼, 中國舞, 以及變臉魔術劇, 特別呈獻印尼亞齊省的沙曼舞, 這是無音樂伴奏的蹲跪排舞, 需由舞蹈員邊唱邊跳, 且越跳越快的合作無間, 令觀眾印象深刻。

節目簡介: 十年以來，一棵葡萄樹徐徐成長，樹枝上果實櫐櫐，綻放著醉人的幽香。粗壯的樹幹與樹枝竭力地供應養份，按時侯孕育出壯健的果子，而這正是本校的教學理念。至於建校的宗旨，除了傳授舞技，還則重傳揚基督的愛。 是次十週年演出，全校的師生合作舞出葡萄樹上的九種果子, 包括 :仁愛、喜樂、忍耐、良善、溫柔、信實、平安、節制及恩慈。
About the Programme: In the past ten years, a vine has been growing sturdily. The branches of the vine bear luscious fruits which disseminate a kind of wonderful aroma. The sturdy trunk is the stronghold and together with all branches, they all dedicate themselves in nourishing all the fruits bearing on the vine and this is a literal depiction of Ivy Chung School of Ballet. Our school always bears the mission to instill the best ballet skills to students as well as spreading the love of God. To celebrate the Ivy Chung School of Ballet’s 10th Anniversary, all teachers and students will together perform “The nine fruits bear on the Vine”. It includes love, joy, patience, goodness, gentleness, faithfulless, peace, self-control and kindness
Venue: Y-Theatre, Youth Square

節目簡介: 在這個作品裡，兩個來自不同國家的編舞，在其共創作品的呈現中，打開了一系列不同的視點。藉著把觀眾視線轉移，她們創造一次互動的體驗，來探討我們如何克服界線和限制。表演場地被改造成一個既規範又無限的環境，​讓舞者、肢體動作、設置、視覺效果和音樂引領觀眾進入一個由通道和密室組成的迷宮。 這演出移去了固定座位，藉著活動壁板的不時轉移，把表演空間重新割切。當舞者移動壁板時，會遮擋了一些視線，但同時又打開新的視野；觀眾也會隨之移動，適應著這些不停演變的空間配置，或圍著舞者而觀，或分散來讓出空間。 通過這些視界的轉變，觀
About the Programme: In this work two choreographers, each from different countries, open a spectrum of views as they present their collaborative production. Shifting the audienceʼs sight lines, they create an interactive experience which delves into the strategies we use to overcome boundaries and limitations. The studio theatre will be transformed into an environment that is at the same time containing and boundless as the dancers, physical movements, setting, visual effects and music lead the audience into a labyrinth of passages and chambers.  Doing away with fixed seating, the piece uses rolling panels which are shifted periodically to reconfigure the performance space. The dancers move the panels into different configurations during the work, blocking certain views and opening up others. The audience also moves throughout the piece, adapting to these evolving configurations, at times dispersing around or encircling the performers. Through these changing perspectives the audience will weave their way through the ever changing environment of the work both physically and metaphorically

Venue: Lecture Hall, Sheung Wan Civic Centre

About the Programme: Elemental was a student and instructor showcasing the skills that the students have been able to attain through Pole Paradise Studio classes and workshops. This annual showcase changes themes and the students and instructors have to perform aerial and other related dances taught at PPS to the chosen theme through choice of music and costume. Many styles of dance are performed varying from pole dancing, aerial hoop, aerial silks, Burlesque and chair dance. As the theme of this show was the Elements then all aspects of the elements including earth, wind, fire, water and wood were portrayed in this showcase. The show was attended by over 200 guests at the popular aerial venue, which is called Grappas Cellar. An Italian restaurant located in Central. This venue is a popular aerial performance venue due to its high ceiling space. In this showcase we had both men and women performing. The performances reared loud applause and shouting from the audience.
Venue: Grappas Cellar HK
Remarks: pole dancing, aerial hoop, aerial silks, Burlesque and chair dance

Programme Name: International Arts Carnival 2012 – School and Outreach Touring Programme: Crazy for Technology
節目簡介: 自最新潮物電玩「蛇果」入手一刻，達仁便醉心於彈指之間，他的世界亦慢慢變成只有單調音符。What’s opp……嗶嗶……躂躂，高速的資訊世界為距離重新定位，遠方好友的一舉一動瞭如指掌，近在咫尺的面孔卻漸行漸遠。在病態沉迷的影響下，達仁彷彿已失去語言表達和聆聽的本能……
About the Programme: Tat is a computer geek. Since he got his hands on the latest ‘i-Fruit', his life had started turning into a monotonic world containing only games and data. While the booming IT network surely helps to keep him posted on the current status of faraway friends, those who were once close to him seem to be drifting apart. Now deeply addicted to technology, Tat finds himself gradually losing the ability to communicate with others…

節目簡介: 女人如花，花樣的年華，又豈只青春少艾。 花一樣的年華，多采多姿，令人迷戀，使人讚歎，讓人感動。 中國是多民族的國度，五十六個民族的舞蹈可謂異彩紛陳、各具特色。《花樣年華》特意精選了包括漢、藏、苗、彝、蒙、傣、朝鮮、維吾爾等不同民族的舞蹈，從而組成花團錦簇般的節目內容。《花樣年華》由本港著名編舞家羅耀威先生擔任藝術總監及編導，並非常榮幸邀請到國家一級演員王小燕女士遠道而來同台獻藝。 我們的年華是花樣的，我們的心靈豐足而歡欣。是對舞蹈藝術的執着與追求，為生活增添了色彩，也因為辛勤的付出及獲得的果實，使我們的年
About the Programme: Youth is like a blossom than flourishes the most beautiful moment of a woman. It is fascinating and captivating. Chinese dance is filled with a rich variety of 56 ethnic minority dances. Dance in Blossom featured a series of brilliant performances Han, Tibetan, Miao, Yi, Mongolian, Thai, Korean and Uyger ethnic styles. Choreographed by Artistic Director Mr. Law Yiu Wai, this performance also had the honour to invite Ms Wang Xiaoyan, the national 1st class dancer of China, flying all the way from China to perform at the show. The performance shared the passion of dance with the audiences. It was also the evidence of the group's effort in the pursuit of Chinese dance over the years.
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall, Theatre
編舞: _羅耀威、汪陽、姑再努爾（古麗）．艾買提
Choreographers: Law Yiu Wai, Wang Yang, Guli Aimaiti
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Theatre

節目名稱: 《綠色環保小戰士》創意芭蕾培訓計劃結業演出
Programme Name: “Little Green Warriors” Creative Ballet Animateur Scheme – Finale Performance
節目簡介: 曾經建造方舟、拯救動物避開大洪水的挪亞，經過千萬年後，其後人挪季竟然要重複祖先的拯救行動！挪季建造了一艘名為「Bulu Bulu號」的時光穿梭機，回到廿一世紀的「過去」，呼籲「過去的地球人」不要再破壞地球。「Bulu Bulu號」飛船帶領地球人穿梭過去、現在和未來，經歷地球數百年來的環境變遷：既走進嚴重污染的時代，亦回到綠草如茵的地球，最後還召集了一班綠色環保小戰士力圖拯救地球！這群綠色環保小戰士使出渾身解數，發明各種千奇百怪的環保機器，以改善地球的污染問題。但是，當中一些小戰士卻在中途感到氣餒。究竟他們
About the Programme: Noah once built a wooden ark to save animals from the flood. After thousands of years, his descendant Noach is to repeat the salvation once again! Noach builds a time machine named “Bulu Bulu”, and rides it back to the 21st century, to call on “People living on Earth in the past” not to damage the Earth. “Bulu Bulu” carries people on flights through the past, present and future, witnessing changes to the Earth over hundreds of years. It flies into an era of serious pollution, and returns to a time when the Earth is still verdant; and finally Noach gathers a group of Little Green Warriors who join forces to save the Earth!
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre

節目名稱: 《精靈新一代 2012》創意芭蕾培訓計劃結業演出
Programme Name: “Smarties Generation 2012” Creative Ballet Animateur Scheme – Finale Performance
節目簡介: 每個小孩子心中都有自己的理想，但在現實生活中，是否每個小孩都能夢想成真呢？故事的主人翁是一個年僅十歲，就讀小三的聰明機智男孩子。由於父母長期在外工作，需由家傭照顧起居飲食。但他不喜歡也不尊重這位家傭，因為他感到被忽略，他渴望得到的只是父母的關愛。儘管父母盡量滿足他的物質需要，可是他從不滿足，也不快樂，幸好這位男孩子最後得到協助，從此改變了他對現實生活的看法。其實每個小孩子都會面對不同的挑戰及困難，不過困難其實並非想像中那麼複雜及難以解決，只要心存信念，態度積極進取，一切困難都能迎刃而解。
About the Programme: All children have their own dream. However, in reality, can the dream of every child come true? The leading character of this story is a clever 10-year-old boy studying in primary 3. Since his parents must spend long hours working away from home, the boy’s daily life is taken care of by a domestic helper. He doesn’t like or respect the domestic helper. Longing for his parents’ care and love, the boy feels he is being ignored. Although his parents meet his material needs as much as possible, he is never satisfied and never feels happy. Fortunately, the boy finally receives help that changes his attitude toward the reality of life. In fact, every child faces different challenges, but the problems are not so difficult to solve as they imagine. With confidence and a positive attitude, all difficulties can be solved.
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre

節目簡介: 舞水，這擺明是個荒話。不是間，是問。不是問你想唔想過大海濕「立」「立」演出連酒店房間的間，是問自己如何在傳說中已死的香港找一個藝術創作空間的問。 係唔係唔係那個間你就不問？ 係唔係嚴肅一點的主題你就怕睇？ 傳說中的芭蕾皇叔伍宇烈不怕你問，只怕你不聞不問。 騙你，只是手段。
About the Programme: What’s in a name?  A hose is not a house, but a house is not a home. A rip-off of that other show,  U say? Where’s  Ur complimentary casino hotel accommodation,  U ask? Why are  U here? What role do  U play in the creative process? A house with  all-U-can-eat glitz-n-glamour dancing water? How do  U measure good art these days? Do  U always get what U pay for? What do  U want to get out of it anyway? Are  U listening? Are U watching? Are U feeling?
Venue: Lecture Hall, Sheung Wan Civic Centre
主辦單位: 康文署 - 文化節目組
venue_en: Lecture Hall, Sheung Wan Civic Centre

節目名稱: 不加鎖舞踊館《失物啟事》
節目簡介: 舊年代、老地方，時空不詳卻似曾相識。 一個火車站，人來人去，失物必多，就自然有個「失物待領處」。 一個年青員工待在那裡，因為好奇，因為無聊，因為⋯⋯其實他也不太清楚 他一直都覺得；像很多年青人一樣，有點「迷失」，但又說不出原因。 日復日，員工忙著；應付無奇不有的；自稱失物物主的人。 失物待領處就像一個生活的博物館。日復日，員工就在那裡，竟然，漸漸愛上他的工作來⋯ 當然；他依舊愛發夢。
About the Programme: Old days old places / unknown and familiar / railway station /  Lost and Found / Young man working / Boredom / Lost / Daydream /  Lost people/ day by day / Museum of Lives / Daydream / Found？
Venue: Y-Theatre, Youth Square
主辦單位: 康文署 - 觀眾拓展辦事處

節目名稱: 廣東現代舞週《蕭邦vs Ca幫》
Programme Name: Guangdong Dance Festival Chopin Vs Ca
節目簡介: 以街舞、現代舞及雜耍藝術碰撞蕭邦古典音樂的舞蹈劇場。 作品講述一眾Cai仔(充滿傻勁的小伙子)以爆炸性的能量，充滿身上每一個細胞硬爆蕭邦柔情音樂。他們用舞蹈將肢體化為五線譜的音符，譜寫自小成長於這城市(香港)的生活印記。 這城市是過份擁擠的城市，親密的中西融匯滋養出許多的半番鬼，回歸後的一國兩制更在經濟掛帥下與中國形成曖昧關係。人們在這不協調的城市中，醞釀出來的生活是過份著重吃喝玩樂的刺激，官能上的重視也只為印証自己存在這城市中的假象。Cai仔在這種環境中唯有強調生活要有趣味，不要那些機械呆板充滿壓力的生
About the Programme: This is a piece blending the classical music of Chopin and contmeporary dance together.  Pianist plays the Masterpieces with his phalanges. The Male dancers are releasing the explosive energy and tactful skills through the masterpieces. With the same theory of dancinging spaces between bones, they trigger vibrations in the air. The choreographer tries to turn the dancers into notes on score, expressing the romance of the music in the stream of time somewhere in the city. With the elements of Hip-hop, Acrobatics, Contemporary Dance, Modern Dance, Post-modern dance, Pre-modern dance, they hang around in the theatre.
地點: 廣州歌舞劇院小劇場 (中國)
Venue: Guangzhou Song and Dance Theatre (China)
venue_en: Guangzhou Song and Dance Theatre

節目名稱: 社區文化大使: 《英雄@過期 》
節目簡介: 英雄入無用武之地，瞬間就「過期」⋯…活像一堆堆過期罐頭；內裡有毒、正在發霉。 英雄最大的敵人：過度懷緬昔日風光。在苦中無人青睞的日子，特別寂寞，終忍不住要相濡以沫，輪流表演自娛也娛人。廣場上，每日陽光在當頭最毒方位，正是獻醜之時
地點: 15處康文署轄下演藝場地大堂、公園及商場

節目簡介: 本身不太擅長語言溝通  有時更會逃避跟不熟識的人說話  很多說話都只對自己說  很多感受都留給自己受  其實我是很『 』的
About the Programme: Not good at language communication   Avoiding talking with strangers  I keep words to myself.  I reserve most of the feelings, emotions for myself. In fact, I am so “ “.

節目簡介: 肢體舞動劃破靜謚  引發肉體與神經之間的感召  身體肆無忌憚的舞動  重新解讀不斷演化的城市  兩股勢力 一場角力 牽引與排斥之間  從遠處眺望自己  對新語彙的渴求  釋放 潛藏 身體與心內的空間

節目名稱: 社區文化大使: 《英雄@降E大調》
Programme Name: Community Cultural Ambassador Scheme: Hero@Eb Major
節目簡介: 上一回《英雄@過期》；止於虛耗的等待中，英雄最終沒來打救。 時光冉冉，瘋人們看電視，見罷神女劉洋在太空倉耍了18秒太極，又來瘋了。 沉醉末日迫近，英雄已死，貝多芬《降E大調第三交響曲「英雄」》；與Lady Gaga 《Monster》，成為最流行的英雄輓歌......玩得太膩，瘋子也有迷失的時候......  某日「神人」貝多芬忽然從天而降，留低錦囊如何造就英雄，瘋人卻越學越瘋、越學越濛......迂迴曲折靈機一觸，瘋子發現：當英雄就要上太空！還要耍太極和跳茶舞。 人看瘋子看人，瘋子思考英雄；也許更有契機

We had also invited Ms Fan Xiaofeng from the Shanghai Ballet performed Giselle. 4. A Modern Ballet “Tears of Nature” performed by members from our dance team.

節目簡介: 1. 「玩具幻想曲」: 由小朋友飾演玩具店內的玩具角色。包括小熊、小公主、小廚師、啦啦隊等等。2. 由本校舞蹈團及精英培訓班演出之現代芭蕾「蝴蝶」。3. 節錄自著名的芭蕾舞選段-包括’睡美人’ '胡桃夾子'’天鵝湖'’ ‘歌碧利亞' ‘女大不中留’及’舞姬’等。更邀請到中國遼寧芭蕾舞團首席舞蹈員王韻及焦洋表演’唐吉訶德’雙人舞。4. 充滿熱鬧氣氛的爵士舞「勁歌勁舞」。

Classical ballet excerpts chosen from Sleeping Beauty, Nutcracker , La Bayadere, Swan Lake, Coppelia & La Fille Ma Gardee. And our guest performers Ms Yun Wang and Mr Yang Jiao from the Liaoning Ballet performed their Grand Pas de Deux from Don Quixote. 4. ‘Rock the Stage’

節目簡介: 很多時候，人們只羨慕成功的喜悅，卻忘掉背後滲透着的血汗和淚水。現在舞團的成績，是十年來各團員經歷無數難以言喻的艱辛，付出許多不為人知的努力而獲得的。十年後的今天，多位創團成員將聯同一群新晉學員，以他們的真誠與夢想，帶領大家用心去感受這十年間的故事，以及故事背後難以忘懷的歲月。現在謹以我們熱愛的舞蹈，化作舞團十歲生日禮物，透過一眾熱情的舞蹈員，獻給陪伴舞團走過這段難忘日子的每一位朋友，並滋潤台下所有觀眾的心靈。
About the Programme: Very often, people only envy the joy of success, but overlook the sweat and tears in behind. The troupe's achievements nowadays, are the results of countless untold hardships and unknown efforts experienced and done by our members for a whole decade. In this performance, a number of founding members joined with a group of budding students, through their sincere and dreams, lead the audiences to feel the story of the troupe in this decade, as well as the stories behind these unforgettable years. Let us turn our favorite dance into the 10-year-old birthday gift for the troupe, for every friends of us who walked through these unforgettable days with us, and for every audiences of this performance.
Venue: Theatre, Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre
venue_en: Theatre, Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre

節目名稱: 多空間「香港歷史系列II 」《舞在圍村─消失中的水牛》」
Programme Name: 2010/11 The Community Cultural Ambassador Scheme  -  Dance at Walled Village
節目簡介: 昔日香港居民以務農為生，用水牛協助犁田耕種。現今農業式微，稻田荒廢，水牛頓無所依。 故事講述一名移居外地的圍村人「大水牛」，回鄉參加「打醮」，與小時候一起耕作的水牛「旺財」重遇。時移世易，人面全非，城市發展不單改變了圍村四周的生態環境，昔日村民簡單純樸的生活也隨之消失，人躺在水牛背上看星的日子不再復見。「旺才」最後因為生存空間一再縮小而走上末路，「大水牛」只能無奈地送上旺財最後一程，並感嘆城市巨輪的無情，心灰已冷，唯在「打醮」最後一天，重遇昔人戀人，最後決定一起投入保育工作。
About the Programme: Hong Kongers used to earn a living on the farm, yet the industry has been declining with farmers turning to other industries, leaving the fascinating work animals abandoned in wildlife.
地點: 錦田吉慶圍 、粉嶺龍躍頭松嶺鄧公祠 、上水鄉廖萬石堂 、元朗屏山鄧氏宗祠、元朗八鄉橫台山遊樂場
Venue: Kat Hing Wai, Kam Tin & Tang Chung Ling Ancestral Hall, Lung Yeuk Tau, Fanling & Liu Man Shek Tong Ancestral Hall, Sheung Shui Heung & Tang Ancestral Hall, Ping Shan, Yuen Long & Wang Toi Shan Playground, Pat Heung, Yuen Long
主辦單位: 康文署 - 觀眾拓展辦事處
相關節目: 2012年社區文化大使計劃《舞在圍村II-阿牛回來了！》
venue.1:
錦田吉慶圍
粉嶺龍躍頭松嶺鄧公祠
上水鄉廖萬石堂

Programme Name: The Story of Island and Boat Hong Kong 2011
節目簡介: 香港在尚未發展成為今日的繁華城市之前，是一個與海有密切關係的小漁港。而被海洋分隔著又與我們息息相關的就是一個個不同大小的島嶼代表著香港不同時期的發展和歷史，孕育出香港獨有的文化。而連接著這些島嶼及至遠大海洋的是一艘艘不同大小的船隻，它們記載及經歷著香港人為理想與目標而努力奮鬥、為生活與大自然掙扎求生的一段段感人故事。《香港船與島的故事2011》演出以現代舞為主，並結合東西方表演程式，加上強勁之中國敲擊及說書﹕當中以天后（媽祖）角色串連整個演出，帶出香港發展的歷史並述說香港人奮鬥的故事。
About the Programme: The Story of Island and Boat – Hong Kong was conceived in 2003, when SARS and the economic downturn weighed on people’s minds.This dance theatre piece recalled the history of Hong Kong, evoking the collective memories of different generations. The narrated stories and danced images revealed the Hong Kong spirit of perseverance and resilience. Hong Kong began as a fishing harbour whose people lived in close proximity to the sea. The many islands were connected by boats, which carried thepeople of Hong Kong as they strove for a better life.And so they were witnesses to the people’s sweat and tears as Hong Kong developed into a bustling metropolis and evolved a distinct culture. They were vessels containing moving stories of struggles against the forces of nature, and of striving for their ideals. The Story of Island and Boat – Hong Kong combined East and West, old and new on one stage. Modern dance met powerful Chinese percussions and “syut syu” storytelling, the southern Chinese folk performance tradition. The character of Goddess Tin Hau weaved the many theatrical elements together, to bring out the stories of Hong Kong.
Venue: Auditorium, Yuen Long Theatre
Choreographers: Victor Ma Choi Wo, Mandy Ming Yin Yim
venue_en: Yuen Long Theatre, Auditorium

節目名稱: 「任玩任跳日」舞蹈試身室、「閑情星期日」舞蹈欣賞及講座
地點: 元朗劇院大堂及演講室
Venue: Yuen Long Theatre, Exhibition Corner & Lecture Room
venue.1: 元朗劇院大堂及演講室
venue_en: Yuen Long Theatre, Exhibition Corner & Lecture Room

節目簡介: 身體在吸納膨脹，我們在空間中不停兜兜轉轉，身份不停在更替轉換……！人生不斷在尋找，真實的、虛假的、純正的、完美無瑕的，我們生活的這一刻轉眼就成為過去，時間/事情沒法凝固停留，生命最終只是一個過程……唯有活在當下。 《身體、空間與身份IV》以肢體創作為主體，利用劇場及客觀的環境空間，結合現場音樂、舞蹈、錄像投影以及互動媒體，讓身體與身份在有限空間中碰撞出意義，一同探索人生的奧妙。
About the Programme: At the core of Body, I.D. & Space IV is innovation by exploring limb movements. Then, by virtue of the theatre and objective space, and by assimilating live music, dance, video projection and interactive media, the body and identity clash in the limited space. Meaning is born. And together, we explore all the mysteries of life. Body, I.D., Space I, II and III were presented at the Dashanzi International Arts Festival (2005) in Beijing, and the OCAT Contemporary Dance Festival (2009) in Shenzhen.
地點: 香港兆基創意書院多媒體劇場及創意大道
Venue: Multi-Media Theatre, HKICC Lee Shau Kee School of Creativity
主辦單位: 康文署 - 文化節目組

節目名稱: 元朗劇院場地伙伴計劃節目：《昏迷 II – 尋找失去的感覺》2012
Programme Name: Unconscious II – In Search of the Forgotten Senses 2012
節目簡介: 「多空間」藝術總監馬才和創作《昏迷I—甦醒》及《昏迷II—尋找失去的感覺》首演於1997年，舞作沉澱15年，今年再次「甦醒」。馬才和將聯同擅於民間唱腔的土家族舞者彭漲、「過江龍」黃磊，加上尺八高手陳偉光，帶領6位本地、海外舞壇新進及一眾化身成土地泥人的演出者，喚醒「昏迷」的都市人，與你一同回味九七，探索生命真諦。
About the Programme: Spirits rose from the dust of the fields and entered the concrete jungle of the fast encroaching city.Here, they searched for remnants of love for the land, some sense of belonging. Amidst the crowds of rushing, colliding city dwellers, they discovered that everyone is searching, and everyone is lost…
Venue: Auditorium, Yuen Long Theatre
Choreographers: Victor Ma Choi Wo & Mandy Ming Yin Yim
venue_en: Yuen Long Theatre, Auditorium

節目名稱: 多空間《舞在圍村II - 阿牛回來了！》工作坊
Programme Name: The Community Cultural Ambassador Scheme 2010 Dance at Walled Village The Return of the Buffalo! Workshop
節目簡介: 「舞在圍村II－阿牛回來了！」計劃延續2010年「香港歷史系列II－舞在圍村－消失中的水牛」的使命，發掘具本土文化特色的社區及地點，將當代藝術推介給普羅大眾，除將現代舞再次推廣至圍村，更鼓勵生活在城市的香港人走進不同的社區，領略不一樣的地區特色，保留具有香港本土特色的文化，推動可持續發展理念。主舞台演出－《舞在圍村II－阿牛回來了！》，透過現代舞及舞蹈劇場，將圍村及新界發展故事一一呈現，帶出可持續發展之理念；鼓舞圍村大巡遊，樂師及舞者將帶領群眾於圍村進行鼓舞大巡遊；舞蹈你點睇？》舞蹈示範 ，演後之舞蹈示範
About the Programme: This is a story about a villager who had emigrated many years now return and meets an old love; two of them work for culture preservation together.Percussion Parade, Dance demonstration , Walled village Dance Happening: Site Specific Dance,Live Music installation,Street Performance and Performance Art and, Exhibition of photos taken by Community Dance Ambassador

Programme Name: The Dream of Pu Song Ling
節目簡介: 離留於人世與幻境，隨妖婆重遊異境，步入花海、山麓、如夢如幻。鯨魚在一呼一吸間化身為人，一步一步進入永恆的聊齋異境。
About the Programme: Intoxicated in a supernatural dream, a journey blossoms for Pu Song Ling where loneliness, seduction, yearnings, deception and curiosity bring adventure and surprises.
Venue: Theatre Y, Y-Space
venue_en: Y-Space, Theatre Y

節目名稱: 《活化八鄉舞蹈及音樂即興表演》
節目簡介: 「地區表演 活化八鄉」. 舞團「多空間」和八鄉綠色生活社九月份於西鐵站安排了三場舞蹈和音樂即興表演，希望與八鄉錦田的居民一起，活化西鐵站的閒置地方，豐富居民的文藝生活。昨日傍晚，來自加拿大、南韓、法國和香港的舞者和樂手，一共演出了三場即興環境舞蹈，吸引了很多居民駐足欣賞。
地點: 錦上路港鐵站外之空地

節目名稱: 《種‧好生活永續栽培(樸門)嘉年華》
節目簡介: 「種‧好生活 -永續栽培﹙樸門﹚嘉年華」於本年11月17日至18日，於嘉道理農場暨植物園舉行，讓大家學習永續生活及農業，一同體驗永續栽培的精神。當日園內設有本土公平市場，售賣本地有機產品及手工藝品等。我們更預備了一系列的講座及工作坊，包括「種‧綠牆」工作坊、「種‧好生活」工作坊及傳統手藝工作坊，更邀來各地正從事永續栽培的人士，分享他們的生活及農業經驗，為水泥都市重新注入清新空氣，帶來自然正能量。更邀來本地的創意人士，於本園下山區的不同地點，即興作音樂和藝術表演，「多空間」於11月17日在嘉道理農場暨植物園
地點: 嘉道理農場暨植物園生態池
Venue: Kadoorie Farm and Botanic Garden Wildlife Pond

節目名稱: 盈彩楓姿2011《樂韻舞躍宋王臺》
節目簡介: 以（盈彩楓姿）命名的舞蹈演出活動，自04年起共舉辦了五場演出。主題及構思均經刻意精選。目的有二；一. 讓當代青少年了解中國國家民族，繼承及延續中國的民族文化藝術，共構和諧社會。二. 以香港本土題材為本，讓青少年從過程中了解香港文化及地理歷史。 這台演出是繼2009年小舞劇（望夫石）後的第二台本土原創作品。以極其有限的資源，盡量做到最好。在新聲國樂團邱少彬總監的熱誠支持下，本着共同的理想，第二個原創小舞劇（宋王臺）順利完成，再加上前後臺熱心的工作入員衷誠合作，成功完成整個演出。
Venue: Auditorium, Tsuen Wan Town Hall
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium
