節目名稱: 米蘭史卡拉歌劇院芭蕾舞團《吉賽爾》
節目簡介: 擁有超過230年歷史的史卡拉歌劇院芭蕾舞團，孕育不少國際芭蕾舞星如Carla Fracci、Massimo Murru及去年隨美國芭蕾舞劇院來港獻技的波雷(Roberto Bolle)。2014年舞團訪港，將率領六十多位頂尖舞者，演繹《吉賽爾》這個至死不渝的淒美愛情舞劇。《吉賽爾》是舞迷的至愛，而吉賽爾一角更是每個女舞者夢寐以求的角色。第一幕濃罩著一片熱鬧氣氛，農家女吉賽爾愛上為了逃婚喬裝平民到村落的王子，吉賽爾跳脫的舞步，王子那雀躍輕快的神采，令人陶醉。但當吉賽爾得悉王子的身份，傷心欲絶，狂舞瘋癲至死。
About the Programme: From Milan's legendary lyric theatre, La Scala Ballet returns to Hong Kong in top form with a huge corps, a stellar cast and a classic from its repertoire, Giselle.  A masterpiece of which audiences never tire – sumptuous, beautiful and melancholy – Gisel
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre

節目簡介: 要數美國史上重要的藝術家，崔莎．布朗必然入選。出身於上世紀六、七十年代，跟羅拔．威爾遜、菲力普．格拉斯（《沙灘上的愛恩斯坦》，2013香港藝術節）、羅森伯格等一起打造美國藝術文化的躍動時代。布朗不囿於傳統框框，以其著名的「布朗風格」：反地心吸力，流麗的肢體動作，巧妙的幾何構圖編排，以及強烈的視覺元素，獨步舞林。馬克．莫里斯、大衛．哥頓等著名編舞亦坦言受其影響。編舞四十年，百多部創作不乏與各界藝術名家如羅森伯格、羅俐．安德遜及巴里殊尼哥夫等的合作。多個著名藝團如巴黎歌劇院芭蕾舞團亦委約其創作。布朗宣佈退休後
About the Programme: Trisha Brown, restless innovator, creator of more than one hundred choreographic works, a genius acclaimed as much by the world of art as of dance. She is the recipient of countless honours including a Bessie ‘Lifetime Achievement Award' and her formidabl
Venue: Lyric Theatre, The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts

節目名稱: 蘇格蘭芭蕾舞團《仙凡之戀搖滾激情篇》
節目簡介: 五度奪得羅蘭士．奧利花大獎的英國超人氣編舞家及音樂劇導演馬修．伯恩，拿手好戲是將經典芭蕾注入時代美感和前衛精神，將芭蕾舞帶給廣大觀眾。他的全男版《天鵝湖》、《睡公主》皆膾炙人口，廣受世界觀眾歡迎。伯恩1994年的浪漫芭蕾《仙凡之戀   –   搖滾激情篇》，改編自芭蕾舞歷史上第一部浪漫芭蕾經典，故事雖仍發生在蘇格蘭，但唱著民謠的十九世紀鄉郊，變成二十世紀六十年代激情青春的格拉斯哥。敢愛敢做，放縱不羈的男主人翁，與搖滾仙女的愛情更熱情奔放；蘇格蘭高地舞、樂與怒辣身舞、浪漫的芭蕾雙人舞，伯恩全新版本的《仙凡之

節目簡介: 當今國際舞壇神級編舞尤裡．季利安獨特的新古典芭蕾風格不僅令他獲獎無數，成為編舞、舞者及舞迷的偶像，各大舞團紛紛搬演其舞作。出任荷蘭舞蹈劇場藝術總監三十年的季利安，一手帶領舞團躋身國際舞壇名牌前列。多年老拍檔，舞而優則編的前荷蘭舞蹈劇場舞者米高．舒馬卡，與季利安合編了《最後的第一次觸動》，契訶夫式的黯然戲劇氛圍下，六位舞蹈技巧高超的前荷蘭舞蹈劇場台柱，包括 Sabine Kupferberg、David Krugel、舒馬卡自己等，以少一分功力都做不到的嚴謹身體操控，在古典雅致的客廳場景中，以優雅舒緩的動作
About the Programme: Unfolding  through  dance  and  wordless  drama,  Last  Touch  First  is  a  highly atmospheric, intimate and sepia-toned mystery. In an eerie, late 19th century drawing room where the furniture is shrouded in dust covers, six characters, each caught up i
Venue: Auditorium, Kwai Tsing Theatre

Programme Name: Igor Moiseyev State Academic Ensemble of Popular Dance (Russia)
節目簡介: 台上七十位活力澎湃的舞者，隨著輕快的節奏，以高難度的舞技，整齊的舞步，散發著豪邁奔放、剽悍的民族魅力，令觀眾站立叫囂的，他們就是俄羅斯國寶級舞團莫伊謝耶夫舞團。舞團由俄羅斯「輝煌的舞蹈家」莫伊謝耶夫創辦，團員均具古典芭蕾的深厚根基，男的跳得勁度十足、剛柔並濟，女的跳起來輕快有致、感情豐富，男女互相笑著唱著，觀眾席上掌聲如雷，令大小觀眾看得嘖嘖稱奇，整個劇院洋溢著歡樂的氣氛。擁有七十六年歷史的舞團，演遍六十多個國家，演出的民俗舞種類甚豐，由地道的俄羅斯歌舞，到西班牙火辣辣的旋轉舞，甚至阿根廷活潑輕快的牛仔舞
About the Programme: Energy, colour, action! Igor Moiseyev Ballet (Russia) will lift you out of your seat.  Honoured as the People's Artist of the Soviet Union, Igor Moiseyev is one of the most highly decorated artists at home and a unique choreographer anywhere in the world.
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre

節目簡介: 許冠傑唱：「從前有個人叫莫大毛，日日攤響屋企等米路，神神化化作風虛無，又唔願剃鬚……」 他，龍的傳人、香港市民、李小龍和許冠傑的忠實fans，為生計用盡法寶，扭盡六壬。 小人物。大社會 工廈中的城市縮影 《莫大毛》籍一個市井人物，聚焦道出大眾香港人的現實寫照。將工廈的排練室轉化成不同城市縮影，場景驟眼似是你我日常經過的某些角落。觀眾隨莫大毛的脈搏起伏流動，轉換視線角度，一夥投入在他的生活當中。

Programme Name: Akram Khan Company - Itmoi (In The Mind of Igor)
節目簡介: 最火紅編舞延續世紀之作《春之祭》的騷動  百年前由史達拉汶斯基撰寫，尼金斯基編舞的《春之祭》震驚藝壇，首演引起巴黎舞迷騷動，如今已被公認為藝術史上革命性的一頁。2013年，全球展開《春之祭》百年紀念活動，當今舞壇最火紅的名字，英國編舞家艾甘．漢亦以《春之祭》式的莽撞能量及活力，結合其獨特的旋風式舞蹈風格，編成《思想伊戈：百年春之祭》，向作曲家及作品致敬。此作於2013年五月在倫敦首演，評論及觀眾反應熱烈。艾甘．漢將印度傳統卡塔克舞技巧融入現代舞，創立只此一家的舞蹈風格，更憑獨舞《源》摘下羅蘭士．奧利花大獎
About the Programme: At its Paris premiere one hundred years ago, Igor Stravinsky's The Rite of Spring famously sparked riots in the theatre. It shattered conventions about what was ‘acceptable' music and dance. Commissioned as a contemporary response to that iconoclastic mil
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: Grand Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 香港舞蹈團聯同中央民族大學舞蹈學院的國家級創作團隊，帶來中國少數民族舞蹈精品《舞韻天地》，涵蓋藏、彝、傣、佤、維吾爾等多個民族的舞蹈精華，有讚頌大自然的藏族舞《牛背搖籃》，具濃郁邊塞氣息的維吾爾族群舞《鷹之歌》，雲南傣族姑娘在瀾滄江畔跳的《水鄉》，佤族民間「甩髮舞」《佤山火》等共11隻各具民族特色的舞蹈。歡騰跳躍的節奏，激發熱血沸騰的情感！《舞韻天地》給觀眾帶來一席蘊含深厚歷史文化內涵的舞蹈盛宴。
About the Programme: Showcasing over 10 ethnic dances, the performance offers a rare glimpse into the lives of Chinese ethnic groups, with exquisite costumes and music that reflect each group's unique characteristics.
Venue: Auditorium, Kwai Tsing Theatre

Programme Name: Tanztheater Wuppertal Pina Bausch - Iphigenia In Tauris
節目簡介: 又一舉世矚目經典出現香港藝術節舞台  翩娜．包殊，二十世紀最偉大的藝術家之一，舞蹈劇場的開創人物，創作影響力無遠弗屆，超越舞蹈界限，遍及戲劇、視藝、文學、電影、時裝、建築等藝術 及創意範疇。每次演出都是城中盛事，不管文化藝術精英，還是社會上的潮人型士，粉絲不計其數。翩娜作品一向結構宏大，而代表作之一，1974年首演的《死而復生的伊菲格尼》 更堪稱巨構中的巨構：結合舞者、合唱團、世界級演唱家及管弦樂團現場演奏來演繹葛路克同名歌劇，氣勢磅礡。由於製作龐大，難得搬演，海外演出不足十次，亮相的都是聲譽甚隆的藝術節
About the Programme: If you only see one show this year, it has to be this rarely staged masterpiece.  Premiered in 1974 by one of the most important choreographers of our time, Pina Bausch's Iphigenia in Tauris takes Gluck's glorious 1781 opera to new heights of dramatic int
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre

venue_en: Grand Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 李仁秀2003年加入荷蘭編舞大師Emio Greco的舞團，回國後為LDP舞團贏得多個編舞大獎。《現代感覺》是李仁秀自組舞團EDx2後備受注目的作品，他將跆拳道、武術、hip hop、即興舞蹈及雜技融入作品，兩個猛男的對峙、膠著、格鬥，既幽默又富戲劇性。此作在2011年首屆北京國際芭蕾舞暨編舞比賽中奪得金獎殊榮，更獲得最受觀眾歡迎編舞獎，評審之一的編舞家林懷民亦盛讚他為「足以形成台風威力的氣旋。」

Venue: Black Box Theatre, Kwai Tsing Theatre

節目名稱: 《香港賽馬會當代舞蹈平台系列》
Programme Name: The Hong Kong Jockey Club Contemporary Dance Series
節目簡介: 香港藝術節再次撮合本地舞壇精英，第三年炮製香港賽馬會當代舞蹈平台系列：資深編舞家邢亮帶領兩位年青舞者尋找男女關係的微妙、優秀編舞黃磊與舞者楊怡孜合演愛情拼圖遊戲、再度參與此系列的楊浩帶來自編自演作品、編舞作品足跡遍歐美亞的黃靜婷、曾於荷蘭進修當代編舞的林俊浩，加上香港作曲家為這些新作度身訂造音樂，展現本地舞蹈新景象。

節目簡介: 兩個來自北歐的編舞大女孩，帶來兩個得意作品，舞蹈中添加了意想不到的 元素，絕非舞蹈咁簡單。於2010年獲選為芬蘭年度舞蹈家的皮裡恩，能歌擅舞，喜融合古典音樂及 多媒體藝術表現她那趣致的創作。《鋼琴家的戀人》被歐洲最潮舞蹈網絡 Aerowaves選為2012年度二十大最佳作品。皮裡恩自彈自唱，手舞足蹈把喜 怒哀樂展現於身體每個部份，有時更撩逗觀眾，玩味十足。瑞典著名編舞及電影導演海爾布隆，編舞風格獨特，多齣短片更獲獎無數。 她為《這不是愛情故事》添上公路電影情節 ─ 一對錯配男女，跳著唱著說著，齊齊踏上無止

Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre

節目名稱: 何必‧館《空凳上的書簡2︰繼續書寫》﹝香港版﹞
Programme Name: Special Delivery 2: Politely Intractable Still By Ho Bit Goon
節目簡介: 一個由你來完成的裝置劇場 一起體味被囚禁十一個年頭的滋味 和當中可冀盼的自由 何應豐承接2013年與台灣莫比斯圓環創作公社合作《空凳上的書簡》的經驗，繼續藉哈維爾的《獄中書簡》延伸想像。一九七九年，捷克前總理哈維爾因政治入罪被監禁，他以書寫重新審視自己，讓心靈在被囚的身體中自由高歌。二零一四年，香港人以自由身軀行走在日漸成形的精神樊籬內，無睹自由遠離的腳步，難道必須身陷囫圇，才聽得到心靈之聲？
About the Programme: An installation theatre performance of which you are the final piece of the puzzle. Experience for yourself what it means to be jailed for 11 years. What kind of freedom could you possibly hope for?

節目簡介: 黃狄文繼《別有洞天》後再度操刀，夥拍著名時裝設計師陳刀及音樂達人沈樂民攜手炮製新作，將微觀起伏思潮、透視身體結構，衝擊觀眾的視聽細胞，一起探索錯綜複雜的微觀世界。
About the Programme: After his full-length debut Blind Chance, Dominic Wong advances his choreography in this follow-up piece. He collaborates with fashion designer Chen Dao to explore the microscopic world of sense and sensibility, with emotionally charged music by emerging composer Shum Lok-man.   This new work is inspired by the sensibility and infrastructure of our body. Communication and connection between cranial nerve cells happen through neurotransmitters, of which there are a great variety of types, functions and formations.

節目簡介: 《舞．聲．道》二部曲是一個結合道家思想的音像裝置展。多媒體與聲音裝置按照中國道家哲學的九宮、八卦和五行佈局而設，參觀者可以透過操作特別研發的應用程式，依據自身生肖屬性，參與一場互動遊戲，於音樂、環境聲音及影像互動中走一段私密的旅程，在煩囂的都市中重獲一片安祥、寧謐。
About the Programme: Momentum II is a sound and video installation exhibition that fuses with Taoism. Multimedia and sound installations are laid out according to Taoist concepts of Nine Halls Diagram, Eight Trigrams and Five Elements. Visitors are invited to take part in an interactive game based on their own Chinese zodiac signs on a tailor-made App, and find quietness and serenity in this loud and bustling city on this private journey.
Venue: 1a Space, Cattle Depot Artist Village

節目名稱: 「漫音‧漫步‧」藝術節－跟上心靈的腳步：中西方舞蹈文化之旅
Programme Name: Get On Your Feet: A Cultural Journey Of Dance Fusion
節目簡介: 壹個集娛樂觀賞性和觀衆互動性於壹身的表演，把舞蹈與視頻藝術和戲劇巧妙地結合在壹起。佛拉明哥，印度舞，夏威夷舞，街舞等等多樣性的舞蹈元素讓妳大飽眼福，享受視覺的盛宴。觀衆們將會在觀賞表演中體驗壹場富有教育意義的橫貫中西的文化之旅。准備好妳的雙腳，每個人都可以盡情的享受舞蹈的樂趣！
About the Programme: An entertaining night of performance showcases a fusion of dance, video art and drama, choreographed by Dr. Rochelle Yang and Max Willi. Be prepared to watch their imaginative, interactive combination of dance style.
Venue: Underground Theatre, The Fringe Club
Production / Performing Unit: MA in Cultural Management Programme, CUHK

節目名稱: 芭蕾舞台全接觸：《睡美人》
Programme Name: Ballet Theatre Camp:  The Sleeping Beauty
節目簡介: 今年復活節，讓您的小朋友進入這個經典的芭蕾舞童話故事，與睡美人和所有夢幻角色一同踏上魔幻奇妙之旅。芭蕾舞台全接觸：《睡美人》是一個充滿啟發性和教育性的三天互動工作坊。專為4-12之兒童而設，讓學員親身領會製作芭蕾舞劇的各種元素，體驗互動工作坊的樂趣。參加者無須舞蹈經驗。  創作起飛: 發揮無限創意，了解舞劇中的默劇和演技 幕後探索: 活學活用，動手製作及觀賞獨特服飾和道具 故事解構: 探討動人情節，經典角色活現眼前 聆聽: 細意聆聽，剖析經典柴可夫斯基的芭蕾組曲 律動: 與香港芭蕾舞團舞蹈員跳出曼妙芭蕾"
About the Programme: This Easter send your child on a magical journey with The Sleeping Beauty and all of the enchanted characters from this classical fairytale ballet. Ballet Theatre Camp: The Sleeping Beauty is an inspiring and educational three-day camp that explores creativity and dance. Children aged 4-12 will love getting involved in the fun, interactive workshops, and learning about all aspects of the theatrical experience of ballet. No dance experience is required.  Creativity: express your dramatic side through mime and acting Behind-the-scenes: try making your own sets, props, costumes and accessories Storytelling: understand more about the characters and story of the ballet Music: find out more about Tchaikovsky' s enchanting score Movement: cultivate your movement skills by learning ballet steps with The Hong Kong Ballet dancers"

Programme Name: The Peacock, A Dance Drama By Yang Liping
節目簡介: 全劇分為〈春）、〈夏）、〈秋）、〈冬）四個篇章，是一個關於成長、人性、生命和愛、以及生命與天地自然相互融通的故事，看似一個古老的寓言，卻直指現代人矛盾脆弱的內心。
About the Programme: In four parts: Spring, Summer, Autumn and Winter. It is about maturation, human nature, living and love as well as the interplay and fusion between life and cosmic forces, at once a story about a peacock and more so an allegory for humanity.

節目簡介: 「終於我來到這裏，它就承載起我所有的重量。一路以來的流浪，讓我從黑暗中看到黑暗，像黑洞吞噬和包容一切一樣……」游弋者的旅程，究竟是蹣跚跌盪還是自由飄盪？舞者的身體影像游弋生命軌跡，以肢體舞動回應與舞台對話，讓觀眾的視覺跟隨游弋者在七米的圓形舞台上起伏，放開緊迫的身形接受當下的變形。
About the Programme: If life comes full circle, are we going away from the start or heading towards the end? On a movable 7-metre diameter circular stage with gravity as their ally and enemy, four dancers tumble and stumble their way to portray life’s motions and emotions. In the midst of motions and convulsions, what does it mean to be grounded?  In the choppy voyage of life, are we merely a roly-poly toy? A disoriented spinning top? Or a wanderer with a compass in hand?
Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
Others: post-performance meet-the-artist session 2014/04/25

節目名稱: 法國五月藝術節 2014 — 地中海尼斯歌劇院芭蕾舞團《馬可孛羅》（贊助節目）
Programme Name: Le French May 2014 - Marco Polo by Nice Méditerranée Opera Ballet (Sponsored Programme)
節目簡介: 根據伊他路 · 卡爾維諾原著小說《看不見的城市》(Invisible Cities) 所改編， 《馬可孛羅》(Marco Polo)—路斯安諾 · 加里圖的一部舞蹈史詩，由舞蹈家艾力 · 費安提供藝術指導—不僅是對於人文主義的讚歌，更是與心靈的相遇，讓我們對世界觸手可及。 關於《馬可孛羅》 在東方調性之中，融入了古典的詞彙和舞蹈元素。這套芭蕾舞劇能帶領我們展開一趟充滿異國色彩的奇幻旅程，並向我們述說想要征服、統治全世界的忽必烈皇帝，與馬可孛羅這位樂於探索新的民族、文化與城市的威尼斯探險家之間的文化碰撞。
About the Programme: Based on the novel Invisible Cities by Italo Calvino, Marco Polo – a choreographic epic by Luciano Cannito under the artistic direction of Eric Vu-An – is a hymn to humanism and the spirit of an encounter that puts the world within our reach.   Marco Polo  A fusion of classical vocabulary and dance with undertones of the Orient, this ballet propels us into a magical journey filled with exoticism, and tells the story of the clash between the emperor Kublai Khan, who wants to enslave the world in his power, and Marco Polo, the Venetian explorer who relishes discovering new people, cultures and cities.   The success of this piece lays in capturing these two contrary visions through the dance and movements of each character. Whereas the emperor retains a hieratic attitude and remains deaf to reality, Marco Polo is occupied by his enthusiastic perception of life; he leaps and twirls to better celebrate the magic of the world, an ocean of possibilities that no man can ever imprison.
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
主辦單位: 法國駐香港及澳門總領事館
Presenter: Consulate General of France In Hong Kong and Macau
製作/演出單位: 地中海尼斯歌劇院芭蕾舞團
venue_en: Grand Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 敦煌美舞乃萃取自聞名於世的敦煌石窟藝術，將靜態的敦煌之美，轉化為動態的舞姿與場景，具體而微呈現出敦煌石窟豐厚的精神文化與藝術內涵。敦煌美舞是一項美麗與意境的結合，舞蹈設計是將敦煌壁畫中的原形予以轉化，動態地再現於舞台上，將千年來的敦煌藝術之美與其深厚的內涵，舞出石窟，呈現在觀眾面前。 舞碼～敦煌石窟、天宮盛舞、白衣觀音、莊嚴僧寶、蓮花童子、胡旋巾舞、曼陀羅之舞、伎樂飛天等。
About the Programme: Dunhuang Beautiful Dance is a reproduction of the culture and the history. The dances unveil l the mysterious Dunhuang and bring the cave paintings to live to the audience.
Venue: Auditorium, Yuen Long Theatre
venue_en: Yuen Long Theatre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 結界達人 節目簡介 結界達人主辦： 多媒體街舞盛宴- F.L.O.W. 圖‧花‧緣 醉生夢死緣未盡 ‧亂舞紅塵圓何來 結界達人再一次帶領觀眾親歷生與死的瘋狂探索旅程。 十位不同表演藝術背景的新世代，以生命之花 (Flower of Life)為題，將以富有娛樂性的綜藝節目形式, 配合環境舞蹈跟裝置藝術的表演空間, 共融創造岀一個奇幻而本地前所未見的街舞劇場。 生命無常，你仲夠唔夠膽玩多鋪？！

節目簡介: 香港芭蕾舞團的《芭蕾精品 2014》搜羅多部短篇傑作，不同風格的舞蹈作品相輔相成，讓舞團的舞蹈員盡展所長，發揮過人才藝。演出將由米高•傅金極具古典風格的「白色芭蕾」作品《林中仙子》作序幕，配以現場伴奏的蕭邦浪漫醉人鋼琴作品; 緊接著是芭蕾匯演,將邀請世界級芭蕾舞巨星與港芭一眾舞蹈員演出一系列精彩舞蹈。最後, 舞團將以當今最矚目的編舞家之一、波士頓芭蕾舞團駐團編舞家卓瑪•伊羅編創的全新劇目，為這場芭蕾精品劃上完美的句號。
About the Programme: The Hong Kong Ballet presents an anthology of short ballets that have been specially selected to complement each other and to showcase the outstanding talents and strengths of the Company’s dancers. The show will open with Michel Fokine’s Les Sylphides, an abstract “ballet blanc” in a classical style, accompanied live on stage by Chopin’s delightful piano music; a mini-gala will follow, featuring international guest stars. The finale of this delightful programme will be the world première of a work, commissioned by The Hong Kong Ballet, from Jorma Elo, resident choreographer of Boston Ballet and undoubtedly one of today’s most sought-after choreographers.
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
編舞: 《林中仙子》- 編舞: 米高霍根 FINDING LIGHT (PAS DE DEUX) - 編舞：梁殷實 《海盜》第二幕雙人舞選段- 編舞：佩蒂巴及華赫坦查布奇安尼 FIVE MOVEMENTS, THREE REPEATS (PAS DE DEUX) - 編舞：基斯杜化韋爾登 SHAPE OF GLOW - 編舞：卓瑪伊羅
Choreographers: LES SYLPHIDES - Choreographer：MICHEL FOKINE FINDING LIGHT (PAS DE DEUX) - Choreographer: EDWAARD LIANG LE CORSAIRE (PAS DE DEUX FROM ACT II)- Choreographers : MARIUS PETIPA & VAKHTANG CHABUKIANI FIVE MOVEMENTS, THREE REPEATS (PAS DE DEUX) - Choreographer:
其他: 《林中仙子》 總排練者：歐美蓮 音樂：蕭邦 現場鋼琴伴奏：陳德堯 / 劉智聰 燈光設計：吳文安   FINDING LIGHT (PAS DE DEUX) 音樂：韋華第《B大調協奏曲》 服裝設計：Mark Zappone 燈光設計：Adam Carrée 燈光執行：吳文安  《海盜》第二幕雙人舞選段 音樂：阿道費阿當及列卡度德里高  服裝：鳴謝瑞典皇家芭蕾舞團 燈光設計：吳文安  FIVE MOV

節目名稱: 《中國舞多面睇》教育導賞演出
Programme Name: Let’s Dance On Stage Educational Dance Performance
節目簡介: 選演多個香港舞蹈團作品選段及民族舞蹈，希望加深觀眾舞團的認誻及開拓大眾對中國舞蹈發展的視野。節目加插介紹作品的創作背景，並解說舞蹈特色。歡迎現場觀眾上台試玩舞蹈道具、學跳民族舞，全方位認識及感受中國舞蹈藝術。
Venue: Auditorium, Tsuen Wan Town Hall
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈團—外展及教育部
Presenter: Hong Kong Dance Company-Outreach & Education Department
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium

節目名稱: 法國五月藝術節 2014 — Pockemon Crew《And...action!》
Programme Name: Le French May 2014 - And... action! by Pockemon Crew (Sponsored Programme)
節目簡介: 世界嘻哈街舞大賽冠軍隊伍Pockemon Crew將首次來到香港，展現他們的最新作品「And …action!」。他們來自法國里昂，這座城市同時也是電影的誕生地；舞者們將會帶觀眾回到上世紀 30、40 年代的電影場景之中，在原創作品中融入了嘻哈街舞、電影及音樂，並帶來驚艷無比的效果。關於「And…action!」靈感來自於上世紀30、40年代的美國電影與音樂劇，舞團的最新創作便是為了向當時的電影及百老匯音樂劇的舞蹈表演致敬，因為最初的嘻哈運動正是受此影響。活力四射、極盡各種高難度技巧的舞蹈表現—這個充滿活躍生命力的舞團是由 6 名舞者所組成，他們混合了多種類型與風格，將帶給您獨一無二的舞蹈體驗。
About the Programme: World hip hop dance champions Pockemon Crew visit Hong Kong for the first time to show their latest production, And action! Originally from Lyon – the city where cinema was born – the dancers take us back to film sets of the 1930s and 40s for an original piece that fuses hip hop, cinema and musical with spectacular results. 「And action!」 Inspired by American movies and musicals from the 1930s and 40s, the latest creation from the company is a tribute to cinema and homage to the dance performed in Broadway theatres at the time, which influenced the first hip hop movement. Full of energy and acrobatics, this vivacious piece with 6 dancers mixes genres and styles for a unique choreographic experience.
Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
主辦單位: 法國駐香港及澳門總領事館
Presenter: Consulate General of France In Hong Kong and Macau
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目名稱: 北京舞蹈學院中國舞等級考試課程結業演出《摩登舞衣》
Programme Name: Beijing Dance Academy Chinese Dance Graded Examination Course Graduation Performance Shining Dance Dress
節目簡介: 水銀燈下流轉的小舞影，變幻出彩麗的民族圖騰  香港舞蹈團外展及教育部「北京舞蹈學院中國舞等級考試課程」結業演出。200多位5—16歲的小舞蹈員在台上展現稚氣童真的舞步，帶來目不暇給的點點亮麗舞影與斑斕的民族風情！  透過香港舞蹈團外展及教育部的專業舞蹈培訓課程，學員不但在考試中獲取佳績，更會穿上了絢麗多彩的民族舞衣，踏上台板演繹各具特色的中國民族舞，帶來片片歡樂童謠。
About the Programme: After years of professional dance training, about 200 graduates aged 5 to 16 of Hong Kong Dance Company Outreach and Education ‘Beijing Dance Academy Chinese Dance Graded Examination Course’ have received outstanding examination results. In the graduation show, the little talents dressed in bright ethnic costumes will show off their best moves on stage, you can hardly take your eyes off!
Venue: Auditorium, Tsuen Wan Town Hall
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈團—外展及教育部
Presenter: Hong Kong Dance Company-Outreach & Education Department
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium

Programme Name: Made in Hong Kong by Hugh Cho
節目簡介: 一個made in Hong Kong嘅八十後男人浪漫之作:八十後男人要什麼……我們該如何努力，才能達到「三十而立」。是這社會走得太快，還是我走得太慢。我一路想……一路想……或許，「翻一翻」用另一個角度去看， 我能感受我在生活，不是生存。Keep calm and carry on.
About the Programme: A romantic work by a man of the post 80s:What do men born in the 1980s need…How hard do we need to work in order to achieve independence when we reach 30? Is this society moving too fast, or am I moving too slowly? I keep on thinking, thinking and thinking…Perhaps I need to flip over and see things from another angle, I can feel I am living, not merely surviving. Keep calm and carry on.
Venue: Black Box Theatre, Kwai Tsing Theatre
Others: post-performance meet-the-artist session 2014/05/30
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Black Box Theatre

節目簡介: 天上人間‧幾許情深‧四段關於愛的傳說 以膾炙人口的四個中國民間傳說為創作素材，配合經典樂曲《梁祝小提琴協奏曲》，糅合中國舞氣韻身法，演繹一段段淒美動人的愛情傳說，向恆久不變的愛情致敬。
About the Programme: Based on four timeless Chinese legends of love, the production is a tribute to love by uniting Chinese dance with one of the most famous piece of classical music from 20th century China, The Butterfly Lovers Violin Concerto.  Don’t miss this unique celebration of love, dance and music.
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: Grand Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

venue_en: Theatre, Sheung Wan Civic Centre

節目名稱: 安娜琪舞蹈劇場及三式《第七感官》﹝台灣﹞
Programme Name: Seventh Sense By Anarchy Dance Theatre & Ultra Combos (Taiwan)
節目簡介: 觀眾隨舞者進入新媒體互動領域，遊走於充滿節奏的多元數碼影像世界；感應獨特的視覺效果，沉浸於抽象與無限相互交織的時空。 部分觀眾將於演出期間與舞者共用同一空間，在三十分鐘的演出過程中與舞者及現場環境作互動。其他觀眾則於觀眾席以半參與者的角度來欣賞整場演出。
About the Programme: Motion-detection and projection-mapping create a high-tech space which is interacting with the dance movements.  The audience are not merely watching the astonishing visual effects but actively participating in this boundless physical-digital environment
地點: 香港兆基創意書院多媒體劇場
Venue: Multi-Media Theatre, HKICC Lee Shau Kee School of Creativity

節目簡介: 城市當代舞蹈團於2014年戴譽重演桑吉加《那一年．這一天》，此作品於2010香港舞蹈年獎中獲頒「最值得表揚編舞」及「最值得表揚製作」兩個獎項，曾獲邀到北京、廣州、新加坡及佛羅倫斯上演。《那一年．這一天》以尋找被時間摧毀的記憶為題，加上桑吉加編創澎湃的肢體語彙，在李勁松充滿張力的電子音樂及楊振業動錄像中，探索記憶的真實性。
About the Programme: Having won two 2010 Hong Kong Dance Awards (“Outstanding Dance Production” and “Outstanding Achievement in Choreography”), the production was also invited to perform in Beijing, Guangzhou, Singapore and Florence. As If To Nothing examines the passage of time in the stream of memories. In this misplaced world, what is real? What is fake? As If To Nothing is an adrenaline-packed and interactive multimedia work featuring electronic music by Dickson Dee and video design by Adrian Yeung. This tour-de-force returns for another breathtaking journey led by CCDC dancers and their extremely physical and emotional performance.
Venue: Auditorium, Kwai Tsing Theatre
其他: 其他相關節目： 圖片展、藝人談
Others: Related Programme： Photo Exhibition, Meet-the-artist
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 「舞蹈青年」(舞青)是城市當代舞蹈團CCDC舞蹈中心多年以來的重點計劃，培養了一代的舞蹈工作者，2002年起不少年輕人在這裡付出熱血與汗水，追求舞道的提昇。他們來自不同的背景，有著不一樣的經歷，但身體裡卻有著相同的舞蹈基因。四位歷屆舞青李嘉雯、黎貴諾、梁思穎、白濰銘初試啼聲，投入編舞的創作世界，把個人的作品搬到劇場裡展演。
地點: CCDC舞蹈中心賽馬會舞蹈小劇場
Venue: CCDC Dance Centre Jockey Club Dance Theatre
編舞: 李嘉雯、黎貴諾、梁思穎、白濰銘
Choreographers: Carman Li, Jasper Lai, Winnie Leung, Ming Pak
venue.1: CCDC舞蹈中心賽馬會舞蹈小劇場
venue_en: CCDC Dance Centre, Jockey Club Dance Theatre

節目簡介: 過往多年，對香港文化藝術的討論都一直集中在「西九」，然而，在香港的不同社區，都有大量的藝術工作者在默默耕耘。在7月7日，三個在東九龍紮根多年的團體，包括進駐牛池灣文娛中心的東邊舞蹈團、九龍城的兆基創意書院及黃大仙的城市當代舞蹈團CCDC舞蹈中心，將會首次攜手聯合主辦「創意城市東邊舞蹈節」，並邀請本地獨立舞蹈工作者及舞蹈單位參與，是民間主導的小型舞蹈節，為舞蹈創作的各方好友提供交流平台，也為觀眾帶來密集的舞蹈活動。當日將會有多個表演節目及工作坊輪流在兆基創意書院的不同空間進行，探索在傳統場地以外進行藝術活動的可能性。
About the Programme: \"East City Creative Dance Festival\" is co-organized by three arts organizations - City Contemporary Dance Company CCDC Dance Centre, HKICC Lee Shau Kee School of Creativity and E-Side Dance Co located in Kowloon East.
Venue: HKICC Lee Shau Kee School of Creativity

編舞: 許俊傑，郭曉靈，黃靜婷，梁芷茵
Choreographers: Cyrus Hui, Elaine Kwok, Chloe Wong, Cherry Leung

節目簡介: 《水舞躍動》探討水與人類的關係，以及水如何在我們生命中，以不同形態包圍著我們。演出在一個向上延伸的巨型弧面上進行，並配合投影技術、大膽的舞蹈，及空中吊索和彈彈繩，舞者與影像的互動渾然天成，呈現出令人驚嘆的世界。

節目簡介: 龐智筠將2013年「購」和「物」為主題的作品《購人心弦》去蕪存菁，「2.0」版本換上更大的舞台，加入劇場好友聲演，重組細膩的舞蹈編排。舞者帶領觀眾遊走物質迷宮的大千世界，與心頭好再度相遇，將當中你我的購物經歷活現眼前，在購物戰場上的試身室或閨房衣櫃內看風景。
About the Programme: CCDC puts Noel Pong’s renewed reflections of premiere production in 2013 onto a larger stage with a new voice over by renowned stage actor and restructured movement rundown. A cast of superb dancers lead audience through a labyrinth of consumer goods as Pong explores the fun, the struggles and the emotions in our shopping experience with humour and insight.
Venue: Auditorium, Kwai Tsing Theatre
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目名稱: 跳格國際舞蹈影像展2014：北京
Programme Name: Jumping Frames International Dance Video Showcase 2014 - Beijing
節目簡介: CCDC藝術總監曹誠淵夥拍資深電影攝影師鍾有添，將2013年在香港演出的舞台作品《尋找大觀園》發展成3D舞蹈電影。以中國名著《紅樓夢》為藍本的環境舞蹈演出穿插不同具香港特色的場景，配以中國評彈音樂，傳統與摩登、古典與現代共冶一爐。更入選本年康城影展「短片角」單元。  委約作品中，大中華地區包括曾入選「第十四屆釜山國際電影節」競賽的獨立導演許雅舒的《哀溺文》、中國年輕獨立藝術家何其沃夥拍《藍宇》的攝影師楊濤拍攝的實驗作品《露西》、北京雷動天下現代舞團舞者郭偉與北京電影學院攝影系的李中葉合作炮製風格寫實質樸，意境溫和愜意的《一天》、新晉編舞李德夥拍資深攝影師霍栢濤以「手」作舞，呈現低頭族生活百態的《Let\'s Say》。  以《艾甘樹》及《然而，我自己》作為「舞蹈紀錄片──東西方對話」的節目，對照當下全球化的東西文化交流對藝術家個人的衝擊。
About the Programme: The Festival Local Focus presents the world premiere of In Search of the Grand View Garden, featuring the strongest production line-up in the Festival’s history: CCDC artistic director Willy Tsao teamed up with veteran Hong Kong cinematographer Henry Chung to transform the acclaimed eponymous dance production into a 3D dance film. With Chinese literary classic Dream of the Red Chamber as blueprint, Hong Kong’s cityscape as backdrop, and classical Chinese narrative ballad pingtan as the soundtrack, the site-specific dance video is a mix of tradition and modern, classic and contemporary, merging modern dance with everyday life.   The Festival has also commissioned dance films by artists from the Greater China Region. Elegy is a production by independent director Rita Hui whose work was selected by the 14th Busan International Film Festival. The experimental stage production Lucy is now a film created jointly by Chinese emerging artist Er Gao and Yang Tao, the cinematographer of cult queer film Lan Yu. Beijing Dance/LDTX dancer Will Guo teamed up with his former classmate from Guangdong Dance School Li Zhongye to produce the heartwarming One Day. Emerging choreographer Li De works with veteran cinematographer Jim Fok to create Let’s Say, a dance of the ‘hand’ commenting on the phenomenon of phubbers.   Two dance documentaries, The Akram Tree and But Myself, from recent years are selected to show the East-meet-West dialogue.

節目名稱: 媒體互動舞蹈空間《編碼2.0》﹝愛爾蘭﹞
節目簡介: 透過數碼追蹤科技 交織影像與舞蹈 《編碼2.0》是媒體互動舞蹈空間（愛爾蘭）的最新作品。是次演出將會是一個精彩震撼的數碼表演，糅合舞蹈、音樂與光影等多個元素，追蹤人類與科技之間關係的演變，展示我們怎樣依賴科技以至不能自拔，為求適應這個日益紛亂的世界而掙紮。憑著《編碼2.0》，媒體互動舞蹈空間（一個由電腦程式員、設計員和音樂人組成的團隊），和一群舞蹈家及編舞家將攜手創造一個亮麗炫目的視覺奇觀，探索自然世界和電子合成世界之間的平衡點。
About the Programme: VISUAL. DIGITAL. DANCE CODES 2.0 is a brand new show of MIDASpaces, which is a digital fusion of dance, music and light. This breathtaking show follows man's evolving relationship with technology – our addiction, dependence and struggle to adapt in an eve
Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre

節目簡介: 《古韻•今釋》，從當代的身體與理解出發，去詮釋古典文學作品中的意境。節目分上下半場，上半場為《春之祭2012》中之《祭禮》，將《河伯娶親》之典故作當代的詮釋。下半場為《風景》，以當代的目光，掠過古典詩詞的意境，再現古韻中之離傷、等待、思念、訣別之場景。
About the Programme: Retrospection / Perspective interprets the imagery of classical literature with the modern body and modern consciousness. It begins with a modern interpretation of the river god’s wedding. The 2nd half is a fleeting view of classical poems, lyrics and their imageries from modern eyes.

節目名稱: 唱聚共舞cha cha cha音樂舞會

節目簡介: 「自由擺」將香港地道特色的油麻地社區中心休憩花園(榕樹頭) 搖身一變成為的士高大舞池。在Elektryk Laydee樂隊的放克（Funk）和新靈魂（Neo Soul） 音樂演奏下，幾位本地頂尖舞者施展渾身解數，帶來各式街舞表演。這個集街舞、音樂和懷舊流行金曲於一身的免費戶外節目, 由Hongboy@節拍攻擊客席策劃，聯同樂隊領班Teriver Cheung和DJ 西門丁以耳熟能詳的七十至九十年代經典粵語流行曲，混搭出時髦的節拍旋律，讓公眾一起舞出懷舊流行節奏。此節目亦啟發首次合作的藝術家自行繼續合作，創作新作品及演出。
About the Programme: Set in a public park in front of the Tin Hau Temple, some of Hong Kong’s best street dancers perform different street dance styles accompanied by funk and neo soul music from the Elektryk Laydee. A first time collaboration that has since inspired more conversations between street dance and ‘live’ funk and soul music. Residents in and around the Yau Tsim Mong district were also treated to a Cantonese Disco Party with DJ mix featuring Hong Kong’s best 70s, 80s and 90s Cantopop spun by DJ Shelf-Index.  Residents young and old came and participated in full force, turning the park into a boisterous celebration for one and all. Guest curated by Hongboy@Rhythm Attack, in partnership with the band leader Teriver Cheung and DJ Shelf-Index, this energetic event was a rare opportunity to get an insider’s dope on what’s happening on the streets.

節目簡介: 我們的舞台如藍天－回首八年，碧華的老師及團員們在這片蔚藍的天空下付出無數的汗水和努力。今次為大家精選的是碧華舞蹈團的經典及新編節目，包括中國舞、現代舞及東南亞舞，當中大部分更是在香港及海外的大型舞蹈比賽中獲得大獎的節目。此外，碧華舞蹈學院創校以來，學生的中國舞級試成績斐然，曾在多個考季獲百分之百優良比率。今次亦為大家帶來他們的努力成果　　就讓我們齊在藍天起舞！

節目簡介: 在一個和平的國家裏，國王皇后為剛誕下可愛的女嬰 - 愛麗娜公主，舉辦盛大的受洗禮。國王皇后邀請了眾多的賓客及六位仙女前來為小公主送上祝福，偏偏大意地遺留了一位卡拉波斯；卡拉波斯對於未獲邀出席非常憤怒，向公主下了一個惡毒的詛咒 - 公主會在十六歲時被紡紗車的針剌死！  究竟丁香仙子的魔法能否戰勝邪惡的詛咒？王子能否排除萬難，喚醒沉睡的愛麗娜公主及她的王國？
About the Programme: Everyone in the kingdom is eagerly awaiting the birth of the king’s child. At last the infant arrives. The king calls for a grand christening celebration to which all the fairies are invited to bestow their blessings on his daughter, Princess Aurora. The joyous scene ends with the arrival of Carabosse; who is infuriated for not being invited. Carabosse announces her curse that Aurora will prick her finger and die at the age of sixteen.   Will Lilac Fairy’s wizardry release Aurora from the spell into this classical ballet repertoire and enter a world of love and enchantment.
Venue: Concert Hall, Hong Kong City Hall

節目簡介: 從課室跳到舞台 2014:  1. 「小飛俠」: 由小朋友飾演童話故事小飛俠內的角色。包括影子、小叮噹、星塵、美人魚等等。 2. 由本校舞蹈團及精英培訓班演出之現代芭蕾「海螺姑娘」。 3.著名的芭蕾舞選段-’睡美人’。更邀請到中央芭蕾舞團首席舞蹈員邱芸庭及武思聰表演’唐吉訶德’雙人舞。 4. 充滿熱鬧氣氛的爵士舞「爵士變革」。
About the Programme: FROM CLASSROOM TO STAGE 2014:  1. ‘Peter Pan’  2. A Modern Ballet “The Conch Fairy” performed by members from our dance team.  3. Classical ballet excerpts chosen from Coppelia. And our guest performers Ms Qiu Yunting and Mr Wu Sicong from the National Ballet of China performed their Grand Pas de Deux from Don Quixote.  4.Jazz ’Dance Revolution’
Venue: Concert Hall, Hong Kong City Hall
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Concert Hall

節目簡介: 一場可怕的龍捲風把小女孩Dorothy刮到了一個陌生而神奇的地方-綠野， 她迷失了路，好想回家！彩虹仙子告之，翡翠城裡有一位很棒的魔法師，Dorothy可以請他幫忙。  走著走著，Dorothy遇上没有腦子的稻草人、没有心臟的機械人，懦弱的 獅子，他們為了實現各自的心願，一行人向翡翠城進發，經歷重重險阻， 他們終於到了翡翠城，還找到了魔法師……
About the Programme: A massive tornado carried a little girl Dorothy from her home in the country to the magical land of Oz.   Dorothy was lost, and would give anything just to return home. Fortunately, a rainbow fairy told Dorothy to go look for a very kind magician – the Wizard of Oz, who might be persuaded to grant her wishes.   As Dorothy began her journey to seek the Wizard, she bumped into a Scarecrow who wanted a brain, a Tin man who wished for a heart, and a cowardly lion who  needed courage. The four soon became friends, and all, with eagerness to fulfill their wishes, started their journey to the Emerald City to look for the Wizard of Oz.   After much adventure, they arrived at the Emerald City and met the Wizard of Oz……

地點: 天水圍天頌苑露天廣場
Venue: Open Theatre,Tin Chung Court, Tin Shui Wai
venue.1: 天水圍天頌苑露天廣場

節目簡介: 這場芭蕾舞劇改編自塞萬提斯17世紀的小說的選段，故事裡同名的英雄、幻想自己是雄糾糾的尊貴騎士的唐吉訶德，出發去找尋他愛慕的女神達辛妮亞。他在旅途中遇上美麗的琪蒂，錯認她是他的女神。故事講述琪蒂和她的情人巴西里奧如何碰上喜劇式 的癲狂人物唐吉訶德，和他頭腦簡單的隨從桑丘．潘薩。如花火般燦爛的芭蕾舞姿和創新舞步是此劇的亮點，也是經典芭蕾舞劇目中對舞蹈員的技巧最苛刻的考驗。《唐吉訶德》不但節奏明快，而且充滿炫目的舞步、狂想式的情節，是一家大小必看的芭蕾舞劇！
About the Programme: The eponymous hero, who misguidedly imagines himself a chivalrous and honourable knight, sets off in search of Dulcinea the fictional maiden with whom he has fallen in love. On his adventures he meets the beautiful Kitri and mistakes her for his beloved Dulcinea. This fun and feisty tale tells of Kitri and her sweetheart Basilio, and their encounters with the comically delusional Don Quixote and his simple squire Sancho Panza.  Known for its balletic fireworks and bravura steps, this ballet is a tour de force, requiring the dancers to tackle some of the most technically-demanding choreography in classical ballet. Don Quixote is a must-see ballet for all the family - a fast-paced dance spectacle packed with virtuoso dancing, a fanciful storyline, and hilarious characters.
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
編舞: 佩蒂巴及阿歷山大．葛斯基
其他: 總排練者及附加編舞: 蓮娜．安娜妮亞雪翡莉/ 音樂: 路德維希．明庫斯/ 藝術顧問: 阿列西．費迪卓/ 編舞助理: 艾加特林娜．夏麗雅西里/ 佈景及服裝設計: 湯姆．米加/ 燈光設計: 陳焯華/ 現場伴奏: 香港城市室樂團/ 指揮: 顏菁

節目名稱: 香港芭蕾舞學會《睡公主》（贊助節目）
Programme Name: The Sleeping Princess by The Hong Kong Ballet Group (Sponsored Programme)
節目簡介: 香港芭蕾舞學會50周年特別呈獻《睡公主》，由香港芭蕾舞學會Heinz Bosl獎學金得主伍宇烈及「芭蕾舞超新星大賞」藝術總監Stephen Xavier聯手，動員來自32間舞蹈學校、超過180位師生，當中包括昔日曾參與芭蕾舞學會活動的老師，並特別邀請早年芭蕾舞學會演出主要演員呂紹梅及吳報釧再度踏上舞台，與年輕舞者共同獻技。芭蕾舞學會繼1980、1993及1998年後第四度上演經典芭蕾舞劇《睡美人》，今回特別玩轉經典，卸下華麗的芭蕾舞衣，揭露舞台背後不足為外人道、最真實的一面，並邀得知名鋼琴家閻韻及新晉芭蕾舞琴師李崇民現場伴奏，讓觀眾感受傳統芭蕾舞的魅力所在。
About the Programme: Stepping into its 50th anniversary, The Hong Kong Ballet Group proudly presents The Sleeping Princess with its Heinz Bosl Memorial Scholarship recipient Yuri Ng and renowned musician-dancer Stephen Xavier as Co-Artistic Directors. To join hands in this grand celebration, over 180 students and teachers from 32 dance schools will take part in the performance, together with Cliff Lui and Sylvia Wu as guest performers, who were the first ballet prince and princess of the Hong Kong ballet scene. The Sleeping Princess is a fresh rendition of the ballet classic Sleeping Beauty, in which audience will be taken to the imaginary backstage to witness how the magic of ballet begins before the fancy tutus and sets. With the live accompaniment by celebrated concert pianist Yim Wan and promising ballet pianist Simon Lee, you are about to experience the charm of classical ballet inside out.
Venue: Auditorium, Kwai Tsing Theatre
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 中國『武俠舞劇第一人』 香港著名編舞家 梁國城 繼編創金庸三部曲《笑傲江湖》、《神鵰俠侶》、《雪山飛狐》後又一鉅獻 大型原創舞劇 射鵰英雄傳 誰是英雄？ 頓悟天靈。大愛無疆，天地動情！ 金庸先生極高評價:「梁國城先生，編舞精彩，結構傑出。」 享譽國際舞蹈名家 - 王亞彬 中國頂級舞蹈天才 - 劉福洋 首次同台 ‧ 綻放光彩 2014年8月29至31日，香港舞劇團將聯同湖北演藝集團，召集各路英雄聚首於香港演藝學院歌劇院，以舞蹈及歌曲呈獻金庸武俠名著《射鵰英雄傳》。 獲文壇巨匠金庸先生再度授權改編之大型原創舞
Venue: Lyric Theatre, The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts

節目簡介: 改編自中國“茅盾文學獎”得獎同名小說，大型藏族舞劇《塵埃落定》不但保留了原著曲折動人的故事情節，以洋溢高原風情的藏族民間舞為本，配合豪情激昂的民族音樂和吟唱，加上華麗斑斕的藏族服飾，訴說一段雪域高原的家族愛恨情仇，見證一個時代的興衰，讓觀眾神馳於藏族文化藝術和民族風情之中的同時，思考人性善惡的因果緣由。
About the Programme: Adapted from the eponymous novel, which won China’s most prestigious book prize established by writer Mao Dun, the Tibetan dance drama Red Poppies draws from folk dance traditions of the region where the book is set.

節目簡介: 《電激玩樂園》是一個互動多媒體的形體劇場，SIRO-A六位成員將會以舞蹈、喜劇及影子偶戲等表現手法與科技投影作現場互動，帶領觀眾穿梭於如夢似幻的虛擬世界之中，一時間真假難分！演出糅合SIRO-A自創神乎奇技的影像投射、燈光動畫、令人驚嘆的激光效果及強勁的電子音樂節拍，創造出一幕幕的視覺幻象，為觀眾獻上一場極具視聽享受的「聲」、「光」感官盛宴。

Venue: Theatre, Sheung Wan Civic Centre

節目簡介: 因為我已經擁有，因為我本來就是，因為是與生俱來。原來發現到自己是什麼 就是一種很純樸的小確幸，與生俱來的血統父母給予的， 祖先給予的。家是自我的延伸，開始想編舞後，就開始蠢蠢欲動要離開溫室，自從26歲那年決定搬出來自住之後獨處給我更大的力量去創作 ，但為什麼我搬出來住之後才知道左撇子用罐頭刀是有困難？這遲來的身份意識令我決定要找尋屬於左撇子的專屬語言，只是剛巧我是一位舞者我更容易感覺到每當我舞動的時候，左撇子的潛在能量就一直在身體、神經系統、思考模式中流動著，是最純粹的感動。
About the Programme: Because it already belongs to me. Because it is the true me. Because it is born unto me. It is a simple honest feat to discover what one truly is. The bloodline from which I came, bestowed on me by my parents and forebears. My family is an extension of the self. Ever since I took to choreography, I was going to leave the molly-coddled environment. Ever since I decided to move out at twenty-six, living alone has given me greater strength for creativity. But why does it take moving out to realise that a left-hander finds it hard to use a can opener? This belated realisation spurs me on to seek the exclusive language of left-handers. As I happen to be a dancer, I find it easier to feel when I dance. The left-hander's latent energy flowing inside the body, in the nervous system and in the mode of thinking. Constitute what is absolutely touching.
Venue: Black Box Theatre, Kwai Tsing Theatre
Others: post-performance meet-the-artist session 2014/09/12

節目簡介: 《如夢幻泡影》—來自金剛經最後一品「一切有為法，如夢幻泡影」，以「非」的手法，創造「空」的美學。時間是結構，1和0翻轉舞蹈，身體幻化影像，舞台上動作在虛與實的時間與空間穿流，現場吉他彈奏古琴「非音」概念，合成電子音樂與形體互動；台灣舞蹈空間舞者及香港、東京表演者，在「如、夢、幻、泡、影」的五大段落間，變造尋常的起承轉合規律，新創非典型現代舞多媒體演出。

節目名稱: 「城市・身體重建」@茶舞巡禮分享演出
節目簡介: 建設城市，首先要建設身體的感受，因為身體是我們賴以存在的媒介，身體感受讓我們明白我們想要一個怎樣的城市。透過動作表達來自感官的感受、回應身處的環境、讓這些無論是舒適的，辛苦的，享受的，討厭的感覺都成為一種看法，成為對自己的認識和建立自我的素材，讓我們更有資格想像我們要怎樣的城市。「想變得更好」是人所共有的希望。希望用茶舞引發創作，把「想變得更好」變成自己的身體感受，透過憶舊的情懷讓我們走進上一代人的生活文化，以第一身角度去理解上一代如何把這種希望化為建設城市的動力。

節目名稱: 第26屆荃灣藝術節開幕演出 - 大型舞蹈詩《一條大河》
Programme Name: 26th Tsuen Wan Arts Festival Opening Ceremony Cum Dancing Poem the Great River
節目簡介: 大型舞蹈詩《一條大河》是香港舞蹈聯會繼《家園》(2010年) 之後, 創作的第七部大型舞蹈詩作品。 《一條大河》創作概念來自著名歌曲《我的祖國》, 而內容則由中華民族的母親河—可以是黃河,也可以是長江, 在青藏高原雪山溶雪孕育發生開始，流經千里, 歷盡滄桑的故事，細訴中華兒女的民族情懷和千年歷史的慨嘆…… 香港舞蹈聯會有20多個團體, 400多位演員參加演出, 除動員本地10多位知名舞蹈編導共同創作外, 尚邀得內地的著名舞蹈家: 雲南省的國家一級編導周培武先生, 和新進北京舞蹈學院編導系畢業生年青編導李佳參與創編。而音樂創作方面, 則邀得本港著名作曲家 ,《城寨風雲》的音樂創作者, 陳能濟先生相助。
Venue: Auditorium, Tsuen Wan Town Hall
Presenter: Association of Hong Kong Dance Organizations
編舞: 陳起馨、羅耀威、莊陳波、陳少鈺、何皓斐、陳俊、李佩佩、黎少玲、湯樂、陳順儀、周曉雯、張秀芬、丁平
其他: 製作及策劃 陳起馨

節目簡介: ─由三位揮灑自如的舞者及實力非凡的新晉編舞：CCDC 舞者林詠茵、樂知靄及來自越南的阮日廣，分別帶來最新創作，以舞者的動與靜，追溯舞蹈的最初！林詠茵於〈木。目〉以幾米的繪本及街頭藝術家繪畫人像畫為題材，化身畫家，以舞作畫，描繪出幅幅令人會心微笑的舞蹈畫。樂知靄首編〈囹‧圄〉，呈現坐困愁城的無力感，提出「生於圍城，是否就等如困於圍城？」的疑問。阮日廣以現代著名音樂家馬克斯‧李希特重新編排巴洛克時期作品《四季》為配樂，演繹大自然與人的關係，，呈獻十四行詩及現代肢體交匯之作──〈感〉！
About the Programme: Three fresh choreographers – CCDC dancers Peggy Lam and Shirley Lok, together with Vietnamese dancer Anh Ngoc Nguyen, demonstrate their choreographic best in a series of new works in In‐between, explore the nature of dance by the movement and stillness of dancers. Sharing delicate relationships between paintings and us, inspired by art works and portraits from street artists. Peggy becomes a painter in Picture Triangle, creating a masterpiece with dance, presenting heartfelt dance‐paintings to leave an impression. Suppression, control and exhaustion intertwined by a series of turning gears: desperations trapped in a city of hopelessness in Besieged choreographed by Shirley Lok. This work is set to a music masterpiece of all time, Four Seasons, recomposed by Max Richter. Harmonising bodies, movements, music, light, visual, prop, fragrance into an intense sensation, Sense choreographed by Anh Ngoc Nguyen promises a unique experience for the audience.
Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
Choreographers: Peggy Lam, Shirley Lok, Nguyen Ngoc Anh
其他: 其他相關節目： 相片展、藝人談
Others: Related Programme： Photo Exhibition, Meet‐the‐artists

節目名稱: 比利時終極舞團《身不能記》
Programme Name: What The Body Does Not Remember By Ultima Vez (Belgium)
節目簡介: 一九八七年，溫．范德基伯斯和比利時終極舞團橫空出世，震撼舞壇：一齣《身不能記》，讓舞蹈與音樂激烈對峙、險象橫生地搏擊，創造全新的感官舞蹈境界，也為范德基伯斯與作曲家德泰利．狄眉、彼得．維美徐贏得被稱為舞蹈界奧斯卡的「貝絲獎」。二○一三年，范德基伯斯以全新陣容復編這齣作品作世界巡迴演出，再次享譽國際。范德基伯斯這齣編舞處女作，可說是危危乎游走於令人「喜」、「惡」之間。那種對峙感，時而出現在兩舞者、兩組舞員之間，時而出現在舞者與音樂、舞者與劃定的界線之間。抗衡中，爆發了侵略、恐懼、危情。此作是舞蹈歷史里程碑，至今猶是。范德基伯斯：「(這舞表達了) 剎那間的激情，不由你選擇，猶如墮入愛河或意外突發的瞬間，毫無預警，要發生的就這麼發生了。對我而言，重要的是那極致的感覺，而不是賦予的意義。我決定用這為一齣劇場創作的基礎時，本身已是一次自相矛盾的挑戰，因為劇場作品是可重複的，也是可控制的。不過，或許說到底，身體無由記取重複的或可控的感覺時，一切都只是無力的幻象，這幻象有助我們為人生這場遊戲下定義或詳盡探討。」
About the Programme: The amazing debut of Wim Vandekeybus and Ultima Vez in 1987 stunned the world of dance of the time.  In New York Vandekeybus and composers Thierry de Mey and Peter Vermeersch received the prestigious 'Bessie Award' for this ‘brutal confrontation of dance and music: the dangerous, combative landscape of What the Body Does Not Remember’.  In 2013, Wim Vandekeybus revived the work with a new cast and it has since toured the world, again receiving critical acclaims. Vandekeybus’ first choreography balances on the razor edge of attraction and repulsion. Sometimes this results in a confrontation between two dancers, then between two groups, between dancers and music, and between dancers and a compelling set of lines.  But throughout there is an explosion of aggression, fear and danger.  Dance history on stage and not to be missed, even today.“The intensity of moments when you don’t have a choice, when other things decide for you, like falling in love, or the second before the accident that has to happen; suddenly they appear, with no introduction, important for me because of their extremeness rather than for the significance to be given to them.  The decision to use this as a basic material for a theatrical composition is at least a paradoxical challenge, considering a theatrical event as repeatable and controllable.  Perhaps when all is said and done, the body doesn’t remember either and everything is a subtle illusion of lack which helps to define or exhaust the game.” - Wim Vandekeybus
Venue: Auditorium, Kwai Tsing Theatre
Others: post-performance meet-the-artist session 2014/10/10

節目簡介: 香港舞蹈團舞者聯同香港舞蹈團兒童團/少年團攜手，舞活唱頌荃灣今昔，細訴客家風土人情。  荃灣古名淺灣，因其海灣水淺而得名。 沿海盜賊猖獗，相傳經過意峽灣，需付三百過路錢。 十七世紀中葉，客家人遷入淺瀛，倚山耕作灣邊漁。 小漁村裡洋溢純樸民風， 祈福、求雨、祭祀、春拼、秋收、划船、舞龍、紡織…… 往日片片生活逸事，活現當今荃灣。
About the Programme: Tsuen Wan was named as ‘Tsin Wan’ due to its shallow bay. The sea was threatened by the active attacks of the pirates, it was said that three hundred dollars had to be paid for crossing the bay.  The Hakka people settled in Tsin Wan during mid 17th century, they made their living as farmers and fishermen. The harmonious life snaps, such a blessings for health and rain, worshipping ancestors, harvesting, rowing, dragon dancing, tapestrying…will reappear on stage, recalling the memories of the past and praying for the future.
Venue: Auditorium, Tsuen Wan Town Hall
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈團—外展及教育部
Presenter: Hong Kong Dance Company-Outreach & Education Department
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium

節目簡介: 日光之下，人們不斷奔跑，聚散離合。 清風吹起漫天泡沫，兩個結成一個。 再噓卻只剩泡影，映照出千萬舊事。
About the Programme: Under the sun, the crowd runs, they falter and they run, Break and reunite. A wave of bubbles fluttering and dancing in the breeze, together they make one. A breath of wind, and the waltz begins again, Nothing but shadows of the untold tales remain.

節目名稱: 《舞之慶典 ─ 香港芭蕾舞團精采35年》
Programme Name: A Celebration of Dance – The Hong Kong Ballet at 35
節目簡介: 香港芭蕾舞團為慶祝創團35周年，將呈獻芭蕾舞精品。這三段芭蕾舞作品展現了香港芭蕾舞團驕人的藝術成就。 舞團過去一直不繼為大家呈獻史上著名編舞家的作品，包括新古典主義芭蕾舞之父喬治．巴蘭欽，當今首屈一指的西班牙編舞家納曹．杜亞陶，以及古典芭蕾舞界中產量甚豐的編舞家佩蒂巴，它他們的作品也涵括在此這場芭蕾舞精品之中，定必為觀眾帶來一個難忘的演出。
About the Programme: The Hong Kong Ballet presents a mixed bill programme in celebration of the Company’s 35th anniversary. Throughout its history the Company has presented works by some of the most famous choreographers of all time, some of whom are featured here including the father of neo-classical ballet George Balanchine, one of today’s foremost choreographers Spanish-born Nacho Duato, as well as classical ballet’s most prolific choreographer Marius Petipa.
Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
編舞: 《小夜曲》George Balanchine © The George Balanchine Trust /《卡薩迪》 納曹．杜亞陶/《天鵝湖》 第三幕 娜塔莉婭．康納斯   (原編舞  佩蒂巴)
Choreographers: Serenade George Balanchine © The George Balanchine Trust/ Castrati Nacho Duato/ Swan Lake Act III NATALIA CONUS,  after Marius Petipa

節目簡介: 安徒生幻想曲用舞蹈重塑對安徒生系列的故事，用身體、肢體動作及感觀認知，細味安徒生說過的故事（其中包括小美人魚，醜小鴨，和皇帝的新衣等）。這著名丹麥作家寫過的戲劇，遊記，小說和詩歌都讓我們觸動過。他那曾存在的瞬間，表達了超越時空、年齡、國籍等界限。他的故事啟發了戲劇，芭蕾等藝術領域。李敬玉舞蹈團通過現代舞蹈及獨特的觸角去探索這些安徒生的故事、人類的多樣和複雜性。編舞將連同多位傑出韓國舞者，帶給觀眾如夢如幻般的劇場體驗。

節目簡介: 香港原創佛教舞劇   廿一世紀，血月當道，人心紛亂。預言指，人類要救活印度菩提伽耶聖樹，才能守護地球。   五位性格各異的港女，在WeChat相遇，雖素未謀面，但一鼓作氣，誓言要勇往聖地。菩提樹下闖進夢境，驚覺與佛陀前世今生之因緣，了悟真正的佛道，超越一切表相；自性慈悲，從不曾失卻。   ｢佛教4D舞動劇場｣繼2012年創作首齣香港佛教舞劇《大樂舞者》後，再度匯集本地頂尖舞者，糅合古典芭蕾、現代舞、原創粵曲與中樂三弦，與觀眾一起穿越古今，以愛轉化人心，激發菩提樹重生。   ｢每個生命都是獨特的。佛陀以八萬

節目名稱: 《社會共融齊起舞2014》綜合藝術教育舞蹈匯演
Programme Name: Dance in Harmony 2014 Integrated Arts Education Dance Performance
節目簡介: 匯聚曾參與藝術義工培訓班、外展舞蹈工作坊、「義工服務新時代，創意無限展才華」研討會、「社會共融齊起舞2014」藝術教育舞蹈日及「社會共融齊起舞2014」義工舞蹈比賽的學校、社福團體及義工組織一同參與即興健康中國舞蹈工作坊及大型綜合藝術表演，藉中國舞蹈推動「藝術教育」、「傷健共融」和「健康教育」。  為了讓社區團體能夠有機會欣賞多姿多彩的中國舞蹈表演，認識中國舞蹈藝術義工服務;特舉辦贈票顯關懷活動，提供免費門票予弱勢社群，令是次匯演更具社會意義，藉此送暖人間，傳播義工精神。
About the Programme: Community service groups, voluntary groups and schools who took part in our Chinese Dance training course, workshops, conference, Dance Day, Chinese Dance Competition participated in this integrated art performance. We aim at promoting the concepts of “Arts Education”, “Social Inclusion” and the “Health Education”.   To provide opportunities for more community groups to appreciate Chinese dance performances, and know about Chinese dance voluntary services, we donated a number of tickets for these groups, which made this activity a more meaningful one.

Programme Name: Chinese Language Arts & Culture Academy's 3rd Anniversary & Arts Festival
節目簡介: 我們是文化和藝術的搖籃。 這三年，中國文化漢語藝術工坊的全體老師、職員及學生們付出了艱辛的汗水和努力，把學校改善得更完美。在今天的舞台上，孩子們會為各位家長表演新的節目，節目內容有中國舞、民族舞、現代舞及普通話話劇。匯演將會展示中國傳統藝術和現代文化的結合。 自創校以來，本校學生除了中文能力取得顯赫的成績外，中國舞等級考試成績亦同樣斐然。我們曾在多個考季獲百分之百優良比率。我們會繼續履行我們的教學職責。 這裡是學習的源泉；這裡是快樂的起點；這裡是藝術的園地。

節目簡介: 《完。美》是梁芷茵在二○一四年第二個長篇作品。作為一名「新鮮人」，梁芷茵的創作靈感一直與生命的實相有關 — 第一個作品《一一》談存在，是次《完。美》則談「時間」。人生的陀飛輪一直在運行，見證著光陰一滴一滴的流逝，盡管我們用盡所有方法去嘗試把它停留 - 應該是說，把它流逝的痕跡盡量抹掉，可是我們仍是無法阻止時間運行。我們將會親眼目睹衰退、蒼老，直至生命的終點。然後我們必須知道，這是生命必然的步驟，也許要經歷這個美麗的過程，生命才算是圓滿。編舞梁芷茵表示，「花」是她創作此演出靈感的來源：「花很美麗，她盛放得最燦爛之時我們愛把她稱為「新鮮」。新鮮過後，花會凋謝、花瓣會落，人們卻不懂欣賞，很多時候未來得及見證她凋落就把她放棄，而不懂凋落是成全花完整一生的過程，就好像人不能接受自己衰老一樣。」儘管不再正值盛年之時，編舞相信只要親身經歷或親眼目睹生命顏色的減退，才能察覺到衍生出來的第二種顏色，那既真貴又獨一無二的美麗。 《完。美》亦特意找來了六位女舞者參與演出，「女人是對光陰流逝最敏感的動物。她們窮一生作皮膚保養、化妝、打扮、運動等等，完全體現了如何渴望能夠「保鮮」及對衰老的恐懼。而我們作為舞蹈工作者，更能夠感受身體的各種限期：體力不繼、爆發力下降、身體機能變化等等，這些都是舞者在時間巨輪下必須要面對的。既然無法保鮮，何不接受花落，經歷它、面對它，讓生命的另外一種色彩出現在自己面前。」作品希望透過舞者對光陰、限期、青春的演繹，與觀眾一同經歷時間流逝，迎接生命的定律，一起去尋找「完。美」。
About the Programme: Beautiful Decay is Cherry Leung’s second full-length work for 2014.  As a member of the “New Force in Motion”, Leung’s creative inspiration has always been drawn from the physical manifestations of life – her first work, Yat Yat, was about ‘existence’, while the present Beautiful Decay is about ‘time’. The tourbillon of life never stops, as it sends time away by the second.  Despite our efforts to hold back time, or more accurately, to wipe away the traces of its passing, we cannot stop its moving forward.  We will witness with our own eyes decline, ageing, and the end of life.  Then we will realise this is life’s natural process - it will not be perfect without experiencing the beauty of it all. According to choreographer Cherry Leung Tsz Yan, ‘flowers’ are the source of her inspiration for this production.  “Flowers are beautiful.  When they are in full bloom, we like to call them ‘fresh’.  After their freshness is gone, they will wither and the petals will fall.  Yet people fail to appreciate this state.  Very often they throw the flowers away before they can witness their decay, not understanding that decay forms part of the integral cycle of life of the flowers.  It is as if people are refusing to accept their own ageing.”  The prime of life may be gone, the choreographer believes, yet through witnessing or experiencing first-hand the fading of its colours, we will be able to see the alternate palette coming out of them, and show us another kind of beauty that is valuable and unique. Beautiful Decay features six female dancers.  “Among all beings, women are the most sensitive to the passage of time.  They spend their lives nourishing their skin, applying make-up, grooming themselves and exercising, a clear manifestation of their fear of aging and their desperation to ‘keep fresh’.  As dancers, we are most prone to feeling the threats of Time on our bodies: declining energy, gradual loss of explosiveness, and change in bodily functions - conditions that dancers have to face under the tyranny of time.  Since we cannot keep it fresh, why don’t we accept decay, experience it, face it and let another palette appear before our eyes?”  Through the dancers’ interpretation of temporal elements and the ‘use by dates’, this work attempts to experience the passage of time, embrace the laws of life, and look for ‘beautiful decay’ together with the audience.

節目簡介: 無是零，雙是二，《無 | 雙》關乎一。一，可以是唯一，唯一是獨尊，是自我，是沒有別的能比得上的意思。不過，無論是征服別人還是戰勝自己，重點其實不在於誰，而在於鬥。一，也可以是最豐富的渾沌整體。《說文解字》有雲：「惟初太始，道立於一，造分天地，化成萬物。」但除了哲學中那種虛空的均勻狀態外，渾沌在物理上是非綫性系統，既確定又隨機，必然與偶然共存，充滿辯證性。同是一，但此一與彼一的差異，亦正好是邢亮與黃大徽之間的對照：一個科班出身另一個埋頭自修，一個擅於處理身體在時間空間中的挪移，另一個概念先行思考為重。《無
About the Programme: None is nought, double is two, 0 | 2 relates to one. 0 | 2 is a battle of the "selves", a struggle between individuality and integration. 0 | 2 is chaos in order, and order in chaos, a very distinct entanglement.
Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目名稱: 王廷琳X松本大樹《樹林之舞2014"空"》
節目簡介: 樹林之舞終結篇: "十年，一瞬！" 從一個諾言開始，引領我自傲地走過十年光景。我們為以體繪形、以舞訴心聲而奮鬥不懈，感恩一路以來有你同行共舞；今年，我們為彼此的“植樹夢” 暫畫句號。 回眸、轉身、歲月匆匆……
Venue: Upstairs Studio, Fringe Club
venue_en: Fringe Club, Fringe Upstairs

節目簡介: 《私房舞》由澳洲編舞家Nat Cursio及香港製作人鄭煥美共同策劃，在戶外草地上設置大小不一的露營帳篷，邀請不同舞蹈類型及風格的香港舞蹈家於帳篷內作現場演出，當中包括當代舞、嘻哈、中國民族舞、印度舞等，並挑選了一系列的澳洲舞蹈實驗電影。觀眾穿梭於各個「舞蹈營」，近距離觀賞各式各樣的舞蹈表演及迷你電影，享受與舞蹈之間非常親密的接觸及細緻的體驗，是一次充滿驚喜和想像力的獨特舞蹈歷程。
About the Programme: Private Dances created and curated by Nat Cursio (Australia) in collaboration with Anna Cheng (Hong Kong) features ‘live’ performances by Hong Kong based dance makers from a range of fields including contemporary dance, Hip Hop, Chinese folk dance, Indian dance and Korean dance in an unusual intimate setting. Set in camping tents on a grass field, audiences encounter these dancers and dances like never before where the proximity lends a very different lens to how dance is received and perceived. Coupled with a series of dance films on small screens from Australia, audiences are invited to traverse from tent to tent into these micro worlds of fantasy, ecstasy and visual explosion no more than two feet away.
Venue: West Kowloon Waterfront Promenade

節目簡介: 自八十年代初，香港芭蕾舞團已開始演出由舞團成員編創的舞蹈。當年團員熱切地創作，展現新一代芭蕾舞風格。今年的《編舞家巡禮2014》承接傳統，呈獻由十位年輕編舞全新編創的八個作品，展示一眾編舞的創意和視野。年輕新銳編舞的革新意念配搭訓練有素的舞者，多齣新作段段精彩，絕對不容錯過！
About the Programme: The Hong Kong Ballet’s performances of choreographic works by our own dancers date back to the early 1980s when many of the Company’s performers began to create their own ballet pieces. Featuring eight pieces by ten different choreographers, Choreographers’ Showcase 2014 celebrates the creativity, ideas and vision of our young dance creators. Don’t miss this rare opportunity to see brand new works choreographed and performed by promising classically-trained artists!
Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
編舞: WEPART《我離》: Jonathan Spigner 尊尼芬．斯納 HERNANDO’S TANGO《海南度的探戈》: Candice Adea 康蒂思．阿廸雅 HORN《觸角》: Yuh Egami & Ricky Hu 江上悠及胡頌威 BREAK AWAY《掙脫》: Li Lin 李林 WATCH THE WITNESS《睇視見證者》: Frank van Tongeren 法蘭基．范東拿倫 SWAN IN THE ABYSS《深淵裡的天鵝》: Jessica Burrows & Sarah Ye

節目名稱: 城市當代舞蹈節：《indepenDANCE－台灣新編》
Programme Name: City Contemporary Dance Festival: IndepenDANCE - Limelight Taiwan
節目簡介: 由台灣舞團MeimageDance開創的「鈕扣計劃」，每年都邀請旅外舞者回國創作與演出。「鈕扣計劃2014」曾在台北及高雄上演，當中張藍勻（前城市當代舞蹈團舞者）和李貞葳（前以色列巴西瓦舞團舞者）兩位舞者的創作，聯同舞蹈藝術總監何曉玫的新作〈假裝〉在《indepenDANCE－台灣新編》上登場，展現台灣當代舞者的獨特語境。
About the Programme: The "New Choreographer" project established by MeimageDance invites Taiwanese dancers who are dancing aboard to choreograph a work at home each year in collaboration with Taiwanese brands and designers.   MeimageDance is bringing three works to independence: Limelight Taiwan – works by choreographers Chang Lan-yun (former dancer of CCDC) and Lee Chen-wei (former dancer of Batsheva Dance Company) from "New Choreographer 2014", and Camouflage, the latest creation by Ho Hsiao-mei, Artistic Director of MeimageDance.
Venue: Black Box Theatre, Kwai Tsing Theatre
Choreographers: Ho Hsiao-mei, Chang Lan-yun, Lee Chen-wei
其他: 其他相關節目： 藝人談
Others: Related Programme： Meet-the-artist
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Black Box Theatre

節目名稱: 城市當代舞蹈節：《indepenDANCE－聚焦香港》
Programme Name: City Contemporary Dance Festival: IndepenDANCE - Hong Kong Focus
節目簡介: 《聚焦香港》是一個讓本土編舞發表作品的平台。CCDC邀請了七位新晉編舞各施其技，先後在北京及廣州巡演，再回到香港，以更成熟、更完善的技藝向觀眾呈現他們的心血，展現出香港多元化的舞蹈風貌。
About the Programme: To provide more opportunities for independent choreographers to present their work, Hong Kong Focus is presenting six dance pieces by local young choreographers. After performing at the modern dance weeks in Beijing and Guangzhou, the artists are coming home to meet their family and friends. They use their own body vocabularies to create new possibilities in their works.
Venue: Black Box Theatre, Kwai Tsing Theatre
編舞: 梁芷茵、白濰銘、施卓然、徐奕婕、黃志榮、黃美玉、黃碧琪
Choreographers: Cherry Leung Tze-yan, Pak Wei-ming, Sze Cheuk-yin, Ivy Tsui Yik-chit, Wong Chi-wing, WONG Mei-yuk, WONG Pik-kei
其他: 其他相關節目： 藝人談
Others: Related Programme： Meet-the-artist
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Black Box Theatre

節目名稱: 獨舞及《緣舞場》即興系列
舞蹈類別: 現代舞, 當代舞, 即興表演
節目簡介: 國際上有很多舞蹈節，它們都起了推動舞蹈發展，增進交流，拓闊藝術家及觀眾視野之功效，而且更有提升該城市在國際間之文化及藝術地位之作用，就是這樣「i-舞蹈節」設立起來了！2004 年一批獨立舞蹈工作者以推動現代舞、當代舞及新舞蹈為目標，自資搞了第一屆的「i-舞蹈節」，雖然規模細小，但却成功為藝術家們打造了一個藝術交流平台！到2009 年「多空間」在有限資源下主辦了「i-舞蹈節2009- 獨舞與即興」，其後「i-舞蹈節2011」除了於香港舉行更由古名伸將i-Dance 的理念延伸至台北，首屆舉辦i-Dance (Taipei)，韓國及日本亦分別2012 年及2013 年主辦i-Dance，不經不覺「i-舞蹈節」在香港已是第五屆了。
About the Programme: The i-Dance Festival was first organized as a self-funded venture by a group of HK independent dance artists in 2004. The festival aimed at arousing public concern towards contemporary dance and new dance development in Hong Kong. We also wanted to provide dance practitioners a platform for the sharing of creative work. The aim of i-Dance is to promote solo dance performance, improvisation and site-specific creations in Hong Kong, and to facilitate conversations among artists from different parts of the world. 2013 will be our 5th i-Dance Festival since 2004.
Venue: Y-Space, Dance Studio
venue_en: Y-Space, Dance Studio

節目名稱: 城市當代舞蹈節：北京雷動天下現代舞團《一處》
Programme Name: City Contemporary Dance Festival: A Place By Beijingdance/ Ldtx
節目簡介: 《一處》以記憶為題，觀照當下。散發縷縷白煙的水煲、燈光映照空中框架投射出虛幻的囚籠，以誘發無限想像的舞台意象、流麗澎湃的編舞，再撰世間的愛恨流離。
About the Programme: In the name of memory, A Place reflects on the present. A hint of white mist coming out of a pot becomes an animated prison constructed by light and shadow. With an unconventional setting and inspiring virtuoso choreography, this is contemplation on displaced love-hate relationships.
Venue: Auditorium, Kwai Tsing Theatre
製作/演出單位: 北京雷動天下現代舞團
其他: 其他相關節目： 藝人談
Others: Related Programme： Meet-the-artist
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目名稱: 《杜哈絲百年：如歌的中板／就這麼多》﹝多元藝術環境劇場﹞
節目簡介: 寫情愛的虛妄　死生的茫茫 法國女作家杜哈絲的一生是用血與肉書寫的一生 既是講她自己的故事　也寫出人間的世相　眾生之共業 一眾來自香港不同界別的資深藝術家攜手向杜哈絲致敬紀念她的百歲冥壽。演出取材自代表作《如歌的中板》(1958)及遺作《就這麼多》(1995)，在土瓜灣牛棚前進進劇場，帶有香港歷史記憶的空間，主要通過舞蹈、戲劇，以小劇場方式，處理杜哈絲的兩大創作主題：愛、死亡。
About the Programme: The performance is given in commemoration of the 100th anniversary of the birth of Marguerite Duras (1914-1996), the French writer with international influence. Duras holds an important place in cultural circles favouring Modernism in Hong Kong after the 1980s. In honour of her centennial, artists in Hong Kong– seasoned or young, and from different sectors – decide to come together in a tribute through installation theatre. We hope to bring to the Hong Kong audience a commemorative event of a different kind. Inspired by her magnum opus, Moderato Cantabile (1958), and the posthumous C'est Tout (1995), the performances will be held at a site rich in Hong Kong history: the Cattle Depot Theatre in To Kwa Wan (for experimental theatre staging), on two of Duras’s favourite themes: love and death.
Venue: Cattle Depot Theatre
Others: Talk 2014/12/12, Post-performance talk 2014/12/13, Meet-the-artist session 2014/12/13
venue_en: Cattle Depot Artist Village, On and On Theatre

節目名稱: 城市當代舞蹈節：廣東現代舞團《鹽焗鶴》
Programme Name: City Contemporary Dance Festival: Salty Roast Crane By Guangdong Modern Dance Company
節目簡介: 鶴，是中國傳統文化美學的代表，但若用客家傳統的烹調法將之「鹽焗」，是何其另類、怪異？  年輕編舞何其沃貫徹其前衛風格，作品以局限為切入點，在喧囂而孤獨、慌張而冷漠，敏感卻令人無能為力的當下，我們該如何掙扎逃離思維、意識的自縛，尋求自我安慰以至自我解脫？
About the Programme: Crane represents longevity, an auspicious symbol of elegance. But when the crane is roasted with salt instead of a chicken in the traditional Hakka way, what would it taste like?   Salty Roast Crane is a work about restrictions, expressing the struggle between chaos and loneliness, restlessness and indifferent, as well as the helpless yet sensitive contemporary. How can one escape from confined thoughts and conscience, and find a solution to break through?
Venue: Auditorium, Kwai Tsing Theatre
其他: 其他相關節目： 藝人談
Others: Related Programme： Meet-the-artist
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 根據本港著名漫畫家馬榮成先生創作的武俠漫畫《風雲》改編，大型武俠舞劇《風雲》讓聶風、步驚雲、無名、雄霸等深入民心的角色，跳出紙框，躍上舞台，通過舞台藝術，展現出漫畫世界中天馬行空的想像國度，是香港舞蹈團又一結合舞蹈與本土文化的精心傑作 。原創漫畫《風雲》出版至今超過二十年，橫跨不同年代讀者，堪稱經典之中的經典。編舞透過舞蹈與舞台空間設計，立體地演繹出畫作中巧妙的構圖與微妙的禪意，意境遼闊。
About the Programme: Based on a well-loved martial arts comic series by HK’s renowned comic book artist Ma Wing-shing, dance drama Storm Clouds brings memorable characters and their imaginative world to life.
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: Grand Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目名稱: 牛池灣文娛中心場地伙伴計劃：舞蹈劇場系列－《舞導創意門》舞蹈課程總結演出
Programme Name: Ngau Chi Wan Civic Centre Venue Partnership Scheme: Dance Theatre Series - From Composition To Choreography Choreography Course And Finale Performance
節目簡介: 從身出發，以身觀心，以身表心   學員在著名編舞家楊春江親自指導下，共同打開《舞導創意門》，親自發掘有趣題材，探討舞蹈劇場的編舞技巧。課程期間主要引導學員如何協調肢體、動作與時空的互動，激發學員的編舞創意，表達自己的方式與意念，創作別具一格的舞作。各精彩作品現進行公開展演，分享編舞學習成果！
About the Programme: From composition to choreography, tutorials conducted by renowned dance artist Daniel Yeung, who figured potential students out to develop amusing themes and shared the choreographing skills for dance theatre. The course focused on composing dance by the
地點: 牛池灣文娛中心文娛廳
Venue: C.A. Hall, Ngau Chi Wan Civic Centre
venue.1: 牛池灣文娛中心文娛廳
venue_en: Ngau Chi Wan Civic Centre, Cultural Activities Hall

節目名稱: 城市當代舞蹈節：《風中三十五》
Programme Name: City Contemporary Dance Festival: Amidst The Wind
節目簡介: 由藝術總監曹誠淵親自挑選CCDC近十年來最精彩的篇章，在同一舞台上，《風中三十五》呈現多位享譽海內外的資深編舞家包括曹誠淵、黎海寧、桑吉加、梅卓燕、邢亮以及當紮編舞龐智筠和黃狄文等風格迥異的創作。
About the Programme: Handpicked by Artistic Director Willy Tsao, Amidst the Wind is a feast of the most exhilarating dance excerpts from CCDC's productions from the last decade, including works by renowned choreographers – Willy Tsao, Helen Lai, Sang Jijia, Mui Cheuk-Yin and Xing Liang – as well as recent creations from rising star choreographers – Noel Pong and Dominic Wong.
Venue: Auditorium, Kwai Tsing Theatre
編舞: 黎海寧、梅卓燕、龐智筠、桑吉加、曹誠淵、黃狄文、邢亮
Choreographers: Helen Lai, Mui Cheuk-yin, Noel Pong, Sang Jijia, Willy Tsao, Dominic Wong, Xing Liang
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目簡介: i-舞蹈節(香港)2014的節目豐富，在整整一個月的活動中，來自世界各地及香港的舞蹈家將本著「舞在當下」的精神，探索及展演感官與動作如何互為一體，以即興、獨舞或借其他舞者之身，與觀眾分享自己對生命的體會和想像。 i- independent舞蹈節以自主、個體、獨立藝術工作者為主幹 i- improvisation 即興的危機與不可預測，挑戰既定與傳統模式 i- innovation 原創與實驗 i- international 建立一個國際性的舞蹈盛會 i- interact 藝術家和參加者互動及交流的平台 i- interlink 由不同的「i」所產生的聯結及聯盟
About the Programme: It will be a month when international and Hong Kong dance artists explore and express the relationship between movements and the senses, to communicate their individuality with solo Improvisation, and together celebrate being at the moment: Dance Now. i- independent i- improvisation i- innovation i- international i- interact i- interlink
Venue: Black Box Theatre, Kwai Tsing Theatre
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Black Box Theatre

節目簡介: 香港芭蕾舞團經典聖誕芭蕾舞劇《胡桃夾子》，由編舞家泰蘭斯‧科勒重新編舞，盡展舞團每位舞蹈員的專長和特色，配合作家克萊爾 ▪ 索倫充滿創意的劇本及設計師祖迪 ▪ 洛的華麗舞台和舞衣，為故事注入新氣息。隨著平安夜的來臨，小嘉麗和費殊展開難忘的旅程，合力對抗老鼠王以拯救胡桃夾子和芭蕾公主，從中體會到忠誠和友情的可貴，也培養了堅毅不屈的精神。憑著他們的率真和創意，最終平息了童話世界裡的風波！香港小交響樂將現場演奏柴可夫斯基的經典樂章，《胡桃夾子》將會讓您親歷繽紛夢幻的奇妙聖誕！
About the Programme: Embrace the festive season with The Nutcracker by choreographer Terence Kohler, dramaturge Clair Sauran and set and costume designer Jordi Roig. This glittering production, which premiered in 2012, follows Clara and Fritz who learn to recognise the value of loyalty, friendship and determination as they embark on an adventure of magical proportions to rescue the Nutcracker and the Ballerina from the clutches of the evil Rat King. Through their charming naivety and creative imagination, the children restore normality to a surreal world. Set to Tchaikovsky’s magical score with live accompaniment by Hong Kong Sinfonietta, this exciting Christmas-time adventure is a perfect ballet for children to enjoy with their families.
Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
其他: 音樂：柴可夫斯基Composer: Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky  劇本：克萊爾．索倫Dramaturge: Clair Sauran  佈景及服裝設計：祖迪．洛Set and Costume Designer: Jordi Roig 佈景助理: 安娜瑪麗亞．卡坦里奧Set Assistant: Annamaria Cattaneo  燈光設計：大衞．保弗羅Lighting D

節目名稱: 城市當代舞蹈團：《CCDC舞蹈課程學生滙演》
Programme Name: City Contemporary Dance Company: Good Show 2014
節目簡介: 《Good Show》是城市當代舞蹈團舞蹈中心與一眾學員攜手創造的一個舞台，集合學員的訓練成果，精英導師的悉心編排，以及台前幕後的設計策劃的一個專業舞台。學員實踐所學，加上對舞蹈的熱誠一一呈現於舞台上，與觀眾一同分享、交流，成就一個有意義且難忘的舞台演出。
About the Programme: Every other year, City Contemporary Dance Company Dance Center stages 'Good Show' which provides a platform for our students to showcase their learning. However, the show would not be possible without the choreography arrangements created by our dedicated

舞蹈類別: 爵士舞/街舞, 現代舞
節目簡介: 《格壁城市》融合了現代舞的美學及演譯城市景觀的街舞技巧，給觀眾驚喜連連。十八分鐘的演出引領觀眾進入一幕幕行色匆匆的城市場景，直叫觀眾重新經驗人人熟悉的生活場所 ── 火車、馬路、升降機……《格壁城市》由舞蹈出發，配上現場敲擊及實地錄音的香港聲音景觀，以動作與聲音勾劃城市生活；在人們急速步伐，割裂空間的規範下，希望你我可以打破無形的圍牆，實現表達自我、跟他人溝通的慾望。
About the Programme: Striking strategic balance between dexterous skills and witty details, Compartmentalized blended contemporary choreography’s fluid aesthetics with street dance’s direct engagement with the cityscape; every passing second urged audiences to anticipate for the next surprise. Employing the universal language of dance and a contagious soundscape made of live percussions and field recordings of Hong Kong’s streets, the 18-minute piece lends a theatrical twist to familiar actions of frantic cities like taking the train, crossing the road, or squeezing into a crowded elevator. Compartmentalized is about life in the city; its unrelenting pace, its segmented space, and the urge for people to break through confining walls for self expression and interaction.
Venue: West Kowloon Waterfront Promenade
製作/演出單位: 不加鎖舞踊館, Stalker Theatre
編舞: Nick Power、曹德寶@不加鎖舞踊館
Choreographers: Nick Power, Hugh Cho@Unlock Dancing Plaza
其他: www.westkowloon.hk/tc/compartmentalized
Others: www.westkowloon.hk/en/compartmentalized
venue_en: West Kowloon Waterfront Promenade

Programme Name: Chopin Vs Ca - Shan Tou University
節目簡介: 鋼琴王子陳雋騫(Phoebus Chan)施展渾身解數為一眾Cai子引路，尋找蕭邦漂流在異國的思鄉情懷，玩盡Hip-hop、雜技、當代舞、舞蹈劇場、現代舞、後現代舞、前現代舞……面對現實的香港，雖然我們沒有對政府、銀行企業或地產商發泄不滿，但我們是不會那樣老實的！我們會在那僵直規劃的城市線條上踮起腳尖跳著舞，在浪漫和放蕩間嘻哈一番。這就是我們的態度、我們的夢想。
About the Programme: Popular pianist of Hong Kong, Phoebus Chan, will exercise his diverse and hypnotic best to lead the dancers into the nooks and crannies of performance-form classical music to hip-hop, acrobatics, contemporary dance, dance theatre, modern dance, post-modern dance, pre-modern dance… and more. Well, we are not going to point an accusing finger at the government, the bankers, the developers… but we won\'t take things hands down either! We have our tricks up our sleeves. We would dance on tip-toe on the dead serious profile of our city mapped out by town-planning. We would do the hip-hop with romantic abandon. So take it from us—that\'s our attitude, those are our dream.
Venue: Shantou University
演出/製作: 不加鎖舞踊館
Cast and Production: Unlock Dancing Plaza Limited
venue_en: Shantou University

節目名稱: 失物待領－中國主要城市巡演
節目簡介: 在一個人來人往的火車站裡，有個「失物待領」的服務台。 一個年青員工獃在那裡，百般好奇、無聊、迷失。 日復日，員工忙著應付無奇不有的失物及自稱失物的物主。 這個失物待領處就像生活的博物館，漸漸地讓年青員工愛上他的工作，但依然愛發夢。
About the Programme: In a busy train station, there is a Lost & Found counter. A young man works there, feels curious, bored and lost.  Day after day, he is busy handling all kinds of strange owners of lost properties.  The Lost & Found counter is like a museum of daily lives. The young man begins to like his job, but he still loves to daydream.
地點: 中國國家大劇院、曉角實驗室、廣粵天地
Venue: M.F Theatre NCPA、 Hiu Koc 、 Canton Place

Hiu Koc

節目名稱: 水舞問（選段）－詩巫國際舞蹈節 馬來西亞巡演
節目簡介: 《水舞問》探討藝術自身價值與其定價的議題。 大灑金錢去做藝術是否正常;有錢有得威，是否要有得睇;俾多D錢, 是否可以睇多D野 這是用得其所，還是浪費金錢。;何時用得其所，何時浪費？ 怎樣判斷錢是用得其所？我們總是相信觀眾的錢是值得花的。 何解？這總是一個謎。
About the Programme: Hose of Dancing Water looks into the pricing of art, and art’s intrinsic value. Is splurging a norm to make art happen? Is money to be flaunted as eye-openers? Does paying more equate to seeing more? Judicious spending, or frivolous wasting?  Whether it is one or the other, how can one tell?  We always believe the audience’s money is well spent. Now why is that? It remains a mystery.
地點: 詩巫國際舞蹈節、華仁中學、 雪隆廣青舞團、 亞洲音樂劇製作公司

節目名稱: 古怪姐妹：《馬克白》改編形體劇場
Programme Name: Weird Sisters: A Physical Theatre Adaptation of Macbeth
節目簡介: 由本會藝術總監麥蓮茜執導，糅合了形體劇場、動態與舞蹈。此劇由表演者合力打造，探索短劇《馬克白》的主題及象徵主義，如劇中的婦女角色、腐敗權力、幻覺和預言。
About the Programme: Directed by YAF’s Artistic Director Lindsey McAlister, this is a piece combining physical theatre, movement and dance. Created collaboratively by the cast, it explores the symbolism and major themes of Macbeth such as female protagonists, corruption of power.
Venue: The Underground Theatre, Fringe Club
venue_en: Fringe Club, Fringe Underground

Programme Name: The Peninsula Hong Kong’s 85th Anniversary Dance Performance “Enchantement Majestueux”
節目簡介: 編舞家廖碧璇與一群年輕的舞者合作，創造一段優美而動感十足的舞蹈劇場作品，以呈現半島酒店的華麗之道！
About the Programme: Choreographer Giselle Liu and a group of young dancers collaboratively create an elegant, high energy, action-packed dance theatre piece to capture the luxury of The Peninsula spirit!

Programme Name: Triple Threat Musical Theatre Programme Showcase: Ssshhh…!
節目簡介: 由本地的專業導師指導，經過16個星期的唱歌、演戲及舞蹈訓練，30位年青表演者將呈獻音樂劇《Ssshhh…!》，故事結合了4個深受歡迎的經典童話選段，包括《金鵝》、《薑餅男孩》、《豌豆公主》和《長髮姑娘》。 「藝能者」計劃致力提高青少年的潛能，令他們成為更強的全能表演者。經過多月的訓練，他們認識了音樂劇的傳統與現代風格，同時接觸多元化的聲演技巧、角色扮演方法及舞蹈風格。
About the Programme: After 16 weeks of training in singing, acting and dance with some of Hong Kong’s leading professionals, our very own cast of 30 talented young triple threats present Ssshhh…! – a musical retelling of the much-loved classic fairy tales The Golden Goose, The Gingerbread Boy, The Real Princess and Rapunzel. Triple Threat is YAF’s programme for teenagers designed to enhance their potential for becoming strong, well-rounded performers. Throughout the training, participants are introduced to classical and modern forms of musical theatre and exposed to an array of vocal techniques, character development methods and dance styles.
Venue: Drama Studio, Chinese International School

Programme Name: The Peninsula Hong Kong’s 85th Anniversary Dance Performance “Tea for Two”
節目簡介: 香港青年藝術協會總監麥蓮茜與一群包括成人及青少年的舞者/編舞家合作，於酒店大堂創作一段輕鬆幽默的作品，以呈現半島酒店優雅下午茶的經典特色！
About the Programme: YAF Director Lindsey McAlister and a group of mixed youth and adult dancer-choreographers collaboratively create a relaxing and fun dance theatre piece at the lobby to represent the classical high tea experience of The Peninsula Hotel!

About the Programme: Choreographer Kirsten Ho and a group of young dancers collaboratively create a beautiful and refreshing dance piece to praise Peninsula\'s reputable outstanding customer service.

節目名稱: 半島酒店85週年舞蹈表演「酒店行李員」
Programme Name: The Peninsula Hong Kong’s 85th Anniversary Dance Performance “The Bellhop”
節目簡介: 結合「行李員」和「林迪舞」，香港青年藝術協會總監麥蓮茜與一群年輕的舞者/編舞家合作，創造一段充滿樂趣和力量，動感十足的舞蹈劇場作品，以呈現半島酒店的精神及其華麗之體驗！ 「行李員」是酒店的搬運工，幫助入住或退房的客人搬運行李，是一個往往被人忽略而非常重要的角色！昔日，行李員必須留意櫃檯的召集鐘響，一如「跳起」般反應迅速，這就是行李員英文名稱bellhop的由來。今天，半島酒店行李員的潔白制服和溫馨笑容，已經成為其典型標誌。 演出獻給半島酒店的工作人員，以表揚他們這85年來的辛勤工作。
About the Programme: Combining ‘bellhops’ and the dance style lindy hopping, YAF Director Lindsey McAlister and a group of young dancer-choreographers collaboratively create a fun-filled, high energy, action-packed dance theatre piece to capture the spirit and luxury of The Peninsula experience!   A ‘bellhop’, also a ‘bellboy’, is a hotel porter, who helps patrons with their luggage while checking in or out – a very important role that many of us often overlook! In the olden days, an employee would have to ‘hop’ to attention when summoned by the front desk by a bell – and this is where the term ‘bellhop’ comes from. Today, The Peninsula’s Hotel’s bellboys have become iconic in their crisp white uniforms and welcoming smiles.   This performance is dedicated to the staff of The Peninsula Hotel, as recognition of their hard work over these 85 years.
地點: 尖沙咀 香港半島酒店大堂
Venue: Lobby, The Peninsula Hong Kong, Tsim Sha Tsui
venue.1: 尖沙咀 香港半島酒店大堂
venue_en: Lobby, The Peninsula Hong Kong, Tsim Sha Tsui

節目名稱: 半島酒店85週年舞蹈表演「聽牆說話兒」
Programme Name: The Peninsula Hong Kong’s 85th Anniversary Dance Performance “If Walls Could Talk”
節目簡介: 真切溫情、嘆為觀止、熱誠、優雅、豪華和服務，這些都是編舞者鄧悠韻在設計半島酒店85週年舞蹈表演時，對酒店所聯想到的二三事。  16位年輕、充滿理想的舞蹈員，運用詞語設計舞步，合作創造出這支當代舞作品，演繹本土甚具代表性的酒店最宏亮的一面。透過不同的時間、空間、高低和方向啟發動態，這支滿有力量而優雅的舞蹈，跳出酒店的獨特建築風格，同時令酒店大堂活潑起來。
About the Programme: Genuine warmth, breathtaking, passion, elegance, luxurious and service – these are the qualities that come to choreographer Siobhan Dumigan’s mind when devising a piece for The Peninsula Hotel’s 85th anniversary celebrations.  Using words as the main device to build movement, 16 young aspiring dancers co-create this contemporary piece with the idea to capture the grandeur of Hong Kong’s most iconic hotel. By manipulating movement through time, space, levels and directions, this strong yet elegant dance embraces the hotel’s unique architecture and brings The Peninsula Lobby to life.
地點: 尖沙咀 香港半島酒店大堂
Venue: Lobby, The Peninsula Hong Kong, Tsim Sha Tsui
venue.1: 尖沙咀 香港半島酒店大堂
venue_en: Lobby, The Peninsula Hong Kong, Tsim Sha Tsui

Programme Name: Standard Chartered Arts in the Park Mardi Gras 2013
節目簡介: 每年一度的戶外大型社區藝術活動，自2008年起，參與及觀賞人數逐年攀升，巡遊匯演由維多利亞公園走出銅鑼灣街頭，吸引了12萬市民及遊客參與。活動以「躍動藝術風」為創作主題，透過五大巡遊環節，引領觀眾走進創意澎湃、穿梭不同時期的大師級畫作的色彩世界。一連兩天的精彩的藝術活動包括：巡遊匯演、日舞、藝趣攤位及舞蹈表演等，讓全港市民共度歡欣週末！
About the Programme: Since 2008, the Standard Chartered Arts in the Park Mardi Gras (AIP) has been a large-scale, annual Community Arts Event in Hong Kong – attracting 120,000 visitors. AIP is also a fantastic opportunity for everyone to enjoy a variety of lively, innovative art activities, including a thematic street parade, sun dances, vibrant art stalls and a medley of dance performances. The theme of year 2013 is “Gallery in Motion”. It is a gallery like no others, introduce you five great art movements in the history via an unprecedented lively way.
Venue: Victoria Park
venue_en: Victoria Park

節目簡介: 前百老匯最長青音樂劇《舞步青雲》，向觀眾展示一場百老匯音樂劇最終回面試的苛刻實況。故事反映演藝界的辛酸，但也道出種種鬥爭、夢想、被拒絕的殘酷，以及從過新生的機會。摒棄一貫金光閃閃的舞台，它呈現了劇場真實的一面：美艷有時，艱苦有時，心碎有時，悲慘有時。 40位出色的年輕演員、歌手和舞蹈員，讓觀眾體會故事背後的血、汗與淚水。劇目旋律悅耳，獲百老匯東尼獎的歌曲包括What I did for Love、At the Ballet和One (Singular Sensation)。
About the Programme: Formerly Broadway’s longest running musical, A CHORUS LINE takes audiences through the final, grueling audition for a new Broadway musical. While it speaks loudest to those in the business, it is also a universal tale of struggle, striving to fulfill a dream, the brutality of rejection, and the opportunity to gain a second chance in life. It departs from the usual glossy backstage musical by presenting a true picture of what it is like to be in the theatre: glamorous at times, but also tough, heartbreaking and tragic. 40 talented young actors, singers and dancers inspire you to experience the blood, sweat and tears that goes on behind the scenes with this Tony® Award-winning score, which includes songs like ‘What I did for Love’, ‘At the Ballet’ and ‘One (Singular Sensation)’.
地點: 香港藝術中心壽臣劇院
Venue: Shouson Theatre, Hong Kong Arts Centre
venue.1: 香港藝術中心香港藝術中心壽臣劇院
venue_en: Hong Kong Arts Centre, Hong Kong Arts Centre, Shouson Theatre

節目名稱: 太古地產白色聖誕市集舞蹈表演
Programme Name: Swire Properties White Christmas Street Fair Dance Performance
節目簡介: 香港青年藝術協會《舞步青雲》的精選環節，透露百老匯音樂劇面試的苛刻實況。
About the Programme: Highlights of Hong Kong Youth Arts Foundation’s A CHORUS LINE, taking the audiences through the grueling audition for a new Broadway musical.
Venue: TaiKoo Place
venue_en: TaiKoo Place

Programme Name: Standard Chartered Arts in the Park Mardi Gras 2014
節目簡介: 每年一度的戶外大型社區藝術活動，自2008年起，參與及觀賞人數逐年攀升，巡遊匯演由維多利亞公園走出銅鑼灣街頭，吸引了近10萬市民及遊客參與。活動以「藝遊科幻境界」為創作題材，從藝術角度演繹時空穿梭、天文、自然生態及機動工程。一連兩天的精彩的藝術活動包括：巡遊匯演、日舞、藝趣攤位及舞蹈表演等，讓全港市民共度歡欣週末！
About the Programme: Since 2008, the Standard Chartered Arts in the Park Mardi Gras (AIP) has been a large-scale, annual Community Arts Event in Hong Kong – attracting 10,000 visitors. AIP is also a fantastic opportunity for everyone to enjoy a variety of lively, innovative art activities, including a thematic street parade, sun dances, vibrant art stalls and a medley of dance performances. Taking inspiration from science, and topics as diverse as travel, astronomy, wildlife and robotics, thousands of young people and artists will come together to create original performance and visual art under the theme ‘Defying Gravity’.
Venue: Victoria Park
venue_en: Victoria Park

節目簡介: 孤兒奧立佛在邦布爾先生的救濟院裡過著煉獄般的生活，無處容身，遂決定逃亡到倫敦，並遇上費金先生盜竊集團的狡猾首領道奇。就在奧立佛被迫當上小偷之時，他遇見改寫他一生的紳士先生… 由奧立佛的經典對白「先生，我想多要一點」開始，這齣引人入勝的音樂劇將透過多首獲百老匯東尼獎的歌曲如I’d Do Anything、You’ve Got To Pick A Pocket or Two和As Long As He Needs Me，帶領觀眾展開驚險之旅。
About the Programme: Escaping from Mr. Bumble’s cruel workhouse with no food, no money and nowhere to live, poor orphan Oliver Twist meets the Artful Dodger, the cheeky leader of loathsome Mr. Fagin’s pint-sized gang of pickpockets. But just as Oliver seems about to embark on a life of petty criminality, he encounters a kind gentleman who might hold the key to his past and future… From the moment Oliver utters the classic words, “Please, sir, I want some more,” this gripping musical takes you on a thrilling journey packed with Tony® Award-winning tunes including I\'d Do Anything, You’ve Got To Pick A Pocket or Two and As Long As He Needs Me.
地點: 香港藝術中心壽臣劇院
Venue: Shouson Theatre, Hong Kong Arts Centre
venue.1: 香港藝術中心香港藝術中心壽臣劇院
venue_en: Hong Kong Arts Centre, Hong Kong Arts Centre, Shouson Theatre

節目簡介: 大型音樂及藝術節Clockenflap首次與香港青年藝術協會攜手合作，為觀眾帶來一系列精彩演出及演後工作坊。 由藝高現代舞蹈團主理、連同本會舞蹈員所演出的「Beatastic」，頌讚節慶中所綻放的自然且具感染力的能量。舞蹈員在漸入高潮的音樂及舞蹈下，舞出一連串抬舉、旋轉及跳躍動作，將身體化成樂器，創作狂熱與引人入勝的節奏。「Negotiating Pulse」是由三位舞者及三名鼓手配以三套爵士鼓演繹虛擬現實的舞蹈及敲擊樂演出。專業藝術家Christine He、Christina Jensen、Mayson Tong、Yu Pak Kin Perkin、Hubert So及Anna Fan在寧靜與狂野音樂中，譜出強勁節奏，震撼觀眾的視覺、聽覺及感覺。 演出結束後設有免費工作坊，由一眾藝術家探索各種節拍、節奏和動作。
About the Programme: Hong Kong Youth Arts Foundation is thrilled to co-present Clockenflap x HKYAF2014, a programme of exciting original performances and workshops.  Beatastic, created by DANCE Kho and featuring YAF dancers, celebrates the raw and infective energy of festivals. In a growing crescendo of movement and music, the dancers perform a choreography of lifts, turns and jumps, using their bodies as instruments to create rhythms that will leave you breathless and wanting more. Negotiating Pulse is an immersive dance and percussive performance with three dancers, three drummers and three drum sets. Swinging between the quiet and the ecstatic, professional artists Christine He, Christina Jensen, Mayson Tong, Sascia Pellegrini and Anna Fan create powerful rhythms that are seen, heard and felt. Free workshops on beat, rhythm and movement were held after the performances.
Venue: Club Minky at Clockenflap, West Kowloon Cultural District
venue_en: Club Minky at Clockenflap, West Kowloon Cultural District

節目名稱: 太古地產白色聖誕市集舞蹈表演
Programme Name: Swire Properties White Christmas Street Fair Dance Performance

About the Programme: Highlights of Hong Kong Youth Arts Foundation’s Oliver! on the street! Plus more than 10 amazing youth dance groups showing their talents!
Venue: TaiKoo Place
venue_en: TaiKoo Place

Venue: Auditorium, Yuen Long Theatre
venue_en: Yuen Long Theatre, Auditorium

節目名稱: 舞蹈匯演暨導師結業禮
Programme Name: Dance Performance cum Dance Teacher’s Certificate Presentation Ceremony
節目簡介: 本會積極推廣舞蹈活動和悉心安排定期舞蹈匯演，並邀請本會專業導師、學員及各界舞蹈團體參與舞蹈匯演，各人舞蹈經驗雖有不同，務求於表演時彼此互相交流心得、切磋舞藝，推廣舞蹈充滿熱誠，造就一次互相觀摩、學習、欣賞良機；透過不同種類的舞蹈表演，讓拉丁莎莎及排排舞更趨普及。本會致力培訓導師及表演工作，表演訓練過程讓舞蹈技巧能學以致用，提升表演質素和能力，還需要廣闊視野及開放態度，把新編排的舞蹈呈獻給觀眾，發掘更多有潛質及興趣人士，提供舞蹈學習及表演的機會。
About the Programme: In order to fulfil the mission of promoting Latin dance, we present this event of the Dance Performance, it aims to provide a opportunity for sharing experience of the graduate teachers, students and the dancers from the other dancing schools and organizations. Although each dancer has different dancing experience, they are full of enthusiasm in promotion and enhancement the level of dancing. They are open to share dancing knowledge and techniques with devoted to the art of dance and bring some new choreographed creative dances with full of energy and enthusiasm to all audiences. It is the pleasure to see everybody to enjoy this commendable evening, the dance performer have gathered to demonstrate the dancing skills. This provides a opportunity for the dancing lovers to learn through the Dance Performances and give them to have a good exercise; rhythmic movements to music provide an effective workout to keep healthy and fit and have fun.
地點: 九龍油麻地眾坊街60 號梁顯利社區中心一樓禮堂
Venue: Henry G. Leong Yaumatei Community Centre (60 Public Square Street, Yau Ma Tei, Kowloon)
製作/演出單位: 香港西方舞總會有限公司
Production / Performing Unit: Hong Kong Western Dance Council Ltd.
子分類_ArtGenre SubCategory: 西方民族舞、標準／拉丁舞

Programme Name: The Wish of Tap Tap (Audience Interactive Edition)
節目簡介: 小踏踏擁有強壯的鐵皮身軀，身體卻總不由自主地發出「滴滴踏踏」的噪音，令河馬波波不勝其煩，經常發生爭執。正當國王為此煩惱時，雙子女巫告訴他，只要找到傳說中的愛心晶石，便能化解紛爭。於是國王命令小踏踏、雙子女巫和波波一同踏上尋找愛心晶石的旅程。途中他們遇見了瘦蜢蜢、大咀鳥和痴肥仔，透過各人的故事，小踏踏和波波漸漸學懂尊重和欣賞別人的重要。
About the Programme: With his metallic body, Tap Tap the Tinman lives up to his name. This causes many arguments with his friend, Po Po the hippo, who finds all the clatter really annoying. Their constant rows upset the King until he learns about the “Crystal of Love” from a visiting sorceress, who says it can resolve any quarrel. He then sends Tap Tap, Po Po and the sorceress to look for the crystal, a journey that finds the trio encountering amazing new friends and learning more about respect and appreciation for others along the way.
Venue: Tai Po Civic Centre Auditorium
venue_en: Tai Po Civic Centre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 巫是最古老的舞蹈家，她是傳達天、地、人溝通的媒介，古時原始社會，巫支配大地，推雲撥月，朝天壓地，面對原始人與動物之本能，適者生存，排難解紛，更帶領部族跳舞，祭祀春天之神，祈福保安。 隨著時代的巨輪，觀蛇鳥之爭鬥，悟太極之智慧，人開始探索宇宙中天地人的奧秘，捉摸對方的虛實，巫把智慧欣賜大地，人的不斷地貪取獲得而漠視關懷的溝通下，巫在孤寂下心碎而死，原始的呼喚，反思在得與捨下如何獲得平衡？
About the Programme: The unpredictable Magician Wu was the leader of all original dances and communication medium of heaven, earth and human. In ancient society, he had the power to dominate the whole universe and was able to avert calamities and brought blessings. As time went by, the battle between the snake and the bird awoke the wisdom of Tai Chi through this work people realizing that the importance of harmony and communication is the only existence for the human race.
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: Grand Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目名稱: 地區藝術觀眾培育計劃：印象香江之「沙田元朗銅鑼灣」社區巡迴
節目簡介: 節目是以特定社區的自身文化及故事製作的「踢躂舞故事劇場」。三個社區串連在一起，利用帶有傳統的說唱形式為融合點，把古老的藝術加上地道的故事，以踢躂舞重新展現在觀眾眼前。每區我們會以一個生活傳統為代表，例如銅鑼灣鵝頸橋的打小人文化、大坑舞火龍、元朗抗戰的堅毅，作為始點和故事的開端，把傳統的感覺和現代的文化互相配合，介紹該區鮮為人知的一面。
地點: 天水圍嘉湖銀座商場、沙田大會堂廣場、銅鑼灣維多利亞公園音樂亭
venue.1:
天水圍嘉湖銀座商場
沙田大會堂廣場
銅鑼灣維多利亞公園音樂亭

Their constant rows upset the King until he learns about the “Crystal of Love” from a visiting sorceress, who says it can resolve any quarrel. He then sends Tap Tap, Po Po and the sorceress to look for the crystal, a journey that finds the trio encountering amazing new friends and learning more about respect and appreciation for others along the way.
