節目簡介: \"The Birthday Party\" 華生家有四姊妹、 今天是大姐姐瑪莉的生日、 三個妹妹決定為大姐姐好好慶祝生日。你一言我一語、 最後安妮決定留在家中佈置場地、莉茲負責購買禮物、 貝兒負責食物。  莉兹和貝兒一來到市集、 琳瑯滿目的店舖和攤位多得教她們眼花撩亂、 好不熱鬧。 她們挑了好一會、 才選好食材和禮物。安妮跟女傭一起打掃大屋、 其他邀來幫忙的朋友則佈置著大廳、莉茲帶了食材回到家中、 立即跑到廚房、 跟廚師一起把新鲜的食材化爲一道道讓人食指大動的菜色。  瑪莉全不知道大宅中三個妹妹的打算、 正跟好朋友們在後園中享用下午茶。  「叮噹」門鈴響了起來、 是瑪莉回來了！  三個妹妹爭先恐後地跑到大門迎接生日會的主角、半推半哄、蒙起瑪莉的雙眼、然後領她到大廳。桌上有美味的食物、大廳佈置得美輪美奐、賓客一早就在等了。  她們大喊：「 生日快樂！」推出生日蛋糕，並送上祝福和禮物。 瑪莉很是驚喜、 她感激說： 「 謝謝妳們。 」 華家的四姊妹度過了開心快樂的一天。
About the Programme: \"The Birthday Party” Once upon a time,  there were the four sisters called Mary, Liz, Annie and Belle. Today is Mary\'s birthday, the other three younger sisters decided to surprise Mary on her birthday. Finally,  Annie agreed to decorate the house while Liz shopped for presents and Belle for food.  Liz and Belle arrived at the market and saw a group of gypsies dancing in the middle of the plaza. They were amazing!  Not surprisingly,  it took them a while to complete their tasks. Meanwhile,  Annie and the little helpers were busy cleaning and decorating the house.  Liz ran into the kitchen immediately after she arrived home. Together with the chef, they were about to turn the fresh ingredients into a delicious gourmet.  Mary had no clue that her sisters\' had a surprise for her.  She was just enjoying her afternoon tea with her friends in the garden. \"\"Ding-dong!\"\"  Mary was back!  The three sisters could not wait to greet their girl of the day!  They blindfolded Mary and led her into the living room.  The place was magnificently decorated and food ready to be served.  \"Happy Birthday!\" A beautifully made birthday cake was presented with the company of blessings and presents.    Mary received her blessings and together they had a wondrous evening.
Venue: Auditorium, Sha Tin Town Hall
Choreographers: Winky Chau/ Kwok Wing Yan/ Lam Wing Yi/ Alice Cheng/ Leung Yee Tak/ Emily Chan/ Sue So/ Catherine Chan/ Helga Fung/ Charlotte Ho/ June Chung/ Zenith Tse/ Miki Leung
venue_en: Auditorium, Sha Tin Town Hall

節目簡介: 《格壁城市》融合了現代舞的美學及演譯城市景觀的街舞技巧，給觀眾驚喜連連。十八分鐘的演出引領觀眾進入一幕幕行色匆匆的城市場景，直叫觀眾重新經驗人人熟悉的生活場所 ── 火車、馬路、升降機……《格壁城市》由舞蹈出發，配上現場敲擊及實地錄音的香港聲音景觀，以動作與聲音勾劃城市生活；在人們急速步伐，割裂空間的規範下，希望你我可以打破無形的圍牆，實現表達自我、跟他人溝通的慾望。
About the Programme: Striking strategic balance between dexterous skills and witty details, Compartmentalized blended contemporary choreography’s fluid aesthetics with street dance’s direct engagement with the cityscape; every passing second urged audiences to anticipate for the next surprise. Employing the universal language of dance and a contagious soundscape made of live percussions and field recordings of Hong Kong’s streets, the 18-minute piece lends a theatrical twist to familiar actions of frantic cities like taking the train, crossing the road, or squeezing into a crowded elevator. Compartmentalized is about life in the city; its unrelenting pace, its segmented space, and the urge for people to break through confining walls for self expression and interaction.
Venue: Chinese New Year Markets, Belmore Park, Eddy Ave, Sydney, Australia
製作/演出單位: 不加鎖舞踊館, Stalker Theatre
其他: www.westkowloon.hk/tc/compartmentalized
Others: www.westkowloon.hk/en/compartmentalized
venue_en: Chinese New Year Markets, Belmore Park, Eddy Ave, Sydney, Australia

節目簡介: 「自由野」是個為期兩天的戶外文化藝術節，結合了不同文化元素和跨界別藝術，內容由龔志成、楊春江、Virginia Hyam及MaD香港當代文化中心共同策劃，為觀眾帶來精彩的節目包括現場音樂、舞蹈、戶外表演及藝術共創。「自由野」亦是西九文化區管理局與跨界別藝術家和藝術組織聯合策劃的空間實驗，建立一種關乎文化、藝術、空間與公眾參與的互動態度。走進「自由野」，可以自由叫、自由唱、自由跳、自由玩，只要你自得其樂，這片空間都容得下。在「自由野」，不分台上台下、幕前幕後，都能親身參與，盡情投入這個文化空間。舞蹈單位: 節拍攻擊, Beyond 852, Performcrew, Les Danseurs Dance Troupe, Chiliboyz, 東邊舞蹈團
About the Programme: Freespace Fest is a two-day outdoor arts and cultural festival featuring a diverse line-up of music, dance, outdoor performances and collaborative programmes. It is an attempt to test the boundaries of public space where participants can shout, sing, dance and play at their will.Co-curated by cross-disciplinary artists Virginia Hyam, Kung Chi Shing, Daniel Yeung and MaD, Hong Kong Institute of Contemporary Culture, Freespace Fest does not merely showcase a blend of the arts and cultural elements that have shaped Hong Kong, but is also an experiment on how we can use the future West Kowloon Cultural District site for festivals.Come and participate, whether this be on-stage or off-stage, front or back of house, and be immersed in the arts.Dance Groups: Rhythm Attack, Beyond 852, Performcrew, Les Danseurs Dance Troupe, Chiliboyz, E-side Dance Company
Venue: West Kowloon Waterfront Promenade
其他: http://www.freespace.hk/2012/zh-hk/
Others: http://www.freespace.hk/2012/en-us/
venue_en: West Kowloon Waterfront Promenade

節目名稱: 自由野2014 - s.l.o.a.p (Space Left Over After Planning)
Programme Name: Freespace Fest 2014 - s.l.o.a.p (Space Left Over After Planning)
節目簡介: 來自澳洲悉尼的Branch Nebula勇於挑戰主流，策劃結合表演、舞蹈及設計的節目。於「自由野2014」，他們與本港一眾跑酷、極限武術、街舞、電單車高手連同聲音藝術家創作了《s.l.o.a.p.》 (Space Left Over After Planning)。在貨櫃箱、石屎障礙物和木櫃組裝的表演場地上，表演者施展渾身解數，以行雲流水的身手和無懈可擊的精準技巧，表演一連串令人驚心動魄的高難度動作，將人體潛能推至極限。作品既在都市環境中尋求挑戰，跨越障礙，創造刺激及驚喜，更可讓觀眾擔任「流動障礙物」，身處表演者當中，感受官能與肢體刺激。
About the Programme: Branch Nebula from Sydney, Australia works across disciplines in performance, dance and design that challenges mainstream cultural conventions. For Freespace Fest 2014, they created ‘s.l.o.a.p.’ (Space Left Over After Planning) in collaboration with local street-style artists: parkourists, trickers, dancers, a trial motorcyclist, and a sound artist. Designed and created in a massive playground of steel shipping containers, concrete blocks, and wooden boxes. ‘s.l.o.a.p.’ is a visual spectacle of urban and street forms that explodes our perceptions of dance, movement and performance in which tightly choreographed, fast paced action places the human body at the outer limits. The performers hunt for challenges in unplanned purposes of the built environment, finding them in the most surprising ways, jumping gaps with cat-like agility, and landing with absolute precision. In the midst of the swirling bodies the audience plays the role of a ‘human obstacle’. Volunteer audiences are positioned in the middle of the action where they are at once spectator and part of the spectacle.
Venue: West Kowloon Waterfront Promenade
Choreographers: Lee Wilson & Mirabelle Wouters @ Branch Nebula
其他: www.westkowloon.hk/tc/freespacefest
Others: www.westkowloon.hk/en/freespacefest
venue_en: West Kowloon Waterfront Promenade

節目簡介: 「自由躍」於西九海濱長廊, 以活力十足的街舞及跑酷表演展示本地青年及街頭文化。由香港飛躍道協會共同策劃，香港跑酷高手以靈活敏捷的身手，自由流暢地展現攀越高牆、跳過間隙、從高處躍下等另類表演藝術。觀眾更可參與免費的跑酷工作坊，體驗這個律動藝術的獨特之處及背後的精神理念。同場還有由Hongboy@節拍攻擊共同策劃的街舞表演，工作坊及比賽。
About the Programme: Take A Leap is an outdoor event that featured high-powered street dance and parkour at the West Kowloon Waterfront Promenade. It brought together some of the brightest talents in the city, taking audiences on a journey to Hong Kong’s youth and street culture. Climbing up walls, leaping across gaps and landing from high falls are just some of the breathtaking moves audiences witnessed from the parkour programme. Co-curated by Hong Kong Parkour Association, our parkour performers showcased their free flowing self-expression and agility, alongside free workshops where audiences were invited to explore and understand the spirit behind this new art form. As well as parkour, audience also experienced the best of Hong Kong’s vibrant street dance. Co-curated by Hongboy@Rhythm Attack, the street dance programme consisted of performances, workshops and exciting battles.
Venue: West Kowloon Waterfront Promenade
其他: http://www.westkowloon.hk/tc/takealeap
Others: http://www.westkowloon.hk/tc/takealeap
venue_en: West Kowloon Waterfront Promenade

Programme Name: Isla School of Dance 5th Year Anniversary Performance - A Ballerina's Journey
Venue: Drama Theatre, The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts
venue_en: Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts, Drama Theatre

節目簡介: 韵情舞集成立以來轉眼間已經歷了十個年頭，而於2013年10月14日假西灣河文娛中心舉行了的，正是韵情舞集的十週年演出晚會 -《韵情拾穗》。相對於百年樹人的培育，我們尚有很遠的距離，但十週年亦是一個特別的日子; 而拾穗的意思，就是要彎著腰，流著汗地將成果一點一滴地撿拾及累積起來。所以韵情舞集就將十年以來累積的得獎作品 - 撿拾的成果作一個整合，一次過呈獻給觀眾欣賞。另外，亦邀請了多個演出團體及嘉賓，一同將歡樂帶給廣大觀眾。
About the Programme: The Tenth Anniversary performance organized by Kidance Troupe has been held on 14/10/2013 at the Theatre of Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre. A number of prize awarded and phenomenal dances during the past ten years were performed on stage again. Many guest performers were invited to perform as well.
Venue: Sai Wan Ho Civil Centre Theatre
venue_en: Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre, Theatre

節目名稱: 飛舞天下《展翅高飛》舞蹈匯演
舞蹈類別: 中國舞, 民族舞, 現代舞, 現代中國舞
節目簡介: 以「創新民族風」為匯演的主題，強調中國民族舞蹈的承傳與創新，嘗試把不同舞蹈風格注入傳統中國舞蹈，如創編舞蹈「沒有翅膀的翱翔」就是將現代舞的特色加添到漢族舞的作品。
Venue: Theatre, Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre
venue_en: Theatre, Sai Wan Ho Civic Centre

節目名稱: 《萬紫千紅 之 情真美善歌舞樂(二) 天長地久》
節目簡介: 《萬紫千紅之情真美善歌舞樂(二) 天長地久》  歌舞晚會主題、風格圍繞天長地久的愛來展開，「七月七日長生殿，夜半無人私語時」是無人不知家傳户繞的民間歷史故事，一個全新創作古典舞劇《天長地久》，大胆揉和京歌《梨花頌》、身段、水袖、劍、長綢、古典舞蹈《霓裳羽衣舞》、揉合京劇身段《贵妃醉酒》、古箏獨奏《夜深沉》等嶄新形式的元素，去讚頌堅貞的愛情；引領大家進入這段「天長地久有盡時，此恨綿綿無絕期」的愛情故事中。節目還包括民族舞如朝鲜族《盛開的金達萊》《元宵燈會》、白族《霸王鞭》《五朵金花》、漢族《小河淌水》、納西族《月亮花》…，表達不同風格的愛情故事；歌曲包括《敖包相會》《美丽的草原我的家》《在那桃花盛開的地方》《傳奇》《今夜無眠》《因為愛情》《夢》…
About the Programme: Wan Zi Qian Hong – an evening of Dance and Music  “Love Till Eternity” The style and theme of the performance is about “Eternal Love”. The romance and love story between The Tang Emperor and the Princess Yang is a folklore passed down from generation to generation. An individual performance section is dedicated to this story, utilizing Beijing Opera and traditional dance steps. Individual performance sections include: Korean cultural dances, Bai Zhu cultural dances, Na Shi cultural dance, which portrait different styles of love stories; and songs.
Venue: Hong Kong City Hall Concert  Hall
Presenter: Wan Zi Qian Hong Yi Shu Tuan Performing Arts
Production / Performing Unit: Wan Zi Qian Hong Yi Shu Tuan Performing Arts
venue_en: Hong Kong City Hall, Concert Hall

節目名稱: 同在藍天下．舞動中國夢
舞蹈類別: 中國舞, 民族舞, 現代舞
節目簡介: 來自香港的碧華舞蹈團和昆明山娃娃民族舞蹈團、雲藝苗苗舞蹈培訓學校、昆明青少年活動中心舞蹈二部等團體以“同在藍天下，舞動中國夢”為主題，將共同為大家表演了二十個舞蹈節目。

節目簡介: 設計全新視角、公共空間、藝術角度三為一體的舞蹈作品。以大膽新穎的「偽角度」塑造出不一樣的「藝空間」。演出與視覺藝術家合作，利用各類視覺效果，包括錄像投影，扣連空間的佈景設置等等元素，突破舞蹈演出的空間界限。
About the Programme: With a breathtaking collage of images, this post-modern dance production explores the intricate love-power relationship between man, beast and demon and reveals the significance of a folk tale in its contemporary contexts. It goes in search of a Hui Sin who seems to have been lost in the thousand-year-old legend.

節目簡介: 一夜牌局爭執釀成四名學生命喪鐵錘下。血案轟動國內，震發輿論。是欺凌？是歧視？還是貧窮有罪？雙城編舞黃茹黃磊，直視血腥慘案，苦挖人性之罪。四位年輕舞者以自身故事與肢體語言，舞成段段殘酷青春。
About the Programme: A poker game ended with four dead bodies. Bullying, discriminateon or indigence? And what is the nature of humanity? Reflecting on the nationwide shocking tragic, with text and body movements of four young dancers, M-cident questions the twisted desire and impatience of the youth, and softly embraces the gragility of life.

Programme Name: The Island Whispers… by DanceArt Hong Kong
節目簡介: 「當一切消失以後，如何憑藉記憶，去追溯這個城方的痕跡？」 相隔十三年，黎海寧與動藝再度合作，共同譜寫一首在癈墟上流動之詩。
About the Programme: “When all is lost and gone. How do we retrace our past in this land of forgetfulness?” After a lapse of thirteen years, Helen Lai joins hands with DanceArt again to create a dance poem on an imaginary wasteland.

Venue: Shouson Theatre, Hong Kong Arts Centre

venue_en: Hong Kong Arts Centre, Hong Kong Arts Centre, Shouson Theatre

節目簡介: 對於我們來說，別人的世界總是離奇古怪，甚至不可思議。異於我的世界，異於我們的生活，即使跟我們有巨大的差別，但仍然能夠激發無窮的想像力，引起共鳴，牽動著身邊的你、我、他。或者我們從不理解，但當我們放下自己一套，嘗試坦誠地接觸他們，這個世界就變得不一樣，我們且敬且畏，卻能夠想像到他們的世界，反過來，我們的世界也突然被放大了。
About the Programme: It is the perception of other people\'s worlds - worlds almost inconceivably strange, yet inhabited by people just like ourselves. Other worlds, other lives, even though so different from our own, have the power of arousing the sympathetic imagination, of awakening an intense and often creative resonance in others. We may never really understand, but once we genuinely try, we will see the world differently - we can imaginetheir world, with a sort of awe, and with this our own world is suddenly enlarged.

節目簡介: 「舞蹈青年」是CCDC舞蹈中心的重點培訓項目，過住曾培育出一班舞壇新力量，不少已成為本地年青舞蹈界的中堅份子。「舞蹈青年2015─城市舞邊界」是一次難得的機會，讓你成為城市當代舞蹈團的青年舞者。你將獲得連續九個月專業高水平的舞蹈培訓，成就非凡舞藝，並將所得展現在屬於你們的社區平台。若你願意挑戰，並且具備信心，準備為自我、為藝術付出時間和汗水，我們誠意邀請你參加「舞蹈青年」－平台舞蹈表演計劃。
About the Programme: Selected students will be offered 9 months of professional dance training, and their extraordinary achievement will be showcased to the community via the podium shows. If your are willing to take up challenges and ready to devote your time and sweat for dance, we sincerely invite you to join WuDaoQingNian - Podium Dance Performance. To undertake the mission of \"from the masses, to the masses\", the programme selects a group of elite dancers from the community who will then be offered a wide range of rigorous training and intensive rehearsals. Finally they will present their achievement back to the community. Dancers will also have the opportunity to participate in overseas tour.
地點: 上環新紀元廣場花園廣場、黃大仙上邨廟宇廣場、油麻地社區中心休憩花園(廟街榕樹頭)

節目簡介: 《整容》將透過、舞蹈、戲劇、音樂，聲效及錄像的原素，從感觀刺激中呈現出現今世代的一些瘋狂現像：拉皮、更換細胞怎至基因改造。揭示這些「美麗」背後隱藏著「殺機」。舞者運用肢體，聲音，道具等等努力呈現這個瘋狂世界，帶領觀眾觀照這個注重外表的保養，「以貌取人」，「以貌娶妻」的現今世代，不少人為了配合這個世界决定嘗試跟隨、嘗試擁護改變、嘗試複製擁護，甚至不惜一切去破壞自我以迎合這標準來以達致「世界大同」。如果有一天，這世界的觀點有一天又改變了，那你又會如何呢？

節目簡介: 成長路本來就是孤獨的。一個人去走，一個人去面對；沒有人明白你，更遑論有人去引導你。出於本能，你摸著石頭過河，走一步算一步。但誰又能夠說他們一路走來了無遺憾? 直到有一天，你終於能夠從成長路上錯落的陰霾中走出來，同時看清楚就是這一堆錯落成就今天的你。

節目簡介: 《Good Show》乃CCDC舞蹈中心為學員提供的舞蹈實踐演出平台。以參與《Good Show 2014》演出為訓練基礎的排演班，為不同程度的舞蹈愛好者提供各種舞蹈的表演訓練，包括：現代舞、爵士舞、芭蕾舞、中國舞等。所有參加的學員均會接受專業舞蹈技巧及表演訓練，並與我們一班高水準及經驗豐富的舞蹈導師共同分享舞蹈的愉悅。學員最後將於2014年12月假沙田大會堂演奏廳舉行的《Good Show 2014》內演出，一展努力成果。
About the Programme: Good Show is a platform provided by CCDC Dance Centre for student to showcase their passion for dance in public performances. Our Repertoires are especially designed for students who would like to join Good Show 2014. A variety of dance classes are offered to participants with different interests and levels. With the professional techniques and performing skills training received, participants can bear fruit on stage with our high quality and experienced teachers. Fruitages will be shared at Good Show 2014 which will be held at the Auditorium, Sha Tin Town Hall on December, 2014.
Venue: Shatin Town Hall

節目名稱: 《那一年‧這一天》佛羅倫斯巡演
Programme Name: As If To Nothing Florence Tour
節目簡介: CCDC獲邀參與意大利法比加藝術節演出《那一年．這一天》。以記憶為主題，桑吉加編創澎湃的肢體語彙，在李勁松充滿張力的電子音樂與楊振業重重互動錄像交織中，與CCDC舞者重新演繹這個充滿爆發力的作品。
About the Programme: CCDC was invited to perform As If To Nothing at arts festival FABBRICA EUROPA in Italy.  As If To Nothing is an adrenaline-packed and interactive multimedia work created by the internationally renowned choreographer Sang Jijia, featuring electronic music by Dickson Dee and video design by Adrian Yeung. This tour-de-forcere turns for another breathtaking journey led by CCDC dancers and their extremely physical and emotional performance.
Venue: Opera di Firenze, Italy

Programme Name: Beijing Dance Festival - Hedvig From The Wild Duck
節目簡介: 獲芭蕾國際年鑑推選為「卓越編舞」的挪威旗艦舞團ZVC藝術總監伊娜．約翰內森，以現代戲劇之父易卜生充滿人性衝突的經典作品《野鴨》為靈感，用舞蹈劇場的形式，展開一場「真相」與「謊言」的哲學辯證。  舞作以故事中的女孩海特維格的死為主軸，以伊娜的高能量肢體語彙重構這經典之作，在香港首演後旋即赴北京演出。
About the Programme: Selected by critics from Ballet International's Yearbook as "Outstanding Choreographer", Ina Christel Johannessen, the Artistic Director from leading Norwegian dance company, Zero Visibility Corp., creates a philosophical debate between "virtue of truth" and "life-lie" in the form of dance theatre.   Her choreography is inspired by the classical stage play The Wild Duck by Henrik Ibsen, the father of modern drama, and was invited to tour in Beijing after its premiere in Hong Kong.
Venue: PLA Theatre, Beijing
venue_en: PLA Theatre, Beijing

Programme Name: Hedvig from the Wild Duck Norway Tour
節目簡介: CCDC於挪威奧斯陸劇院再次呈獻《野鴨‧女孩》。《野鴨‧女孩》為舞團和享譽國際的挪威旗艦舞團ZVC藝術總監伊娜．約翰內森，以現代戲劇之父易卜生的經典作品《野鴨》為靈感所創作的舞蹈劇場。舞作以女孩海特維格之死為主軸，展開一場「真相」與「謊言」的哲學辯證。
About the Programme: CCDC is proud to present Hedvig from The Wild Duck at Oslo Opera House, Norway. This work of dance theatre is choreographed by Ina Christel Johannessen, artistic director of Norway’s Zero Visibility Corp, inspired by Ibsen’s modern classic The Wild Duck. Through the death of the child protagonist, Hedvig, Johannessen reinterprets this compelling play with her renowned dynamic physicality.
Venue: Opera House, Oslo, Norway
venue_en: Opera House, Oslo, Norway

節目名稱: 跳格國際舞蹈影像節2014：香港
Programme Name: Jumping Frames International Dance Video Festival – Hong Kong
節目簡介: CCDC藝術總監曹誠淵夥拍資深電影攝影師鍾有添，將2013年在香港演出的舞台作品《尋找大觀園》發展成3D舞蹈電影。以中國名著《紅樓夢》為藍本的環境舞蹈演出穿插不同具香港特色的場景，配以中國評彈音樂，傳統與摩登、古典與現代共冶一爐。更入選本年康城影展「短片角」單元。  委約作品中，大中華地區包括曾入選「第十四屆釜山國際電影節」競賽的獨立導演許雅舒的《哀溺文》、中國年輕獨立藝術家何其沃夥拍《藍宇》的攝影師楊濤拍攝的實驗作品《露西》、北京雷動天下現代舞團舞者郭偉與北京電影學院攝影系的李中葉合作炮製風格寫實質樸，意境溫和愜意的《一天》、新晉編舞李德夥拍資深攝影師霍栢濤以「手」作舞，呈現低頭族生活百態的《Let’s Say》。來自海外的短片：比利時導演皮亞‧拉許沙及編舞艾曼紐‧雲遜繼2012年的委約創作後新作《歡迎光臨》以女版歷蘇穿戴隆重的民族服飾，赤腳與廣東現代舞團舞者遊歷中國，見證文明與發展的威力；來自西班牙的艾力‧帕喬恩以《You Will Fall Again》將舞者的身體推向極限，給觀眾帶來驚喜。  「舞影萬花筒」帶來風格迥異的舞蹈電影：美國導演艾倫‧布朗與復興現代舞大師喬納‧伯克攜手合作，《舞影隨行》書寫少年尋夢遇愛的浪漫詩篇；而香港鬼才編舞伍宇烈一次過串起九位各懷絕技的現代舞男，以一齣《香港舞男有錄像》揭示舞者鮮為人知的心事。
About the Programme: The Festival Local Focus presents the world premiere of In Search of the Grand View Garden, featuring the strongest production line-up in the Festival’s history: CCDC artistic director Willy Tsao teamed up with veteran Hong Kong cinematographer Henry Chung to transform the acclaimed eponymous dance production into a 3D dance film. With Chinese literary classic Dream of the Red Chamber as blueprint, Hong Kong’s cityscape as backdrop, and classical Chinese narrative ballad pingtan as the soundtrack, the site-specific dance video is a mix of tradition and modern, classic and contemporary, merging modern dance with everyday life. The film was selected for screening at the Short Film Corner of Cannes Film Festival this year.  The Festival has also commissioned dance films by artists from the Greater China Region. Elegy is a production by independent director Rita Hui whose work was selected by the 14th Busan International Film Festival. The experimental stage production Lucy is now a film created jointly by Chinese emerging artist Er Gao and Yang Tao, the cinematographer of cult queer film Lan Yu. Beijing Dance/LDTX dancer Will Guo teamed up with his former classmate from Guangdong Dance School Li Zhongye to produce the heartwarming One Day. Emerging choreographer Li De works with veteran cinematographer Jim Fok to create Let’s Say, a dance of the ‘hand’ commenting on the phenomenon of phubbers.   In addition, the Festival presents a selection of short films from abroad as well as international collaborations. Welcome is a new comedy by Belgium director Pierre Laranza and choreographer Emmanuelle Vincent, a follow-up of their Jumping Frames commission in 2012. Welcome is about the cultural shock of an ethnic African experienced as she explored modern China barefoot with dancers from Guangdong Modern Dance Company. You Will Fall Again by Alex Pachon from Spain challenges the dancer’s body to the extreme.   Screendance Kaleidoscope is introducing two dance videos of distinctive styles this year. Created by American director Alan Brown and internationally renowned choreographer Jonah Bokaer, Five Dances is a poetic journey about finding dream and finding love. Renowned Hong Kong choreographer Yuri Ng brings together nine outstanding Hong Kong male dancers to reveal their stories behind the stage in DANzING BOYz & VIDEOz.
地點: 百老匯電影中心、百老匯 The ONE
Venue: Broadway Cinematheque, The ONE Broadway

百老匯電影中心
百老匯 The ONE

節目名稱: 跳格國際舞蹈影像展2013：北京
Programme Name: Jumping Frames International Dance Video Showcase 2013: Beijing
節目簡介: 「跳格」是亞洲規模最大、水平最高的舞蹈影像節之一，這次再度與北京百老匯電影中心合作，為觀眾呈獻多個兩岸三地及世界各地的優秀舞蹈影像，將舞蹈影像這門集舞蹈、影像及視覺藝術於一身的多媒體藝術形式帶給首都觀眾。
About the Programme: Jumping Frames is an annual festival which unites two established art forms - video and dance. It is the only dance video festival in Asia that features both commissioned works and works for competition. The festival collaborate with Broadway Cinematheque Beijing again to present outstanding works from China and around the globe to provide a platform for artists and audience alike to share, discuss and explore the unlimited possibilities of the fusion of dance and video.
Venue: Broadway Cinematheque Beijing
venue_en: Broadway Cinematheque Beijing

節目名稱: 環境舞蹈演出《衣食住行》
節目簡介: 《衣食住行》是CCDC為上海世博會創作的環境舞蹈，以都市人生活不可或缺的四大元素為題材，把舞蹈本身的概念與周邊環境相融合，觀眾更可與舞者作近距離接觸。這次CCDC聯同廣東現代舞團，根據正佳廣場的環境糅合出新穎而有趣的舞蹈元素，帶領觀眾重新審視現代都市眾生相，帶來嶄新的觀賞經驗。
About the Programme: Following the success of the performances during EXPO Shanghai and Hong Kong, CCDC bring DELT to Guangzhou jointly performed with dancers of Guangdong Modern Dance Company. DELT -- the acronym for "Dressing, Eating, Living, Travelling" - is a Chinese phrase for describing "the four essential elements in everyday life". Willy Tsao and talented young Hong Kong choreographers Ong Yong Lock have tailor-made this site-specific dance gala to celebrate the vibrancy of Hong Kong's unique culture and its influence on the lifestyles of modern Chinese.
地點: 廣州正佳廣場東北中庭
Venue: Grandview Mall, Guangzhou

節目名稱: 第十屆廣東現代舞周：《尋找大觀園》
Programme Name: The 10th Guangdong Dance Festival - In Search of the Grand View Garden
節目簡介: 《尋找大觀園》以中國名著《紅樓夢》為藍本，述說一群愛好古典文學的現代青年遊園拾趣，陶醉於瑰麗的園景，不禁吟詩飲酒，聞歌起舞，化為園主。觀眾遊走於公園及酒店大堂，令觀眾置身如《紅樓夢》般詩意濃濃的夢幻場景。
About the Programme: Based on the classic novel Dream of the Red Chamber, In Search of the Grand View Garden is about young travellers fond of classic literature who arrive in an extraordinary garden. Enchanted by the beautiful landscape, they drink and recite poetry, sing and dance and assume the roles of the imaginary characters in "The Red Chamber".Audiences will be engaged at the Park and hotel foyer by the ambiguities of roles and apparent conflicts in time and space as found within Dream of the Red Chamber while the stories of the travellers' ever shifting lives are revealed.
地點: 廣州花園酒店及廣州沙面公園
Venue: Guangzhou Garden Hotel & Guangzhou Sha Mian Park
主辦單位: 廣東星海演藝集團、城市當代舞蹈團
Presenter: Guangdong Xinghai Performing Arts Group,  City Contemporary Dance Company
venue.1: 廣州花園酒店及廣州沙面公園
venue_en: Guangzhou Garden Hotel & Guangzhou Sha Mian Park

節目名稱: 北京舞蹈雙周：《購人心弦》
Programme Name: Beijing Dance Festival - The Buying Game
節目簡介: 獲頒2012香港舞蹈年獎「最值得表揚編舞」獎的CCDC編舞、舞者以及作為當今最有前途的編舞家之一的龐智筠以購物經歷創作《購人心弦》。遊走於石屎森林和指尖上的購物迷宮，被琳瑯滿目的產品和翻天覆蓋的精美圖照所俘虜。當中的感情流向為何，是單向的，還是雙向的，或是更錯綜複雜？  作品於2013年首演時憑緊貼生活的題材及舞者精湛的演出，令演出叫好叫座，引來各方熱烈迴響。今年7月，舞團特別將作品搬至大舞台上演，龐智筠去蕪存菁，將賣物場上的你我購物經歷活現觀眾眼前。
About the Programme: Noel Pong is one of today’s most promising choreographers. Winner of the 2012 Hong Kong Dance Award \"\"Outstanding Choreography\"\", she was inspired by shopping encounter and created The Buying Game. Wandering between immersive shopping labyrinths in concrete jungles and virtual online shopping platforms, one is overwhelmed by a barrage of desirable things made more desirable by exquisite imagery. How do emotions flow in this world: one way, two ways, or crisscrossing?  The Buying Game converses with everyday life and is realised by a cast of superb dancers, the premiere performances in 2013 were well-received and drew enthusiastic responses. This July, the CCDC puts Pong’s renewed reflections onto a larger stage, once again analysing our shopping experience with humour and insight.
Venue: PLA Theater, Beijing
venue_en: PLA Theater, Beijing

Programme Name: A Preview of The Dream of The Red Chamber
節目簡介: 觀眾可率先欣賞由港芭舞蹈員示範《紅樓夢》— 夢紅樓的精彩選段！藝術總監區美蓮與此新製作的創作團隊更會於這次「優先睇」中為大家介紹此舞劇的精髓，並分享幕後點滴 !
About the Programme: Artistic Director Madeleine Onne alongside the creative team of this new production will share with the audience the idea and inspirations behind this ballet. There will also be a preview performed by the Company’s dancers.

節目名稱: 第十一屆廣東現代舞周：《風中三十五》
Programme Name: The 11th Guangdong Dance Festival - Amidst the Wind
節目簡介: 由藝術總監曹誠淵親自挑選CCDC近十年來最精彩的篇章，在同一舞台上，《風中三十五》將呈現多位享譽海內外的資深編舞家包括曹誠淵、黎海寧、桑吉加、梅卓燕、邢亮以及當紮編舞龐智筠和黃狄文等風格迥異的創作，豐富多彩的舞碼定給你一個目不暇給的晚上。
About the Programme: Handpicked by Artistic Director Willy Tsao, Amidst the Wind is a feast of the most exhilarating dance excerpts from CCDC’s productions from the last decade, including works by renowned choreographers – Willy Tsao, Helen Lai, Sang Jijia, Mui Cheuk-Yin and Xing Liang – as well as recent creations from rising star choreographers – Noel Pong and Dominic Wong. Amidst the Wind distills the essence of 35 years into one unforgettable evening.
Venue: Guangzhou XingHai PA Garden
編舞: 黎海寧、梅卓燕、龐智筠、桑吉加、曹誠淵、黃狄文、邢亮
Choreographers: Helen Lai, Mui Cheuk-yin, Noel Pong, Sang Jijia, Willy Tsao, Dominic Wong, Xing Liang
venue_en: Guangzhou XingHai PA Garden

節目簡介: 是次的獨舞與即興之上半場為獨舞或演出，下半場為不同界別之藝術家，透過《緣舞場》共同進行即興創作。而每次即興演出前，藝術家會進行一系列的研習工作坊，以增加彼此在藝術上的見解，並加深認識和溝通。
About the Programme: Solo dance and performance was arranged in Solo & Improve. In each performance the first part is solo dance or performance that choreograph and perform by the artist themselves. Then the second part is the “Improvisation Land”, in which artists from different media will come together to create a group improvisation. Artists will also join the research workshops before the performances so as to understand the artistic concept of each other.

節目簡介: 兩位有多年國際創作及演出經驗的編舞，以限制觀眾視線及位置為創作起點，在觀眾角度及編舞意願間帶出互動；探索人生面對的種種困難及障礙，社會、文化差異及生理帶來的限制等，追尋解構的方法及打破規範的可能性。 劇場將化成最開放又最受限制的環境，由舞者、動作、佈景、視覺效果及音樂引領觀眾進出一個個人生迷宮。
About the Programme: Two choreographers with years of experience creating and performing for the international audience will present their next production with a new twist – by restricting the audience’s sightline and viewing position as the point of departure, thereby creating an interactive process between the audience’s angle and the choreographers’ designs. During this process, the many difficulties and obstacles in life, the constraints brought about by social, cultural and physiological differences, and the possible solutions to resolving them or to achieving a breakthrough will be explored. The studio theatre will be transformed into an environment that is at the same time boundless and restrictive, as the dancers, physical movements, setting, visual effects and music lead the audience into one labyrinth in life after another.
Venue: Guangdong Song and Dance Theatre
venue_en: Guangdong Song and Dance Theatre

About the Programme: Xin Xiang  The concept behind my dance piece is related to a traditional Chinese image, a ‘Tree’ as symbols of existence and a representation of the philosophy of life; self-realization, resilience and self-contentment.

節目簡介: 山東秧歌（鼓子秧歌、膠州秧歌、海陽秧歌）是中國最具代表性的漢族民間舞蹈，場面宏大，氣勢磅礴。《風水行》以山東秧歌為素材，從當代視角出發，配合傘、鼓、棒、花等傳統道具，表現「一脈相承，血濃於水」的民族情懷。作品獲頒「2009香港舞蹈年獎」殊榮，大型製作《風水行》以更廣闊的空間和更多元的角度，展現山東秧歌的澎湃生命力！
About the Programme: Feng Shui takes inspiration from the rich physicality of Shandong’s folk dance “rice sprout song”, or yangge. Employing yangge’s traditional props and specific dance language, it traces past and present, heaven and earth in a continuum with men.
Venue: Kwai Tsing Theatre Auditorium
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目簡介: 香港舞蹈團和香港芭蕾舞團破天荒攜手，為兩團年輕的編舞提供交流及實踐的平台。此次「八樓平台」由香港舞蹈團舞蹈員表演，編舞則由首席舞蹈員陳俊以及來自香港芭蕾舞團的年輕編舞共同擔任，不同舞蹈風格的作品將共冶一爐，呈現年輕編舞們的不同理念，具香港藝術特色的中西交流。
About the Programme: Hong Kong Dance Company’s dancers will perform works created by Principal Dancer Chen Jun and emerging choreographers from The Hong Kong Ballet, drawing from the diverse and diverging styles from the East and the West.

舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 民族舞, 爵士舞/街舞, 現代舞
節目簡介: 小女孩純純家境清貧，父母都忙著工作，家中沒有玩伴祗留下她，十分寂寞。  一天在街上經過玩具店，給店內各式各樣的玩具吸引得樂而忘返。意外地，卻給玩具店主把門鎖上了，純純鎖在店內睡著了。 倦極入睡的純純，在睡夢中各種洋娃娃都動起來跳舞，她也興奮得隨著它們舞動，並在那裡渡過了一個難忘的晚上。 天亮了，店主回來見到她，同情之餘並送好一件玩具，這樣她也和所有的小朋友一樣有自己的〝玩伴〞,高高興興的玩耍，給平淡的生活帶來樂趣。
About the Programme: Poor little girl \"Shun Shun\" was alone at home with lot of house to manage, she had no playmate nor toys, and was very lonely and up set. She went passed a Toys shop and was attracted to the toys that she overlooked the closing time and was kept in the Toy shop alone. Tired and fell asleep, and in her dream all the beautiful dollies came alive and dance with her, a wonderful evening that she could ever remember.At dawn, the shop keeper came back to see her, feel sympathy and sent a toy to her. So she, like all children have their own \"playmate\", happily playing, to dull life fun.
Venue: Sai Wan Ho Civic Center Thestre

節目簡介: 美國哥倫比亞大學巴納德學院主辦巴納德第六年全球專題研討會 - 婦女改變中國額外活動之一, 由紐約講師 Colleen Thomas 主導之接觸即興工作坊，並聯同上海體育學院講師彭漲，香港舞蹈家陳敏兒, 泰國藝術家Nattaporn Thapparat, 及中國藝術家蔡穎，共同於上海田子坊藝術中心演出。
About the Programme: Under the Barnard College Global Symposium - Women Changing China, artists from New York (Colleen Thomas), Bangkok (Nattaporn Thapparat), Hong Kong (Chan Man Yee Abby), Shanghai Hai ( Cai Ying and Peng Zhang) held a contact Improvisation workshop followed by a structure Contact Improvisation performance at the trendy Tian Zi Fang Arts Center.

venue_en: Tian Zi Fang Art Center, Shanghai

Programme Name: AROUND SOUND ART FESTIVAL 2014 JAPAN & HONG KONG
節目簡介: 聲音掏腰包將首度將藝術節的部分節目帶到海外：「聽在」2014共分為兩部分，包括於日本京都府京丹後市舉辦、為期三日兩夜的「丹後聆聽營」，以及將於香港舉行的展覽、演出、錄像放映及藝術家分享會。 由黃嘉淇、王鎮海、聯同宮北裕美及鈴木昭男共同策劃的「丹後聆聽營」包括為期兩周的藝術家駐留計劃，獲邀參與的羅潤庭、陳翹康、黃福權、李穎姍、陳敏兒及邢亮將於日本京都府京丹後市體驗生活及進行聲音與空間之探索，並聯同日本藝術家梅田哲也、evala & sonihouse、山崎昭典及Ayumi Adachi於體驗營期間透過在地裝置、現場表演及藝術家對談分享其探索成果。
About the Programme: Around 2014 is the fourth edition of the festival since it inaugurated in 2009. This is the first time that we bring Around out of Hong Kong. Being There – Artist Residency and Retreat Camp to be held in Amino, Kyoto, is curated by Alice Wong, Wong Chun-hoi, Hiromi Miyakita and Akio Suzuki. Hong Kong based artists Edwin Lo, Fiona Lee, Chan Kiu-hong Joe, Wong Fuk-kuen, Chan Man-yee Abby and Xing Liang are invited to travel to Amino, Kyoto for a 2-week residency, in which they will explore sound and space in Amino. Together with Japanese artists evala & sonihouse, Akinori Yamasaki and Ayumi Adachi, the artists will present workshops, soundwalks, and performances during the 3-day Retreat Camp. The artists will also engage with the public in dialogues while wandering around this small city on the coast of the Sea of Japan.
Venue: Amino Shrine
其他: 日本國際交流基金、計劃由香港特別行政區政府民政事務局藝術發展基金資助 香港特別行政區政府民政事務局芸術発展基金助成事業  http://www.soundpocket.org.hk/v2/around-sound-art-festival-and-retreat/around-sound-art-festival-2014/around-sound-art-festival-2014/
Others: Supported by Japan Foundation, Supported by the Arts Development Fund of the Home Affairs Bureau, the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region  http://www.soundpocket.org.hk/v2/arou
venue_en: Amino Shrine

節目簡介: 繼2012年香港藝術節＜野豬＞後，由莊梅岩編劇、甄詠蓓導演及陳敏兒演出暨編舞/形體導演的城市膨脹式黑色喜劇，叩問生命與工作的意義。，連同各獨當一面的偶像實力演員翟凱泰、朱栢謙、韋羅莎、鄧智堅、禤天揚、陳安然、郭翠怡及唱作人黃靖，以調笑為經緯，揭示我們「揾食」背後的種種辛酸，扣問「人性」何價，聯手為「新視野藝術節」打造出一個震撼人心的當代城市膨脹式喜劇：六個綜橫交錯的失衡故事，成全一齣無情的黑色喜劇。
About the Programme: Following The Wild Boar performed at the 2012 Hong Kong Arts Festival, dramatist Candace Chong and director Olivia Yan team up with Abby Chan (performer / movement director) again in Black Monday to reveal the negative influence of “making a living” and to reflect on our attitude towards life. A satire that will strike a chord with many Hongkongers today. Six dark-humoured, interwoven tales about handling the harshness of reality.
Venue: Auditorium, Kwai Tsing Theatre
其他: 1/11 演後藝人談
Others: 1/11 Meet the artist
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Auditorium

節目名稱: 杜哈絲百年: 如歌的中板/ 就這麼多
Programme Name: Duras Project: Moderato Cantabile / C\'est Tout
節目簡介: 本地一班藝術家包括盧偉力、陳敏兒、羅乃新、潘芳芳、梁榮忠、陳錦樂攜手以舞蹈、戲劇、音樂、劇場裝置來演繹杜哈絲的顛
About the Programme: The performance is given in commemoration of the 100th anniversary of the birth of Marguerite Duras (1914-1996), the French writer with international influence. Duras holds an important place in cultural circles favouring Modernism in Hong Kong after the 1980s. In honour of her centennial, artists in Hong Kong– seasoned or young, and from different sectors – decide to come together in a tribute through installation theatre. We hope to bring to the Hong Kong audience a commemorative event of a different kind. Inspired by her magnum opus, Moderato Cantabile (1958), and the posthumous C\'est Tout (1995), the performances will be held at a site rich in Hong Kong history: the Cattle Depot Theatre in To Kwa Wan (for experimental theatre staging), on two of Duras’s favourite themes: love and death.
Venue: Cattle Depot Theatre
主辦單位: 康樂及文化事務署 - 文化節目組
Presenter: Leisure and Cultural Services Department - Cultural Presentations Section
其他: 講座 12.12.2014 (星期五) 下午4:30 當杜哈絲遇上九龍城寨 生命史的記憶 + 時空的瘋狂 講者：陳翠兒、盧偉力  演後談 13.12.2014 (星期六) 下午4:30 三個香港女子在法國 講者：羅乃新、黃愛玲、鄭碧儀  藝人談 13.12.2014 (星期六) 晚上9:30 主持：洛楓
Others: Talk 12.12.2014 (Fri) 4:30pm When Duras meet Kowloon Walled City Memories of Lifetime History + Madness of Space and Time Speaker: Corrin Chan, Lo Wai-luk  Post-performance Talk 13.12.2014 (Sat

節目名稱: 第二個巴別塔：舞踏城寨
Programme Name: The Second Tower of Babel: Butoh in the Kowloon Walled City
節目簡介: 由一群日本藝術家與香港舞者／音樂家共同創作，亞洲民眾戲劇節協會、第三屆舞踏節、妄人文明（Wangnin Bunmei）聯合呈獻，帶來多場兩地藝術家共創的舞踏演出，並由日本藝術家石本華江 Kae Ishimoto、善哉和也 Kazuya Zenzai 和栩秋太洋 Taiyo Tochiaki分別引領別具風格的兩場工作坊、以及推出九龍城寨＋舞踏紀錄片同場放映及討論會。
About the Programme: The Second Tower of Babel: Butoh in the Kowloon Walled City is a collaborative project between a group of Japanese artists and local Hong Kong dancers / musicians based on the theme of “Kowloon Walled City”, co-presented by Asian People\'s Theatre Festival Society, The Third Butoh Butoh Festival and Wangnin Bunmei. As a 17 days Butoh Festival, it is scheduled be held from 5 to 21 September 2014, including Butoh performances, documentary films screening with discussion about Butoh and Kowloon Walled City, two butoh workshops facilitated respectively by Kae Ishimoto and Kazuya Zenzai from Wangnin Bunmei and Taiyo Tochiaki.
Venue: Hong Kong Film Culture Centre
venue_en: Hong Kong Film Culture Centre

節目簡介: 童心舞躍樂歡欣，民族服飾展繽紛  香港舞蹈團外展及教育部「北京舞蹈學院中國舞等級考試課程」的200多位小舞蹈員，從四歲開始跟隨音樂拍子手舞足蹈，刻苦鍛鍊，功架十足，在試場上榮獲佳績。課程第一至十二級學員以真摯童心帶來民族舞繽紛，展現過去一年學舞的成果與歡欣！
About the Programme: After a year of professional dance training, 200 graduates from grade 1 to 12 of HKDC ‘Beijing Dance Academy Chinese Dance Graded Examination Course’ are all confident to have excellent results. They dance with joy and show the colours of Chinese ethnic groups.
Venue: Auditorium, Tsuen Wan Town Hall
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈團 – 外展及教育部
Presenter: Hong Kong Dance Company-Outreach & Education Department
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium

Venue: Exhibition Gallery, Tsuen Wan Town Hall

Presenter: Hong Kong Dance Company-Outreach & Education Department

Programme Name: “Tibet Dance Story” by Hong Kong Dance Company
節目簡介: 西藏位於中國的西南部，地勢高峻、土地遼闊，有「世界屋脊」之稱。西藏文化擁有濃厚的宗教色彩，藏民一生追求心靈的淨化與人性的覺悟，相信持續修行可以輪迴轉世，普渡眾生。因此他們並不畏懼死亡，視死亡為新生命的開始。西藏傳統民間舞蹈服裝別具特色，衣飾為長袍長裙連水袖，腳踏長靴，頭戴鑲有家族承傳的天然石或木珠的飾物，以及彩色的辮子。熱巴鼓和哈達都是藏族舞蹈常用的道具，舞蹈或慶豐收、或祭神問天、或擬神獸動態，均能體現其文化內涵。導賞演出初探西藏的歷史與文化，配以藏族民間舞蹈的演出，引領同學走進神秘的國度。
About the Programme: Tibet is located at the South-western part of China. It is named as ‘The Roof of the World’ because it has wide and high lands. Tibetan people believe in reincarnation, so they are not afraid of death. Tibetan dance costumes features in long coats and dresses with long sleeves. People usually wear boots and head pieces which stitched with inherited natural jewelleries. Their hair is decorated with colourful braids. Tibetan people dances with Reba drums and Khatas in harvest and worshipping gods. In the performance, traditional Tibetan folk dances are performed, and are made comprehensible with a brief introduction of Tibetan history and culture, inviting the audience to explore mysterious Tibet.
Venue: Auditorium, Tsuen Wan Town Hall
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈團—外展及教育部
Presenter: Hong Kong Dance Company-Outreach & Education Department
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium

節目名稱: 香港舞蹈團《淺灣傳奇》選段演出及導賞
Programme Name: Selected Excerpts from The Legend of Tsuen Wan cum Dance Appreciation by Hong Kong Dance Company
節目簡介: 舞劇《淺灣傳奇》取材自荃灣客家圍村，透過村民耕作、求雨、祈福等舞段，展現昔日農村生活風情，集舞蹈、戲劇及歌唱元素，細訴歷史，舞動今昔。節目選演多個舞蹈片段，特別加插導賞環節，解構如何製作及操控栩栩如生的火龍及在台上漂游的小木船等道具；讓學生親嘗拋祈福球許願的樂趣和穿木屐起舞的感受。
About the Programme: The Legend of Tsuen Wan is a dance drama based on the history of Tsuen Wan, looking at life in a Hakka walled village. The performance tells the story of Tsuen Wan through dance and drama, featuring farming, praying for rain and blessing, and the day-to-day life of a folk village. The extra interactive sessions introduce the production and operation of the fire dragon and wooden boat on stage. Students are invited to practise the blessing custom or dance with clogs.
Venue: Auditorium, Tsuen Wan Town Hall
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈團—外展及教育部
Presenter: Hong Kong Dance Company-Outreach & Education Department
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium

節目簡介: 首部曲「自然森林版」是一場環境舞蹈，在太平山空曠的草坪上，八位舞者依據風水方位在聲音裝置間翩翩起舞，引起一股祥和之氣，藉此試圖引發公眾對自然空間、傳統文化和環境保護的新領悟。
About the Programme: At the summit of Victoria Peak, with verdant forests as a backdrop, eight dancers perform in a labyrinth of sound installations laid out according to the theory of Feng Shui, creating an auspicious ambience.
地點: 香港山頂柯士甸山遊樂場
Venue: Mount Austin Playground, the Peak, Hong Kong

節目名稱: 跳格國際舞蹈影像展2014：廣州
Programme Name: Jumping Frames International Dance Video Showcase: Guangzhou 2014
節目簡介: CCDC藝術總監曹誠淵夥拍資深電影攝影師鍾有添，將2013年在香港演出的舞台作品《尋找大觀園》發展成3D舞蹈電影。以中國名著《紅樓夢》為藍本的環境舞蹈演出穿插不同具香港特色的場景，配以中國評彈音樂，傳統與摩登、古典與現代共冶一爐。更入選本年康城影展「短片角」單元。  委約作品中，大中華地區包括曾入選「第十四屆釜山國際電影節」競賽的獨立導演許雅舒的《哀溺文》、中國年輕獨立藝術家何其沃夥拍《藍宇》的攝影師楊濤拍攝的實驗作品《露西》、北京雷動天下現代舞團舞者郭偉與北京電影學院攝影系的李中葉合作炮製風格寫實質樸，意境溫和愜意的《一天》、新晉編舞李德夥拍資深攝影師霍栢濤以「手」作舞，呈現低頭族生活百態的《Let’s Say》。來自海外的短片則有比利時導演皮亞‧拉許沙及編舞艾曼紐‧雲遜繼2012年委約創作後新作《歡迎光臨》以女版歷蘇穿戴隆重的民族服飾，赤腳與廣東現代舞團舞者遊歷中國，見證文明與發展的威力；來自西班牙的艾力‧帕喬恩以《You Will Fall Again》將舞者的身體推向極限。而香港鬼才編舞伍宇烈一次過串起九位各懷絕技的現代舞男，以一齣《雲之南》揭示舞者鮮為人知的心事。與英國格拉斯哥舞蹈中心合作之委約作品《有一個地方》，享譽國際的中國藏族舞者桑吉加遠赴蘇格蘭的絕地高原，與當地知名導演卡特里娜‧麥克弗森一拍即合，以心無旁騖的專注及凌厲的舞蹈語彙帶觀眾走進一個蒼茫大地與嚴峻高山的國度，桑吉加展現德国现代舞巨人威廉‧科西赞誉的那股「清澈見底，如河水般勇往直前」的力量。
About the Programme: The Festival Local Focus presents the world premiere of In Search of the Grand View Garden, featuring the strongest production line-up in the Festival’s history: CCDC artistic director Willy Tsao teamed up with veteran Hong Kong cinematographer Henry Chung to transform the acclaimed eponymous dance production into a 3D dance film. With Chinese literary classic Dream of the Red Chamber as blueprint, Hong Kong’s cityscape as backdrop, and classical Chinese narrative ballad pingtan as the soundtrack, the site-specific dance video is a mix of tradition and modern, classic and contemporary, merging modern dance with everyday life. The film was selected for screening at the Short Film Corner of Cannes Film Festival this year.  The Festival has also commissioned dance films by artists from the Greater China Region. Elegy is a production by independent director Rita Hui whose work was selected by the 14th Busan International Film Festival. The experimental stage production Lucy is now a film created jointly by Chinese emerging artist Er Gao and Yang Tao, the cinematographer of cult queer film Lan Yu. Beijing Dance/LDTX dancer Will Guo teamed up with his former classmate from Guangdong Dance School Li Zhongye to produce the heartwarming One Day. Emerging choreographer Li De works with veteran cinematographer Jim Fok to create Let’s Say, a dance of the ‘hand’ commenting on the phenomenon of phubbers. Renowned Hong Kong choreographer Yuri Ng brings together nine outstanding Hong Kong male dancers to reveal their stories behind the stage in DANzING BOYz & VIDEOz. There is a Place is the exciting outcome of the collaboration between CCDC and the Dance House of Glasgow. Sang Jijia, a Tibetan dancer-choreographer based in China, travelled to Scotland to make this 7-minute dance film with Katrina McPherson and Simon Fides in the Highlands. Combining exquisite movement and stunning landscapes, the film takes the viewer into his pure world of dance.
地點: 廣州二沙島星海音樂廳戶外草坪
Venue: Outdoor lawn, Xinghai Concert Hall, Ersha Island, Guangzhou
venue.1: 廣州二沙島星海音樂廳戶外草坪

節目簡介: 您也可以成為小胡桃夾子、芭蕾公主或老鼠王！ 這個有趣的工作坊歡迎4至8歲的小朋友參加。工作坊運用意象、手藝和形體動作來探索《胡桃夾子》的故事，從而讓參加者對芭蕾舞的興趣更濃。毋須跳舞經驗均可參加。
About the Programme: You too can be a little Nutcracker, Ballerina or Rat King! Children aged 4-8 are welcome to join this fun workshop. Imagery, crafts and of course movement are used to explore the story of The Nutcracker and enhance participants\' interest in ballet. No previous dance experience is necessary.
地點: 香港文化中心大劇院後台八樓排演室GR2
Venue: GR2, 8/F, Grand Theatre Backstage, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue.1: 香港文化中心大劇院後台八樓排演室GR2
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre Backstage, 8/F, Rehearsal Room GR2

節目名稱: 認識《林中仙子與芭蕾精選》
Programme Name: Get to know Les Sylphides and More
節目簡介: 《林中仙子》從1909年巴黎首演，穿越到2014年的香港，不朽的芭蕾經典到底有甚麼獨有的魅力？是甚麼啓發了卓瑪伊羅，特別為香港芭蕾舞團編創作品《Shape of Glow》？以上答案將於此講座逐一公開。參加者可認識此五部獨一無二的芭蕾精品，當然少不了香港芭蕾舞團舞蹈員優先演繹《林中仙子與芭蕾精選》內的選段。
About the Programme: What unique qualities brought classical ballet Les Sylphides all the way from its 1909 Paris première to Hong Kong in 2014? And what inspired Jorma Elo as he created Shape of Glow for The Hong Kong Ballet? These questions and more will be answered at this talk. Come along and learn about the five distinct pieces that will be featured in this mixed bill production. You will also have an opportunity to watch The Hong Kong Ballet dancers performing excerpts of Les Sylphides and More in the Studio Theatre.
Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目名稱: 《林中仙子與芭蕾精選》演前導賞
Programme Name: Les Sylphides and More Pre-Performance Talk
節目簡介: 安坐大劇院欣賞節目前，歡迎到劇院外的大堂參加《林中仙子與芭蕾精選》演前導賞。出席者將可優先預覽浪漫古典芭蕾作品《林中仙子》，以及當代偏鋒的《Shape of Glow》。導賞涵蓋了不同作品的音樂部份，和五個編舞單位各有千秋的創作靈感。
About the Programme: Before you take your seats for the show, head to the foyer outside the Grand Theatre for a brief insight into Les Sylphides and More. There will be a quick overview of the performance’s line-up, from the romantic and classical ballet Les Sylphides to the edgy and contemporary Shape of Glow. The talk will touch on the music and choreographic inspirations of the five pieces in the production, each of which is very different from the next.
Venue: Level 2 Foyer, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue.1: 香港文化中心二樓大堂
venue_en: Level 2 Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Foyer

節目簡介: 《唐吉訶德》這本小說在1605年寫成，至今已有400餘年歷史。改編自小說的芭蕾舞劇以愛為中心，但同時也幽默地重新詮釋騎士精神及道德。由世界頂級芭蕾舞蹈家蓮娜．安娜妮亞雪翡莉加入的新編舞，保證讓觀眾目不暇給！想知多點關於《唐吉訶德》和香港芭蕾舞團如何呈獻這部與眾不同的古典芭蕾舞劇，不要錯過這場講座！
About the Programme: Don Quixote has an incredible history spanning the 400 years since the novel was written in 1605. The ballet centres on love but also offers a hilarious look at an alternative view of chivalry and knighthood. Come and learn more about Don Quixote and The Hong Kong Ballet\'s own unique take on this classical ballet staged by world famous prima ballerina Nina Ananiashvili.
地點: 香港文化中心大劇院後台八樓排演室GR3
Venue: GR3, 8/F, Grand Theatre Backstage, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
編舞: 佩蒂巴阿歷山大．葛斯基、蓮娜．安娜妮亞雪翡莉
venue.1: 香港文化中心大劇院後台八樓排演室GR3
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Grand Theatre Backstage, 8/F, Rehearsal Room GR3

節目簡介: 想先睹為快嗎？歡迎到劇院外的大堂參與我們的演前講座，了解更多關於《唐吉訶德》華麗的佈景和服裝設計，還有一些有趣的小知識，助你欣賞此齣精采的全新製作。
About the Programme: Get a sneak peek into the background of Don Quixote before the curtain goes up on this premiere! Join us at the foyer outside the Grand Theatre for a short informative talk, where you will hear about the sumptuous sets and costumes, and learn some interesting facts that will help you appreciate this marvellous new production.
地點: 香港文化中心二樓大堂
Venue: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Level 2 Foyer
編舞: \"佩蒂巴阿歷山大．葛斯基、蓮娜．安娜妮亞雪翡莉 \"
Choreographers: Marius Petipa, Alexander Gorsky Nina Ananiashvili

節目名稱: 《舞之慶典 ─ 香港芭蕾舞團精采35年》優先睇
Programme Name: Preview of A Celebration of Dance – The Hong Kong Ballet at 35
節目簡介: 來率先看看這既精采又內容豐富的預演，認識《舞之慶典—香港芭蕾舞團精采35年》的芭蕾精品吧。你將會認識編舞家喬治．巴蘭欽首個在美國創作的芭蕾舞作品，柴可夫斯基同名樂章的名作《小夜曲》；了解納曹．杜亞陶甚具影響力而激盪人心的當代芭蕾舞作品《卡薩迪》；以及掌握《天鵝湖》第三幕這場芭蕾舞經典背後的藝術趣味。除了嘉賓講者的解說外，你將有機會與我們的舞蹈員接觸，欣賞《舞之慶典—香港芭蕾舞團精采35年》的選段!
About the Programme: Come along to our interesting and informative preview of A Celebration of Dance – The Hong Kong Ballet at 35. Learn more about choreographer George Balanchine\'s masterpiece Serenade, his first ballet created in the United States to Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky\'s score of the same name. Find out the meaning behind Nacho Duato\'s powerful and provocative contemporary ballet Castrati while getting further insight on the great classic, Swan Lake Act III. In addition to offering guest speakers, this lecture will offer you a fine opportunity to meet our dancers up close and see them dance excerpts from A Celebration of Dance – The Hong Kong Ballet at 35.
地點: 香港文化中心大劇院後台八樓排演室GR3
Venue: GR3, 8/F, Grand Theatre Backstage, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue.1: 香港文化中心大劇院後台八樓排演室GR3

節目名稱: 《舞之慶典 ─ 香港芭蕾舞團精采35年》芭蕾舞鞋設計比賽–公開展覽
Programme Name: A Celebration of Dance – The Hong Kong Ballet at 35 Pointe Shoe Design Competition – Public Exhibition
節目簡介: 2014年標誌了香港芭蕾舞團誕生35周年，我們希望更多朋友來和我們一同慶祝﹗職是之故，我們現正舉辦「芭蕾舞鞋設計比賽」直至9月5日，主題為「我‧最愛」，鼓勵參加者把它們喜愛的事物揉合到古典芭蕾舞的標誌—芭蕾舞鞋，其中35份最優秀的作品將於公開展覽展出，來看看參加者的創意吧!
About the Programme: 2014 marks The Hong Kong Ballet’s 35th anniversary, and we hope to engage the community to celebrate with us. To this end, we are running a Pointe Shoe Design Competition until 5th September 2014. The theme of the competition is “My Favorite Things”, encouraging participants to blend what they love with the most iconic symbol of classical dance – the pointe shoe. 35 of the best designs will be proudly displayed at a public exhibition.
地點: 香港文化中心地下大堂
Venue: G/F, Foyer, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: G/F, Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Foyer

節目簡介: 演後藝人談
About the Programme: Post-performance Meet-The-Artist Session
Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 齊來認識胡桃夾子、芭蕾公主、老鼠王及其他《胡桃夾子》的經典角色！聖誕合家歡芭蕾舞劇《胡桃夾子》家傳戶曉，澳洲編舞家泰蘭斯‧科勒創作的版本精采刺激，柴可夫斯基的音樂美不勝收。演出講座以輕鬆手法探討這齣源於俄羅斯聖彼得堡的經典作品，是引領大人小朋友進入夢幻芭蕾世界的最佳嚮導。
About the Programme: The Nutcracker, Ballerina, Rat King and more - take this opportunity to look inside choreographer Terence Kohler\'s exciting and unique version of The Nutcracker. With beautiful music by Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky, find out more about this wonderful production and its historical journey from St. Petersburg, Russia to Hong Kong. This informative and lighthearted conversation is suitable for children and adults alike and is the perfect way to begin your magical experience at the theatre.
地點: 香港文化中心大劇院二樓大堂
Venue: Level 2 Foyer, Hong Kong Cultural Centre

節目名稱: 演藝舞蹈：《舞蹈三部曲：慶典》
Programme Name: Academy Dance: Three Dances for a Celebration!
節目簡介: 為慶祝演藝創校30周年，舞蹈學院將以頂盛陣容，為觀眾呈獻光采耀目的舞蹈表演。學院一眾才華洋溢的年輕學生為此次演出而加緊磨鍊舞蹈技巧，務求將三場舞蹈發揮得淋漓盡致。是次編排三場舞蹈的創作團隊更達世界級，包括2002年入選「勞力士創藝推薦資助計畫」的桑吉加、香港著名編舞家之一黎海寧、以及演藝學院中國舞系系主任盛培琪和現代舞系高級講師余載恩。音樂方面，李勁松及林安淇應邀為舞蹈編作樂曲，林安淇更會現場伴奏。今次演出不僅展示新一代舞蹈學生的舞蹈才華，還體現出舞蹈學院的特質 — 傑出卓越、推陳出新、橫跨學院、合力協作、融會中西文化。三場舞蹈均會別開生面地融入芭蕾舞、中國舞與現代舞的元素。今年適逢30周年校慶，別具意義 — 除了回顧及細味過往成就外，更應展望將來 — 這正是進行這項實驗嘗試的良機！
About the Programme: The Academy’s 30th Anniversary - and time for the School of Dance to shine even more brightly than usual! And to do that, we’ve put together a wonderful line-up: talented young dancers honed to perfect pitch; music specially commissioned for the event (from Dickson Dee, and Angel Lam - the latter performed live); three wonderful works from four first-class choreographers - 2002/2003 Rolex Dance Protégé Sang Jijia, Helen Lai - one of Hong Kong’s best, and School faculty Sheng Peiqi and John Utans (Head of Chinese Dance and Senior Lecturer in Contemporary Dance, putting their creative heads together). And while showcasing the talents of our young artists, the programme will also showcase many of the School’s underpinning principles - excellence, innovative new work, the cross-disciplinary, the collaborative, and the coming together of east and west. In an unusual move, all three works will be ‘cross-stream’, ensembles that see a mix of dancers from the School’s three majors - Ballet, Chinese Dance, and Contemporary Dance. It’s a bit of an experiment: but we’re all for trying something different in an exciting year that not only looks back on the past, but also points straight ahead to the future.
Venue: Drama Theatre, The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts
Presenter: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts
Production / Performing Unit: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts
編舞: 桑吉加, 黎海寧, 盛培琪, 余載恩
Choreographers: Sang Jijia, Helen Lai, Sheng Peiqi, John Utans

節目名稱: 獻給我的最愛+ 唐吉訶德
節目簡介: 神造人時，給我們豐富的感官，是為了讓我們去感受衪預設在所有人心底的愛。我們生前贏得的所有金錢財富、名譽地位我們都無法帶走，能帶走的只有記憶中沈澱下來的純真的感動以及和物質無關的愛和情感，它們無法否認也不會自己消失，它們才是人生真正的財富。  「獻給我的最愛」，獻給我們心中最愛的人。讓大家享受感動的一晚！
About the Programme: God creates human and give us a wealth of senses in order to allow us feel the love he places in our heart. The wealth and fame we earned on earth cannot be taken carried along with us, the only thing which can be carried along is the pure love and feelings which long embedded in our memory which is undeniable and will never disappear. Such love and feelings are the real wealth of our lives.   “Dedicate to my beloved”, dedicate to those we love deeply. May all of you enjoy a moving night!
Venue: Y-Theatre, Youth Square

節目簡介: 節目背影於一個花園裹, 有不同種類的小花如紅玫瑰, 小雛菊, 燦爛的太陽花,紛紛的續一盛開 令這個花園帶來生機. 接著有蝴蝶, 小白兔, 青蛙, 稻草人, 青蛙, 小蜻蜓, 毛毛蟲, 小甲蟲, 草蜢等在花園裡遍遍起舞, 情影美麗, 接著有小雨點紛紛出場. 小雨點過後, 有小蜜蜂, 小花貓, 小烏, 小昆蟲和彩虹, 磨菇仙子出現, 到晚上的來臨, 還有不同的恆星仙子, 貓頭鷹, 月亮和大大小小不同的星星,為這個花園增添耀眼, 就像施 了魔法一樣, 美麗得像一幅油畫 表演著不同的舞步, 表現出不同角色,稠令觀眾留下美麗的印象. 節目還有爵士舞,  女大不忠流的雙人舞中的節錄以及由本校校長鍾金寶編排”Stars” 的節錄 為這次表演謝幕.
About the Programme: The story background is in the garden, there have many different little flowers in the opening like Pale Pink cyclamens, Purple Pansy,  Red Rose, Orange Sun Flowers and white daisy .  Butterflies, bunnies, scarecrows, frogs, dragonflies, caterpillars, ladybirds, grasshoppers are dancing in the garden.  The little rain drops is falling in the garden. After the rain, bees, cats, statues fairies, little birds, toadstool fairies, nymphs and rainbow are appearing in the garden and make the garden more energetic and colorful. At the night, many different size of stars are shinning in the sky and the owls, moon make the garden look like the beautiful painting.  We also have jazz, mainly on pointe work in Excerpt from Pas de Duex - La Fille Mal Gardee . Of course, the finale dance named “Stars” choreography by Joan.

節目簡介: 節目背影於一個小女孩, 對玖寶產生濃濃的好奇, 有一晚竟在睡夢中, 由美人魚帶領著她展開海底之旅. 除了看到美麗的睡蓮, 海葵, 珊瑚, 海藻, 不同種類的珊瑚魚, 當然還看到小女孩最感興趣的寶箱, 寶箱裡載滿很多漂亮的玖寶如黃金, 白銀, 藍寶石, 珍珠, 鑽石, 翡翠, 紫水晶. 紅寶石, 月光石等, 學員用不同的舞台演繹了不同角色, 讓觀眾帶來目不暇給的表現, 為觀眾留下美麗的印象. 節目下半部有爵士舞, 踢踏舞, 和一些芭蕾舞名著中的選段, 如天鵝湖, 吉賽爾等, 以及由本校校長鍾金寶編排的 ”La Valse” 為這次表演謝幕.
About the Programme: A young gir, interested in jjewellery, she dreams that she goes diving into the sea and meet some mermaids who show her around of the sea world, of course, she won’t miss a treasure box which full of beautiful jewels  In second half of the performance, we have jazz, tap and  mainly on pointe work in Swan Lake, Peasant dance from Giselle and the most remarkable part in the performance is the finale dance named “La Valse” choreography by Joan.

節目名稱: 「根與魂｣ — 多彩貴州非物質文化遺產匯演
Programme Name: Genesis and Spirit - A Showcase of Intangible Cultural Heritage of Guizhou
節目簡介: 貴州是一個山川秀麗、氣候宜人、資源豐富、民族眾多的省份。以其「十里不同天，一山不同俗」的多元民族文化，為人類留下了許多彌足珍貴的文化遺產。「根與魂」 -  多彩貴州非物質文化遺產匯演，是以人類非物質文化遺產侗族大歌為主線，並彙集貴州各少數民族傳統音樂舞蹈，以樸實的藝術表現手法，再現貴州的原生文化，讓世界各地瞭解貴州豐富多彩的民族文化。
About the Programme: Guizhou is situated in the southwest of China. It boasts picturesque landscapes, pleasant climate, rich natural resources, and an interesting demographic mix of ethnic minority groups. There is a Chinese saying that describes the uniqueness of Guizhou –\"A different sky every ten miles, and different customs even within one mountain\".  It has therefore given birth to many rare cultural heritage gems. In this spectacular, Genesis and Spirit: A Showcase of the Intangible Cultural Heritage of Guizhou, the programme is made up of songs and dances of the various ethnic groups in the region threaded through by the important genre of Guizhou that has been inscribed onto UNESCO\'s Representative List of the Intangible Cultural Heritage of Humanity, the Grand Song of the Dong Ethnic Group. The colourful eclectic cultures of Guizhou will unfold here with its natural charm that promises to captivate audiences around the world.

節目名稱: 《民族舞．百家情》民族舞蹈匯演
節目簡介: "承2013年《民風鼓舞．嚮全城》的成功，香港旗艦藝團香港舞蹈團聯再同兩個本地最具規模的舞蹈聯盟香港舞蹈總會及香港舞蹈聯會第四年再次聯手，於2014年3月1日假香港文化中心廣場舉辦《民族舞‧百家情》大型民族舞蹈匯演。  是次參演團體共有23個，加上香港舞蹈團專業舞者齊齊大獻舞技，展現中國各民族舞蹈氣魄。逾三百名穿上色彩斑斕服飾的民族舞者，與大家分享漢族、藏族、傣族、羌族、彝族、朝鮮族、維吾爾族等民族樂舞情懷。活動免費入場，觀眾反應熱烈，全日近6,000人觀賞。           "
About the Programme: To follow the success of the Drum Dance Fiesta in 2013, Hong Kong Dance Company brought forth a dance gala Folk Dance Fiesta to the general public at Piazza, Hong Kong Cultural Centre on 1st March 2014. This performance was its fourth collaboration with renowned counterparts Hong Kong Dance Federation and Association of Hong Kong Dance Organizations.   There were 23 organizations that took part in the gala. Professional dancers from the Hong Kong Dance Company showed off their techniques with a touch of Chinese ethnic groups. All 300 dancers performed in colorful costumes. Folk dances of the Han, Tibetan, Dai, Qiang, Yi, Korean and Uyghur were rejoiced in the carnival of motions.    The cultural event was free of charge and it was applauded by a crowd of some 5000 people who enjoyed the gala.
地點: 香港文化中心露天廣場
Venue: Piazza, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
主辦單位: 香港舞蹈總會、香港舞蹈聯會及香港舞蹈團
Presenter: Hong Kong Dance Federation, Association of Hongkong Dance Organizations, Hong Kong Dance Company
venue.1: 香港文化中心露天廣場
venue_en: Piazza, Hong Kong Cultural Centre

節目名稱: 《民風鼓舞響全城 》民族舞蹈匯演
節目簡介: 香港舞蹈團、香港舞蹈總會及香港舞蹈聯會合辦的週年全港舞蹈界盛事，《民風鼓舞響全城》民族舞蹈匯演，於2013年3月9日下午於香港文化中心露天廣場舉行。是次大匯演陣容鼎盛，集本港舞界精英，與大眾分享漢族、藏族、傣族、苗族、彝族、朝鮮族、蒙古族、維吾爾族等民族舞蹈情懷。各大舞蹈團體加上特邀演出嘉賓香港演藝學院中國舞系的舞蹈新秀，齊齊大獻舞技，馬拉松式競跳各族舞蹈，帶來目不暇給的繽紛中國民族舞巡禮。
About the Programme: Jointly presented by the Hong Kong Dance Company, the Hong Kong Dance Federation and the Association of Hong Kong Dance Organizations, the Drum Dance Fiesta was held from 2-5pm on 9 March (Saturday), at the Piazza of the Hong Kong Cultural Centre.                                                                                        Hundreds of dancers from local dance groups dressed in bright Chinese folk costumes showed off their best moves. They shared the beats with the public in the mass dance. The mass dance was followed by a marathon performance of Chinese folk dances.                                                                                                                 Together with the dance students from the Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts, the Chinese folk dancers painted a brilliant rainbow of ethnic dances over the Piazza. The event was positively received with an audience of approximately 6,000 for the day.

節目簡介: 寂寞的小女孩父母出外工作，兩姐妹溜躂到玩具店，意外地被關在店內，倦極而眠。夢中和各種玩貝愉快舞蹈。夢醒後，店主體諒二人，並送贈玩具。二人開心地回家。
About the Programme: Two lonely girls were left at home, and they ventured out to a toy shop, got locked in the toy shop incidentally. In their dream, they danced happily with the toys of different nationalities. When woke up in the morning, the shop keeper give them some toys to comfort them. They went home with thanks together.

節目簡介: 舞蹈 - 《鼓舞》 生命充滿神奇的變數，充滿無限的可能。2008年汶川地震失去雙腿的中國舞者廖智，將在一個直徑長達1.8米的中國鼓上，以非凡的舞技為你帶來她鼓勵災民的舞蹈作品。演出還加入由香港舞蹈團署理藝術總監楊雲濤*編排伴舞的部份，五位本地舞者攜手演出，成就出香港獨一無二的演出版本！
About the Programme: Dance – Cheering Them Up Life is capricious, offering a myriad of possibilities. Liao Zhi lost her legs in the 2008 Sichuan earthquake. In an amazing dance to cheer up victims of the disaster, Liao will perform on a 1.8− meter giant drum. Choreographed by Yang Yuntao, Acting Artistic Director of the Hong Kong Dance Company, five local dancers will join Liao to create a unique performance which is a premiere for Hong Kong audience!
Venue: Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

演出/製作: 工俱舞蹈團

節目簡介:
日本超人氣全男班當代舞團「東京鷹」，以意念奇特多變的強烈風格獨樹舞壇。今次演出結集多年來創作的最強片段，將有趣的形體、離奇的電影、動畫、現場音樂和意想不到的戲劇元素融入舞蹈當中，笑料之外也呈現肢體的陽剛衝擊性；作品幽默機靈，充滿巧思，展現非一般的舞蹈型格，深受年輕觀眾歡迎，更創下日本票房史上開賣後十四分鐘售罄的驕人紀錄！他們不只紅遍日本，更踏足美洲、歐洲、亞洲等二十多個國家，一致好評，是當代劇場界高度注目的創作團隊！來吧，讓舞蹈重新還給生活、還給嬉戲、還給趣味；盡情享受快樂的感染力、創意的驚喜、生活的瘋趣！
 
「一班不受控制不恭不敬不同尺碼與儀態的男生，充滿令人難忘的漫畫式節奏和豐富的舞蹈語彙。」~《紐約時報》
 
「意念新奇、風格獨特、打破常規，無可比擬------這就是『東京鷹』！」~《東京舞蹈雜誌》
 
關於 近藤良平 (「東京鷹」創辦人、藝術總監及編舞)
東京出生的近藤良平，在秘魯、智利、阿根廷等音樂國度中成長，大學時代因迷上舞蹈，便開始與同好合作創作，奠定了舞團的原型。近藤良平採用豐富多元的表演元素，強調每位舞者的特性。其獨特風格更受到日本NHK電視台的邀請，在多個節目中編舞和演出，帶出舞蹈和創意就在日常生活當中的好玩理念。也獲知名時裝品牌山本耀司、BEAMS、電影導演三池崇史等跨界邀請合作，讓近藤良平及「東京鷹」的創作與表演遍及電視、電影、流行時尚等舞台。2004年獲得「第四回朝日舞台藝術賞」的寺山修司獎，目前於橫濱國立大學任教。
About the Programme:
Zany! Witty! Quirky! Sweaty! Here comes the highly popular contemporary dance troupe from Tokyo! Coming in all shapes and sizes and dressed in their trademark Japanese school uniforms, the all-male Condors is famous for their zany mix of comedy sketches, strange films, blasting retro rock music and storytelling, held together with precise calculation by exuberant high-energy dance. The wild and unique performance and many humorous body expressions are unfolding a new style of entertainment which led to regularly sold-out houses not only in Japan (where they set a theatre record when all tickets were sold in just 14 minutes) but also across the globe, and in the process have won swathes of critical acclaim.
 
In GRANDSLAM, each scene seems randomly connected, but coming to the end, it will bring back your own nostalgic memories and remind you of the things that are important for life. The Condors presents a happy-go-lucky performance for you. Like our life should be! Fasten your seat belt and enjoy the ride!
 
“An irrepressible, irrelevant brunch of nicely ill-assorted sizes and presence, the men were impressive in their comic timing and knowledge of dance styles.” ------ New York Times
 
“Incomparably unique company; that is outreaching Condors. Freshly and easily, the company breaks through the boundary of category and existing concept.” ------ Dance Magazine, Tokyo
 
About Ryohei Kondo (Founder, Artistic Director & Choreographer of CONDORS)
Tokyo-born Ryohei Kondo grew up in Peru, Chile, and Argentina where rhythm is a way of life. In 1996, he founded Condors which have become well-known for its satirical treatment of Japanese pop culture. Kondo's richly varied stagings featuring a rapid succession of scenes and skillfully interspersed dance, video, live music, puppetry and drama. His unique style of choreography and performances led to many invitations for collaborating in other media including TV, film and fashion; Condors has appeared on several programmes on Japan’s national TV station NHK and were invited to be catwalk models by Yohji Yamamoto, while Kondo has choreographed for BEAMS’s commercials and Takashi Miike’s movie. In 2004, Kondo was awarded Shuji Terayama Award at the Asahi Newspaper Performing Arts Awards for his choreography. He currently lectures at the Yokohama National University.
Venue: Shouson Theatre

舞蹈類別: 中國舞, 現代/當代舞, 東方舞
節目簡介: 回首九年，碧華的老師、團員及學生們在這片蔚藍的天空下付出無數的汗水和努力。每當站到台上，我們看到的就是太陽、是白雲、是彩虹。  今次為大家精選的是碧華舞蹈團的經典及新編節目，包括中國舞、現代舞及東南亞舞，當中部分更是在大型舞蹈比賽中獲得大獎的節目。  此外，碧華舞蹈學院創校以來，學生的中國舞級試成績斐然，曾在多個考季獲百分之百優良比率。今次亦為大家帶來他們的努力成果。
About the Programme: 回首九年，碧華的老師、團員及學生們在這片蔚藍的天空下付出無數的汗水和努力。每當站到台上，我們看到的就是太陽、是白雲、是彩虹。  今次為大家精選的是碧華舞蹈團的經典及新編節目，包括中國舞、現代舞及東南亞舞，當中部分更是在大型舞蹈比賽中獲得大獎的節目。  此外，碧華舞蹈學院創校以來，學生的中國舞級試成績斐然，曾在多個考季獲百分之百優良比率。今次亦為大家帶來他們的努力成果。
Venue: Auditorium, Tsuen Wan Town Hall
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium

節目名稱: 「社會共融齊起舞2015」綜合藝術教育舞蹈匯演
節目簡介: 匯聚曾參與藝術義工培訓班、外展舞蹈工作坊、「義工成長路~優化服務惠社群」研討會、「社會共融齊起舞2015」藝術教育舞蹈日及「社會共融齊起舞2015」義工舞蹈比賽的學校、社福團體及義工組織一同參與即興健康中國舞蹈工作坊及大型綜合藝術表演，藉中國舞蹈推動「藝術教育」、「傷健共融」和「健康教育」。  為了讓社區團體能夠有機會欣賞多姿多彩的中國舞蹈表演，認識中國舞蹈藝術義工服務;特舉辦贈票顯關懷活動，提供免費門票予弱勢社群，令是次匯演更具社會意義，藉此送暖人間，傳播義工精神。
About the Programme: Community service groups, voluntary groups and schools who took part in our Chinese Dance training course, workshops, conference, Dance Day, Chinese Dance Competition participated   in this integrated art performance. We aim at promoting the concepts of “Arts Education”, “Social Inclusion” and the “Health Education”.  To provide opportunities for more community groups toappreciate Chinese dance performances, and know about   Chinese dance voluntary services, we donated a number of tickets for these groups, which made this activity a more meaningful one.
Venue: Auditorium, Tsuen Wan Town Hall

舞蹈類別: 芭蕾舞, 爵士舞/街舞, 現代/當代舞, 西方民族舞
Category: Ballet, Jazz/Street Dance, Modern/Contemporary, Western Folk
節目簡介: 嘉年華早在歐洲是一個傳統的節日. 直到近年, 嘉年華更流行於亞洲, 這次表現, 我們以嘉年華為提才 ~ 嘉年華中有銀樂隊, 有可愛的小孩, 棒棒糖菓, 啦啦隊, 小馬, 小芭蕾舞蹈員, 健康舞及體操舞蹈員, 小丑, 魔術師, 行鋼線特技人 大型輕氣球, 小孩手持絲帶起舞, 和法國宮廷派對上的面具舞都在嘉年華狂歡起舞;節目還 有爵士舞,和一些芭蕾舞名著中的選段, 如歌碧利亞的馬祖卡舞曲, 天鵝湖中的西班牙舞曲, 四小天鵝舞曲, Finacee Dance, 唐吉訶德中的”夢” , 仙凡之戀, 以及由本校校長鍾金寶編排歌碧利亞中的 ”Grand Waltz” 的節錄 為這次表演謝幕.
About the Programme: Carnival is the main event in Europe, and this event is spreading to Asia recently. The carnival typically with marching band, a lot of children, lollipops, cheer leaders, Ponies, ballerinas, acrobats, clowns, tightrope walkers, magicians, big balloons, ribbon dance, and masque dance occurred.  They are combine into difference elements and have the fun party together.The second half, we have jazz, and the mainly on pointe work in Excerpt from the repertoire  from Coppellia, Swan Lake, Don Quixote , Les Sylphides.  The grand waltz from coppelia is the most spectacular choreography by Joan.
Venue: Y Theatre, Youth Square

節目簡介: 香港樓價高企,隻身來港的異鄉人周芳,只能負擔面積 70 尺的劏房。一轉眼,容身之所從 70 尺到 120 尺。在居住了7年的《蝸》裡,周 氏感受到這城市為她帶來的衝擊和魅力。 每個人的心中都有著一個安樂蝸。作為異鄉人初來港時感受到香港是好客之都,人們的臉上掛著笑臉,熱心地展現這個城市親切的一面。異鄉人漸漸地適應了本土的生活,被同化、被接受。她在融入的同時經歷了時間的洗禮。隨著樓房越建越高,無形的牆壁狠狠地把她和這城市分隔著,被排擠、被孤立。就像蝸牛一樣,背負了一種實在的壓力,然而背上的標籤不是靠努力便可以甩掉。回到蝸的空間裡,異鄕人看著牆壁上的裂痕,思緒陷入一個又一個的旋渦,容不下半點空隙。

Programme Name: Eureka Moment - From Head to Toe!
節目簡介: 從頭發現一閃即逝的靈光！ 三位三十而立的本土編舞，誓要以獨特的舞蹈感動觀眾 城市當代舞蹈團 (CCDC) 將於 9月18 至20 日假香港文化中心劇場上演《發現號 》─ 由三位同是來自本土舞壇的編舞: 馮樂恒、黎德威和黃振邦，將以別樹一幟的創作風格呈現肢體美學，以舞蹈語言撼動觀眾心靈 ，分享他們靈光一閃的發現！ 這一刻她與他最相襯，下一秒他身邊卻換了人。馮樂恆在《紅牆》中窺探她與他和他跟她的曖昧糾纏， 與你細說男女之間的身份與關係。黎德威於《眩》嘗試用舞蹈傾聽身體 ，一步一步走到人心迷宮的渾沌邊緣，揭開表

Programme Name: REAL Showcase New Series -  Off State
節目簡介: 「法兒」是舞蹈動作的專業詞語,一般指演員對舞蹈的感覺。「跑法」是一個民間舞蹈術語,意為偏離了原本的舞蹈規範。對於一個偏離軌道的狀態,如何於過程中面對自身的轉變。石嘉琁希望利用民族民間舞的原始動律,尋找「它」背後的風格特色,與現今生活經歷相互融合,然後透過是次作品呈現。希望透過是次機會,從民間舞蹈身段探討如何與當代身體作出協調;衝破中國民間舞蹈的既定模式,然後抽絲剝繭,再將之融合於現今生活片段當中,以一個編舞新鮮人的身份,擦出肢體與動作的新火花。

節目簡介: The Roots 是一場歷險之旅。11 名嘻哈舞者各自施展渾身解數，以其精湛舞藝為團隊增色，帶領觀眾進行一次探索。編舞暨藝術總監卡達． 阿圖， 多年來穿梭街頭、馬戲團帳幕、拳擊台與劇院舞台， 越戰越強； 由阿圖編創的The Roots 立意深遽，回溯自身來時路。雖然The Roots 以阿圖的起步作為切入點，但絕非陳腔濫調之作：以光影與氛圍造就的The Roots，是重新定義嘻哈舞蹈的一次開拓性演出。

節目簡介: 每個人都帶著無法挽回的過去，與另一個人互相碰撞。這些記憶交疊，遺憾與悔恨，雖轉化成不同形態，卻仍困在過去與現在，躑躕不前。  當代編舞許俊傑，以公眾游泳池獨特的空間佈局為靈感，巧妙地將隱藏在我們身邊的故事，牽引重組再撕裂，創作出一部衝擊視覺及記憶的環境舞蹈劇場作品。是次演出範圍包括：泳池入口、更衣室、走廊、泳池旁及水中，舞者亦要熟習在不同演區及水中起舞，誓要將泳池的不同環境附上新義意。在游泳池作舞蹈演出雖困難重重，卻是個舞蹈和創意的新挑戰！
地點: 西貢保良局北潭涌渡假營游泳池
Venue: Swimming Pool, Pak Tam Chung Holiday Camp
其他: 「對話空間」系列獲香港特別行政區政府「藝能發展資助計劃」的資助

節目簡介: 繼《女式》、《全女打》、《針言．絮語》後，又一全女掌舵創作的舞蹈製作。心思縝密卻大膽創新的舞壇活躍份子藍嘉穎；舞跡踏足港、英、美多地的賀倩瑩；積極參與跨媒體工作、愛演愛編愛跳的馬師雅；及以精湛舞藝著稱香港舞壇的莫嫣，精心炮製四齣舞蹈短打，勢必推翻世俗為女性定型的陳詞濫調。

節目簡介: KPOP Dance Concert是Friends Junction Dance Company一年一度的匯演。總結一年以來的KPOP舞蹈，用舞蹈、音樂、燈光效果呈現特別的演出，帶出深受大眾喜愛的韓國舞蹈文化。2014年4月，我們舉辨了KPOP Dance Concert 2014，收到不少的報名和回響。有見及此，我們決定今年也繼續舉辦這一項有意義的活動。在較早前的時間我們也舉行了KPOP Dance Cover比賽，選出了優勝者並邀請了他們在KPOP Dance Concert進行表演，讓大家有交流的

節目名稱: 《大河之舞》二十周年特別紀念版（港譯：舞起狂瀾）
節目簡介: Riverdance港譯《舞起狂瀾》，大河之舞是享譽世界的踢踏舞劇，伊莉莎白女王二世的壽辰禦賞演出，2014年迎來了20周年的全球巡迴演出。   這個起源於1994年的愛爾蘭傳統踢踏舞劇已經在世界巡演了15000餘場，在全球47個國家1000多個劇場擁有超過2500萬觀眾，演出總行程達到563000英里，是月球到地球距離的兩倍。   大河之舞，是一部世界的舞蹈史詩，除了愛爾蘭傳統的踢踏舞之外，西班牙佛朗明哥舞的熱烈、俄羅斯芭蕾舞的優美及美國紐約風格爵士踢踏舞的幽默都融合其中；   大河之舞，是一部美的史詩
About the Programme: With an incredible two decades of global success since the show first burst into the public’s heart at the Eurovision Song Contest in Dublin in 1994, this is an unmissable chance for HK audiences to reconnect with what the Irish Times rightly described as
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre

Programme Name: 2015 Emerging Choreographers Series by Hong Kong Dance Alliance (Sponsored Programme)
節目簡介: 今年香港舞蹈聯盟再次製作「編舞‧新系列 2015」，參與計劃的編舞者，均是活躍於香港舞蹈界的新生代。三位新晉編舞家：禤天揚，李偉能及李德，各自為「編舞‧新系列」的演出編排一個長約25分鐘的新舞作。由本地資深編舞家楊春江帶領下，經過五個月的排練，為大家帶來三個不同風格的作品。
About the Programme: Hong Kong Dance Alliance resume this meaning project Emerging Choreographers 2015 and its four panelists have selected three active and up-and-coming choreographers.  The elite choreographers: Huen Tin Yeung, Lee Wai Nang, and Li De, will present their or
Venue: Black Box Theatre, Kwai Tsing Theatre

舞蹈類別: 中國舞, 現代/當代舞
節目簡介: 香港舞蹈團與「跨界編舞才子」伍宇烈先生再度攜手，召集本地一眾舞蹈創作人，結伴同遊，回首與前瞻中國舞在香港的傳承與發展。《少年遊》以三代舞者背後的故事為經、探索經典舞碼的全新演繹為緯，編織出一幅「且聽青春吟」的意象，喚起觀眾的少年夢。多位資深舞蹈創作人，結合他們獨特的個人經歷，以全新視角詮釋《月夜遊》、《獨步》、《雨夜》、《颼颼》等經典之作，與觀眾分享他們與中國舞相伴多年的成長和收穫。
About the Programme: The Hong Kong Dance Company joins hands with renowned choreographer  Yuri Ng to take you through a ruminative journey with local dancers and choreographers in Shao Nian Yau.  Staging the stories behind three generations of dancers, this creative ollaboration sets out to interpret  classic dances anew, with a view to reflecting on the heritage, development, and prospect of Chinese dance in Hong Kong.

節目名稱: 《星夢遊樂》－荃灣大會堂場地伙伴計劃
Programme Name: I am a DANCER!Theatre - Tsuen Wan Town Hall Venue Partnership Scheme
節目簡介: 星星聽說了香港舞蹈團「北京舞蹈學院中國舞等級考試課程」二百多位學員的舞蹈夢，決助他們飛躍繁星舞台！在遊樂共舞間，小舞蹈員不單展現課堂所學，還穿起鮮豔奪目的民族舞衣，喜悅自信地高喊：「I am a DANCER!」
Venue: Auditorium, Tsuen Wan Town Hall
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium

節目名稱: 《起舞》－ 荃灣大會堂場地伙伴計劃
Programme Name: Just Dance! - Tsuen Wan Town Hall Venue Partnership Scheme
節目簡介: 香港舞蹈團 X 香港演藝學院 X 澳門演藝學院 X 廣東舞蹈戲劇職業學院  粵港澳舞蹈專業培訓學府展才秀   香港、澳門、廣東三個舞蹈培訓學院以規範化的課程，承傳著優秀的中國舞蹈傳統，融匯當代的藝術思維，為21世紀的演藝新苗開創舞蹈專業之門。作為本地旗艦專業舞團之一，香港舞蹈團為三院繫結紅線，讓年輕人們由心起舞，漫說三地快樂舞事，延續中華民族川流不息的青春舞曲。
About the Programme: Hong Kong Dance Company invites the three top professional dance training institutes: Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts, Macao Conservatory and Guangdong Dance and Drama College, to showcase the talents of their students.
Venue: Auditorium, Tsuen Wan Town Hall
製作/演出單位: 香港舞蹈團外展及教育部
Production / Performing Unit: Hong Kong Dance Company - Outreach & Education Department
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium

Programme Name: Voices and Dances of the Distant Land
節目簡介: 香港舞蹈團聯袂本地音樂生力軍「一舖清唱」，搜羅中國民間各地最活潑生動的歌舞傳統，糅合嶄新創意呈現舞台。「一舖清唱」巧妙地將多首膾炙人口的民歌改編成無伴奏合唱歌曲，除保留了原曲的優美旋律和韻味外，更插入流行、搖滾、爵士等風格的變奏，加上諧趣鬼馬的演繹，充分展現中國傳統歌舞活力四射和富時代感的一面，在蒙古、維吾爾、藏、壯、傣族的山水風情畫間，縱情遨遊，跟隨著曼妙動人的舞步，一同訪尋那個令人嚮往的、淳樸而美好的香格里拉。
About the Programme: In Voices and Dances of the Distant Land, Hong Kong Dance Company collaborates with Yat Po Singers, a local a cappella group well-loved by the young audience for their witty, theatrical performances, in a creative  remaking of Chinese folk songs and dances. Yat Po Singers will interpret a collection of widely loved folk songs as choral music, expressing their melodic beauty and idyllic spirit through the magic of voice. In this distinctive contemporary interpretation of traditional song and dance, you will hear rich nuances of latter-day music genres like pop, rock and jazz.   Join us on a magical journey: let our voices and our dance lead you into the realms of romance, folklore and joie de vivre, and take you to an idyllic distant land.
Venue: Auditorium, Tsuen Wan Town Hall
venue_en: Tsuen Wan Town Hall, Auditorium

節目名稱: 《十二生肖大冒險の冰雪奇熊》
Programme Name: Magical Adventures of Baby Polar Bear and the 12 Zodiac Animals
節目簡介: 白雪茫茫的北極，受到人類不斷破壞，情況非常嚴峻，北極熊更是無家可歸。可怕的雪崩突然降臨，把一對北極熊母子分隔，險象環生！十二生肖各有本領，被派往北極拯救大自然，幫助熊BB尋親。旅途上，他們遇到如夢如幻的北極光與流星雨，在危難中發揮合作精神…… 香港舞蹈團的專業舞蹈員，聯同兒童團及少年團的小演員，邀請觀眾一起踏上這趟神奇冰雪之旅。十二隻趣緻動物與熊啤啤載歌載舞，劇情緊張刺激，幽默詼諧，為大小朋友送上一個關於愛、勇氣和環保的動人故事。
About the Programme: One little bear on a big adventure to find her mum! Professional dancers of the Hong Kong Dance Company as well as young dancers from the Children’s and Youth Troupes invite you to join them on this magical tour on ice. Through dance, music and hilarious drama, twelve cute animals and the bears take you on a ride in this heartfelt tale about love, courage and environment protection.
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
編舞: 謝茵,蔡飛,兒童團及少年團全體導師
Choreographers: Cai Yin, Xie Fei, Instructors of the Children’s and Youth Troupes
venue_en: Grand Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 木蘭代父從軍的堅毅不屈經典故事，自古至今感動了無數人的心靈，千古傳頌。香港舞蹈團大型舞劇《花木蘭》，特別加入多媒體錄像及獨特佈景設計，融合古典舞、武術、現代舞美元素等豐 富藝術形式，將花木蘭的忠、孝、勇、智立體地呈現於舞台上，承傳中國傳統文化價值，鼓舞人心。
About the Programme: The Hong Kong Dance Company brings to the stage an inspiring re-telling of the household folktale of The Legend of Mulan in a dance drama. Traditional Chinese virtues are exemplified through the unusual adventures   and touching story of Mulan, a peasant girl who disguises as a man to join the army in place of her aged father. A heroine with moral courage and intelligence, Mulan’s exceptional wisdom and vision transcend fame and fortune.
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: Grand Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 新編大型舞劇《倩女．幽魂》以經典文學鉅著《聊齋誌異》中「聶小倩」的故事為創作藍本，改編自八十年代徐克監製的經典電影《倩女幽魂》，配合扣人心弦的電影配樂，以奇幻深邃的意境、懾人心魄的舞蹈，述說美艷女鬼聶小倩與耿直書生寧采臣的浪漫人鬼戀，讓觀眾重新遊歷故事中虛幻的妖境異域，人鬼妖的鬥法與相戀，蕩氣迴腸，觸動心靈。
About the Programme: The grand dance drama L’Amour Immortel is an adaptation of a story from classical Chinese literature, Strange Tales from a Chinese Studio, and the renowned 1980s Hong Kong movie A Chinese Ghost Story produced by Tsui Hark. L’Amour Immortel reinterprets this classic tale from a contemporary perspective. A beautiful, bewitching ghost loses her heart to an honest, good-natured man and resolves to save him from evil forces, even at the cost of her own afterlife. The lovers traverse a shadowy, mysterious underworld in their fight for love and freedom. Gripping, thrilling and passionate, this tale of forbidden love brings out the most beautiful of human values through the poignancy of a timeless ghost story.
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: Grand Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目名稱: 《韓舞紀 －首爾 · 香港 · 相遇》
Programme Name: Dancing Seoul to Soul - Korea · Hong Kong · Encounter
節目簡介: 香港舞蹈團「八樓平台」首次與韓國舞蹈界攜手合作《韓舞紀 - 首爾‧香港‧相遇》，韓國著名現代舞蹈及編舞家柳碩勳及李倫勍教授，以韓國民謠《阿里郎》變奏出現代人生《路》；留法編舞家尹敏碩，把傳統音樂與舞蹈元素轉化成人間《雜感》；兩套作品折射出韓國舞蹈傳統與當代融合的獨特文化精神。本地代表香港舞蹈團首席舞蹈員黃磊則呈獻新作《身‧影》，舞映其狀態與個人思緒。
About the Programme: Hong Kong Dance Company’s “8/F Platform” features the first ever collaboration between inspiring choreographers and dancers from Korea and Hong Kong, pushing the boundaries of choreography and traditions.  Ryu Seok-hun, Lee Yun-kyung, Yun Min-suk. Three glittering stars of  contemporary dance from Seoul. They are bringing two works that  showcase the independent spirit of Korean dance, blending cultural traditions with contemporary insight. HKDC’s Principal Dancer Huang Lei creates a new work Passing Shadows, exploring human emotions and state of mind.
地點: 上環文娛中心八樓平台
Venue: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, 8/F Platform
編舞: 黃磊, 尹敏碩, 柳碩勳
Choreographers: 黃磊, 尹敏碩, 柳碩勳
venue.1: 上環文娛中心香港舞蹈團八樓平台
venue_en: Sheung Wan Civic Centre, 8/F Platform

節目簡介: 跨媒體中國新舞道《極道體》    鬼才編舞家楊春江X新媒體藝術家林欣傑X香港舞蹈團首席舞蹈員陳俊人本為体、道生兩極、天地合一、舞法無邊正負磁場兩個身體的極道游走，以軀體作導引，結合舞台中央一束感應影像及聲效的光柱，劃出天圓地方，伸延無極意象。兩位凌空舞者，舞動天、地、人和，一起說「道」，觸發多重視、聽能量千變萬化的時空舞動…… 鬼才編舞家楊春江，聯同新媒體藝術家林欣傑及香港舞蹈團首席舞蹈員陳俊，攜手合作跨媒體中國舞道《極道體》。透過聲音、光影、舞步，穿越空間與物理所限，為你帶來一台高感官觸
About the Programme: Within a magnetic field, two bodies revolve around a pole that responds to images and sound, extending into infinite possibilities… Ingenious choreographer Daniel Yeung collaborates with New Media Artist Keith Lam and Hong Kong Dance Company Principal Dancer Chen Jun in Bipolar Bodies. Through sound, light, shadows and dance moves, they traverse spatial and physical boundaries, creating a Chinese dance experiment that heightens all of your senses!

節目名稱: 【國際民俗舞蹈週】《緣起敦煌》（贊助節目）
Programme Name: International Folk Dance Week 2015 - Dunhuang Reflections (Sponsored Programme)
節目簡介: 繼《舞出敦煌》系列在香港文化博物館「敦煌－說不完的故事」展覧中獲得觀眾的盛大歡迎後，香港舞蹈總會將於8月呈獻《緣起敦煌》大型舞劇。劇本以敦煌壁畫爲觸發點，反映人生哲理，切合大乘佛教三法印要義。通過敦煌舞蹈、高雅音樂、服飾化裝設計、舞台燈光、錄像投影等裝置，成就一齣大型高藝術性和觀賞性的作品。引導觀眾認識佛教對中國文化藝術及生活哲理的深遠影響，從藝術的角度了解敦煌文化，帶出對文物保育應有的重視態度。
About the Programme: The series of 30 educational performances ofcommissioned by the Hong Kong Heritage Museum to accompany the "Dunhuang--Untold Tales Untold Riches" exhibition in early 2015 received overwhelming support. As a further development the Hong Kong Dance Federati
Venue: Auditorium, Shatin Town Hall

節目簡介: 漢賽和格蕾是一對兄妹，他們常常沉迷玩電子遊戲，尤其喜愛玩candy crush。 有一天，媽媽帶他們和其他小朋友到士多啤梨果園參觀，即使其他小朋友叫他們一同玩遊戲，還有鳥兒從他們身邊飛過，他們的眼睛卻一直被遊戲機吸引著，專注於遊戲機玩樂中。突然他們眼 看到所有糖果也從遊戲中跳了岀來。兩兄妹雀躍地跟随著糖果奔走到瀑布前，最後更穿越瀑布到達一個黑潻潻的寂靜空間。寂靜的環境，加上遼闊的星空，漢賽和格蕾感到很害怕。這時候，他們看到很多糖果精靈在舞動中，好像很開心。所以他們便一直隨着她們前進。。。不覺地走進了一間糖果屋。在糖果屋內，彩色繽紛的糖果們也在開心玩樂，此時，薑餅精靈突然發現了漢賽和格蕾的闖入，便着令糖果們合力把他們倆捉住 。在這一刻，各種糖果也出盡法寶，將他們捉。他們被不同的糖果重重的纏著，急得想哭起來......Ting a ling~~~突然傳來電話聲，媽媽着急的問道，漢賽和格蕾去了哪裡，他們慶幸媽媽及時來電把他們送回現實世界，並承諾以後也不再廢寢忘餐地打遊戲機了。
About the Programme: The siblings Hansel and Gretel love electronic games, especially the  very popular game Candy Crush.   One day, mother took them to on an outing strawberry farm with other  kids, hoping to introduce them to Nature, but Hansel and Gretel just   focused on playing their games.   All of a sudden, the candies come to life! They followed them without thinking…….  Strange environment, it scared Hansel and Gretel. Then finally a magnificent candy house appeared.   Hansel and Gretel have barged into the world of candies. They were entrapped.  Ting-A-Ling ~~~ A call from mother came just in time to bring them  back to reality. They learned a lesson and promised they will never be addicted to electronic games again!
Venue: Concert Hall, Hong Kong City Hall

節目簡介: Elements元素，我們以『金』代表華麗的古典芭蕾，『木』以音樂性歌舞劇來表現，『水』則是現代舞的流暢自如，『火』精力十足的巴西戰舞-Capoeira，『土』一切的根基，芭蕾基本動作示範。以五行元素比擬多種不同風貌的舞蹈形式。五行不但代表了多元的舞蹈方向，也隱含了我們教室的學生來自各行各業，卻因為舞蹈聚集在一起的巧妙關係。   Gravity Ballet舞蹈學校，成立六年，以成人芭蕾舞為主，在這裡的學習愉快卻不失嚴謹，輕鬆卻也重視紀律，我們的學習，不在於比較，更重視對於自我的超越。『Elements』

節目簡介: 耆舞派對2015 全港長者快樂椅子舞大匯演 尊賢會一直致力宣揚及推廣「活躍社交、快樂老化」，過去曾於不同安老院舍和長者中心舉辦快樂椅子舞工作坊，在音樂、舞步和歡樂的氣氛中，帶給長者快樂、運動和社交活動，藉此強化長者們的身心與心靈健康。希望透過是次活動，讓長者與家人、朋友一同享樂。

節目簡介: 由韵情舞集主辦一年一度的演出晚會《韵情舞集 15》,於 28-12-2015假柴灣青年廣場 Y 綜藝館舉行,除了老師們編排的多隻舞蹈之外,在今次的演出裡,老師亦發掘及培育了幾位團員另一方面的舞蹈才華,引導她們如何開始編排舞蹈、利用舞步及動作加以變化、協調、道具運用、圖形及舞台空間的互動等,豐富舞蹈的意境,這使當晚的節目更加精彩及多元化。同時亦安排了中國舞分級考試組合展示,作為各級考試班同學的匯報。更邀請了多個演出嘉賓團體,一同將歡樂帶給觀眾。
About the Programme: The annual performance《Kidance 15》organized by Kidance Troupe has been held on 28-12-2015 at the Y-Theatre of Youth Square. In this year, other than a number of newly choreographed and phenomenal dances being performed as usual, we have tried to encourage and develop the Troupe members’ ability in dance choreography by inviting them to practice in the choreography under the teacher’s guidance and the result was good. The performance ended up with a showcase of combinations from Chinese Dance Grade Examination Syllabus.Many guest performers were invited to perform as well.
Venue: Y Theatre, Youth Square
venue_en: Youth Square, Y Theatre

節目名稱: 雅頌舞樂－藝摯十八週年東歐民族舞蹈匯演
Programme Name: European Dance Ensemble - The 18th Anniversary Performance of Knack Cordial
節目簡介: 表演超過20首東歐民族舞蹈組曲, 包括匈牙利, 羅馬尼亞, 斯洛伐克，保加利亞及烏克蘭等舞蹈，並有多首在全港公開舞蹈比賽西方舞組拿金獎和全場最佳表現獎舞蹈。受邀來港與本團同台合作演出的海外表演嘉賓包括: 來自台灣的波亞斯歐洲民族舞蹈團，MFC匈牙利舞蹈俱樂部及巴勒克世界民俗舞團, 來自英國的有杜拿東歐民族舞蹈團。這次台灣有40多人來港參與表演, 英國2人, 香港團員60多人，共超過100表演者演出。
About the Programme: We perform folk dances from Hungary, Romania, Slovakia, Bulgaria and Ukraine etc of which some dances had been awarded the Best Performance Award and Gold awards at Hong Kong Open dance Contests. Overseas guest performers include Pojas European Folk Dance Ensemble, Magyar Folklore Club, BLK International Folk Dance Group from Taiwan and  Doina Eastern European Folk Dance Group from UK. There are more than  100 performers taking part in this performance which includes 40 from Taiwan, 2 from UK and more than 60 from Hong Kong.
Venue: Auditorium, Tuen Mun Town Hall
venue_en: Tuen Mun Town Hall, Auditorium

節目名稱: R & T (Rhythm & Tempo)「擊響‧節奏‧踏舞台」踢躂舞培訓計劃 2014/15- 結業演出

節目簡介: 頑皮搗蛋的小魔星又施展他的惡作劇本色，今次他要混入人間界，誓把人間界弄至天翻地覆！小露寶是天界警察，受天神巴利夫之命，在限時之內捉回小魔星。但小魔星詭計多端，一見小露寶便逃之夭夭，因此天神巴利夫便給了小露寶三件法寶，包括：「Head Voice發聲大喇叭」、「趣怪面譜」和「Arabesque螺旋蜘蛛網」。一於來個《小露寶智擒小魔星》行動！
About the Programme: “A Tap Dance Adventure - Little Robot Vs. Wicked Gremlin ” will be performed by students from four primary schools and two secondary schools.

節目名稱: 《手手愛漫遊》手牽手創意劇團(俄羅斯) @奇幻滿FUN
Programme Name: Miracle Fun' Series: Time for Fun  by Hand Made Theatre (Russia)
節目簡介: 來自俄羅斯聖彼得堡的手牽手創意劇團僅憑雙手的交錯纏繞，就創造出了火車、船、滴答鐘及動物等各式各樣的事物，令觀眾樂在其中。許多可愛的物件，接二連三地從四周湧現，在空氣中跳躍及舞動，舞出一個又一個的小故事，如季節替換、音樂起源、天鵝湖、奧林匹克運動會等等。 《手手愛漫遊》是一個歡樂又充滿創意的表演。演出中融入了許多日常生活元素，旨在用嶄新的表達方式去展現平凡事物，配合輕快歡樂愉悅的背景音樂，讓觀眾在輕鬆氣氛中盡情發揮想像空間！
地點: 西灣河文娛中心劇院、大埔文娛中心演奏廳、元朗劇院演藝廳

節目名稱: 多媒體無限系列：《浮華書》狼嚎五度劇團（哥倫比亞）
Programme Name: Boundless Multimedia' Series: Vanitas Libellum by La Quinta del Lobo (Colombia)
節目簡介: 一個結合現場演奏、巨型投影及舞蹈的跨媒體演出 《浮華書》是一個多媒體劇場，以探索時間的概念和人們對時間的認知為主題。作品分為三幕:〈滴漏鐘〉、〈動態城市〉及〈蛻變〉。演出通過虛幻的影像效果和原始的形體動作，對異象、夢、夢魘等各種人們對時間流逝的經驗作反思。作品糅合互動科技、即時動作追蹤技術、巨型投影和原創現場音樂等多個元素，以增加節目的感染力。

節目名稱: 《佛蘭明高之聲》莎拉．芭拉斯佛蘭明高舞蹈團
節目簡介: 西班牙最受矚目的佛蘭明高藝人莎拉．芭拉斯，享譽於她絢麗的步法與攝人的舞台演出，更被英國每日電訊報譔文稱讚為「其中一位不能不注視凝望的表演者」。她將為大家帶來全新表演《佛蘭明高之聲》。  莎拉．芭拉斯深受到幾位偉大的佛蘭明高藝人影響，他們包括柏高．狄．路西雅、卡馬隆．德．拉．伊斯拉、安東尼奧．加迪斯、安立奎．莫倫特及卡門．阿馬亞，而《佛蘭明高之聲》則是一個向以上各位致敬的作品。

節目名稱: 芭蕾舞導賞講座「舞星‧名劇」
節目簡介: 備受讚賞的劇目有賴舞藝高超，氣質獨特的舞蹈員凝聚強大的感染力，促使觀眾產生共鳴，教人百看不厭。才華出眾的舞蹈家不論是表演傳統古典劇目，或是現代新編的舞蹈作品，同樣展現出卓越的表現力與深厚的藝術素養。芭蕾舞明星在台上演繹古今名劇發放的個人魅力，實在叫人着迷。
About the Programme: Many dance repertoires have won acclaim by virtue of highly skilled dancers who command the stage and engage the audience with their unique aura.  Great dancers of exceptional talent can demonstrate the same virtuosity whether in a traditional classic or a newly choreographed, modern dance, and it is this amazing stage presence that makes their audience fall in love with them.

節目名稱: 澳洲室樂團及悉尼舞蹈團《光》
Programme Name: Illuminated' by Australian Chamber Orchestra and Sydney Dance Company
節目簡介: 「光」表現了拉斐爾．邦納凱拉對編舞的熱愛，三齣扣人心弦的舞作，除了結合了動作、音樂及著名女歌手凱蒂‧努南的現場歌唱演出外，更呈現了三種不同舞蹈面貌，魅力非凡。  邦納凱拉把《變奏‧10》及其另一舞碼《靈光》，以浪漫的方式向布列頓閃爍奪目的音樂作品致敬。  由邦納凱拉與李察‧托尼提攜手打造的《漫舞拉莫》，則將拉莫令人驚豔的巴羅克芭蕾及歌劇音樂帶到二十一世紀；在這齣作品中，活力十足的巴羅克音樂與優美動人的當代舞相互交融，這舞碼首度公演已座無虛席，大獲好評。  是次演出由澳洲室樂團、悉尼舞蹈團、女歌手努南及赫爾普曼獎得主服裝設計師東尼‧馬提捷弗斯基聯合製作，「光」保證讓大家度過一個難忘的現場音樂與舞蹈之夜！
About the Programme: Across a trio of breathtaking dance pieces, ‘Illuminated’ offers a radiant marriage of movement, music and live vocals from legendary songstress Katie Noonan. Born from the passionate choreography of Rafael Bonachela, ‘Illuminated’ brings together three captivating visions of dance.  Bonachela’s Variation 10, joins his Les Illuminations – a deeply romantic tribute to the shimmering compositions of Benjamin Britten.  Bonachela and Richard Tognetti’s stunning collaboration Project Rameau brings Jean-Philippe Rameau’s dazzling Baroque ballet and opera music roaring into the 21st century. Fusing vibrant Baroque music with beautiful contemporary dance, Project Rameauin its premiere season played to packed theatres and critical acclaim.  Featuring the Australian Chamber Orchestra, Sydney Dance Company, songstress Katie Noonan and costume design from Helpmann Award–winner Toni Maticevski, ‘Illuminated’ promises a stunning evening of dance and live music.

Programme Name: Dance x Multimedia' Series: "Artist of Light" by iLuminate (United States)
節目簡介: 熒舞團的一眾舞蹈員會身穿發光的充電舞衣在漆黑的舞台上演出。《電光舞者》為舞團成名後首個創作的足本完整舞台演出，透過音樂、美術、不同的舞蹈風格（如：現當代舞、街舞、拉丁舞和霹靂舞Breaking）及珂布創造的iLuminate熒舞團獨有的專利技術，讓表演者、編舞家、工程師、技師程式員、造型師及藝術總監利用自訂的無線燈光程式，打造極具爆炸性兼耀眼奪目富炫目視覺效果及具爆炸性的舞蹈演出。
About the Programme: iLuminate, is the brainchild of Miral Kotb, where dancers in electrified glow-in-the-dark suits, is well-known for performing choreographed dances and illusions on a darkened stage. 'Artist of Light' is the first full length performance created by the fam
