節目簡介: 月亮映照海面，海風掀動浪花，松針層疊交錯，晦暗月色中流連著被塵緣所困的幽靈姊妹 ─ 松風與村雨，她們因著僧人的探詢，現身訴說自身的故事⋯⋯日本能劇的經典劇目《松風》，落在以跨界合作馳名國際的德國編舞家莎莎 ‧ 華爾斯手中，既保存東方傳統劇場的含蓄簡約，又具備西方歌劇音樂的深厚宏大，加上當代舞蹈流麗澎湃的表達力，糅合出一種嶄新舞台美學，獲評為「令人難忘的總體藝術作品」。  著名當代古典音樂作曲家細川俊夫的作品充滿日本傳統音樂印記，這次他擷取能劇的精髓，以超脫的樂音描繪出敏銳剔透的情感和大自然佗寂之美；歌劇演員與舞者相互交替、反覆推進，將凄怨激烈的情感和詭秘的存在狀態，演繹得恰到好處；舞台上意象鮮明、一虛一實的巨網和木造框架，營造出時空橋樑，讓靈魂回到凡間尋求最終的解脫。
About the Programme: A moonlit sea stirred by the wind. Pine needles crisscross and intertwine. The lingering spirits of sisters Matsukaze and Murasame remain entangled in the human realm, where they relate their poignant love story to a Buddhist monk... World-renowned for cross-disciplinary collaborations, German choreographer Sasha Waltz fuses minimalist eastern theatre with textured western opera in a fluid choreographic reinterpretation of Japanese Noh classic Matsukaze. The ethereal outcome is a radically new and creative experience, praised as an "unforgettable total work of art".  Contemporary classical composer Toshio Hosokawa, acclaimed for his original envisioning of Japanese music, here distills the musical essence of Noh theatre in this modern dance-imbued rendition. In doing so, he unleashes both the painfulness and purity of Nature through a crystallised blend of the traditional and avant-garde that encompasses vocal, orchestral and even silent elucidation. As the enigmatic tale unfolds, singers also become dancers entwined in an eerily apocalyptic landscape. At times, a diaphanous web enmeshes the performers beyond time and space while reality is bounded by a wooden frame. In such ways, the vivid stagecraft serves as if a Noh bridge, crossing from now to the after life and taking souls back to the mortal world for ultimate liberation.

節目名稱: 2016 社區文化大使計劃：《飛飛旅遊爸》
Programme Name: 2016 Community Cultural Ambassador Scheme: "My Daddy, My Flying Car and Me"
節目簡介: 「家」是一種概念、集體記憶，還是成長過程中的心靈支柱？原創舞劇《飛飛旅遊爸》的飛飛懷抱爸爸的關愛，排除萬難，以舞蹈周遊列國，帶著全新的感悟向未來進發。計劃透過演出、工作坊及展覽，邀請大家與飛飛一起體驗自立與成長，感受家庭的溫暖與支援之可貴。

節目名稱: 2016 社區文化大使計劃：踢躂歌舞劇神話《踢躂亞星》巡迴演出
Programme Name: 2016 Community Cultural Ambassador Scheme: "Sing with the Feet" Touring Performance
節目簡介: 10月、11月，R & T 與一眾演員於全港18區上演《踢躂亞星》！ 故事講述... 星辰本來是負責清潔天空的神仙,祂越來越對這份看似微不足道的工作感到無聊,因而對自己的工 作不以為意,亦慢慢地忘記了當初對盤古的承諾。藍天成了烏沉沉,不善打理的天空,最後還下起了一連 十日的大雨,連日的大雨使天空缺了一個大洞,女媧得悉此事......屆時，自有分解！

節目名稱: 2015/16年度學校文化日計劃：《賞‧識現代舞》
Programme Name: 2015/16 School Culture Day Scheme："A Date with Contemporary Dance"
節目簡介: 舞蹈是一種抒發感情，表達思想的藝術。現代舞更是一種自由的藝術形式，舞者可以透過不同的肢體動作表現自我。那麼，現代舞源自甚麼？跟傳統的芭蕾舞和民族舞又有何分別？現代舞如何反映當今本地社會的精神面貌？這個節目由舞團藝術總監曹誠淵精心策劃，一方面欣賞舞蹈在歷史中不同的流變，另一方面配以深入淺出的講解，寓通識教育於藝術欣賞。城市當代舞蹈團的專業舞者將會示範芭蕾舞、古典舞及中西方民間舞蹈，以演出介紹現代舞大師依莎朵拉‧鄧肯（Isadora Duncan）、瑪瑞‧魏格曼（Mary Wigman）等的藝術理念，展示現代舞蹈的多元性。

節目名稱: 2016/17年度學校文化日計劃：《蟻人的快樂哲學》音樂舞蹈形體劇場
Programme Name: 2016/17 School Culture Day Scheme："Philosophy of Happiness of Ant-men"
節目簡介: 成長路上，青少年往往要面對繁忙生活節奏、事事講求經濟效益的價值觀以及家長望子成龍的期望所帶來的無形壓力。節目嘗試透過原創音樂、舞蹈、歌曲及形體動作，讓青少年尋回「快樂生活」真諦。除可欣賞精彩的現代舞演出外，演後互動共舞及問答環節更可讓同學參與其中，親身體驗何謂「愉快學習」，並從中反思如何開創屬於自己的「快樂生活」。

節目簡介: 八位能演擅舞、靈巧敏捷的舞者， 與七個各具性格、趣緻搞鬼的機械人切磋舞藝，攜手建構出一幕幕超現實的人間風景，時而荒誕幽默，時而窩心動人，帶你走入真人與機器共存的未來世界。「舞蹈新丁」NAO 隨著節拍扭動身體，哪怕變成滾地葫蘆仍屢敗屢戰，與舞者合演的一段雙人舞更令人眼界大開！
About the Programme: Step into another dimension where humans and machines merge  Eight amazingly agile dancers take to the stage with seven lovable NAO robots, each with its own "personality". Together they take you into a surreal world where the absurd and humorous meet the poignant and heart-warming, and boundaries between humans and machines fall away. Watch how a robotic novice dancer "learns" to swing with the beat while an eye-opening human-machine partnership inspires an endearing pas de deux.  France's pioneering Blanca Li Dance Company spent three years creating this international hit, which also incorporates the mechanical orchestra of Japanese avant-garde group Maywa Denki. Serving as art installations as well as providing magical live accompaniment, the automated instruments add to the fluid choreography and dazzling projection to del iver a futurist ic extravaganza. A truly animated dance party that sets in motion the question of what it means to be alive!
Venue: Auditorium, Kwai Tsing Theatre
主辦單位: 康樂及文化事務署 - 藝術節辦事處

節目簡介: 「舞蹈日2016」將會是第七屆的舞蹈日。一如以往，「舞蹈日2016」將展示本地舞蹈界的全方位力量。資深及新進舞蹈家，將聯同專業及業餘舞團，以及活力澎湃的年青人，於元朗劇院演繹不同風格、多姿多采的舞蹈。這次的舞蹈日我們特別邀請到本地資深舞蹈家王廷琳擔任活動顧問。  「舞蹈日2016」將以舞蹈欣賞為主題，市民可欣賞資深及年輕舞者在台上精彩的舞蹈演出，而舞者透過舞蹈交流，互相欣賞。 同時，大會亦安排了工作坊、分享會及展覽等推廣活動，以及「舞得起！」自由舞台，讓市民一起舞動，享受舞蹈的樂趣。  精彩內容： 巡遊 (元朗潮僑英歌舞隊參與) 舞蹈匯演: 由十多個不同團體，包括本地專業舞團、地區舞團及舞蹈學生，輪流演出現代舞、芭蕾舞、中國舞、踢躂舞、爵士舞等，向觀眾推廣不同形式的舞蹈。 環境舞蹈: 於元朗大馬路休憩花園及元朗劇院竹林將上演不同風格的環境舞蹈，讓市民與舞者近距離接觸及互動。 工作坊: 由專業舞者及舞團設計不同形式的舞蹈工作坊，供不同年齡的市民免費參與，讓參加者享受跳舞的樂趣，藉此推廣舞蹈至社會各階層。 分享會: 舞蹈界知名人士包括劉兆銘、周佩韻及王榮祿，將分享其舞蹈生涯中的體驗和趣事，讓參加者對舞蹈有更多的了解。 「舞得起！」自由舞台:節目當日除了有不同的專業舞團及舞蹈家參與演出外，亦將開放劇院大堂特定表演區—「舞得起﹗」自由舞台，為公眾提供場地，表演不同類別的舞蹈，一展身手。 展覽 舞動一分鐘: 韓錦濤新編一段簡單的舞步，舞館Studiodanz舞者將在主舞台閉幕演出。歡迎瀏覽舞步示範，預早學習。
About the Programme: Dance your style!  Dance Day 2016 will be the 7th Dance Day since 2009. Similar to previous Dance Days, Dance Day 2016 will showcase different generations of local dance talents. Veteran and emerging dance artists as well as professional and amateur dance groups will join hands with young people to give a wide variety of delightful and exhilarating dance performances at Yuen Long Theatre. Renowned local choreographer/ dancer, Andy Wong is invited to be the Event Advisor for Dance Day.  Appreciation is the theme for Dance Day 2016. The public is able to appreciate the dance performances of veteran and young dancers on stage while dancers can share their ideas and thoughts with each other.   More than that, participatory activities such as workshops, sharing sessions and exhibition will be organized. There will also be the 'U Can Dance!' where everyone is welcome to join in and enjoy the fun of dancing.  Content: Parade (Joined by the Chiu Chow Yingge Dance Troupe of Yuen Long) Dance Showcase: More than 10 different groups, including professional local dance companies, district dance troupes and dance students, will take turns to perform modern dance, ballet, Chinese dance, tap dance, Jazz dance, etc. Environmental Dance: Environmental dances will be performed at the Yuen Long Main Road Rest Garden and the Bamboo Garden of the Yuen Long Theatre. Audiences can interact with the dancers closely. Workshops:Professional dance artists and companies will conduct free dance workshops for different age groups to encourage the public to enjoy dancing and promote dance art at community level. Sharing Sessions: Veteran dance artists including Lau Siu Ming, Pewan Chow and Ong Yong Lock will share their experiences and interesting things happened in their dance life, so participants can understand more about dance. 'U Can Dance!' Free Dancing Zone: Apart from the participation from various professional dance groups and dancers, an indoor free dancing zone 'U Can Dance!' will be designated to the public to perform all kinds of dance. Exhibition 1 Minute Flash Dance: Angela Hang has choreographed a dance made up of simple steps. Dancers from Studiodanz will perform the dance in the finale on the Main Stage. If you want to learn the dance movements, please watch the demo clip.
Venue: Yuen Long Theatre

節目簡介: 讓我們一起走進充滿精彩舞蹈、音樂和魔法的奇幻世界。戀人、精靈、淘氣搗蛋聯同月光在閃爍的舞步和孟德爾遜的名曲下，活潑生動地把莎士比亞的經典故事娓娓道來。 英國編舞家里安姆．史家列是國際舞台上最炙手可熱的編舞家之一。新西蘭設計師翠絲．格蘭特．羅得精心為莎士比亞家喻戶曉的角色和魔法森林創造了壯麗新視野，舞台由肯德爾．史密夫美不勝收的燈光設計照亮。無論你是大小朋友還是舞蹈愛好者，這場盛大的亞洲首演都會為你呈現最耀目亮麗的舞台魔力！  故事簡介 仙后蒂塔妮亞和仙王奧伯龍在一個月色高照的晚上因為森林內睡著的男孩起了爭執。蒂塔妮亞最後把小孩據為己有。奧伯龍怒火中燒，喚來學徒帕克，命他尋找魔法花。只要把魔法花汁塗在睡著的人眼蓋上，醒來便會愛上第一眼看見的生物。奧伯龍打算在蒂塔妮亞身上以此報復。 另一邊廂，四位探險者一同進入了森林，想要尋找奇異的樣本，錯綜複雜的多角愛情即將發生。海倫娜一心向著廸米特立斯，但這位男生卻迷戀荷蜜亞，一位已心繫雷山德的女生。看到這個情景，奧伯龍使喚帕克以愛情花解決問題，讓廸米特立斯回應海倫娜的愛慕。然而帕克把兩名男士攪亂了，把藥水擦在錯誤的人身上，令情況變得更加複雜。 蒂塔妮亞醒來，在愛情花的法力下愛上了被帕克變成驢子的工匠巴頓。奧伯龍偷偷監視這對戀人，為蒂塔妮亞的丟臉事暗喜，但她卻茫然不知。 奧伯龍得悉帕克在廸米特立斯和雷山德身上犯錯後怒不可遏，準備要懲罰帕克和撥亂反正，讓雷山德再次愛上荷蜜亞，廸米特立斯和海倫娜配成一雙。巴頓恢復人形。隨著這夜完結，蒂塔妮亞和奧伯龍也重修舊好，輕輕地把熟睡的男孩歸還到發現他的地方，讓他去做自己的仲夏夜之夢。
About the Programme: Be transported to a magical world of dazzling dance, music and enchantment. Lovers, fairies, mischief and moonlight conspire in Shakespeare’s classic tale, vividly retold with sparkling steps and Mendelssohn’s famous score.  British choreographer Liam Scarlett is one of the most sought-after choreographers on the international stage. New Zealand designer Tracy Grant Lord has created a glorious new vision of Shakespeare’s iconic characters and enchanted wood, illuminated with lighting by Kendall Smith. This is a spectacular Asia premiere – for young and old, lovers of dance, music and sheer theatrical magic.  The Story In a forest clearing, under a moonlit night sky, Titania and Oberon quarrel over a Changeling Boy found sleeping in the wood. Titania eventually takes possession of the infant. In his rage Oberon summons his apprentice Puck, and sends him to search for a magical flower. When sprinkled into the eyelids of a person sleeping, this magic flower causes the sleeper to fall in love with the first creature he or she sees upon awakening. Oberon plans to use this on Titania in revenge. Meanwhile, four explorers have entered the forest in search of the exotic specimens to be found there, and a complicated love triangle ensues. Helena pines for Demetrius, who is in turn infatuated with Hermia, who is happily coupled with Lysander. Upon seeing this, Oberon orders Puck to resolve this situation by using the magic flower to make Demetrius return Helena’s affections. However, Puck confuses the two men and administers the potion to the wrong one, causing even more trouble. Titania awakens under the flower’s spell to fall in love with the rustic Bottom, whom Puck has transformed into a donkey. Oberon spies on the couple, taking great pleasure in Titania’s humiliation, to which she is entirely oblivious. Upon realising Puck’s mistake with Demetrius and Lysander, Oberon is furious and sets about punishing Puck and resolving the mess, so that Lysander return to loving Hermia and Demetrius finds love with Helena. Bottom is restored to human form and, as the night draws to a close, Titania and Oberon resolve their differences and gently return the sleeping Changeling Boy to where they found him, and to his own midsummer night’s dreams.

節目簡介: 今人復古意 圓融兼貫通  古扇之美，身段之律，我表其一大特徵：圓融貫通。 我對這種圓融貫通的動作興趣盎然，很想通過研習它，來開啟我對古風古意的捕捉以及對東方動作的理解。 為此，流轉於中國戲曲摺扇的開、合、揮、轉、拋、遮、蕩、撲、抖、托、揉‥‥‥我想將動作透視在如此本質的細微之處，意在筆筆有出處，字字有依據，舞舞有章法。
About the Programme: Antiquity Revolves as Fan Opens The delicacy of fan and rhythm of posturing aroused my interest to discover the movement with the feature - smoothly coherent. I am captivated by such smooth-coherent movement and keen on studying on it, to unlock my discovery on antiquity, also orientalism understanding. Thus, such movement in Chinese Opera with fan, as folding, unfolding, waving, rotating, throwing, covering, swinging, fluttering, shaking, carrying and rowing...I hope to grasp the detailed essence from its origins, in pursuit of being well-founded in each movement.

節目名稱: 卡洛斯．阿哥斯達告別古典芭蕾之旅
節目簡介: 曾在事業上創下無數輝煌成就，世界最重要的芭蕾舞巨星之一，卡洛斯‧阿哥斯達將帶來他最後的古典芭蕾舞節目。由昔日在古巴寂寂無名到今日足跡遍及全球多個重要舞臺，卡洛斯‧阿哥斯達有著不可思議的事業發展。他曾擔演眾多經典芭蕾舞角色，包括《天鵝湖》的齊格飛王子、《唐．吉訶德》的巴塞勞及《胡桃夾子》的王子等。他亦曾與多個國際知名舞團合作，包括古巴國家芭蕾舞團、英國皇家芭蕾舞團、英國國家芭蕾舞團和侯斯頓芭蕾舞團；另曾出版過兩本小說和參與兩齣劇情片的演出。在其告別古典芭蕾之節目中，阿哥斯達將聯同多位古巴舞壇精英，攜手演繹多個他最喜愛的芭蕾舞劇選段。
About the Programme: After an unparalleled career as one of the world’s foremost ballet stars, Carlos Acosta presents his final classical ballet programme.  From humble beginnings in Cuba to performing on some of the world’s biggest stages, Carlos Acosta has had an incredible career. He has played many of ballet’s most iconic roles including Prince Siegfried in Swan Lake, Basilio in Don Quixote and The Prince in Nutcracker. He has worked with leading international ballet companies including National Ballet of Cuba, The Royal Ballet, English National Ballet and Houston Ballet, written two novels and appeared in two feature films.  For his final dancing classical works, he performs excerpts from his favourite ballet repertoire alongside an incredible cast of dancers from Cuba.

節目簡介: 作為梅裡美筆下「蛇蠍美人」的延伸，柏希斯透過其編舞的《我是卡門》反映女性真實的生活與情感，卡門不是「蛇蠍美人」，她只是尋常女人。柏希斯一直渴望借鑒其於人生旅途中積累的各種情感、身體，甚或創作歷程經驗，以第一身角度闡述關於女性的一切。柏希斯並以其作為佛蘭明高舞蹈家、編舞家、安達盧西亞人和西班牙人的多重身份，以及對「大同世界」的熱切追求，開展全新個人創作路。年屆五十的柏希斯，認為隨歲月流逝所積累的寶貴智慧與處理情感問題的豐富經驗，足以讓她能夠探討她所在的女性世界。她堅信在所有女性身上都可找到卡門的基因，而每位女性都正在編寫屬於她的「卡門傳奇」。
About the Programme: ‘The leading innovator of modern flamenco’ - New York Times  To transcend the myth of the ‘femme fatale’, sculpted by Prosper Mérimée, María Pagés choreographed I, Carmen to reflect the lives and feelings of real women. This new personal creative path taken by María Pagés is deeply rooted in her desire to talk about women, drawing on her own vital, emotional, physical, sentimental and creative life experiences as a woman – as a flamenco dancer, choreographer, Andalusian, Spaniard and passionate advocate of universality.  Now, at the age of 50, she feels that her emotional and intellectual achievements give her the distance she needs to talk about the female universe she is part of. Her conviction is that Carmen is in all women and that all women are Carmen.

節目簡介: 《狂人止步》是一個原創踢躂舞作品，配以全新的音樂。舞者以踢躂舞表達辦公室種種關係及權利的角力。辦公室成為弱肉強食之地，每個人都是瘋癲的狂人，凝視着五彩繽紛的慾望。權力的角力，不在乎場地。因為，我們都生存在江湖。

節目簡介: 2016年全新舞作《無用》，由藝術總監王榮祿及來自台灣的舞蹈家周書毅共舞。二人以舞為生，雖處於相異的年齡層，都真切面對自己身體舞蹈時的「有用」與「無用」，更察覺人被世界跌宕所改變著。在極端發展的社會中，我們都追趕著時代的變遷，人類演化得更複雜。「無用」是一場抗爭，一次空白，一些沉澱，一點希望，而我們的身體，還能如何走下去？
About the Programme: In a world of extreme development, lives sigh. What is the use of human bodies!?  Unlock Dancing Plaza will stage its new work Never-never Land, with a duet dance by Artistic Director Ong Yong Lock and Taiwanese dancer Chou Shu-yi, in May 2016. Irrespective of their age, Ong and Chou can genuinely feel the usefulness and uselessness in their bodies through their dance, and notice that people change along with the world’s ups and downs.  In a society of extreme development, we are all striving to keep up with the time while human evolution is becoming more complicated. ‘Usefulness’is a war of fight, a void of emptiness, some sedimentation and hopes. Faced with all these, how shall our body proceed?

Programme Name: Dance On Series "Dance, for No Reason"
節目簡介: 「時有舞跳，時有動哀，時有笑，時有哭。」  時間一分一秒流動着，絲毫不差。可是，對於一個人來說，十年的時間，頻率可以是不規則的。頭一兩年過得快，後兩三年過得慢，樽頸的那三年甚至可以用凝固來形容，直到十年過後，才發現時光有如閃電，一息間就流走了。  十年前，黃靜婷，許俊傑，郭曉靈三位還在香港演藝學院修讀舞蹈課程，當時楊惠美老師推薦三人參加第一屆在城市當代舞蹈團舞蹈中心舉辦的i-Dance舞蹈節，發表了第一個合編的創作《三人讀白》。《三人讀白》後來演變成一個長篇創作，也拍成了一個舞蹈錄像，他們的身體，把一道冰冷的鐵樓梯變成了火熱的布景。然後，香港、澳門、廣州、北京、東京、新加坡、馬來西亞、烏帕塔、華沙、紐約⋯⋯他們在不同的藝術節平台學習、觀摩、發表自己的創作。《植聽》、《曾經發生，一些相似的事情》、《獨唱》，還有大大小小的作品，邊走邊跳。  「跳舞，是為了甚麼？」三個人十年後再次聚在一起，問的正是這個問題。不過，我相信跳舞的提問不是由文字解決，最好由肢體表達。 「過去十年以來，你編舞的時候，最集中注意的是甚麼？」是三個人為《三拾以後》第一次排練的議題，其中一個人站在排練場地的中間獨舞半小時，另外兩人從旁觀察，再用身體做回應。他們的結論是，各自都有個人的風格，卻又無需要語言，都能找到彼此的共鳴。  現代舞由一開始已經有種破舊立新的精神，是循環不息的滾輪，循環不息的在立，在破，在立，在破。二零一五年十月一日，我們誤會了排練場的租期，最後到了曉靈的家裡閒談。「究竟我們跳的舞要往那個方向去？立過了些甚麼？要破些甚麼？」  而存在於破與立之間，時間一分一秒流動着，絲毫不差。

節目簡介: 生活在城市中的人，對「城市」和「身體」的直接聯想，應該就是二者在時間的軌道上都出現著「變舊」和「變老」的現象吧！雖然二者有著類近的宿命，但我們也未必需要消極面對。「城市」要從新舊交替中才能尋找到發展的道路，而「身體」也同樣需要良好的新陳代謝才能維持健康的生命；不論怎樣，都是為了形塑充滿能量的身體和城市。從生活中脫離自己的安全區，以挑戰的態度重新形塑自我吧！

節目名稱: 國際綜藝合家歡2016特備節目: 兒童舞蹈劇場《開心博士森林記》
Programme Name: International Arts Carnival 2016: Children's Dance Theatre Show  "Dr Happy to the Rescue"
節目簡介: 開心博士是個周身法寶的旅行家，到處為小朋友帶來無限歡樂。在一次探險旅程中，開心博士經過一個奇妙森林，發現大河馬波波被困在兩顆巨樹中間的夾縫，無法動彈……究竟接著會發生什麼事呢？

節目簡介: 「舞」可能第伍回， 兩位合共壹佰零壹歲的舞蹈藝術家， 馬才和及嚴明然伍拾歲後的人生告白……!  「舞」可能系列是馬才和及嚴明然透過舞蹈來探索及反映他們身處在不同時期對舞蹈的反思，繼而衍生的舞蹈作品。「舞」可能系列從一九九九年開始已進行了四個系列，當中包括：「舞」可能I （一九九九）、「舞」可能II―黑暗角落（二ＯＯＯ）、「舞」可能III―這是一個舞蹈表演！？（二ＯＯＯ）及「舞」可能IV―馬才和的舞蹈展覽一（二ＯＯ九）。  《「舞」可能伍：一Ｏ一》將於二Ｏ一六年四月推出。馬才和及嚴明然兩人已年過五十，二人年齡加起來剛好是一Ｏ一歲。為此，他們計劃回顧及整理其舞蹈生涯中的重要片段，並邀請多位在他們生命中曾經留下痕跡及影響的人物參與創作，當中包括來自不同媒界的藝術家及友人，他們將影响《「舞」可能伍：一Ｏ一》的產生，共同協助尋找「舞蹈」的可能性！  演出含裸露場面。
About the Programme: Dance “IN” Possible at its fifth episode. Dance artists Victor Choi-wo Ma and Mandy Ming-yin Yim, review their life in dance at the age of 50 + …!  Dance “IN” Possible series can be a reflection of the exploration and rethink towards dance by Victor, Choi-wo Ma and Mandy Ming-yin Yim who explore through dance in their various eras. Dance “IN” Possible series started in 1999 and four series have been staged, including Dance “IN” Possible I (1999), Dance “IN” Possible II – Dark Corner (2000), Dance “IN” Possible III – This is a Dance Performance!? (2000) and Dance “IN” Possible IV – Victor Ma’s Dance Exhibition I (2009).  The new production Dance “IN” Possible V :101 shall be staged in April 2016. Victor and Mandy are both over 50 years old (their ages add up to 101 years old). To this end, they hope to make retrospection for reviewing their dance career, and invited persons who have left a mark on their trails or affected them to collaborate in the creative work. The participants include artists and friends from various media; together with Victor and Mandy, they will jointly create the production and search for the possibility of 101 kinds of ‘dance’!  The programme contains nudity.

節目簡介: 走進視覺大師的繽紛世界　舞出米羅的奇妙星空 《米羅的奇妙星空》是一個匯聚鮮艷色彩、各式形狀和有趣遊戲的舞蹈劇場。演出靈感源自西班牙繪畫大師約安．米羅筆下以奇幻宇宙為主題的一系列色彩鮮艷的藝術作品。編舞家恩里克．卡布雷拉以舞團一貫充滿玩味創意的創作手法，利用優美的舞蹈、別出心裁的戲偶和精彩絕倫的數碼視覺效果將一幅幅色彩繽紛的畫作搬上舞台，描畫出舞團眼中的一片奇幻星空。
About the Programme: Immerse into the colourful dance spectacle inspired by the fantastical universe of Joan Mir? Constellations is a dance cocktail of vivid colours, shapes and games conceived after the imagery by the great Spanish artist, Joan Mir? Taking inspiration by a series of works in which Joan Mir?shows his wonder with the space, choreographer Enrique Cabrera fills his imaginary blank canvas with wonderful dance, ingenious puppetry and terrific digital visuals with the company's trademark playfulness, creativity and style.
Venue: Theatre, Ngau Chi Wan Civic Centre

節目簡介: 《長白山阿里郎》這部朝鮮民族歌舞以讚美人與自然、人與人之間的和諧為主題；曾於北京國慶六十周年獻禮上演出，並於二〇一〇年在上海世博會上演。  節目詳情 《長白山金達萊》（群舞） 《嗡嘿呀》（伽倻琴獨奏） 《緣》（雙人舞） 《豐年祭》（群舞） 《泉》（群舞） 《長白歌謠》（男民歌獨唱） 《歡聚一堂》（男民歌獨唱） 《長鼓舞》（群舞） 《美阿里》（群舞） 《書魂》（群舞） 《阿里郎》（女聲民謠獨唱） 《祝媽媽長壽》（二重唱） 《牙拍舞》（群舞） 《熱風》（長嗩呐獨奏） 《騰飛》（群舞）
About the Programme: Arirang of Mount Paetku emphasizes on appraising the human beings and the nature, as well as harmony amid mankind. The piece has been presented in the nation’s 60th anniversary as well as Expo 2010 in Shanghai. 節目名稱: 屯門文藝協進會舞蹈班結業典禮暨舞蹈表演
Programme Name: Performance by Tuen Mun Arts Promotion Association
節目簡介: 舞蹈班結業典禮暨舞蹈表演，由屯門舞蹈團團員及舞蹈學員聯合演出，由舞蹈名家劉佩雄任藝術總監。編導有劉樹芳、劉幗貞、屈美娟、古愛玲、鄺婉儀、張曉芸、何祖宜、李國安、徐麗芬、卓惠玲、陳綺妮等。節目多元化，包括民間民族舞、爵士舞、芭蕾舞、拉丁舞等，演出人數超過360人，場面熱鬧，配上華麗佈景，將會帶給各位觀眾美與勁的享受。
About the Programme: (Chinese Only)

節目簡介: 以意大利小說家卡爾維諾的《看不見的城巿》為起點，《城圍》探索城巿與城巿之間的真實與虛幻。  在全球化、都巿化和無情歲月的步步進迫之下，作為城巿的一份子，該如何守護自己的土地？而當一個人由一個城巿走到另一個城巿生活，又該如何自處？  妙思舞動藝術總監林偉源曾於不同城巿生活，多年來游走於不同藝術領域，他將以過來人身份訴說城巿的無限可能，接納抑或排斥？希望抑或絕望？  新銳編舞家兼舞者胡頌威以其中國舞的根底，向芭蕾舞世界進發，其獨特的藝術經歷造就出一齣又一齣個性風格強烈的作品，為他帶來香港藝術發展藝術新秀獎（舞蹈）的榮譽，  身兼兩職的他，將聯同另外六位來自倫敦、馬爾默、東京、上海及香港，各自擁有獨一無二舞蹈人生的優秀舞者，攜手衝破城巿中有形無形的框架，建構出可能根本不存在於這個世界的理想國度。
About the Programme: Taking the tale of Invisible Cities by Italo Calvino as its starting point, DiviNation explores the world we are living in, the effects of time and the uncertainty of humanity’s future. With globalization and urbanization cities play an increasingly important role in civil society. An international creative team was set up to explore the unlimited possibilities of cities, real and surreal. Allen Lam, Artistic Director of Muse Motion and Ricky Songwei Hu, an uprising Choreographer join forces with six other versatile dancers: Eryck Brahmania from London, UK; Paul Pui Wo Lee from Malmö, Sweden; Yo Takahira from Tokyo, Japan; Jingting Duan from Shanghai, China; as well as Irene Lo and Gigi Yang from Hong Kong to construct a highly contrasting yet coherent image of their utopia.
Venue: Theatre, Hong Kong City Hall
演出/製作: 編舞: 林偉源, 胡頌威 舞蹈員: Eryck Brahmania, 段婧婷．胡頌威, 李沛和, 勞曉昕, 高比良洋．楊怡孜 佈景設計: 阮漢威 燈光設計: 蕭健邦 服飾及形象概念: 朱瑞英 音響設計: 楊我華

節目名稱: 韓國十月文化節：《佛 ‧ 像》
節目簡介: 《佛‧像》靈感源於佛像複製品及其文化衝突，表達了「『佛像』展示的不是佛臉孔，而是我們自己」這種矛盾的思想《佛‧像》同時暗示凡人皆有「佛相」及對眾生的「憐憫」。 創新編舞、現場音樂及韓國著名當代藝術家崔正和的藝術裝置，集合不同元素創造出全新的舞台語言。 《佛‧像》橫跨傳統與現代、匯貫中西、雅俗共賞，提出了一個發人深省的問題：世界如何看待神聖與世俗？與觀眾共同探討如何在生活的瑣碎、無常和多姿多采中找到神聖、與現今多元文化現象取得共嗚
About the Programme: This work, inspired by the pastiche of buddha copies and the cultural clash, gives the paradoxical insight that the buddha figure ‘bulsang’ is not the face of God but our own faces in this world. Here the title simultaneously implies the life of secular people as the buddha figure ‘bulsang’ literally and as the poor ‘bulssang’.  While the choreography creates new movement vocabulary through disheveling the boundaries of dance and culture, and integrating disparate elements, the pop-art sensibility of installation artist Choi Jeong Hwa and DJ’s live music create a playful stage by experimenting improvisation.  crosses over the boundaries of the traditional and the modern, the East and the West, the refined and the vulgar. It casts a question how the world view of the divine and the vulgar being one, which finds the sacred in the trifling, unstably changing and vibrant life itself, resonates with today’s hybrid cultural phenomena and approaches with validity in today’s life.
Venue: Auditorium, New Wing, Ko Shan Theatre
主辦單位: 大韓民國駐香港總領事館, 韓國國家當代舞蹈團

節目名稱: i-舞蹈節（香港）2016: 閉幕活動《舞在天空下》
Programme Name: i-Dance (HK) 2016: Closing Activity "Dance Under The Sky"
節目簡介: 舞蹈，音樂及不同媒體藝術家共聚於新界鄉間田野，集體創作一觸即發！在天空下即興，當下產生的視、聽、動感，將平日麻木的感官習慣一掃而空。觀眾與演出者於演出後一同享用餐宴，以色、香、味完成豐富的一天。 當天活動包括：樂活導賞團、舞蹈及音樂演出、工作坊、餐宴及錄像播放…
About the Programme: Artists in dance, music and other media gather in the New Territories, sparking off collective creativity in an improvisation performance in the open air. The sight, sound and movements generated in the here-and-now freshen up our numbed senses. After the performance, audience and performers join in a dinner of organic food to complete a fulfilling day. Activities on the day: Lifestyles of Health and Sustainability (LOHAS) tour guide, dance and music performance, workshop, dinner and video screening …

節目名稱: i-舞蹈節（香港）2016: 《90後的黎海寧》
節目簡介: i-舞蹈節(香港) 2016 今年找來殿堂級編舞家黎海寧，重新審視她自 90 年代以後的作品，如:《女書》、《Plaza X 與異變街道》、《隱形城市》及《創世記》等經典創作，選取當中的精彩片段，並找來一眾舞界翹楚，一起將經典創作再度重現觀眾眼前。90後的黎海寧，是 90 後的觀眾必看，90前的你又怎能抗拒？
About the Programme: Maestro choreographer Helen LAI looks back on her works from the 90’s onwards at i-Dance Festival 2016. Excerpts from her now-classic works, includingHerStory, Plaza X, Invisible Cities and In the Beginning…etc, will be performed by renowned dance artists. The works of Helen Lai in the post-90’s are must-watch for those born post-90’s, and are simply irresistible for anyone born pre-90’s.
Venue: Black Box Theatre, Kwai Tsing Theatre

venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Black Box Theatre

節目名稱: i-舞蹈節（香港）2016:《 i-舞蹈創作平台3及4》
節目簡介: i-舞蹈節今年特設的i-舞蹈創作平台，透過邀請多位海外與本地舞蹈及新媒體藝術家，共同探索舞蹈與科技的可能性。兩個晚上，四個全新舞蹈作品，多位來自不同訓練及文化背景的編舞及媒體藝術家，將透過舞蹈與科技的結合來尋找新的舞蹈語言，訴說當下的存在。  節目三 MORPHING OF PHI PhiΦ 是希臘文第廿一個字母，一個約值1.618 的特別數字。PhiΦ 亦經常應用於藝術、數學及科學的「黃金分割率」。 《Morphing of Phi》是根據黃金分割率來展現舞蹈與科技的結合，反映對美學一絲不苟的追求與迷思，並以此為創作的基本論述，在創作語彙當中傳達出另一種視覺創作概念的可能。  節目四 舞蹈診症室 舞蹈醫生徐家輝設計的人工智能編舞機原型，將於演出首次亮相。是次講座示範以「舞蹈診症室」為概念，尋找當代舞編創問題的病徵。
About the Programme: A number of local and overseas dance and new media artists will come together in “i-Dance Lab”, a new i-Dance Festival initiative, to explore the performance potential when dance and new media collide. On two evenings, in four newly created works, dance and new media artists of diversified training background tell their stories of existence in a new dance language.  PROGRAMME 3 MORPHING OF PHI Phi Φ is the 21st letter of the Greek alphabet, a special number approximately equal to 1.618. It is also known as the Golden Section which is always applied in art, math and science. Morphing of Phi is a combination of dance and technology, an addiction to and struggle about aesthetics from the choreography of Phi.   PROGRAMME 4 DANCE CLINIC MOBILE Introducing the first prototype of Artificial Intelligent Machine for choreographic processes designed by dance doctor Choy Ka Fai. This Lecture Demonstration proposed the concept of a dance clinic to explore the choreographic symptoms of contemporary dance.
Venue: Black Box Theatre, Kwai Tsing Theatre
演出/製作: 藝術統籌: 馬才和 監製: 嚴明然 節目三《MORPHING OF PHI》 編舞: 郭曉靈 演出: 郭曉靈 視覺藝術及程式設計: 關繼延, 黃冠彪 聯合策劃及研究: XPLOR 技術支援: Hong Kong Institute of Vocational Education   節目四《舞蹈診症室》 舞蹈醫生: 徐家輝(新加坡) 演出: 唐偉津（綠美）
Cast and Production: Artistic Director: Victor, Choi-wo MA Producer: Mandy,Ming-yin YIM PROGRAMME 3-MORPHING OF PHI Choreographer: Elaine KWOK Performer: Elaine KWOK Visual & Programming Design: KWAN Kai Yin, Kwankai, Ale
venue_en: Kwai Tsing Theatre, Black Box Theatre

節目名稱: i-舞蹈節（香港）2016:《 i-舞蹈創作平台1及2》
節目簡介: i-舞蹈節今年特設的i-舞蹈創作平台，透過邀請多位海外與本地舞蹈及新媒體藝術家，共同探索舞蹈與科技的可能性。兩個晚上，四個全新舞蹈作品，多位來自不同訓練及文化背景的編舞及媒體藝術家，將透過舞蹈與科技的結合來尋找新的舞蹈語言，訴說當下的存在。  節目一 看．不見（城市） 城市、記憶、欲望、符號、名字、死亡、天空…… 從卡爾維諾的《看不見的城市》出發，看見與看不見的城牆與隙縫之間，肉身遊走虛擬的城市，以電腦程式語言書寫馬可孛羅的遊記。  節目二 浮光掠影 光影與舞蹈似乎是很理所當然的配合，科技的發展可以把可能性推向更廣更闊。但，我們的創作希望找回原來的美學與樂趣。
About the Programme: A number of local and overseas dance and new media artists will come together in “i-Dance Lab”, a new i-Dance Festival initiative, to explore the performance potential when dance and new media collide. On two evenings, in four newly created works, dance and new media artists of diversified training background tell their stories of existence in a new dance language.  PROGRAMME 1 IN.VISIBLE (CITIES) City, memory, desire, symbols, names, death, sky…..departing from Italo Calvino’s Invisible Cities, between the visible and invisible walls and gaps, the body saunters the virtual cities and writes Marco Polo’s travel journal with programming language.  PROGRAMME 2 ENLIGHTEN Light and shadows have been regarded the natural partners of dance. Technological advancement triggers more possibilities than ever. Yet, in this new work of ours, we are looking to retrieve the beauty and joy we had before.
Venue: Black Box Theatre, Kwai Tsing Theatre

節目名稱: i-舞蹈節（香港）2016: 《緣舞場66 - 研．演．現》
節目簡介: i-舞蹈節(香港) 2016中的舞蹈、多媒體與即興研習週，匯集不同地區的藝術家，透過為期數天的交流研習活動，藝術家一同進行主題探索、即興、工作坊及討論，發掘感官、身體、動作、個體與群體之間的關係。在研習的過程中，參與藝術家透過參與不同藝術領域的創作而互相啟發，提升參與者的藝術視野。整個研習週過程同時有文字、相片及錄像紀錄，進行保存，紀錄日後將供予有需要人士翻閱。 研習週公開予藝術家親身上場參與，有興趣人士需預先登記，報名請直接與「多空間」職員聯絡。公眾則可透過 i-舞蹈節(香港) 2016 及「多空間」臉書專頁，觀賞即時報導，參與整個研習過程，並可於網上即時留言回應，每天的研習設半小時總結演出，觀眾可透過網上直播免費欣賞。 研習週最後一天為《緣舞場66—研．演．現》之即興展演，演出將是參與者共處一週的一次互動創作及分享。
About the Programme: Through days of exchange and research in Dance, Multi-media & Improvisation Research Week of i-Dance(HK)2016, artists from all over the world explore the relationships between movements, own senses, and individuals while participating in exploration, improvisation, workshops and discussions. Participants engaged in different art forms will broaden their horizons of arts and inspire each other. The Research Week will be documented in text, photos and videos as well as archived as research materials.  The Research Week is open to professional artists for participation. Interested parties please contact Y-Space to register. The public can be part of the Research Week through real-time online broadcast on i-Dance(HK)2016 and Y-Space Facebook pages. Instant comments are most welcome! There will be a daily research presentation during the final half hour of the day and it will also be viewable live online.  Improvisation Land 66 – RE … closes the Research Week with a performance, the last chance for all participants to interact and communicate.
Venue: Black Box Theatre, Kwai Tsing Theatre
演出/製作: 藝術統籌: 馬才和 監製: 嚴明然 舞蹈: Chankethya CHEY(柬埔寨), Lindsey Renee DERRY(美國), 鹿島聖子(日本), 勝部知子(日本), KIM Bong Ho(南韓), 古名伸(台灣), 馬才和(台灣), 黎美光(台灣), 李德 (香港), 林茹鴻(台灣), 梅卓燕, 唐偉津 (綠美), 文慧(中國), 楊浩, 嚴明然 音樂: 文律元(中國), 葉破 文字

節目名稱: i-舞蹈節（香港）2016: 《傳統當代對對碰》及《緣舞場65》
節目簡介: 海外、内地及本土舞蹈藝術家這晚帶你一次過體驗中國、法國、老撾及本地的傳統與當代的舞蹈。三位獨舞者的獨特訓練背景，將為你呈獻三段獨一無二的精彩舞蹈風景，同場還有《緣舞場65》，海外與本地藝術精英共冶一爐，難以筆墨形容，只演一場，錯過了別說遺憾！  《見習舞者》 電流注入舞者的神經，引發另一種感知。日復日的操練卻帶來困惑和迷失，舞者更要面對內裡的怪物 …  《圓》 《圓》是老撾／法國編舞及舞者 Olé Khamchanla 的實驗作品。Olé 的舞蹈旅程，揉合了街舞、巴西戰舞、當代舞、舞踏、傳統老撾和泰國舞蹈，令 Olé 思考他的舞蹈本質是甚麼；更結合都市舞蹈（urban dance）和傳統舞蹈中不斷改變和凝定的身體姿勢，發展出其獨特的舞蹈語言。  DIDI & GOGO Didi 和 Gogo 在等待 didigogo，Didi 對 Gogo 說 didi，Gogo 對 Didi 說 gogo，然後，Didi 和 Gogo 還在等待 didigogo。  《緣舞場65》
About the Programme: Local, Mainland and overseas dance artists present to you an evening of traditional and contemporary dance of China, France, Laos and Hong Kong. Three soloists of distinct training background share the stage with three unique pieces of dance. Also showing on this evening is Improvisation Land 65. The powerful collaboration of the performing international artists is going to be beyond description, and is strictly one evening only!  DANCE INTERNSHIP An electric current is injected into the dancer’s nerves, initiating a new and unfamiliar perspective on harmony, logic, patterns, rhythm, time and space. After this unusual catalyst, the day-to-day routine soon confuses the dancer. Worse, the dancer now has to face inner demons, who eagerly wait for a chance to integrate within the dancer.  CIRCLE CIRCLE is an experimental work of the Lao-French dancer and choreographer Olé Khamchanla. Drawing on its journey woven by the hip-hop, capoeira, contemporary, Butho and traditional Laos and Thailand classical dances, Olé questioned the essence of his dance, creating a singular vocabulary fed by urban dance and the ever changing and frozen postures of ancestral dances.  DIDI & GOGO While waiting for didigogo, Didi said “didi” to Gogo and Gogo said “gogo” to Didi. And then, Didi and Gogo continued their wait for didigogo.  IMPROVISATION LAND 65
Venue: Black Box Theatre, Kwai Tsing Theatre

節目名稱: i-舞蹈節（香港）2016: 《同志「愛」之夜》及《緣舞場64》
節目簡介: 「基」不可失！ 愛無分彼此，無分男女，無分國界，莎士比亞逝世四百年，假如羅密歐重生，他會否對愛有不同的演繹？集合海外與本地愛跳舞的他與他，與你一同擦出「愛」火花。只演一場，「基」不可失！  《羅密歐的天地》 「你將成為我的賤婦。」他看着我雙眼，嘴角輕揚，帶着濃重口音對我說：「你聽懂了沒有？你將成為我的賤婦。」 來自新加坡的 Daniel KOK 他在 planetromeo.com 網站，在六十天內約會了四十次，每次當他遇上一個人，他便會請他因應他們的關係送 Daniel 一份禮物。然後 Daniel 邀請他的基羅密歐們到劇院，觀賞他以舞蹈作為回禮。一份份禮物因此轉化成創作，演出由此誕生。如果觀眾來劇院看 Daniel 演出之前，大家已建立了親密的關係，那又會如何？誠邀你來見證或一起建立這個關係！
About the Programme: Don’t miss that one-and-only gay evening!  Love transcends gender and national delineation. Shakespeare passed away 400 years ago. If Romeo is born today, would he look at love differently? The he and he who come together for his love for dance is looking forward to light love up in your presence. An one-and-only gay evening that is not to be missed!  "PLANET ROMEO" Through the online portal, planetromeo.com, I went on 40 dates in 60 days. During the encounters, I ask each one for a gift in response to our relationship. In exchange, I invite my gay romeos back to the performance where I return my gift in the form of a dance. “You are going to be my bitch.” Looking me in the eyes, he smiled lightly and said in a thick accent, “You understand? You are going to be my bitch.”
Venue: Black Box Theatre, Kwai Tsing Theatre
演出/製作: 藝術統籌: 馬才和 監製: 嚴明然 《羅密歐的天地》 概念: Daniel KOK 編舞: Daniel KOK 演出: Daniel KOK 戲劇指導: Jorge GONÇALVES 製作及舞台經理: YAP Seok Hui   《緣舞場64》 舞蹈: Daniel KOK(新加坡), 余載恩(香港/澳洲), 楊春江 (香港) 音樂: 黑鬼, 梁卓堃, 葉破 新媒體: 馮炳輝

節目名稱: i-舞蹈節（香港）2016: 《當代泰式宮廷夜》
節目簡介: 節目由國際著名舞蹈藝術家 Pichet Klunchun 主理。Pichet 曾獲獎無數，更曾獲邀到世界各大小舞蹈節演出。是台節目包括 Pichet 的獨舞《 》，及由他導演及編排的結構即興《咪走雞》。《 》及《咪走雞》均只演一場，座位有限，正野當然咪走雞啦！  《 》 Pichet Klunchun 的最新作品是《 》。Pichet 說：「我不知道如何為這獨舞命名。但這不等於它沒有名字。我只是找不到適合的。」如果你想知道《 》是甚麼，你必須親自來看。 《咪走雞》 《咪走雞》是一台新舞蹈作品，舞者需要回應由著名 ranad ek（低音木琴）演奏者 Boonyoung Katkong 演奏的 Kraw Nai Tang Tawada。一般來說，Kraw Nai Tang Tawada 是由低音木琴獨奏的樂曲。《咪走雞》由 Pichet Klunchun 主理，i-舞蹈節特別邀來本地一眾年青舞者，對 Kraw Nai Tang Tawada 這首經典音樂作出即時的回應，在這瞬間，當舞者以其獨有方式回應音樂的強大能量時，卻產生出一個永恆的「當下」。
About the Programme: The performance is conceived and organised by the internationally-acclaimed dance artist Pichet Klunchun. Pichet has won many awards and has performed in dance festivals around the world. The evening’s programme will include his solo piece “ ”, followed by Tam Kai (Hunting the Chicken), an structured-improvisation directed by Pichet. There will only be one concert with limited seating for “ ” and Tam Kai. Make sure you don’t miss it!  《 》 Pichet Klunchun’s latest work “ ” as he said “It is the solo piece that I do not know how to name it. It doesn’t mean that it has no name. I just cannot find proper name for it.” So do come and watch “ ” if you want to find out more about “ ”……  "HUNTING THE CHICKEN" Tam Kai (Hunting the Chicken) is a new dance performance that asks dancers to respond to the virtuoso Kraw Nai Tang Tawada piece played by the renowned ranad ek (alto xylophone) master, Boonyoung Katkong. Kraw Nai Tang Tawada is typically done as a solo ranad ek performance, allowing a master to show his skill, experience, intelligence, and creativity. Here, the music serves to challenge participants, demanding their creative responses to the music’s powerful and fast-paced rhythms. The movements spontaneously reflect both an ephemeral and an eternal “present” that arises from each of use as each of participant directly respond to the mighty musical energy in a unique way.
Venue: Black Box Theatre, Kwai Tsing Theatre

節目名稱: i-舞蹈節（香港）2016:《 紅》- 紀錄劇場
節目簡介: 從革命樣板戲到今天的《紅》，文化大革命已過去五十年，樣板戲，樣板美學之於我們的身體和記憶留下什麽？文革五十週年又與香港有何關係？《紅》是生活舞蹈工作室的最新作品，其靈感和思考起點來自於革命樣板戲。生活舞蹈工作室的創建人、編舞、和舞者文慧，正是伴隨著八個樣板戲成長的那一代人，對文革時期的文藝作品懷有複雜的情感與體驗，決定以紀錄劇場的方式重訪這些革命樣板戲。
About the Programme: Red, the latest work by the Beijing-based “Living Dance Studio”, is a documentary performance that finds its inspiration and point of departure in the revolutionary model theatrical works. Turning the artistic and critical attention to the imagery of the heroic, gun-wielding ballerinas balancing on their toes, the Living Dance Studio uses a variety of documentary materials – publications and visual materials about the original revolutionary model ballet, footage of recently conducted interviews, biographical and personal stories of the revolutionary ballet dancers, etc. – to engage with the performers’ bodies on stage.
Venue: Auditorium, Kwai Tsing Theatre

節目名稱: i-舞蹈節（香港）2016: 節前節目《尋找消失的海岸綫–原來港島西》
Programme Name: i-Dance (HK) 2016: Pre-Festival Event "Retracung Hong Kong's vanished coastline  -Hong Kong West Side Story"
節目簡介: 探索生活空間的表演及創作可能性，將演出空間帶離傳統劇場。演出遊走於室內和室外的街道、球場、梯間及街角等公共空間。作品以環境舞蹈、環境即興或舞蹈事件（Dance Happening）形式進行。 每當變幻時，便知時光去…… 隨著時代轉變，今天的港島區海岸綫與 1841 年相比，已面目全非。從早年的礁石沙灘，到建立維多利亞城；從確立四環九約，到發展成今天繁華的港島區。  「四圍跳」這回將帶領觀衆游走於西環及堅尼地城，沿著電車軌尋找港島西失落了的文化及歷史痕跡。我們邀請多位年青編舞，於港島西選取不同的地點，進行實地考察，並因應環境特色創作一系列的環境舞蹈，觀眾會被帶離傳統劇院，跟隨著編舞的步伐，游走在不同的空間及角落，傾聽導賞員柏齊訴説港島西的大小故事，在消失中的建築環境及空間窺探傳統及歷史遺留下來的痕跡，尋找香港失去的集體回憶。
About the Programme: “Changes testify the passage of time…” As time progresses, today’s Hong Kong Island coastline doesn’t look anything like what it used to be in 1841. Hong Kong has come a long way from being a rocky beach to be named the City of Victoria. The City first saw its urbanized prosperity through the four “Wans” – Sai Wan, Sheung Wan, Central and Wan Chai (formerly Ha Wan). What remain are the 100-year old tram tracks that remind us of our history, our roots.  “Dancing All Around” invites the audiences to saunter Sai Wan and Kennedy Town, move along the tram tracks in search of hidden cultural and historical traces in the West of Hong Kong Island. A group of young choreographers have identified locations along this route for their site-specific dance creation. Following the choreographers, the audiences will get a glimpse of the cultural and historical traces in the various performance sites, appealing to your attention to what are now lost: the coastline, and our shared memories.
Venue: Multiple locations at the Hong Kong Island

節目簡介: 《Good Show》乃CCDC舞蹈中心為學員提供的舞蹈實踐演出平台。以參與《Good Show 2016》演出為訓練的排演班，為不同程度的舞蹈愛好者提供各種舞蹈的表演訓練，包括：現代舞、爵士舞、芭蕾舞、中國舞等。所有參加的學員均會接受專業舞蹈技巧及表演訓練，並與我們一班高水準及經驗豐富的舞蹈導師共同分享舞蹈的愉悅。學員最後將於2016年12月17日或18日在沙田大會堂演奏廳舉行的《Good Show 2016》內演出。
About the Programme: Good Show is a platform provided by CCDC Dance Centre for student to showcase their passion for dance in public performances. Our Repertoires are especially designed for students who would like to join Good Show 2016. A variety of dance classes are offered to participants with different interests and levels. With the professional techniques and performing skills training received, participants can bear fruit on stage with our high quality and experienced teachers. Fruitages will be shared at Good Show 2016 which will be held at the Auditorium, Sha Tin Town Hall on 17.12.2016 or 18.12.2016.
Venue: Auditorium, Sha Tin Town Hall

節目簡介: 香港舞蹈年獎「最值得表揚編舞」星級組合 龐智筠X阮日廣 CCDC全新配搭，兩位香港舞蹈年獎「最值得表揚編舞」得主：香港土生土長的龐智筠及來自越南的阮日廣，一邊同場較技；一邊惺惺相惜，娓娓道來越男港女的堅．心事：介乎而立與不惑之年，從少男少女轉變為輕熟男女，感悟生命的必然與偶然，與男女老少一起嘗歷情感跌宕，五味紛陳。光陰流轉，原來人生就像氹氹轉，縱萬物更替，唯初衷不變。  一個晚上，兩個作品。 品嚐日常中的況味，觀照自身； 細看穹蒼間的萬有，珍惜當下。  龐智筠｜客廳 回憶幕幕掀起，觸手可及。 龐智筠與孔德瑄、劉詩豪、夏恩蓓聯手打造〈客廳〉，以真實經歷沉澱而成，龐氏掏心掏肺真誠之作。 那個最熟悉的客廳，滿載著一天一滴的生活痕跡，平凡卻踏實。多美好都有完結的一天，重新踏進客廳，一句「我回來了！」，你等待的，是誰的回應？ 得有時、失有時，如果萬物真有時，你我重逢將會在何時？  阮日廣｜回初 天地之初，一片虛無。混沌之中，大地之母蓋亞翩然而生，是世界之始。天空、海洋、山脈都因祂而生，作為生命之源，孕育眾神。 阮日廣繼《動靜》之〈感〉後，再次展現恢宏之思，解構宇宙穹蒼與人類的關係，重新反思人類生於地球卻不斷糟蹋自己根源的徵結。首度夥拍著名服裝設計黃志強及錄像設計盧榮，強勢打造嶄新舞蹈體驗。
About the Programme: A new performance crafted by Noel Pong and Ngoc Nguyen Anh – both Hong Kong Dance Award winners for “Outstanding Choreography” In the transition from 30 to 40, young men and women become mature and review the certainties and possibilities of their lives, experiencing the ups and downs of emotion with mixed feelings. Time flies and life is like merry-go-round – everything changes and only original aspirations remain. This award-winning partnership – Noel Pong is from Hong Kong; Ngoc Nguyen Anh hails from Vietnam – will surely delight, forging forge ability and aesthetic. This is a chance to see their choreographic best, exclusively on the same stage, appreciating each other. She Says, He Talks brings surprise and intrigue to contemporary dance. Unmissable for dance fans.  Two exciting new works in one evening. Experience a range of emotions from real life, and how they impact on us. Open your eyes to everything in the universe. Cherish every moment.  Noel Pong｜Leaving & Living The memories lingering within these walls seem so near. Leaving & Living, choreographed by Noel Pong with designer team Charfi Hung, Low Shee Hoe and Ha Yan-pui, is a sincere reflection of Pong’s personal life, recalling the experience of losing a loved one. An ordinary living room contains a plethora of memories. When a loved one has departed, how does it feel to cross its threshold? What emotions do we feel? Sometimes you win, sometimes you lose. If we are predestined to walk this path in life, when shall we be reunited?  Anh Ngoc NGUYEN｜Mother, I am Sorry In the beginning, there was no form but void. The Mother of Earth, Gaia, was born in chaos. As the source of life, she gave birth to the sky, the sea, the mountains and the gods. After Sense from In-Between, Anh Ngoc Nguyen continues to explore the universe and humanistic concerns through dance, rethinking their relationships and asking questions about our propensity to ruin our habitat. Nguyen partners designer Edmond Wong and video artist Wing Lo for the first time to create a brand new dance experience.
Venue: Auditorium, Kwai Tsing Theatre

節目簡介: 大石頭突然爆開，孫悟空出世啦！ 有金睛火眼，識得七十二變，輕輕打個觔斗，就有十萬八千里遠，分分鐘飛到你身邊！ 同猴子猴孫由地府玩到天庭，遇上玉皇大帝王梓軒都無有怕，就怕觀音大使河國榮？ 弊弊弊，都係收心養性，同唐三藏、豬八戒、沙僧往西天取經，打走妖魔鬼怪，正經事要緊！ 氣象萬千的《西遊記》，要讓大人小朋友開心的大笑、緊張得大叫。原來現代舞可以歡樂有趣，百看不厭！ 《西遊記》故事耳熟能詳，眾所周知天神和妖精法力高強，但舞功超凡的神妖們你又看過沒有？  孫悟空這「魔王」降世後即大鬧天宮，慘令玉皇大帝與皇母娘娘等神仙哀號連連，卒之被壓在五指山下；好色豬八戒想娶妻，強搶高家千金；沙和尚於流沙河興風作浪，更與豬八戒大打出手，且看唐三藏如何收服這三個頑劣的徒弟再踏上取經之路！除了一眾天神和這四師徒，更有一群精靈佻皮的花果山小猴子，配上豐富舞台場景，必定為你帶來目不暇給又充滿歡樂的演出。
About the Programme: Family Entertainment Contemporary Dance Theatre Journey to the West is a well-loved story full of powerful spirits and magical deities. But have you seen them dance?  Monkey wreaks havoc in the Heavenly Palace and ends up trapped under the Five Finger Mountain. Pigsy wants a beautiful wife and tries to steal the daughter of the Gao family. Sandy terrorises the Flowing Sands River and fights with Pigsy. How will Tripitaka manage his unruly disciples on his journey to seek Buddhist scriptures?  Join Tripitaka, Monkey, Pigsy, Sandy and the little monkeys from Flower Fruit Mountain on this raucous adventure as they fight demons and deities. Don’t miss this joyous dance spectacle celebrating the Year of the Monkey.
Venue: Auditorium, Sha Tin Town Hall

節目簡介: 真實存在於哪邊? 請選擇下列正確的答案  A.真實存在於光明的地方 B.真實存在於黑暗的地方 正確答案:____________  真實存在於哪一邊? 每天都面對氾濫的社會問題，種種揭秘、抨擊、爭執、打鬥，有如大光燈把問題聚焦於眼前。但把燈光聚焦就可以更加看清問題的真相？你掌握到燈制開關的權利嗎？如果下一秒你會變成被燈光聚焦的本體，那麼當初你該如何處理手中的開關制？ 從前年《動藝》主辦作品《煙霧瀰漫》開始，至去年中文大學主辦雨傘運動展覽《928祝生日..》，三位編舞呂沅蔚、程偉彬及李朗軒一直緊密合作，透過舞蹈及戲劇性元素，探討切身的社會問題。《你開丨關了燈?》將延伸主題並解構黑與白，正與反，光與暗的關係。
About the Programme: (Chinese Only)

節目簡介: 曾有很多輝煌燦爛的城，如夜空中的煙花，在最璀璨的瞬間轉冷成灰，城中那些相愛的人們都已飄零四散。 這不是我們的故事，我們的城市有更堅固的鋼筋水泥和更熱鬧的車水馬龍。人們有囂張的野心，也習慣禮貌的疏離。 但也許這就是我們的故事。煙花還在綻放，狂歡的人群腳下已是一地淒涼。 別對他們說，這不是同一個城。   繼《那一年‧這一天》後，CCDC駐團編舞桑吉加再度夥拍實驗音樂家李勁松，創作全新節目《煙花‧冷》，以強烈的動感，能量澎湃的舞蹈，訴說「我城」的故事。
About the Programme: Fireworks dazzle and amaze – yet they are ephemeral. As they burn they vanish and the world becomes silent again. A firework’s explosion doesn’t elicit warmth; instead, there is desolation once the spectacle ends. Perhaps life is like a firework? For nothing lasts.  CCDC Resident Choreographer Sang Jijia explores fireworks as a metaphor, questioning the human experience and the inevitable changes we face in life. Our struggle for survival opens us to pain and anguish, love and suffering, to risks and the urge to protect – to life and death. Now middle-aged, Sang never stands still to aspire a novelty of his choreographic language, exploring warmth and affection – a shift evident in this new work for CCDC, in which we unearth and recognise tenderness in our hearts.
Venue: Auditorium, Kwai Tsing Theatre

節目簡介: 被南華早報譽為「最具潛質編舞新星」的黃狄文認為人生像一幅幅獨特的拼圖，每個人都是一零星碎片。當千塊碎片交織在不同時空拼湊出無限組合，形態或色調的反覆無常或會摸不著頭腦，但變化萬千的構圖，呈現出來的故事交錯令人百感交集。其新作《拼途》擺脫以往編舞框架，將舞者化成流動雕塑，並夥拍鬼才設計師阮漢威，一同探索人與人之間的交往，分享對生活的細膩觀察。*2016/04/02 上午十一時於CCDC舞蹈中心賽馬會舞蹈小劇場，設有公開綵排免費場。
About the Programme: Memory is incomplete. A puzzle. Every experience, every treasured relationship, they’re pieces. And throughout our lives, we search for missing pieces – in ourselves, in those we love, in nowhere. Maybe we’re lucky – maybe we recover these pieces. But there is still a long way to go, a long journey until we complete our own puzzle.  In Little Pieces, celebrated choreographer Dominic Wong with his creation team, stage designer Yuen Hon-wai and lighting designer Low See Hoe, explore possibilities – in costume, stage design, lighting, choreography – guiding the audience, encouraging them to complete their own puzzle. A open Rehearsal is held on April 02, 2016
Venue: Studio Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
主辦單位: 城市當代舞蹈團有限公司

節目簡介: CCDC精心打造「舞人習作」系列，呈現CCDC舞者獨當一面的澎湃創作力，為舞壇帶來新氣象。新年伊始，《舞人習作2016》將帶來七位舞者的清新小品，撥動我城獨有節奏，煥發生機。   李家祺 Lee Ka-ki 從陌生到認識，然後熟悉，是人是物也是地。物轉星移、位置轉換、環境改變，只為尋找一刻安舒。《囚人》、《空間之間》編舞李家祺繼續遨翔於想像的空間，於新作中觸動都市人的敏感地，試圖在不協調的相處中找出和諧的契機。  麥卓鴻 Kelvin Mak 曾被《南華早報》點名讚評，舞技矚目的麥卓鴻首次編舞，決定回歸原始，找尋屬於自己的存在意義。每個人都希望找到一片安身立命之所，敢於踏上重新發掘的旅程，才能真正擁抱人生。  譚渼樺 Malvina Tam 籠裡出生的鳥認為飛是一種病，那人類生活在繁華都市中，寧靜也許就是一種不安的存在？曾旅居外地的譚渼樺親自演繹都市人活在資訊爆炸中的適應與生存，重新感知現世。  曾景輝 Terry Tsang 戲遊人生，由被凝視的那刻開始。肉慾戲譃之間，妳尤如缸中之物，嬉弄與真實，誰主宰著誰？曾景輝繼《忍耐》、《異域》、《聲．引力》後，激蕩內心深處迴響，又一突破力作！
About the Programme: As one of Hong Kong’s most creative dance ensembles, CCDC has brought refreshing new voices to audiences through Dancers’ Homework, a showcase for CCDC dancers’ choreographic talents. 2016 Dancers’ Homework features a mixed bill of seven emerging choreographers from CCDC. Through their works, they react and revitalise the unique rhythm in this city.  Lee Ka-ki Nothing is known when we meet someone, somewhere or something new. They become familiar as time goes by. Time flies, things change. Are we searching for a moment of peace through the reconstruction of things that we know?  Lee Ka-ki, choreographer of P BOARD Q and Space within continues the imagination of space, finding harmony in the disharmony among urban dwellers.   Kelvin Mak Praised by SCMP as a “standout” dancer, Kelvin Mak’s first choreography returns to the origin, looking for the meaning of existence. Everyone wants to find a place to settle down, but one can only find one’s true path along the journey of rediscovery.  Malvina Tam “Birds born in a cage think flying is an illness,” Alejandro Jodorowsky said. People who live in a metropolis see living at peace as unstable. Having lived abroad for two years, Malvina Tam presents a solo performance that revisits our circumstances, exploring how people survive and adapt in the information boom.   Terry Tsang The game starts at the first sight. Flirting with desire, you are living in fish tank. Between play and reality, who dominates? Terry Tsang stirs deep inside, causing reverberations within in another breakthrough piece after Patience, Exotic and Sound · Gravity.

節目簡介: CCDC精心打造「舞人習作」系列，呈現CCDC舞者獨當一面的澎湃創作力，為舞壇帶來新氣象。新年伊始，《舞人習作2016》將帶來七位舞者的清新小品，撥動我城獨有節奏，煥發生機。   陳俊瑋 Ivan Chan 在字語組成的世界，所有定義早已塵埃落定，陳俊瑋繼《Unequal》、《Naked as I Came》及長篇作品《Not Yet / To Forget》後，立意打破既定模式，呈現全新風貌。  麥琬兒 Natalie Mak 你逃跑，但我會追上；我赤裸，但你不會看見；你假裝，我卻真實；我們碰上，但誰會承認？麥琬兒首個實驗之作，藉著發現對話去探索存在我們之間屬於每個人的那一本字典。  謝甲賢　Tseky Tse 世上萬千生命，每每重要；唯獨經歷拒絕、遺棄、與愛隔絕的一群，滯留在歡樂缺席的狀態中，悲傷、痛苦、心碎，發出聽不見的哭聲。謝甲賢以生命之舞，提出未可解的疑問，未完整的生命到底是人、是物、還是虛無？
About the Programme: As one of Hong Kong’s most creative dance ensembles, CCDC has brought refreshing new voices to audiences through Dancers’ Homework, a showcase for CCDC dancers’ choreographic talents. 2016 Dancers’ Homework features a mixed bill of seven emerging choreographers from CCDC. Through their works, they react and revitalise the unique rhythm in this city.  Ivan Chan Every definition is prefixed in this world constructed by languages and words. After Unequal, Naked as I Came and the full-length Not Yet / To Forget, Ivan Chan breaks this established pattern, restarting from the body in this new work.  Natalie Mak You run away, but I'll catch up; I'm naked, but you won’t see me; you pretend, but I’m real; we meet, but who will admit to it? The first experimental dance by Natalie Mak uncovers thoughts deep inside us and the language of dialogue, all through dance.   Tseky Tse Life is important. However, thousands are unborn in the world – rejected, abandoned, isolated from love. Somewhere, they are crying without hope or joy, suffering through sorrow, pain and heartbreak. Tseky Tse raises the question: how do we define the unborn? A person? A thing? Nothing?

節目名稱: 國際黑盒劇場節2016: 《白房間》
節目簡介: 以舞踏的形式聆聽榮格七位病人的心底話語  【土方巽舞踏研究場】將聯同【香港話劇團】在國際黑盒劇場節2016於十一月十日至十三，首演香港第一齣舞踏劇場的演出:《白房間》。本製作邀請到日本舞踏創立人，土方巽的直系門生，和栗由紀夫執導，聯同本年度香港小劇場獎最佳女主角陳麗珠等人主演。  七位病人共舞於白房間內 故事人物以精神科醫生兼心理學家卡爾榮格的真實臨床個案為角色原型，以精神病醫院為場景，用舞踏譜來呈現病人。期望引發思想，什麼是「正常」，什麼是「異常」，甚至「瘋癲」。這些被大部人認為是「正常」精神狀態被扭曲的病徵，也是本劇的起點。同時，舞踏這種藝術方法，有極大的創作空間，讓舞者和演員發掘和實驗，如何以舞踏承載他們角色的複雜層面。本劇將運用土方巽所創的《舞踏譜》來演繹具深度，而又纖細微妙的舞踏。  什麼是《舞踏譜》? 它是一種以文字和畫作導引舞者的編舞方法。例如孟克Edvard Munch的《吶喊》，就是本劇其中一個角色Woman C 的呈現骨幹。附帶著《吶喊》內的人物精神狀態，同時飾演Woman C的個人故事。是圖畫、文字和身體之間的實驗，以追求舞蹈藝術中，轉化(Transformation)身體的呈現。
About the Programme: Seven patients in a white room, a spectrum of madness converge into a sharp white beam of deep love and humanity.  The White Room Research Collective (WRRC) and Hong Kong Repertory Theatre is proud to present “White Room”, Hong Kong’s first ever butoh-theatre production, which will take place from the 10-13 November as part of the International Black Box Festival 2016. This production has Yukio Waguri, a disciple of butoh founder Tatsumi Hijikata, directing. It also features critical acclaimed actress Bonni Chan, who won Best Actress in the 8th Hong Kong Theatre Libre Awards for her portrayal of madness in Psychosis 4.48 earlier this year.  Seven characters trapped in a white room Set in an mental asylum, the seven characters, man A, man B, man C, woman A, woman B, woman C, woman D, all are inspired by Carl Jung’s clinical patients. Each in a plead to stand tall in the darkness. Their burning desires loom.   Butoh-Drama Methodology Through the use of butoh-fu, the actors will develop a layered inner life of their character, each with their specific ailment. In doing so, the production hopes to pose the question of “what is normal?” “What is madness?”  Butoh-fu (舞踏譜) is a choreography method developed by Tatsumi Hijikata, the founder of butoh; it uses paintings and words as a way to access a performer’s inner world and helps them to focus their energy. For example, the character of Woman C may be given the painting “The Scream” by Edvard Munch as a source of inspiration. As she goes about her everyday actions and speaks her lines, she should also simultaneously sense the air around her distort and screaming; which in turn transforms the quality of her speech and movement.

節目簡介: 伊卡洛斯住場計劃(HKICAROS)概念來自希臘神話。穿上蜜蠟翅膀的伊卡洛斯，逃出迷宮。但因為飛得太接近太陽，令翅膀的蜜蠟熔化，而墮落海洋。  本計畫和香港國際編舞節(HKICF)希望提供平台給本港年青藝術工作者和海外藝術家在自己的藝術創作內自由飛翔冒險，同時也是一個無顧慮的演出空間，讓他們日後可以持續發展。經過HKICAROS 的實驗、嘗試、國際交流和集體創作後，來自不同國家的住場藝術工作者會在HKICF分享創作成果。  一連四晚，將有或長或短的形體演出，舞蹈經驗各異的藝術工作者，展示他們編舞、探究身體和舞蹈的作品。
About the Programme: The (HKICF) Hong Kong International Choreography Festival is modelled specifically after the residency (HKICAROS) so as to internationalize and give more opportunities to local and international artists living and working in Hong Kong by interacting, meeting and working collectively with international artists from across the world. Over four nights at Sheung Wan Civic Theatre there will be short and long performances by all artists who who have been part of the Hong Kong International Collective Artists in Residency for Opportunities and Sustainability (HKICAROS) as well as from artists who are bringing their production to the festival.
Venue: Theatre, Sheung Wan Civic Centre
venue_en: Theatre, Sheung Wan Civic Centre

節目名稱: 《對話空間》第二部曲《沒有殺過一個人》
Programme Name: Dialogue of Space Series II: Did Not Kill A Single Man
節目簡介: 七章介乎【流過血與未流過血】【殺過敵與未殺過敵】的偽歷史書寫文獻  戰爭中： 我是兇手 歷史書寫中： 我是兇手 網絡媒體中： 我是兇手 他們說，歷史，能夠還我一個自辯的機會 他們說，歷史，不能還我一個自辯的機會 他們說，歷史，還我一個不能自辯的機會 他們說，在我死了以後，便是自辯的機會  歷史不是自說自話／搬紙過字／提供答案／隔岸觀火／時空停留／⋯⋯⋯⋯
About the Programme: ‘Blood, shed or not shed’ ‘Enemies, slain or not slain’ 7 Chapters on Fabricated History  At war: I am the killer. In historical writing: I am the killer. On online media: I am the killer. History, can grant me a chance to defend myself They say; History, cannot grant me a chance to defend myself They say; History, gives me back a non-defending chance They say; After my death, it is the chance for defend myself They say.  History is NOT a monologue / a copy / an answer / a spectacle / a time stopper / ...

節目簡介: 動藝 x 二高表演  來跳吧、來玩吧！ 12月一齊來玩這個舞蹈Party！ 盪失於不同世紀  八九十年代標誌著令人趨之若騖的瘋狂反叛 每晚Party也有「奇形怪狀」的驚喜 流行電音和舞步有時青澀得令人咋舌 卻富有強烈當代風格  廿一世紀過了一半有多 我們的瘋狂跑到那裹了 專業成為了教條 規行矩步跟著「對的」主流巿場走  可望見的廿二世紀會是 New Age的世界 瘋狂的回歸 還是......  二高運用後現代解構主義的藝術手法，用看似碎片化的舞蹈動作符號體系來構建一個復雜思想意識體系的整體。尋找流行音樂文化在從前和當代劃過的痕跡，窺視它將來的軌跡，喚醒社會性遺傳下來的集體無意識，在找尋自我的同時找尋相互認可的、難以辨別對錯的社會價值、關系、規則。

節目簡介: 歷時兩年文本創作  哲學史上恆久討論  「表象」/「本質」   〈2014香港藝穗民化節參節節目〉  〈2016變革重演〉   梁天尺 x 周詠恩 x 巢嘉倫 x 葉興華   到底，是真實掩蓋世界的真相；  還是，異象埋藏於我們的本相？   某夜凌晨，一隻牛突然從天而降，  壓?加府文夫婦鄉郊旅館中的房間，喚醒昏睡中的二人，  正在留宿一宵的史堤臣老先生身亡。  語言及文字整夜在半夢半醒之間被拋來覆去，直至報紙仔前來……  終極顛覆，真相瓦解……   6月，突破困局，荒誕幻象中挖掘意識真相

節目簡介: 文字言説意義　舞蹈牽動身體 一呼一吸　　書寫生命的詩意 《非關舞蹈》吳偉碩（梵谷）X 王榮祿 透過吳偉碩（梵谷）的「文字與舞蹈對話工作坊」與 王榮祿 的身體實踐中，他們對文字和身體都做出深刻的思考。梵谷傱文字到形體表演中，領悟到文字裡隱藏著身體的經驗，而堅信舞動既然由身體出發，自然也可和文字相通。而王榮祿從文字和舞蹈裏也發現，關於生命的書寫和認識文字的生命能量，相信讓身體懂得書寫文字的源起，是能找到這一些與身體深切的關聯，也是一種趣味盈然的身體探索。 走進「艺鵠」的書本空間，這將是一場文字與舞蹈的詩交。

節目簡介: 想一次過滿足你小朋友的五個願望？在這裡，你和小朋友可一次過觀看5 個不同英語音樂劇及舞蹈劇目，包括小飛俠、獅子王、三隻小豬、愛麗絲夢遊仙境及糖果屋歷險記，與台上的小朋友一起唱唱跳跳，歡渡一個愉快的下午。再一次歡迎你來到我們 Steps Education 及 My Stage Performance Academy 的年度大匯演，一起慶祝我們學校裡的小朋友的天賦與表演天份！

節目簡介: 在不遠的未來，一個沖繩的新城市裏，有一個名叫Dara的EISA民族舞明星，他想透過對生活的了解和認識前人創造EISA的過程，幫助自已創作新的EISA民族舞。充滿熱誠的Dara打開了時間之門，穿越過去、現在及未來。他認識了不同的琉球藝術表演者，當中經歷令Dara對新琉球的印象開始改變……
About the Programme: In not-so-distant future in Neo-City Okinawa, a young man is just about to set off for his journey. His name is Dara, a star Eisa performer. He has an ambition to seek for the new Eisa which is real to his life and generation by understanding the ancestors’ spirit when they developed Eisa. Let by his great passion for the challenge, Dara opens the door of time and visits the past, present and future. As he meets the performing arts of Ryukyu and the world as well as the people who created them, his vision for “Neo Ryukyu” gradually starts to take a shape...

節目簡介: 免費節目Fun Tap Jam即興踢躂匯，是香港踢躂節的重點活動之一，以節奏為大前提，鼓勵不同層次的踢躂舞者在Tap Jam的過程中溝通、自我學習、提升和觀察，從而得以改進。感受踢躂舞藝術帶來的樂趣，分享各參與者的踢躂魔力。觀迎公眾人仕免費進場欣賞。
About the Programme: Being one of the major programmes in Hong Kong Tap Festival, Fun Tap Jam is a free style tap dance event. With strong music and energetic beat, dancers from all around the world will join together, hoping to bring improvement, inspiration and move next step forward. The public are welcome to join. Let's share the happiness and enjoy the exciting atmosphere all together!

節目名稱: 香港踢躂節2016:《拍 · 我 · 踢躂》
Programme Name: Hong Kong Tap Festival 2016: "Beat Me Tap"
節目簡介: 香港踢躂節由 R&T (Rhythm & Tempo) 主辦，是一年一度的舞蹈盛事，今年已是第六屆舉辦，希望透過邀請外國著名踢躂舞大師訪港交流，提昇業界水準，並在本地積極推廣踢躂舞藝術。香港踢躂節的交流活動包括：主題工作坊、大師分享會、即興踢躂匯及重點節目《拍‧我‧踢躂》大匯演，每年吸引超過九成的本地踢躂舞愛好者參與。本年主題工作坊及《拍・我・踢躂》大匯演嘉賓包括來自日本的浦上雄次、當間裡美及久保群清。

Programme Name: The Imperial Ice Stars' Swan Lake On Ice
節目簡介: 世界馳名的冰上皇族將以凱旋姿態重臨香江，首度於香港文化中心大劇院呈獻得獎劇目《冰上皇族天鵝湖》。由廿四位奧運及世界級冠軍溜冰選手演出，透過一系列高速跳躍及轉體動作，展現出優雅和動感，舞蹈融入花樣滑冰到另一新高峰，配以柴可夫斯基扣人心弦的音樂，華麗的舞台布景，壯觀的冰火效果及亮麗的服飾，令您一看難忘。   從倫敦到悉尼；多倫多到東京，足跡遍及多個城市，冰上皇族贏得多個藝評及觀眾的五星級讚賞。不論有否觀賞過其 精湛演出，《冰上皇族天鵝湖》將永垂不朽的經典愛情故事以舞蹈和花樣溜冰於玫麗堂皇的劇院內從新演譯，讓觀眾一看傾心。
About the Programme: The Imperial Ice Stars, make their debut at the Hong Kong Cultural Centre with their award-winning masterpiece Swan Lake on Ice.   To Tchaikovsky’s glorious music, the 24 Olympic, World, European and National Championship level skaters take ice dance to a new level with their breath-taking high-speed leaps and throws, awe-inspiring flying sequences and complex lifts, and their grace and athleticism. Sumptuous sets, spectacular fire-on-ice effects and opulent costumes all add to an unforgettable experience.   From London to Sydney and Toronto to Tokyo, The Imperial Ice Stars have earned five star praise from audiences and critics alike. This exhilarating and innovative portrayal of the iconic love story will have you on the edge of your seat.
Venue: Grand Theatre, Hong Kong Cultural Centre
venue_en: Grand Hong Kong Cultural Centre, Studio Theatre

節目簡介: 假如城市將不斷變動，人仍可以抓緊土壤嗎？ 台北、香港，城市的雙生兒 三位表演者，三個身體 漂流不斷的城市想像 帶著歌謠及舞蹈 碰觸土壤所帶來的真實生命  究竟旅程如何帶動身體去創作？ 距離又怎樣豐富了想像？ 前「優劇場」成員，台灣舞譜大師吳文翠；旅台之後更見凝練的旅台舞者郭嘉源；接受台灣表演訓練回來的新晉演者曾棱尉；再加上台灣著名獨立音樂創作人王榆鈞，同樣跨過地域之限，以「移動中的城市創作」為題展開創作，在漂流不斷的外在與心靈空間，思考城市／土地糾纏於藝術／生命的夢。 讓我們把兩城聚焦在百年牛棚，一個在地鐵開通之前，廣為人知的文化小綠洲。古蹟、兩個非正式場地、開放的空間，兩星期讓表演者與觀眾接觸更赤裸的表演土地，一個拒絕單一化的藝術前路。  曾棱尉作品《二度引力》 前往台北讀書的少女，想念香港的人 畢業回港，那邊的太陽花又盛放得令她痛心 她想起韓波與昆德拉的《生活在他方》…… 就像城市有不同的引力 總要把這個城市的她與另一邊拉扯不放 她沉默，家，在何方？ 這時雨傘 赤腳少女走上旺角街頭 踏過兩城碎落玻璃、煙霧、火焰 用血 跳著探戈  創作人以戲劇表演方式，結合舞蹈與光影技術，呈現兩城引力想像，與不同文化身分的「我」互動。
About the Programme: (Chinese Only)
Venue: Room N2, Cattle Depot Artist Village

節目簡介: 亞洲國際芭蕾舞大賽得獎者滙演乃亞洲國際芭蕾舞大賽的壓軸精彩節目。表演嘉賓雲集香港芭蕾舞團、俄羅斯克里姆林宮芭蕾舞團及菲律賓馬尼拉芭蕾舞團的芭蕾舞明星。他們將與本屆來自十五個國家三百多名選手中選出之全場大奬和金獎得主們同台演出，互相煇映。
About the Programme: Leaving his beloved rose, the Little Prince from asteroid B-612 starts his space odyssey. On his journey, he comes across the Earth, where he meets a pilot lost in the Sahara and makes friends with a fox and a snake... This story of love and courage eventually leads the lost pilot to the meaning of life hiding in the dark.  Based on The Little Prince, this dance theatre for families integrates contemporary dance, literature, music, live sand drawing and animation – an inspired, unexpected and unique interpretation of this well-loved classic.

節目簡介: 香港一直是東西方之間的交匯處，不同的文化相遇，並已發展經年。東與西，兩個看似獨立的詞彙，早已連接起來，建立一個強大多樣的寶萊塢舞蹈社羣，在我們生活的美好城市中凝聚在一起。  BEYONDancing BOLLYWOOD 2017是第二年由BEYOND Bollywood主辦。它旨在突顯文化的奇妙結合，強調寶萊塢舞蹈和不同風格音樂的作用，包括寶萊塢、古典印度舞、Bharatanatyam、Kathak。這天晚上，印度的音樂表演展開序幕，緊隨其後由多個舞蹈團演出一連串現場舞蹈。

節目簡介: Nrityaanjali is a celebration of India dance featuring traditional Kuchipudi dance, semi classical dance and also Bollywood.  The show is in celebration of Master Hari Om’s decade long journey of dance in Hong Kong. All dance lovers are most welcome to be a part of this celebration. About Master Hari Om: Born in a family of artists, Master Hari Om started learning dance at an early age of 3 and also started teaching very early since he was 14. During his time as a student he has won several competitions, participated in international Kuchipudi dance festivals and also a recipient of scholarship from Indian government to learn Kuchipudi. He came to Hong Kong in 2003 and introduced Bollywood Fusion, Kuchipudi, Indian Dance (semi-classical dance) and Bhangra which became a trend in all yoga centers in Hong Kong. Master Hari Om is one of the rare dance masters who are capable of doing both the traditional and modern dances at the same time. He trained and taught several dancers in Hong Kong with utter dedication and passion which can be found in the dance of all his students who dance to be happy. His students are now performing professionally as well. His work as a dancer, choreographer and dance master speaks for his talent, love and passion for dance.
About the Programme: We are powerless against fate. We don’t have the strength to change what we lack inside. Even when we live in a materialistically rich world, we can’t be free from fear.  “All phenomena are illusionary and unsubstantial,” according to the Diamond Sutra. How one sees the world depends on one’s viewpoint. How one understands the emotional realm depends on awakening the senses. Reset your life to allow for an infinity of unlimited possibilities.  Following his emotional letter to Hong Kong, Fragile Beauty, world-renowned Tibetan choreographer Sang Jijia has created a new work to examine the many faces of life. Sentimental Reality travels down the path of life, from the mundane to the monumental, facing life, death, and fate. Making this epic journey with Sang are dramaturg Tang Shu-wing, composer Dickson Dee, set designer Leo Cheung, costume designer Cindy Ho Pui-shan and lighting designer Low Shee Hoe. This will surely be the most magnificent work of the season.
Venue: Theatre, Sheung Wan Civic Centre
venue_en: Theatre, Sheung Wan Civic Centre

節目簡介: [全球期待]：2017 Joint-U Mass Dance 大學聯校巡迴舞蹈匯演，星期五 1230 第一場又係喺EdU開始，你準備好未？ 3 Nov (Fri) 1230 EdU Central Plaza 6 Nov (Mon) 1255 BU 蒙民偉廣場 7 Nov (Tue) 1900 LU 永安廣場 9 Nov (Thu) 1300 CU 百萬大道烽火台 10 Nov (Fri) 1200 OU 1/F 多用途禮堂 13 Nov (Mon) 1230 SYU 文康大樓 LG2 室內運動場 15 Nov (Wed) 1200 HKU Happy Park 22 Nov (Wed) 1230 CityU U-Circle 24 Nov (Fri) 1230 PolyU Logo Square 29 Nov (Wed) 1800 UST Atrium 十場已經更新完，早一個鐘霸位是常識。
About the Programme: 【Asian Première】   An exotic fable of a dashing pirate’s love for a beautiful harem girl, Hong Kong Ballet’s première of "Le Corsaire" features captive maidens, rich pashas, suspenseful abductions, dramatic rescues and a poisoned rose, culminating in an unexpected shipwreck that’s one of the most breathtaking spectacles in all of ballet! Based on "The Corsair" by Lord Byron and choreographed by Anna-Marie Holmes, former Artistic Director of Boston Ballet, this exhilarating production is full of adventure, action, comedy, and romance with a famous pas de trois from its colourful cast of characters!   Holmes won an Emmy Award for her staging of "Le Corsaire" for American Ballet Theatre (ABT) on Public Broadcasting Service (PBS)’s ‘Great Performances’. "Le Corsaire"’s showcase of virtuoso ballet techniques, with bravura roles for men, feisty female characters and jubilant group dances, is a standout in classical repertoire. Love worth having is love worth fighting for!

節目簡介: 一個男孩、一個女孩，來自兩個對敵的幫派，構成一個永誌難忘的愛情故事。  被英國泰晤士報譽為「最熱爆勁舞音樂劇」，《夢斷城西》至今仍是永垂不朽。  《夢斷城西》於1957年首次踏上百老滙舞台，憑創新的編舞及音樂，將莎士比亞經典名劇《羅密歐與茱麗葉》中可歌可泣的愛情故事重現於五十年代紐約年青幫派之間，為音樂劇場帶來全新面貌。  好評如潮，從倫敦、東京到悉尼，多個城市門票火速售罄，這齣精彩而嶄新的經典勁舞音樂劇將緊接來港演出。  多位國際級演員呈獻動感熱舞，演繹多首金曲如Maria、Tonight、Somewhere、America及I Feel Pretty，讓香港觀眾感受前所未有的震撼。  《夢斷城西》是一齣音樂及戲劇均熱情澎湃的作品。其同名電影更榮獲10項奧斯卡獎項，當中包括最佳電影，為《夢斷城西》這個經典故事創下無可比擬的大師級傑作美譽。香港觀眾絕對不能錯過！
About the Programme: Hip-hop is a tough game in which only the best survive. In the heavily male-dominated hip-hop industry, principal dancer and choreographer Marion Motin has set out to demonstrate that in a universe of Hip-hop, women can ‘own’ the place.  Motin constructs In the Middle like a movie with light a key part. Marion Motin uses spotlights to mimic the flashing lights of cameras in order to intensify the atmosphere.  She loves images and displays that defy obvious explanations – indeed, she describes the show as “a multitude of emotions, encounters, stages, as well as music, images, gestures …”, allowing her audiences to contribute to making their own interpretations.  Cross–border choreographer, Marion Motin started lessons in classical dance at just five.  In 1996, she started dancing on the streets realising her passion for Hip-hop. She has worked with pop sensation Madonna and Belgian singer Stromae, which expanded her hip-hop opportunities.  In 2015, she also collaborated with Christine & The Queens for her tour Chaleur Humaine.
Venue: Lyric Theatre, The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts

節目名稱: 「團結・節奏 編舞計劃」作品展演
Programme Name: Hong Kong New Tapper Choreography Project Showcase
節目簡介: 「團結」──將香港有潛質及專業的踢躂舞者團結及集中起來 「節奏」──把每人心目中不同的舞蹈節奏以踢躂舞呈現出來 「編舞」──如何利用不同的創作靈感及編排把聽得見的舞蹈在舞台上呈現給觀眾。  R & T（Rhythm & Tempo）首辦「團結・節奏 編舞計劃」之作品展演將於以下時間公演，是次製作我們揀選了4組踢躂舞者，並邀請日本大師Yoshiko 向他們傳授編舞技巧。  在展演上，4組舞者會向大家展示自己的踢躂編舞作品，展示他們的創作意念。表演期間，觀眾亦可近距離觀賞舞者精湛的舞技。
About the Programme: Winner of Hong Kong Dance Awards 2016 Outstanding Performance by a Female Dancer Outstanding Performance by a Male Dancer Outstanding Set Design for Dance  L'Amour Immortel The futile love between man and ghost has long carried metamorphic connotations in Chinese literature. Women, in particular, were depicted as ingenious, headstrong and bold – contrary to the gentle, motherly yet oppressed figures in history. For some, the existence of these ghostly women became their silent cry against patriarchy, while others saw an outlet for their fantasy.  L’ Amour Immortel is the most enduring story from the literary classic Strange Tales from a Chinese Studio, written by Pu Songling three centuries ago. It chronicles the star-crossed encounter between Nie Xiaoqian, a beautiful, bewitching ghost, and good-natured scholar Ning Caichen. Nie has been coerced by the devil to prey on humans, but loses her heart to the truthful scholar. The lovers must traverse the shadowy underworld, defending their love and freedom. Will Nie defy the netherworld to save her love from the evil force, even at the cost of her own afterlife? L’ Amour Immortel celebrates the beauty of love and humanity. Gripping and heart-thrilling, the poignant story has been repeatedly adapted for cinema and television, making it a time-honoured household name.
Venue: We Draman Black Box Theatre

About the Programme: Day in and day out the same old thing, eat, sleep, work, repeat.  What is it that drives us to keep on keeping on?  As our passion guides us, we dance through our life.  As our passion drives us, we radiate our light.  As our passion ties us, we unite in our plight.  We move through life, sometimes with haste, sometimes with grace—fleeting moments, that ephemeral balance.   The 2nd teacher/student co-creation from creator Miss Eve Yu & Gravity Ballet, “C'est la Vie”, continues the narration of the constant collisions we experience between our dreams and our realities.

About the Programme: Simon says by Emmanuelle Vo-Dinh France x Hong Kong collaboration  Le French May Arts Festival & Unlock Dancing Plaza presents Emmanuelle Vo-Dinh’s new piece Simon says. Inspired by her fruitful exchange with four Hong Kong-based dancers in 2015, Vo-Dinh wanted to continue working with them to develop a piece of original choreography.  The premise was simple, let’s combine two childhood games: Simon says and the electronic parlour game Simon with its four coloured buttons where players have to recreate sequences associating sounds and colours. What they both have in common is the risk-taking, self-control, concentration, adrenaline rush… as well as the fact that both happen in a space of obedience and alienation.  With this basic idea of two games with four players, dancers from Hong Kong – who Emmanuelle Vo-Dinh met during a workshop there – travelled to Le Havre to continue working with her. Improvising, making and breaking rules as they went along, reflecting on the results, then letting go – a new challenge for the four more used to learning and assimilating choreographed steps – Simon says grew out of the artistic interface between these two approaches, blending efficiency, mastery, a love of games, and ever-reformulating situations. Between submission and rebellion, let the game begin!
Venue: Youth Square, Y Theatre

節目簡介: 朱䴉，象徵幸福吉祥的美麗珍禽，被稱為「吉祥之鳥」。在很久以前的農耕時代，朱䴉與人類和諧共處，相伴相生。在人類的記憶深處，朱䴉是一種多情的鳥類，它們矜持、典雅、潔淨、高貴，同時也敏感、脆弱和多疑。那時，朱䴉與人類是多麼親近友善，多麼情意綿綿。 不知自何時起，「吉祥之鳥」漸漸淡出了人類視線。人類在向現代化與城市化的快速奔跑中，不經意間忽略了朱䴉生存環境的惡化。野生朱䴉繁衍所必須的藍天淨水和寧靜自然的棲息生態，已經變得越來越狹小，越來越險惡了。僅僅不到一百年，野生朱䴉種群便已宣告瀕臨絕跡。 一九八一年五月，中國科學家在陝西洋縣意外發現了七隻野生朱䴉，一度被宣告瀕臨絕種的「吉祥之鳥」又重新走進了人類視線。今天，在中國、日本、韓國以及東西伯利亞，在人類越來越自覺的精心保護和悉心愛護下，朱䴉又出現了物種復蘇的吉祥徵兆。 「生命中不能承受之輕」，為了曾經的失去，呼喚永久的珍惜。
About the Programme: Slow Down. Seek the Origin. Sample Alternatives. As one of Hong Kong’s most creative dance ensembles, CCDC brings refreshing new voices to the dance floor with Dancers’ Homework, a showcase for CCDC dancers to express their choreographic talent. 2017 Dancers’ Homework features a mixed bill of experimental works by four emerging choreographers from CCDC, reinvigorating our connection with our city’s rhythm and refreshing our minds when facing challenges of coming years.  Ivan Chan Aurora Rolling in the deep swirl of time, the price we pay for chasing boundlessly is to lose the ability to remember daily happenings. We save up to travel many miles to the so-called top ten sites we must see in our lifetime while such utopia might well be common sights to the people in the vicinity. After Unequal of Imagination Boom, Naked as I Came, Not Yet / To Forget and Inconnu, Ivan Chan chases the “loves” around you today flowing on Reynaldo Hahn’s notes.  Bobo Lai X – 85213 You may think I am crazy but I just think you misunderstand totally. It is common to see the phrase “back to normal” in Facebook comments, Instagram hashtags and on headlines. We all have our own definition of “normal”, but where is the line differentiating genius and idiot? Do we take our daily experiences for granted and lose the self-awareness required to discover alternatives? If our neigbour gazes out of the window every midnight for seven years waiting the spaceship to bring them home. Would you reply with a “wow” or an “it’s just seven years”? This experimental dance fantasy by Bobo Lai uncovers thoughts inside those our eyes see as fools.  Lee Ka-ki To Gather We cross paths on a train platform. We glimpse each other as our shoulders brush pass. I think of you when I close my eyes. When I open my eyes, I notice my existence ever after eyes open. Clinging to the balloon of imagination, Lee Ka-ki – choreographer of “DAN”s Room, P BOARD Q and Space Within – floats through time to search for the piece of sky that belongs to us.  Kelvin Mak Lies in Waiting When the truth is being killed grain by grain and buried by layers and layers of lies, how can we tell between true and false or the light and dark side of humanity? After Echoes Within, Kelvin Mak, who has been praised by SCMP as a “standout” dancer, searches for the lenses that can help us see clearly in the whirl of chaos.

節目簡介: 「緣督以為經，可以保身，可以全生，可以養親，可以盡年。」 出發於兩類文化的承傳，引領著一項身體的研習。  是次身體研習創作因應編舞多年在中國武術、太極及舞蹈藝術的訓練根底下，作為一個解牛的庖丁，探索及研究舞動方式如何讓身體與自然融合，「依乎天理，因其固然」，摒除相互排斥的利害衝突，歸向合於一的規律系統。

節目名稱: 不加鎖舞踊館 #DANCELESS 演出暨分享會
Programme Name: 不加鎖舞踊館 #DANCELESS 演出暨分享會
節目簡介: 公眾參與（Participation）是不加鎖舞踊館未來的重要藝術發展方向。近年，我們專注發展#DANCELESS系列──引導公眾參與，藉著身體和日常生活物料（如塑膠袋、乒乓球、紙等）的互動，探索身體的律動和感知，讓不同社群體驗舞動的樂趣。  我們將於分享會中展現 #danceless01 和 #danceless03 兩項創作，誠邀各位前來觀賞和探尋#DANCELESS的奧妙。  #danceless01 - The Sound 王榮祿  反式思考舞蹈的新構成；從聲音、動能和空間的移動，尋找人與人之間的微妙關係。聲音以各自的名字開始，之後重組變調百般變化，只為了能招喚和控制一個由垃圾膠袋製成的迷你沙發。最終迷你沙發夢幻變大，但大家卻只能淩空坐在上面。  #danceless03 - bolero 王榮祿  舞以「老」入題，從bolero中編舞更看到 blo 與 old 的暗示。期盼讓我們沒有遺憾地回看生命原來都熱情如衷。以舞蹈工作坊和參與者玩著身體律動遊戲，從專注中解放身體的想像，從身體互動中建立彼此默契，至於這個舞蹈就在參與者和我及觀眾彼此的交心中自然完成。 此作品首演於2015年，至今已於日本、韓國、新加坡的六個藝術節中展演。

節目簡介: 逾百年歷史的聖彼得堡俄羅斯芭蕾舞劇院首度訪港，為觀眾帶來經典芭蕾舞劇《天鵝湖》。《天鵝湖》於一八七七年首演，今年正是此劇面世一百四十週年！柴可夫斯基創作的優美旋律可謂家傳戶曉、大師佩迪巴的經典編舞令舞者幻化成優雅的天鵝，加上動人的故事情節，使《天鵝湖》成為芭蕾舞劇中的不朽傳奇！  聖彼得堡俄羅斯芭蕾舞劇院以保留舞劇的原貌為宗旨，致力把百多年前的芭蕾舞藝術忠實復現觀眾眼前。劇院由俄羅斯遠渡而來，為香港觀眾呈獻原汁原味的俄派芭蕾舞，萬勿錯過！
About the Programme: About 【KATERINA JOUMANA】 performing artist, teacher, choreographer, dance company owner/director.  Katerina started her dance education at the age of 5 with classical ballet. Having finished ballet school in her home town of Baikonur, Kasakhstan, she moved to Moscow, Russia, where she had worked for several state dance companies and at the same time obtained a master's degree at university. Committed to life-long learning, Katerina continued to perfect her ballet technique over the years, extensively studied modern/contemporary dance and bodywork (the Feldenkrais method of somatic education).  Having fallen in love with Oriental/Middle-Eastern dance in 2004, Katerina devoted her career to this art form, has won several international dance competitions and founded her dance company "Joumana Dance Show", which has been performing to ever increasing audiences for more than 10 years now, based in two world capitals – Moscow/Russia and Vienna/Austria. Having performed solo and with the company on four continents, Katerina relies on the traditional Middle-eastern dance and musical forms. However at the same time she gives them a contemporary touch, mixing the traditional with contemporary, classical with expressive show styles, working with various musicians and creating inspiring choreographies. She sees oriental dance as an art form, sending the message of not only beauty and elegance, but also acceptance, appreciation of various cultures, being open to new creative ideas and finding one's true potential.  Katerina currently resides in Vienna, Austria, where she teaches classical ballet and middle-eastern dance to the new generations of dancers. She enjoys the transformative effect of dance on her students and continuing to learn from them. She manages and choreographs for her dance company, as well as travels extensively to teach and perform in various countries.

節目名稱: 《沙丘上的巴別塔 : 舞踏深水埗》
Programme Name: "The Third Tower of Babel : A Butoh Interpretation of Sham Shui Po"
節目簡介: 兩年半前，亞洲民眾戲劇節協會聯同香港舞踏•舞踏節舉辦了舞踏演出:第二個巴比塔舞踏城寨.演出者包括了石本華江及她的舞團[妄人文明]成員，以及香港的舞踏人梁嘉能，梁偉傑，周可凡等和其他舞踏工作坊参與者。演出位於土瓜灣工廠大廈的香港電影文化中心及其天台。它的超現實，殘酷劇場美學，黑暗，但充滿活力地演繹九龍城寨和當下的香港,绝對地為了一個令人難忘的演出和經驗。它更或多或少预言了隨後發生的雨傘運動.  現在與石本華江和她的日本團隊善財和也、松岡大，香港的梁嘉能、梁偉傑和胡美寶聯同新舊合作者再度走在一起排演沙丘上的巴比塔 :舞踏深水埗。這是另一場舞踏的盛宴.九龍舊區深水埗在眾位資深舞踏人演繹下,有多少失落,希望和叛逆?它又多少是深水埗邊緣社群的呐喊?表演將在石硤尾一所已故工廠大廈的天台,和觀眾一起近望和身歷深水埗。
About the Programme: An anthem of Jiangnan maiden’s devoted love  A panoramic view of Zhejiang’s folk marriage custom   Grand Red Trousseaus‧Dream of a Maiden  Grand Red Trousseaus‧Dream of a Maiden is a grand dance theatre infused with the folk customs of Eastern Zhejiang. It is inspired by the millennium-old wedding customs in Jiangnan (Southern China) and the history of Ningbo migrant workers who roamed around the country. The dance drama tells the romantic legend about the loyal and unchanging love of a lady from a wealthy family living in an ancient town in Southern China during the late Qing and early republic era.   Grand Red Trousseaus‧Dream of a Maiden has received the 11th National Construction of Spiritual Civilisation of ‘Five “One” Project’ Award.

節目名稱: 第四屆香港舞踏節: SU-EN舞踏方法工作坊總結演出
Programme Name: The 4th Hong Kong Butoh Festival: SU-EN Butoh Method Introduction Workshop Finale Performance
節目簡介: 演出及編排為SU-EN舞踏方法入門工作坊之展演，舞碼由身體發展出來的素材編作。這場總結演出是一個很好的機會讓參加者得以在舞台上體現舞踏身體的藝術。表演會包括KAI-EN(2010年於SU-EN舞踏團畢業之舞者)表演的獨舞。  SU-EN舞踏 • 旨在以舞踏形式塑造舞動與表演的身體形態 • 這形態會被重建及重新定義 • 在身體與空間遭受挑戰之下將展現出新的可能性 • 為舞台表演及編舞方法提供了更多可用材料。  結合身體舞踏元素，工作坊 包含呼吸、重心、平衡、持久力及力量的基礎訓練，一起探究肢體動作、習慣及其結構，其中一些練習可能會在室外並且多以二人一組形式進行。(這次工作坊為入門簡介，深入掌握此舞踏宜接受訓練三至五年)

節目名稱: 第四屆香港舞踏節: 《煙塵》
節目簡介: 於不完整的空間 她感受著自身 隨著黑色粉末的香氣 輕舔那若隱若現的傷 這場黑色獨舞表演領大家進入一個以媒煙彌漫創造的任意形態世界， 黑色吞嚥所有其他的色彩。人類文明及文化行為留下足跡， 煤粉騷動威脅著其他生命，卻把美麗鮮活昇華。 這個獨舞表演已於世界巡迴演出並透過呈現SU-EN父親心靈的幽暗向他致敬。

節目簡介: 原定於2017年8月27日 (星期日) 於香港演藝學院戲劇院舉行之“Dance Festival 2017 - Timeless Reel”因8號颱風關係經已更改為9月10日下午2時30分。持有原定場次2017年8月27日 (星期日) 下午2時30分門票之觀眾，可直接持票出席於2017年9月10日 (星期日) 下午2時30分之演出或要求全數退款。
About the Programme: From September 2017 to February 2018, WE Dance returns to the Nursery Park! Taking place every second Sunday of the month at Freespace Happening, WE Dance is an exciting participatory dance programme that invites you to join fun dance activities in a natural outdoor environment – relaxing both your body and your mind! This season, we have a wide range of exciting dance forms for you to enjoy. In September we open with workshops on Israeli folk dance, where tutors from the Hong Kong Dance Federation help you learn fun, simple steps to lively, middle-eastern rhythms, and in October, students from the School of Dance at The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts share easy-to-learn ballet barre and mime exercises. In November, learn how to communicate with strangers through dance at Otrotango Dance Company’s very special Argentine tango workshop, in December, join the fun, family Latin workshops hosted by the tutors and young dancers of K&B Dance Company, and in January, take part in a WE Dance journey through the park. The season comes to a spectacular close in February 2018 with a five-hour non-stop WE Dance Finale that everyone is invited to be part of!  Keep up to date with our monthly line-up – and get ready to dance!

節目名稱: 第二十四屆元朗藝術節：《冷箭》
節目簡介: 人生遍佈圍城，身陷其中，不免選擇與掙扎。你我的應對卻永遠千差萬別，但世界正因此保持著別樣的平衡。首演至今逾十年，時間洗煉，棋局依舊精彩非凡……  2006年《冷箭》於北京正式首演。這部煥發大氣磅礴、充滿中國文化意象的現代舞作品，將當時剛成立的北京雷動天下現代舞團轟轟烈烈地推向世人。方寸之間，寫照生命圍城；目光所及，充斥人生兩色。舞團聯合創始人李捍忠和執行藝術總監馬波，憑藉深厚的創作功力和敏銳的藝術思考，在中國圍棋的靈感中為作品注入令人魂牽夢繞的靈魂和力量。伴隨美國著名作曲家大衛‧達林悠揚的大提琴聲，舞台上偌大的棋盤中穿梭著遐想的人群，就如同現實中的你、我、他。
About the Programme: Folding Echoes - Joseph LEE  Folding Echoes explores the way contemporary dance performance being seen, interpreted and comprehended. Everything in the work points to the ambiguity of our cognitive experience, which differs among individuals.   The 16th Day - Gabbie CHAN  The 16th Day is an art piece which brims with emotions and complex self-struggling. It is not only a personal story but it also questions about in what way the society affects our personal values and how to break with the traditional meaning of “beauty”.   Xin Xiang - Pewan CHOW  The concept behind this piece is related to a traditional Chinese image, a ‘Tree’ as symbols of existence and a representation of the philosophy of life; self-realization, resilience and self-contentment.

節目簡介: 虛擬? 真實? 當代女偶紀事的金光浮世繪 充滿台客同人誌色彩的舞蹈劇場 暗藏反動的慾望 在觀看別人中 看見自己  超現實視覺潮佼佼者，臺灣編舞家何曉玫，自歷年累積的作品意象裡，重新調配出一台充滿台式扮裝(cosplay)精神的集錦式製作《默島新樂園》。匯集了從家將神祇、檳榔西施、布袋人偶到芭比娃娃等各種辨識度極高的臺灣特殊文化符號，創造一幕幕台洋雜處的金光浮世繪，將在地的廟會氣息帶入劇場，並藉由芭比娃娃式的人偶美學，隱喻俗艷與寂寞並陳的現代社會。  經典再製的《默島新樂園》系列，融合辨識度極高的臺灣文化符號，以劇場舞蹈方式呈現，重新詮釋出傳統文化的當代實驗性。編舞家對於社會性別的觀察，挑戰在舞作中不停反轉觀看與被觀看者的角色立場，以巧妙的超現實表現手法，無比誠懇地演繹時代流轉之下的改換世間。模糊了實寫與創作的邊界，由打破框架的表演方式拉引出深刻的共鳴。

節目名稱: 根與魂–浙江非物質文化遺產匯演：舞劇《十里紅妝．女兒夢》
Programme Name: Genesis and Spirit - A Showcase of Intangible Cultural Heritage of Zhejiang：Dance Drama "Grand Red Trousseaus．Dream of a Maiden"
節目簡介: 一部江南女子忠貞愛情的讚美詩  一幅浙江民間婚嫁習俗的風情畫   《十里紅妝‧女兒夢》  《十里紅妝‧女兒夢》是一部反映浙東民俗風情的大型舞劇，脫胎於千百年來的江南婚嫁民俗和寧波幫走南闖北的歷史。舞劇講述了清末民初一位居於江南古鎮的大家閨秀忠貞不渝的愛情傳奇。 阿甬和越兒自小青梅竹馬，在豆蔻之年互訴芳心。「等我回來，做我的新娘」阿甬的一句承諾譜寫了越兒的思念等待，永恆不變、守望於此的十里紅妝 ‧ 女兒夢。  本劇曾獲中國第十一屆精神文明建設「五個一工程」獎。

About the Programme: Beautiful Reflections of Lotus and Bauhinia  2017 marks the 20th anniversary of the establishment of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region. To celebrate this happy occasion, the Hong Kong Dance Expo will lift the curtain on performances with Dance Across Hong Kong – Special Performance of the Lotus Awards and Bauhinia Cup to Celebrate the 20th Anniversary of the Establishment of the HKSAR. The excellent works awarded in the Lotus Awards and the Bauhinia Cup will be jointly presented by the Chinese Dancers Association and the Hong Kong Dance Federation. Such meaningful cooperation and exchange will fully review the joyous celebration of the pearl of the orient as well as the beautiful reflections of the lotus and bauhinia.

節目簡介: 放緩促步，重索初衷，細嚐另擇  CCDC精心打造「舞人習作」系列，呈現獨當一面的CCDC舞者澎湃的創作力，為舞壇帶來新氣象。《舞人習作2017》為2017年揭開序幕，觸動都市節奏下繃緊的神經骨髓，煥發創新思維迎接來年的挑戰。  陳俊瑋 〈奧羅拉〉 太少空間，太多蹺蹊；太少深刻，太多消失；網誌上人生不可不看的十大奇景爭相招徠，積蓄省下，踏破鐵鞋⋯⋯或者，在某個角落的日常就正是我們趨之若鶩的烏托邦。陳俊瑋繼《Unequal》、《始至》、《不曾/忘記》及《陌》後，從雷納爾多‧哈恩的音符抒發舞頌，今天與你重新感覺一切是愛。  黎家寶 〈X-85213〉 『別人笑我太瘋癲，我笑他人看不穿。』 臉書上的留言、線上相片分享的標籤、或媒體發放的主題，「回到正常生活」或「恢復正常運作」不絕於耳，何謂「正常」，人人心中自有一把尺，天才與白痴只是一線之差，對經驗之日常是否已習以為常？七年來一直半夜坐在窗前等待外星人帶自己回家，「七年」對你來說只是「嘩」的一聲還是「七年而已」? 黎家寶奇想之作，帶領我們窺探視為瘋子的七年心窗。  李家祺 〈同生共〉 車站月台你來我往擦肩而過，兩線相交驚鴻一瞥，閉目想念，眼睛張開，感悟自身存在從未如此踏實。繼《單s室》、《囚人》、《空間之間》編舞李家祺拿起想像的汽球，飄浮在時間河流，跟你一同穿越人世景況，尋找自己活著的天空。  麥卓鴻 〈遍地謊蜚〉 無數問號被靜默吻去，從不聽不講一聲一句，還是真理在胸筆在手？當真理被埋，遍地謊言時，要如何分清真與偽、人性光與暗？曾被《南華早報》點名讚評，舞技矚目的麥卓鴻繼首個創作《留⋯⋯處》後，帶你踏進沙土漩渦，在時代亂流之中尋找分辨清濁的鏡片，重思掙扎求存之道。
About the Programme: Award-winning original musical back by popular demand, up another league Football players of Hong Kong reaching beyond Asia An exhilarating tale of passion and dreams  When it comes to football, there should be no divide among us. Once upon a time, Lee Wai Tong, the King of Football in Hong Kong, led the Republic of China football team for the first time to compete in the Olympics in Berlin. The year was 1936. Eight football players from Lo Wai, a small fishing village in Tai Hang, Hong Kong, made history with their skills in football, taking their dreams and passion beyond Hong Kong, into the international arena. At a time when resources were hard to come by, it was faith and determination that took them the furthest in pursuing their dreams.  Premiered in 2008, Field of Dreams received four Hong Kong Drama Awards that year, including Best Overall Performance, Best Original Music, Best Actor (Tragedy / Drama) and Top Ten Most Popular Productions. With Leon Ko as composer and Chris Shum as lyricist, the duo behind the Hong Kong film Perhaps Love, Field of Dreams will be revived for the second time. Joining hands with the Hong Kong Dance Company with live accompaniment, the 2017 production promises to take the acclaimed musical to a whole new level of visual and musical enjoyment.

節目簡介: 面對命運，我們無力； 面對自身匱乏，我們無力改變； 即使處身最豐饒的世界，卻仍然逃不過恐懼的網羅。  「凡所有相，皆是虛妄」 實相是真相，無不相則生萬法； 有相，無相，觀乎心。  從大徹大悟的境界領會後感性， 將人生重設，擁有無限可能性。  譽滿國際的藏族編舞家桑吉加繼《煙花‧冷》道盡香港感懷後，新作《後感性‧實相》揣摩人生百態，面對日常、命運、生死，在不安中匍匐而行。夥拍強勁幕後團隊：劇作指導暨文本創作鄧樹榮、原創音樂李勁松、佈景設計張國永、服裝設計何珮姍以及燈光設計劉詩豪，打造年度最恢宏之舞作。

節目簡介: 你何時學會恐懼？  何時我們成為了他們？   將他人本質化，自我配上偽裝的正當性  手持合乎理性的武器，視原地不動的為他者，就有了屠殺的理由  「善」的、「惡」的、「好」的、「壞」的，全都罪有應得  是耶？非耶？  不要默默活在其中，隨波逐流，不作異聲   武術與舞蹈同源。曾獲八卦掌冠軍、內家拳冠軍兼舞者黃振邦繼2015年《發現號》之 〈……是如何鍊成的？〉後，再次以武/舞觀照世界。

節目簡介: 從街舞的元素出發，創造出緊貼地氣的當代舞蹈劇場，把源於街道和城市的街舞文化，轉化成勁度十足的劇場經歷。擅長於街舞語言及音樂的本地年青編舞陳頴業，透過是次作品去揭示當下的城市生活，青春劇般的熱血根本從未出現，真我根本慢慢地被抹殺。  當人去到某一臨界點，就會開始抉擇，從認命到堅持，從堅持到認命……最初抱擁著赤子之心，無畏無懼，到後來卻耗盡全身的活力去娛慾自己、追逐利益……

節目簡介: 來自B-612星球的小王子，離開了他心愛的玫瑰，展開了一場充滿愛與勇氣的星際漫遊。他輾轉來到地球，在撒哈拉沙漠遇上迷途的飛行員，又在途中認識了狐狸、蟒蛇……與小王子相遇的飛行員終於明白自己失落了的純真與初心，決定重新用心感受所愛的一切。  合家歡當代舞劇《小王子》，改編自法國同名經典，並由舞團副藝術總監黃狄文與沙畫藝術家海潮跨媒體合作，用沙子重現飛機師與小王子在撒哈拉沙漠上的初見。節目將揉合舞蹈、文學、音樂、現場沙畫與動畫影像，將一幕幕經典場景活現舞台，化成精緻瑰麗、觸動人心的畫面，與大人小朋友一起感受愛！
About the Programme: Asian Grand Prix Winners’ Gala is the grand finale of the Asian Grand Prix International Ballet Competition, a leading ballet competition in Asia. Ballet stars from Hong Kong Ballet, Kremlin Ballet Russia, and Ballet Manila Philippines will shine on stage with the new winners of Grand Prix Awards and Gold Medal this year, selected from over 300 candidates from 15 countries in a week of exciting competition.
